trainer_description_en.lsd.10098000000: An optimist whose constant smiling is infectious, he loves malasadas and fun. He takes Pokémon battles where Trainers are in sync with their Pokémon very seriously.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10099000000: An incredibly impetuous, high-spirited young man who runs straight for what he wants without any hesitation, he has an earnest passion for Pokémon.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10101000000: This high-spirited young lady likes to stand out and has a strong sense of justice. Her dream is to have many battles with Trainers all over the world.
trainer_description_en.lsd.18000000000: A new Trainer on a new adventure with [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon, ready to take [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] important first steps toward becoming a Pokémon master.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10110000000: A Gym Leader known as the Tomboyish Mermaid, she has an upbeat personality but also acts tough and takes rules very seriously.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10106000000: This Electric-type Gym Leader also works as a model. Watching her battle in the beautiful, bright lights of her Gym can be mesmerizing.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10153000000: One of the Hoenn League Elite Four, this elegant lady traveled far to hone her Pokémon’s Ice-type moves. She seeks opponents with a fiery passion for battle.
trainer_description_en.lsd.18000020000: With a new Pokémon partner in tow, this Trainer is ready to grow and take on tougher Pokémon battles, using [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] potential as [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] greatest weapon.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10101100000: Dressed head to toe for warm hospitality during the holiday season, Rosa and Delibird deliver joy and cheer to all of their friends.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10096100000: Though his uniform has changed, Siebold remains a chef at heart. He is working on his newest recipe, a lavish delicacy featuring Octillery ink.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10140000000: This leader of the expansive Team Rainbow Rocket enterprise, which aims to use Pokémon to rule the world, believes Pokémon are no more than tools.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10111000000: The Indigo League Champion prefers his battles fair and square, and many find his caring demeanor very endearing.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10017000000: This cheerful and friendly Trainer has an insatiable sense of adventure and absolute confidence in her battling skills.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10112000000: A reliable veteran Pokémon Trainer from Johto, this energetic nature lover can often be found roaming the mountains.
trainer_description_en.lsd.18000120000: Full of hope and curiosity about what each new day will bring, this Trainer is up to any challenge with [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Legendary Pokémon.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10129000000: This mysterious Trainer journeyed throughout the Hoenn region to carry out her mission as the Lorekeeper of the Draconid people.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10106100000: With her new sygna suit, Elesa makes sure that center stage is hers—be it in the world of Pokémon battles or fashion.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10157000000: A unique Trainer in both looks and mannerisms, she began designing Pokémon-inspired clothes in the hope that someday she could become a Pokémon.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10114000000: A powerful psychic herself, this Gym Leader who uses Psychic types can see the future with her precognitive powers. She allegedly does not like conflict.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10151000000: This Gym Leader uses Ghost types and has made a reputation for herself in both contests and Pokémon battles. She is known for her avid study of Pokémon.
trainer_description_en.lsd.10137000000: This pioneering Pokémon Professor was an accomplished Trainer in his heyday and has since become an authority on Pokémon research. He is also Blue’s grandfather.

trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10018000000: Let’s go out and look for never-before-seen Pokémon!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10019000000: Someday, I want to be a great Trainer like my dad!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10049000000: Yup, I’d like to see how far your bond will carry you.
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10051000000: Get ready for your hardest Pokémon battle yet!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10062000000: Strong Pokémon. Weak Pokémon. That is only the selfish perception of people.
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10021000000: I am the most powerful Trainer in the world!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10002000000: I’m so happy to be friends with you!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10020000000: I can’t let you get strong all by yourself!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10004000000: The only thing on my mind during a battle is victory!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10106000000: We’re going to see whose star shines brightest!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10095000000: Do your best not to bore me with a yawn-inducing battle.
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10153000000: What a relief it would be if I could, for once, have a serious battle against an opponent!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10048000000: A beautiful loss is still a loss, and an ugly win is still a win!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10101100000: My cooking will put a smile on your face!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10096100000: Ah, hello! I will be serving you today! Oh, is that not why you called me?
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10111000000: There’s no need for words now. We will battle to determine who is stronger— us or them.
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10091000000: As a Champion of the Pokémon League, I accept any challenge!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10017000000: Always believe in your Pokémon’s potential, and accept every battle you’re challenged to!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10112000000: If you wanna go exploring, I’m your guy! The beach, the mountains, or even high in the sky!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10090000000: When it comes down to it, I’m just the strongest there is right now.
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10106100000: I live my life grandly and happily by walking the fine line between beauty and eccentricity!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10114000000: If you wish, I will show you my powers!
trainer_indication_message_en.lsd.10151000000: Whenever and wherever, dance, dance, dance!

training_item_description_en.lsd.520000000001: Used for leveling up sync pairs.

villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000001001: Restores [Digit:3digits ]% of all allied sync pair’s HP.
villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000001002: Recovers all MP of all allied sync pairs.
villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000002001: At the start of battle, raises the Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed of all allied sync pairs.
villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000002002: At the start of battle, makes all allied sync pairs’ next attacks a critical hit.
villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000002003: At the start of battle, makes all allied sync pairs nullify status conditions inflicted upon them.
villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000002004: At the start of battle, reduces physical damage done to the allied field of play.
villa_item_description_en.lsd.740000002005: At the start of battle, reduces special damage done to the allied field of play.

weekly_bingo_mission_difficulty_group_pe.10001: To unlock, complete Chapter 4: A Blossoming Flower.
weekly_bingo_mission_difficulty_group_pe.10002: To unlock, complete Chapter 9: Champion on the Roster.

battle_villa_milestone_events_grade10_en.battle_villa_milestone_events_grade10/61: Hey! You made it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Guess it’s time for us to battle it out then, huh!
I’m not gonna go easy, all right? Same goes for you!
That was awesome! You’re stronger than ever, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I guess it’s time for my Pokémon and I to hit the training area! Next time, we’ll beat you for sure.
Let’s battle again soon, OK? Real soon! No backing down!

battle_villa_milestone_events_grade15_en.battle_villa_milestone_events_grade15/61: Well, fancy that. I had a feeling you could handle yourself in here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Guess I wasn’t wrong...
You know what comes next, right, kid? Time to throw down! Come at me!
Impressive! No wonder you’ve been givin’ the young master a run for his money.

battle_villa_milestone_events_grade20_en.battle_villa_milestone_events_grade20/61: Hey, hey! How’s it going? You keeping up with your studies?
Come on! Gather up all the knowledge you’ve got, and show me what you can do! Bring it on!
Way to get it done! You know what you’re doing!
Don’t let this victory go to your head, though. Keep studying hard, all right? Next time, I’m not going to let you win!

battle_villa_milestone_events_grade25_en.battle_villa_milestone_events_grade25/61: According to my data-interpreting machine... Yes. Very interesting indeed. Looks like...90 percent?
Oh, don’t let the beeping concern you. It’s time to begin!
I, on the other hand, appear to have had suboptimal results this time. That 90 percent figure must have been your odds, not mine.

battle_villa_milestone_events_grade5_en..battle_villa_milestone_events_grade5/610: Whaaat? Is that you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Did you, like, teleport up here or something? How’d you get here so fast?
Greeeat... Guess that means I gotta follow Master Lear’s orders now.
Come on. Slide on over here, and show me what you can dooo!
I’m gonna, like, crush you now, ’kay? So, y’know, hope you’re ready!
Keep this up, and you’ll be climbin’ the ranks in no time. You can dooo it!

ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Looks like you’re all charged up  and ready to go, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0101_0701_02_10: All right! It’s time to enjoy another day full of exciting battles!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_01_10: Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio. Do you know those Pokémon?
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_02_10: Those three are the Pokémon that new Trainers in the Alola region can choose from to be their first partner Pokémon.
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_03_10: They’re really energetic Pokémon, yeah! Each is an important partner for an island challenge!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_04_10: Ah! An island challenge is the Pokémon adventure that kids in the Alola region go on.
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0701_05_10: If you’re interested, try asking a Trainer from the Alola region!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0702_01_10: The day one becomes a Trainer is a precious memory! It’s something you can never forget!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0601_0702_02_10: You’re making lots of memories together with your partner, too!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_01_10: I let myself get hit with all kinds of moves so I can test their power!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_02_10: People who don’t know what I do probably think it’s pretty dangerous!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_03_10: But my body’s pretty tough, so I’m all right, even if I get knocked around a little!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0701_04_10: My lab’s all beat up from moves and from me getting sent flying!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0702_01_10: The Rockruff and Snubbull back at my lab especially love to play!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0602_0702_02_10: All the important stuff that might get broken I keep safely in another room anyway, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0701_01_10: My wife, Professor Burnet, is here on Pasio, too!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0701_02_10: Of course I’m enjoying my research, but I’m also enjoying sight-seeing.
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0701_03_10: Next, I’d like to see Pasio’s blue oceans!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0702_01_10: Alola’s beaches and Pasio’s beaches  are totally different, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0603_0702_02_10: On Alola’s beaches, you can see a lot of Pyukumuku. But Pasio’s beaches don’t have them at all!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0701_01_10: My Lycanroc is a Midday Form one!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0701_02_10: His Attack and Speed stats are high.  He’s a partner I can really rely on!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0701_03_10: He’s always looking after the Rockruff back at the lab!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0702_01_10: Rockruff are known to be really friendly!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0604_0702_02_10: When my Lycanroc was a Rockruff, he’d come up to me for attention, too!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_01_10: The Alola region didn’t have a Pokémon League until I made one, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_02_10: So up until now, the only challengers have been Trainers from the Alola region.
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_03_10: But just like other Pokémon Leagues, we’re always waiting for strong Trainers to come and challenge us!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0701_04_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Make sure you come challenge the Alola region’s Pokémon League, OK, cousin?
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0702_01_10: The Alola region’s Champion is actually around the same age as you, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/0605_0702_02_10: I’m sure you’ve got a chance to become a superstrong Trainer in the Alola region, cousin!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! Great timing, yeah! I have something I wanted to give to you!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0701_02_10: How is it? I thought this was something you could really use!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0702_01_10: When you’re out doing fieldwork, you can find these kinds of useful items sometimes.
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/1701_0702_02_10: Whenever I meet different people and Pokémon, I discover lots of new things!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0701_01_10: Your adventures take you running all over the place, don’t they? That’s great!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0701_02_10: It takes a lot of energy to do that much exploring outside, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0701_03_10: Maybe in the future you’ll become  a Pokémon Professor, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0702_01_10: Your future is overflowing  with possibilities, cousin!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0702_02_10: If you’re passionate about something, keep on challenging yourself!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2501_0702_03_10: I’ll help you out on your way, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0701_01_10: My dream was to create a Pokémon League in the Alola region!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0701_02_10: If you keep trying, your dreams can come true. I’ll never forget that—even now!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0701_03_10: If you’ve got a dream you want to make true, I’ll support you all the way, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0702_01_10: The road to making your dream come true is paved with difficulties! The normal way  of doing things often isn’t enough.
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/2511_0702_02_10: That’s why overcoming those difficulties feels even better!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Sleep well, cousin? I got some good rest, and I’m ready to go, yeah!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/3002_0701_01_10: Morning, cousin! Sharing a smile first thing makes me feel great all day!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/3003_0701_01_10: Hey there! Perfect day for some Pokémon battles, yeah? I wanna do some more move research!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/3004_0701_01_10: Hey! You’re heading out now, yeah? Have fun battling out there!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/3005_0701_01_10: Alola! Heading out now, cousin? It’s dark, but you can go anywhere with Pokémon by your side!
ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.ch0001_00_kukui/3006_0701_01_10: Evening! Still ready to go all out, cousin? Get some rest if you start to feel tired, yeah.

ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting for you!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0101_0701_02_10: Exploring together with friends is way more fun than going it alone!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_01_10: Hehe. My Chikorita is pretty cute, right?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_02_10: The leaf on her head is especially cute!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_03_10: If you get close to her head, it feels warm like the sun, right?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0701_04_10: Looking at Chikorita always reminds me of Johto!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0702_01_10: I guess a person’s hometown is a special place to them.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0601_0702_02_10: I wonder how Grandpa and Grandma are doing.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0701_01_10: Do you know the Pokémon named Marill?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0701_02_10: It’s a great Pokémon I met back in Johto!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0701_03_10: It’s got a round body like a balloon.  Don’t you think that makes it really cute?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0702_01_10: One time, my Marill fell in the mud.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0602_0702_02_10: And when I caught a whiff of its scent, it smelled like a dust mop! I was so surprised!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0701_01_10: Seems like even here there’s a lot of people who know the Johto dialect.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0701_02_10: When other people use the dialect, it starts to slip out of me, too!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0701_03_10: Do you know Valerie, from Laverre City? Do you think it’d be cute to talk the way she does?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0702_01_10: The Johto region has a lot of really old towns.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0702_02_10: I guess traveling the world makes me realize the good stuff about where I’m from.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0603_0702_03_10: Hmm, could I be feeling a little homesick?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_01_10: Seems like even if you become a great Trainer, there’ll always be people wanting to  challenge you.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_02_10: Red always gets challenged to Pokémon battles.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_03_10: Sometimes I think I’m a little jealous of him.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0701_04_10: If you’re always battling,  then there’s no time to play!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0702_01_10: Since we’re on the topic, maybe I should challenge Red, too.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0604_0702_02_10: We battled before, but was it really a great battle?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_01_10: I sometimes forget that I’m the senior Trainer when I’m with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_02_10: Sometimes it looks like you get along with your Pokémon better than me, too...
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_03_10: and you’ve helped me in Pokémon battles sometimes, too.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0701_04_10: OK! I’m going to give it my best so that you don’t surpass me anymore!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0702_01_10: You can ask me, your senior Trainer, anything you want to know, OK?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/0605_0702_02_10: I’ll show you that I can become a senior you can count on!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0701_01_10: Ah! Here it is! Have this! It’s a present from me!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0701_02_10: I used it a long time ago, but I’m OK with giving it to you!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0702_01_10: I know it’s a hand-me-down, but I’m sure it’ll really come in handy!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/1701_0702_02_10: I’ve got a lot of memories with that item, so take good care of it!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, so what’s your relationship with Red like?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_02_10: Oh, that was out of the blue, wasn’t it? I don’t mean anything weird!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_03_10: There’s something about you that reminds me of Red, but I can’t quite put my finger on it...
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_04_10: Maybe it’s how seriously you take battles or the way you refuse to lose.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0701_05_10: It could also be the way you interact  with your Pokémon. You really cherish  your Pokémon, don’t you?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2501_0702_01_10: I think you can definitely get as strong as Red!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_01_10: Today, as your senior, I’ll give you advice on whatever you want!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_02_10: If you’re worried or troubled about anything, just let me know!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_04_10: Does this mean I’m an unreliable senior?
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0701_05_10: Ah! It turns out, I’ve got something I’m worried about!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0702_01_10: It turns out, acting like your senior is pretty difficult.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/2511_0702_02_10: Hmm. Maybe I should try to act more like myself.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Great day, isn’t it. Come on. Let’s head out together with our Pokémon!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/3002_0701_01_10: I woke up super early. I just couldn’t wait to see where I’d go today!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/3003_0701_01_10: I’m a bit tired... Guess I was wandering around a little too much.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/3004_0701_01_10: I feel like taking a nap, but it just seems like such a waste to...sleep.
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/3005_0701_01_10: I bet exploring at night would be fun, too! Oh man, now I wanna head out!
ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.ch0002_00_kotone/3006_0701_01_10: Look at all the pretty stars! I bet trying to count them all would put you to sleep in no time... *yawn*

ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0101_0701_01_10: Hi, I was waiting for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Things get so slow when you’re not around.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0101_0701_02_10: Want to see which one of us can get stronger today?
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_01_10: My partner, Espurr, is a pretty popular Pokémon in the Kalos region.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_02_10: A lot of people keep them out of their Poké Balls, since they’re so friendly and affectionate.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_03_10: Of course, they’re also great in battle. You should see what mine can do!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_04_10: He’s my trusted partner, and we aim  to become stronger together.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0601_0702_01_10: Only great Trainers like me can have Espurr as a partner.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0601_0702_02_10: Mine does have a sweet tooth, though. He’s snuck off with my snacks more than once.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0603_0701_01_10: Pasio is a completely different world from Kalos.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0603_0701_02_10: I wonder... I trained pretty hard in Kalos, but how far will those skills take me here?
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0603_0701_03_10: To be honest, I’m scared to find out—but more than that, I’m excited!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0603_0702_01_10: I will overcome any obstacle Pasio throws at me!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0603_0702_02_10: I wear this hat to remind me of how determined I am. As long as I’m wearing it, I won’t forget!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_01_10: Having good teamwork is tricky, isn’t it? Different Trainers and Pokémon move at different rhythms and everything.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_02_10: When you think about it, you’re able to sync up immediately with lots of different Trainers. That’s a kind of talent, you know?
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_03_10: I hope you keep on strengthening your talents.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_04_10: I think that’s how you’ll get stronger.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0604_0702_01_10: Different people have different ways of becoming strong. I’ll get stronger in a different way than you.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0604_0702_02_10: It’s no fun if everyone is the same, anyway. I hope you look forward to seeing what my strengths are when it’s time for us to battle!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0605_0701_01_10: I don’t know what it is you’re aiming for, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0605_0701_02_10: It may even be that you’re not sure yourself.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0605_0701_03_10: But even then, I still believe that we’ll end up reaching the same place.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0605_0702_01_10: There are many different ways for people and Pokémon to interact. Same goes for people interacting with people, of course.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/0605_0702_02_10: Let’s work together to try to figure out which way is best.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are. Here, I’ve got a present for you.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/1701_0701_02_10: I want us to get strong together, so I hope you put it to good use.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/1701_0702_01_10: I don’t need anything in return, but if you insist...
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/1701_0702_02_10: The only thing I want is for you to get stronger.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_01_10: There are some moves that are easy to use, but why don’t you try out moves  you’ve never used before?
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_02_10: You might come up with new strategies, and that’ll help battles go a lot smoother.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_03_10: Before you ask, no, I’m not going to tell you what strategies I use.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_04_10: You’re one of my best opponents! I want to keep my strategies a secret until it’s time to actually battle you.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0702_01_10: Isn’t it great to have someone you really want to beat in a battle?
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0702_02_10: It’s a goal for you to pursue— to strive for that victory.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2501_0702_03_10: I hope you keep getting stronger. Because I plan on going even further than that!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_01_10: I have a friend called Serena.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_02_10: She’s a pretty dependable girl—always says exactly what’s on her mind.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_03_10: Personalities aside, you have a lot in common with her. Your strength, how you battle— that kind of thing.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_04_10: Maybe that’s why I get so stubborn about beating you. I just don’t want to lose.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0702_01_10: Serena used to be pretty quiet when we  first met. Her personality changed only recently.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0702_02_10: People tell me she totally calls the shots in our relationship.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/2511_0702_03_10: It’s not like that, though.  She’s just dead set on going her own way.  Besides, it’s not like we’re in a “relationship!”
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/3001_0701_01_10: Morning. I see you’re an early riser as well. I admire that.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/3002_0701_01_10: My Pokémon and I are always ready to go, morning, noon, or night!
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/3003_0701_01_10: Hi there.  I’m glad to see your Pokémon  happy and healthy.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/3004_0701_01_10: Hmm... It’s important to take a break  now and again, I suppose.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/3005_0701_01_10: How’s it going? I’ve been doing some extra training at night.
ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.ch0003_00_calme/3006_0701_01_10: You’re out late, aren’t you. I can keep you company for a bit.

ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I figured I’d run into you if I waited here.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0101_0701_02_10: Things just aren’t as exciting if you’re not around. Come on, let’s do our best today!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0601_0701_01_10: I’m well known as a Trainer who’s good in battles!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0601_0701_02_10: I’ve gotten good at what I love, and what I love is winning battles!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0601_0701_03_10: Winning a no-holds-barred battle... It’s the best feeling in the world!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0601_0702_01_10: When you battle, don’t you get that real strong desire to win? Especially if it’s against a strong opponent!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0601_0702_02_10: I bet you like to win, too, don’t you? If so, you might do some amazing things in battle someday!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0602_0701_01_10: I want to experience for myself every fun thing that there is.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0602_0701_02_10: I keep finding new things I want to try out... And before I know it, my schedule’s just bursting at the seams!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0602_0701_03_10: *sigh* I wish days were much, muuuuuch longer.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0602_0702_01_10: My schedule is packed full, but don’t worry! I can handle this—no problem.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0602_0702_02_10: Don’t you underestimate the potential of the expert Trainer Hilda!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0603_0701_01_10: My Tepig is a dear partner to me. She’s kept me company through all my traveling.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0603_0701_02_10: I feel like my dream of becoming the best Trainer in the world will come true if I’m with Tepig.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0603_0701_03_10: And you better believe I’m gonna make it real! I hope you’re as excited as I am for that day!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0603_0702_01_10: You know, when I give Tepig food, she always sears it before eating it.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0603_0702_02_10: So I make sure to give her food that won’t get ruined even if it’s heated up!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0603_0702_03_10: I still can’t forget the look Tepig gave me after she tried to cook ice cream and melted it...
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_01_10: I learned through my travels that the world is really huge—and that both Pokémon and people all have different ideas and ways of thinking.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_02_10: So, maybe my travels would have been different if I’d traveled with some other Pokémon instead of Tepig.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_03_10: But I am who I am, and I met you because I’m with Tepig.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0701_04_10: That’s what I call a fateful encounter!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0702_01_10: I don’t spend a lot of time thinking about “What if...”
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0702_02_10: Because for me, right now is the best there is!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0604_0702_03_10: There’s no point in regretting things after they happen. I’d rather spend the time enjoying battles!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_01_10: You know, it’s something that’ll have to wait for another day, but...
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_02_10: There’s one person I really,  really want to battle against.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_04_10: I think you’ll become an even stronger, even more amazing Trainer than you are now.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_05_10: And once you get there, I want to have  an all-out battle with you. One Trainer against another.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0701_06_10: I want to be someone who’s always strong, always cool... Someone people look up to. That’s my goal.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0702_01_10: When the time comes to battle you, I’m not going to hold anything back!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/0605_0702_02_10: It’d be super uncool if I didn’t give 100 percent when we’re about to decide who’s the most powerful Trainer!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, it’s you! Mmm, just one minute...
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/1701_0701_02_10: Ah, found it! Here, this is for you!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/1701_0701_03_10: Didn’t you want something like this? Even if not, I’m sure it’ll come in handy. Keep it!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/1701_0702_01_10: If I find anything else, I’ll be sure to let you know!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_01_10: Not to brag or anything, but you know this sync pair right here is pretty strong in battle, right?
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_02_10: So I always get asked about the secret to becoming stronger.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_03_10: But to be honest, I don’t really have a good answer to that...
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_04_10: It’s like...hard to explain. Instinct, I guess? I focus so much on the battle that I don’t really remember what I do.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0701_05_10: I wonder if my Pokémon has the same kind of thing...
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0702_01_10: The only thing I think about during battle is the word “victory”!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0702_02_10: I think my Pokémon’s the same, too. We become more in sync every time we battle!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2501_0702_03_10: So we’re able to...really, y’know, click and be in the zone.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve been told that our sync pair seems to be full of spirit and determination whenever we battle.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_02_10: I guess it makes sense. I definitely  don’t want to lose, so I get in the zone.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_03_10: Winning is cool! That’s all that matters!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_04_10: *sigh* I’m joking, of course!  But don’t you think that’s  a cool way to look at it?
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0701_05_10: I mean, we’re definitely getting stronger, so why not let people see it?
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_01_10: It’s not like I’m trying to intimidate my opponents, OK? You don’t have to believe me, but it’s true.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_02_10: Still, even my partner seems to...radiate strength, I guess?
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_03_10: I feel like she’s grown in confidence since I first met her.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/2511_0702_04_10: Heh, it’s definitely reliable! I’m really proud of my partner.
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Let’s go get ’em again today!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! I’m looking forward to a bunch more Pokémon battles today!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/3003_0701_01_10: Hi! Afternoon already, huh? What are you up to?
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/3004_0701_01_10: Hi! Now that you’re here, let’s go have some fun!
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/3005_0701_01_10: Hey! Still ready for more, huh?
ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.ch0004_00_toko/3006_0701_01_10: Hey! Is it that late already? Time sure does fly!

ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0101_0701_01_10: Listen, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Just like how thin ice on a lake  gradually thickens...
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0101_0701_02_10: it’s important to keep up gradual improvement. You did well to come again today.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0701_01_10: No matter how resistant to cold I get, I’ll never be able to beat...
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0701_03_10: I was a very sickly child, so I went to an island with very clean air to help me heal.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0701_04_10: I had to live alone in a room without people or Pokémon until I was fully cured.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0702_01_10: Back in those days, my best friend  was a stuffed toy Pokémon.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0601_0702_02_10: It was a big stuffed toy Lapras. It shows up in my dreams even to this day.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_01_10: Have you seen a pack of the adorable Sea Lion Pokémon, Seel?
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_02_10: They swim through arctic rivers and roll around on icebergs as if they were spirits of the sea.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_03_10: And the colder it gets, the better they feel. It must be wonderful...
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0701_04_10: to be able to gaze up at a sky of ice from the bottom of the frigid water.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0702_01_10: Seel feel better the colder it gets, but if you give them a hug, they’re surprisingly warm.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0602_0702_02_10: They’re covered in squishy blubber and fluffy fur. It feels wonderful!
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0701_01_10: There was a time when I just traveled and traveled, riding on Lapras’s back.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0701_02_10: Back in those days, Lapras were near extinction.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0701_03_10: So I would search for Lapras to protect them with Ice-type moves.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0603_0702_01_10: Now that we’ve been protecting them for so long, you can find Lapras in the wild again.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0701_01_10: The reason I started my adventures was because I wanted to reach an aurora.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0701_02_10: Of course, now I know that’s impossible.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0701_03_10: It doesn’t matter why you started out. What matters is that you keep moving forward, even if your goal changes.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0702_01_10: It’s funny to think that the girl who was chasing auroras became an Elite Four member.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0604_0702_02_10: But even though I was able to join the Elite Four, I was never able to reach an aurora. Hee hee!
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0701_01_10: How strong do you want to become at Pokémon battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0701_02_10: I’ve always wanted to just keep getting stronger.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0701_03_10: As the ice Pokémon Trainer of the Kanto Elite Four, and as the Trainer for my own Pokémon, I can always be stronger.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0702_01_10: I’ve always been fighting against evildoers who would try to harm my friends.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0702_02_10: Protecting Lapras was easy, thanks to my name as an Elite Four member.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/0605_0702_03_10: The secret to my strength is my strong desire to protect Pokémon I love.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0701_01_10: Here, you can have this. Use it how you like.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0701_02_10: But when you do use it, be sure to thank me first.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0702_01_10: No, I’m not going to tell you how you should use it.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/1701_0702_02_10: Even if you make a mistake, that will be its own lesson.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_01_10: What you aim for, what ideals you hold— that’s all up to you.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_02_10: But don’t do anything that would make your Pokémon sad.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_03_10: If your heart ever becomes cold as ice...
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_04_10: I’ll be right there to thaw you out.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0701_05_10: In fact, I might get so heated that you’d get burned.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0702_01_10: I wonder why whenever I look at you...
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2501_0702_02_10: I feel a smile creep onto my face.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_01_10: I feel like my stuffed-toy collection is going to keep growing as long as I stay on this island.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_03_10: And they’re all in poses that I’ve never seen anywhere else!
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_04_10: Of course I need to buy them all.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0701_05_10: *sigh* There’s no way I could choose just one.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0702_01_10: Since I have the opportunity, I might as well try to gather all the stuffed toys.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/2511_0702_02_10: But only the cute ones, of course. Could you help me choose?
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. Wash your face with cold water— it’ll wake you right up.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/3002_0701_01_10: What a beautiful morning! I bet it would feel good to surf on a Pokémon.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/3003_0701_01_10: You need the most energy around noon. It’s the same for people and Pokémon.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/3004_0701_01_10: Everyone is getting more active... But there are still some Pokémon that are zoning out...
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/3005_0701_01_10: My Pokémon were practicing their moves tonight. It’s dark now, so watch out for all the ice.
ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.ch0005_00_kanna/3006_0701_01_10: Go to bed early, before you catch a cold. But if you come down with a fever, I’ll cool you off.

ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0101_0701_01_10: Yo! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I could feel your fiery spirit!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_01_10: Yo! Hiya! You got a moment for a quick chat?
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_02_10: You know, Infernape’s fire on its head keeps burning for its whole life.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_03_10: And don’t you think my hairdo is like a raging fire, too?
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0601_0701_04_10: We’ve got pretty similar heads, right? Heh, it really makes me feel like we’re partners!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0601_0702_01_10: Infernape’s fire keeps burning for its whole life.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0601_0702_02_10: It’s a great partner to me, with a burning body and a burning heart!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_01_10: Sometimes people say that as a member of the Sinnoh Elite Four, I should dress more properly.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_02_10: But see, this is my style!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_03_10: I told them, if you’re going to change your whole style just ’cause someone told you to, that’s not very proper as a Trainer, you know?
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_04_10: Of course, the day after I said that, I went and burned my foot on Infernape’s fire.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0701_05_10: Turns out wearing flip-flops has drawbacks. If someone gives you some advice, you should at least listen!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0702_01_10: Listening to people’s advice is definitely good, but that doesn’t mean you always have to do as they say.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0602_0702_02_10: At the end of the day, it’s up to you. Just don’t be stubborn for no reason!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0603_0701_01_10: My partner’s Infernape! He moves with blinding speed  and can unleash powerful blows!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0603_0701_02_10: His punches are so quick! How quick, you say? Well, uh... Super quick!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0603_0701_03_10: You can actually follow his movements,  since he leaves a trail of fire.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0603_0702_01_10: Infernape’s the one that helps me do my hair! He can help me dry it at Mach speed!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0603_0702_02_10: Sometimes it misses and smacks into my head. If you ever see me rolling around on the ground in pain, that’s what happened.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0604_0701_01_10: Back when I’d just joined the Elite Four, I’d always battle with Drifblim.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0604_0701_02_10: I met it as a Drifloon at the Valley Windworks. I think it was on a Friday.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0604_0701_03_10: I could sense it had a burning soul, so I decided to raise it!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0604_0702_01_10: Drifloon and Drifblim both have burning-hot spirit!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0604_0702_02_10: It’s said that they even carry away people’s spirits, after all!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0605_0701_01_10: Yo! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You remind me of a friend of mine.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0605_0701_02_10: His name’s Volkner. Every time I get burnt out, he comes along and gives me a recharge!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0605_0701_03_10: It goes both ways, though. When he’s in a funk, it’s up to me to light a fire in his heart!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0605_0702_01_10: If you remind me of Volkner, that means you’re burning hot, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/0605_0702_02_10: Let’s keep burning hot together, all right? You’re my kind of Trainer!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/1701_0701_01_10: Yo! Perfect timing. I was cleaning out my room and found something good!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/1701_0701_02_10: You can have it! Hope it helps you burn even hotter!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/1701_0702_01_10: It may have been something Lopunny hid in my hair.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/1701_0702_02_10: I think it uses my hair as its nest or something.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, I consider you a friend! So, let me tell you the key to battles!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2501_0701_02_10: The most important things for winning battles is a burning heat!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2501_0701_03_10: You’ve got to set your spirit on fire and burn and burn and BURN!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2501_0702_01_10: That feeling of giving your absolute 100 percent best in a battle and burning down to cinders...
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_02_10: whether I’m having a meal or taking a bath, I’ll always come and help you out!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_03_10: After all, isn’t that what friends are for? We help each other out!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_04_10: Of course, I tend to be clean out of batteries after each battle.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2511_0701_05_10: You’ll probably have to help me out a lot more than I’ll need to help you!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2511_0702_02_10: Our battles have heat and burning spirit.
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/2511_0702_03_10: Let’s show the whole world our bright fire!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/3001_0701_01_10: Hey, you’re lookin’ good this morning! How ’bout a sizzling-hot Pokémon battle?
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/3002_0701_01_10: I make sure to wake up early, you know? It takes a healthy lifestyle to keep the fire burning!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/3003_0701_01_10: Yo! Hope you’re not overheating. There’s still plenty of daytime to enjoy!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/3004_0701_01_10: Don’t forget to eat lunch! You’ll be sorry if you’re all burned out!
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/3005_0701_01_10: Ah... I think I had too many battles today. I’m all burned out...
ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.ch0006_00_oba/3006_0701_01_10: Early to bed and early to rise. I want to be ready for tomorrow’s battles!

ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was hoping I’d see you today!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0101_0701_02_10: I’m so excited you’re here! Time for some fun!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0701_01_10: How do people usually greet each other here on Pasio?
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0701_02_10: In Alola we say, “Alola!” It means, “Hello!”
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0701_03_10: Remember that! That way, if you ever decide to visit Alola, you’ll know how to greet other Trainers!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0702_01_10: Alola is really scenic and beautiful, just like Pasio! And we’ve got really yummy food there, too!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0702_02_10: If you end up visiting, I’ll tell you all about our Alolan myths and legends!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_01_10: My Palossand is really great with kids.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_02_10: She loves to frolic and play with tiny tots and other little Pokémon!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_03_10: Story time is when I like to shine, though. I love reading to the kids.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_04_10: Palossand actually likes to join in and learn right along with them! She’s just the cutest.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0702_01_10: We all have different things we’re good at— different values, different ways of thinking...
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0702_02_10: and the same is true about Pokémon! Everyone is unique and special in their own way.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0702_03_10: That’s why it makes me so happy when we work together and help each other!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_01_10: I love reading! You can find a book about pretty much anything, you know!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_02_10: Books can take us on journeys to fantastical worlds and tell the stories of people far away from us.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_03_10: Isn’t that amazing?! I’ve read some books that made me shiver in suspense and some that made me shake with excitement!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_04_10: Do you like reading, too? If so, I can recommend all kinds of books to you! Just say the word!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0702_01_10: I’d love to go visit the library in Sinnoh one day!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0702_02_10: I heard it has all kinds of books on the ancient myths and legends of Sinnoh. I wonder what they’re about!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_01_10: Ghost Pokémon are so free-spirited. I never know what they’re going to do next!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_02_10: The other day, I blinked and my Drifblim caught a breeze and drifted away somewhere. The poor thing got so lost...
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_03_10: And my Sableye is always causing mischief, scribbling in the children’s storybooks when they’re not looking.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_04_10: And my Dhelmise! Don’t get me started on that time it made friends with some Skrelp at the beach and brought them home to play!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_05_10: Ghost Pokémon may be free-spirited and mischievous, but you know what? That’s what I love about them!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0702_01_10: When I’m with my Ghost-type Pokémon, I don’t get scared even when it’s pitch-black outside!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0702_02_10: Dark nights actually make me really excited! Playing in the dark is such a fun thrill!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? I just wanted to say thank you for being such a good friend!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_02_10: Oh, sorry... Did that come out of nowhere? I’ve actually been thinking about it for a long time! Tee-hee!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_03_10: It was pure luck that brought us together, and I feel so lucky that we’re such good friends now!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_04_10: I hope we can keep doing fun things together! There’s a whole world of exciting things for us to do out there!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0702_01_10: With so many other amazing Trainers on this island, I’m so glad you chose to spend time with us!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0702_02_10: In return, Palossand and I promise to help you out the best we can!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0701_01_10: Look! I found this when I was taking a little walk earlier!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0701_02_10: Shhh... Here, it’ll be our little secret. Don’t be afraid to use it, though!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0702_01_10: Taking a stroll on a road you’re familiar with can still lead to something new!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0702_02_10: When you discover something different from the norm, it’s that much more exciting!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0701_01_10: I wonder how everyone is doing back home at Aether House. They’re like my family. I miss them so much!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0701_02_10: It’s kind of strange, though. When I’m with you, I almost feel like I’m back there with the kids.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0701_03_10: It feels warm... Content, maybe? Odd, isn’t it. But in a good way.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0702_01_10: Back at Aether House, I’m like everyone’s big sister! They all really depend on me.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0702_02_10: You can lean on me, too, if you want! Taking care of others is like second nature to me now, and I like doing it!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0702_03_10: Would you let me lean on you for help in return if I need to? That would make me really happy!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0701_01_10: You know, it’s spooky how well the two of us get along together!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0701_02_10: I get the same feeling when I’m with you as I do with my sweet Palossand! I’ve never had a friend like you before.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0701_03_10: Let’s be friends forever! You’re my favorite teammate—I dunno what I’d do without you!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_01_10: Everyone’s always happy in Alola— the people and the Pokémon!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_02_10: That’s why I love it so much! Everyone feels like one big family.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_03_10: And now we have one more person to add to that family... It’s you, of course!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_04_10: Heehee! I’m talking about you, y’know!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/3001_0701_01_10: G’morning! I’ve got so much energy today! Come on, let’s go have some fun!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! The day’s just begun! What do you think I should do?
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/3003_0701_01_10: Hiya! I always feel so peppy this time of day. It’s the best time to go for a stroll!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/3004_0701_01_10: Hey there! Did you eat yet? I’m ready to go out for some battling if you’re done.
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/3005_0701_01_10: Nighttime is definitely my time! I’m ready to go out and have some more fun!
ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.ch0007_00_acerola/3006_0701_01_10: Evening! My Pokémon and I really love dark nights!

ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0101_0701_01_10: Hello...[Name:PlayerNickname ]. It’s so nice to see you.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0101_0701_02_10: I’d been hoping I would run into you soon!
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0701_01_10: I have all sorts of beautiful Grass-type Pokémon back in my hometown.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0701_02_10: Every one of them is full of life and energy. We spend most of our days free and easy at the Pokémon Gym.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0701_03_10: I wonder what my dear Tangela and Victreebel are up to right now...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0702_01_10: Whenever I leave my Gym, I can’t help constantly worrying about the Pokémon I left behind.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0702_02_10: What if my Pokémon turn the inside of the Gym into a wild jungle while I’m gone?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0601_0702_03_10: Dear... That would be so adorable of them...I would probably just leave it that way!
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0701_01_10: There’s nothing more adorable than a stubborn sprout—or more charming than a fuss-free blossom.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0701_02_10: Spending a relaxing, carefree day with such lovely Pokémon. Is there anything more heavenly?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0701_03_10: As a Trainer, I find my most precious moments are the ones I spend with my Pokémon.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_01_10: My Gym is full of nothing but plants and Pokémon.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_02_10: I can easily spend the whole day just taking care of them, helping them to grow strong and beautiful.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_03_10: There’s always so much work to do! We find it hard to get everything done— even when we divide up the labor.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0602_0702_04_10: It’s a very busy job, but the delightful fun we have makes it all worthwhile.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0701_01_10: The climate sure is lovely here on Pasio. My partner Pokémon is enjoying it as well.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0701_02_10: As for myself, well...I tend to get very sleepy whenever the weather is sunny.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0701_03_10: Dear... Sometimes I blink my eyes and it’s already the next morning.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0702_01_10: My Pokémon is even stronger after it has spent some time absorbing the warm sunshine.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0702_02_10: I would love to show you some of that strength personally, but I...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0603_0702_03_10: I’m afraid I’m...a little too sleepy at the moment.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0701_01_10: When I’m out for a stroll through town, I often end up taking the long way round.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0701_02_10: But whenever that happens, my dear Vileplume always shows me the way back home.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0701_03_10: Vileplume remembers the roads much better than I do, in fact! She really is a lovely little Pokémon.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0702_01_10: My dear Vileplume has been by my side ever since she was an Oddish.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0604_0702_02_10: After all the time we’ve spent together, we’ve gotten to know each other so well.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], are you familiar with flower arrangement? It’s a hobby of mine.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_02_10: You know, I’ve always thought that flower arrangement and Pokémon battles share something in common.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_03_10: Selecting certain flowers to arrange together in order to create something more beautiful...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_04_10: is a lot like selecting certain Pokémon moves and battle strategies in order to obtain victory, wouldn’t you agree?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0701_05_10: The desire to cultivate something in order to reach a certain goal is an idea that both of them share.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0702_01_10: If you’d like to learn more about the art of flower arrangement, I would be happy to show you a little.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0702_02_10: It can help improve your concentration as well as lift your spirits.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/0605_0702_03_10: I actually have a class where I teach flower arranging. Feel free to come by anytime.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0701_01_10: Oh my! I’m so glad you’re here.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0701_02_10: I’d like you to have this. It’s a present from me.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0702_01_10: Oh dear! Thank goodness I ran into you.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/1701_0702_02_10: I’m sure I would have forgotten to give this to you had we not crossed paths.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0701_01_10: You seem to really enjoy Pokémon battling a lot.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0701_02_10: When I watch other sync pairs battle, I can see how much fun they’re having.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0701_03_10: And when I battle with you, my heart dances with joy.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0702_01_10: I discovered something remarkable about your Pokémon battles.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0702_02_10: Whether an individual wins or loses a battle, everyone has a delightful expression on their face.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2501_0702_03_10: I think that maybe your ability to share your fun with others is another type of strength.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0701_01_10: To battle is to weave various elements together, ultimately leading to victory or defeat. No two Pokémon battles are exactly alike.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0701_02_10: I find a sort of beauty in that, which I’m conscious of even in battle.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0701_03_10: One could say that I’m enjoying the art of battling, so to speak.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0702_01_10: The beauty of battling is a fleeting one. Blink and you might miss it.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0702_02_10: Think about it—you can never enjoy the same battle twice.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/2511_0702_03_10: But it’s that fleeting, momentary joy that brings color to each and every day... That’s how I like to think about it.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3001_0701_01_10: Good day! The morning sunshine feels so nice.
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning. Lovely weather, isn’t it? Shall we take a stroll?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3003_0701_01_10: Hello... Oh dear... I must have dozed off. Is it nap time?
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3004_0701_01_10: Hello... The warm midday sun makes me sleepy. I’m afraid I might doze off...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3005_0701_01_10: Oh dear... Good evening. I get sleepy at night...
ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.ch0008_00_erika/3006_0701_01_10: Good evening. It’s dark already. Do you have something you need to finish today?

ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0101_0701_01_10: Hm? If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s good to see you today.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0101_0701_02_10: When I see how much you or my son has grown and accomplished, I can’t help but think I need to train more, too.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_01_10: The Trainers of my Gym are all very powerful.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_02_10: True strength acquired from proper practice means not running from even the most difficult of battles.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0701_03_10: When you face a challenge, I want you to answer it with all you’ve got!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0702_01_10: At my Gym, everyone battles each other without ever holding back, all in the name of growing stronger.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0601_0702_02_10: I am no different. I am always thinking of new ways to win in battle.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_01_10: Sometimes I run into my kid at the Pokémon Center.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_02_10: The other day I saw him wearing his clothes inside out. Honestly, he can be so careless sometimes. It reminds me of someone...
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0701_03_10: What? No, not me! I’d never do something like wear my clothes incorrectly!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0702_02_10: Whenever we see each other, we both look that way, I suppose.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0602_0702_03_10: Looking like that... I feel like I should say something, but I just end up laughing.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_01_10: Slaking is very powerful, but he will start loafing around right away. That’s his weakness.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_02_10: I understand Slaking’s strong and weak points, so I want to make the most of everything he is able to do!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0701_03_10: If you understand the strengths and weaknesses of Pokémon, too, battles will become much easier for you.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_01_10: I don’t just mean your own Pokémon, either. Knowing about all kinds of Pokémon is important.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_02_10: If you do, you’ll be ready to counter against any Pokémon’s strengths.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0603_0702_03_10: If you want to learn about Slaking’s power, I’m ready to battle anytime!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve got a few other Pokémon besides Slaking here, but they’re all back at home looking after my Gym.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_02_10: I wonder how they’re doing with the Trainers... Not slacking off, I hope!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0701_03_10: Blissey and Linoone are probably all right, but Spinda’s eyes are always spinning around and it has a tendency to wander off.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0702_01_10: They’re all definitely training hard every day.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0604_0702_02_10: That goes for people, too! It’s no different for people or Pokémon! If you want to get stronger, you can’t hold anything back!
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_01_10: Have you ever considered the emotions that come with a battle’s end, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_02_10: Happiness, sadness... There are many different things you can feel.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0701_03_10: All of those feelings become the foundation of your strength, so remember them well.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0702_01_10: Losing, even when you battle with all your might, is painful—even for adults.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/0605_0702_02_10: What I mean is that hating to lose is a childish thing to do.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve been looking for you! I was thinking I wanted to give this to you.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0701_02_10: I think you’ll be able to put that to good use. I’ll continue to keep supporting you.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0702_01_10: That gift I gave you a while ago? You don’t have to worry about giving me anything in return.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/1701_0702_02_10: I thought you could use it, so I gave it to you. That’s all there is.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_01_10: It may be surprising, but even I get worried about things sometimes.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_02_10: For example, when I go on a trip, I always worry about what kind of souvenirs I should bring back as gifts.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_03_10: What, you thought it was a more serious kind of worry? Well to me, that is serious.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0701_04_10: It’s something that will travel far and be given to someone. So I have to choose carefully.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_01_10: To find a great gift, I actually did  a bunch of research about Pasio.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_02_10: There are just so many different things I’m sure my family would like.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2501_0702_03_10: Hmm. I can’t decide. If you see something good, let me know.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_01_10: As a Trainer and as a Gym Leader, I’ve learned many things.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_02_10: But even so, I still feel like I’m not giving it  my all. That’s why I’m participating in the PML.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_03_10: Winning a battle isn’t easy. Especially since there are so many strong Trainers like you around.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0701_04_10: There’s a lot to learn! My hope right now is to learn as much as I can from everyone.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_01_10: Tactics and counter tactics are different between regions and generations.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_02_10: However, changing to whatever others do isn’t actual strength. A strong Trainer has unshakable conviction.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/2511_0702_03_10: When I see you battle, I’m reminded of my son. I think you two are similarly determined.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. Let’s give it our best effort today.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3002_0701_01_10: Morning. Did you sleep well? I’ll be counting on you today.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3003_0701_01_10: Have you eaten? You must take care of your body.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3004_0701_01_10: Time sure can fly in the afternoon. Be careful not to waste too much of it.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3005_0701_01_10: Days with you sure go by fast. Make sure to rest up for tomorrow.
ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.ch0009_00_senri/3006_0701_01_10: It’s already getting dark. Watch your step, and keep an eye out for nocturnal Pokémon.

ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0101_0701_01_10: I’ve been waiting, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Come on! The ring is calling us!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0101_0701_02_10: All right! Time to get pumped! Crash! Crash!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0701_01_10: My partner, Floatzel, also loves professional wrestling!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0701_02_10: We travel throughout the Sinnoh region and make appearances in matches together!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0701_03_10: Now that I think about it, the first time I met Floatzel was in the ring, too!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_01_10: See, he interrupted one of my matches back when he was still a Buizel!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_02_10: We’ve been the best tag team ever since!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_03_10: You’ll meet your best partner in battle someday, too. Just wait!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0601_0702_04_10: Or, what do I know. Maybe you’ve already met!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_01_10: One of the Pokémon I’m raising is a Quagsire.
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_02_10: Normally it seems really zoned out and it’s difficult to tell what’s going on in its head...
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_03_10: But once a battle starts, it overwhelms the competition with an amazing display of power!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0701_04_10: Its cute look hides a fiery heart! It’s amazing!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0702_01_10: It doesn’t move much, but it’s definitely what you’d call a powerhouse!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0602_0702_02_10: I hope you can appreciate Quagsire’s talent, too!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0701_01_10: Gah hah hah! It seems like Crasher Wake is famous even here on Pasio!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0701_02_10: But, hmmm. That means I need to be careful and make sure I maintain my image at all times! Don’t want to ruin the dreams of the children!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0701_03_10: I definitely need to make sure I stay healthy! What kind of wrestler would I be if I got knocked out by a cold, after all?!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0702_01_10: Even if you’ve got a strong body, you still need to take care of it!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0603_0702_02_10: Your body is your most fundamental asset, after all!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0701_01_10: By the way, did you know I personally wrote the theme song for Crasher Wake?!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0701_02_10: Now, let me give you a taste of my amazing singing voice!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0701_03_10: Er-hem! Aaah aaah ahh... The ring is my rolling sea. ♪
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0702_01_10: I’ve been told that my singing can make babies and Pokémon stop crying!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0604_0702_02_10: Gah hah hah! My voice must be more soothing and melodic than I thought!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_01_10: I’ve been surprised by a lot of things since I came to Pasio!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_02_10: The first thing I noticed was the ocean! I love the sea in the Sinnoh region, too, but the water here is really amazing!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_03_10: Another thing that surprised me is you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’ve true muscle!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0701_04_10: I hope you keep training those muscles to the max!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0702_01_10: Don’t worry—Crasher Wake has his eye on you! I’ll watch your every step as you grow stronger!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/0605_0702_02_10: I’m already looking forward to the day you come challenge me in my own ring in Sinnoh!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! There you are! I’ve been looking for you!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0701_02_10: Here! A gift from me! It’s all yours!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0702_01_10: Gah hah hah! You love it, don’t you?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/1701_0702_02_10: It’s a gift from Crasher Wake, after all!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, what’s up? You need a sparring partner?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0701_02_10: You’ve certainly gotten a lot stronger than when we first met! You’re almost a completely different person!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0701_03_10: Your strength is proof that you’ve been able to keep up with the Wake in your training!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0702_01_10: You’re turning out well! I’d say you’re almost ready to say you’re a top-notch wrestler!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0702_02_10: Ahem, I mean Trainer! This makes me want to cry tears of joy!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2501_0702_03_10: Once the PML is over, why don’t we officially become a tag team and take on challengers in the ring together?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0701_01_10: I was watching your battle just now! You did good!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0701_02_10: It’s all thanks to the time spent with yours truly, of course!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0701_03_10: You’re definitely a proper wrestler now! I’d have you as a main event any day!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0702_01_10: What’s that? You’d rather stay a Trainer instead of becoming a wrestler?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0702_02_10: Oh, don’t be shy! Don’t worry—I’ll make you a supercool mask, too!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/2511_0702_03_10: Let’s see, you’ll need a ring name, too. Oh! How about Crasher Wake Jr.?!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3001_0701_01_10: Haha! Such a glorious morning! I’m going to have a great workout today—I can tell!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3002_0701_01_10: Morning, the perfect time for a song! Hmm hmm hmm hmm hm... What? You’re not sticking around for my song?
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3003_0701_01_10: Hey! Hope you’re not getting tired already! Gotta give the day all you’ve got!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3004_0701_01_10: Hey! Great day, isn’t it? Just keep at it with all your energy!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3005_0701_01_10: I’m about ready to crash, but I’ve got more training to do! Just a little bit more!
ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.ch0010_00_maximum/3006_0701_01_10: Training before you sleep helps you start tomorrow with a splash!

ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0101_0701_02_10: If you have some time, have a battle with me! I’m just bursting with energy!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_01_10: I love Pokémon and music equally.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_02_10: I could never choose one over the other, so that’s why I do double duty!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_03_10: I can tell you’re wondering if I’m actually able to be any good at either.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0701_04_10: Of course I am! Why wouldn’t I be?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0702_01_10: If there are things you’re itching to try, you should just go for them!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0601_0702_02_10: Sitting around being indecisive doesn’t get you anywhere!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_01_10: You know, my old man has two jobs, too, just like me.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_02_10: He’s a ship’s captain and an actor!
