ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_03_10: Although I gotta say, he gets a bit caught up in acting sometimes and lets his ship just sit in harbor.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0701_04_10: It’s not good to cause problems for people, right?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0702_01_10: See, I want to support my old man’s dream of becoming an actor.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0602_0702_02_10: I mean, I went and saw the movie he was in, and it was pretty good.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0701_01_10: Sometimes, when I’m out exploring, inspiration just hits me out of nowhere!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0701_02_10: It’s a great help to my song writing.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0702_01_10: Sometimes, working two jobs can show you new things.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0603_0702_02_10: But you can’t slack off on either of them!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_01_10: Whirlipede normally sits pretty still and doesn’t move much...
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_02_10: but if she’s attacked, she jumps into action!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_03_10: It’s like she’s letting all that stored-up energy explode!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0701_04_10: She’s definitely a Pokémon that knows how to put on an invigorating show, right?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0702_01_10: Unleash your energy when it really counts!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0604_0702_02_10: It’s what Whirlipede taught me, you know? You can’t just be all out all the time. You need to make your efforts really count!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0701_02_10: Huh? Oh, sessions are when we go exploring together!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0701_03_10: Sometimes, I get this comfortable feeling, like I’m hanging out with my band members!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0702_01_10: I can feel my spirits rising when I’m with you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/0605_0702_02_10: It’s like I have even more energy than usual!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/1701_0701_02_10: Oh, no no, I don’t want anything back! I just felt like giving something to you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/1701_0702_01_10: Make sure to use that item I gave you, OK?
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/1701_0702_02_10: A really good Trainer puts items to good use!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_01_10: Hey, about you and your Pokémon!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_02_10: You’re getting really strong, aren’t you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_03_10: Not just pure strength. Your will to win is getting stronger, too!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0701_04_10: Watching you gets me pumped, too!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0702_01_10: I’ll never use my double duty with my band as an excuse for anything!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2501_0702_02_10: I don’t plan on letting you win our Pokémon battles, either, so there!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_01_10: The song I’m working on—it’s going to be great!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_02_10: See, I’m making my adventures here into a song!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_03_10: Oh, of course you’re gonna be in the song, too!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0701_04_10: There’s no way any of my adventures here on Pasio would happen without you!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0702_01_10: I still want more ideas for new songs, though.
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/2511_0702_02_10: So that means you’re gonna keep exploring with me, all right?!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! You’re looking energetic! Keep it up, and let’s get some stuff done!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3002_0701_01_10: Giving your all from the beginning of the day, huh? Just make sure you don’t burn yourself out!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3003_0701_01_10: It’s a waste if you don’t give it your all when the sun’s out!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3004_0701_01_10: Managing a band and Pokémon means using time effectively!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3005_0701_01_10: It’s all about timing—we gotta play our hearts out, till the last chord of the night!
ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.ch0011_00_homika/3006_0701_01_10: I was thinking about calling it a night. But if you’re still good to go, then so am I!

ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0101_0701_01_10: Time for Lady Korrina’s big appearance! And look! It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s make today a fun one!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0101_0701_02_10: Come on, together now! Let’s make today a super fun day!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/1701_0701_01_10: Hey! Lucario said he wants to give you this!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/1701_0701_02_10: He said he sensed an aura around it. Here, check it out!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/1701_0702_01_10: Lucario and I found this for you, so it’s bound to come in handy!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_01_10: Why the long face? If you’re bored, why not practice some tricks with me?
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_02_10: And by tricks I mean awesome skating moves!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_03_10: Getting a trick just right gives me the same thrill as winning a Pokémon battle!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0701_04_10: Once you get a handle on your balance, you can do tricks during battle and call out instructions on even the roughest turf!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0702_01_10: So? What do you think of my tricks? I love doing awesome tricks during battles. It’s what I’m best at!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0601_0702_02_10: If you ever want to see more of my magnificent tricks, just challenge me to a battle!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0701_01_10: I’m practicing my kicks and punches to deepen my bonds with my Fighting-type Pokémon!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0701_02_10: This allows me to give the best possible instructions for their powerful moves in battle.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0701_03_10: My Pokémon are my life, so I want to grow stronger along with them!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0702_01_10: What? You want to know how strong I am? Well then...
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0702_02_10: take a good look at my super special move! Rolling axe-kick!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0602_0702_03_10: That should give you a pretty good idea of how strong I am!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0701_01_10: You know, Lucario and I have been two peas in a pod ever since he was a Riolu.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0701_02_10: We’re more than friends. We’ve been so close for so long that you could even call us family.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0701_03_10: Lucario just has to be near me and then I can sense how he’s feeling.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0702_01_10: Right now, for instance, I can sense that he’s buzzing with excitement!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0702_02_10: I mean, the whole city’s bustling with activity in the wake of the PML, after all!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0603_0702_03_10: Lucario has been itching to participate in the spectacle as well!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0701_01_10: Pokémon are just so mysterious and fascinating and cute, aren’t they?!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0701_02_10: Of all the different Pokémon types, I’ve always loved Fighting type the most.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0701_03_10: We train together each and every day to become stronger! Isn’t that awesome?!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0702_01_10: I’m really excited to see all of the Pokémon that will be appearing in the PML.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0702_02_10: All of the amazing, cute, powerful Pokémon and their Trainers...
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0604_0702_03_10: But I’m excited about us the most, of course!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_01_10: You have such an amazing bond with your Pokémon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Watching you two makes me smile.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_02_10: I mean, it’s plain to see how delighted your Pokémon are by what you do!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_03_10: I can tell you’re very considerate of each other. You’re always moving toward the same goal.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0701_04_10: I know that because Lucario and I are the same way!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0702_01_10: When I see a Trainer and a Pokémon with a really tight friendship...
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/0605_0702_02_10: it always brings a smile to my face! It really is amazing to witness!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_01_10: You know, this time I really want to prove to myself that I can be stronger.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_02_10: Since becoming a Gym Leader, I’ve been challenged to Pokémon battles by a ton of different Trainers.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_03_10: But I want to be the one who makes the challenges again.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0701_04_10: I want to prove that my Pokémon and I can be number one.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_01_10: Trainers and Gym Leaders alike come from all over the world to test their strength at the PML.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_02_10: That’s the reason I don’t think my challenge was a mistake.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_03_10: No matter how old you get or what your day job is, every Trainer wants to master their skills and be as strong as they can be!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2501_0702_04_10: That’s why everyone puts so much effort into the competition.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0701_01_10: Hey, do you think it’s possible to climb to the top of the arena?
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0701_02_10: I was just thinking about how nice it would be to gaze up at the sky from a spot so high up.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0701_03_10: When I stare up at the sky, my heart feels light as a feather... I feel like I can do anything. It’s a really nice feeling.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0702_01_10: In my hometown, there’s this big tower called the Tower of Mastery. Once, I climbed to the very top to remind myself to keep chasing my dreams.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/2511_0702_02_10: You know, so I wouldn’t forget where I started. When I first gazed up at the arena, I felt that same feeling inside of me.
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Glad to be here!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3002_0701_01_10: Hi! Good morning! Start off the day with some cheerful greetings!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3004_0701_01_10: Do you smell something tasty? Or is it just my imagination?
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! Roads at night are dangerous, so be careful!
ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.ch0012_00_corni/3006_0701_01_10: It’s night already. Maybe I’ll gaze at the moon.

ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0101_0701_01_10: Oh! Been a while, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look different, like you’re ready to go all out now!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0101_0701_02_10: I wonder what grand adventures await us today! Come, it’s time for some fun!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_01_10: You know, people speak in a most peculiar fashion in this city! I noticed that on other islands in Alola as well.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_02_10: My own venerable grandfather is the only one I had to emulate growing up, so I am not familiar with your hip, groovy slang.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0701_04_10: Well, either way, I have gotten used to saying them now, and that’s not likely to change.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0702_01_10: Ho! Well met, friend! Such fine weather we’re having today, don’t you think? Wait, no, GROOVY weather, huh?!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0601_0702_02_10: *sigh* This is more difficult than I thought. Perhaps big city slang and I were not meant to mix!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_01_10: The bond I share with my Mudsdale is not merely that of Trainer and Pokémon!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_02_10: He lets me ride on his back, of course, and he carries heavy cargo. He lends us his strength to plow the fields.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_03_10: The farm would never survive without Mudsdale’s help! Shoot, life on the island just wouldn’t be the same without him!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0701_04_10: My grandfather always used to say people and Pokémon were made to help one another— I really feel the truth of those words now!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0702_01_10: There are some hurdles I can’t jump over alone, but together, my Mudsdale and I can overcome them all!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0602_0702_02_10: And before we know it, we are covered from head to toe in mud! Two peas in a pod, we are!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_01_10: There was this one time, before I was the Island Kahuna...
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_02_10: I was taking a stroll along the beach when I felt an odd squishy sensation under my toes— I had accidentally stepped on a Gastrodon!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0701_03_10: Some purple liquid was oozing out of it, so I leaned down to see if it was hurt—and it started healing itself right before my eyes!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0702_01_10: The heartiness of that little Gastrodon was truly a sight to behold, I tell you!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0603_0702_02_10: The texture of its gooey body and its cry were so...edgy. Ahh, I’d love to see one again.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_01_10: Before I was chosen to be an island kahuna, I journeyed throughout Alola to prove my worth to the guardian deity, Tapu Fini.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_02_10: And that got me thinking, what if I extend my journey beyond the Alolan islands? Around the world!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0701_03_10: That is how I came to participate in the PML here on Pasio.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0702_01_10: I wonder how my grandmother and the others are getting on back in Alola.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0604_0702_02_10: I will have a thousand stories to share with them when I return home!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_01_10: You are a truly devoted Trainer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! There’s never a dull moment when you’re around.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_02_10: Sometimes, when we’re together, I feel as though a hidden power deep inside of me is awakening!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_03_10: Hmm! Hapu’s hidden power. Anything could Hapun!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_04_10: Hmph! On second thought, forget what I just said! It was not as punny as I thought.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0701_05_10: It’ll be our little secret!  Promise you won’t tell a soul!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0702_01_10: Good puns have a way of sticking into your memory like glue.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/0605_0702_02_10: If you ever come up with a good one, do share it with me!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! You came at just the right time. I was just thinking of giving you this!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0701_02_10: Whenever I go out on strolls, I tend to pick up new ideas and occasionally some knickknacks!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/1701_0702_01_10: Here, don’t be shy! This is my way of saying thank you.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_01_10: You never fail to surprise me when it comes to Pokémon battling.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_02_10: However, you are still but a rough-hewn stone. As an island kahuna, I feel it is my duty to guide you and polish you to greatness!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_03_10: What? Oh, I meant no offense, friend!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0701_04_10: There is still much for me to learn on my own journey as well! We shall learn and grow together!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0702_01_10: There is so much that we can still learn. The world is an open book!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2501_0702_02_10: The more you learn, the more you grow!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_01_10: Hmm. There is still so much I do not know about this place.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_02_10: I did not come here for sightseeing, but journeying around the world like this is a remarkable experience, indeed!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0701_03_10: Are you familiar with this area? It would be grand if you could show me around sometime.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_01_10: I want to go back to my grandmother and the rest of the family with plenty of stories to tell!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_02_10: If you happen across any extraordinary tidbits, be sure to let me know!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/2511_0702_03_10: My trust in your recommendations is absolute!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3001_0701_01_10: Ah, you’re awake! Having to tend to the fields every morning has made me an early riser.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3002_0701_01_10: It is good to wake up early! You should make the most of the time you have!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon, friend! Now is the time to relax and take a stroll.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3004_0701_01_10: Alola! This is how we greet people in my hometown.
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3005_0701_01_10: On the island, things get quite sleepy once the sun goes down. But I think I can hold out a little longer today!
ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.ch0013_00_hapu/3006_0701_01_10: Good evening! I have heard that at night the city never sleeps! But I am sleepy!

ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Late for class again, I see. Wait, that’s not right. Sorry, force of habit! Good to see you!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0101_0701_02_10: I’ve been studying every day in hopes of being able to support you better in battle.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_01_10: My Pokémon Stoutland, Cinccino, and Watchog...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_02_10: are all fans of being groomed and getting massages.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0701_03_10: They’re always happy to get a nice massage right after a tough battle.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0702_01_10: Rewarding your hardworking Pokémon and looking after their well-being is...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0601_0702_02_10: one of the most important jobs we have as Trainers.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_01_10: After I became a Gym Leader, the Lillipup I’d raised as my partner evolved into a Stoutland.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_02_10: I haven’t been a Gym Leader for very long yet...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_03_10: but I will say this: the trust and friendship that I’ve built up with Stoutland is second to none.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0701_04_10: Stoutland is the ace of my team, and I depend on him a lot. I’d love to show you how strong he is sometime.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_01_10: The key to bringing out a Pokémon’s full strength is getting to know it inside and out.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_02_10: I did a ton of studying with my Stoutland here, at first.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0602_0702_03_10: And not just reading books, mind you. A lot of it was observation. It’s important to learn what sort of personality your Pokémon has.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_01_10: My job at the Trainers’ School is to teach young Trainers all about Pokémon.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_02_10: There are many different methods out there for improving your strength as a Trainer...
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0701_03_10: but in my experience, hands-on learning with Pokémon through battling is a surefire way to get stronger.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0702_01_10: I may be on the teaching end of the classroom at the Trainers’ School, but often I’m learning just as much as I’m teaching.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0603_0702_02_10: Sometimes beginner Trainers who aren’t used to being around Pokémon help me discover things I never would have noticed otherwise.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_01_10: You know, I did a fair bit of research on Pasio a while back.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_02_10: I suppose it should be obvious, but photos really don’t do justice to the scale of this place at all.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0701_03_10: It’s not enough to just read and study. You’ve got to go out and experience the world with your own two eyes.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0702_01_10: That reminds me—I have a friend who wants to go do some sight-seeing. I think I might follow along.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0604_0702_02_10: Funny thing is, up until recently, I don’t think I would have said that. The old me couldn’t be bothered.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. If you ever get a chance to visit the Unova region, you should come visit my Gym.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_02_10: I’d love to introduce you to the Trainers there, as well as my students at the Trainers’ School.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0701_03_10: I’m sure they’d get a kick out of hearing all about our adventures here on Pasio.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_01_10: With your skills, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I’m sure you could make a career for yourself as a Trainer anywhere you go.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_02_10: I’m not just saying that, either. I believe it.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/0605_0702_03_10: I want to battle you out in the world—not just with my Stoutland here but with the Pokémon I meet along the road.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0701_01_10: Nice timing! Could you hang on a second?
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0701_02_10: I wanted to give this to you! I thought it seemed rather useful. Hope it comes in handy.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/1701_0702_01_10: If I come across anything else that seems useful, I’ll make sure I pass it along to you.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_01_10: Hmm. I wonder what kind of battle strategies we could utilize with your Pokémon and mine.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_02_10: Oops, sorry about that. Sometimes I get lost in my thoughts.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0701_03_10: Being both a Gym Leader and a teacher, I tend to have a lot on my mind at any given time.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_01_10: You know, I’ve always preferred to pause and give things a lot of thought.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_02_10: If you brainstorm your battle strategies beforehand, you’ll be able to quickly adapt to any obstacle you face later on.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_03_10: However, just because that method works for me doesn’t necessarily mean it’s best for you.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2501_0702_04_10: Everyone should be free to seek out whatever battle methods work best for them.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_01_10: It’s exciting to think about what the future holds for you and the Pokémon you’ll meet on your path as a Trainer.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_02_10: There are so many diverse people to meet here around every corner, each with their own unique thoughts and feelings.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0701_03_10: I mean, I came all this way because I wanted to have those same experiences as well.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_01_10: I’ve gone through a lot to get where I am today, both good and bad.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_02_10: But honestly, going off on my own as a Trainer and traveling throughout the Unova region was the best thing that ever happened to me.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/2511_0702_03_10: I hope that one day you feel the same about the experiences you’re having right here and right now.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Did you get plenty of rest last night? We’re gonna need our energy today.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! There are only so many hours in a day. You should set up a game plan!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3003_0701_01_10: Afternoon! It’s the perfect time for studying. You should take advantage of it!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3004_0701_01_10: Afternoon! Now’s the perfect time to go out and do something fun!
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3005_0701_01_10: Evening! Anything left on your to-do list? The day’s almost over.
ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.ch0014_01_cheren/3006_0701_01_10: Evening! It’s pretty dark outside, so we should be careful if we’re heading out.

ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0101_0701_01_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Are you ready for a Pokémon battle?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0101_0701_02_10: As long as you have the will to win, you’ll be fine! Let’s make it another great day!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_01_10: Other than being a Gym Leader in Kanto, I also help on fossil excavations.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_02_10: I become more familiar with all sorts of regions by digging in the earth and mountains.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_03_10: I wonder what kind of Pokémon there were a long time ago. What kind of geography was it?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0701_04_10: Whenever I think about ages that we don’t know about, I can’t help but get really excited.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0702_01_10: If you ever come to Pewter City in Kanto, come visit my Gym.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0702_02_10: I’ll show you around the Gym—and the museum we have nearby, too!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0601_0702_03_10: If you have any interest in old Pokémon fossils, I can’t recommend it enough.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_01_10: My Onix is my best partner.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_02_10: He specializes in withstanding any attack and dishing out a powerful counterattack.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_03_10: He just fits with how I do battles as well.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0701_04_10: There aren’t too many Pokémon that can stand after getting counterattacked by Onix!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0702_01_10: Onix can get around by digging into the ground.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0602_0702_02_10: He’s big and heavy, but you’d be surprised at how nimble he is.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_01_10: I’ve been going to the mountains  and the ruins on Pasio.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_02_10: Of course, I’m participating in the PML as well.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_03_10: But as long as I’m here, I might as well enjoy myself, right?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0701_04_10: Don’t get me wrong, I’m not slacking off!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0702_01_10: The Trainers that gathered here are  from all over the world and know  all sorts of geography, history, and Pokémon.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0702_02_10: It’s great that I not only get to battle them but also get to talk to them.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0603_0702_03_10: Not to mention, I’ll have stories to take back to Kanto.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0701_01_10: Pokémon battles are the hardest  for the Pokémon themselves.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0701_02_10: That’s why I train as much as my Pokémon— so that I can empathize with their hardships.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0701_03_10: How tough it must be to take that kind of damage... If I could experience it with them, victory would be that much more satisfying.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_01_10: Pokémon support their Trainers  by using their powers.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_02_10: That’s why I wanted to be able to support my Pokémon as well!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_03_10: And as I trained, I became a lot stronger.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0604_0702_04_10: Now, I can run with a Geodude on my back.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_01_10: I wonder what kind of Trainer you will become, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_02_10: As a Gym Leader, I’ve seen  a lot of different Trainers.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_03_10: But all of the Trainers that were able to beat me had a glint in their eye.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0701_04_10: No matter how strong you become, I want you to remember what it was like when you began and enjoy Pokémon battles in the same way.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0702_01_10: Even the strongest Trainer was a beginner once.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/0605_0702_02_10: You don’t have to hold anything back. Find Trainers more experienced than you, and challenge them to Pokémon battles!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, perfect timing! There was something I wanted to give you.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0701_02_10: You’re always going all over the place, so I hope this will be useful to you.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0702_01_10: I find a lot of items like this when I’m taking a walk on the mountain.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/1701_0702_02_10: It would be bad if it affected Pokémon, so I end up picking it up.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve fought a lot of Trainers up until now.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0701_02_10: So, believe me when I say that  you are an excellent Trainer.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0701_03_10: You can hold your head high  and take on more battles!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0702_01_10: You need a strong will for battles.  Wanting to win, wanting to not lose— that willpower will lead you to victory.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0702_02_10: So believe in yourself. Believe that you’re an amazing Trainer.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2501_0702_03_10: Believing in yourself with a rock-hard will— that is the secret to winning!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0701_01_10: You’re becoming stronger than  I could have imagined. It’s like  I found a diamond in the rough!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0701_02_10: Don’t worry—that’s a compliment. I’m just saying that it’s like finding an unexpected gem.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0701_03_10: In other words, it’s rare to see a Trainer as good as you are!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0702_01_10: One of these days, I want to have a serious battle with you.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0702_02_10: Battling a rare gem like you would probably be a lot more intense than I can imagine!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/2511_0702_03_10: I can already hear the sound  of our clashing wills!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! The day’s just begun. Let’s plan out what we wanna do.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3002_0701_01_10: Phew! I just got back from my morning warm-up on top of a boulder.
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3003_0701_01_10: Hey there! The weather’s perfect for collecting rocks, don’t you think?
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3004_0701_01_10: It can be tempting to loaf around in the afternoon, but keeping your day balanced is the key to growing stronger!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3005_0701_01_10: Wait, you’re heading out this late? Don’t overdo it, all right? Save some energy for tomorrow!
ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_00_takeshi/3006_0701_01_10: Evening! Do you have some stuff you still need to get done? I’m happy to help out if I can.

ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0101_0701_01_10: Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re in high spirits today, too, huh?
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0101_0701_02_10: All right! I have to get stronger, too!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0701_01_10: Some designer gave me this outfit  when I came here.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0701_02_10: I usually don’t have too much of a preference  with clothes...
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0701_03_10: But I feel like this outfit helps me focus and makes it easier to battle. Maybe that’s just proof that I like it.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0702_01_10: This outfit will be perfect for serious battles.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0601_0702_02_10: Especially if I’m going to battle  a strong Trainer like you.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_01_10: I usually let my Tyranitar go wild in important battles.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_02_10: He has high defense, like I prefer—and raw strength for awesome attacks, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_03_10: Tyranitar is the best of both worlds!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0701_04_10: If we ever have the chance of battling together, I’ll show you Tyranitar’s power.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0702_01_10: Each Pokémon has things  they’re good at and bad at.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0602_0702_02_10: It’s the Trainer’s job to identify them and use their strengths well.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0701_01_10: If you’re tired from a battle, it’s important to take breaks.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0701_02_10: If you want to get stronger, it’s crucial to not exhaust yourself.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0701_03_10: Good Trainers are very good at resting up. Always keep that in mind, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0702_01_10: I make sure to take ample breaks, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0603_0702_02_10: It might be mundane, but it refreshes you like after a good night’s sleep.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0701_01_10: Tyranitar and Onix have completely different fighting styles.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0701_02_10: It’s still a work in progress, but I think it’s fun to try to fine-tune your strategies with your Pokémon.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0701_03_10: The more you know about your Pokémon, the stronger you’ll be, after all.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0702_02_10: But when it comes to battle, I can trust that  he’ll go berserk on the opponent.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0604_0702_03_10: It makes me glad when I see him battle  as much as he likes.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0701_01_10: If you ever find yourself in battle, don’t hesitate to call me.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0701_02_10: I’m starved for battle right now. I want to have one as soon as possible!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0701_03_10: Maybe it’s because of my new outfit, but I am really feeling motivated.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0702_01_10: Don’t you ever feel more motivated when you wear new or different clothes?
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/0605_0702_02_10: I guess it’s true that the clothes make the man.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/1701_0701_01_10: Good timing! Here, you can have this.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/1701_0701_02_10: It should be handy.  I hope you put it to good use!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/1701_0702_01_10: If I find anything else I can give you,  I’ll let you know.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0701_01_10: Defending well means less damage  to what you’re protecting.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0701_02_10: Whether it’s for yourself or your friends, good defense is the strength needed for victory!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0701_03_10: That’s why I pride myself on how sturdy I am.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0702_01_10: All the Pokémon with me are the same way. They are proud of their sturdiness, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2501_0702_02_10: Trainers and their Pokémon work together to reach a goal. That’s what Pokémon battles are.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0701_01_10: You’ve become a lot stronger  than when we first met.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0701_02_10: I saw it firsthand. There’s no mistake about it.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0701_03_10: Get even stronger and challenge me again! When the time comes, I’ll battle you with everything I have!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0702_01_10: Battle more Trainers, and gain more experience.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0702_02_10: There are a lot of strong Trainers here, so you should be able to grow much stronger.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/2511_0702_03_10: Of course, you can count on me, too.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Do you have any plans for the day? If you don’t, it’s never too late to think of some.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! I am pumped up today! Let’s give it our best shot out there, as always!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3003_0701_01_10: I was just about to find some Pokémon battles! Get ready—you’re coming with!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3004_0701_01_10: I always make sure I get a good meal or two in during the day. If not, my body feels slow and weak!
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3005_0701_01_10: You’re heading out now? Make sure you don’t stay up too late.
ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.ch0015_01_takeshi/3006_0701_01_10: Oh, hey there. You still awake, too? The sky is pretty gorgeous tonight. You should go check it out!

ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0101_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so happy to see you!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0101_0701_02_10: I’m looking forward to another day of fun with you!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_01_10: I asked my Swoobat and Unfezant to take care of the Gym while I’m away.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_02_10: I hope they’re not getting into any trouble. I’m a little worried about them...
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_03_10: Hmmm, maybe I should head home for a bit to check on them.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0701_04_10: Yeah right! There’s still so much I want to do on Pasio—there’s no way I’m heading home yet!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0702_01_10: It’s not just Pokémon taking care of the Gym. There are a bunch of Trainers there, too.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0702_02_10: They should be fine if I’m away a while longer.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0601_0702_03_10: Ooh, but I should make sure I check in often. I don’t want them to miss me too much!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0701_01_10: My Swanna can really move when she battles, so I can always count on her.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0701_02_10: She’s normally calm, though, and likes to stay neat and looking her best.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0701_03_10: That’s why I always have to keep a brush just for Swanna with me.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0702_01_10: Swanna really loves showing off her bright white wings!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0602_0702_02_10: It really brought her down when they got dirty in battle, so I cleaned her up right away!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0701_01_10: At my Mistralton City Gym, we send Trainers flying with cannons and fans.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0701_02_10: Doesn’t that sound like a superfun thrill?  I thought it was a brilliant idea,  if I do say so myself.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0701_03_10: But it seems like a lot of Trainers get worn out before they can get all the way to me.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0702_01_10: You seem tough enough to not be bothered at all if you were sent flying.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0603_0702_02_10: If you’re interested, you should come  take a shot at my Gym.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0701_01_10: Isn’t my hair tie cute? I love it!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0701_02_10: It’s really well designed, too. It’s easy to gather my hair up and keep it in place.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0701_03_10: Even when the wind is strong, it doesn’t get blown away or come loose or anything.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0702_01_10: When you’re flying into the wind, your glasses will fly away in a heartbeat.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0604_0702_02_10: You have to secure all your personal items when you go flying!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_01_10: Some places would take forever to walk to.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_02_10: But you can fly to them right away in a plane!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_03_10: It feels great to fly over mountains and forests.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0701_04_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], you should come take a trip through the skies with me!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0702_01_10: Flying into the wind or way up above the clouds is so much fun.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/0605_0702_02_10: And when you’ve got some Pokémon that can fly with you, it’s even more fun!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0701_01_10: Good to see you! I’ve got a present for you.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0701_02_10: I spotted it as I was flying overhead. It’s all yours, so use it however you want!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0702_01_10: Hee-hee! No matter how far away things are, a pilot’s eyes can see them!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/1701_0702_02_10: I’ll probably find something else nice on another flight. I’ll let you know when I do!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0701_01_10: There are so many reasons I like flying, it’s hard to explain them all.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0701_02_10: I guess the main thing is that my Pokémon and I can fly anywhere we want.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0701_03_10: There are no walls or ceiling to box us in—the freedom of it feels great.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0702_01_10: There’s more to the sky than just blue and some nice white clouds floating by.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0702_02_10: Sometimes it rains, sometimes the winds are strong. Some days, the sky’s just right for flight, and some days it’s not.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2501_0702_03_10: It makes you feel like the sky is alive.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0701_01_10: Some things can be tough to do on your own, but if you have help, you can get it done.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0701_03_10: People and Pokémon are all different, so when we combine our efforts, our power is on a whole different level, too!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0701_04_10: I hope I can battle with even more people and Pokémon.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0702_01_10: Maybe the reason Pokémon battles are so fun is because people and Pokémon get to spend some quality time together.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0702_02_10: I mean, you can’t have a Pokémon battle all by yourself!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/2511_0702_03_10: That’s why I always try to enjoy myself when I’m having a Pokémon battle.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Hee hee! Pilots are good at waking up early, you know!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! I hope today’s full of fun!
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3003_0701_01_10: Hi there!  The weather’s perfect for a flight today. What do you say?
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3004_0701_01_10: Hiya! Isn’t the weather nice today?  Maybe I should go clean my plane.
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3005_0701_01_10: Evening! You’re working pretty late, huh? Are you staying up for something exciting?
ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.ch0016_00_huuro/3006_0701_01_10: Playing outside at night always gives me such a thrill! You have to be careful, though. It’s kinda hard to see.

ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You made it! How’s your partner Pokémon doing?
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0101_0701_02_10: Make sure you take good care of it, all right? Don’t push it more than necessary.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0701_01_10: I’ll protect my Pokémon no matter what. That’s my golden rule.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0701_02_10: Why? Because he chose me. Out of everybody else, he chose me to be his Trainer.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0701_03_10: That alone makes me want to protect him from anything!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0702_01_10: Seeing somebody important to me get hurt is so much worse than getting hurt myself!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0702_02_10: I think you understand that feeling well.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0701_01_10: You see a lot of Trainers keep their Pokémon out of their Poké Balls on Pasio, right?
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0701_02_10: I’m glad to be able to walk around with my Eevee, but it does worry me a bit...
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0701_03_10: He’s just too cute! Somebody might want to kidnap him!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0702_01_10: Or maybe a talent agent might want to make him a Pokémon model! Would that mean we couldn’t be together anymore?!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0702_02_10: Oh no! Wh-where’d I put his Poké Ball?! I have to protect him!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_01_10: There are a lot of great things about Pasio, but I think some of the most impressive things are the different smells.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_02_10: The scent of flowers wafts from the forest, carried by the wind.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_03_10: Sometimes I stop to get lost in the aroma of the flowers.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_04_10: And then I realize that everybody’s staring at me like I’m a weirdo.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0702_01_10: You can smell delicious smells coming from the city, and you can smell the salt from the ocean breeze.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0702_02_10: Man, I just can’t get enough of Pasio!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_01_10: There are a lot of Rattata around Pallet Town in Kanto. That’s where I’m from.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_02_10: This one time long ago, one snuck into our kitchen!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_03_10: It nibbled on so much of our food... I couldn’t believe what was happening when I walked through the door!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_04_10: While it did surprise me, that Rattata looked so happy eating, I couldn’t get angry at it!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0702_01_10: I travel around with my Pokémon and spend all my time with them, but I always find new surprises!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0702_02_10: It makes me want to know about Pokémon even more!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0702_03_10: Maybe that’s just the nature of being a Trainer?
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_01_10: Hey! I think I just figured something out!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_02_10: You know how my Eevee is super cute?
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_03_10: Not only that—he’s so strong! Like, nobody can even touch him!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_04_10: Is it possible...that we’re the strongest?
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0702_01_10: Maybe you can be my rival, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0702_02_10: You take good care of your partner Pokémon, and you’ve got some real talent when it comes to battling.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/1701_0701_02_10: I wanted to give this to you! I’m sure it’ll come in handy!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/1701_0702_01_10: Well, I’m off! Take care of yourself!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0701_01_10: Eevee’s front paws are soooooo fluffy and soft! It feels great to just squeeze them!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0701_02_10: They’re so small and cute, but they have so much power behind them, too.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0701_03_10: He’s always so reliable, but at the same time, I can’t help but feel really protective of him!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0702_01_10: Pokémon have a very mysterious charm about them.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0702_02_10: Aah, I love him sooo much... I just can’t even—
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0701_01_10: Right now, I’m really into making different flower crowns for my Eevee.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0701_02_10: I pick flowers that might look good on him, and when I put them on his head, sometimes he cries out happily and other times he doesn’t react at all.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0701_03_10: That means he has preferences, too, right? I should take notes next time!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0702_01_10: What kinds of flowers do you think Eevee would like best?
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0702_02_10: Maybe I should have him choose for me when I make my next flower crown.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0702_03_10: Heh heh! I’m already getting excited!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/3001_0701_01_10: Sometimes I wish Trainers could use photosynthesis, too. I would just spread out my arms and soak up the sun.
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/3002_0701_01_10: Nothing like early morning sunshine to wake me up and fill me with energy for the day!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/3003_0701_01_10: You know, I’m glad I came to Pasio. There’re so many different Trainers and Pokémon to meet!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/3004_0701_01_10: Everywhere you look, the scenery here on Pasio is so gorgeous! It would be a waste to stay cooped up inside all day!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/3005_0701_01_10: Everything seems a little bit different at night, don’t you think? Pasio, Pokémon...even people!
ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.ch0017_00_leaf/3006_0701_01_10: You’d think I would hate the dark, but actually I don’t! There are lots of Pokémon that can only be found at night!

ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been waiting forever!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0101_0701_02_10: I wonder what kind of new adventures we’ll have today! Well, then we’re off!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_01_10: I read up on Pokémon a good deal, you know?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_02_10: But just reading books doesn’t teach you everything about Pokémon.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_03_10: That’s why you have to go out, walk with your own legs, and see them with your own eyes.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0701_04_10: That way, you can see Pokémon for yourself. The kind that aren’t just recorded as data!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0702_01_10: I want to meet all the Pokémon in the world!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0601_0702_02_10: Maybe you can call that my dream.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_01_10: Understanding ecosystems and the mechanisms of Evolution is important, too...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_02_10: But I’m more interested in the minds of the Pokémon.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_03_10: I want to know about what they think and how they feel.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0701_04_10: I want to understand their emotions so that we can make the world more like how they want it.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0702_01_10: If people and Pokémon could understand each other better, we could become even closer!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0602_0702_02_10: Think about it! A world where we care for and help each other. Wouldn’t that be great?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_01_10: Totodile’s been with me the longest.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_02_10: She has a little bit of a troublemaker streak, so I had my work cut out for me at the start.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_03_10: She would try to bite me whenever she got the chance. It was pretty tough!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_04_10: But in reality, she actually bit me only once.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0701_05_10: I fell in a river once and almost drowned. But Totodile bit my hand to try and pull me out.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0702_01_10: Seeing a river always reminds me of that day.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0603_0702_02_10: And of how Totodile came swimming toward me from the light I saw at the bottom of that river.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_01_10: It makes me sad whenever I see people showing their Pokémon affection in the wrong way.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_02_10: They might be trying to make their Pokémon happy...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_03_10: but ultimately, their Pokémon might not like it or it might end up backfiring.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_04_10: This happens because people don’t have  the right knowledge about their Pokémon.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0701_05_10: I hope people can educate themselves so there can be a lot less Pokémon that suffer.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0702_01_10: Doing what each other wants might be true love...maybe.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0604_0702_02_10: Love is difficult, isn’t it? But then again, what do I know. Ha ha!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_01_10: Looking at you, I always get to thinking...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_02_10: that maybe you and your Pokémon are the ideal image of how people and Pokémon should be.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_03_10: Neither of you pushes yourself to get along with the other. You just naturally do.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0701_05_10: It’s not just Pokémon that I observe, you know.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0702_01_10: I might have been a Trainer longer than you...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/0605_0702_02_10: but I have plenty I can learn from you, too!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this. A present from yours truly.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0701_02_10: I’m sure it’ll help you out, so it’d be nice if you used it!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0702_01_10: I sometimes get presents from people, too.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/1701_0702_02_10: But this one time, I got one from a Pokémon!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_01_10: Have you heard of the Legendary Pokémon?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_02_10: They’re Pokémon that rarely show themselves in front of people, if they even ever do.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_03_10: A while back, I found a Legendary Pokémon called Suicune and chased it.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_04_10: It was such a beautiful Pokémon. It looked pure and pristine, like a crystal.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0701_05_10: If I ever run into Suicune again, I want to show it that I’ve grown up.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0702_01_10: Being able to meet a Legendary Pokémon comes with its fair share of hardships.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2501_0702_02_10: Because it’s so rare to lay eyes on them,  it’s that much more awe-inspiring when you do.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_01_10: It’s a shame, but there are people in the world that use Pokémon for evil.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_02_10: I can never forgive people like that!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_03_10: Not just because of the fact that they’re using Pokémon to do bad things.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_04_10: But even more than that, as Trainers, they are failing their Pokémon!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0701_05_10: Those Pokémon that are trusting those Trainers are betrayed. It pains my heart to see Pokémon going through that...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0702_01_10: It would be great if you could show the world how a Trainer and their Pokémon should be.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/2511_0702_02_10: Not some twisted bond but a true connection between Pokémon and their Trainer.
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3001_0701_01_10: It’s interesting how some Pokémon are waking and some are going to sleep. Their differences make them so fascinating!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3002_0701_01_10: The earlier I wake up, the more chances I have to meet cool Pokémon!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3003_0701_01_10: We’re going on another adventure to meet new Pokémon today! Hehehe!
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3004_0701_01_10: If I ever get info on a rare Pokémon, I’ll be sure to let you know, OK?
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3005_0701_01_10: Pokémon that appear only at night  are sure difficult to meet. *yawn* I’m sleepy...
ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.ch0018_00_chris/3006_0701_01_10: Even on nights with no moonlight or stars, you can still make out the Pokémon eyes in the dark.

ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I’ve been waiting for you! Come on. Let’s get going!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0101_0701_02_10: I think we’re gonna meet lots  of different Pokémon today!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_01_10: The other day, I was wondering where my Treecko went. Turns out, he was clinging to the ceiling!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_02_10: I was looking at him, wondering what he was up to, when he suddenly came diving down onto my face.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0701_03_10: Seems like it’s his new hobby or something. He surprised me, but I did get a good laugh, too!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_01_10: I told you about my Treecko and his new hobby of diving onto people’s faces, right?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_02_10: Well, we smacked heads when he tried that last time. Ever since then he’s become a bit more careful before he dives.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0601_0702_03_10: It’s really funny watching Treecko carefully line up his jump!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_01_10: When I was back in the Hoenn region, my Taillow would curl up on my head whenever it got cold.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_02_10: I think it liked it there ’cause my head is warm. It was pretty much Taillow’s special spot.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_03_10: I don’t mind it when it’s windy, since it keeps my hat from blowing away, but...
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0701_04_10: I have to admit, Taillow gets a bit heavy when it sits on my head for too long.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_01_10: I get worried sometimes that Taillow might just go ahead and turn my hat into a full nest.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_02_10: In the spring, it even catches the Worm Pokémon Wurmple and leaves them on my hat!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0602_0702_03_10: Maybe it’s too late about the nest thing, huh?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_01_10: My dad is actually a pretty amazing Gym Leader.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_02_10: And my dream is to become a better Pokémon Trainer than my dad!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0701_03_10: So I want to learn even more about Pokémon and become stronger than I am now.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_01_10: Someday, I’d love to become a Gym Leader with my favorite Pokémon.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_02_10: And be an obstacle for Trainers to overcome, just like my dad.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0603_0702_03_10: In order for my dream to come true, I’d better be able to win in the PML, at least!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_01_10: You know, I have a friend named May. She’s my best rival!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_02_10: I still remember the first time we had a Pokémon battle, back in the Hoenn region.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0701_03_10: I’d never had a heated Pokémon battle like that, where we both give it everything we have!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_01_10: May’s always cheerful and energetic, but when she watches stars at night, she gets really quiet.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_02_10: We were watching shooting stars the other day, and every time she saw one, her eyes lit up.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0604_0702_03_10: Her eyes were really pretty, too, like stars!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_01_10: You need a rival for a journey, right? Like, a friend who helps you keep going  and challenges you to become stronger!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_02_10: Yeah, I’ve got May, but it’s not like we’re always together here.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_03_10: Besides, I can never have too many rivals.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_04_10: Now, I’d really like my rivals to be strong and dependable—like a partner almost, right?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0701_05_10: You wouldn’t happen to know anyone like that, would you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0702_01_10: In case it wasn’t clear, I was thinking about you when I was talking about all that rival stuff, OK?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/0605_0702_02_10: I might as well be direct. You’re definitely one of my rivals now, OK? [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, I was just looking for you!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0701_02_10: You can have this. My Pokémon found it stuck in a tree.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0702_01_10: It was a pretty good item, right?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/1701_0702_02_10: I personally like it a lot, so I hope it comes in handy for you, too!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_01_10: Do you remember what inspired you to become a Pokémon Trainer?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_02_10: For me, it was my dad. I always wanted to be an amazing Trainer like him.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0701_03_10: I’ve become stronger so that I could catch up to him.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_01_10: My dad’s a Gym Leader, and I’ve battled him before. I won that time.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_02_10: I might have defeated him when he battled me as a Gym Leader, but...
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_03_10: I still don’t feel like I’ve really surpassed him yet. He has more knowledge, more experience, more everything.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_04_10: So someday, I want to become the better Pokémon Trainer, in every way!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2501_0702_05_10: That’s why I have Pokémon battles every day! I want to really get to know all the Pokémon, just like my dad!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_01_10: As I’ve watched you get stronger, I’ve started feeling something. I think it’s anxiousness?
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_02_10: Until now, all I really thought about was overtaking my dad. But now, you’re on my mind.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_03_10: I don’t want you to leave me behind—or even catch up to me! That’s what helps me become even stronger.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0701_04_10: I’ve said it before and I’ll say it again: you’re definitely my rival!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_01_10: I’m glad you’re my rival, you know. It’s helped me become even stronger!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_02_10: I guess this is what you call a healthy rivalry.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_03_10: Finding a worthy opponent, and competing with them as rivals...
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/2511_0702_04_10: Don’t you think it’s a good way to be? You’d better stay sharp. You’re one of my best rivals now!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3001_0701_01_10: Great weather this morning! Good thing we got up early!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3002_0701_01_10: Hey! I woke up to the sounds of chirping Pokémon. Anyways, I’ll be counting on you today!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3003_0701_01_10: It’s afternoon already? The perfect time for Pokémon battles!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3004_0701_01_10: There’s a lot of stuff on sale here, so you can always find something new.
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3005_0701_01_10: I want to know more about Pokémon you can only find at night!
ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.ch0019_00_yuki/3006_0701_01_10: Wow, the stars are beautiful tonight. Maybe we’ll see a shooting star!

ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I figured you’d be coming soon.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0101_0701_02_10: Battles seem more fun when you’re around. Let’s do our best today, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0701_01_10: I’ve been traveling all over the place,  and then I was called here to Pasio.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0701_02_10: Traveling is good for you. You get to see new sights and meet new people and Pokémon.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0701_03_10: You’re one of the new people I’ve met  during my travels, you know?  And I’m very happy for that!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_01_10: Don’t you think it’s kind of miraculous when we meet new people or Pokémon?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_02_10: The world is so big, there are so many people and Pokémon that’ll never meet each other...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_03_10: And yet we’ve met here, and now we’re talking and becoming friends!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0601_0702_04_10: I hope we can make this meeting something really special.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0701_01_10: I like Pokémon battles because I really want to experience the joy of victory, I guess.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0701_02_10: So much goes into winning a battle. You have to plan your strategy, raise your Pokémon, read your opponent’s moves...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0701_03_10: It just feels wonderful when you can bring all those factors together and seize victory!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0702_01_10: When we win, my Pokémon get really happy, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0702_02_10: That goes for that frustrating feeling when we lose, too, of course.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0602_0702_03_10: I think Pokémon battles are a form of communication.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0701_01_10: I know my Oshawott is pretty tiny, but he’s really good at Pokémon battles.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0701_02_10: He’s defeated much larger Pokémon by using his smaller size as an advantage.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0701_03_10: He’s the best partner I could have for my travels!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0702_01_10: My Oshawott is, what do you call it... Stoic, I guess.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0702_02_10: He wakes up earlier than even I do and goes out on his own to train.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0603_0702_03_10: I guess he’s strong because he takes battles so seriously...?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_01_10: Even if it’s a place you’ve been to many times before, you can discover new things if you just pay a little closer attention.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_02_10: I really enjoy looking for little secrets like that, you know?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_03_10: You might discover a path you never saw before or meet new Pokémon. It’s hard to quit exploring once you get into it!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0701_04_10: I’d love it if we could go exploring together, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0702_01_10: Forests and mountains are fun to explore, sure, but cities can also be really exciting.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0702_02_10: My favorite thing to do is look for great restaurants that are off the beaten path!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0604_0702_03_10: Besides, if the Pokémon I meet seem like they’re having fun, it makes me smile, too!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_01_10: I feel comfortable when I’m with you. You’re reassuring, somehow.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_02_10: So, y’know, even if you become an amazing Trainer...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_03_10: I hope our relationship won’t change. I hope we’ll stay friends.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0701_04_10: So, uh, this is a little embarrassing, but... Let’s stick together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0702_01_10: When I watch your Pokémon battles, it makes me feel...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/0605_0702_02_10: It’s hard to explain. Like my heart’s on fire? It makes me want to battle, too.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, I found something good, so I figured I’d share it with you!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0701_02_10: It’s best to share happiness with another person, after all!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0702_01_10: I’m pretty good at finding items, since I’ve traveled so much.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/1701_0702_02_10: I’ll let you know if I find anything else good!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0701_01_10: I’m really looking forward to  the Pokémon battles on Pasio.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0701_02_10: Each place has its own powerful Trainers.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0701_03_10: So whenever I’m going to face strong Trainers, I always wonder how far I’ll be able to go.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0702_01_10: Seeing you get stronger and stronger... It really makes me feel like I can’t lag behind, either!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2501_0702_02_10: In other words, you are a great inspiration for me!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0701_01_10: I’m a bit of a sore loser. I try not to let it show, since I don’t want people thinking I’m childish.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0701_02_10: But that does mean I battle to win, even if it’s against you!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0701_03_10: You’re my friend, and that’s why I want to go all out in our battles! No holding grudges, even if you lose!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0702_01_10: It’s like, we’re together a lot...but that’s exactly why I don’t want to lose. Do you have that kind of competitiveness, too?
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0702_02_10: I guess having this kind of feeling about each other is what you’d call a rivalry.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/2511_0702_03_10: Well, I hope we can stay good friends—and good rivals!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Did ya eat a good breakfast? You’ll feel better if you eat.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! Sleep well? I can’t wait to have a ton of Pokémon battles today!
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! Eating lunch made me sleepy...
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3004_0701_01_10: Afternoon! Wanna go for a walk or something? Oh, and while we’re at it, I also want to do some Pokémon battles.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! It’s a nice night, right? Quiet, calm, and pleasant.
ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.ch0020_00_toya/3006_0701_01_10: Evening. A day goes by fast, huh. I’m not done having fun yet!

ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0101_0701_02_10: I’ll battle you, if I have time! Not like I’d lose anyway!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0701_01_10: Have you heard about me already? If you’ve heard I’m super strong, it’s true!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0701_02_10: I mean, your average Trainer doesn’t even stand a chance against me!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0701_04_10: Well, Red did beat me, but the next time we battle, things are gonna be different!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0702_01_10: It doesn’t matter what kind of event it is or where it’s being held. I’ll always make it to the top!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0601_0702_02_10: That’s the type of Pokémon battle I want to have, after all!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0701_01_10: Pidgeot’s my pride and joy.  You should see how fast he can fly!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0701_02_10: He can even carry me and fly to different towns!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0701_03_10: My hair does get completely ruined by the time we reach our destination, though.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0702_01_10: Don’t you think my hair looks great?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0602_0702_02_10: I put a lot of effort into it so that it doesn’t get messed up even when I’m flying with Pidgeot.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0701_01_10: I’m a Pokémon Trainer, through and through. I always want to battle the strongest opponents!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0701_02_10: And I’ve got a rival, Red. We can throw everything we’ve got at each other, holding nothing back.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0701_03_10: I hope you can find a rival like that, too. One that will help you grow and vice versa.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0702_01_10: Red doesn’t say much, but he’s an amazing guy. Full of love for Pokémon.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0603_0702_02_10: Don’t tell anyone I said this, but I respect him. There’s so much I learned after I lost to him.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_01_10: Y’know, my hometown is a tiny little place out in the boonies of a faraway region.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_02_10: I don’t go back much, really. I mean, I can get so much stronger! I need to keep training!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_03_10: But my sis back home keeps asking when I’m coming home, every time I talk to her.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0701_04_10: What a bother, right? She doesn’t get that a guy’s gotta do what a guy’s gotta do.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0702_01_10: I guess my sis really doesn’t get that I gotta do what I gotta do.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0604_0702_02_10: Don’t get me wrong, though. I know she’s just looking out for me, and I’m grateful for that.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0701_01_10: You know, [Name:PlayerNickname ], you remind me of him. Of my rival.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0701_02_10: You don’t say much, and the way you look when you’re with Pokémon...
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0701_03_10: You’re quiet, but you’ve got that burning passion, too. Just like him.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0702_01_10: It’s hard to tell what he’s thinking sometimes, you know.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/0605_0702_02_10: I’ve known him for a long time now, but there are still a lot of mysteries about that guy.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0701_01_10: Here, you can have this. It was tangled up in Pidgeot’s feathers.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0701_02_10: Put it to good use, OK?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0702_01_10: Pidgeot can fly at Mach 2! You wouldn’t stand a chance if he hit you!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/1701_0702_02_10: I remember one time, we ran into a flock of Swanna. They got super angry, and we had a high-speed air battle!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_01_10: You’re aiming to become the  strongest Trainer too, right?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_02_10: I’ve got a word of advice for you, then!
