ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_03_10: Never forget to treat your Pokémon with trust and love.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_04_10: OK, to be honest, it’s something my gramps taught me a while ago.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0701_05_10: But I try to live by those words, even today.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0702_01_10: You can’t become strong just by  simply focusing on power.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2501_0702_02_10: At the end of the day, it’s a trusting relationship with your Pokémon that’ll make a difference.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_01_10: Do you still remember the first Pokémon you caught, or the first opponent you battled?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_03_10: How could I forget? It’s the day my adventure began, after all.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_04_10: And my adventure isn’t over yet. Not until my perfect partner and I defeat Red, and I become the most powerful Trainer ever!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0701_05_10: Shoot, I don’t even have enough time to catch my breath!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0702_01_10: Maybe you’ll become a Trainer like Red, too, someday.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/2511_0702_02_10: When the time comes, I know I’ll be super pumped!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! All pumped up and ready for the day? Don’t let your guard down  just because it’s early!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning. How you feeling? Me? I’m feeling great. Thanks for asking!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3003_0701_01_10: Hey, how’s it going? You’re not slacking off on your training, are ya?
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3004_0701_01_10: Bonjour! Off for an adventure? That’s fine and all, but don’t forget to have a battle with me from time to time!
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3005_0701_01_10: Fancy running into you at this hour! Taking a break is an important part of training, you know.
ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.ch0021_00_green/3006_0701_01_10: You’re still adventuring at this hour? I think I’m gonna call it a day myself. Smell ya later!

ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0101_0701_02_10: You’re glimmering like the shiniest shard of ice!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0101_0701_03_10: Looking at fresh ice is always nice. Keep up the good work, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_01_10: You’re wondering whether I get cold dressed like this all year?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_02_10: I’m sure there are people around you that spend the year in short sleeves, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_03_10: Those people have blazing spirits! That’s why the cold doesn’t bother them.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0702_01_10: I mean, I get cold, too, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0601_0702_02_10: If you’re not 100 percent on your game all the time, you have to find a way to keep warm.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_01_10: Ice is a bit of a paradox, y’know? It’s both durable and fragile.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_02_10: Fragile when warm and durable when cold.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_03_10: Power is just as fickle.  But that is what makes it fun.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_04_10: I like to cherish the kind of power that can be lost in a moment.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0702_01_10: Now, the kind of power that is unshakable, the kind that will never change no matter what...
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0602_0702_02_10: I want you to have the kind of spirit that would be able to find it.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_01_10: I always enjoy my Pokémon battles with my trusty Avalugg.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_02_10: In any case, you can say the one who enjoys themselves the most is the winner, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_03_10: Time is limited. We don’t have the kind of time to think about things like winning or losing.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_01_10: I’m impressed with how you  interact with your Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_02_10: There are Trainers that want to become stronger or maybe become closer to their Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_03_10: Just like how no two people have  the same thoughts, the same can be said  for Pokémon as well.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_04_10: So being able to have fun alongside your Pokémon is an incredibly precious thing.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_01_10: I may be hard as ice, but my wife  can easily make me melt.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_02_10: She asked me about “it” the other day, y’know? And I couldn’t answer her.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_03_10: All I could say was, “Oh yeah, that’s a few days away, isn’t it?” She got mad at me...
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_04_10: I mean, what is “it” anyway, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_05_10: It must’ve been our anniversary! Yeesh!  We all have something we’re not good at.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0702_01_10: I can be tough as an iceberg, hot as a furnace, but there’s one thing that I cannot stand up to.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0604_0702_02_10: My wife’s cold stare.  It’s something I could never get used to.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you know about the Pokémon village?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_02_10: It’s a place where hurt Pokémon go to rest and support each other.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_03_10: I hope you get the chance to go there. I’m sure it will make you even kinder toward Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0702_01_10: Unfortunately, there are bad people that hurt Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/0605_0702_02_10: If you ever find a hurt Pokémon, I hope you care for it. You have a good heart. I’m sure you will.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0701_01_10: I found this caught in one of Avalugg’s cracks.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0701_02_10: Here, you can have it. Use it well.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0702_01_10: Avalugg has really big cracks, so if you don’t clean them often, you’ll find a bunch of things  caught in there!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/1701_0702_02_10: I once lost a present I meant to give to my kids, but I found it in one of Avalugg’s cracks! Ha ha! *sigh*
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_01_10: I might be a Gym Leader, but I can only be one thanks to the support I get from my family.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_02_10: My wife and kids are always there, cheering me on.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_03_10: It’s thanks to them that I can give it my all when I battle.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_01_10: My locket with a picture of my family is  my most important possession, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_02_10: I never leave home without it! It reminds me how grateful I should be to them!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_03_10: Besides, y’know... It’s nice to think  that your family is always with you.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_01_10: Spending time with you warms my heart.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_02_10: Both people and Pokémon alike have hearts. I’m just saying that you have a warmth that is soothing to those around you.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_03_10: At the very least, Avalugg here and I like you!
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_04_10: I bet the people and Pokémon that approach you can see that you have a kind heart, too.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0702_01_10: One warm person can warm up  everyone around them.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/2511_0702_02_10: And if there’s a frigid knucklehead around, well, that’s where you come in, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3001_0701_01_10: Hi! The morning air always fills me with vigor. Isn’t it refreshing?
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3002_0701_01_10: Y’know, I woke up around five this morning. I just can’t seem to get good shut-eye lately.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3003_0701_01_10: Hey, how’re you doing? We should have a battle one of these days.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3004_0701_01_10: Hey there. Pokémon battling is always a good way to spend the day.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3005_0701_01_10: You’re out and about awfully late. You shouldn’t overexert yourself, you know.
ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.ch0022_00_urup/3006_0701_01_10: Goin’ out at this time of night? Well, just don’t stay up too late.

ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I hope you’re faring well today.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0101_0701_02_10: I’m feeling quite blissful today! The happiness of my Pokémon tends to rub off on me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_01_10: When you wander the land as I do, you get the chance to chat with all sorts of different Trainers.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_02_10: Some want to be stronger—some want to gain a closer friendship with their Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_03_10: What they wish to achieve with their Pokémon varies a lot depending on the person.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_04_10: But one thing they all share in common...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0701_05_10: is the incredibly strong bond they have with their Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0702_01_10: Blissey and I have traveled far and wide together.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0601_0702_02_10: After all this time, our sync strength must be strong indeed.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_01_10: When I’m out on a journey, if I ever feel close to breaking down and giving up...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_02_10: I think about you and my Pokémon and I suddenly feel energized and ready to press on again.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_03_10: It’s good for Trainers to remember that our Pokémon are always by our side.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0701_04_10: Never forget that, all right? The people around you are always there to support you when you need it.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_01_10: The Old Chateau was a really frightening place, even with my Pokémon there beside me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_02_10: But you know, the only reason I am who I am today is because my Pokémon was there for me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0602_0702_03_10: Trusting and believing in your Pokémon is so, so important.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_01_10: My Blissey’s egg makes everyone smile, no matter who they are!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_02_10: Sometimes she even lets me hold it. Feeling its soft warmth in my arms really puts me at ease.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_03_10: It feels like holding a little ball of happiness!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0701_04_10: If you’re ever feeling worn out, you should try borrowing Blissey’s Egg as well. I’m sure it’ll make you feel much better.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0702_01_10: Did you know that my Blissey can immediately spot when I’m feeling down?
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0603_0702_02_10: She has such a kind heart. Just having her by my side makes me feel 100 percent better.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_01_10: Sometimes it’s good to loaf around and relax with your Pokémon.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_02_10: You never know—you might discover a new side of your Pokémon that it doesn’t show during battles.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0701_03_10: For example, if Blissey cuddles me when we’re taking a nap, I sleep like a baby!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0702_01_10: Pokémon are all so fluffy and cute, but...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0604_0702_02_10: it would take some courage to take a nap with a Wailord.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_01_10: I usually do all of my hair styling myself...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_02_10: but sometimes Blissey really wants to do it for me.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0701_03_10: The results aren’t always the most polished, but I let her do it anyway because she looks so cute when she’s excited!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_01_10: I have really long hair, but it’s much easier to deal with when it’s braided like this.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_02_10: Funnily enough, Pokémon are attracted to my braid as it sways while I’m walking. It makes them want to pounce!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/0605_0702_03_10: Does it make you want to pounce, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0701_01_10: I had a dream that I was riding on a Pelipper on an adventure through the clouds...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0701_02_10: and when I woke up, I was holding this in my hand.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0702_01_10: Isn’t that odd? I suppose stranger things have happened.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/1701_0702_02_10: Maybe I’ll find something even nicer in my hand the next time I wake up from a nap! Tee-hee!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been having so much fun recently.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_02_10: I mean, relaxing and taking naps with my Pokémon is great and all, but...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_03_10: going out and exploring with you recently has been such a delight!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_04_10: Adjusting our strategies to match our opponents, battling side by side... It’s all just so exciting!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0701_05_10: I find myself thinking about our next adventure all the time now!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0702_01_10: There are some opponents I would be a little worried about battling by myself...
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2501_0702_02_10: but if we challenge them together, I feel confident that things will work out somehow!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_01_10: My Pokémon aren’t just cute—they pack a lot of punch as well! Tee-hee!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_02_10: I have a friend who’s an incredibly talented Pokémon Trainer.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_03_10: Meeting that friend is actually what helped me realize how much I enjoy Pokémon battling!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0701_04_10: Even now...I’m just itching to go out there and find someone to battle with!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_01_10: I’d love to make more friends who enjoy Pokémon battling like I do.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_02_10: I mean...it would be nice if we could be friends.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/2511_0702_03_10: Or rivals! Rivals are great, too!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! I hope this is a happy day for you!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3002_0701_01_10: That scent in the air when you wake up early in the morning is the scent of adventure!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3003_0701_01_10: Hello there. Why don’t you take a few deep breaths with me and enjoy a slow day?
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3004_0701_01_10: This is the time of day when my Pokémon and I have the most energy!
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! I think it’s almost bedtime.
ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.ch0023_00_momi/3006_0701_01_10: I know you’re working very hard, but if you stay up too late, you or your Pokémon could fall ill.

ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0101_0701_01_10: “And so she stared off into the sunset, patiently waiting for the day [Name:PlayerNickname ] would return once more.”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0101_0701_02_10: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Would you mind being my subject today? I’ve got some new novel ideas that need brainstorming!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0701_01_10: My Chandelure and I have been the best of friends ever since she was a Litwick.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0701_02_10: I was only a small child when we first met, long before I started writing novels.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0701_03_10: I often used to read stories by the light of Litwick’s flame.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0702_01_10: To this day, I still often use Chandelure’s flames to light up my work space when I’m writing my novels.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0702_02_10: Under the glow of her light, I feel like I’m able to envision the events of my stories so much more vividly.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0601_0702_03_10: Although she sometimes scolds me if I doze off at my writing desk.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_01_10: “And so it was...that a fated meeting with Litwick changed the course of the young woman’s destiny!”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_02_10: She—I mean, I—became a Pokémon Trainer, and I met my dear Litwick, and I met countless other people...
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_03_10: and I discovered that every person and Pokémon out there has a story to be told.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0701_04_10: It was then that I decided to write novels— to tell the beautiful stories of the people I meet and share them with the world!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_01_10: I’ve told all kinds of stories up until now about the hearts of Trainers and their Pokémon.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_02_10: My novels are an extension of the world I witness with my eyes and feel in my heart.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_03_10: As long as people and Pokémon continue to help each other and enrich each other’s lives, I’ll continue to write my stories.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0602_0702_04_10: “At those words, the young woman’s eyes sparkled like the shining flames of her Chandelure.”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0701_01_10: Even with a wealth of vocabulary, some feelings simply can’t be put into words.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0701_02_10: Perhaps that’s a topic I should challenge myself with as a writer.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0701_03_10: Yes! Someday I’ll capture those indescribable emotions with my pen and share them with the world!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0702_01_10: “They walked forward on their path... Together as one, without need for words, believing in their bond of friendship...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0702_02_10: It’s precisely because people and Pokémon cannot communicate through words that drives us to connect through our hearts instead.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0603_0702_03_10: And if so, that means writing about those feelings is my true destiny. Gosh! I suddenly feel so inspired!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0701_01_10: “The Trainer and Pokémon faced a tall,  tall mountain ahead of them.  At the summit, their final rival...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0701_02_10: Hmm. No, that feels a little off, doesn’t it?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0701_03_10: In times like these, it’s often better to move on to something new rather than force your way through writer’s block.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0702_01_10: Wait! The second I just thought about giving up, the most amazing idea popped into my head!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0604_0702_02_10: I feel a best seller coming on! Gosh, I’ve got to write all of this down before I forget!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], why do you think people are afraid of Ghost-type Pokémon?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0701_02_10: I’ve always thought that all types of Pokémon are equally adorable!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0701_03_10: One day, I’ll write a best seller that will show the world just how amazing Ghost-type Pokémon truly are!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0702_01_10: “Mysterious shadows of the darkness... Form a bond with one in your heart, and even the blackest of nights will seem brighter...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0702_02_10: Yes! A tale that will make the world fall in love with Ghost-type Pokémon! No one could write it better than me!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/0605_0702_03_10: Oh! You could even be my first beta reader once it’s finished!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/1701_0701_01_10: I was just taking a stroll in the forest to mull over some story ideas when I found this on the path.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/1701_0702_01_10: “The item, unbeknownst to anyone, would soon be the catalyst that set off a remarkable chain of events...”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/1701_0702_02_10: Tee-hee! Or so I’d like to think! Though I’m sure it’s highly unlikely.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0701_01_10: I feel so inspired! The more I spend time with you, the more curious I get!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0701_02_10: And it’s curious in a different way than I’m usually curious about Pokémon. This feels totally new! But why...
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0701_03_10: I’d like to find that out. Would you let me tag along with you awhile longer? I need you to be my muse!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_01_10: I think I’ve found it! The sparkling light that shines within you as a Trainer!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_02_10: That must be what’s been drawing me to you—what’s made me so curious!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_03_10: Now it’s up to me to investigate just how far that shining light you possess stretches. I’ll do my very best!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2501_0702_04_10: I’ll do it for the novel I’ll inevitably write one day! Until then, I’ll be here to witness your story.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve come to realize that being strong isn’t just about winning battles.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0701_02_10: It’s about kindness—lending a helping hand to someone in need. Or having the courage to stand up for other people.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0701_03_10: It’s all of those things together that make someone truly strong. Tagging along with you has helped me realize that!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_01_10: “The Trainer discovered a whole new world the day they met their first Pokémon... And so their story together began.”
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_02_10: Someday... Someday I’ll write a brilliant novel with you and your Pokémon as the main characters.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_03_10: Once it’s finished, I want you to be the first one to read it.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/2511_0702_04_10: I’ll write all about the kindness and courage you’ve taught me. Promise me you’ll read it?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3001_0701_01_10: Hello... I’m not really a morning person... *yawn*
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3002_0701_01_10: Is it morning already...? I got so wrapped up in my writing, I seem to have forgotten to sleep.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3003_0701_01_10: Hello. I enjoy afternoons—it’s the perfect time for reading. Do you have any recommendations?
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3004_0701_01_10: This afternoon, I’ll brainstorm for my next book while watching my Pokémon.
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! I do most of my writing at night. I seem to get all my good ideas around this time!
ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.ch0024_00_shikimi/3006_0701_01_10: I was up very late last night, writing. I plan on going to bed earlier tonight.

ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0101_0701_02_10: Mine is on point, as always!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_01_10: Hey, do you have any interest in the fashion here on Pasio?
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_03_10: I’ve seen a lot of different fashion throughout my journeys.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_04_10: Everywhere I go, I see people of all shapes and sizes expressing themselves through fashion!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_05_10: When it comes to being stylish, I’m second to none!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0701_06_10: My personal style choices are outfits that represent who I am as a person.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0601_0702_01_10: I only wear clothes that I really love. I put a lot of thought into my personal style! It’s what they call individuality!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_01_10: Melt the ice with the fire in our hearts! That’s how Candice likes to battle!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_02_10: Even Ice-type Pokémon have a burning focus deep inside them.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_03_10: That way, even if things get a little wild and crazy, they have their focus to keep them on track!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0701_04_10: Only their moves need to be icy, after all! A heart full of fiery passion is way cooler than a frigid, cold one!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0702_01_10: I suppose I should act cool because I’m an Ice-type Pokémon Trainer...
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0602_0702_02_10: but that’s just not me! I can’t force myself to be something I’m not—and I don’t want to!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0701_01_10: Did you know my Abomasnow is super cool even when she’s playing hide-and-seek?!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0701_02_10: She can whip up blizzards that blanket her surroundings with white snow, allowing her to hide from everyone!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0701_03_10: Isn’t that awesome?! Although, when she’s the seeker, sometimes she can’t find US in her blizzard, either.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0702_01_10: You know, my Abomasnow has always been pretty cool!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0603_0702_02_10: She knows just when to take this burning enthusiasm of mine down a few degrees with her icy cool attitude. She’s the perfect partner!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0701_01_10: When you’re up on a snowy mountain, you’ve got to be energized and fully focused!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0701_02_10: If you aren’t, you could end up freezing over like an icicle! You’ve got to let your inner fire burn!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0701_03_10: No matter where we go, my Pokémon and I are second to none when it comes to focus!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0702_01_10: My Abomasnow is such a caring partner. Whenever I get chilly, she’s always there to give me a nice warm hug.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0604_0702_02_10: Her fur’s so fluffy and warm—I’m never worried about the cold, even when it’s freezing outside!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Anyone ever told you your Pokémon is the spitting image of you?
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0701_02_10: How wonderful! That just goes to show you what a close bond you have with your Pokémon!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0701_03_10: The memories you share with your Pokémon can affect it a lot as it grows, you know!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0702_01_10: People and Pokémon are very different from one another... But the feelings we have are one and the same.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/0605_0702_02_10: One heart, one mind, and in our case, one razor-sharp focus!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0701_01_10: Abomasnow picked up something interesting the other day.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0701_02_10: We thought maybe you could use it! Here, it’s a present from us!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0702_01_10: Giving and receiving presents always makes me feel nice inside!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/1701_0702_02_10: Even after you use them up, that warm feeling still remains!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_01_10: Abomasnow are extremely tough, but even they have their weaknesses.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_02_10: That’s why we often pair up and train with Maylene!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_03_10: It’s so nice knowing you have a friend beside you, pushing you to work hard and reach your goals together!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0701_04_10: Maylene is a super hard worker. When I’m with her, I feel even more focused and eager than when I’m alone!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0702_01_10: Maylene and I are planning to train together again soon.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2501_0702_02_10: This time, we’re focusing our training on fashion research!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_01_10: You know, sometimes people tell me that it doesn’t really matter how focused you are.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_02_10: They tell me there are obstacles that just can’t be overcome by mere focus and willpower.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_03_10: But to me, that just sounds like you’re giving up before you even try! Right?
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_04_10: People only feel that way because they’re not focused enough! That’s what I think.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0701_05_10: When you truly believe in your partner Pokémon, your inner focus will ignite all on its own!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0702_01_10: Focus is absolutely vital when it comes to improving your skills!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/2511_0702_02_10: That’s why I’m always hyperfocused, no matter where I am or what I’m doing!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3001_0701_01_10: Hiya! Are you focused first thing in the morning? I sure am!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning! Something about telling people  good morning makes me feel good.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3003_0701_01_10: Hi! How are you? Still plenty of day ahead of us!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3004_0701_01_10: Hello there! I feel happy all day when people say hello to me.
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3005_0701_01_10: Oh, hi! Ready for more? You look pretty focused to me!
ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.ch0025_00_suzuna/3006_0701_01_10: Whew. I think I’m getting a little sleepy. Might be time to say good night while I still can!

ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0101_0701_02_10: I bet you’re happy, huh? After all, I’m such a cutie! I’m lookin’ forward to more adventures today!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_01_10: Pasio really is a nice place, ain’t it? I sure think it is!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_02_10: I’ve never seen scenery like this back home. The girls and the Pokémon are all so cute, too!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_03_10: Well, none of ’em are quite as cute as yours truly, though!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_05_10: I heard there was a festival or somethin’, so I decided to come join. I’m glad I did—this is perfect for a vacation!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0701_06_10: Although festivals in Goldenrod City, where I’m from, are even bigger and brighter than this.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0702_01_10: Trainers really do come from all over the place, don’t they? I guess they’re all here for the PML—everybody sure is givin’ it their all!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0601_0702_02_10: That’s my kind of people! I love seein’ people workin’ hard at what they love!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_01_10: I can’t help but cry when I lose a Pokémon battle.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_02_10: I mean, how come everybody doesn’t cry when they lose?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_03_10: It’s very serious business, after all! Ain’t it disappointing when you lose?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0701_04_10: I know I get all kinds of disappointed! I feel sad for my cute Pokémon when they lose, and that’s why I always cry when we’re bested.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0702_01_10: I know it won’t change anything if I cry, but don’t you feel better after a good cry?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0602_0702_02_10: I think that’s a good enough reason to cry for me!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0701_01_10: Got your eye on my Miltank, do you?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0701_02_10: What fine taste you have! Doesn’t she just make your heart go pitter-patter?!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0701_03_10: You know what’s really great about her? She’s all kinds of cute, and she’s strong! What more could you want?!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0702_01_10: Ooh, and Miltank’s Moomoo Milk is exquisite. I mean just the best!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0603_0702_02_10: I love her so much, I would never, ever let anybody else have her!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0701_01_10: Hey, are you a small or a medium?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0701_02_10: Look like a medium to me...
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0701_03_10: Kids your age grow real fast, so you should get your clothes a little big.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0604_0702_02_10: They get big and strong right before your very eyes!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], you got a special someone?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0701_02_10: Me? I got a whole lot of special someones! I just love everyone so much!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0701_03_10: I sure hope everybody likes me all right, too.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0702_01_10: If you want somebody to like you, be they a person or Pokémon, you gotta let ’em know you like them, too.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/0605_0702_02_10: You gotta show ’em how important they are to you with your words and your actions. This is gettin’ kinda awkward.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0701_01_10: I traded some of my Moomoo Milk for this.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0701_02_10: You can have it if you want!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0702_01_10: Oh, I’m glad it made you so happy!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/1701_0702_02_10: Well, if I come across any other good stuff, I might just give it to you again!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_01_10: I always knew we’d get along great.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_02_10: You’ve got some real strong bonds with your Pokémon, don’t you.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_03_10: Why, you’re almost as close as me and Miltank!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_04_10: I’ve never met a Pokémon fan I didn’t like!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0701_05_10: After the battle ends, we’re all friends.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0702_01_10: I’ve got more friends than just Miltank, you know.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2501_0702_02_10: If you come to my hometown, I’ll introduce you to all of them!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_01_10: Do you like being alone or around others?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_02_10: I can’t even think about passin’ time all quiet by myself.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_03_10: There are so many things that are so much more fun when you’ve got someone else around.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_04_10: And when times are tough, we can support each other, right?
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0701_05_10: If you’re in trouble, I’ll be right there to help you out!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/2511_0702_01_10: I love cheerin’ people up when they’re feelin’ down.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3001_0701_01_10: Mornin’! Happy to see ya today!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3002_0701_01_10: Mornin’. Whew, I shouldn’ta stayed up all night. I sure am sleepy now!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3003_0701_01_10: Howdy! Almost nap time for me!
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3004_0701_01_10: Hi! You doin’ all right? Me? I’m fine, I s’pose.
ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.ch0026_00_akane/3005_0701_01_10: Hey! I took a long nap, and now I’m wide awake!

ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Where are you going to explore today?
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0101_0701_02_10: If there’s a meadow full of flowers, I bet that’d make Grass-type Pokémon happy!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0701_01_10: You know, I’m from the Sinnoh region. We have a myth there that this whole world was created by a Pokémon.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0701_02_10: I think it must have been a Grass-type Pokémon!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0701_03_10: ’Cause, y’know,  I can believe what I want, right?
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0702_01_10: I really enjoy pondering the world that’s mentioned in the Sinnoh region’s myths.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0702_02_10: If it really was a Grass-type Pokémon that created the world, I think that deity definitely liked rain.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0601_0702_03_10: I mean, it must have, right? I think it also really loved rich soil, full of nutrients.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0701_01_10: I wonder how they choose the plants to bring to an artificial island.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0701_02_10: I guess they gather a bunch of plants from all over and then choose which ones to plant.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0701_03_10: I want to see if any plants from the Sinnoh region were chosen!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0702_01_10: It just occurred to me that there might be plants from far away that we’ve never seen before.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0602_0702_02_10: I’m excited about the Pokémon battles, sure, but I’m also really looking forward to seeing all the different plants on Pasio!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_01_10: When it comes to Grass-type Pokémon, Roserade is really cool, but I love Turtwig, too!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_02_10: Watching its adorable little face munch down on leaves—it just made me want to hug it and never let go!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_03_10: I was wondering if I should actually do that when Turtwig came to me on its own!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0701_04_10: Ever since then, Turtwig has been  one of my very best friends!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0702_01_10: There are certain times where you meet someone for the first time but then your feelings connect as if a flower was blooming between you.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0603_0702_02_10: Don’t worry—I know you’ll have a miraculous moment like that, too, someday!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0701_01_10: My Roserade is so cute, I’d love to hug her, too, but I can’t.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0701_02_10: Her thorns have poison, so I’d be in a lot of trouble if I hugged her.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0701_03_10: Still, I love her so much, someday I might not be able to resist and give her a squeeze.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0702_01_10: They say beautiful flowers have thorns, but to have poison on top of that...
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0604_0702_02_10: I think Roserade needs to be less pretty! Not!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_01_10: The Pokémon I like all have really distinct aromas.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_02_10: But even then, their scent changes from day to day. I can even tell their mood by how they smell that day!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_03_10: It’s almost like I’m talking to them. It makes me feel like we’re really connected, even if they don’t understand the words I use.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0701_04_10: You know, I’m a little curious about your scent, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Hee hee!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0702_01_10: Any Pokémon will try to tell you what it’s feeling, even if it can’t use words. Each Pokémon has its way of communicating.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/0605_0702_02_10: I think a Trainer’s job is to understand how their Pokémon communicate!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! I was looking for you! I wanted to give you this.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/1701_0701_02_10: Just thought I’d share! Hold on to it. I’m sure it’ll come in handy!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/1701_0702_01_10: It’s the same in nature, you know? You receive, then you give—it’s all a cycle.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_01_10: So, I have a secret to tell. I didn’t come here just for the adventure.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_02_10: I came because I also wanted to overcome my fears.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_03_10: I haven’t really been able to tell my friends that I’m a bit of a coward, but...
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0701_04_10: I felt like if I told you, you’d help me out.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0702_01_10: You see, I’m really, really scared of...ghosts.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2501_0702_02_10: So, I just can’t handle Ghost-type Pokémon.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_01_10: Hey. Do you know the Pokémon Pumpkaboo and Phantump?
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_02_10: As you know, I really love Grass-type Pokémon, but...
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_03_10: These two, they’re not just Grass type. They’re also Ghost type!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0701_04_10: I want to take care of them and cuddle them too, so I can get over my fear.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0702_01_10: See, I think they’re cute. I really do.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0702_02_10: But their movements and whatnot are a bit different from normal Grass types, and they scare me a little.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/2511_0702_03_10: Still, as a Grass-type Pokémon Trainer, I can’t just stay scared! Someday I’ll be able to cuddle them!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! How’re you feeling? I’m always doing great!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3002_0701_01_10: Today is another day where we can give it our all! It helps to say it out loud, you know.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3003_0701_01_10: Hey there! Let’s keep having Pokémon battles and continue getting stronger!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3004_0701_01_10: We’re all set and ready to get going! La la la la la la la!
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! Adventuring at night is fun, too. I mean, I’m not s-scared of the dark or anything.
ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.ch0027_00_natane/3006_0701_01_10: *yawn* I’m getting drowsy! I can’t help it, though— all the plants are asleep, too!

ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0101_0701_01_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s about time! I thought you’d never come.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0101_0701_02_10: Heh heh, so... Let’s get exploring!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_01_10: What are you staring at? Don’t be so rude.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_03_10: Well, there must be more to you than meets the eye if you understand the beauty of this style!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_04_10: This is the ultimate fashion, appropriate for the ultimate Gym Leader!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0701_05_10: No, it’s not strange—and I’m not embarrassed to be wearing it, either!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0702_01_10: Heh, it’s not a bad feeling to have an admirer.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0601_0702_02_10: Very well! You may admire me to your heart’s content!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_01_10: Do you know the famous dragon Trainer, Lance? He’s actually my cousin.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_02_10: But he never acknowledges my skill, even though we’re both dragon users!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_03_10: Isn’t that just awful? What could possibly be lacking from me?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0701_04_10: I wonder—is there truly something lacking in me?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0702_01_10: Oh, no, it’s not that I don’t like him. I just feel a little disgruntled is all.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0602_0702_02_10: Don’t you dare tell anyone I said that, though!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_01_10: Kingdra is a very special being to me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_02_10: She’s strong, beautiful, and tough. Her regal form is truly fitting of her name!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_03_10: And sometimes, when things don’t go the way I’d like them to, she comforts me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_04_10: Kingdra looks positively divine, I know, but...
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0701_05_10: She also has a very beautiful heart.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0603_0702_01_10: Kingdra and I are like two hearts beating as one. That’s why we’re the greatest sync pair of all.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_01_10: It can be difficult to raise Dragon-type Pokémon.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_02_10: But if you don’t give up and take things slow and steady, they’ll always come through for you.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_03_10: Unfortunately, some Trainers do just give up in the face of the challenge.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_04_10: So one of my goals is to teach such Trainers the proper way of raising Dragon types.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0701_05_10: I don’t want there to be any more unhappy Pokémon or Trainers.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0702_01_10: If you want to become a Dragon-type user, your first step should be to find a Pokémon you really like.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0604_0702_02_10: It’s always best to raise a Pokémon you like. And then, someday, we can have a Dragon-type showdown!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_02_10: There should be lots you can learn from me, the world’s best Dragon-type master!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_03_10: If you insist, I wouldn’t mind personally training you.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_04_10: Hee hee, once the PML is over, come visit me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0701_05_10: I’ll make you my apprentice! Think of the honor!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/0605_0702_01_10: Well, that’s settled! You’ll come to me! You promised now, so no backing out!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, one moment. Uh, well... Here, you can have this. I just happened to come across it.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0701_02_10: Take it. If you don’t want it, you don’t have to keep it.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0702_01_10: Since I personally gave you a gift, you should treat it like it’s me and treasure it.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/1701_0702_02_10: Oh! But no holding back, though! Use it whenever you need it!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_02_10: You’re getting very interested in Dragon-type Pokémon, aren’t you?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_03_10: Hmph, well, I can understand being drawn to powerful beings!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_04_10: But Dragon-type Pokémon are proud creatures of legend!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_05_10: They won’t warm up to you so easily!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0701_06_10: They only lend their strength to Trainers who are truly worthy.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0702_01_10: It can be difficult to truly bond with one, but a Dragon-type Pokémon is definitely the best Pokémon to have as a partner!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2501_0702_02_10: I think you will become obsessed with them, too.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_01_10: To me, defeat is an impossibility.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_02_10: Victory is everything. That’s how I’ve always battled.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_03_10: That’s the only way I can show the strength of Kingdra and me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_04_10: That’s why we have to win, no matter who we’re facing.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0701_05_10: Yes, I’ve always felt like I didn’t want to lose for my own sake, but from now...
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0702_01_10: You’re someone who I’m willing to admit is strong, OK?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0702_02_10: So I won’t forgive you if you lose to anyone other than me.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/2511_0702_03_10: Promise me you won’t lose to anyone! Promise!
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3001_0701_01_10: Did you wake up early just so you could waste time?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3002_0701_01_10: I have some time to talk, if you don’t have anything else to do.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3003_0701_01_10: Why don’t you get moving instead of wasting time fooling around?
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3004_0701_01_10: Good weather today. I’m in a good mood, so I suppose I can spend time with you.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3005_0701_01_10: Staying up late is bad for you. Get some rest while you can.
ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.ch0028_00_ibuki/3006_0701_01_10: You’re still awake? Well, I suppose I could keep you company, if you insist.

ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you burning to battle again today?
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0101_0701_02_10: You know I’m all warmed up—touch me and you might get burned! Well, let’s head out!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_01_10: In my hometown of Lavaridge, you can walk right out the back of the Pokémon Center and into a hot spring!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_02_10: You can feel the heat of the earth in the water.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_03_10: It makes me so hot, I feel like my whole body is made of flames!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0701_04_10: I’d love to go on a nice trip to some hot springs with my Pokémon.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0702_01_10: Hot springs are good for Pokémon, too! I always bring along some Pokémon when I go for a soak.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0601_0702_02_10: My Numel feels refreshed after a soak in the springs, too!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_01_10: Sometimes you just can’t get fired up.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_02_10: And that’s when you’ve just gotta do it!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_03_10: Times like those are when it’s most important to just go for it!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0701_04_10: Weak flames will get blown out easily. You gotta go big when you light your fire!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0702_01_10: When you don’t feel like you can keep going...
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0602_0702_02_10: come see me! I’ll light your fire back up again!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0701_01_10: Some Fire-type Pokémon are so hot, it’s tough to pet them.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0701_02_10: Slugma’s body and Torkoal’s shell get amazingly hot!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0701_03_10: Be careful not to burn yourself!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0702_01_10: Pokémon like it when you show them affection.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0603_0702_02_10: Even if they’re hot, when you give them just a little pat, they’ll know how much you care.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_01_10: Torkoal and I’ve been together for a long time.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_02_10: When you’ve been around somebody since you were a kid, they feel like family, don’t they?
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_03_10: Torkoal’s always been there to cheer me up whenever I was feeling down.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0701_04_10: I want to show Torkoal how thankful I am, and that’s why I’m so fired up to be the best Trainer I can be!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0702_01_10: Torkoal’s shell is very important to her.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0702_02_10: Even when her shell gets hot, I try to polish it.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0604_0702_03_10: When I do, Torkoal gets really happy!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0701_01_10: Do you like hot springs? You should try stopping by one when you head out on an adventure!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0701_02_10: There are all kinds of different hot springs, and they can be really good for you. It’s fun to travel around to different ones, too!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0701_03_10: Some hot springs let you bring your Pokémon along, too. I bet your Pokémon would like it.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0702_01_10: Battling can be awfully tiring, so it’s important to rest up and refresh, too.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/0605_0702_02_10: You might have some way of resting that works even better than a soak in a hot spring for you.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0701_01_10: Thanks for everything! This is all yours!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0701_02_10: I might forget I have it on me and carry it right into the hot springs anyway. Then it’d be no good to anybody!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0702_01_10: You get all embarrassed when you get a present, don’t you.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/1701_0702_02_10: But I’m going to bring you another one when I find something good!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_01_10: Try not to push yourself too hard.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_02_10: I was trying too hard to be a good Gym Leader and ended up falling into a slump.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_03_10: That’s when I realized that if I just relax and do things my way, it’s more fun and I can hone my skills more easily.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0701_04_10: I have my fellow Trainers to thank for helping me to realize that.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0702_01_10: It can be tough to do things your own way, but it’s not impossible.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0702_02_10: There’s still so much I don’t know...
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2501_0702_03_10: but I’m here for you, through good times and bad! That’s what friends are for!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_01_10: My grandfather was one of the Elite Four, and I always looked up to him.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_02_10: But you know, just because you look up to somebody doesn’t mean you have to be just like them. I can never be my grandfather.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_03_10: So now I’m aiming to be the best version of myself I can possibly be!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0701_04_10: Just watch me! With you by my side, I feel like there’s no limit to how strong and how fired up I can get!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0702_01_10: I think I was able to become such good friends with you because I felt comfortable just being myself.
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/2511_0702_02_10: I hope that when I become the best version of myself, you’ll have reached that same point, too!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! A greeting will light your fire for the whole day!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! Guess what! I’m going to start my day with a cold shower!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! The sun is shining! I’m feeling really upbeat!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3004_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! How are you feeling? Me? You know I’m on fire!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! Fire shines especially bright at night. Um, but it’s also important to rest!
ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.ch0029_00_asuna/3006_0701_01_10: Good, uh...evening... N-no, I wasn’t just dozing off!

ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0101_0701_01_10: Hee hee hee, I’ve been waiting for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0101_0701_02_10: Come on! Each day of training counts! You have to give it your best today, too!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_01_10: Pokémon that use Psychic-type moves tend to be a little strange.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_02_10: Back in the Hoenn region, I met the Clay Doll Pokémon Baltoy when I was smaller.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_03_10: It didn’t move at all, so I got curious and decided to keep watching it.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_04_10: But then it suddenly let out a loud cry! It was  like that was a signal or something. A whole  bunch of Baltoy started gathering around!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_05_10: I only barely managed to run away before I got swallowed up in the swarm.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0702_01_10: My Lunatone acts strange sometimes, too. When it’s a full moon, it starts spinning around really fast!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0601_0702_02_10: I tried to get it to settle down, but it won’t stop. I wonder what that’s all about.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_01_10: Lunatone is my friend. It’s been with me for a long time!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_02_10: It’s really important to me—just like the moon itself!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_03_10: It’s so big and pretty! It’s a wonderful family member to me!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0702_01_10: Hee hee, Lunatone seems like it’s in a good mood today!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0602_0702_02_10: I don’t need telepathy to tell what it’s thinking. We’re family after all!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_01_10: There are lots of things I really like!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_02_10: I like Lunatone, of course, and I like you, too. I like so many things, I can’t count them all!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_03_10: But right now, I think I really like Pasio’s toy stores!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_04_10: Time flies when I visit, even if I’m just looking!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0702_01_10: If I spend too long looking at toys, sometimes Lunatone gets jealous.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0603_0702_02_10: Hee hee, isn’t that silly? Of course Lunatone is more important than some silly toy!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_01_10: It’s a lot of fun to jump around riding Spoink, you know?
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_02_10: Spoink tails are like springs, and they can use them to jump really high!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_03_10: But I need to be careful, ’cause sometimes they move so quickly I get thrown off!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_04_10: You need to get the...knack? Yeah, the knack of it.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0702_01_10: Jumping around with Spoink is fun, but you can only do it when you’re a kid because adults are too heavy.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0604_0702_02_10: I need to make sure I have all the fun I can!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], can you hear me out?
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_02_10: These days, I’ve started thinking about you more. Like, how you’re doing or...
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_03_10: what you’re up to... That sort of thing.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_04_10: I think that’s why our combination’s getting better, too!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0702_01_10: Never mind our combination. I just plain enjoy being around you!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/0605_0702_02_10: It’s exciting when I think about what adventure we’ll have together next!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a present for you, since you’re always working so hard!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_02_10: I think it’ll be useful to you!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_03_10: I’m your friend. Of course I can tell  what kind of thing you want!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/1701_0702_01_10: I know you’ll use it well. That gift comes from my heart, after all!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_01_10: Tate and I sometimes help out with experiments at the Mossdeep Space Center!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_02_10: They say our psychic powers are useful for the experiments they perform.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_03_10: And so we’re always happy to help out!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_05_10: they buy us toys as rewards!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0702_01_10: I’m not helping out with the experiments just for the toys, OK?
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2501_0702_02_10: That’s just a bonus! I really just want to help out the people in the Space Center!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve always teamed up with Tate till now, but...
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_02_10: I’ve learned a lot through teaming up with you, too!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_03_10: I always thought that my combination with Tate was perfect ’cause we were twins.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_04_10: But I think I realize now there were a lot of times when Tate worked to stay in sync with me.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_05_10: Just like how you try to keep in time with me!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0702_01_10: Next time, when I team up with Tate again...
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/2511_0702_02_10: I think we’ll be able to show an even more powerful combination!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Nice day, isn’t it.
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3003_0701_01_10: Hello! Nice weather puts me in such a good mood!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3004_0701_01_10: Let’s play a lot and battle a lot!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! What a beautiful moon tonight!
ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.ch0030_00_ran/3006_0701_01_10: I feel the power of the moon at this time of night.

ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0101_0701_01_10: Heh heh heh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I had a feeling you’d come, so I was waiting.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0101_0701_02_10: I’m always looking forward to seeing you!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0701_01_10: My Solrock has been full of energy ever since we came here.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0701_02_10: Can you feel it? That crackling, popping sensation?
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0701_03_10: You can tell how your Pokémon is feeling, even without any special powers!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0702_01_10: Knowing how each other feels is an amazing power!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0601_0702_02_10: You definitely need it to work  hard together at something.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_01_10: Liza and I are totally in sync! But well...
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_02_10: we got into a huge fight once, when Liza lost one of my toys.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_03_10: She kept quiet about it for so long! Even though she knew she couldn’t really hide it from me!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0701_04_10: But well, I ended up forgiving her. She apologized to me, and besides, she’s the only twin sister I’ve got!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0702_01_10: I’ve started a fight with Liza, too, actually. I ate her snack without asking her.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0602_0702_02_10: Heh! I can tell by your look, you think Liza and I aren’t too different, right?
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0701_01_10: Solrock doesn’t really change its expression.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0701_02_10: So it expresses itself using its whole body!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0701_03_10: That’s why I want to show it how I feel using body language, too—not just words.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0702_01_10: It’s difficult to show your feelings using your whole body like Solrock does...
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0603_0702_02_10: But when I’m with Solrock, it’s like we’re dancing together. It’s a lot of fun!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0701_01_10: There was a time when Liza and I swapped clothing and hairstyles.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0701_02_10: I ended up being sent to a place where there were only girls.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0701_03_10: Liza said she had fun, but I was so embarrassed.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0702_01_10: Liza says she wants to do it again, but I dunno.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/0604_0702_02_10: Hmmm. Well, if it’ll make Liza happy, maybe I’ll give it a go again. Even if it means I’ll get embarrassed again.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/1701_0701_01_10: You always keep me company, so... Here! A present for you!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/1701_0701_02_10: Heh heh heh, I tried to pick something perfect. I hope you like it!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/1701_0702_01_10: I didn’t ask anybody for advice, you know? I picked it all by myself! I was a little nervous.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0701_01_10: Liza and I help out at the Space Center sometimes.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0701_02_10: And they bought me a cool toy as a reward!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0701_03_10: It was so cool, I carried it around everywhere, and now I accidentally brought it here with me. Don’t tell Liza!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0702_01_10: They told me at the Space Center that the universe is full of mysteries.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2501_0702_02_10: I hope I can go to space someday.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0701_01_10: I’m glad I was able to battle with you.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0701_02_10: I always team up with Liza, so there are a lot of things I never realized before.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0701_03_10: I want to learn lots more and become even stronger!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0702_01_10: Liza told me she also learned a lot by teaming up with different people.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/2511_0702_02_10: Maybe I should challenge her to a battle? I want to see how strong we’ve gotten!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! You look wide awake. I was just wondering what kind of fun I could have today.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! A nice early greeting really wakes me up!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3003_0701_01_10: Hello! Nice day, isn’t it. Perfect for a Pokémon battle!
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3004_0701_01_10: Hey! I always get hungry for a snack around this time...
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! You’re here late. Don’t work too hard.
ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.ch0031_00_fuu/3006_0701_01_10: *yawn* Oh! No, I’m not tired! I’m fine!

ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0101_0701_01_10: Pleasure to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Both people and Pokémon have so many experiences in their lives.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0101_0701_02_10: Be sure to face the day with a strong spirit.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_01_10: I am often told I wake up earlier than anybody, but the truth is it’s not by my own will.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_02_10: In the Johto region, there is the Swine Pokémon known as Piloswine...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_03_10: and it always comes to wake me in the morning, by climbing onto me.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0701_04_10: It’s quite heavy, and there are times when its tusks start digging into me, too. It can be rather dangerous.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0702_01_10: If you find yourself awake early, why not go for a walk?
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0601_0702_02_10: I personally recommend a stroll along a beautiful glacier. I find it very calming.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_01_10: Both people and Pokémon go through much suffering in order to become strong.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_02_10: But that is what makes the joy of victory in a Pokémon battle so sweet.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0701_03_10: Just like how the warmth of spring is so joyous after a harsh winter.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0702_01_10: When you face true hardship, remember you have friends and allies right beside you.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0602_0702_02_10: Your bonds with them are sure to lend you strength.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_01_10: A long time ago, I placed Seel in serious danger, all because of my own inexperience.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_02_10: It was at the Seafoam Islands of the Kanto region. Seel had collapsed. It was up to me to save him, but...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_03_10: foolish as I was, I ended up losing consciousness, too.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0701_04_10: That is why I chose to learn from my mistakes and became a teacher of harshness.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0702_01_10: Make sure you don’t end up like me, child.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0603_0702_02_10: Become strong, so that you can protect your precious friends and Pokémon.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_01_10: My age is catching up with me. These days, my legs simply aren’t what they used to be.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_02_10: But as long as I have this cane—and the company of my Pokémon—I will be just fine.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_03_10: My Pokémon does more than just help me walk— he bolsters my old heart as well.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0701_04_10: I won’t be losing to young whippersnappers anytime soon.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0702_03_10: They are all my trusted allies. I know they will support me no matter what.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0604_0702_04_10: As long as I have them by my side, I know I can hold my own against any young Trainer.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_01_10: I believe that the seasons represent a person’s life, young [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_02_10: After a hot summer, a calm autumn arrives, and then the harsh winter. But once winter ends...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0701_03_10: we are greeted by the warm spring. We can withstand the harsh winter because we know spring is coming.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0702_01_10: Even when you are faced with harsh times, you must persevere, trusting that spring will come.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/0605_0702_02_10: It always does, without fail. You must support your friends as they support you—and wait for spring together.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0701_01_10: I found this on my walk this morning. Go on. You can have it.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0701_02_10: It is more fitting for you to have it than I. Keep it.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_01_10: I trust you will put it to the best use.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_02_10: The way you use items is what matters. Remember this, child...
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/1701_0702_03_10: It is sure to be useful in your life.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], how are you doing these days? You have a braver look than before.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_02_10: Adventures teach you both fun and harshness. That is why it is important to press onward—but without arrogance.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0701_03_10: Having all-out battles with other Trainers is sure to give you the desire to improve.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_01_10: I see you’ve gained a fair amount of experience. And yet you have much to learn.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_02_10: You are one of the more talented Trainers I’ve met!
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2501_0702_03_10: But that is why you must have discipline as well. Never forget winter’s harshness, young one.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_01_10: The trick to winning battles? I wasn’t expecting such a question from you.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_02_10: Knowing your opponent is important, of course, but knowing your own Pokémon is far more so.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_03_10: Understand your Pokémon’s characteristics, and turn the tide of the battle.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0701_04_10: After that, it’s experience that decides who wins and loses. Those who master the type matchups master the battle.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_01_10: You’ve grown quite strong. I think now you could survive even the harshest of winters.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_02_10: But remember, there are still many Trainers who are far stronger than you. If you slack off from battling, you will lose your skill.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/2511_0702_03_10: I hope you become strong enough to someday help teach others, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Is that really the time? I’ve been up since five.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3002_0701_01_10: It’s the beginning of a bright new day. Let’s continue to do the best we can.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3003_0701_01_10: Hello there! Sunny days like these help to soften the harshness of winter, they do.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3004_0701_01_10: How are you? Are you giving it your all?
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening. The day will soon be over. You’ve worked hard.
ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.ch0032_00_yanagi/3006_0701_01_10: And so another day passes. Be sure to treasure the time you have tomorrow as well.

ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0101_0701_01_10: Well, I’ll be! If it ain’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! So yer back, huh? Yer gutsy, kid. I like that!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0101_0701_02_10: Y’all better show me yer tough side today!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_01_10: Say, have y’ever seen a vibratin’ Palpitoad before? They’re a sight to see, I tell ya! A real treat!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_02_10: They’re pretty famous back in Driftveil City in the Unova region—where I’m from.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_03_10: That’s not why I brought a Palpitoad here with me, though.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0701_04_10: It’s really on account o’ the way they show their true grit whenever they battle!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0702_01_10: If yer interested in seein’  some o’ that Palpitoad grit in action,  you should come visit me in Unova!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0601_0702_02_10: You’ll prolly hear their cries all over the place there!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_01_10: Back in Unova, my Excadrill is a must-have business partner when it comes to minin’ work!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_02_10: At one point in my life, I reckon I had truly hit rock bottom. Lower than low.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_03_10: But with Excadrill by my side, I was slowly able to drill my way back up the tunnel.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_04_10: Inch by inch, we rose right back on up to the surface!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0701_05_10: To this day, I still dream about all the hard work we did.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0702_01_10: No matter how tough things get, it’ll be all right in the end if you’ve got yer Pokémon there beside ya!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0602_0702_02_10: So keep yer chin up, ya hear? ’Specially when the goin’ gets tough.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_01_10: Gettin’ plenty o’ rest is part o’ yer job! Spread yerself too thin, ’n’ you’ll surely burn out.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_02_10: As for me, I find that takin’ little strolls  around town here on Pasio’s been  a nice breath o’ fresh air.
