ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0701_03_10: This sure is a mighty-fine place. I could learn a thing or two here... Improve my city back home.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0702_01_10: Lookin’ out at all them city streets is one o’ the finest parts o’ my job, I tell ya!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0603_0702_02_10: When I look up at them buildings, shaped like nothin’ I ever seen before, heh, even this ol’ boss gets excited.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_01_10: Lookin’ out at the ocean reminds me o’ Driftveil City.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_02_10: I wonder how all the workers back home are holdin’ up.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0701_03_10: I’m hankerin’ to get back ’n’ see how much all of ’em have grown since I’ve been gone!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0702_01_10: Them Driftveil City workers sure have got some guts, lemme tell ya.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0604_0702_02_10: It’ll be nice to see everybody again. Maybe I’ll buy ’em all some souvenirs while I’m here!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Yer finally showin’ some true grit, ain’t ya.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_02_10: But I reckon you’ve still got some room to grow in those britches o’ yers. Aim for the sky, I always say!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0701_03_10: If y’all can face yer opponent head on ’n’ win—no cheap tricks—I reckon y’all have got some real skill!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_01_10: Mayhaps I said a li’l too much just then, for an ol’ miner like me, anyway.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_02_10: I do commend ya on yer youth and passion and grit—but that don’t mean I gotta like ya!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/0605_0702_03_10: It ain’t often somebody gets a compliment outta ol’ Clay!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0701_01_10: Hey there, kid! Fancy meetin’ ya here!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0701_02_10: I was just fixin’ to give ya this! Go on—use it how ya like!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0702_01_10: It’s just a trifle, kid. But I expect ya to return the favor someday!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/1701_0702_02_10: Hrmmph! No need to get all worked up now! That’s jus’ my way o’ sayin’ thanks.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_01_10: You wanna talk about work? If yer lookin’ for idle chat, take yer yapper elsewhere.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_02_10: You shouldn’t get too overly familiar with work people, see? That’s just business fundamentals right there.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0701_03_10: Hah, the workers back in Driftveil City are a different story, though!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_01_10: You got a sharp eye, kid. And you ain’t lackin’ much in the cool, calm, and collected department, neither!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_02_10: That critical judgment o’ yers’ll come in handy for ya someday—you’ll see. Jus’ stay sharp, kid!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2501_0702_03_10: When ya boil ’em down, Pokémon battles ’n’ doin’ business ain’t so different.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_01_10: So, ya fancy yerself a bona fide Trainer now, do ya? You’re learnin’ the ropes pretty well—I’ll give ya that!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_02_10: Just don’t go gettin’ all content and complacent yet, ya hear?
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0701_03_10: If yer expectin’ a bonus, ya better be willin’ to do whatever it takes! No givin’ up halfway, got it?
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_01_10: Work ’n’ business are all about trust. Seems yer startin’ to understand that pretty well!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_02_10: I ain’t never thought about havin’ business partners before.
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_03_10: But you’ve got some good prospects, kid. If—and that’s a BIG if...
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_04_10: If ya won’t take no for an answer, come ’n’ see me in Driftveil City!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/2511_0702_05_10: I’ll hire ya on at my company!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3001_0701_01_10: It’s still mornin’, kid. Let’s figure out how ta put this day to good use!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3002_0701_01_10: Lemme tell ya, wakin’ up early does a world o’ good. Makes the whole day longer!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3003_0701_01_10: Hope you ate a hearty lunch, kid. We still got a whole day ahead of us!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3004_0701_01_10: Don’t get me wrong. I got nothin’ against a good nap now and again. It’s all about gettin’ that shut-eye!
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3005_0701_01_10: Ah! Night. Now, let’s see who can stay awake longer...
ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.ch0033_00_yakon/3006_0701_01_10: I know nighttime’s for sleepin’, but ya know... it’s tough to lose so much time.

ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0101_0701_02_10: I think I’m gonna start a new sketch.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_05_10: Oops! Sorry, I kinda zoned out there. Sometimes I just get lost in my thoughts.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_06_10: Being able to focus and concentrate helps a lot with painting, too.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_07_10: Painting is pretty much my life. I’ve loved doing art forever.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0701_08_10: It’s one of the reasons I came to Pasio, actually. I wanted to see all of the beauty this place has to offer.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0702_01_10: Whenever I paint or sketch people, I feel like I somehow get to know them better.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0601_0702_02_10: I wanna get to know everything about you, your Pokémon, and Pasio, too!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0701_01_10: Back in Alola, we have this Pokémon called Shiinotic.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0701_02_10: The way they move their little bodies around is really unique—I make them the subject of a lot of my paintings.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0701_03_10: Although, if you stare at them long enough, you’ll start to get sleepy.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0702_01_10: Anyway, if you ever come across a Shiinotic, take good care of it! And be careful you don’t end up dozing off.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0602_0702_02_10: Shiinotic have kind of an odd look about them, but I promise they’re all really nice!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_01_10: Oops. I think I got some paint on my face. Guess that’s proof I painted something rad!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_02_10: When I get super focused on my work, sometimes the paint flies everywhere and I end up looking like a canvas myself!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_03_10: I’m not kidding! When the paint’s flying around, that’s a good thing! It’s fun getting covered in paint.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0701_04_10: I mean, sometimes I put paint on myself on purpose. Helps to get me in the mood. Kinda like a good luck charm or something.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0702_01_10: If you get paint on your face, do you look in the mirror before you wash it off? I’m always curious to see what I look like.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0603_0702_02_10: I mean, getting paint on your face can be like a piece of art on its own. You just gotta wash it off in the end.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_01_10: My Granbull has a pretty scary-looking mug, but underneath that, he’s really just a big scaredy-cat.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_02_10: Once he warms up to you, he’ll snuggle and play all day, though. Such a cutie pie!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_03_10: When Granbull was just a little Snubbull, he sometimes used to gnaw on my paintings.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0701_04_10: It took me a while to figure it out, but he actually did that when he was really happy.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0702_01_10: I guess now I know my Granbull loves my paintings! Heh heh.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0604_0702_02_10: I’ll have to keep painting more and more stuff if I want to keep him happy!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, do you think you could come and find me after the PML’s over?
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0701_02_10: It’s just, like, I think you have a really beautiful heart, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0701_03_10: It would make me really happy if I could sketch you and your Pokémon. If I could capture your hearts in a painting.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0702_01_10: I wonder what color palette would best represent that pure heart of yours.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/0605_0702_02_10: Heh heh, I guess that’s for me to know and you to find out! I’m excited to start.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/1701_0701_01_10: Pasio’s chock-full of interesting stuff! I came across this a little while ago.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/1701_0701_02_10: I wanted to give it to you as a present. Here, have at it!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/1701_0702_02_10: I’m sure it’ll help you on your journey.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0701_01_10: Alola! Well, well, aren’t you a ray of sunshine today.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0701_02_10: Oh. That just gave me an idea for a new painting. A nice, happy one.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0701_03_10: I’ll start sketching it out right now. You’re gonna love it.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0702_01_10: Life’s pretty easygoing back in Alola. Great weather, lazy days...
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0702_02_10: Everyone’s always got a smile on their face. The people, the Pokémon... It’s pretty infectious.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2501_0702_03_10: I’ve got my friends Ilima, Mallow... Oh! That reminds me, I need to go meet up with Sophocles!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_01_10: Wha—?! Wait, stop right there! You can’t come over here right now!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_02_10: I’m finishing up a super, super important piece over here! Sorry!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_03_10: Yeah, I know I’m always painting. But this one’s really special, OK?!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0701_04_10: I don’t wanna ruin the surprise! So no peeking, OK?! I mean it!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_01_10: Hmm... The last finishing touches are super important, but I’m not sure where I wanna go with it yet...
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_02_10: W-wait a sec! I thought I told you no peeking! Sheesh, all I want is to keep my painting a secret.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_03_10: I wanna make sure I do us justice— me and Granbull, you and your Pokémon, our cute, smiley faces...
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/2511_0702_04_10: Wait! That was supposed to be a secret! You didn’t hear any of that, OK?!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3001_0701_01_10: Mornin’! The breeze feels nice. Hey, let’s go find a good spot to sketch.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3002_0701_01_10: Mornin’! One thing I like about traveling is trying out the local eats.
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3003_0701_01_10: Nice light! Wanna go out and sketch?
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3004_0701_01_10: When the sun moves, so do the shadows. Gotta be careful when you’re painting!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3005_0701_01_10: I got super sucked into my drawing, and when I looked up it was already dark!
ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.ch0034_00_matsurika/3006_0701_01_10: *yawn* I’m gettin’ kinda tired. I think I’m gonna call it a night.

ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been waiting for you!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0101_0701_02_10: In for another training session with me today? Let’s see what we can make of it!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_01_10: Pasio is so unusual and exciting!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_02_10: The world is beyond anything I ever imagined, let me tell you.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0701_04_10: Compared to the size of the world, we’re both little tykes, eh, kid?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0702_01_10: There’s got to be so many Electric-type Pokémon in this world that I’ve never seen before!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0601_0702_02_10: Just thinking about it makes me very, very, very, very, very, very...
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_01_10: Between you and me, kid, I’m a huge fan of the Pokémon Pikachu.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_02_10: It’s a world-famous Pokémon, and, well, I’m in love with it, too!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_03_10: Just thinking about its adorable little face... It’s so good! ...Huh?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0701_04_10: Oh, of course I love Raichu, too! It’s really cute—but it packs a punch, too! It’s perfect!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0702_01_10: I’m looking forward to meeting lots of Trainers with their Pikachu and Raichu here on Pasio, too.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0602_0702_02_10: If you see one, report it to me—on the double!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_01_10: Want to hear a story from me? Well, I used to have a Voltorb that was actually quite a coward. Disappointing, right?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_02_10: You’d be surprised, though. Just because it was easily scared didn’t make it weak.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_03_10: My cowardly Voltorb would always notice even little dangers and hazards!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0701_04_10: In fact, that’s how I got my reputation as a super-cautious electric soldier!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_01_10: Even things that might seem like a disappointment can turn out to be really good.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_02_10: It’s all about variety—about how everyone’s different. Trust me on that.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0603_0702_03_10: One of the reasons why I train my Pokémon so hard is because I want to make sure I strengthen their good points!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_01_10: I have plenty of treasures—things I would never want to lose!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_02_10: I train hard so that I can protect my treasures!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_03_10: In fact, I became a Pokémon Trainer to better protect my treasures! It’s important to never forget your roots.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0701_04_10: I’m not afraid to set traps or install multiple locks for my room! It doesn’t matter if people call me a coward!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0702_01_10: Sometimes, you’ve got to ask yourself, what is today for?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0604_0702_02_10: It’s something you and I have to keep asking ourselves, every day!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, you ain’t bad, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’re a good kid.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_02_10: I want things to turn out well for you. Really, really well!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0701_03_10: So, a word of advice: Enjoy your time with your Pokémon! Have lots of battles—and most importantly, make lots of friends!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0702_01_10: I’ve come across lots of different treasures. The variety is shocking!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/0605_0702_02_10: If you can gather a huge number of treasures— and keep them safe—that’s proof that your strength is the real deal!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0701_01_10: My Pokémon knocked over a trash can and... Surprise!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0701_02_10: It had a little gift—perfect for you, kid!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0702_01_10: Ha ha, I’m joking about the trash can bit, kid! Did you take me seriously there?
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/1701_0702_02_10: Sorry, sorry! I’ll give you more presents now and then—give me a break!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_01_10: Your Pokémon battles are fantastic, kid! Absolutely electrifying!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_02_10: It feels good when you’re doing well and enjoying your battles.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_03_10: But it’s important to not let your guard down— especially when you’re on a roll!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0701_04_10: It’s very dangerous to lose focus during Pokémon battles!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0702_01_10: The most important thing for victory is caution!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2501_0702_02_10: Whether on the battlefield or in Pokémon battles, caution will save the day!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_01_10: Pokémon battles are something that both adults and children can get passionate about!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_02_10: No matter where I go in the world, Trainers are always battling each other!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_03_10: It’s definitely a lot of fun, but you can’t do it without love for your Pokémon!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0701_04_10: Pokémon aren’t just tools for battle, after all!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0702_01_10: I think you can show the world, kid!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/2511_0702_02_10: Show everyone that you can become happy by forming a strong bond with your Pokémon!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3001_0701_01_10: Mornin’! Good Pokémon Trainers should be up and ready at the crack o’ dawn!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3002_0701_01_10: Mornin’! I’m just going for my daily run. It’s the best way to stay fit!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3003_0701_01_10: Ten-hut! How’s your energy, kid? I’m always fully charged!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3004_0701_01_10: Hey! How’s it goin’, kid? Better not be slackin’ off!
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3005_0701_01_10: I don’t care if it gets dark. My Pokémon can light a spark anywhere, no sweat.
ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.ch0035_00_matthies/3006_0701_01_10: Evenin’! I’d love to hit the rack, but my Pokémon keep zapping me.

ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You heading out today?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0101_0701_02_10: I’ve got my new invention up and running... Maybe I’ll head out for a little bit, too.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0701_01_10: I’m not really the greatest around other people. When people stare at me, I...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0701_03_10: You may not have noticed, but I just fainted, like, three times...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0702_01_10: I’m trying really hard to get used to other people looking at me.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0601_0702_02_10: But trying your best doesn’t automatically guarantee good results... Just like experimenting with a hypothesis.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_01_10: I can use this gadget to control a bunch of my inventions.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_02_10: For example...this one. My Trainer Pinger.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_03_10: Using this machine will call Trainers over to your current location...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0701_04_10: but using it requires a massive amount of electricity.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0702_01_10: Did you know this little gadget can actually control a bunch of the machines I’ve invented?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0602_0702_02_10: I may have been the one who engineered it, but it’s the power of science that’s REALLY amazing!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0701_01_10: You know, I was pretty surprised when I found out that Togedemaru is thought to have no Evolution.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0701_02_10: Just think—she was born a little roly-poly, and she’ll always be one, no matter how much she grows.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0701_03_10: It’s kinda cool... If people were like that, we could get away with paying the kid’s price for the bus and stuff forever.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0702_01_10: Some people tell me I look like my Togedemaru.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0603_0702_02_10: We’re really good buddies, so I guess we could be rubbing off on each other.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_01_10: My Charjabug helped me a lot with my experiments back on Ula’ula Island.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_02_10: They let me use some of the electricity they have stored in their bodies.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_03_10: Also, their bodies are made up of right angles, so if my creativity’s ever blocked, I can stack them up like bricks for fun...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0701_04_10: Just kidding. I’ve gotta be nice to my Charjabug, or their friend Vikavolt will get mad and come flying...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0702_01_10: Vikavolt is Charjabug’s Evolution. It gathers up energy in its jaws, then fires it off in massive electric jolts!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0604_0702_02_10: It’s like a cannon! It can even break through the thickest shelters.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_01_10: Since coming here to Pasio, I’ve made some good headway in my various experiments.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_02_10: I mean, there’s so much interesting data! The people and Pokémon gathered here are way beyond my knowledge!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_03_10: Same goes for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. If this were my simulation, I’d have beaten you a hundred times over.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0701_04_10: Although that simulation hasn’t been very reliable lately. Even when I was back in Alola...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0702_01_10: According to my simulation, I should be Champion by now.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0702_02_10: Bathing in the spotlight, a role model for all kinds of Trainers...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/0605_0702_03_10: Oh boy... I think I just fainted for a second at the thought of that...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/1701_0701_01_10: I didn’t invent this or anything, but it should be pretty useful. Here, take it.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/1701_0702_01_10: Hopefully it’ll be super effective for you in battle!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/1701_0702_02_10: I have my own inventions to help me in battles, so I don’t need it.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0701_01_10: Wh-what are you looking at? Hold on... Have you been bitten by the inventor bug?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0701_02_10: If that’s the case, maybe we could try making something basic together?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0701_04_10: (Oh no... What if you weren’t curious about inventing and you were actually curious about ME...)
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_01_10: I did about 256 simulations while pondering what it is you’d like to invent.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_02_10: My conclusion: a machine that can use the plans and blueprints in your brain to create everything automatically.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_03_10: With a machine like that, you’d only have to THINK about an invention in order to bring it to life!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2501_0702_04_10: What?! That sounds like something I’d want for myself?! Well...when you put it like that, I guess you’re not wrong...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_01_10: What? You’re interested in how machines are constructed? Why didn’t you say so sooner?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_02_10: Well, first you have to think about what you want your machine to do. That part is key!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_03_10: Like, if you’re scared of talking to people, maybe a machine that makes it easier to do that?
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0701_04_10: Actually, that might just be something I want personally...
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_01_10: After you figure out what kind of machine you’re making, the next step is to draw up a blueprint.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_02_10: Careful, though. If you muck up the power supply or drive systems, you’ll get zapped like BZZZZT!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_03_10: But you’ll be fine as long as you keep an eye on things as you go. I wouldn’t worry about it too much.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/2511_0702_04_10: Failure’s a big part of inventing things. That’s a fact! You’ve just gotta keep adjusting things until it’s just right.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3001_0701_01_10: Morning. I-I’m still so sleepy. I stayed up way too late running experiments.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3002_0701_01_10: *yawn* My batteries are fully charged, but my motor’s not up and running yet. I might need to reboot.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3003_0701_01_10: Oh, hey! The sun is too bright for me. I prefer staying in my lab.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3004_0701_01_10: Maybe I’ll exercise this afternoon. Gotta think about my health at least a little bit.
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3005_0701_01_10: I-I’m kinda nocturnal, so it’s about time for me to start my experiments for the night!
ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.ch0036_00_mamane/3006_0701_01_10: I conserve energy at night by using the electricity my Electric-type Pokémon have stored up.

ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, so yeh’ve come back today, too, eh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s make today another beautiful verdant day!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0701_01_10: What I got here with me are my trusty gardening shears. They slice through even the thickest of branches with ease.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0701_02_10: I’ve been usin’ these for over 30 years, and the only things I trust more are my Pokémon.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_01_10: One time, I was using them at night and I was mistaken for a Pinsir, the Stag Beetle Pokémon.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_02_10: My neighbors thought these were a Pinsir’s pincers and went into a bit of a tizzy.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_03_10: Thank goodness nobody threw a Poké Ball at me.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0601_0702_04_10: Those things hurt if they hit yeh in the noggin.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0701_01_10: Reading is fertilizer for yer mind.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0701_02_10: Just like plants need water and nutrients, people need excitement and surprise.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0701_03_10: That’ll bud yer heart and cover it in beautiful flowers.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0702_01_10: As people age, their hearts are more accepting. Very much like the grass that accepts everything.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0702_02_10: And it’s this acceptance that makes our land nice and green.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0602_0702_03_10: So that you don’t go skinnin’ yer knee after a little fall.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0701_01_10: My Weepinbell has acid that can melt anything down to goop.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0701_02_10: His razor-sharp leaves will slice anything in half.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0701_03_10: I think I would have been able to be of help had they called me to make the PML stadium.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0702_01_10: I’m sure Weepinbell would be a huge help at  construction sites, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0603_0702_02_10: He’s a big softy, but he’s as strong as any Machamp or Conkeldurr!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0701_01_10: A lot of the local sprouts come to play at the Coumarine City Gym.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0701_02_10: They use the ropes and nets the challengers climb as a playground.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0701_03_10: This one time, though, a tyke’s Totodile chewed through the ropes and made the gym impossible to beat.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0702_01_10: The Coumarine City Gym is made to be an obstacle course.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0604_0702_02_10: I myself exercise at my Gym by hangin’ on the ropes, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0701_01_10: Say, [Name:PlayerNickname ], why are yeh in the PML?
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0701_02_10: Me? Well, I’m in it for a nice hot cup of tea after a well-fought Pokémon battle.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0701_03_10: Reminiscing on the battle makes that one cup of tea exceptional.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0702_01_10: I don’t know why yeh fight.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/0605_0702_02_10: But I know that these matches are something that both yeh and yer Pokémon need.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0701_01_10: I was takin’ care of my trees when I found this.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0701_02_10: I’m sure yeh can find some use for it.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0702_01_10: The forest ain’t just chock-full of good Mother Nature’s bounty. It’s full of things people dropped, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/1701_0702_02_10: If I find anything else, I’ll let yeh in on it, too, sprout.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_01_10: There are four things to remember when yer raisin’ plants, child...
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_02_10: sunlight, water, temperature, and ventilation. Can’t give too much, can’t give too little.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_03_10: Overeatin’s bad for people, too, right? The same can be said for plants and Pokémon.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0701_04_10: Just the right amount. That’s the secret to a long life.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_01_10: Takin’ a walk is very much like life. If yeh think about it that way, makes yeh reconsider how yeh walk, don’t it?
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_02_10: Light don’t always last. Parts of that path are covered in shadows, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_03_10: Same can be said for life. There’ll be good that happens to yeh, and there’ll be bad.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2501_0702_04_10: What’s important is how yeh pick yerself up. Yeh have to be resilient like a weed.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_01_10: There are lots of types of plants. People and Pokémon have their individual traits, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_02_10: Now, yeh ain’t gonna get along with everyone. But just remember that yeh shouldn’t ever deny ’em, either.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_03_10: But if yeh accept ’em, they might change, too. Just like a rose can lose its thorns.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0701_04_10: Let yer heart be like the swaying willow. That’s the secret technique to an easy life.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_01_10: Interactin’ with Grass-type Pokémon is the same as raisin’ plants.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_02_10: Don’t think of being slow as a disadvantage. Instead, use yer Attack and Defense to yer advantage.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_03_10: Yeh give water to strong saplin’s, and yeh reinforce the weak ones.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/2511_0702_04_10: I learned how to raise my Pokémon from raisin’ plants. I’m sure there’ll be something the plants can teach yeh, too.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3001_0701_01_10: Good mornin’ to yeh. How yeh feelin’ today? Make sure yer always lookin’ after yer health!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3002_0701_01_10: Us old folk tend to get up early. It’s the healthy thing to do.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3003_0701_01_10: Good day! Whether yer a person or a plant Pokémon, getting sunlight is vital for yer health!
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3004_0701_01_10: There are a lot of Trainers out around this hour. Go talk to ’em, battle ’em, and gain experience.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! Yer workin’ hard. Even the grass and trees are asleep at this hour.
ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.ch0037_00_fukuji/3006_0701_01_10: A lot of people and Pokémon become more active at night. But don’t stay up too late, yeh hear?

ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I had a feeling you’d show up, so I thought I’d  wait for you.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0101_0701_02_10: Man, I’ve been waiting so long now, I’m practically a fossil! Kidding, kidding...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_01_10: Both my dad and I are Gym Leaders, you know.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_02_10: I’ve always loved Pokémon that are tough and strong like boulders...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_03_10: but my dad favors solid, heavy, steel-like Pokémon.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_04_10: You probably think they’re really similar, but trust me—I’m an expert on these things. They’re totally different.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0701_05_10: And I mean TOTALLY different. I mean, a lot of rocks appear the same, but in reality, no two are exactly alike.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0702_01_10: How do you tell them apart, you ask? Well, how about you figure that out yourself? That’s really the fastest route.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0601_0702_02_10: Whether or not we share the same love for rocks and stones, it would make me really happy if you showed some interest.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_01_10: Back at home I work at the Oreburgh Mine.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_02_10: I work hard to hone my drilling skills at the mine so that someday I can achieve my dream:
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_03_10: to build a massive tunnel system that connects the whole world!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0701_04_10: How about you? Are you chasing a dream? Forging your own path and working as hard as you can to make it happen?
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0702_01_10: I hope maybe someday I can use my tunnels to connect Pasio to the rest of the world!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0602_0702_02_10: I’ll have to dig pretty deep to create an underwater tunnel... But I’m up for the challenge!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_01_10: The island of Pasio was built on top of a rocky ocean layer. I wonder what sort of hidden treasures lie beneath the surface.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_02_10: If I could get permission somehow, I’d love to do some excavating here!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0701_04_10: It’s settled, then! Time to come up with a plan for our official Pasio excavation tour!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0702_01_10: I wonder who we need to get permission from. Well, time waits for no one! We’ve got lots of planning to do!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0603_0702_02_10: Wait... I’ve already got a ton of other locations I’d like to excavate, too! I think I need to sort out my priorities first.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_01_10: My dad has a friend named Riley.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_02_10: He’s a bit of a mystery, but he’s a real solid Pokémon Trainer.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0701_03_10: I wonder if he’s here on Pasio as well... It would be awesome to meet up with him.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0702_01_10: You’ll know Riley when you see him! He wears a fancy blue suit and a nice blue hat...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0604_0702_02_10: so he tends to stand out in a crowd no matter where he is!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_02_10: The Pasio lifestyle sure has piqued my interest so far!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_03_10: There’s still so much I don’t know!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_04_10: Like what’s buried just below the surface of the ground where we’re standing right now. Stuff like that!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0701_05_10: It would really rock my world if there were rare fossils beneath here...
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/0605_0702_01_10: But either way, there are plenty of ways to have fun here besides just Pokémon battles!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0701_01_10: I dug up something interesting today! What do you think? Awesome, right?
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0701_02_10: I thought I’d give it to you if you want it!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0702_01_10: If I dig up anything else, I’ll bring it over.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/1701_0702_02_10: You’d be amazed by some of the things that get unearthed when you’re excavating!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_01_10: I respect my dad a lot, and I’ve always looked up to him, but it’s not just because he’s my dad.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_02_10: He’s a Gym Leader just like me, but he’s way, way stronger than I am.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_03_10: Coming from his son, I guess that might be a little hard to believe. But trust me, it’s the truth.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0701_04_10: My dad’s...infinitely stronger than I am!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_01_10: I don’t think my dad’s always been this strong.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_02_10: Over the years, he trained and trained and trained to become as powerful as he is now.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_03_10: That’s why I need to keep on digging! I’ll dig and dig and dig so that someday I’ll be that strong, too!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2501_0702_04_10: One day I’ll be as strong—no, STRONGER than my dad!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_01_10: Sometimes when I’m working down in the coal mines, I get so caught up in digging that I lose track of the time.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_02_10: The other day, my Pokémon came  down the mine to give me some water  while I was focused on my work.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0701_03_10: Despite my tunnel vision, I always remember to stay hydrated, but the kind gesture did make me happy.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_01_10: It’s nice that my Pokémon worries about me, but while I’m on the job, all the other workers really depend on me.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_02_10: I’m the leader down in the Oreburgh Mine, after all!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/2511_0702_03_10: If you ever need a hand, you can count on me.  I’ll show you what a huge help I can be!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3001_0701_01_10: Whoa, it’s already morning? It’s so bright up here compared to the mines.
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3002_0701_01_10: *yawn* Sorry, I just got back. I was out digging a tunnel!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3004_0701_01_10: Hey there! You know it’s not good to stay cooped up inside all the time. Everybody needs a little sunshine!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3005_0701_01_10: Hi there! It may be dark outside, but I’m still full of energy! I’m used to being in the dark!
ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.ch0038_00_hyouta/3006_0701_01_10: Wow, it’s already dark out? Time for me to go dig some tunnels!

ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0101_0701_01_10: Here again today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? That’s fantastic! Just fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s make today a great day and fill up a whole photo album!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_01_10: My older sister, Alexa, gave me my camera.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_02_10: Alexa’s a journalist for a big publishing house!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_03_10: My dream is to use this camera to take all kinds of pictures of different Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_04_10: Of course I’m taking pictures on Pasio, too.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0701_05_10: I feel like Pasio’s got a lot of passion!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_01_10: By the way, I’m a Gym Leader. At the Santalune City Gym, you can see my Pokémon pictures on display.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_02_10: I’m trying to get the word out about it here on Pasio, too. I hope people will come to see it.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0601_0702_03_10: It’s really charming, so it’s pretty popular!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_01_10: Surskit is a Pokémon that walks on top of the water with Swift Swim!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_02_10: I don’t even know how many times I’ve captured her grace with my camera!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0701_03_10: Her charms are unending, no matter how many pictures I take. I just love it!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0702_01_10: If you ever meet a wild Surskit, be sure to watch it closely!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0602_0702_02_10: Its tiny legs support its whole body on the water. How can you not love it?
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_01_10: I take pictures of things other than Pokémon, too!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_02_10: Pokémon Trainers, of course. But also the scenery in towns and natural settings!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_03_10: When I’m shooting Pokémon, of course Bug-type Pokémon are my favorites! They’re just so cute!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0701_04_10: The Evolution of Bug-type Pokémon is a lot faster and more mysterious than other Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0702_01_10: I’ll never get tired of taking pictures of Pokémon, no matter how many I take.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0603_0702_02_10: Focusing on something I love and clicking the shutter is the best feeling in the world!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_01_10: There’s a Pokémon from the Kalos region called Vivillon. It’s a fantastic Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_02_10: Even though they’re the same species, many Vivillon have different wing patterns!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_03_10: That’s why there are lots of people around the world who collect different Vivillon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0701_04_10: I’m one of those people! Even here on Pasio,  I plan to look for people with rare Vivillon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0702_01_10: I want to make an album with photos of every kind of Vivillon someday!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0604_0702_02_10: You’ll help me with that, right? I’m really looking forward to it!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_01_10: I think it’s really great that I came to Pasio!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_02_10: I’ve met a lot of Pokémon, and I met you, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0701_03_10: To me, you’re a fantastic photo subject!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0702_01_10: But not just as a model, of course. I really enjoy Pokémon battles together with you, too!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/0605_0702_02_10: Let’s keep on doing our best, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0701_01_10: I found this while I was wandering around town with my camera!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0701_02_10: Here’s a present to celebrate your strength!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0702_01_10: There are things you can only see  through a viewfinder!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/1701_0702_02_10: If I find anything again, I’ll be sure to give it to you!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_01_10: Oh! Look at that Pokémon’s nimble walk!  What a photo op!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_02_10: Wha—?! It ran off. I must’ve gotten too close.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_03_10: The trick to taking Pokémon pictures is to not alert them to your presence.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0701_04_10: Making sure you don’t startle or alert the Pokémon—that’s gotta be the first step, right?
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_01_10: Take your lens and focus it...focus it... Then snap that shot!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_02_10: Practice helps you get better at taking pictures.  It’s the same for catching Pokémon, right?
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_03_10: You need to aim your throw with the Poké Ball. Then throw it at the exact right time!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2501_0702_04_10: Timing is important to both. Poké Balls and film are limited, after all.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_01_10: Ah, wait! I should take a picture here!  You’ve got a great smile going on!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_02_10: Hm? Why am I so into taking photos? Hmm. I guess it’s because of my older sister.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_03_10: Alexa, writer for the Lumiose Press! That’s my supercool older sister.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0701_04_10: My older sister knows I love pictures, so she gave me this wonderful camera!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_01_10: Why do I take pictures of smiling faces? That should be obvious!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_02_10: Because they’re just fabulous! That’s how I feel about smiling faces!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_03_10: Taking pictures and having pictures taken makes people happier and happier. It’s the best!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/2511_0702_04_10: Taking joyful pictures is the whole reason I’m a photographer!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Let’s make sure today’s fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3002_0701_01_10: I bet I’ll find a lot of photo ops today, too!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! No matter what time of day it is, I always feel fantastic!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3004_0701_01_10: During the day, everything gets so active! Even Pokémon!
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! Nighttime photography can be tricky, but you can snag some fantastic photos.
ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.ch0039_00_viola/3006_0701_01_10: You worked hard today! Get some good rest so we can take another shot tomorrow!

ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0101_0701_01_10: Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Running into you is always a joy.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0101_0701_02_10: Continue to train hard, my friend. Seize the heart of justice!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_01_10: There’s a Pokémon called Beartic that’s native to my hometown in Unova. It’s got sharp, icy claws and fangs...
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_02_10: which can appear quite intimidating to most people! But my Beartic is truly stout of heart, I must say.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_03_10: I myself have gone on many a trek through the snowiest mountains with my Beartic to train.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_04_10: His warm, furry mass has kept me from freezing to death out there on countless occasions.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0701_05_10: Facing the harshest forces of nature together with one’s Pokémon... It’s all part of one’s training, in the end.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0702_01_10: Pokémon help out their Trainers, and Trainers help out their Pokémon.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0601_0702_02_10: Our mutual support is what gives us  this incredible sync strength.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_01_10: Did you know that Cryogonal’s body is made up of frozen ice crystals?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_02_10: If you touch one by accident, be prepared to feel a freezing -150 °F chill!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_03_10: Then again, Cryogonal and I have undergone intensive training to improve our sync strength, so I’ve felt its freezing touch many times.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0701_04_10: The fiery passion of our friendship urges us to grow ever stronger!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0602_0702_02_10: Oh, not to worry! I’m sure I’m only sneezing because I, uh... Because I always have my shoulder exposed! Mm-hmm!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_01_10: Are you interested in films, child?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_02_10: Pokéstar Studios back in Unova is the heart of the movie industry, you know! Our films are incredibly popular.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_03_10: I’ve acted in lead roles in many of them, of course.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0701_04_10: The brilliance of those films and all the performers involved deserves to be shared! Watch them—feel the creators’ passion!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0702_01_10: Did you know Pokéstar Studios utilizes Pokémon talent in addition to us actors? They add a whole new level to the narrative.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0603_0702_02_10: If any of this has piqued your interest, I strongly recommend picking up a film or two. I promise you won’t regret it.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_01_10: I was once known as “the quiet one” or “the strong, silent type,” but I have come a long way since then.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_02_10: I found that...I wanted people to know how I was feeling. I didn’t want to be misunderstood, so I began to speak up.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0701_03_10: There are some things in life one simply must put into words. You cannot expect others to read your mind!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0702_01_10: Traveling to Pasio and meeting you will prove to be one of my life’s greatest treasures.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0604_0702_02_10: It may sound grandiose, but it’s true. In my heart, I consider every friend I’ve ever met a priceless treasure.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_01_10: For reasons I shan’t discuss now, I once retired from my career as an actor.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_02_10: But, after some time had passed, the Champion of the Unova region, Alder, showed me a new path in life.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_03_10: No matter how hard things get...even when it feels as if the entire world is against you, you will always have a path.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0701_04_10: If you’re ever feeling lost, remember those words, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0702_01_10: In teaching others, we learn a great deal about ourselves.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/0605_0702_02_10: Teaching and supporting you has taught me a great deal indeed.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0701_01_10: Here—a small token of our collaboration.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0702_01_10: It feels good to give to others.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/1701_0702_02_10: Seeing the other person’s face light up with joy alone is enough to make it feel worthwhile.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_01_10: Would you say I resemble Brycen-Man at all? Don’t we look alike?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_02_10: I’m referring to the star of the popular film  Brycen-Man from Unova, of course.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_03_10: What?! You’ve never heard of the unstoppable Brycen-Man?! Now that just simply won’t do!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_04_10: Hmm... ... ... I’ve got it! Let’s produce a new Brycen-Man film here on Pasio!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0701_05_10: You’ll act in the film as well, of course. I insist!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_01_10: Yes, child? You’re anxious to start filming, you say?
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_02_10: Mwahaha! What a coincidence! Me too!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2501_0702_03_10: After the PML is over, I’m sure our schedules will be packed with filming!
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_01_10: Whenever I watch you battle, I’m reminded of just how splendid it is to witness someone grow.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_02_10: The sight of both Trainer and Pokémon, working together in earnest to improve their skills...
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_03_10: The pair of you will achieve great things in the near future. I can see it plainly within you.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_04_10: The journey ahead of you will by no means be an easy one.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0701_05_10: But remember that you have people like me, rooting for your victory.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0702_01_10: Strength doesn’t only come from within. It comes from the people who believe in you as well.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/2511_0702_02_10: Remember to treasure your friends, your Pokémon, and especially yourself.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning to you! I see you’re starting your training bright and early.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3002_0701_01_10: A morning jog is a must for building battle stamina.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3003_0701_01_10: Good day. How goes it? I would be pleased to join you in training, if you wish.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3004_0701_01_10: Have you had lunch yet? You need to eat properly to get the most from your training.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening. If you are tired, you should rest. No need to put on an act.
ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.ch0040_00_hachiku/3006_0701_01_10: I’m impressed to see you out so late. Try not to lose too much sleep, all right?

ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0101_0701_01_10: Whoa! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re here, just as I predicted!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0101_0701_02_10: I’m so ecstatic you came, I’m crackling with energy! Come on—time to start the day!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_01_10: Electivire is a fierce, robust Pokémon that can harness the power of electricity!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_02_10: If you touch Electivire while it’s charged up with crackling electricity...
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0701_03_10: you can actually lose consciousness for several moments. So make sure you don’t EVER do that, OK?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0702_01_10: Electivire are incredibly rare to find in the wild, you know.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0601_0702_02_10: If you ever manage to team up with one, you can be sure it will be a dependable partner.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_01_10: Grrr... Still at 47 percent? Slower than I expected.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_02_10: Whoa! I was so focused, I didn’t even see you there!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_03_10: I was trying to perform an update on my data-interpreting machine, see...
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0701_04_10: But it’s taking forever! The update’s already been going for a hundred hours or so!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_01_10: This is just the mobile version of my data-interpreting machine, but it’s got amazing functionality!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_02_10: I’ll tell you all about what this baby can do next time.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0602_0702_03_10: If we open that can of worms now, it’ll be midnight before I can explain all of its awesome features.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_01_10: Bronzong can call down the rain, so people in ancient times used to think they were deities.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_02_10: In fact, some people still worship them as rain bringers today, if you can believe that.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_03_10: I don’t really buy into that, though. The only results I believe in are the ones I can prove numerically.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0701_04_10: Besides, if it suddenly started raining indoors, all of my machines would break.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0702_01_10: Did you know that many Pokémon feel naturally energized by the rain?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0603_0702_02_10: For that reason, a lot of Pokémon feel thankful toward Bronzong, too.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_01_10: You look like you’re itching to know more about me!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_02_10: In other words, you’d like to interpret my data. Is that correct? If so, feel free!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_03_10: Let’s see. Um... Male, teenager... No, that’s not the sort of data you want, is it?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_04_10: If you want to learn more about me, you’ll need to collect some data. Spending time with me is the best way to do that.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0701_05_10: It just so happens that I’m interested in collecting some data on you as well. Nice timing!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0702_01_10: There are plenty of things out there that you can’t understand with just a calculator.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0604_0702_02_10: The more you learn about the world, the more you’ll find things about it that interest you.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_01_10: Do you think my hairstyle is weird?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_02_10: I’m really specific about how I do it, but it doesn’t take long at all.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_03_10: That could be because I use my invention the Auto-Hairstyle-O-Matic to analyze my hair type.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0701_04_10: Want to try it out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? My invention can turn any hairstyle into one that’s just like mine.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/0605_0702_01_10: My Auto-Hairstyle-O-Matic doesn’t work on bald people.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0701_01_10: My invention the Detect-O-Matic picked this up out in the forest.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0701_02_10: I did a round of analysis on it, and it seemed right up your alley!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0702_01_10: Collecting data and performing analyses are important for all things in life.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/1701_0702_02_10: They are the key to obtaining greater knowledge and experience.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_01_10: Whoa! Hey, you! You came at just the right time!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_02_10: I’ve been wanting to do some analysis on you. Give me your data!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0701_03_10: Don’t worry—I don’t need you to do anything super specific. I just need to look at you through my machine!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_01_10: Bzweeeeep! Oh, don’t let the beeping concern you. I’m just interpreting some of your data.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_02_10: You and your Pokémon continue to exceed my calculations. What’s the secret to your strength?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2501_0702_03_10: Hmm... I’ve just gotta know! I’m going to solve this mystery through my analysis. I promise!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_01_10: If you collect lots of data and analyze your Pokémon battles, you can utilize that data moving forward!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_02_10: It’s true! It’s part of my job description as Factory Head!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_03_10: Pokémon get disappointed when they lose battles, too. That’s why you’ve got to formulate new strategies!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0701_04_10: So that you can learn from your mistakes! And so next time, you can win! And things will go exactly as planned!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_01_10: I always get tons of great data when I battle against you.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_02_10: It’ll all be put to good use when I go back to the Battle Factory!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_03_10: Although I might as well collect as much data as I can while I’m here...
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_04_10: The more knowledge I can amass, the more helpful I can be to you in a battle.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/2511_0702_05_10: AND I can keep getting stronger in the meantime! Perfect logic, just as I calculated!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! According to my analysis, we’re in for a fine day!
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3002_0701_01_10: I always make excellent progress when I study Pokémon in the morning.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3003_0701_01_10: Greetings. My calculations tell me that the current air  temperature and humidity are optimal for battle.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3004_0701_01_10: Creating a plan and then executing it is the most efficient way to spend the day.
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening. How much do you know about nocturnal Pokémon?
ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.ch0041_00_nejiki/3006_0701_01_10: Each night, I like to review my accomplishments of the day and evaluate my efficiency.

ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0101_0701_01_10: Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I thought I saw you come in.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0101_0701_02_10: I can see the glow of adventure in your eyes. Let it carry you like the wind beneath your wings!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_01_10: Once, when I was a small child flying through the sky with my bird Pokémon, I tried to ride atop the clouds...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_02_10: I gazed up at them as they floated by... perfectly fluffy and beautiful in the sky. I wanted to take the clouds on a journey...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_03_10: And do you know what? I did that very thing! I rode the clouds...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0701_04_10: For you see, what I thought were clouds were really a flock of Altaria! You can imagine my surprise when I tried to ride them!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0702_01_10: Drifting leisurely through the great blue sky, the song of the Altaria echoing on the wind...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0601_0702_02_10: It felt like something out of a dream.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_01_10: In my home of Fortree City, the trees grow tall and the people live high up in tree houses.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_02_10: We grow anxious when we’re too close to the ground, you see. I used to constantly stand on my tiptoes...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0701_03_10: but as you might guess, it led to a great deal of leg cramping...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0702_01_10: One must always soar gracefully, even if it means getting a leg cramp or two!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0602_0702_02_10: Such is the life of we who fly across the skies with bird Pokémon!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_01_10: Pelipper are excellent at scooping things up in their large beaks and carrying them great distances.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_02_10: We often depend on their services as messenger birds for this reason.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0701_03_10: When I was younger, my Pelipper was kind enough to help me take on a part-time job making deliveries.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0702_01_10: Pelipper and I were never in it for the money.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0603_0702_02_10: We delivered packages so that we could learn everything we could about the Fortree City Pokémon Gym.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_01_10: My beloved bird Pokémon soar freely across the sky, claiming the wind as their own with their great feathered wings.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_02_10: It’s as if their graceful forms are a manifestation of our desire to reach for those skies.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0701_03_10: When I’m soaring through the wind with my Pokémon, I feel like I’m one with nature.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0702_01_10: Bird Pokémon can teach us how to be one with nature.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0604_0702_02_10: When I look at you and your Pokémon, I can tell you know that, too.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_01_10: You have a sparkling air about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_02_10: Your elegant gait seems to carry a mysterious breeze throughout the room with you.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0701_03_10: It’s as if Mother Nature herself is sending the wind your way.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0702_01_10: I have a feeling that if I stick with you, I’ll be able to soar all the more gracefully...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/0605_0702_02_10: The sky is far too wide for one person alone... I’m sorry. Please ignore my ramblings...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0701_01_10: This item was carried to me on the wind. Here, I hope you use it well.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0701_02_10: May Mother Nature’s great breath bring you fortune in battle.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0702_01_10: Why do you think the winds of fortune blow the way they do?
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/1701_0702_02_10: A good wind does not falter on its path and leaves the air pleasantly fresh as it sweeps by.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_01_10: I thought long and hard about how to be one with my bird Pokémon.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_02_10: I even tried behaving like a bird for a while—I would perch up in the trees from dawn till dusk, singing my songs.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0701_03_10: A few of the passersby seemed to be quite worried about me at the time, though I have no idea why...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_01_10: Learning to hear the whispers of the wind was quite difficult as well...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_02_10: There are no translators or textbooks to learn from.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2501_0702_03_10: I feel like I’ve begun to understand it now, but one-way conversations have proven to be difficult...
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_01_10: Would you like to try conversing with the wind? It always puts me at ease.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_02_10: A gentle breeze means it’s happy. A sudden gust means it’s angry or upset.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_03_10: A powerful storm means...well, maybe you shouldn’t go any closer in that case. Just a few windy tips for you!
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0701_04_10: Although, now that I think about it, the wind doesn’t behave all that differently from us people.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_01_10: A pleasant breeze can make me feel positive and motivated, and when I’m feeling that way, good things tend to happen.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_02_10: Good fortune is carried on the wind, or so they say.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/2511_0702_03_10: I hope the wind brings good fortune to you.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. Do you ever think about how wonderful it would be if you could soar gracefully through the sky?
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3002_0701_01_10: The best time to gauge the wind is in the morning.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3003_0701_01_10: The key to having a good afternoon is finding a high place and feeling the wind on your face.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3004_0701_01_10: Hello. I think it’s important to get some rest from time to time.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3005_0701_01_10: Don’t stay out too late—the night wind can give you a nasty chill.
ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.ch0042_00_nagi/3006_0701_01_10: I just love to feel the gentle breeze after the sun goes down.

ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Riding a wave today, too?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0101_0701_02_10: Anything can be training! So what should we do today?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_01_10: Makuhita’s power is amazing! He trains all the time without me having to say anything!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_02_10: Although, long ago, we had an argument...
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_03_10: Hahaha! I suddenly got sent flying.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0701_04_10: His body may be small, but it’s packed full of power and he’s got a lot of guts.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0702_01_10: With a tenacious Pokémon like that around, I soon formed a rivalry.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0601_0702_02_10: It’d be great if you can find a partner like that, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_01_10: I love to go surfing! I’ve trained my body so I can enjoy riding the rough waves!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_02_10: Planking is good for paddling! Push-ups are good for improving your takeoff!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_03_10: Squats and marathon running are effective, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0701_04_10: Even if you can’t ride the waves, don’t give up. Training your body requires heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0702_01_10: When I say heart, I don’t mean the organ.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0602_0702_02_10: I mean that passion in your heart. That feeling of being honest with yourself.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_01_10: I’m from Dewford Town. It’s a small island.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_02_10: The island’s pretty small, so we’re all like family there. We’re all bound by some incredibly strong bonds.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0701_03_10: We all help each other out. We can stand against even the strongest of waves. ’Cause we’ve got teamwork!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_01_10: When there’s a problem in Dewford Town, people from all over the island come to help!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_02_10: Whether Dewford Town’s strength lives on  depends on you!  Ride that wave as best you can!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0603_0702_03_10: If you ride that wave... the rest will work itself out somehow!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_01_10: Hitmontop is a Pokémon with a really unique kind of fighting pose!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_02_10: I use the feeling of the balance of that excellent pose as reference for surfing.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0701_03_10: I can tell just by looking at you, you’d be captivated by its pose, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0702_01_10: There’s a lot of things you can learn from studying Pokémon!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0604_0702_02_10: Who we are today is thanks to Pokémon!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We meet again! Call me when you can’t ride those sweet waves!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_02_10: A long time ago, I used to relax with my training partners a lot!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0701_03_10: The best break from working out is more of it! And a Pokémon battle is the best thing for that!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0702_01_10: A long time ago, I used to train together with one that had a love for Rage Candy Bars and a fiery passion!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/0605_0702_02_10: I’m waiting for the day when we can communicate with our hearts!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, it’s you! I found something pretty good!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/1701_0701_02_10: I found this under a rock I was pushing for training!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/1701_0702_01_10: It’s something great, right?  Don’t be shy. Use it however you want!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_01_10: Look! Look at these biceps! These pecs! These traps!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_02_10: Muscles are obedient! If you train them, they will answer you!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0701_03_10: Put love into it, just like with raising Pokémon! That’s the secret to muscle training!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_01_10: Waves will take anything you throw at them! Muscles are the same!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_02_10: We say “mother ocean,” so are our muscles  like a mother, too?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_03_10: Nah, wait. We’re the ones raising them, so we’re the mothers? Or maybe fathers?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2501_0702_04_10: Hm? That’s not the point?  Hah, I say weird stuff sometimes!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_01_10: The trick to getting better at surfing... is to have a stout heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_02_10: Pokémon battles are the same! Even if your real ability isn’t enough, don’t lose in your heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_03_10: Don’t just train your body—train your heart! That’s what it means to be truly strong!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0701_04_10: As long as you remember that, you can ride any wave, no matter how rough!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_01_10: I love high waves and the salty breeze from the bottom of my heart!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_02_10: When the sun’s summer rays are beating down, I put my training to the test!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_03_10: And when I finally ride that wave, I’m filled with an overflowing sense of accomplishment!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/2511_0702_04_10: I want to share that feeling! Don’t you want to try out surfing?
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! You’ll wake up in no time when you start moving your body!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3002_0701_01_10: Hey! Wanna join me for a jog? The morning breeze is cool and refreshing!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3003_0701_01_10: Chilling on the beach in the afternoon, waiting for good waves... That can be fun, too!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3004_0701_01_10: Weather’s nice and the sea is calm. It’s a perfect afternoon for some training!
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3005_0701_01_10: It’s so nice listening to the sea at night and hearing the tide roll in.
ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.ch0043_00_toki/3006_0701_01_10: It’s nice to cool off a bit at night. Make sure you’re ready to hit the surf tomorrow!

ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting for you to come!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s learn about Pokémon together again.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_01_10: I’m looking up all sorts of things about Trainers and Gyms from different regions.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_02_10: If I want to win the PML, I have to learn  as much as I can from old documents.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0701_03_10: Humans are creatures of learning, after all!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0702_01_10: There are all sorts of things in history—both big and small.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0601_0702_02_10: Even small things are important. For example, our meeting will go down in history.
