ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_01_10: There are Geodude all over the world, but many of them are in the Kanto region.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_02_10: Those Geodude evolve into Graveler and then into Golem after that.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_03_10: I always wanted to be a Trainer of a Golem.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0701_04_10: In fact, one of my goals as a young child  was to train a Golem.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0702_01_10: Even a small Pokémon can grow big and strong.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0602_0702_02_10: Being able to see that moment is another perk that comes with being a Trainer!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_01_10: Boulders, fossils, and minerals—aren’t they all wonderful?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_02_10: Just looking at them gets me excited!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_03_10: These were here before I was born...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0701_04_10: and they will be here for a long time after. They’re unbudging, absolute objects.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_01_10: Even a rock can be as beautiful as a jewel or the stars in the night sky.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_02_10: But you have something that shines just as brightly...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0603_0702_03_10: Your passion. That hot, burning passion is something that every Trainer should have.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_02_10: Her firm stance, her well-featured face...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_03_10: She is absolutely beautiful, like an avatar of beauty itself.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0701_04_10: She is not flashy, but her rugged look is what makes her so beautiful.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0702_01_10: I want Nosepass to make her mark on a shiny stage one day, too.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0604_0702_02_10: Because Nosepass is still a gem in the rough!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_01_10: You can see a Trainer’s preference even in something as simple as a battle.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_02_10: I like battles when I can predict the outcome.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_03_10: But what I like even more are...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_04_10: battles with you for which no amount of studying could ever prepare me for!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0701_05_10: Those battles get so hot that we could melt boulders!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0702_01_10: I have so many things I can learn from battles with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/0605_0702_02_10: I just hope that you have something that you can learn from them, too.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0701_01_10: I got you a present as a reward for all of your hard work!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0701_02_10: Think well of how to use it. It can become anything from exactly what you need to completely worthless, depending on you.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0702_01_10: Even if you study up on it, you won’t know how to use it properly until you actually use it.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/1701_0702_02_10: In whatever you do, there’s informational knowledge and practical knowledge that you have to consider.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_01_10: Do you like to study? I absolutely love it!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_02_10: The more I learn, the more I feel that I am polishing myself...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0701_03_10: very much like a rock being polished into a gem, and I love that feeling.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_01_10: I don’t need a break! I love to learn.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_02_10: But I do want to learn more about Pasio.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_03_10: Rumors say that there are buildings with fossils in the walls...
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2501_0702_04_10: Uh, no! It’s nothing. Forget I said anything!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_01_10: Would you like to study with me? The romantic secrets of the rocks?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_02_10: For example, the fossils buried in the walls... Even living creatures become rocks!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_03_10: Learning is wanting to know more. That is what is important.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0701_04_10: Let’s study the mysteries of Rock-type Pokémon together!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_01_10: To be able to talk with me this much... Are you, by chance, a rock maniac like me?
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_02_10: How splendid! Please be my rock pal!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_03_10: I have to introduce you to Steven, too! He’s also my rock pal!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2511_0702_04_10: Please come by the Rustboro Gym sometime  and battle me!  We’ll use our best Rock-type Pokémon!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3001_0701_01_10: Hello! Using the morning to plan your day is always a good idea.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3002_0701_01_10: Waking up early always makes me feel like something good will happen. Like...maybe finding a rare stone!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3003_0701_01_10: Afternoon! I prefer to get my chores done early in the day. It helps keep things efficient!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3004_0701_01_10: I always get a bit sleepy in the afternoon. If I’m not careful, I... *yawn* I might not be able to stop yawning.
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3005_0701_01_10: Hello! I suppose it’s time to rest for the night. I hope you had a productive day!
ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.ch0044_00_tsutsuji/3006_0701_01_10: If you push yourself too hard in the evening, it’ll affect how you feel the next day. Make sure to set aside some time to rest.

ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0101_0701_01_10: Hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so glad you’re here! I’ve been waiting for you.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0101_0701_02_10: I wanted to show you the results of all the new research I’ve been doing!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_01_10: A lot of people think Bug-type Pokémon, like Weedle and Kakuna, are creepy.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_02_10: They don’t understand how awesome and cute Bug-type Pokémon really are!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0701_03_10: When they evolve, sometimes they look completely different than they did before! It never gets old!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0702_01_10: They can go from a superhardened chrysalis to sprouting big, beautiful wings!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0601_0702_02_10: Don’t you find that super mysterious?! Oh boy, I’d love to expand my circle of Bug-type Pokémon enthusiasts!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_01_10: When I go to the library, I can never reach the books on the upper shelves, no matter how far I stretch.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_02_10: I wish I could use String Shot! I could grab a book from up high and pull it right into my hand!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_03_10: You know what would be even cooler? If I had beautiful wings to fly with, like my Bug-type Pokémon...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0701_04_10: I wish I could evolve, like Metapod or Kakuna.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0602_0702_01_10: Maybe, when I grow up, I’ll completely change my shape, too—just like a chrysalis!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_01_10: When I grow up, I wanna be just like the world-famous Pokémon professor, Professor Oak!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_02_10: I wanna be super knowledgeable about ALL Pokémon, not just Bug-type Pokémon!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_03_10: Oh boy! If I could do research alongside Professor Oak someday, that would be a dream come true.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0701_04_10: That’s why I’ve gotta study, study, study so I can make that happen one day!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0702_01_10: I’ll be rooting for your dreams to come true, too! Let’s work hard together!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0603_0702_02_10: It’s better to have a goal in sight than to run around recklessly. At least, that’s what I think.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_01_10: When I was back in Johto, one of the Pokémon I focused my research on the most was Scyther.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_02_10: They zip around reeeally fast, so it was extremely hard to catch one.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0701_03_10: Then again, the challenge made me that much happier when I did manage to finally catch one!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0702_01_10: Most people tend to focus on its razor-sharp scythes...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0604_0702_02_10: but the way Scyther’s beautiful green color blends into the grass and trees is also pretty amazing, if you ask me.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_01_10: Do you think there’s a Legendary Pokémon out there that’s a Bug type?
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_02_10: If you ever hear any rumors about one, promise you’ll tell me!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_03_10: I’d search high and low all over the world if it meant I could meet a Legendary Bug-type Pokémon.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0701_04_10: A-and if I did, I’d be the most excited bug catcher in the whole wide world!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0702_01_10: If you’re searching for a Pokémon, you should never give up! One will appear eventually—if you keep at it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/0605_0702_02_10: That’s pretty much the story of my life!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0701_01_10: I found something neat when I was out catching some bugs. Here, you can have it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0701_02_10: Don’t worry about it! It’s just a little token of thanks for all the things you do for me.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0702_01_10: Sometimes I catch more than just Bug-type Pokémon in my net...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/1701_0702_02_10: like handy items and stuff! I’ll be sure to share what I find with you!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_01_10: If someone were to ask me why I love Bug-type Pokémon so much...I...I’m not sure how I’d answer that.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_02_10: They’re beautiful, they’re cool, they’re tough! And, and...
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0701_03_10: and there are so many amazing things about them that I don’t think I could list them all if I tried!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_01_10: Sometimes, it’s hard to explain why you love something.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_02_10: That’s why I want to show everyone, not just tell them, how awesome my Beedrill is! I want them all to see it!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2501_0702_03_10: When you see Beedrill’s giant stingers and sharp, powerful attacks, it’ll be love at first sight!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_01_10: Whenever we have a conversation, I feel like I just babble nonstop about Bug-type Pokémon and nothing else.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_02_10: Are you good at listening? You’re so easy to talk to.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0701_03_10: I hope we can keep talking to each other like this—as friends! That would make me really happy!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0702_01_10: I really like you and I really like Bug-type Pokémon, so I always want to tell you all about them!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/2511_0702_02_10: If you have anything that you really like, you can tell me all about it, too!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3001_0701_01_10: Up and at ’em! Those Bug-type Pokémon aren’t gonna research themselves!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning. It’s so early. How do you have so much energy? I’m still sleepy.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3003_0701_01_10: Hey! Do you want to take a little nap before heading out?
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3004_0701_01_10: Good afternoon! The weather is so nice. We should go do some nature observation!
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3005_0701_01_10: Gee, look at the time! Sometimes I get so caught up in my research, I don’t realize how late it’s getting.
ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.ch0045_00_tsukushi/3006_0701_01_10: Wow, you’re out late tonight! Maybe I should put in a few extra hours of research myself!

ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0101_0701_01_10: There you are! I was waiting for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0101_0701_02_10: We can’t get this party started without you! I’m counting on you today, too!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0701_01_10: Pinsir is my bro. We’ve communicated—him with his pincers and me with my fists—so many times we understand each other perfectly!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0701_02_10: Clashing with body and spirit will allow anybody to understand each other.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0701_03_10: Even if we can’t talk to each other, Pokémon are humanity’s best friend!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0702_01_10: If you want to be friends, you gotta butt heads a few times!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0601_0702_02_10: So if you got something on your mind, don’t hold nothin’ back. Come at me!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_01_10: I’m the Frontier Brain that tests your knowledge.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_02_10: I know it’s hard to imagine  with me lookin’ like this.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_03_10: But knowledge ain’t just somethin’ you get by studyin’.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0701_04_10: In order to experience everything, you need to have a honed mind and body to handle it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0702_01_10: Everything is connected. Nothing you do is ever a waste!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0602_0702_02_10: You gotta know what you’re good at. That is what’s gonna lead you to winning.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_01_10: Looks like there are a lot of areas that we still don’t know about on Pasio.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_02_10: I gotta study up if I want to keep my title of Frontier Brain!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_03_10: If you find any area information, let me know. I wanna go with you.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0701_04_10: I can’t stand not knowing something!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0702_01_10: And there are still plenty of things I don’t know out there.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0603_0702_02_10: That’s just frustratin’, ain’t it? That’s why I want to know more!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_01_10: Back at the Battle Frontier where I’m from, you fight each other with Pokémon that you rent.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_02_10: So you and your opponent are on an even playing field! If you can’t think outside the box, your opponent will read you like a book!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_03_10: No matter what hand you’re dealt, you gotta bring all your Pokémon knowledge to battle!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0701_04_10: You’re tested on how well you can utilize rented Pokémon!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0702_01_10: Even if you’re usin’ Pokémon that you’re not accustomed to, as long as you know about ’em, you can be strong!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0604_0702_02_10: If you can know your partner Pokémon’s moves, characteristics, and how it fights, that alone gives you a connection to it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_01_10: These guys on Pasio sure are fun! They battle in ways I’ve never seen before!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_02_10: There are so many things I would never have been able to experience had I stayed in Hoenn.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_03_10: I gotta take this opportunity to study up!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0701_05_10: If you ever need help, you can count on me!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0702_01_10: I’ll never be cheap with knowledge! Watch and learn as much as you can!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/0605_0702_02_10: I promise you won’t regret it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/1701_0702_01_10: You probably need this more than me. Use it well!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0701_01_10: Whoa whoa, what’s wrong? You’re gonna go win a Pokémon battle, ain’t ya?
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0701_02_10: If you ever need my advice, you just gotta ask!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0701_03_10: With our knowledge and experience combined, there’s nothin’ we can’t handle!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0702_01_10: If you ever get stuck, don’t just stop!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0702_02_10: Try everything, and build up your experience! Then use that knowledge to get results!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2501_0702_03_10: All I can do is help. You need to find your own resolve to get those results!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0701_01_10: I see that all your efforts, big and small, are definitely making you stronger.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0701_02_10: Once we’re done with Pasio, come by the Battle Frontier!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0701_03_10: With your skill, you’ll make it far. I know it!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0702_01_10: Most don’t make it through the Battle Frontier with force alone.
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0702_02_10: But you? You might even be able to win the entire thing!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/2511_0702_03_10: If you’re gonna challenge us, though, you’d better be ready to go wild!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Time to start the day off with a spark!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3002_0701_01_10: You’re looking a little sleepy there. C’mon! I’ll wake you up!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3003_0701_01_10: Hey hey! You look like you’re doing good. Keep it up, and keep it going!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3004_0701_01_10: Hey! C’mon! Let’s get out there and do something!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3005_0701_01_10: Just ’cause it’s late doesn’t mean I’m out of energy. C’mon! Try to keep up!
ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.ch0046_00_datsura/3006_0701_01_10: You look like you’re still ready for more. C’mon! Let’s keep at it!

ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0101_0701_01_10: I had a feeling that you would be coming here, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0101_0701_02_10: Well then, let’s start today’s training!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0701_01_10: After some training, my skill was recognized by the Pokémon League and I joined the Elite Four.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0701_02_10: I can only keep getting better! The possibilities are limitless!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0701_03_10: If you have the desire to progress, that will be your drive to acquire more strength.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0702_01_10: To me, becoming a member of the Elite Four is important but it isn’t my goal.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0601_0702_02_10: What I’m aiming for is even higher. I want to be the pinnacle of all Pokémon Trainers!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0701_01_10: Sometimes, we Elite Four have Pokémon battles among ourselves.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0701_02_10: We all know each other’s tactics, so it always comes down to the skin of our teeth.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0701_03_10: The key to my winning all of my battles... I want to find it here on Pasio!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0702_01_10: There are people all over the world that my Pokémon can’t beat yet...
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0602_0702_02_10: That’s what gets me fired up. I want to beat all of them!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_01_10: Xatu is a very mysterious Pokémon.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_02_10: One time, I thought she disappeared...
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_03_10: But then three days later, I found her in the same spot as if nothing had happened.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_04_10: Now this is just hypothetical, but she might  have transcended time and space!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0701_05_10: Even if that’s not the case, it’s possible that Xatu have amazing powers we don’t know of yet.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0702_01_10: Xatu’s eyes are seeing both the past and the future.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0603_0702_02_10: I wonder how she sees the present.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_00_10: As a member of the Indigo Elite Four, I need reliable Pokémon to take on all my challengers. One of mine is Jynx.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_01_10: Before I became an Elite Four member, I went to the Ice Path in the Johto region.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_02_10: I slipped and was about to be stranded, but then I heard somebody’s voice...
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_03_10: That was when I met Jynx!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0701_04_10: I instantly liked her humanlike voice and strange dance, and so I decided to train one.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0702_01_10: I feel as if Jynx’s dance has a mysterious power to it.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0604_0702_02_10: I can count on her even when I battle as an Elite Four member.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_01_10: If you want to become even stronger, I’ll teach you an easy training method.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_02_10: Just concentrate really hard on the tree in front of us.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_03_10: You can train your concentration like that, and if you can train your concentration like that, you will be able to concentrate in battle better, too!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0701_04_10: Your strength of mind—your strength of will—becomes your advantage in battle.  Try it out sometime!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0702_01_10: There are more ways to train, but I’m going to keep those a secret.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/0605_0702_02_10: If I tell you how I train, you’ll figure out the secrets to my strength!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/1701_0701_01_10: Xatu brought me an item, but you can have it!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/1701_0702_01_10: Xatu brings back items that have a mysterious power to them!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/1701_0702_02_10: At least I think they do. But I want you to be able to feel that, too.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_01_10: After all of my travels and training, there was something I came to feel.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_02_10: That is the strength of Psychic-type Pokémon! The mysterious powers they hold is very strong!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_03_10: But willpower is not the only appeal of Psychic- type Pokémon. They also have strength of mind!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0701_04_10: I can count on them in any battle. That is what I was attracted to.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0702_01_10: I train to better myself and to not disappoint my Pokémon.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0702_02_10: My Pokémon always give me a splendid performance!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2501_0702_03_10: The reason I can keep fighting as a member of the Elite Four is my Pokémon try hard, too. That’s why I have to work just as hard as them.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0701_01_10: You’re growing strong so quickly. I have to watch my back!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0701_02_10: I’d like to have a race with you to see which of us reaches the pinnacle of all Trainers first!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0701_03_10: I’m grateful for the chance to not only meet you but to be on a team with you as well!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0702_01_10: I’ll keep you in mind when I train with my Pokémon in the future.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0702_02_10: Because I want to beat you specifically! Losing is not an option, after all!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/2511_0702_03_10: So if you could keep our future battle in mind as well, that would be great!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3001_0701_01_10: Hello there. Would you care to do some early morning training with me?
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3002_0701_01_10: They say the early Pidgey catches the Weedle. Like myself, you seem to have taken that lesson to heart.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3003_0701_01_10: Hi there. Would you be interested in seeing some of my psychic powers in action?
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3004_0701_01_10: My Pokémon loves to stare up at the sun. She’ll do it all day if she can!
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3005_0701_01_10: It could be my imagination, but I feel like my psychic powers intensify at night.
ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.ch0047_00_itsuki/3006_0701_01_10: My Pokémon never stops gazing at the world— even at night.

ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0101_0701_01_10: I’ve got a good feeling about today. Luck seems to be in my favor whenever you’re around, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0101_0701_02_10: I’m getting antsy just thinking about all the battles that await us today.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_01_10: One of my comrades back home is a Pokémon called Bisharp, a species native to the Unova region.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_02_10: Bisharp’s body is protected by steel armor, and it has a fondness for slicing into whatever it sees.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_03_10: It glides through the battlefield regally, like shuffling a deck of cards.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_04_10: The way it seems to own the battle with its charm has made it one of my favorite Pokémon to battle with.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0601_0702_01_10: I hope someday you, too, will discover a Pokémon that draws your gaze with its beauty and charm in battle.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0601_0702_02_10: When you do, I have a feeling you’ll develop a new thirst for victory within you as well.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_01_10: I’m fond of a great many Pokémon...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_02_10: but it’s Liepard’s strength that I’d risk it all on.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_03_10: The way she pounces with devastating blows faster than her opponents can predict them...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_04_10: Sure, there’s always some manner of luck involved—but that just adds to the flavor.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0602_0702_01_10: When you find a Pokémon that you adore, go out on a limb for it—take risks.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0602_0702_02_10: When you crave victory for your Pokémon, that desire feeds into your Pokémon’s strength.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_01_10: It’s plain to see that every Trainer here on Pasio has a thirst for battle—myself among them.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_02_10: I, too, wish to revel in the joy of Pokémon battling.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_03_10: I wonder... Who do you think will rise to the top and claim victory here on Pasio?
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_04_10: I suppose that’s a foolish question—the natural response of any Trainer would be themselves, of course.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0702_01_10: If I had to wager a guess at who lady luck favors most, besides myself...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0702_02_10: well, I suppose I’d wager on you—hypothetically, of course. You have potential. I see great things in your future.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0603_0702_03_10: Why not cast your lot with me, and we can claim victory together?
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_01_10: In a Pokémon battle, we seek victory— never defeat.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_02_10: For us, battling with our Pokémon is a way to satisfy our desire to win—to get what we want.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_03_10: I don’t let myself get distracted by losses or grow bigheaded when victorious—I simply seek to win my next battle.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_04_10: That is my pure and honest desire, and I have no need to hesitate.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0702_01_10: It’s not wrong to thirst for battle.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0702_02_10: A pure, true desire to win has the power to change one’s fate, despite the inevitable losses one must sometimes face.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0604_0702_03_10: When the time comes for you to face adversity, I wonder how the cards will fall.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_02_10: I love Pokémon more than anything else in the world, as all Trainers do...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_03_10: but let me get one thing off my chest.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_04_10: Battles can be used to settle a lot of different things.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_05_10: However, battling others just to profess that your love is better than theirs... That’s just deplorable.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0605_0702_01_10: Telling someone that their feelings are wrong—or getting in the way of someone else’s love—is not a nice thing to do.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/0605_0702_02_10: When it comes to loving your Pokémon, everyone can be a champion.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, looks like I caught you at just the right time. I have something for you.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/1701_0701_02_10: Here, don’t be shy. May it serve you well.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/1701_0702_01_10: If you want more, you’ll have to fend for yourself.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_01_10: The Pokémon you choose, the moves they use, and the Trainers you team up with...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_02_10: are all impeccable choices, the way I see it. You know how it feels to thirst for victory and triumph.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_03_10: From my perspective, it looks like you still have some room to grow when it comes to following through on the battlefield...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_04_10: but if that’s just your playfulness that I’m seeing, then perhaps I’m wrong.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0702_01_10: After all, having a thirst for victory is not a bad thing in and of itself...
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0702_02_10: but if you can afford to have some fun along the way, it should be encouraged.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2501_0702_03_10: A bit of adventurousness can be the ace up your sleeve, you know. I can appreciate that in a battle opponent.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_01_10: Highly competitive Trainers don’t tend to flock together.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_02_10: You see, the strongest Trainers know they’ll eventually have to face one another, and that doesn’t lend itself to chummy teamwork.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_03_10: That being said, teaming up with you and claiming victory together versus individually... That has its own brilliant shine.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_04_10: I want to experience more of that shine.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_01_10: Being a Pokémon Trainer isn’t something you can do alone.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_02_10: You always have your Pokémon fighting there beside you. You can’t have a real battle otherwise.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_03_10: In order to win, you have to be able to trust your Pokémon and your Pokémon has to have faith in you.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_04_10: The Trainers who possess the strongest trust are the ones who will win—particularly here on Pasio with this many Trainers competing.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. Something tells me luck’s on our side today.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/3002_0701_01_10: I’m not really a morning person... I tend to stay up late battling most nights.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/3003_0701_01_10: Eating a proper meal should be your first step to prepare for battle.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/3004_0701_01_10: I study new moves during the day—and then battle with them at night. That’s my style.
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/3005_0701_01_10: Dark nights are for daredevils like me. Are you a daredevil, too?
ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.ch0048_00_gima/3006_0701_01_10: Some people say nights are calm and relaxing, but for a thrill-seeker like me, they get the blood pumping.

ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0101_0701_01_10: Ahahaha! I’ve been waiting for you! Glad you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s deepen our bonds even more today!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0701_02_10: I was just talking about you with her.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0701_03_10: Oh, she went home... I guess she thought to give us some space.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0702_01_10: I talked to a lot of people on Mt. Pyre, so I got used to all of them coming and going.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0601_0702_02_10: I’m guessing she was just shy, so don’t worry about it!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_01_10: Admittedly, I have a bit of a “Grandma’s girl” streak.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_03_10: Whenever I’m feeling down, she tells me a joke to make me laugh.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0701_04_10: So when I was a member of the Elite Four and the Pokémon League, I couldn’t see my grandma. That made me sad.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0702_01_10: Grandma tells me that the most important thing is the bond between you and your Pokémon.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0602_0702_02_10: That’s why my Pokémon and I cherish our bonds!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_01_10: There’s a Pokémon called Sableye in the Hoenn region!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_02_10: It has jewels for eyes, which sparkle, and it’s really cute!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0701_03_10: It’s a bit of a prankster, so it might be a handful, but be nice if you ever see one.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0702_01_10: A lot of people might not notice them, but there are Pokémon in a lot more places than you would expect!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0603_0702_03_10: Wait a minute... There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio...
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve been with Dusclops for a long time now.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_02_10: Grandma brought her home when I was little and feeling down.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0701_03_10: She’s been my best friend, and she’s stayed at my side ever since!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0604_0702_01_10: To have a friend at your side when  you’re going through hard times is  the most precious thing in the world.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_02_10: Wouldn’t you say our bonds have gotten really strong?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_03_10: I hope I can introduce you to my grandma soon.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0701_04_10: I’m sure she would be really happy to meet you!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0702_01_10: My grandma’s Pokémon sometimes come to check in on me!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/0605_0702_02_10: They usually stay near the foot of Mt. Pyre.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0701_01_10: Perfect timing! I have a present for you!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0701_02_10: A nearby Pokémon told me that it was there.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/1701_0702_01_10: It was right here until a little while ago. I guess it’s shy.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_01_10: You want to know what kind of training I did on Mt. Pyre?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_02_10: I battled and befriended Ghost-type Pokémon to understand them better.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_03_10: I took Grandma’s advice to become friends with them more...
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0701_04_10: And then, by the time I realized it, I had become stronger, too! Isn’t the power of bonds amazing?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_01_10: Ghost-type Pokémon and I have an unspoken understanding.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_02_10: Because they stay by my side when I’m happy, sad, in good times, and in bad!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2501_0702_03_10: That’s why I hope I can stay with them forever!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_01_10: How many other Trainers or Pokémon did you deepen bonds with since you came to Pasio?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_02_10: I was hoping that I would be able to become stronger here.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0701_04_10: So that’s why I’m really happy that I can talk to you like this! Ahahaha!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_01_10: Talking is great, isn’t it? It lets you communicate your feelings to others!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_02_10: Even if you don’t speak the same language, even if you can’t see each other...
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/2511_0702_03_10: As long as you want to share something and are willing to listen, you can be friends with anyone!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Are your ears burning? I was just talking about you!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3002_0701_01_10: Haha! It’s so nice and quiet this morning, isn’t it?
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3003_0701_01_10: The afternoon sunshine tells me our friendship is gonna grow even stronger today!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3004_0701_01_10: Already afternoon, huh? Wish I could have tea with my grandma.
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3005_0701_01_10: Haha! What great timing! There’s been a lot of buzz about you lately!
ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.ch0049_00_fuyo/3006_0701_01_10: It’s always so lively and fun here at night! But I cherish our quiet conversations, too.

ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0101_0701_01_10: Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Maylene here, reporting for duty!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s fuel up with some healthy food and get right to training today!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0701_01_10: Whenever we do yoga training, my Meditite helps me out like an instructor!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0701_02_10: Although now that I think about it, I really just copy whatever she does...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0701_03_10: Meditite’s a pretty tough instructor, though! She’s always on hard mode, even when she knows I’m trying to copy her.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0702_01_10: Pokémon have their own personality quirks, just like we do.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0601_0702_02_10: Treasuring those unique personality quirks is our job as Trainers!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_01_10: You can tell a lot about a person by the way they fight using martial arts.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_02_10: You can figure out what they’re fighting for, why they learned the moves they did...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_03_10: and whether they aim to protect or hurt.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_04_10: The same is true for Pokémon battles. I can just sense it...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0701_05_10: I know what my opponents are fighting for.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0702_01_10: I practice martial arts and train for Pokémon battles to better myself.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0603_0702_02_10: I know it’s kind of selfish. I wish everyone would push themselves to achieve something great.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve done a lot of rigorous training, so the cold and the heat don’t bother me at all.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_02_10: I mean, the training itself can sometimes be pretty grueling...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_03_10: but in the end, I can make it through all of that because my Pokémon are there beside me.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0701_04_10: If I complained all the time, I’d feel bad for my Pokémon.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0702_01_10: Sometimes my training regimen is so tough that I just want to give up.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0702_02_10: When that happens, my Pokémon and I take a break and play to our hearts’ content.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0604_0702_03_10: Letting go and having fun for a while recharges my energy for next time!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_01_10: I really want to fight against you in a martial arts match, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_02_10: Not an actual fight! You know what I mean, right? A standard match with a set of rules.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_03_10: I’ve been trying to figure out why I want to fight you so badly, and I think it’s because I want to get to know you better.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0701_04_10: I’m pretty sure that’s gotta be the reason.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0702_01_10: I’m not really all that great with words, but what I’m trying to say is...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/0605_0702_02_10: I always get this warm, happy feeling when we battle each other, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0701_01_10: I got you something! It’s yours if you want it.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0701_02_10: You should use items if you have them! They’re no good if you hoard them forever.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0702_01_10: Sometimes I feel bad if I have to use my items...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/1701_0702_02_10: and because of that, they just end up in a big pile... It’s bad—I know.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve thought a lot about what makes a good Gym Leader and how I can be better in the future.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0701_02_10: I’ve never been able to find a good answer, though... I still don’t really have a clue.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0701_03_10: But I feel like the longer I’m with you, the closer I’ll be to finding that answer.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0702_01_10: When I look at you, the way you always give 110 percent of your effort to everything, especially Pokémon battling...
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0702_02_10: you make me want to get up and take action rather than worry and overthink things.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2501_0702_03_10: I still don’t really know what makes a good Gym Leader, but you know what? I’m just gonna do the best I can!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0701_01_10: One of my best friends is actually a Gym Leader, too, like me!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0701_02_10: She gives me a lot of advice, and we have a lot of Pokémon battles.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0701_03_10: Oh! Of course you’re my friend, too, silly! I care a lot about you both!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_01_10: I’m really glad I decided to team up with my Pokémon. We’ve really put our hearts into training.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_02_10: Without Pokémon battling, we never would have met you or any of the other amazing people we’ve gotten to know.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_03_10: If I’d stuck with martial arts alone or only focused on Pokémon battling, none of this would have been possible.
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/2511_0702_04_10: All of my memories and experiences up until now have become my greatest treasure!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! I like to start my day off with some jogging!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning. Gee, I’m so hungry, I could eat a whole Berry tree!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3003_0701_01_10: Yo! I recommend weight training for an afternoon workout!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3004_0701_01_10: Maybe I’ll splurge and have some snacks today! Nah. I gotta stick to my training regimen!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3005_0701_01_10: I discovered that if I do stretching at night, I end up sleeping better!
ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.ch0050_00_sumomo/3006_0701_01_10: If I’m hungry before I go to sleep at night, I dream about food. You can pig out all you want in a dream, after all!

ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0101_0701_01_10: Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You got here at the perfect time!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0101_0701_02_10: I hope you have surprises and inspiration in your adventures today.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_01_10: You like my necklace? I think it’s pretty, too!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_02_10: Believe it or not, I run a jewelry shop  on the side—while also being a kahuna.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0701_03_10: And sometimes, keeping the raw and rough edges makes the jewels look fancier!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0702_01_10: If you ever find yourself interested in jewelry, come to my shop!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0601_0702_02_10: The wares might be pricy, but my selection is top-of-the-line!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_01_10: Are you eating properly? Pokémon battles drain Trainers as well as Pokémon.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_02_10: I eat well so I can battle well anyplace and anytime.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0701_03_10: Maybe that’s why I like a person who appreciates good food!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_01_10: I would totally recommend the Z-sets you can get in Alola!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_02_10: They really pile food onto your plate, and they use tasty family recipes. They’re my favorite!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0602_0702_03_10: Though I hear that some people are just after the Heart Scales that come along with the dish!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_01_10: Golem from the Alola region look different  than ones from other regions.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_02_10: They throw electrified rocks. Isn’t that pretty neat?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_03_10: And those electrified rocks shine like jewels and are really pretty.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0701_04_10: Beautiful and strong! That’s what I really like about that move.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0702_01_10: There are a lot of Pokémon that you can only see in the Alola region.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0603_0702_02_10: If you find any Trainers from Alola, maybe you can ask them to show you their Pokémon.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_01_10: My trusty partner is the rough ’n’ tough Lycanroc!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_02_10: He’s flexible and kindhearted. In a way, he’s the opposite of me.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_03_10: But that’s why I’m drawn to him. I think it’s the same for him, too.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0701_04_10: That being said, all my Pokémon are adorable!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0702_01_10: I like soft and cute things.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0604_0702_02_10: I even collect Stufful and other Pokémon plush.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_01_10: I might be the kahuna, but really, I’m just your average girl, you know?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_02_10: So you can be more relaxed around me, OK?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_03_10: Wouldn’t it make it easier for both of us if we just acted natural around each other?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0701_04_10: At the least, it would make me happier if we could be like that.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0702_01_10: Being laid-back is the best for both people and Pokémon. Always being proper is so tiring.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/0605_0702_02_10: If you’re ever in a jam, talk to each other, and  when things are calm, laugh with each other.  That kind of relationship is the best!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/1701_0701_02_10: You’ve been working really hard, so here’s a present from yours truly.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t worry about it! I’m munificent like that!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_01_10: Thanks to the fact that I’m both a kahuna and a member of the Elite Four...
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_02_10: I get to meet all sorts of Trainers, but it’s never on this kind of scale.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_03_10: Thanks to the PML, I’m having so much fun interacting with Trainers from all over the world.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0701_04_10: You don’t get this kind of experience very often, so make sure you enjoy yourself while you can!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0702_01_10: With there being so many people from all over the world...
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2501_0702_02_10: maybe I can find somebody special myself.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0701_01_10: You really do keep growing stronger, don’t you! It’s really satisfying to watch!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0701_02_10: At this rate, you might even be able to reach the apex of all Trainers.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_01_10: Your team members trust you  because of your strength.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_02_10: Even I’m drawn to your strength and your personality.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/2511_0702_03_10: I want you to show me more of your Pokémon battles in the future, too!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3001_0701_01_10: Alola! Today looks like it’s going to be a lovely day, doesn’t it.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3002_0701_01_10: *yawn* I think I slept in a little too late today... It’s tough being a grown-up.
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3003_0701_01_10: Alola! Have you felt the breeze outside today? It’s just lovely!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3004_0701_01_10: I’ve got some kahuna errands I need to run today, but I kinda want to relax and have fun with you instead!
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3005_0701_01_10: Alola! Aren’t you a little young to be out and about this late?
ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.ch0051_00_litchi/3006_0701_01_10: The stars are beautiful tonight, and the air is so clear here.

ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0101_0701_01_10: ’Sup, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been waitin’ for ya, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0101_0701_02_10: I’m always down for a swim or a Pokémon battle, dude. Either one’ll do!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_01_10: Yo, you know how much I love the ocean, right? Can you believe I actually almost drowned once?
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_02_10: It’s true! Just when I thought I wasn’t gonna make it, I got rescued by one o’ the Caring Pokémon, Alomomola.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_03_10: I was barely conscious, but thanks to Alomomola’s rad healing abilities, I made it back to safety.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0701_04_10: I’ll never forget how the membrane on its back felt while it carried me to shore— soft and slippery but kinda warm, too.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0702_01_10: I wonder how that Alomomola’s doing these days...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0601_0702_02_10: The ocean’s full o’ friendly fishes! I love ’em all, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_01_10: My Carracosta’s shell is suuuper hard, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_02_10: A while back, he accidentally bumped me in the face...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_03_10: Man, I was NOT expectin’ it to hurt like that! It felt like concrete!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0701_04_10: If I hadn’t been wearin’ my goggles, things coulda gone reeeal bad!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0602_0702_01_10: Be careful out there, all right? Don’t be reckless, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_01_10: I’m a true man of the sea! When I’m not workin’ at my Pokémon Gym, I’m usually out swimmin’ somewhere!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_02_10: Some people tell me that bein’ a man of the sea isn’t a real job, though...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_03_10: I mean, I know that... Duh. But I love the sea more than I love food, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0701_04_10: I dunno how else to say it...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0702_01_10: I just keep doin’ what I love to do, yo!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0603_0702_02_10: That’s my motto! Do what ya love!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_01_10: Man, I love the ocean! The beautiful, big, open blue!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_02_10: And it’s got sooo much life, too!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_03_10: The ocean’s seriously epic, dude! I can’t get enough of it!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0701_04_10: If I could be that epic someday, that’d be pretty gnarly.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0702_01_10: When things get tough, I just stare out at the waves and they wash all my worries away.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0604_0702_02_10: Life is meant to be epic, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_01_10: The beaches in Unova are rad, but the ones here on Pasio are pretty epic, too!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_02_10: I’ve got this righteous dream, dude— to swim in every ocean in the world! Wicked, right?!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_03_10: I’m plannin’ to swim every inch o’ these beaches while I’m here!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0701_04_10: You should come swim with me when you feel up to it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0702_01_10: If you wanna get a real feel for what the ocean’s like, swimmin’ is where it’s at.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/0605_0702_02_10: You can even race against Pokémon, dude! It’s totally awesome!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0701_01_10: Whoa! There you are! I’ve got somethin’ for ya!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0702_01_10: Use it whenever you feel like it!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/1701_0702_02_10: You don’t gotta be a hoarder, either. There’s more where that came from, dude!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_01_10: Dude, the sea is seriously huge! Yeah, you probably already knew that...
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_02_10: But listen! It looks gigantic on the surface, right? But there’s so much underneath that you can’t even see!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_03_10: I mean, all kinds o’ rivers feed into the ocean, and the ocean just takes ’em all in, no questions asked!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0701_04_10: That’s how I wanna be! Openhearted and accepting of others, just like the ocean.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_01_10: When I’m swimmin’ in the big, open ocean, I stop carin’ about all the stuff that worries me on land.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_02_10: I know what I wanna do and who I wanna be, yo!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2501_0702_03_10: I wanna be epic! I wanna be openhearted! I wanna be a true man o’ the sea!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_01_10: I try to always judge things with my own two eyes, you know?
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_02_10: I mean, who’s a good person? Who’s a bad person? That’s somethin’ you’ve gotta judge for yourself!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0701_03_10: If you let somebody else make that judgment for you, you might miss out on something awesome one day, dude.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_01_10: If you see somebody in trouble, you should help ’em out, no questions asked!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_02_10: Even if another dude tells you they’re a bad person, that shouldn’t stop you from helpin’ ’em out!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/2511_0702_03_10: That’s how I live my life, dude! I believe it to my core.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3001_0701_01_10: ’Sup, dude! Ready for a mornin’ swim?
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3002_0701_01_10: Hey, you an early riser, too? Stayin’ healthy is no small thing!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3003_0701_01_10: Whoa, look at that sunshine! The sea’s almost sparklin’!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3004_0701_01_10: Yo, what are you lazin’ around for? Up and at ’em!
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3005_0701_01_10: Dude, it’s wicked out tonight! I’m down to head out one more time, if you are.
ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.ch0052_00_shizui/3006_0701_01_10: You’re out pretty late tonight. It’s good to take breaks, you know!

ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0101_0701_01_10: Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been looking forward to seeing you again.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0101_0701_02_10: If there are walls we have to climb today, let’s climb them together!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_01_10: My Amaura is always on his best behavior, and his skin feels so nice and cool to the touch.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_02_10: When I look at his long neck, I feel a sense of friendship and closeness.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0701_03_10: I feel like he’s just as eager as I am.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0702_01_10: I wonder what sort of things Amaura can utilize his long neck for. Other than eating food in high places, that is.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0601_0702_02_10: I’d love to sit down with him and leisurely debate all of the many possibilities.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_01_10: One time, a chunk of the cliff collapsed where I was rock-climbing.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_02_10: I actually found a fossil among the stones that fell...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_03_10: and it turned into a Tyrunt when I had it restored at the Fossil Lab.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0701_04_10: Funnily enough, I found my Amaura’s fossil at those very same cliffs.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0702_01_10: I wonder how I happened to find my selfish Tyrunt in the same place I found my sweet Amaura...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0602_0702_02_10: Maybe our friendship goes above and beyond the walls of our differences.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_01_10: I get along really well with Siebold, one of the Elite Four of Kalos, where we’re from.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_02_10: He and I are a lot alike in that we’re both completely devoted to bettering ourselves and what we do.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0701_03_10: I’m sure he’s on a deep dive into Pasio cuisine right now, honing his skills as a chef.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0702_01_10: All this talk about Siebold is making me miss his delicious cooking.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0603_0702_02_10: I’ll have to ask him to whip me up something tasty the next time I see him.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_01_10: This might surprise you, but I have a little bit of a sweet tooth.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_02_10: I’m trying to maintain my current body weight, though, so I can’t have too many sweets.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_03_10: I limit myself to one slice of cake each week, but sometimes it’s so hard to resist.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0701_04_10: Then again, that one slice of cake tastes even more sublime after a whole week of not eating any.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0702_01_10: Strictly refraining from doing something for a while makes me even more excited to do that thing.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0604_0702_02_10: I continue to be strict with myself so that I can savor that feeling!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_01_10: These stones I use to decorate my hair are all the rage back in Kalos.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_02_10: I’m the one who started the fashion trend, actually...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_03_10: Incidentally, that’s how I earned my title as a  trendsetter and fashion leader in Kalos.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0701_04_10: I can be your fashion advisor if you like, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0702_01_10: These hair stones are unique in the same way that we’re all unique as people.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/0605_0702_02_10: When your clothes and accessories are a perfect match for your unique personality— that’s TRUE fashion!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0701_01_10: I found something nice for you up in the mountains. Here!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0702_01_10: You can find a lot of interesting things up in the mountains if you know how to look for them.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/1701_0702_02_10: That’s one of the things I love most about rock-climbing.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_01_10: Having a daring, adventurous spirit is most important of all.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_02_10: When it comes to sports, there’s no question. But challenging yourself when it comes to food is also important!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_03_10: I wonder what sort of flavors Pasio has to offer us...
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0701_04_10: Now THAT’S an adventure I’d dare to get behind!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_01_10: Competing in the PML is an incredible challenge—a mountain unlike any other I’ve climbed before.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_02_10: I wonder what it’ll look like at the summit, towering over all the other Trainers. I’d love to see for myself.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2501_0702_03_10: That is, after I’ve climbed over my FIRST wall—defeating you, my friend.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_01_10: You and your Pokémon seem like you have a really close relationship with each other.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_02_10: Relationships with Pokémon can change just like relationships with people, though, depending on how dedicated you are.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0701_03_10: But with someone as dedicated as you, I’m sure there’ll never be any issues.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_01_10: There are some things you just can’t reach, no matter how far you stretch out your hand.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_02_10: But you never give up—you keep on fighting with everything in your heart.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/2511_0702_03_10: I feel lucky to have found friends that are as  talented and spirited as you and your Pokémon.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. Are you ready for some early training?
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning! It’s great weather for rock-climbing today.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3003_0701_01_10: Hi there! How’s your training coming? Make sure you’re thoroughly prepared to climb!
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3004_0701_01_10: Hi! Let’s put on a smile and give it our best shot out there today.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3005_0701_01_10: It’s getting pretty late, isn’t it. I admire you for training hard into the night.
ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.ch0053_00_zakuro/3006_0701_01_10: You’re certainly working hard tonight! Just be careful not to overdo it.

ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0101_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I have been waiting for you!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0101_0701_02_10: Fwahaha! Let us not waste a single day that could be used to hone our skills!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_01_10: I was originally a Gym Leader, and  I made an invisible labyrinth in my Gym.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_02_10: Of course, it was to weed out weak Trainers!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_03_10: But my daughter got lost in there once and created quite a scene.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_04_10: She has since grown to be my successor and a fine ninja as well as a Gym Leader, but...
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0701_05_10: No matter how old she may become, she is still my child. That story will always bring a smile to my face.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0702_01_10: My daughter looks up to me. Maybe it’s because of this that she is showing very fast growth!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0601_0702_02_10: I must train twice as hard to make sure that I am not overtaken by the girl.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_01_10: We have a large park in Fuchsia City called the Safari Zone.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_02_10: It is a place where you can observe Pokémon in their natural habitat.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0701_03_10: If you ever go to the Kanto region, go see for yourself! I am certain you’d discover something new.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_01_10: I also patrol the Safari Zone myself.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_02_10: Fwahaha! It is in order for all visiting guests to enjoy the park safely!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0602_0702_03_10: The nature in Fuchsia City is our pride and joy! Therefore, we must all cherish and protect our environment!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_01_10: Venomoth, a Pokémon that inhabits the Kanto region, looks very beautiful.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_02_10: However, behind that beauty, it hides a deadly poison.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0701_03_10: Beautiful things often hide their share of danger. Remember that for the future.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0702_01_10: Fwahaha! A long time ago, I was hit by Venomoth’s poison.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0603_0702_02_10: But it was through that experience that I became interested in Poison-type Pokémon. It was through that I became the man in front of you!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_01_10: My Crobat hunts his prey swiftly and silently.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_02_10: Would you not say that he is a ninja’s perfect partner?
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0701_03_10: Of course, if I am not careful, he tries to suck my blood!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0702_01_10: Crobat and I are equals. Words do no justice to what we share.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0604_0702_02_10: Perhaps trying to suck my blood is his way of showing me affection.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_01_10: If you’re going to be battling all sorts of pairs, make sure you choose the type of moves that your opponents are weak against.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_02_10: Fwahaha! As long as you can find  your opponent’s weakness, you’ll have an edge in any Pokémon battle!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_03_10: If you know not only what the opposing Pokémon are weak to but also what yours are weak to...
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0701_04_10: you will be able to identify both opportunities and crises!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_01_10: Now that I’ve warned you to look out for your opponent’s weaknesses, you understand what that means, yes?
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_02_10: It means that I challenge you!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/0605_0702_03_10: I am intrigued to see how you will deal with my Pokémon and my techniques!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/1701_0701_01_10: I have a gift for you! I’m sure you will find a good use for it!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/1701_0702_01_10: Pokémon are both smart and strong. You are the only one, however, that can lead them to victory using items.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/1701_0702_02_10: Make sure to find the best use for it.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0701_01_10: You have become much stronger than when we first met!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0701_02_10: Your desire to improve is splendid! I truly want you as an apprentice!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0701_03_10: I enjoy watching your remarkable growth!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0702_01_10: Even one that has lived on a single track as a ninja and a Pokémon Trainer has something to learn from your Pokémon handling.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0702_02_10: I wonder, if I introduced you to my training and teachings, would you become even stronger?
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2501_0702_03_10: Fwahaha! No, I will not force you. But if you are ever interested, come talk to me!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_01_10: It is sobering to see how quickly young Trainers become stronger.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_02_10: Whether through my daughter, Janine, or you...
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_03_10: it is very possible I’ll have the privilege to see one of my students grow to new heights and leave splendid results!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0701_04_10: I would like you to be my daughter’s rival. The two of you would be perfect for honing each other’s skills!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_01_10: Janine claims that her skill in both Pokémon battles and ninja arts are not adequate.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_02_10: If she had somebody to bounce off, I’m sure she would be able to grow, too.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_03_10: Not to mention, I am certain that you could learn something from her as well.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/2511_0702_04_10: I look forward to the growth the two of you will display!
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/3001_0701_01_10: If you find yourself struggling to wake up in the morning, I suggest splashing your face with cold water.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/3002_0701_01_10: It has become my routine to rise with the sun in the morning.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/3003_0701_01_10: Fwahaha! Time to apply my ninja techniques to the lunch my lovely daughter made me.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/3004_0701_01_10: Rigorous daily training is the key to securing glorious victory.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/3005_0701_01_10: True ninjas adapt to the darkness and make it their home by becoming one with the night.
ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.ch0054_00_kyo/3006_0701_01_10: You still seem full of energy. That is excellent! Continue your training!

ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0101_0701_01_10: Well met, young [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been awaiting your arrival!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0101_0701_02_10: I shall be your shield today! Do not tarry, now! Let us be off!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_01_10: The manner in which you battle with your Pokémon is just and fair... and, might I add, quite brilliant!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_02_10: There is an etiquette to Pokémon battling, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='lady' ], and I firmly believe that etiquette includes fighting with honor.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_03_10: We Trainers should take pride in defeat as much as we do in triumph— doing so leaves little room for regret.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0701_04_10: I approach each and every Pokémon battle I compete in with the same earnestness.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0702_01_10: Pokémon are the greatest of comrades— they never fail to give us their utmost effort.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0601_0702_02_10: That is why I believe that we, as Trainers, have an obligation to give them our sincere effort in return lest we dishonor our Pokémon!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_01_10: Aegislash has been my comrade in countless battles.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_02_10: In fact, I would go so far as to say that Aegislash is my pride and joy!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_03_10: I hope that you, too, feel a sense of pride when you look at your own Pokémon.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0701_04_10: To have pride in one’s Pokémon means to trust  and believe in them! Thus strength is born!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0702_01_10: If you have pride in your Pokémon— truly feel it in your heart—your Pokémon will surely respond in kind.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0602_0702_02_10: I feel it in mine own heart and have made a vow to fight every fight with honor and good faith.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_01_10: Whenever I’m away from home, my Klefki keeps the keys to my estate safe and sound.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_02_10: At first, the little prankster made off with my keys, hid them where I couldn’t find them...
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_03_10: But when I defeated him in a Pokémon battle, he returned the keys to me without so much as a question.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0701_04_10: It was then that I decided to entrust Klefki with my keys of my own accord... We have been jolly friends ever since.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0702_01_10: No thief can steal my keys as long as Klefki is keeping them safe.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0702_02_10: In fact, I would go so far as to say that my being able to walk about with such confidence here on Pasio...
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0603_0702_03_10: despite being so far away from my estate...is all thanks to Klefki.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_01_10: Maintaining the glorious condition of my steel armor requires intensive training.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_02_10: Some days, I plunge my steel gloves into an open flame. On others, I seat myself beneath a raging waterfall.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_03_10: Sometimes I don my armor and have my Aegislash attack me head-on! It’s true—on my honor as a knight!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0701_04_10: I would not dare provoke an attack from Aegislash without my steel armor on, however! And do not try such at home, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='lady' ]!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0702_01_10: My Aegislash’s attacks are extraordinarily sharp.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0702_02_10: SO sharp and intense that I can feel the force of his attacks through my magnificent armor!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0604_0702_03_10: And it only intensifies during a battle... I long to feel the same brute force that the Pokémon feel on the front lines.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_01_10: The desire to protect not only oneself but also the people and Pokémon around you...
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_02_10: That desire can be a Trainer’s sword— and also his shield!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_03_10: Young [Name:PlayerNickname ], it seems you already possess your own such sword and shield.
