ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0701_04_10: Take up your weapons, and fight to defend your comrades! Lead them to victory!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0702_01_10: A team will never experience true triumph if its strength is limited to one member!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0702_02_10: But you, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='lady' ], possess the skill to rescue your teammates from crisis— to reinforce their sense of unity!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/0605_0702_03_10: A sword and shield can be quite useful, but only one who is both stout of heart and filled with pride shall rightfully wield them.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/1701_0701_01_10: Do accept this token of my regard! I believe it may be of use to you!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/1701_0702_01_10: I knew it from the moment I laid eyes upon it... Knew that this item was destined to find your hand.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_01_10: Long has this suit of armor—this treasure— been held by the esteemed knights of my family.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_02_10: Generation after generation, we have protected the land of Kalos, living in peace with the Pokémon that dwell there.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_03_10: Long, long ago, the land of Kalos was swept up in a ruthless war, you see...
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0701_04_10: My ancestors banded together with Pokémon to rescue the townspeople from a cruel fate... So ’twas written in the annals of history.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0702_01_10: Those Pokémon and my ancestors were defending the future, child. It is thanks to them that we are able to live in peace now.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0702_02_10: We must not take that for granted. That is why I, Wikstrom, strive to live in harmony with Pokémon...
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2501_0702_03_10: I shall keep the memory of my family’s good deeds in my heart and dutifully pass it on to the next generation.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_01_10: I have given my word that any contest of mine shall be fought fairly and honorably.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_02_10: And you, my friend, have demonstrated the very definition of true honor in battle many times over!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_03_10: Thy heart is pure and sincere, as evidenced by your interactions with Pokémon and other Trainers.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0701_04_10: Verily, you fill my heart with pride, child. Nay. Rather, ’tis the team we form together that has that honor!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0702_01_10: The road is long and hard, young one,  but with a bit of good faith and perseverance, you will reach your destination in time.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0702_02_10: Do not waver now! You must proceed with confidence!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/2511_0702_03_10: After all, I will be right here to protect you! My sword is ever at the ready. You have only to ask!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! I give my word that I shall not falter this day!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/3002_0701_01_10: It is good to see you laboring so hard in the early morn. Let us train together!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/3003_0701_01_10: Greetings! Let us strive for greatness— that we might have no regrets!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/3004_0701_01_10: Let us press forward honorably, with the sun at our backs!
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/3005_0701_01_10: You are training hard—and it is well past dusk. Remember, rest is of equal import.
ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.ch0055_00_gampi/3006_0701_01_10: Only a little more to go! Let us press on with pride in our hearts!

ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0101_0701_01_10: Well, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Looks like I don’t have to ask if you’re ready or not.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0101_0701_02_10: Don’t push yourself too hard, all right?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0701_02_10: But Alola’s a really peaceful place. Thanks to that, I get to take it easy.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0701_03_10: Even though there are plenty of things going on around the world.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0702_01_10: The police mascot for Alola is a Granbull.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0601_0702_02_10: I personally think a Meowth wouldn’t be too bad, either.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0701_01_10: Compared to other places, Alola has some funny-looking Pokémon.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0701_02_10: Even my Persian looks different from the ones you’re used to, doesn’t she?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0701_03_10: Alolan Persian have nice round faces.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0702_01_10: I know that Alolan Persian are rare around these parts.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0602_0702_02_10: I like both Alolan and normal versions, but I personally prefer the fluffier Alolan ones.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0701_01_10: You know the Pokémon Honchkrow and Krookodile?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0701_02_10: They’ve got some scary looking mugs, but you wouldn’t think so if you saw them smile.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0701_03_10: You can never know anything about a person or a Pokémon just from a glance. When you have a chance, take a good look at those around you.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0603_0702_02_10: You won’t get anything out of gazing at me.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0701_01_10: Pasio is nice and all, but I’m not really used to being far from home.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0701_02_10: What sights to see, what food to eat... I have no idea what to do.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0701_03_10: In the end, I slack off just like I do in Alola.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0604_0702_01_10: Things never changing is definitely a source of comfort...even if it does get boring.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... No, it’s nothing too important.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_02_10: I noticed that Pasio doesn’t have a Sushi High Roller around.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_03_10: I wanted their Z-Kaiseki Ronin Set, but I guess there’s nothing I can do.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0701_04_10: If you ever find yourself in Alola, I’ll treat you to it.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0702_01_10: I heard that Kalos has a Sushi High Roller.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/0605_0702_02_10: But apparently they’re a little different from the one in Alola.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0701_01_10: Hold out your hand. Here, you can have this.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0701_02_10: Whether it’s of use or not is up to you, though.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0702_01_10: No point in a guy like me hanging on to something like that.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/1701_0702_02_10: But you’re different. If I find any again, I’ll make sure to give them to you.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0701_02_10: If you need anything, let me know. I can at least hear you out.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0701_03_10: You look like you have a lot on your plate.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0701_04_10: You might even have stuff that you can’t do all by yourself.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0702_01_10: You’ll tire yourself out if you’re always in a rush.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2501_0702_02_10: Taking it easy isn’t as bad a thing as people might tell you.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0701_01_10: You’re getting really strong... What are you planning for the future?
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0701_02_10: Trying to get even stronger is fine, too... But that’s a really long path.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0701_03_10: But seeing how steadfast you are... It makes me think you just might be able to make it.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0702_01_10: I’m an old man. I try not to have dreams anymore.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2511_0702_02_10: As long as young kids like you enjoy yourselves, that’s all I can ask for.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3001_0701_01_10: Out for Pokémon battles this early, huh? Me? I’m just loafing around, I guess.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3002_0701_01_10: You’re out and about pretty early. If you’ve got something to do, better go get it sorted.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3003_0701_01_10: Hmm, already midday. You can train as hard as you like, but don’t overdo it.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3004_0701_01_10: Hey there. If you’re up for Pokémon battles, do them while it’s still light out.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3005_0701_01_10: Careful now. The paths around here can be hard to see at night. I guess you’ll be fine with your Pokémon, though.
ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.ch0056_00_kuchinashi/3006_0701_01_10: It’s already pretty late. Once you’re done with whatever you’re doing, you should head home and get some sleep.

ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0101_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I have been waiting for you. You have a good glint in your eye today!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0101_0701_02_10: Make sure to keep training! Hoo hah!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0701_02_10: That is power that can only be born from his limber body.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0701_03_10: As a martial artist, I aspire to the flexibility that Hitmonlee possesses.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0701_04_10: I hope I can kick like him one day, too.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0702_01_10: To learn the skills your Pokémon possess...
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0702_02_10: will lead to more deeply understanding your Pokémon.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_01_10: I enjoy training. In fact, I have few other hobbies.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_02_10: The joy of pursuing strength comes with its share of hardships.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_03_10: But even then, I have one thing that soothes my tired body.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_04_10: Spas! The Ember Spa is the best!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0702_01_10: I soak in the springs while I think about the next day’s training routine.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0702_02_10: Absolute bliss! You should come with me sometime!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_01_10: Machamp, just like his name says, is a champion!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_02_10: He’s also been my partner since my younger days!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_03_10: We exposed ourselves to harsh environments and communicated with our fists.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_04_10: And ultimately, the bond that was born has been between us since.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0702_01_10: Machamp’s power is an inspiration to martial artists everywhere.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0702_02_10: He is also the perfect example of a honed body.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_01_10: If it leads to me becoming stronger, I’ll eat and drink anything. I have no preference in taste.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_02_10: The only exception is the Rage Candy Bar! Rage Candy Bars are the best!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_03_10: A great flavor that rejuvenates my tired body  after training. The rushing energy!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_04_10: Such unspeakable joys... I wish I could teach you those joys, too...
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0702_01_10: The moment you chomp down on one of those bars!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0702_02_10: Absolute bliss! The one moment I do not want to be disturbed. All this talk is making me hungry!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_01_10: Training, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Good! I like seeing honed Pokémon!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_02_10: I can sense strength from you as well! But do not be satisfied with that!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_03_10: The way I became a member of the Elite Four was by wanting to battle strong Trainers!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_04_10: Every day is a lesson! And there is no end to learning!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0702_01_10: Maybe this time, I’ll try to train you! I believe in your potential!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0702_02_10: I will train you until you collapse from fatigue!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/1701_0701_01_10: This is a gift from me to you!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/1701_0701_02_10: Use this and train even harder!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/1701_0702_01_10: No need to thank me! Just get stronger!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0701_01_10: Do you like candy bars? I personally love them!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0701_02_10: I especially like the Rage Candy Bars sold in Mahogany Town in the Johto region.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0701_03_10: You should try them out sometime! I promise you won’t regret it! Rage Candy Bars are the best!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0702_01_10: There are plenty of people out there much stronger than I am.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0702_02_10: And in the same vein, there may be a candy bar out there that is better than a Rage Candy Bar!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0702_03_10: If I find any on Pasio, I will definitely let you know!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0701_01_10: To be strong is to always look up and never stop.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0701_02_10: To never be satisfied, to humble yourself, and to always aim higher...
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0701_03_10: That is how you will discover your true strength!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0702_01_10: The top of the PML is not the final goal! It is only a checkpoint!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0702_02_10: I will keep believing in my possibilities and keep charging through my limits!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0702_03_10: And once I’ve gotten stronger, I want us to battle each other!
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/3001_0701_01_10: If you have no plans for the day, you are welcome to join me in my training.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/3002_0701_01_10: I’m ready for a steaming hot shower now that my morning workout is over.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/3003_0701_01_10: True discipline is not accomplished in a day. Constant training over time is key.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/3004_0701_01_10: All that intense training earlier has given me a mean appetite...
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/3005_0701_01_10: Exposure to the cold night wind is no good. You must take care of your body above all else.
ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.ch0057_00_shiba/3006_0701_01_10: Huh, it got dark so fast. Time to wash off the day’s sweat with a dip in the hot springs.

ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It looks like the winds are quite pleasant today.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0101_0701_02_10: I am going to go train. Would you like to join me?
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_01_10: This is a very large city, but it provides so many convenient services.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_02_10: And even if it is an artificial island, Pasio would be very attractive to tourists as well.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_03_10: My father owns the Hano Grand Hotel.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0701_04_10: So I am quite confident in my knowledge of hospitality.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0702_01_10: I know what real hospitality is like.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0601_0702_02_10: The reason all of the people called to Pasio seem so happy must be because there is ample care that goes into their comfort.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_01_10: Toucannon has a very large beak.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_02_10: I evolved him from a Pikipek I caught in the past.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_03_10: He gracefully flies in the sky, and every time I’ve gotten stronger, he’s changed his form, too.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0701_04_10: I have to make sure to stay strong for Toucannon as well.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0702_01_10: Pokémon evolve and change their form for their Trainers.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0602_0702_02_10: We, as Trainers, must keep moving forward for them as well!
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_01_10: As a professional golfer, I aim to make my matches entertaining for the spectators.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_02_10: Besides, I enjoy playing the games that the audience enjoys watching.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_03_10: That’s why I feel the same with Pokémon battles. We enjoy the battles that others enjoy to watch.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0701_04_10: However, I get so caught up in the battle that I don’t pay attention to my surroundings. I still have a lot to learn.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0702_01_10: Be it a neck-and-neck battle that makes  your palms sweat, or one that’s graceful and  coordinated, there are always highlights.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0702_02_10: Perhaps it is because they are exceptional that they stand out so much.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0603_0702_03_10: Or perhaps they are coincidences  that only happen because we are  so caught up in the heat of battle.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0701_01_10: Oricorio is a Pokémon that changes how it looks depending on what nectar it sips.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0701_02_10: And it performs a different dance depending on what form it has taken.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0701_03_10: I can’t help but respect it for the vigor with which it dances.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0702_01_10: My Oricorio uses Baile Style, so she does an intense and passionate performance.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0604_0702_02_10: If you ever get the chance to visit Alola, I would love to show you in person.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_01_10: Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Today’s a rest day from training.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_02_10: By taking breaks from time to time, you can optimize your training. Changing your pace is important.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_03_10: I wonder what I should do on my day off...
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0701_04_10: Maybe I should do what I enjoy.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0702_01_10: I thought about it, and I decided that I like golfing and Pokémon battles.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/0605_0702_02_10: You can do those things on your days off, too!
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/1701_0701_02_10: It should be more useful to you. Please use it well.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/1701_0702_01_10: Acquiring new items is important, of course.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/1701_0702_02_10: But what is more important is using them efficiently and with good timing.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_01_10: It is pointless to just work out  for long periods of time.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_02_10: It’s because you concentrate while working out that your experience sticks.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_03_10: That is why I am researching ways in which I can concentrate during my ten-hour workout.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0701_04_10: That’s my usual workout time, so I should be able to get great results.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0702_01_10: I never want to compromise when it comes to either golf or Pokémon battles.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0702_02_10: Be it golf competitions or Pokémon battles, in order to win, I must be able to win against myself.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2501_0702_03_10: I want to be able to meet the expectations of my golf fans that cheer me on and the Pokémon that fight alongside me.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_02_10: I would even want to challenge you right here and right now.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_03_10: But instead, why don’t you try your hand at the Alola League?
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_04_10: I would like to battle you as a member of the Elite Four.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0701_05_10: I’m sure you would be able to make it very far in the league.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0702_01_10: The Alola League is still relatively young.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0702_02_10: But don’t let that fool you. The Elite Four and the Champion are genuinely strong.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/2511_0702_03_10: If you seek the greatest of battles, please come by sometime.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. There’s a wonderful breeze blowing right now!
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/3002_0701_01_10: Morning! We’ll miss out on valuable training time if we don’t get going!
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/3003_0701_01_10: Hello there! Care to join me on the practice range?
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/3004_0701_01_10: There’s a nice breeze out there today. It’s perfect weather for a round of golf.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/3005_0701_01_10: Hello. It feels like time to start my evening training. Maybe I’ll hit the putting green.
ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.ch0058_00_kahiri/3006_0701_01_10: Is it night already? There aren’t enough hours in a day...

ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0101_0701_01_10: Hah! Welcome back, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting for you!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0101_0701_02_10: Help me think of questions for my next quiz!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_01_10: I am Blaine!  I am the Gym Leader of Cinnabar Gym! I’m also known as the Hotheaded Quiz Master!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_02_10: My Pokémon are all hotheads that were raised on Cinnabar Island!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_03_10: Now that I’m here, you have nothing to worry about.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_04_10: If there’s anything you would like to know about Pokémon, ask me!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_05_10: I’ll answer you in quiz fashion!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0702_01_10: The quizzes I think up are very popular!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0702_02_10: All the Trainers who challenged me  were happy to take them.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0701_02_10: Climbing up those mountains is very liberating— especially so if your Pokémon are at your side.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0701_03_10: I once got lost and stranded on the mountain, but there was a Pokémon that I saw there...
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0701_04_10: I could never forget that light that guided me, and I went back many times to look for it.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0702_01_10: Ever since the one time I got stranded on the mountain, I’ve always gone hiking with Ponyta.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0702_02_10: He’s a Fire Horse Pokémon that has sturdy legs and can easily jump over cliffs and hills!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_01_10: There is a facility called the Pokémon Research Lab on Cinnabar Island.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_02_10: They research very interesting things, such as Pokémon Evolution and legends.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_03_10: Rearranging genes is a practical way to explore the infinite possibilities of Pokémon.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_04_10: That’s some difficult stuff, but the researchers at the lab all believe that they’re doing the right thing.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0702_01_10: Back in the day, Fuji and I toiled to unlock those secrets, too...
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0702_02_10: And what we birthed... Well, we thought it was a symbol of the true potential of Pokémon at the time.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0701_01_10: I have a friend in Lavender Town.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0701_02_10: His name’s Fuji, and back in the day, he was an excellent researcher.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0701_03_10: Now he manages a refuge for abandoned Pokémon there.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0702_01_10: If you ever find yourself in Lavender Town, pay him a visit.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0702_02_10: I’m sure a Trainer like you would be able to put a smile on his face.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0701_01_10: Whenever I’m thinking up quizzes, I take off my sunglasses so that I can concentrate.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0701_02_10: Good ideas just come to me when I do so.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0701_03_10: Maybe you could think some up, too. It’s surprisingly easy to get hooked!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0702_01_10: Hm. I thought of a good quiz!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0702_02_10: Are Infernape sharp thinkers or poor?
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0702_03_10: They’re sharp! They are INFERnape, after all!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! I wanted to give you something.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0701_01_10: Hah! Let your youth—your spirit—burn bright, young one!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0701_02_10: Your youth can burn like a blazing flame, and it can burn out just as easily!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0701_03_10: Ignite your passion while you can! That is the key to living a hot life!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0702_01_10: Fire-type Pokémon are even hotter than their names or appearances might seem!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0702_02_10: They will lose to nobody when it comes to heat! From their spirits, their bodies, even how they look when they fight, they are hot and heartful!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0702_03_10: In a battle, you should always let your passion burn! That’s common knowledge when you fight with Fire-type Pokémon!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0701_01_10: Pasio tickles my thirst for both adventure and exploration at the same time!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0701_02_10: With it kindling my heart like this, it piques my interest as a scientist and a Trainer!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0701_03_10: Of course, I’m interested about you, too! Burn the fire in your heart, and challenge me!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0702_01_10: What I want is a Pokémon battle that’s as intense as the lava that spews out of a volcano!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0702_02_10: And I get the feeling I’ll get that from you one day!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0702_03_10: Now! Let’s ignite our spirits! Our bodies! Ignite and let this battle burn to cinders!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. A beautiful day, isn’t it? Even the Pokémon seem to be bright and chipper!
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/3002_0701_01_10: *yawn* Oh, excuse me! I got carried away thinking up quizzes late last night.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/3003_0701_01_10: Brilliant weather today! What’s that? The glare off my head is blinding you?
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/3004_0701_01_10: Always make sure you eat proper meals! Using your thinking cap burns calories, you know.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/3005_0701_01_10: Hm? Does the darkness make you nervous? In that case, I suppose my Pokémon could use its flame.
ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.ch0059_00_katsura/3006_0701_01_10: Such a wonderful night! Nights like these always seem to inspire the best quiz questions!

ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was getting tired of waiting for you!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s train and get superduper stronger together!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0701_01_10: People in Kanto say that Weezing are Pokémon that eat poison gas and get bigger.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0701_02_10: And would you believe that they are really popular among girls?
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0701_03_10: Yeah, I figured you wouldn’t. I might be the only girl that does like them.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0601_0702_02_10: I might sometimes make him angry and make him explode, though.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_01_10: My father is Koga, of the Elite Four! I want to become more like him. That’s why I have to train even harder!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_02_10: Father is very strong and strict. He is also cool with how skilled of a Pokémon Trainer he is!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_03_10: But more importantly, he’s kind! Isn’t he awesome?
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0701_04_10: But I won’t lose in the PML! I’m still a Pokémon Trainer first and foremost and a daughter second!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0702_01_10: Overcoming the person you admire the most is the ultimate form of flattery!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0702_02_10: So I was hoping that I could battle you a lot.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0602_0702_03_10: That way, we can polish each other’s skills!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0701_01_10: Everybody in the Fuchsia City Gym disguises themselves to look like me! You can imagine how hard it is to find me!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0701_02_10: It’s really fun, and a lot of the challengers have good things to say about it, but...
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0701_03_10: nobody realizes it’s me if I ever dress up.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0702_01_10: There are a lot of fashionable people on Pasio.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0702_02_10: But whenever I dress up, everybody asks if it’s just another disguise.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0603_0702_03_10: I mean...that’s not really my intention.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0701_01_10: My ninja uniform is specially tailored! It’s made from Ariados silk!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0701_02_10: It’s really durable! And even better, it’s warm in the winter and really cool in the summer!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0701_03_10: But the best part is that it makes me feel as if Ariados is always protecting me.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0702_01_10: People sometimes make gloves or scarves with Ariados silk, too.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0604_0702_02_10: Maybe I can make you some!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. What do you think of Poison-type Pokémon?
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_02_10: I think it’s great that each Pokémon has moves that it alone specializes in.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_03_10: And they use those moves to get any advantage they can and become stronger, whether their type is Fire, Grass, Water, or even Poison.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0701_04_10: Of course, Poison isn’t one of the popular types, but I’m not ashamed to say that I like it.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0702_01_10: You can ask me anything about Poison types! I’ll teach you everything I know!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/0605_0702_02_10: I’m learning a lot about moves from you, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It’s nice to be able to exchange knowledge.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0701_01_10: Here, you can have this! It was caught in Ariados’s thread!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0701_02_10: Whether it’s a Pokémon or an item, there’s always a right place to use it!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0702_01_10: You can find a lot of cool stuff caught in Ariados’s web. Isn’t that cool?
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/1701_0702_02_10: When I was a kid, I was clumsy and would get caught in Ariados’s web myself.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0701_01_10: My father is a member of the Elite Four! He’s one of the best Pokémon Trainers  in the world!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0701_02_10: I inherited my Gym from my father!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0701_03_10: I still have a lot to learn, but one day, I’m going to become so strong that both my father and all the other Gym Leaders will acknowledge me!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0702_01_10: I want to become stronger so that I’ll be a better Gym Leader!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0702_02_10: I have to study more about poison and practice my ninja techniques... There are a lot of things I have to do!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2501_0702_03_10: I’m going to be challenging you to battles a lot more in the future, so be ready for that!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0701_01_10: I’m not one to brag, but I think I’m pretty strong!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0701_02_10: Of course, I still have a lot to learn, and I’m not nearly strong enough for my father to accept me.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0701_03_10: But as long as I’m with you,  I know I can surpass all my limits!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0702_01_10: I apparently have a little bit of stage fright.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0702_02_10: But whenever I’m talking to you, I can relax and use my full strength!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/2511_0702_03_10: So let’s stick together! I don’t think I can do this without you!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! I always start my day with a long jog to help strengthen my legs!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/3002_0701_01_10: Life is full of distractions, but I’m gonna do my best to stay focused on my training today!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/3003_0701_01_10: If I ever want to beat you or my father, I’ve gotta train hard every day!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/3004_0701_01_10: I was just on my way to give my father his lunch!
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/3005_0701_01_10: If your eyes aren’t used to the dark, I can guide you at night.
ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.ch0060_00_anzu/3006_0701_01_10: Moving through the shadows of night... Mark of a true ninja!

ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0101_0701_01_10: If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m so happy to see you here!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0101_0701_02_10: Keep up with your training! If you do, you’ll surely get stronger and stronger!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0701_01_10: It’s like the whole town is celebrating with the PML! No matter how old I get, this still gets my blood pumping!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0701_02_10: Strong Trainers from regions all over are gathering here.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0701_03_10: I’m here to prove that I’m still in my prime when it comes to battling!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0601_0702_01_10: I’d be more excited if that old duff Oak were still competing, too, though.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0701_02_10: She eats a lot and loves to laugh. She’s a real lively one.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0701_03_10: She’s gentle and cute. Such a good Pokémon!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0701_04_10: She does like to make mischief, too, though.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0702_01_10: When she tries to sneak up on me for some sort of prank, I have to be quick on my feet to dodge her.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0602_0702_02_10: For Gengar, being mischievous is just how she plays with me. By now, I’m used to it.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_01_10: Pasio is the place to be right now, but night will fall here, too.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_02_10: Even in the brightest of light, there is always darkness lurking nearby.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_03_10: On nights when shadows seem to move on their own and cold winds are blowing, take care to watch for what’s behind you.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0701_04_10: Mind that ominous lights don’t come to steal your soul away.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0702_01_10: How well can you handle Ghost-type Pokémon, child?
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0702_02_10: They can sense a weak heart and will take advantage of it. You must always have a strong heart.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0603_0702_03_10: Once you’ve grown close to one, there’s no longer anything to be afraid of.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0701_01_10: Golbat in the Kanto region look scary, but when you get used to them, they can be quite sweet.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0701_02_10: They’ll come right down and land on your head and give you playful little bites.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0701_03_10: If you’re not watching them closely, though, they’ll start to suck your blood, so you have to keep an eye on them.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0702_01_10: For as big as their mouths are, Golbat have pretty short fangs.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0702_02_10: But you still need to be careful around them. Their fangs are thick, so it’s tough to get them out once they’ve sunk them into you.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0604_0702_03_10: Although that is one of the things I find cute about them.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_01_10: Why did you decide to become a Trainer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_02_10: As long as you have a good reason, you’ve got nothing to worry about.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_03_10: Believe in yourself, don’t forget what you’re doing this for, and keep moving forward!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0701_04_10: Keep on battling no matter how old you get!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0702_01_10: That old duff Oak chose to use his talents on research instead. What a waste!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/0605_0702_02_10: If you’re a stronger Trainer than other people, you should keep battling as long as you live!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/1701_0701_01_10: Aha! Great timing—I have something for you.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/1701_0701_02_10: This is one of my favorite items. I’m sure you’ll be able to put it to good use.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been having Pokémon battles for a very long time.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_02_10: I’ve had times when my skills couldn’t cut it.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_03_10: But you can’t give up at times like those! You have to keep battling again and again until you win!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0701_04_10: If you give up, you’ll never grow as a Trainer!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0702_01_10: You’re still so young, and that’s precisely why you have so many more battles ahead of you.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2501_0702_02_10: So take on as many of those battles as you can. That’s the only way you’ll get stronger, child!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0701_01_10: When I was young, I was reckless at times, and I had the perfect rival.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0701_02_10: And now I’ve got you youngsters.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0701_03_10: I wonder how much fun I’ll have against you.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_01_10: The man I accepted as my rival was really strong.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_02_10: And now he’s just some old duff...
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_03_10: Well, at least you’ve got some pluck. I don’t think you’ll turn out like him.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/2511_0702_04_10: You’re not a Trainer if you don’t battle! He really is such a waste of talent...
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning, child. Make sure you train hard today!
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/3002_0701_01_10: Did you sleep well last night? I hope no wandering Pokémon came by to eat your dreams.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/3003_0701_01_10: Remember—even during the day, darkness is just around the corner. Don’t let your guard down.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/3004_0701_01_10: How’s your training going? Don’t forget to take a break every now and then.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/3005_0701_01_10: If you’re outside on a dark night, remember to watch your back and never trust your shadow.
ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.ch0061_00_kikuko/3006_0701_01_10: My Pokémon’s energy always shoots up as soon as the sun goes down.

ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0101_0701_02_10: I’m hoping you’ll do your best to entertain me today.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_01_10: My love for Dark-type Pokémon first began with my Umbreon.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_02_10: His elegant, piercing gaze and beautiful courage won me over immediately.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_03_10: It wasn’t just his looks, though—he can put up an incredible fight in a Pokémon battle.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_04_10: Feint Attack, Foul Play, Torment... Our tactics must be infuriating for the Pokémon on the other side of the battlefield.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_05_10: But I love the way so many Dark-type moves work to outwit and counter the opponent.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0702_01_10: It’s kind of hard to put into words what it is about Dark-type Pokémon that fascinates me so...
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0601_0702_02_10: They’re so wild and adorable... *sigh* Words just don’t do them justice!
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_01_10: I normally spend my days in the Kanto region battling with the eager Trainers who come to challenge the Elite Four.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_02_10: All sorts of Trainers come to test their skills against me, but my Dark-type Pokémon and I usually have them in the palm of our hand.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_03_10: When it comes to tactics, the possibilities are endless—depending on your Pokémon’s type, moves, and passive skills.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_04_10: Knowing that your opponent uses Dark types isn’t enough. Getting to know your own Pokémon and forming a strategy around that is key.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0702_01_10: A lot of people think that Dark-type Pokémon don’t play fair and square because of the way their move names sound.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0702_02_10: But understanding move effects and utilizing your Pokémon’s strengths isn’t something that’s unique to Dark types. Not by a long shot!
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0602_0702_03_10: I hope that you learn something about Dark-type tactics when we battle each other.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_01_10: We all know that type matchups can give you a huge advantage in a Pokémon battle... but they’re not always a must.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_02_10: Once, I was challenged by a Trainer who insisted on battling with the first Pokémon they ever received, regardless of type matchups.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_03_10: The first time we battled, I was victorious, but the next time they challenged me, they beat me fair and square.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_04_10: In the end, type matchups may be important, but sometimes victory can be achieved using something more precious than that.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0603_0702_01_10: I admire a Trainer who can stand firm and stick to their beliefs.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0603_0702_02_10: It may be a bit self-centered, sure, but it means they’ve got the power to do something great. I like that.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0604_0701_01_10: Hmph... I guess you’re not half bad.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0604_0701_02_10: Unless my eyes deceive me, I think that Pokémon of yours is going to be great someday.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0604_0701_03_10: Pokémon grow so much stronger when they know their Trainers love them, you see.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0604_0702_01_10: It’s rare that another Trainer catches my interest.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0605_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], your Pokémon looks...so very dashing today.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0605_0701_02_10: You and your Pokémon have the same spark in your eye, you know.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0605_0701_03_10: Remember the way you feel right now, and use that positivity to propel you forward.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0605_0702_01_10: I like to measure up my opponents, then take them down with the perfect counterattack.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/0605_0702_02_10: It seems like you’ve already found your own battle style as well.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/1701_0701_01_10: Have you been using your items effectively? Here, you can have this.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/1701_0701_02_10: It’s a present. It’s a, uh... *giggle* Well, you’ll see.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/1701_0702_01_10: How do you like your present? I’m sure it’ll come in handy for you.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/1701_0702_02_10: Knowing how and when to use items during a battle is key.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2501_0701_01_10: There’s no such thing as a strong Pokémon or a weak Pokémon, as far as I’m concerned.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2501_0701_02_10: Every Pokémon is unique in its own way— it’s up to the Trainer to figure out how best to utilize that.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2501_0701_03_10: Any trait can be turned into an advantage as long as you love and encourage your Pokémon.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2501_0702_01_10: Even if some people might call them weak, I never give up on the Pokémon I love.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2501_0702_02_10: It’s precisely because I love them that I’m able to see all of the good in them.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2501_0702_03_10: Then again, I’m sure none of this comes as a surprise to you.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0701_01_10: If you’re someone who gets caught up in the desire to win so much that it drains the fun out of battling for you...
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0701_02_10: sorry, but you’re failing as a Trainer. That sort of mind-set is just not OK.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0701_03_10: Why, you ask? Because the battles that are fun for both you and your Pokémon are the ones that will lead you to victory.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_01_10: You should always have fun when you’re battling, no matter what. Sometimes that’s easier said than done...
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_02_10: but I get the feeling that’s not an issue for you. I can see that you and your Pokémon have mutual trust and affection in spades.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_03_10: Just stay true to yourself and continue to have fun battling just the way you are.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_04_10: One day, maybe we could face each other in a spectacular battle as well—you doing what you do best and me doing the same.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/3001_0701_01_10: I’m not really a morning person, you know? I’m doing my best just to keep my eyes open.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/3002_0701_01_10: It’s not good to sleep in late, you know. I suppose that’s your prerogative, though.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/3003_0701_01_10: Have you eaten yet? A healthy meal before battle is key.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/3004_0701_01_10: As soon as the clock hits noon, my Pokémon is itching for battle.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/3005_0701_01_10: The starry sky is such a wonder. I could gaze up at it all night.
ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.ch0062_00_karin/3006_0701_01_10: I do love the night...but it’s never good for a lady to miss her beauty sleep.

ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0101_0701_01_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Now we start our training!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0101_0701_02_10: Practicing every day is the key to becoming the ultimate Trainer!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_01_10: The PML! A battleground that only the mightiest of warriors are allowed to set foot in!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_02_10: No other festival could make my spirit tremble like this one does!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_03_10: I shall participate, find all of the strong Trainers, and overwhelm them with decisive strength!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0701_04_10: This is a battle to perfect our strength! Even Conkeldurr is more tense than usual!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0702_01_10: Now’s my chance to show the world the results of my training!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0601_0702_02_10: Conkeldurr and I will support you and your Pokémon to the limits of our strength!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0701_01_10: Mienshao is a Pokémon that uses a graceful martial art.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0701_02_10: Elegant and efficient movements! That is the secret to Mienshao’s strength!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0701_03_10: I refer to their efficient movements  when I train as well!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0702_01_10: Power isn’t just being bigger or physically stronger than your opponent.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0602_0702_02_10: Being able to generate maximum force with minimum movement! That’s what leads to victory!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0701_01_10: Concrete has become a necessity in modern construction.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0701_02_10: With good reason, too! It’s hard and sturdy and withstands the rain  and wind while towering over all of us.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0701_04_10: You feel this from concrete, too, don’t you?
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0702_01_10: It’s said that Conkeldurr is the one that taught us how to make concrete.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0603_0702_02_10: In a way, Conkeldurr is wielding his own power when he commands and controls concrete!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_01_10: At my core, I am a martial artist, and what is most important to a martial artist is spirit, technique, and body.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_02_10: A spirit that will allow you to hold on to your convictions... A technique that you hone... A body that is hardened through training...
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_03_10: These three elements are the key to strength! And those are what I focus on!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0701_04_10: Engrave that into your spirit and body. That will be your first lesson!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0702_01_10: I have styled my hair so that it does not impede me during training or fights!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0702_02_10: Long hair can even get in the way of your opponents.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0604_0702_03_10: Grooming yourself is also important for combat, and I make sure to groom myself regularly!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_01_10: I have a master. Alder is his name.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_02_10: He is the oldest Champion in Unovan history, and he represents what I aim to achieve!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_03_10: I always have and always will strive to be the best!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_04_10: I will defeat both Master Alder and you and continue training for greater heights!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0701_05_10: I have sworn to dedicate my life to the last breath to perfectly honing my skills!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0702_01_10: My strength is not a means to any end.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0702_02_10: My aim is to hone and perfect my own strength, and that is my only aim.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/0605_0702_03_10: That is my motivation. No, that is my life itself!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/1701_0701_02_10: You even made me acknowledge your strength. That is why I want you to reach greater heights along with me by whatever means you can!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/1701_0702_01_10: Conkeldurr and I are both seeking out  strong Trainers and Pokémon.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/1701_0702_02_10: The two of us are looking forward  to how strong you will become!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve gone all over the world single-mindedly pursuing strength.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0701_02_10: That’s when I met Master Alder. He taught me  the wonders of pursuing strength, and thus I became a member of the Elite Four.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0701_03_10: You have a peculiar power to make me remember those days.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0702_01_10: A spirit that desires strength and the will to know what it means to be the strongest... I can sense you possess both.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0702_02_10: I know you will become stronger, but I will not lose to you!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2501_0702_03_10: Because that spirit and that will are just as present in myself as well!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0701_01_10: Even if I lose a battle, as long as I have gotten stronger, I consider that a victory against myself.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0701_02_10: With that in mind, whenever you battle, look at your opponent, look at your Pokémon! And most importantly, look at yourself!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0701_03_10: You can become much stronger! And if you do, I can become even stronger as well!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0702_01_10: What I desire is a battle with a Trainer that has the perseverance and strength of will to be true to themselves!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/2511_0702_02_10: And you’re true to yourself and your convictions. That is why you are able to become stronger!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/3001_0701_01_10: Ah, it’s morning! Time to stand tall and surpass the weaker person you were yesterday!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/3002_0701_01_10: If you’re still sleepy, go splash water on your face. I guarantee it’ll wake you right up!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/3003_0701_01_10: The sun is high. Now is the time to train! Focus your mind and body!
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/3004_0701_01_10: Try to maintain good eating habits. A healthy body is a must for martial arts.
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/3005_0701_01_10: Night is the perfect time to reflect and center yourself. Meditation is yet another part of training...
ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.ch0063_00_renbu/3006_0701_01_10: Rest is an important part of training! Don’t overdo it. Take a break when you need to.

ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_1031_02_10: I should’ve known that wouldn’t go well...
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_1031_03_10: Maybe taking it easy isn’t such a bad idea...
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0701_01_10: An Ace Trainer’s Pokémon must also be an ace!
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0701_02_10: When Slaking gives it his all, he’s strong, but he doesn’t often give his best effort.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0701_03_10: He could do it if he tried, but he doesn’t, and it’s starting to affect me, too.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0702_01_10: I mean, Slaking’s laziness is really starting to rub off on me.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0702_02_10: If things keep going like this, I’m going to turn into an ace slacker.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2702_0702_03_10: Ah well. I guess we can always try harder tomorrow.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_1031_01_10: I’m an Ace Trainer. I’m very capable.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_1031_02_10: It’s OK—there’s no need to worry.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0701_01_10: I graduated from school at the top of my class, and I’ve been an Ace Trainer ever since!
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0701_02_10: But all I worried about was Pokémon, so I hardly talked to people. I’m bad at human relationships.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0701_03_10: I don’t understand how people can just challenge someone they’ve never seen before to a battle.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0702_01_10: I’m scared to even talk to people...
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0702_02_10: Then again, battling is a good way for Trainers to get to know each other.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2703_0702_03_10: You can make friends when you have Pokémon, which is a totally awesome thing about them, especially for someone like me.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_1031_02_10: Moving faster than your opponent is essential.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_1031_03_10: I want to get faster, too!
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_01_10: The faster your Pokémon is, the faster your move gauge charges!
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_02_10: So then you’re able to use more moves. That’s why speed is so important!
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_03_10: I’ve been going running with my Pokémon to raise my own speed.
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0701_04_10: I don’t really feel any different, but, uh...  I guess I’m a lot healthier!
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0702_01_10: Why does your move gauge charge quickly when your Pokémon are fast?
ch0069_00_elitem_en.lsd.ch0069_00_elitem/2704_0702_02_10: Best not to think too hard about it!  When you’re fast, it’s good! That’s all!

ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_1031_01_10: Being an Ace Trainer is lonely...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_1031_02_10: I miss the days of being a rising star.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_1031_03_10: Dreaming of someday  becoming a veteran...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_01_10: I just love Pokémon. That has always been the case.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_02_10: Before I knew it, people were calling me an Ace Trainer.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_03_10: Someday, people will call me a veteran.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0701_04_10: But for me, I’ve always liked Pokémon and that will never change.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0702_01_10: I’m called an Ace Trainer, but that doesn’t sit well with me.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2701_0702_02_10: Can’t I simply be a Pokémon fan...?
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2702_1031_02_10: I want a new Pokémon pillow...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0701_01_10: A true Ace Trainer cares about sleep.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0701_02_10: It’s important to restore the energy that you burned up throughout the day.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0701_03_10: What’s perfect for getting good sleep is using a pillow of a cute Pokémon and Musharna  as a protection against nightmares!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2702_0702_02_10: And it eats up all your bad dreams for you so you can get a good night’s sleep.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2703_1031_01_10: The future is beyond our imagination.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0701_01_10: My Xatu is always standing still.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0701_02_10: It’s because she can’t avoid the future even though she can see that it’s dark.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0701_03_10: But I don’t believe that! I promise I can change Xatu’s future!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0702_01_10: Xatu can see not only the future but also the past.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2703_0702_02_10: She knows how much effort I’ve put forth in the past and how hard I’m working now. She understands me the best!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_1031_02_10: I’m from a family of Ace Trainers. Cool, right?
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0701_01_10: My mom and my dad are both Ace Trainers!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0701_02_10: So imagine me becoming a punk girl!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0701_03_10: They were like, “Whoa. Hold up. Say what?” They got so jealous!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0702_01_10: When I told them I’m going to be a punk girl, my dad went to the mountains to find himself.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0702_02_10: And my mom went to a beach wearing a bikini! For real!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2704_0702_03_10: Once I was all alone, I thought maybe being an Ace Trainer isn’t so bad.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1031_03_10: I hope my Pokémon can get stronger!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1032_01_10: Aw, so cute... Your Pokémon, that is!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1032_02_10: The beauty of a pupa before it emerges.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_1032_03_10: The potentiality before Evolution is so beautiful.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_01_10: When your Kakuna evolves, he’ll be cool and strong!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_02_10: Really? Right now, I’m always protecting him...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_03_10: He’ll turn into a Pokémon that’s good at attacking. But he’s cute now, too!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_04_10: Yeah. But I’ll work hard so he can evolve into a cool Pokémon soon!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_05_10: No need to rush. There’s always something good at every stage.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_06_10: You can learn a lot by being creative because your Pokémon hasn’t evolved yet. It’s harder to do that after they evolve.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2751_0701_07_10: I see. So you’re learning with your Ponyta...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_1031_01_10: I don’t want to be at the center of attention...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0101_02_10: Oh, that was just me warming up. I’m not weird!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0101_03_10: Umm...let’s battle! If I win, promise me you won’t look at me with those strange eyes.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0401_01_10: You seem more fired up than I am!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0102_01_10: Ace Trainers are always confident! Battling with force and spirit!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0501_01_10: You can’t just win by force.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2861_0601_02_10: My friend who knows I’m shy came up with it. It’s quite embarrassing.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_1031_01_10: Keeps their focus and always works hard...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_1031_02_10: And gives all they’ve got in battles.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_1031_03_10: That’s the kind of Trainer I want to battle against.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0101_02_10: If you want to compete in the PML, you’ll have to defeat me first!
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0102_01_10: If you want to get strong, you must battle me.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0501_01_10: What? I lost? You must have trained really hard for this...
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0601_01_10: I’m certain you’ll rise to the top in the PML.
ch0070_00_elitef_en.lsd.ch0070_00_elitef/2863_0601_02_10: Keep your focus and continue to work hard!

ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_1031_01_10: You’ll lose in a flash if you let your guard down.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_1031_03_10: I’d love to teach you all the ins and outs.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_01_10: Pokémon battles on Pasio all depend on  how fast you can make your next move.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_02_10: You’ll get blown away if you just stand there.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_03_10: Your opponent won’t wait for you to make a decision.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_0701_04_10: Just act before you think. That’s a strategy, too!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_0702_01_10: The best way to learn is to make your body remember the feeling.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2701_0702_02_10: If you’d like, I can give you a hands-on crash course whenever you want.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_1031_01_10: You have to keep track of your Pokémon’s condition.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_1031_03_10: I should check how to help my Pokémon recover...
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_0701_01_10: Battles are all about strategy. Just attacking won’t win battles for you.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_0701_02_10: For example, some moves can cause status conditions.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_0701_03_10: You have to make sure that you have a way to cure those, too.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_0702_01_10: There are a lot of different types of status conditions.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_0702_02_10: Just like how there are all sorts of sicknesses and diseases that people can suffer from.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2702_0702_03_10: You wouldn’t take cold medicine to treat a burn, would you? You have to make sure you’re using the right item for the right status condition.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2703_1031_03_10: I personally like them to be a little classy.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_01_10: The more you love your Pokémon, the more they will respond.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_02_10: See? Look at that. The flowers she’s holding look a lot more vibrant, right?
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_03_10: Sorry, I’m so obsessed with Roserade right now!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2703_0701_04_10: So...I don’t have time for you. And I’m not sorry.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2703_0702_01_10: You’re soooo cute, Roserade! I could just watch you all day!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_1031_01_10: As your senior, let me tell you something.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_1031_02_10: It’s just great having somebody by your side.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_1031_03_10: It’s sad, but life can be  a bit lonely sometimes...
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_01_10: I always make sure to interact with my Pokémon as a real adult should.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_02_10: First, make sure you think of others’ feelings  and don’t do anything that would hurt them.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_03_10: Next, you have to stay with them. Make sure they don’t get lonely without you.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_0701_05_10: I’m an adult, but that doesn’t make a difference. Whether you’re an adult or a child—that doesn’t matter to your Pokémon.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2704_0702_01_10: Of course, there are a lot of grown-up Trainers that can’t even do that.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_1031_01_10: We look like mother and child?
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_1031_03_10: I miss when I was like that, too...
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_1032_01_10: I wanna grow up  to be like you!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_1032_02_10: Having a servant is a status symbol!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_1032_03_10: I think my Pokémon is the best!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_01_10: The Pokémon I trained are super-duper strong!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_02_10: Oh, really? That’s exciting! Do you want to have a battle?
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_03_10: Yeah! If I win, you have to be my servant!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_05_10: An older, pretty servant like you would be a good status symbol!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2751_0701_06_10: Is this young naïveté? Is this little girl serious?
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/1901_0101_01_10: Mmm, I felt eyes on me. Let me show you how a battle’s done.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/1901_0601_01_10: I have that bad habit of thinking I have the upper hand, and I always fall flat.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/1901_0601_03_10: But I know I’ll forget these mistakes by tomorrow and lather, rinse, repeat... That’s me.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_1031_02_10: I pride myself on my beautiful and dignified Pokémon battles.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_1031_03_10: We have to be beautiful no matter where we are.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0101_01_10: I’ll be the judge of whether you’re beautiful or not.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0101_02_10: Now, try to bedazzle me with a Pokémon battle!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0102_01_10: What I want is a polished and beautiful Pokémon battle.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0102_02_10: Now, try to bedazzle me with a Pokémon battle!
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0601_01_10: So beautiful that I was entranced by you.
ch0071_00_otona_en.lsd.ch0071_00_otona/2863_0601_02_10: Thank you for showing me such a splendid bond.

ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_1031_01_10: I always end up buying things for my Pokémon...
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_1031_02_10: There’s just so many things I can buy, I can never  make up my mind.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_01_10: Have you been to the shop in the Pokémon Center yet?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_02_10: Their selection is really good, so I end up buying a lot!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0701_03_10: I always take a peek when I’m at the Pokémon Center. Shopping is the best, isn’t it?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0702_01_10: I’m buying supplies for my Pokémon!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2702_0702_02_10: Fortune favors the prepared, after all!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_01_10: How is this possible? I chose the perfect pair!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_02_10: The perfectly cool pair of swim trunks!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_03_10: I spent all day trying all my trunks on to finally choose this pair!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_04_10: So how is this possible? I’m the exact same as all the other swimmers!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0701_05_10: Everybody has the exact same pair of my perfect trunks!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0702_01_10: No, wait. All of us have an undying love for the ocean.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2703_0702_02_10: So of course we’d have the same clothing taste! We are all siblings of the sea!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_01_10: You have to warm up before going into the water. That’s basic.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_02_10: Once you have the basics down, next comes application!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0701_03_10: Float on the water and relax! Pretend you’re a Tentacool, and let the water refresh you!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0702_01_10: Once you’re recovered, give it your all like a Basculin!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2704_0702_02_10: *pant pant* I’m beat! That’s enough image training for today!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_1031_01_10: I want to be that free.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_1031_02_10: But I’m too conscious of other people.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_01_10: Do you feel that wind, too? Doesn’t it embrace your whole body?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_02_10: He’s so dreamy... I wish I could live as freely as he did.
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_03_10: You only live once! And I’m going to live free, just as a swimmer should!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_04_10: I worry too much about my parents’ expectations and how others see me...
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_05_10: The only thing you have to worry about is whether you’re living true to yourself!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_06_10: I decided! I’m going to become a swimmer, too!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/2751_0701_07_10: I want my life to be something that I can proudly call my own!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0101_01_10: I am good at breaststroke, freestyle, butterfly...and, of course, Pokémon battles!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0501_01_10: Did I just lose a Pokémon battle, even though I’m so good at them?
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0601_01_10: Wow, you’re strong! I even trained with backstroke and diving!
ch0072_00_kaipan_en.lsd.ch0072_00_kaipan/1903_0601_02_10: Fine, I’ll swim with a Wailmer on my back from now on for training.

ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_01_10: To establish a bond, I have to... Hi-yah! Whew... That’s enough for today!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_02_10: Sorry, I’m trying something out here!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_03_10: When a Trainer and their Pokémon make  a real bond as a sync pair, an amazing  special move will activate...or so I hear!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_04_10: Right now, I’m training to activate it! Hi-yah!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_01_10: Apparently these special moves have  different effects depending on  the sync pair that uses them.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_02_10: Almost like the bond that is born from the clash of spirit to spirit and fist to fist!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_03_10: So, the key must be found in training! Hi-yah!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_1031_01_10: An opponent with such high defenses...
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_1031_02_10: We’ve trained to handle opponents with low defenses!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_01_10: A good offense is the greatest strength! It’s what my Pokémon and I train for every day!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_02_10: Because we train our offense so much, low defenses are no challenge! Battle us whenever!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_03_10: But an opponent with BIG defenses makes things difficult! That’s our biggest weakness!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_01_10: When you master one thing, another becomes your weakness.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_02_10: And recently, all of the opponents that challenge me have had very high defense!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_03_10: High defenses are my weakness! How does everybody know my weakness!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_01_10: I’m going to train in the fiercest of rain or the scorchiest of heat!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_03_10: I finally met my idol, the Karate King! And not only did he battle me—he even gave me a Pokémon!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_04_10: I am at the peak of happiness! I’d follow him for life!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_05_10: That is...if I hadn’t lost sight of him! So instead, I just started training again.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0702_01_10: You can train anywhere and anytime!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2703_0702_02_10: This Pokémon isn’t the only thing I got from the Karate King, after all! Life lessons count, too!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_01_10: You, human that uses Pokémon... Can you understand my words?
