ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_03_10: Ha ha ha! I surprised you, didn’t I! I was actually in a movie a long time ago!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_04_10: It wasn’t an easy gig for anyone, but the lead actor was amazing!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_05_10: The movie didn’t exactly go according to script, but he never gave up and kept redoing his shots. I consider him my mentor!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0702_01_10: I make sure to train as both a Trainer and an actor every day!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2704_0702_02_10: But whenever I’m acting, nobody talks to me!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_1031_01_10: Come on, now. You’re trying to overcome this, aren’t you?
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_1031_03_10: It’ll be OK, though! Don’t worry about it!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_02_10: Come on, buddy! I’m here with you! We’ll get through this together!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_03_10: A long time ago...when I was still a security guard for the gift shop...
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_04_10: Uh...yeah. You told me that part already.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_05_10: A frighteningly strong opponent... But it was because of that that I decided to try to reach the top!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_06_10: Yeah, that’s the ticket! I’ll help you, too! You’ll be fine, buddy!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_07_10: But I’m still scared of Hyper Beam!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0101_01_10: I just won a battle, so I’m feeling good!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0501_02_10: Oh, whatever! I’m in a terrible mood now!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_01_10: I think I’m gonna go to bed...
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_02_10: I’m not strong enough to be able to get right back up and try again.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_03_10: Uh, well, you know... I’m grateful for you battling me!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1902_0101_01_10: Muahaha! My hobby is to beat Trainers on their way to what lies ahead!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1902_0601_01_10: Rather than enjoying defeating someone, should I aim higher?
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1902_0601_02_10: It’s probably people with that kind of attitude who gather for the PML.
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0101_01_10: Err... I wasn’t sleeping! Let’s battle!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0501_02_10: This can’t be happening! This must be a dream!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0601_01_10: I was careless, but being half-asleep isn’t a good enough excuse!
ch0073_00_karate_en.lsd.ch0073_00_karate/1903_0601_02_10: I mean...I wasn’t asleep! I swear! It’s not true!

ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_1031_01_10: These shorts are a badge of honor!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_1031_03_10: I really wish I could put  shorts on Pokémon, too.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0701_02_10: You might skin yourself if you fall,  and it would hurt.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0701_03_10: But you can’t deny how comfortable they are!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0701_04_10: I wish I could put shorts on my Pokémon, too.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0702_01_10: Wintertime? Of course! I wear shorts then, too!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2701_0702_02_10: After all, shorts are the coolest  and the comfiest!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_1031_01_10: So many legs...  How should I do this?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_1031_03_10: The two of us are gonna go the distance!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0701_01_10: Isn’t my Ariados cool? I met her in the forest, and she’s been my partner ever since!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0701_02_10: I want to put a pair of shorts on her...
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0701_03_10: But with her having so many legs,  I don’t know how to put them on.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0702_01_10: Do they even make shorts with  more than two leg holes in them?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2702_0702_02_10: Where could I find them... Do you think any stores on Pasio would sell them?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1031_01_10: You’re always whining! Jeez, that’s all you do!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1031_02_10: My little brother is so rebellious!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1031_03_10: He used to be adorable, like a doll...
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1032_01_10: My sister and I used to be really close.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1032_02_10: But lately, she keeps nagging me.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_1032_03_10: I wish she would be nicer to me.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_01_10: Why do you always only wear skirts?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_02_10: Well, why do you only wear shorts?
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_03_10: Shorts are the only things I have to wear.  I don’t have anything else.
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_04_10: Shorts are my thing—and they’re my favorite!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_06_10: I’ve got an idea! Let’s trade!
ch0074_00_tanpan_en.lsd.ch0074_00_tanpan/2751_0701_07_10: No way! Are you crazy?!  Your skirt is all open and frilly!

ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_1031_01_10: A beautiful thing can also be poisonous.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_1031_02_10: Ahh... I wish I could feel them...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_01_10: Mareanie’s got the most gorgeous tentacles... It’s like an art piece!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_02_10: But they’re poisonous, so when other Pokémon touch them, they faint.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_05_10: Even if your Pokémon is poisoned or paralyzed, you can use items or moves to heal it!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0702_01_10: But you can’t heal Trainers with items or moves.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0702_02_10: What if a Trainer were to become poisoned? What would you do?!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_01_10: I totally know how you feel.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_02_10: It’s important to have a place to relax...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_03_10: Same goes for Trainers and Pokémon...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_01_10: Try to really understand your Pokémon.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_02_10: For example, Pokémon that have excellent Water-type moves can use those moves even in deserts or forests.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_03_10: But Pokémon that like water are happiest when they’re close to water.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_04_10: You have your favorite spot, right? So do Pokémon!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0702_02_10: Even after an exhausting adventure, once you come home, you feel restored.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_1031_03_10: I should scout some sync pairs.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_01_10: When I feel lonely, I like making new friends to go on adventures with.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_02_10: You seem a bit lonely, so I’ll let you in on a little secret.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_03_10: If you go to the Pokémon Center shop, you might find friends there!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_04_10: Not that I’m asking you to be my friend, but...
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0702_01_10: I hope you get to meet lots of new people as you travel.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0702_02_10: If I happen to be one of them... *cough* Oh, nothing... Never mind.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1031_01_10: What’s he doing with that Poké Ball?
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1031_02_10: Does he not know how things work on Pasio?
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1032_02_10: Maybe it doesn’t like the way I throw my Poké Ball.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1032_03_10: Do I need to try harder?
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_01_10: Dude, every time I try to catch a Pokémon, people interfere with me.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_02_10: Um, you’re not serious, are you? This joke’s gone on long enough, bro.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_03_10: What? Come on, don’t say that. Gimme some advice!
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_04_10: To begin with, there are no wild Pokémon on Pasio.
ch0075_00_bikini_en.lsd.ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_06_10: How have you not noticed that? All of the Pokémon are with Trainers.

ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_01_10: I want to fill in the blank spots in my Pokédex.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_02_10: I just can’t find some Legendary Pokémon.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_1031_03_10: Where in the world could they be?
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_01_10: I mean, if I’m going to call myself a collector, I at least want some Legendary Pokémon!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_02_10: That’s why I’m out here traveling the world.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_03_10: But for some reason, somebody always gets there ahead of me.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0701_04_10: I wonder if it could be the same person that’s catching them all.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0702_01_10: Couldn’t somebody sneak a Legendary Pokémon onto Pasio for me?
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2701_0702_02_10: I’d be happy to just register it in my Pokédex. Isn’t there anybody out there who can help me...
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_01_10: You can’t just be sweet to your Pokémon all the time.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_02_10: I’ve got a Ponyta as well as a Blastoise.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_1031_03_10: I’m scared of fires, you know.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_02_10: I’d really like to keep him indoors.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_03_10: But I’m too afraid of starting a fire, so I can’t.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0701_04_10: As long as Blastoise is around, we can put out any fire.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0702_01_10: But when Blastoise is around, the whole house gets flooded.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2702_0702_02_10: Ooh, I know! I should just get a Vanilluxe to freeze all the water!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_1031_02_10: My curiosity can never be satisfied!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_01_10: Pokémon from all over the world have gathered here for the PML.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_02_10: My goal is to see as many different Pokémon as I can!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_03_10: I wonder what kind of Pokémon I’ll spot next.
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0701_04_10: Just thinking about it is making me crazy excited!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0702_01_10: I hope I can meet a Trainer who has a Legendary Pokémon!
ch0076_00_collector_en.lsd.ch0076_00_collector/2704_0702_02_10: If you know anyone who has one, you have to tell me, OK?!

ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_01_10: Pikachu? Does anybody have a Pikachu?
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_02_10: I want to meet one and rub cheeks with it...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_1031_03_10: This is an isle of dreams.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_02_10: Just by raising a Pikachu, you’d become the center of attention.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_03_10: There aren’t any Trainers with Pikachu  back where I’m from, but I’m sure  I can meet one on Pasio!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0701_04_10: That’s what makes Pasio the island of dreams!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0702_01_10: I think the secret to a Pikachu’s cuteness comes from its tail.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2701_0702_02_10: It zigs like this and zags like that. It’s just way too cute!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_1031_02_10: Look how he’s playing  with his ball.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_01_10: I wish I were the ball that my Seel is playing with.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_02_10: Roll me around, frolic with me, and ignore me.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0701_03_10: Do you understand my feelings? You do, right? That’s how much I love my Seel!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0702_01_10: I don’t care if he loses interest in me and forgets me.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2702_0702_02_10: In fact, because I’m there as a point of comparison, Seel looks that much cuter!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_1031_01_10: I want this... but I want that, too...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_1031_03_10: I know I have to watch my spending, but...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_01_10: Buying things at the shop is my favorite pastime!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_02_10: If I see any new Pokémon goods, I can’t help but buy them.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_03_10: If I hear something’s a limited edition, I hold nothing back!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0701_04_10: I can make money whenever, but I can only get limited editions then and there!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0702_01_10: But of course I think money is important.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2703_0702_02_10: If I didn’t have money, I wouldn’t be able to buy new goods!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_1031_02_10: Hmm, would like to make my partner stronger...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_1031_03_10: Need to coordinate with my team, though...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_01_10: Are you using the café? You can make your partner stronger or edit your team there.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_02_10: It’s great that it’s in the Pokémon Center and we can use it whenever we want!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0701_03_10: Go there with your Pokémon and relax sometime!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0702_01_10: Heh heh. You know, I enjoy sitting at the café and watching the Trainers come into the Pokémon Center with their Pokémon.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2704_0702_02_10: A lot of Trainers walk around with their Pokémon out of their Poké Balls. This place is great!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1031_02_10: I must not have enough love for my Pokémon.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1031_03_10: I have so much to learn from a Poké Fan.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_01_10: Pokémon aren’t just creatures to catch.
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_02_10: As long as you can stay with your Pokémon...
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_1032_03_10: then they can be a part of your collection!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_02_10: Wow, this many! That is amazing!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_03_10: If you love Pokémon like I do, this much is easy!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_04_10: But there aren’t any wild Pokémon here, right?
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_05_10: You don’t have to catch them. If you become friends with me, you can play with my Pokémon whenever you like!
ch0077_00_daisukim_en.lsd.ch0077_00_daisukim/2751_0701_07_10: Come over to my house sometime. We have plenty to talk about!

ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_01_10: This and that... Oh, and that, too...
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_02_10: Preparation is key before an adventure.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_1031_03_10: Be diligent! Every ranger knows that!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_01_10: I’m a Pokémon Ranger! I’ll protect the peace of Pasio!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_02_10: You’re going on an adventure, too, huh? Then you must prepare!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_03_10: Even when your Pokémon are dependable, you can’t just count on them.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0701_04_10: Call me as soon as you’re in danger! I’ll come rescue you!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_01_10: Giving up when you know that the adventure is too arduous is also important.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_02_10: Only Pokémon Rangers never give up— even when the situation seems impossible!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2701_0702_03_10: It’s because if I give up, it means that I’m giving up on somebody else.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_01_10: Grass-type moves are gentle on the skin.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_02_10: Nature means grass, and grass means beauty!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_1031_03_10: Being one with nature means silky smooth skin.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_01_10: My Bayleef’s aromatherapy is truly excellent!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_02_10: Apparently, the spicy aroma emitted from the buds makes the skin smooth and supple.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0701_03_10: That’s why Pokémon Rangers are young and beautiful!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0702_01_10: Bayleef is such a good Pokémon. She thrives on praise!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2702_0702_02_10: But if I praise her too much, she sometimes gets bashful and uses Tackle on me.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_1031_01_10: I swiftly come to the rescue of those in need.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_1031_03_10: Even in deep forests, be sure not to miss anything!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_01_10: I have great eyesight! I can see faraway objects even in the forest.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_02_10: My good vision comes in handy in battles, too! I can aim well and hit the target with moves.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_03_10: But moves that are difficult sometimes tend to be more powerful.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0701_04_10: To fight with certitude, or to aim for a single blow—that is the question...
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0702_01_10: Oftentimes, powerful moves tend to miss the target when it’s a critical moment.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2704_0702_02_10: But Pokémon are the ones using the moves, so perhaps my vision doesn’t matter so much?
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1031_01_10: It’s great to live in nature!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1031_03_10: I hope to be one when I grow up.
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1032_02_10: It’s adorable that you admire me!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_1032_03_10: I have to teach you a lot!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_01_10: What’s needed in a Pokémon Ranger is a strong sense of justice!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_02_10: And respect for and understanding of nature and Pokémon!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_04_10: Camping is especially great since you get to directly experience nature!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_05_10: Learning from a camper about proper clothing and gear is also useful!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_06_10: If so, will I no longer be called a “lass”...?
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/2751_0701_07_10: An identity crisis! Could this be a challenge I have to overcome in order to become a Pokémon Ranger?!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0101_01_10: Will you be able to face the majesty of nature?
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0501_01_10: I believe that you can face it!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_01_10: Your Pokémon have such genuine eyes!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_02_10: You can overcome anything when you’re with your Pokémon!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1901_0601_03_10: That kind of relationship is very important. You have a good match!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1902_0101_01_10: It’s the law of the jungle that prevails in nature! I’ll take a bite out of you!
ch0078_00_rangerf_en.lsd.ch0078_00_rangerf/1902_0601_01_10: The law of the jungle is real. You have to be creative if you want to beat stronger opponents.

ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_1031_02_10: Yup! I looked so cute just now!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_1031_03_10: Look at me! I need compliments!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_01_10: Ooh, so cute! Soooo cute! And stylish! I love it, I love it, I love it!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_02_10: I’m complimenting myself and my Pokémon to get us fired up.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_03_10: I can’t be outdone by these Pasio party girls!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0701_04_10: My Pokémon and I are the cutest in the world!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0702_01_10: I get to decide what’s stylish and what’s not, by the way.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2701_0702_02_10: The same way I choose whatever Pokémon I like to accompany me around, I choose to wear whatever fashion I like.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_01_10: She’s so cute when she tilts her head to the side.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_02_10: Her teeth are nice and straight, and she doesn’t have any cavities!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_1031_03_10: Uh-oh! Did I scare you? Oh, I’m sorry. I know you don’t like scary things.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0701_02_10: That’s because I brush her beautiful, sharp fangs every day!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0701_04_10: Cleanliness is very important, after all!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0702_01_10: My Granbull is such a timid little princess.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2702_0702_02_10: She likes to look her best, but she gets scared when people stare.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_1031_02_10: I can’t be afraid. I have to try to be nice.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_1031_03_10: I want to make friends. Just need some courage...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_02_10: The Pokémon Center is where all the latest trends start, so there’s always a lot of people.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_03_10: You can usually see some friends, and there will always be people you don’t know.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0701_04_10: If there’s someone you’re interested in, maybe you can make friends with them. You need the courage to talk to them first, though...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0702_01_10: I got up the courage to say something, but I forgot to ask if we could be friends.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2703_0702_02_10: But if I keep going to the Pokémon Center, I’m sure I’ll get another chance!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_01_10: Can’t be burned, huh? That’s pretty surprising.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_02_10: I wonder, is there anything more fashionable?
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_1031_03_10: With a passive skill,  I’ll be a very capable girl.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_01_10: Once you and your Pokémon get strong enough, you’ll learn a passive skill.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_02_10: Passive skills are special capabilities of sync pairs. They can stop you from being burned and stuff.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0701_03_10: I can’t wait to see what passive skill we’ll learn!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0702_01_10: If I had a passive skill that kept me from being burned...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2704_0702_02_10: maybe I could drink hot coffee without cooling it off first!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1031_02_10: Emotes can say way more than words can.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1031_03_10: I use waaay too many emotes...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_01_10: I dream about emotes all day long...
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_02_10: Sometimes I spam them during battles.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_1032_03_10: I’m totally hooked on emote spamming!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_01_10: When you want to communicate during a Pokémon battle, emotes are totally super useful.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_03_10: Oh, you do?! We’re, like, so good together!
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_04_10: You can literally say anything with emotes, like “TYVM!” or “Yeet!” or “Hundo P!”
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_06_10: Maybe we should, like, just talk with emotes?
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/2751_0701_07_10: I think that may be a little too much.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0101_01_10: Hey! Look me in the eyes! There! All right—let’s battle.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0601_01_10: When Trainers’ eyes meet, it might be time for a Pokémon battle.
ch0079_00_miniskirt_en.lsd.ch0079_00_miniskirt/1902_0601_02_10: Or I’ve also heard that you might fall in love.

ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_01_10: Ga ha ha! The mountains and oceans of Pasio!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_02_10: Where there is nature, you will find a hiker!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_03_10: I don’t even need clothes! I want to feel nature with my whole body!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_01_10: Not just the mountains. The volcanoes, forests, caves, and glaciers...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_02_10: Pasio is such a colorful place!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_03_10: I can hardly believe that this island is completely man-made!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_04_10: I bet a lot of Pokémon helped in building it!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0702_01_10: Pasio isn’t an exception. Other places all have their strong points, too!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0702_02_10: And you have to feel that with your whole body! That is real exploring; that is real adventure!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_1031_02_10: His tiny hands are so charming, too...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_1031_03_10: And when he tries to hug you, he vibrates.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_01_10: My partner is Palpitoad. He’s the Vibration Pokémon. He makes crying children tremble!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_02_10: If you hug him, you can feel his stomach vibrating.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_03_10: He’s a lot more effective than an ab stimulator!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_04_10: He’s also cool and damp in the summer, so I can’t recommend this Pokémon enough!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0702_01_10: Palpitoad has a very charming face, doesn’t he?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0702_02_10: Whenever I see his face,  I can’t help but feel at ease.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_01_10: Rock-type Pokémon are the embodiment of adventurous spirit!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_02_10: Ruggedness! Real outdoorsmen ought to be rugged!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_03_10: Strength of mind and body is vital in the outdoors!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_01_10: Yeah, no matter how you shake it,  I like Rock-type Pokémon.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_02_10: It helps that I see them the most when hiking in the mountains, but that’s not the only reason.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_03_10: More than anything, it’s those rugged bodies.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_04_10: Take a look at a Golem, and you’ll know what I’m talking about.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0702_01_10: Rock types are hard, sure,  but they aren’t invincible.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0702_02_10: But I think that just adds to their charm.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_01_10: I want to know more tricks on climbing.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_02_10: I suppose I should ask a grown-up.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_03_10: I want to hear more from Mr. Hiker.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1032_02_10: it makes my heart sing to see young people interested in hiking.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1032_03_10: Pokémon that are born on the mountains are strong.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_01_10: Learn the routes that Pokémon on the mountain use! That makes so much sense!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_02_10: Ga ha ha! The same can be said for the oceans and forests, too!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_03_10: There are even stories from other places in which wild Pokémon help lost children get home.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_04_10: I really have to watch for more Pokémon on my travels...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_05_10: Make sure you ask other Trainers for advice, too. And if you want to know about mountains, I’ll answer any of your questions!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_06_10: Thank you so much! Let’s go hiking together sometime!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_07_10: I like it! You remind me of myself when I was younger!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0101_01_10: I’m a hiker... I might be big, but I’m a coward...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0101_02_10: I guess we can have a Pokémon battle if you want, but go easy on me, OK?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0501_01_10: I asked you to go easy on me...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0601_01_10: Could you be a little...nicer next time?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0101_01_10: I’m chasing my dream, and I’m fighting for a victory!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0601_01_10: My dream is to research the artificial mountains on Pasio so I can create my own someday!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0601_02_10: Ha ha ha! That’s right. Men are hopeless romantics no matter how old they get.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_1031_02_10: Live on the mountain, and love the mountain.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_01_10: Ga ha ha! Aren’t the mountains great?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_02_10: The air is clean, and the waters are crystal clear!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_03_10: And the Pokémon battles are hot! Right?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0401_01_10: That’s the ticket! Here I go!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0102_01_10: Ga ha ha! The mountains are great! The greenery is beautiful! The clouds are beautiful!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0102_02_10: Pokémon battles really are hot, aren’t they.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko_en.lsd.ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0601_01_10: I guess I still have a ways to go!

ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_01_10: I have so many friends, I can’t play with them all!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_02_10: I’m friends with everybody, and everybody’s friends with me!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_1031_03_10: Pokémon are my friends, too! I like my friends.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_01_10: My mommy says that friends are like stars. You don’t always see them, but you know they are there.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_02_10: Did you know you can make friends with people you play with?
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_03_10: It would be cool if I could make 100 friends...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0701_04_10: Oh boy! If I really do make 100 friends, how will I remember everybody’s names?!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0702_01_10: If I have a Pokémon battle with 100 different friends starting right now...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2701_0702_02_10: I think I’ll be a grown-up before I get to the last person! That would take forever!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_1031_03_10: And their abs are like ice cube trays!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_01_10: When I grow up, I wanna be big and strong like Machamp.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_02_10: What if I could beat Machamp at arm wrestling? That would be so cool!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0701_04_10: I could even give a Machamp a piggyback ride!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0702_01_10: There’s probably so much cool stuff I can do once I’m a grown-up.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2702_0702_02_10: But...I still want Machamp to pick me up and hold me even when I’m big.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_01_10: I like playing hide-and-seek with Daddy’s Pidgeot.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_02_10: No matter how far I run, Pidgeot catches up!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_1031_03_10: Whizzing through the sky is the best!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_01_10: My daddy’s Pidgeot is the bestest Pidgeot ever!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_02_10: Even when I hide really good, it always finds me right away!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0701_03_10: And...and it even lets me ride it high up where the clouds are!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0702_01_10: Daddy says Pidgeot spoils me too much.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2703_0702_02_10: But it doesn’t matter, ’cause Pidgeot always takes my side! Tee-hee! Just don’t tell Daddy... It’s a secret!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_1031_01_10: You shouldn’t treat people like they’re little kids.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_1031_02_10: I’m a kid...but I act just like a grown-up!
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_01_10: You shouldn’t judge people by the way they look.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_02_10: Sure, I may look like a little preschooler...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0701_03_10: but I’m actually... Well, I’m actually still only four, so I guess I am a preschooler just like I look...
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_01_10: You know how one day, Pokémon evolve and change the way they look?
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_02_10: One day, I’m gonna evolve into a grown-up, just like that.
ch0081_00_enjif_en.lsd.ch0081_00_enjif/2704_0702_03_10: It’ll be really exciting but also really sad. I guess that’s life, though, huh.

ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_01_10: If you use an attack type that your opponent’s Pokémon is weak against...
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_02_10: You can do a lot of damage!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_03_10: But I found a type that is stronger than all other types.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0701_04_10: That is the adorable type! Adorableness is the best! Adorableness is divine!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0702_01_10: When I’m observing Pokémon, sometimes they try to run away.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2701_0702_02_10: They are so cute how they get shy, too!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_1031_01_10: Pokémon might walk on this road!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_1031_02_10: We should put a garbage can around here...
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_1031_03_10: I gotta clean this up for the Pokémon!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0701_01_10: Somebody threw garbage on the ground here... Over there, too!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0701_02_10: Pasio is a public space. It’s for everybody to use.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0701_03_10: And then you get these selfish punks who think  they can litter like it’s their own backyard!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0702_01_10: There was so much litter here until a bit ago, but it’s all clean now...
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2703_0702_02_10: I guess there are others that care for the Pokémon and the island as much as I do.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_1031_01_10: Mercy! I do declare—I might start growing ears like Liepard!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_1031_03_10: And I’m still on my way up with Liepard!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0701_01_10: I’ve heard that if you’re close to someone, you start taking on the same habits.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0701_02_10: Well, I make sure to do my nails and groom  myself at the same time that Liepard does.
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0701_03_10: And look at me now. I am fabulooouuus!
ch0082_00_kowai_en.lsd.ch0082_00_kowai/2702_0702_02_10: Show me how to be more like you!

ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_1031_02_10: I’m so booored! Calling all bored people! Let’s do something!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_1031_03_10: Come out, come out, wherever you are!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_02_10: Ooh, a new face! I don’t think we’ve met before. Probably. Most likely. Sure!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_03_10: I’m just your average punk girl! But it seems like fate wanted us to meet, huh. Welp, nice to meet you!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_04_10: Ooh! You’ve got a Pokémon with you, right? We should, like, hang out! I’ve got nothing better to do!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0702_02_10: Don’t be shy, pip-squeak! C’mon, have a chat.  We’re all brothers and sisters here!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_01_10: I wonder if my Dusclops is OK...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_02_10: Who can guess what she’s thinking... It’s pointless.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_03_10: Does that, like, make me a nihilist? Whatever.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_01_10: Dusclops doesn’t really make sense to me. Like, what’s going on in that head of hers?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_02_10: It feels empty. Like it’s just a dark void in there.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_03_10: I guess that’s fine, though... After all, the one with a dark void in her heart is ME! Ahahaha!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0702_01_10: What I DO know about this little enigma is that she loves me.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0702_02_10: And, well, I love her, too. And, like, just having that friendship is enough for us.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_01_10: Facing Pokémon with high Special Defense is, like,  a hard-core challenge.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_02_10: Facing Pokémon with low Special Defense is a total breeze though.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_03_10: My Gengar and I have  been hittin’ the books!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_01_10: I, like, really want my Gengar to win more battles.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_02_10: And, like, when I asked my teacher about it, she told me Gengar’s got really high Special Attack and stuff.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_03_10: So, like, against a Pokémon with low Special Defense, Gengar’ll be super strong, I guess.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_04_10: I mean, I wish she woulda told me that sooner, though. Coulda saved Gengar some trouble.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0702_01_10: So, like, I think all this studyin’ is startin’ to help us win.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0702_02_10: Makes me wanna study harder, ya know? I mean, we must be doing somethin’ right.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_1031_01_10: I wonder if I could, like, move here to Pasio... Is that possible?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_1031_03_10: I just wanna stay here and have fun forever...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_01_10: I got transported here to Pasio before I really knew what was happening, and now I’m competing in the PML...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_02_10: but, like, when the tournament’s over, we’ll all have to go back home, right?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_03_10: After hangin’ out with all the cool people here, goin’ explorin’ all the time... I don’t wanna leave.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_04_10: I’d, like, totally swap sides and be a host or something... I could welcome other people to Pasio, ya know?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_01_10: Yep! I made my decision! Talkin’ to my parents about it isn’t gonna be very fun, though.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_02_10: But ya know what? This is what I wanna do! And I’m gonna convince them I made the right decision!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_03_10: Makin’ my way up in the ranks o’ this tournament should help my cause, too, yeah?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1031_03_10: Heh heh... They like to hang out with their friends!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1032_01_10: Did you just wing it? Wait, this one’s bat-ter... Sink your teeth into this!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1032_02_10: What’s the first thing little Crobat learn at school?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_01_10: What? Not even a giggle? I doubt you could do any better...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_05_10: Hmm... You’ve got me there! I dunno! What keeps them going?
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_07_10: *sigh* And I had such high hopes for that one...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0101_01_10: Ugh! I just can’t! It’s driving me crazy!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0101_02_10: HOW is my Pokémon this cute?!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0501_01_10: My Pokémon is so cute, it hurts... So pretty and lovely, even when we lose!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0601_01_10: This Pokémon is gonna ruin me— I know it... It’s just too darn cute! I can’t help but spoil it rotten.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0601_02_10: I know it’s bad to spoil your Pokémon— my parents spoiled me and look how I turned out! I just can’t help it...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0101_01_10: Wh-why are you looking at me like that! I didn’t do anything!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0501_01_10: I haven’t done anything bad! I swear! C’mon, it’s the truth!
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_01_10: Sorry... Sometimes I just get this feeling that, like, everybody around me hates me and looks down on me.
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_02_10: They get scared, and their first reaction is to challenge me to a Pokémon battle...
ch0083_00_badgirl_en.lsd.ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_03_10: I think my fashion’s super cute, not scary! But I guess it gives people the wrong idea sometimes...

ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_1031_01_10: My battle strategy is different from others...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_1031_02_10: Whittle them down with status conditions...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_01_10: There are numerous methods for fighting in a Pokémon battle!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_02_10: Dominating the battlefield with powerful attacks is one way, but using logic and strategy can win battles as well.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_03_10: Pokémon that seem weak at a glance can actually be very effective in battle by utilizing status conditions and stat changes!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0701_04_10: That’s the strategy my Pokémon and I often use when we battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_01_10: Even if you don’t have a type advantage over your opponent, it’s still possible to triumph!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_02_10: Pokémon battles aren’t just about raw strength—they’re about strategy, too.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2701_0702_03_10: That’s the focus of my research, actually, and it’s why I’ve come to participate in the PML!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0701_02_10: They also happen to share an uncanny resemblance to a Poké Ball! I’ve always wondered why that is!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0701_03_10: In fact, I’ve dedicated my research to solving that very mystery!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2702_0702_01_10: Which came first, the Voltorb or the Poké Ball...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_01_10: Pssst. I’ve got some intel. Want some intel?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_02_10: It’s really good intel. Believe me—it’s good.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_1031_03_10: It’s super top secret intel about that professor.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_01_10: Ah, hello there, Trainer. As thanks for coming over to chat, I’ll give you some useful information.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_02_10: Combining certain moves together can give you an incredible advantage in battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_03_10: If you try using low-accuracy moves after using Telekinesis on a Pokémon...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_04_10: you’ll find that even the low-accuracy moves will be mysteriously on-target!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0701_05_10: So? Was that helpful for you?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0702_01_10: Try experimenting with different combinations the next time you battle!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2703_0702_02_10: I guarantee your battling will be even more enjoyable!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1031_01_10: There’s way too much stuff I know nothing about.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1031_02_10: It would take forever  to research it all. There’s  no way I’m doing that!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_01_10: Why don’t people ever use them?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_02_10: If you simply TRIED using one, you’d see how convenient they are!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_1032_03_10: I gotta spread the word... People need to know.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_01_10: Tell me—why doesn’t anyone bother to read level-up manuals?! They’re extremely useful!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_02_10: Huh? What are you talking about? I’ve never heard of a level-up manual.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_03_10: If you train using level-up manuals, you can  gain experience without having to battle! Convenient, right?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_04_10: Interesting... So where can I get ahold of those? Can I buy them somewhere?
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_05_10: They’re available for purchase at the shop, but you can also receive them as a log-in bonus sometimes!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_06_10: Really? I might already have some, then...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2751_0701_07_10: Why don’t you try checking your bag? See if you have any level-up manuals you can train with!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_1031_01_10: Heehee, it’s time to collect my precious samples...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_1031_02_10: Careful not to step on the samples at your feet.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_1031_03_10: I’m in the middle of some significant research here...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0101_01_10: Science happens wherever scientists are present!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0101_02_10: Namely, this very place, which contains things I’d very much like to research! So do not come any closer!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0101_03_10: I’d like to immerse myself in my research now, so I’ll be eliminating you from my vicinity. Prepare to battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0401_01_10: Time to eliminate the overly enthusiastic youngster!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0302_01_10: If I’m in your way, I can leave...
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0402_01_10: It seems you can take a hint. I like that.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0102_01_10: Would you KINDLY refrain from stomping all over my precious research samples?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0102_02_10: I’d like to immerse myself in my research now, so I’ll be eliminating you from my vicinity. Prepare to battle.
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0501_01_10: You DARE take research away from a scientist?!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0601_01_10: Arrrgh! I said don’t step there! You’ll ruin my precious research samples!
ch0084_00_kenkyuin_en.lsd.ch0084_00_kenkyuin/2861_0601_02_10: I mean it! Don’t come anywhere near my vicinity!

ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_01_10: Power is important, but support is, too, right?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_02_10: I’m not alone. I’m going to do my best with my friends.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_1031_03_10: I want to live up to everybody’s expectations.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_01_10: My Pokémon and I specialize  in healing and raising stats!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_02_10: I’m not really good at attacking,  but leave support to me!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0701_03_10: I always come through in the end!  You can count on me!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0702_01_10: If things aren’t going well, just remember me...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2701_0702_02_10: because I’ll always be in your heart! Ha ha! Just kidding!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_01_10: Keep your hopes and dreams in your heart!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_02_10: Let them shine bright like a rising star!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_1031_03_10: You can keep going! Don’t look back!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_01_10: I know the kind of Trainer that I ultimately  want to become...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_02_10: and even if my goal seems impossible,  I’ll never give up hope!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_03_10: I’ll reach my dreams and surpass them!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0701_04_10: That will be my life’s work!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0702_01_10: If you ever lose sight of your dreams...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2702_0702_02_10: just remember the person you wanted to be. Envision the future self you aspired to become.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_01_10: I hope I can make a lot of new friends on Pasio, too!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_02_10: New friends just make us betta, y’know?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_1031_03_10: Havin’ a rival is always wicked cool, too!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_01_10: Ya gotta watch your buddies’ backs!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_02_10: Whetha it’s with a Pokémon or anotha Trainer, the powa of bonds is wicked strong.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_03_10: I mean, when yiz pull off a sync move? Aw, just fugget about it!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0701_04_10: And more importantly, it’s just wicked fun!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0702_01_10: Yiz and me? Yeah, we’re already friends!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2703_0702_02_10: Ah, but yiz my rival, too. Don’t yiz fugget that!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_1031_01_10: I can do this! We can do this!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_1031_02_10: I just can’t get enough of Pokémon battles!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_01_10: I lost a battle the other day. Man, that was frustrating!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_02_10: So I thought about it, trying to figure out what went wrong.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_03_10: But I couldn’t figure it out. Was it our coordination? Maybe my Pokémon and I are a bad match...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_04_10: The other Trainer probably just did more research than I did...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0701_05_10: There are a lot more things I don’t understand, but if I keep at it, it’ll work itself out! I’m sure of it!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0702_01_10: I’m sure there are plenty of questions that can’t be answered no matter how hard you think.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2704_0702_02_10: But not letting that stop you is the sign of true strength!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_01_10: I want to be an Ace Trainer, just like you!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_02_10: One of these days, I hope I can be as cool as you!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1031_03_10: Well, it’ll probably take a long time, but...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_01_10: Well, that’s a lot of pressure you’re putting on me. Ha ha!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_02_10: Oh, your gaze, brimming with expectations...
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_1032_03_10: Yes! Look at me more! Tell me how cool I am!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_01_10: What should I do when I have more than one opponent?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_02_10: There were so many, I got dizzy. So I ran away!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_03_10: If you calm down and scope out your opponents, you’ll find the right target.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_04_10: But but but... How will I know which Pokémon to target?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_05_10: Think of the type of move you are using.
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_06_10: Oh, right! I have to pick the Pokémon that my own Pokémon will have the advantage over!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_07_10: Aw, man, I have such a way to go! I want to be like you faster!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/2751_0701_08_10: Uh, well... Keep at it! Remember, you can always ask me anything!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0101_01_10: Well, well, well! Do you really think you can beat me?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0501_01_10: Well, well, well! Wait... I lost?
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_01_10: Well, well, well... You’re pretty good!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_02_10: Just kidding! I figured you would be this strong!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1901_0601_03_10: But I couldn’t run away, could I? That would be really uncool!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0101_01_10: Oh gosh! I am so good, it’s becoming a burden!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_01_10: Hold on! You’re way too strong!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_02_10: You’re probably stronger than the Elite Four! You might even win the PML!
ch0085_00_hopef_en.lsd.ch0085_00_hopef/1903_0601_03_10: Ha ha! Don’t worry—I’m not trying to hustle ya!

ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_1031_02_10: I’m totally ready to go off and explore...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_1031_03_10: but there’s no one around to look me in the eye.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_01_10: If you’re eager to battle but you can’t seem to find an opponent...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_02_10: that’s when you should dash over to the Pokémon Center and talk to Trista!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0701_03_10: She’ll help you reach out to your friends so you can go out exploring together!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0702_01_10: If you can’t seem to meet eyes with any other Trainers, you should go and talk to Trista at the reception desk!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2701_0702_02_10: She’ll always be there to look you in the eye!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_1031_01_10: Chopping wood is a cinch with its two giant pincers.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_1031_03_10: Perfectly straight posture! What I’d give for that...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_01_10: My partner here is the Stag Beetle Pokémon, Pinsir!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_02_10: Pinsir’s the perfect Pokémon for a camper like me! He can chop a piece of firewood in half lickety-split!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0701_03_10: His superflat back is the best part about him, though! It sure makes riding Pinsir easier than, say, Heracross!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2702_0702_01_10: Then again, Heracross’s horn is a lot easier to grab on to.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_01_10: There are as many moves out there as there are Pokémon types!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_02_10: There are ones that make your Pokémon rock solid!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_1031_03_10: And the more you use them, the stronger your Pokémon’s defenses get!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_01_10: There are all kinds of different moves that your Pokémon can use!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_02_10: For example, there are moves  that can increase your Pokémon’s defenses  or reduce your opponent’s! Isn’t that cool?!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_03_10: If you use a move like that two or three times or more, it’ll be that much more effective!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0701_04_10: Keep using it, and your Pokémon’ll be rock solid for sure!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0702_01_10: Wait... What if my Pokémon could learn a move that makes my opponent infatuated with me?!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2703_0702_02_10: That...that would make me super popular! I wonder if moves can actually work on people, not just Pokémon...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_01_10: Maybe I should listen to the radio today, too...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_02_10: Gathering data is one of the basics of being a good Trainer, after all.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_1031_03_10: I just learned that male and female Pokémon can look really different.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_01_10: Battling is a surefire way to make your Pokémon stronger, but gathering data is really important, too.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_02_10: I’ve started listening to the radio to get my information. I bet I know way more about Pokémon now!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_03_10: Take Magikarp, for example! Did you know that males have yellow whiskers and females have white?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0701_04_10: Whether or not that knowledge helps you make your Pokémon stronger all depends on you!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0702_01_10: Knowledge is a greater weapon than raw strength.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2704_0702_02_10: Knowing that Magikarp get super strong when they evolve into Gyarados makes it easier to persevere through training one.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_01_10: I only choose the most beautiful Pokémon. They suit me the best!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_02_10: But what can I do to get closer to my Pokémon? What’ll make him like me?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1031_03_10: Maybe I need to be more beautiful! And confident!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1032_01_10: You look pretty confident to me already, kid!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_1032_02_10: Shucks, I’m wonderin’ the same thing! How do I get MY Pokémon to like me?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_01_10: Aha! Maybe it’s all about showing affection! I should try petting and grooming my Weepinbell more often. That oughta do the trick!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_02_10: Ohoho! You may be right, m’boy! My Onix is massive, though. Pettin’ and groomin’ all that stone is no easy feat...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_03_10: Hmm... Well then, how else are you gonna get your Pokémon to like you?
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_04_10: Well, do you think just bein’ a swell person in general could be enough to get a Pokémon to warm up to you? Seems plausible.
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_05_10: Yeah! I think you’re onto something! If we want our Pokémon to like us more, we’ve gotta work on ourselves first, huh!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_06_10: Hmm... Think getting squeaky clean in the bath will help? I should fix my hair, too... Maybe I could get some fashion advice from a Sylveon!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_07_10: Hey, you shouldn’t mention other Pokémon around your Weepinbell. He’ll get jealous, and that kinda defeats the purpose!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/2751_0701_08_10: Really? Did I make you jealous, Weepinbell? I’m sorry, buddy. From now on, it’ll just be you and me!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0101_01_10: I gotta look cool so I can show off to my girlfriend!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0101_02_10: Do me a favor and battle with me!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0601_01_10: I can be pretty stylish when I’m putting up a tent, but that’s basically the only cool thing about me...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1901_0601_02_10: I should just give up... Yep. I’m gonna spend the rest of my life boasting about how well I can put up a tent...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0101_01_10: When it comes to camping, safety comes first! Same goes for Pokémon battling!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0501_01_10: I thought it was safe to say I’d beat you...
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0601_01_10: You know, you should always be prepared for the unexpected!
ch0086_00_campm_en.lsd.ch0086_00_campm/1903_0601_02_10: Then again, if you’re always prepared for the unexpected, is it really unexpected anymore?

ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0101_0701_01_10: Good to see you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’re looking particularly cheerful today.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0101_0701_02_10: Where are you heading out to? Perhaps I could tag along, if that’s all right.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_01_10: I’ve done a fair bit of wandering from place to place, starting with the Hoenn region, where I grew up.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_02_10: Part of my goal was to traverse the land in search of rare stones, but more than that...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_03_10: I wanted to walk this world on my own two feet. To see it with my own eyes. To feel it on my very skin.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0701_04_10: How about you? What is it that you want to learn or experience here on Pasio? I’d be interested to hear your story sometime.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0702_01_10: As a Champion, I wouldn’t have been able to travel around so freely if not for the support I had from others.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0601_0702_02_10: I’m eternally grateful for all of the help they gave me.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_01_10: Traveling here and there—hunting rare stones and collecting my favorites—is my hobby.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_02_10: Although...you probably already knew that. I’m sure I’ve mentioned it at least once or twice.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_03_10: Anyways, the reason I keep bringing it up is...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0701_04_10: Well, it’s sync stones. Do you think it would be possible to take a sync stone back to the Hoenn region with me?
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0702_01_10: Did you know that sync stones react to the bond between a sync pair? The stronger that bond is, the brighter the stone shines.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0602_0702_02_10: With a luster like that, sync stones probably rank as one of my top five favorite kinds of stones in existence.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0701_01_10: Sync pairs are what ideal partnership between people and Pokémon looks like.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0701_02_10: It would be amazing if this sort of relationship expanded beyond Pasio someday.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0701_03_10: Think about it. We would all be so much more in tune with one another. It could bring harmony to the entire planet.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0702_01_10: I hope that someday the world will accept the simple, most fundamental truth into their hearts...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0603_0702_02_10: The truth that people and Pokémon are connected. We simply can’t exist without each other.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_01_10: I have a house in Mossdeep City, back in Hoenn. I was staying there before I traveled to Pasio.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_02_10: Have you met Tate and Liza? They’re the Mossdeep City Gym Leaders, so I’ve had a lot of interaction with them...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_03_10: It really is a splendid place. You should visit sometime.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0701_04_10: I’d love to show you to my home, though you’ll have to forgive the rather sparse decor...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0702_01_10: I wonder what my next adventure will be after I return to Mossdeep City...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0604_0702_02_10: I could always do a bit more traveling. Or perhaps I could settle down and dedicate my time to training.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_01_10: There are many things in this world that one cannot accomplish alone.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_02_10: That’s why it’s so essential that we have friends... and that we help each other when we’re in need.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_03_10: With you and I and our Pokémon all working together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0701_04_10: I feel like we could overcome any disaster that comes at us. Don’t you agree?
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0702_01_10: I’ve been keeping an eye on you and your Pokémon. You’ve been training hard, pushing yourselves to grow stronger.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/0605_0702_02_10: I like to see partners who do their best together. That’s why I like you so much!
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, I was just about to go look for you.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0701_02_10: I got you a present. It’s right here.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it will come in handy for you.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/1701_0702_02_10: I thought about giving you one of my favorite stones, but I was afraid it might weigh down your bag...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_01_10: A lot of great sync pairs have gathered here on Pasio...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_02_10: but I find myself particularly drawn to you and your Pokémon.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_03_10: It’s clear that your battle skills are a cut above the rest, and you share a close-knit bond with each other.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_04_10: But what really impresses me is the number of friends you have made who truly support you.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0701_05_10: It’s an incredible power to have. Don’t go taking it for granted, all right?
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0702_01_10: If you ever make it to the Hoenn region in the future, come and find me. I’ll be waiting for your challenge.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2501_0702_02_10: Let’s put it all on the line. No holding back... Just me and you in a battle to see who’s the strongest!
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_01_10: We all have a hidden glimmer within ourselves... a hidden excellence.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_02_10: When we’re passionate about something or we’re protecting something we care about, that glimmer inside us shines really brightly...
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_03_10: like the way the facets of a gemstone glint in the light. I love people and Pokémon that have that sort of glimmer.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0701_04_10: I mean people and Pokémon like you and your partner. I was referring to you two, in case that didn’t come across.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0702_01_10: It’s not about what’s on the outside. That beautiful glimmer shines from within you.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0702_02_10: It may not be visible to you, but to those of us who see you doing your very best each day, you shine like a precious gem.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/2511_0702_03_10: That’s why I like you both so much.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/3001_0701_01_10: Fine weather we’re having this morning. It would be perfect for collecting stones.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/3002_0701_01_10: You’re always so active and full of life! Just being around you gives me a boost of energy.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/3003_0701_01_10: I think it would be fun to explore different areas and compare all the stones we find.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/3004_0701_01_10: Pasio is a big island. Before you sprint across it in one go, try taking your time and enjoying the sights.
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/3005_0701_01_10: How are you and your Pokémon doing? Be careful not to push yourselves too hard, all right?
ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.ch0090_00_daigo/3006_0701_01_10: Some stones shine brightly even in the deepest darkness...like the stars that shine in the night sky.

ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look like you’re ready for some fun today.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0101_0701_02_10: What do you say we use that energy to go find a battle or two!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0701_01_10: Different Trainers have different feelings and approaches when it comes to Pokémon battling.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0701_02_10: Our Pokémon are on the receiving end of those feelings, and they fight for us wholeheartedly.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0701_03_10: So in a sense, watching a Pokémon while it’s battling can actually tell you a lot about its Trainer, too.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0702_01_10: When you and your Pokémon are battling together, you two always look like you’re having so much fun.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0702_02_10: It’s part of why I love battling with you.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0601_0702_03_10: It’s easy to pour all your energy into something if you’re having a great time doing it.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_01_10: A mysterious power drew us to this place... But I wonder what influenced its creation.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_02_10: There are all sorts of diverse locations here,  aren’t there?
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_03_10: Pasio may be a man-made island, but I think it’s been influenced by the mythology of other regions.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0701_04_10: There’s so much to see here that it’s hard to pick where to explore next.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0702_01_10: I’ve got a report I need to finish, but a little swimming at the beach sounds kind of nice, too. I did bring a bathing suit, after all...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0702_02_10: Oh! Don’t mind me. I’m just talking to myself over here!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0602_0702_03_10: There’s so much variety here on Pasio. The creator must really have a mind for hospitality, assuming all of this was a conscious decision.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0701_01_10: There’s an ancient cave painting in my hometown. It’s what first sparked my interest in studying ancient mythology.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0701_02_10: The artwork portrays an old Sinnoh legend. It’s quite an impressive sight.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0701_03_10: It’s a little out of the way, but I think it would be worth the trip to Celestic Town to see it next time you visit the Sinnoh region.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0702_01_10: It’s a lot colder in Sinnoh than it is here on Pasio. Remember to bring a coat when you visit!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0603_0702_02_10: I’m so used to the colder climate there that places like Hoenn and Alola feel too warm.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0701_01_10: All of my Pokémon are amazing, but Garchomp is definitely the ace of my team.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0701_02_10: Maybe that’s why she’s been such a ball of energy ever since we got to Pasio.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0701_03_10: It’s up to me to channel all of that energy and make the most out of it in a battle.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0702_01_10: Back when she was a Gible, she’d gnaw on fabric, books, and even tables! It was a pain to deal with at the time, but she was just so cute...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0604_0702_02_10: Thinking back on those days always makes me laugh. She used to be such a naughty thing, but look at her now! My brilliant ace.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0701_01_10: I’m the person I am today because of everything I’ve seen and experienced up until now...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0701_02_10: which means that who we are and what we do today is going to change who we will be in the future.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0701_03_10: So I say live life to the fullest! Let’s make sure we can look back on our pasts with a smile someday.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0702_01_10: Hmm... It’s kind of hard to sum up my past in only a few words...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/0605_0702_02_10: but it’s a life I’ve built together with my Pokémon, so one thing I can say for sure is that it’s amazing!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, I wanted to give you this. Do you think you can use it?
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0701_02_10: I don’t really need it, but I didn’t want it to go to waste, either. Will you take it?
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0702_01_10: If I don’t get rid of the things I’m not using, my room gets out of hand pretty quickly...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/1701_0702_02_10: I mean, um, forget what I just said! Let’s just keep that between you and me, OK?
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_01_10: Being in a place that was created just for Trainers is so exhilarating, isn’t it?
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_02_10: Maybe it’s all the enthusiasm in the air with so many Trainers and Pokémon milling about.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_03_10: A lot of my friends and colleagues have gathered here, all in one place.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0701_04_10: We’ll have to stay on our toes if we don’t want to lose!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_01_10: Interacting with other Trainers and getting to know each other is so important—especially since we’re all competitors in the end.
