ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_02_10: The other day, I had a lovely time with Caitlin and a few other Trainers at the café where we went for a cup of tea...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_03_10: Oh! And there’s an amazing cake shop nearby as well! What else...
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2501_0702_04_10: Hm? What’s that smirk for? You don’t think I spend ALL my time prancing around eating cake, do you?
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0701_01_10: If you raise your Pokémon with love and kindness, it will return those feelings.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0701_02_10: My Pokémon are like my best friends— we’ve been journeying and battling together from the very beginning.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0701_03_10: I have absolute confidence in their abilities because of all the time we’ve spent together.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0702_01_10: You believe in your Pokémon and your team, and your Pokémon knows it! That’s probably where it gets a lot of its strength.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/2511_0702_02_10: After all, being relied upon by others often motivates us to try even harder. Your Pokémon wants to do its very best for you!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! You look like you’re in a good mood. You must be doing well if you’re up and about this early!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning. Are you all set for today? I’m looking forward to exploring some new mysteries with you.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/3003_0701_01_10: I started doing some research on this island, and before I knew it, it was lunchtime! The more I learn, the more curious I get.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/3004_0701_01_10: Phew, I just finished organizing all of my research materials. I think I’m ready to go blow off some steam now.
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/3005_0701_01_10: It looks like the sun’s gone down. What an enchanting time to go on a stroll!
ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.ch0091_00_shirona/3006_0701_01_10: Great myths have been passed down throughout history by the light of a campfire.

ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0101_0701_01_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been craning my neck like a Haxorus trying to find you around here!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0101_0701_02_10: I’m glad I got to meet up with you today! We should go do some exploring!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_01_10: I grew up in a mysterious place called the Village of Dragons.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_02_10: It’s a really awesome place where people and Dragon-type Pokémon live together in harmony!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_03_10: Haxorus was basically my neighborhood buddy when we were growing up. Nowadays, we might as well be family!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0701_04_10: Hmm... If we were really family, would that make Haxorus my big sister? Weird, since I’m the one always taking care of her.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0702_01_10: Before my Haxorus evolved, she was smaller than I am! Can you believe that?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0601_0702_02_10: She was so itty-bitty. She used to play inside my hair everywhere we went!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_01_10: What do you think it means to be an adult?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_02_10: Like...dressing fancy? And caring about important stuff? Using big, fancy words?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_03_10: I know I can’t be a kid forever, and I’ve gotta grow up at some point.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_04_10: I’ve been kinda copying what other adults do recently, but I don’t really get it.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0701_05_10: You know what? I don’t wanna change! I’m just gonna keep acting like my normal kid self!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0702_01_10: I asked old Grandpa what it means to be an adult, and he said nobody knows!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0602_0702_02_10: If nobody knows, how’s a kid like me supposed to know?!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_01_10: I’m Iris! The girl who knows the hearts of dragons!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_02_10: Tee-hee! That almost sounds like it came from one of those TV specials, huh?
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0701_03_10: “Mystic Discoveries: The Girl Who Was Raised by Dragon Pokémon” kinda has a nice ring to it!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0702_01_10: If I ever do get put on TV, I wanna show the world that Dragon-type Pokémon aren’t really scary.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0603_0702_02_10: Sometimes they get moody and angry— but so do people!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_01_10: Isn’t my hairstyle super cool?! People always tell me it’s the first thing they notice!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_02_10: My hair’s so big and fluffy that I can actually store things in there if I want!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0701_03_10: This one time, Haxorus hid some Berries in it, and when we took them out later, they looked exactly the same! Weird, right?!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0702_01_10: I always take really good care of my hair!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0604_0702_02_10: I mean, it’s my trademark, after all!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_01_10: Whenever I’m walking around downtown Pasio, I can’t help fidgeting and looking around everywhere...
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_02_10: Where I grew up, my only playgrounds were forests and waterfalls. Being in the big city makes me so nervous!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_03_10: Playing tag with Salamence, hopping from tree branch to tree branch, is super fun!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0701_04_10: You should come play with us sometime, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll teach you some cool tips for playing tag!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0702_01_10: It’s kinda hard to compare the big city to somewhere full of nature— they’re way too different!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/0605_0702_02_10: When I’m surrounded by nature, it makes me think of my hometown, the Village of Dragons. It’s nice and nostalgic!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this! I’m pretty sure it’ll be useful!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0701_02_10: Haxorus said it might be dangerous if I step on it, so she brought it over!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0702_01_10: Haxorus looks super big and strong, but she’s actually really gentle and well behaved!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/1701_0702_02_10: Then again...she can get pretty scary when she’s mad!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been around Pokémon my whole life, and battling has always been like second nature to me.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_02_10: Before I knew it, I’d gotten to be super strong!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_03_10: Getting to battle all the time used to seem super normal to me, but it’s actually kinda awesome!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_04_10: And also getting to meet and become friends with so many cool people! That part is super awesome, too!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0701_05_10: Let’s aim to be the best of the best Pokémon Trainers out there!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0702_01_10: I feel like together we can both grow sooo much stronger!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2501_0702_02_10: Imagine what the view would look like! Standing proudly at the top— the greatest Pokémon Trainer ever!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_01_10: Grandpa Drayden always says that people and Pokémon have to trust and depend on each other to live.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_02_10: That’s why I battle together with my Pokémon! So that we can deepen our trust and friendship!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_03_10: In a Pokémon battle, the Trainer’s heart and the Pokémon’s heart become one!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0701_04_10: If we give it our all, it doesn’t matter if we win or lose! We’re still smiling in the end!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_01_10: Pokémon have an awesome power inside of them that we, as people, don’t.
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_02_10: But you know what? The fact that we get to become such good friends with such awesome Pokémon is also super cool!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/2511_0702_03_10: Don’t you think so?! I gotta keep battling so I can learn everything there is to know about Pokémon and Trainers!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Gotta make sure you’re dressed well!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3002_0701_01_10: I’m gonna let my Pokémon do some sunbathing this morning, while the sun’s nice and bright!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3003_0701_01_10: Hi! Kids shouldn’t be afraid of the outdoors. Come on—let’s go out and play!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3004_0701_01_10: It’s so bright outside! Makes me want to lie down and soak up some sun with my Pokémon!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3005_0701_01_10: Evening! Ready for more fun? Back at the Village of Dragons, lots of Pokémon become more active at night!
ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.ch0092_00_iris/3006_0701_01_10: My granddad always said that children who sleep well grow well!

ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3201_0701_01_10: Welcome! I can help you check your current area information right here.
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3201_0701_02_10: We hope to see you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3202_0701_01_10: Welcome! You’d like to check your current area info, right? I can do that for you!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3202_0701_02_10: We look forward to your next visit!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3203_0701_01_10: Welcome! Feel free to check your current area information right over here.
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3203_0701_02_10: We hope to serve you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_01_10: Does anyone want to go exploring?
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_02_10: Today is a perfect day for an adventure.
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_03_10: Maybe I should do some exploring, too...
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_05_10: When it comes to area info, I’m your girl!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_07_10: Aw... I wish I had a partner Pokémon, too...
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3401_0701_01_10: Seems like you’re achieving great things these days! I hear there’s someone who wants to meet you!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3402_0701_01_10: I’ve got new info for you—hot off the presses!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3501_1031_01_10: I’ve got to share this info, and fast!
ch0093_00_staff_center_en.lsd.ch0093_00_staff_center/3501_1031_02_10: The faster this info gets out, the better...

ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0101_0701_01_10: Good to see you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I knew you were a Trainer I could count on.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0101_0701_02_10: I can’t wait to see how you navigate your Pokémon through Pasio.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_01_10: Just how many years has it been since I became one of the Hoenn League’s Elite Four...
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_02_10: I’ve battled so many Trainers like you over the years—young and full of hope with a deep love for their Pokémon.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_03_10: What always gets me fired up the most is when I bring out my ace card—Salamence!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_04_10: Everything that I am as a Trainer  I’ve poured into my Salamence.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0701_05_10: When a Trainer is strong enough to make me bring out ol’ Salamence, it makes my heart pound with excitement!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0702_01_10: Salamence and I have been training together since he was just a Bagon.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0601_0702_02_10: Since we’ve been together for so long,  we know a lot about each other,  such as our favorite colors of Pokéblocks.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0701_01_10: Kids catching Pokémon are so adorable.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0701_02_10: I saw one recently that was so cute,  I decided to say something. But that kid  was scared of me and ran away.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0701_03_10: Briney has mentioned it from time to time, but do I really have such a scary face?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0702_01_10: Maybe I should practice making nice faces sometimes so that adorable kids don’t hate me.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0702_02_10: Hmmm, let’s see... Like this? No, no, no... Like this, right?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0602_0702_03_10: This is tough. How can I get a happy, smiling face like yours?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_01_10: A long, long time ago, a Pokémon saved my life.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_02_10: I fell overboard and was about to drown when a wild Dragonite rescued me.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_03_10: I felt I needed to repay that majestic Pokémon in some way, so I vowed to become a Trainer.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0701_04_10: Spending my youth with a Dratini I encountered after that is one of my treasured memories.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0702_01_10: It’s the relationships between Pokémon, people, and nature that make our world what it is.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0603_0702_02_10: For the Dragonite that taught me that, I’ll keep on being one of the Hoenn Elite Four for as long as I can.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve got an old friend in Hoenn. The way he handles a rudder is quite impressive.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0701_02_10: Why, I can still remember all the times we set sail together like it was yesterday.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0701_03_10: Cherish your friends. Someday, the time you spent together will become wonderful memories.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0702_01_10: I wonder how ol’ Briney and Peeko are doing.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0604_0702_02_10: In our day, Briney and Drake were names that echoed throughout our hometown.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0701_01_10: It’s good to set ambitious goals for yourself, [Name:PlayerNickname ], but don’t overdo it.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0701_02_10: A goal can be like a massive wave, and getting over the top can seem like an impossible task.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0701_03_10: Just keep getting over as many small waves as you can. The experience will be of great value to you.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0702_01_10: I sincerely hope that the path you’re on is the right one.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/0605_0702_02_10: It’s up to us adults to serve as a lighthouse, guiding you as you make your way. You can always count on me.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/1701_0701_02_10: I’ve got a present for you. Use it to improve your skills as a Trainer.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/1701_0702_01_10: A ship at sea will be buffeted by the waves.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/1701_0702_02_10: And those waves have brought that gift to you.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0701_01_10: Back when Briney and I were trying to be the greatest sailors in the world, we used to spend a lot of time talking.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0701_02_10: We talked about all kinds of things and sure did have a lot of fun.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0701_04_10: Hey, don’t give me that suspicious look!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_01_10: I talk about all kinds of things, but it was really just about ships, like arguing over which one we should set sail on next.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_02_10: Yes, Briney and I have been crazy about ships since way back.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_03_10: And now I feel the same way about Pokémon.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2501_0702_04_10: What do you think? Do you want to have some fun talking Pokémon with me?
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0701_01_10: Let me tell you, [Name:PlayerNickname ], Hoenn is a great place—full of beautiful nature and, more than anything, a nice place to live.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0701_02_10: When you’ve gotten a little stronger, we should go visit it at the same time.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0701_03_10: I know you’re a Trainer I can count on, so it shouldn’t be too far off in the future!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0702_01_10: When you do make it there, I’ll already be waiting for you as one of the Hoenn League Elite Four!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0702_02_10: Just because you make it to me, don’t think that I won’t go down without a fight!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/2511_0702_03_10: And because it’s you, this ol’ Drake will give you everything he’s got!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3001_0701_01_10: Looks like you had a restful sleep. A good day often starts after a good night, doesn’t it.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3002_0701_01_10: The sea is calm this morning. Seems like a good day for sailing.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3003_0701_01_10: Already afternoon. Fine weather like this makes me want to go for a sail.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3004_0701_01_10: Don’t waste away your afternoons. Time is limited, after all!
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3005_0701_01_10: Make sure you rest well for tomorrow. Your Pokémon will worry if you’re not shipshape.
ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.ch0094_00_genji/3006_0701_01_10: Don’t force yourself to stay awake if you get tired. Heed a little advice from an old sailor.

ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0101_0701_01_10: Good day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’ve got a lot of nerve, keeping me waiting this long, you know...
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0101_0701_02_10: Tee-hee! I’m only teasing. I hope you have a lovely day today.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_01_10: Pasio is such a warm and comfortable island, isn’t it? Quite amazing, really.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_02_10: You know, if I could have a new villa built here, it would be just perfect.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_03_10: With my own villa, I could enjoy the city and natural landscapes here at my leisure.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0701_04_10: You know what... I think I’ll consult my butler, just in case.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0702_01_10: If I ever do build a villa here, I’ll be sure to invite you.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0702_02_10: Hmm... For the interior, I’m picturing royal red carpets and a collection of art pieces from around the world.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0601_0702_03_10: I can decorate with some of Reuniclus’s favorite things as well. That way we can both enjoy the space.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_01_10: A long time ago, my psychic abilities used to manifest whenever I lost control of my emotions. It caused trouble for the people around me...
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_02_10: Nowadays, I feel much stronger and I’m able to control those outbursts.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_03_10: Back then, I was still so immature...
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0701_04_10: But you know, I wouldn’t be the person I am today if I hadn’t experienced those things in my past.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0702_01_10: Changing something about yourself... It’s not an easy task to accomplish, by any means.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0702_02_10: But if there’s something you’d like to change or improve, I’ll be rooting for you.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0602_0702_03_10: If I can do it...I’m certain you can, too.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0701_01_10: My Reuniclus likes to cause mischief with her psychic abilities.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0701_02_10: Sometimes she moves the furniture around in my room without telling me... She does that quite a lot, actually.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0701_03_10: I’d love to be able to rearrange my furniture with mysterious psychic powers.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0702_01_10: Although, every time I try to rearrange my furniture or clean my room myself, my butler puts a stop to it.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0603_0702_02_10: He insists that me trying to clean is no different from my Reuniclus causing mischief... Can you believe that?
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0701_01_10: When I couldn’t fall asleep at night, my Gothitelle used to use her mysterious powers to create beautiful starry skies for me.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0701_02_10: It was like having my own planetarium in my bedroom... Such precious memories.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0701_03_10: Every moment I’m with my Pokémon is another beautiful memory. I gain more and more of them each day.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0702_01_10: I think we overdid it a little bit that night we created enough starry sky to cover the largest room in the manor.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0702_02_10: My butler smiled when he saw it, but I’m quite sure he was shocked by the entire matter.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0604_0702_03_10: Gothitelle and I immediately returned the room to its previous state, but that was sort of fun in a way, too.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0701_01_10: I haven’t yet reached what I would call my perfect self.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0701_02_10: But someday I will fulfill that dream... I’ll become the most elegant and most graceful and refined Trainer of all.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0701_03_10: And when I do, I’d like you to witness it.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0702_01_10: If you have a goal in mind and it’s in my power to help you achieve it, I’m more than happy to lend a hand.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0702_02_10: But triumphing over the final hurdle is something you must do with your own strength...
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/0605_0702_03_10: Grasp onto victory with your own two hands, or it will fall apart before you know it.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0701_01_10: Do you have a moment? I have something nice I’d like to give you.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0701_02_10: It’s something I think you should have... I hope you find it useful.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0702_01_10: Reuniclus often finds items like these for me.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/1701_0702_02_10: She has a keen eye—notices things much more quickly than I do.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0701_01_10: Where do you think you’re going? Are you just going to abandon me here?
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0701_02_10: I was hoping you and I could have a Pokémon battle...
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0701_03_10: Tee-hee! I’m only teasing. I just love seeing that confused look on your face.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0702_01_10: I wasn’t lying when I said I wanted to battle with you, you know.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0702_02_10: But I also want you to face all sorts of other Trainers first. I’d like to see just how strong you can become.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2501_0702_03_10: When the day comes and you’re ready, I’d like for you and I to have a grand battle... Is that too much to ask? Am I being selfish?
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve noticed that my mood tends to swing in a certain direction whenever I’m around you.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0701_02_10: Oh! But I’m not talking about mood swings in the wild, uncontrollable sense. Perhaps that wasn’t the proper word to use.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0701_03_10: It’s more like...when I’m around you, I find it easier to express how I’m feeling to other people and Pokémon.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0702_01_10: Sometimes, considering other people’s feelings can actually make you a stronger person yourself, huh.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/2511_0702_02_10: I’m not sure I would have ever realized that on my own had I not met you.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/3001_0701_01_10: My, you’re awfully energetic in the morning! Could that be the secret to your strength?
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/3002_0701_01_10: What a calm and refreshing morning. I think today will be a good day.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/3003_0701_01_10: Hello there. I’m so bored, I’m falling asleep... Perhaps I’m in need of a Pokémon battle or two.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/3004_0701_01_10: Good day. Wonderful weather, isn’t it? I was just contemplating heading out for a walk.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening. The day goes by so fast, doesn’t it? Once you’ve finished everything, you should rest, too.
ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.ch0095_00_cattleya/3006_0701_01_10: Oh my, is it dark already? Don’t push yourself too hard.

ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, there you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve been expecting you.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0101_0701_02_10: You mustn’t let the day go to waste if you mean to bring out the best in your Pokémon. Chop-chop!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_01_10: There’s one ingredient that is guaranteed to make any recipe tastier. Do you know what it is?
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_03_10: Enjoying a meal with a smile on your face makes everything taste that much more delicious, don’t you think?
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_04_10: Watching others enjoy a meal you prepared is the greatest happiness of all for a chef like myself.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0701_05_10: You should always endeavor to do your very best in order to bring happiness to yourself and the people around you.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_01_10: At times, I tend to stress myself out over a lot of things... But you know, not every problem has a definite answer.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_02_10: That’s why it feels so good when you find your own way to solve things. It’s a different sort of happiness.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0601_0702_03_10: Both cooking and Pokémon training have so many deep layers. We could continue to learn about them forever—and we should!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_01_10: I’ve heard some people call me a legendary chef.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_02_10: But truthfully, I don’t think that moniker is entirely accurate.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_03_10: There is still so much more that I can learn and endeavor to achieve.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0701_04_10: I strive to elevate my cooking and my Pokémon battles to a level of true art! They must be masterpieces!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0702_01_10: When I’m defeated in a Pokémon battle, I feel that my own weakness is to blame.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0602_0702_02_10: I need to draw out the absolute best in my Pokémon, or I’ll never achieve my goals.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_01_10: I met my Clawitzer when he was still a Clauncher, and he’s been my most dependable front-liner ever since.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_02_10: It was a bit shocking how we first met, actually. I still remember it clearly to this day...
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_03_10: You see, Clauncher somehow got mixed in with some ingredients I had procured for a recipe of mine.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_04_10: After I’d gotten over my initial shock, I thought to myself, this Pokémon would really shine in a battle!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0701_05_10: Finding Clauncher among my ingredients that day and making that immediate judgment set things in motion for the long term.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0702_01_10: And you know, if you really think about it, it wasn’t I who found Clawitzer...
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0603_0702_02_10: It was Clawitzer who found me.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_01_10: Once, I decided to leave Kalos and go on a journey to discover the ultimate recipe.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_02_10: I was fishing one day and caught a Magikarp, but it was no ordinary Magikarp. I felt immense potential within it.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_03_10: Eventually I learned that my instincts were correct. It more than lived up to my expectations.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0701_04_10: When it evolved into Gyarados, the pair of us conquered many a rough wave together.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0702_01_10: Potential is something that lies hidden within.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0604_0702_02_10: Drawing out that hidden flicker of light is the job of every Trainer—as well as the job of a world-class chef.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_01_10: I’m so glad that we had the opportunity to meet, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_02_10: You are a Trainer that possesses the ability to draw out the most amazing potential in your Pokémon.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0701_03_10: I firmly believe that you have a bright future ahead of you. There’s so much you will accomplish.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0702_01_10: Your strength as a Trainer is directly related to your ability to bring out the best in your Pokémon.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/0605_0702_02_10: Remember that, and I’m positive you’ll continue to grow even stronger.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0701_01_10: I found something interesting while I was cleaning up the kitchen. Here, take it.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0701_02_10: I’m certain you won’t let a fine item like this go to waste.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0702_01_10: Both Trainers and chefs should endeavor to make the most of the raw materials they start with!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/1701_0702_02_10: If I find anything else you might like, I’ll be sure to send it your way.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_01_10: The art of cooking and Pokémon battling are both beautiful in their impermanence.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_02_10: The end result may only last for a short while, but it takes a great amount of time and devotion to get up to that point.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_03_10: That brief moment feels special because of all that time spent earnestly debating, researching, learning, and practicing.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0701_04_10: One could call it a compilation of their life. That’s why we must always do the very best we can.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_01_10: Our Pokémon are always inching closer and closer into our hearts.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_02_10: I’m constantly tackling my own worries and stress for that reason.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_03_10: When I do, we all end up feeling a little bit happier.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2501_0702_04_10: To be truly happy, we must continually devote ourselves.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_01_10: You know, when it comes to Pokémon battling, you help me out in a myriad of ways.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_02_10: I’d like to treat you to a delicious meal. One that I’ve poured my heart and soul into.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_03_10: This conundrum I’ve been going back and forth over—whether or not Pokémon battles are worthy of being called art...
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0701_04_10: I’d like you to taste my food—my art— and tell me what you think the answer to that question is.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_01_10: In essence, the art of cooking and Pokémon battling are one and the same.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_02_10: The quality of the ingredients, the skill of one’s Pokémon... Drawing out the best of each will take you to greater heights.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/2511_0702_03_10: I know that you have great effort and true skill. That’s why I feel I can ask you this question.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3001_0701_01_10: Morning. Have you eaten a well-rounded breakfast? It’s the most important meal of the day.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3002_0701_01_10: A new dawn, a new day. One should savor every last moment lest tomorrow never come.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3003_0701_01_10: Hello! Did you have a nice lunch? One is not living if one is not enjoying food.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3004_0701_01_10: Hohoho! What shall I cook for dinner tonight? I’ll need to stock up on ingredients.
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3005_0701_01_10: A tip: Try chewing your food slowly, and really savor the flavor. That always gives me a boost of motivation!
ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_00_zumi/3006_0701_01_10: Remember to get a good night’s sleep tonight so that you’re ready for tomorrow’s adventures.

ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0101_0701_01_10: Welcome back, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='Mr.' F='Miss' ] [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Would you care to start with an appetizer?
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0101_0701_02_10: Ah, my apologies... It’s this uniform. While I’m wearing it, my way of speaking automatically shifts into customer service mode.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0701_01_10: When I’m shorthanded at the restaurant, I sometimes serve food to the guests myself.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0701_02_10: It makes my busy days even busier, but I don’t mind the extra work at all.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0701_03_10: Simply having the chance to see my guests’ eyes light up with joy as I place their meals before them is reward enough.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0701_04_10: Nothing makes a chef happier than to see his guests smile.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0702_01_10: Sometimes my guests call me to their table to share their thoughts on the meal.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0702_02_10: They smile and tell me how they loved my choice of spices in the main course or enjoyed the nice textures in the dessert.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0601_0702_03_10: I love hearing that feedback. It makes me want to delight and surprise my guests with even more delicious dishes in the future.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0701_01_10: What do you think makes a meal truly excellent? It’s more than just how delicious the food is—I can tell you that.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0701_02_10: The aesthetics of the garnishing and plating, the timing of each course, and the overall atmosphere of the restaurant are all deeply important.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0701_03_10: I believe there’s value in taking the time to step out to the front where my guests are dining and check these things myself.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0701_04_10: Or...maybe I just like seeing my guests smiling. Who knows? *chuckle*
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0702_01_10: Sometimes I do go out and walk by the tables at my restaurant, but I’m no match for the waitstaff.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0702_02_10: They are masters in their own right. I’m constantly impressed by how quietly and efficiently they’re able to move about the dining area.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0602_0702_03_10: I can rest easy knowing the restaurant guests are in very good hands.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0701_01_10: Octillery and I first encountered one another on a beach.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0701_02_10: I was there with my Clawitzer to procure some new ingredients to work with.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0701_03_10: As we were walking, Clawitzer bristled at something hiding among the rocks, so he shot toward it with Water Gun...
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0701_04_10: and out jumped Octillery! In a way, I suppose we started off as enemies more than friends.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0702_01_10: As soon as Octillery spotted us, he attacked with Octazooka.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0702_02_10: Thankfully, we were able to dodge it for the most part, but a little bit of ink from the blast managed to splash into my mouth in the process.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0603_0702_03_10: As soon as the flavor hit me, I knew... If used as a cooking ingredient, Octillery’s ink could have endless potential!
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0701_01_10: Octillery’s ink is actually safe to cook with and eat.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0701_02_10: It has a deep, robust, complex flavor... Simple words like “sweet” or “salty” or “spicy” can’t even begin to describe the spectrum of it.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0701_03_10: I knew from the moment I tasted it that in the hands of an expert like myself, Octillery’s ink could be used to create a new kind of food!
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0701_04_10: I wanted to learn everything I could about Octillery, so we spent a lot of time together.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0702_01_10: Octillery’s ink isn’t poisonous, but it can cause a peculiar reaction when handled, so there are certain precautions you have to take.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0702_02_10: The ink contains a substance that can dull our sense of smell. If you come into contact with it, your nose may not work very well for a while.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0604_0702_03_10: That’s why I always advise wearing a mask when extracting Octillery ink—to guard your nose from the fumes.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0605_0701_01_10: I’d love to prepare you a full-course dinner someday, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Would that interest you?
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0605_0701_02_10: Every step of the process would be handled by yours truly, so you wouldn’t have to lift a finger.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0605_0701_03_10: I’ll take care of everything, from preparing the food to setting the table—Chef Siebold’s full dining experience.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0605_0702_01_10: I’d like to use Octillery’s ink in at least one of the courses. Yes, that would be a must!
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0605_0702_02_10: But sadly, I have yet to perfect a recipe that uses it.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/0605_0702_03_10: Soon! Soon I will finish my recipe and you can look forward to tasting it—along with many other delicious dishes—in your full-course dinner!
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/1701_0701_01_10: I came across this by chance when I was shopping for ingredients. Would you like to have it?
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/1701_0701_02_10: Use it well. I hope it helps you win a glorious Pokémon battle!
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/1701_0702_01_10: Oh, no need to thank me. Although...
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/1701_0702_02_10: if you happen to spot any rare ingredients, tell me immediately, OK? I’ll come and find you right away.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0701_01_10: When I wear this uniform, I’m forced to realize that there are certain ideals and expectations that come with food service.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0701_02_10: To master waiting on guests in the dining area would be to master a whole different art form.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0701_03_10: While I would love to do so, perfecting both serving and cooking would be a bit beyond my reach.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0701_04_10: My battle is in the kitchen, not the front of the restaurant.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0702_01_10: I think of my restaurant as a vast, complete work of art with many working parts.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0702_02_10: The chef who cooks the food, the staff who serve the guests in the front—all are vitally important.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0702_03_10: It’s the joy of sharing a meal and the sense of community that that creates. It’s one big work of art.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2501_0702_04_10: One person can’t create something like that alone. It’s easy to get bigheaded as a chef, so I try to remind myself of that from time to time.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0701_01_10: Most Octillery like to spend their days in dark, cramped spaces like caves and grottoes.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0701_02_10: But ever since my Octillery and I became partners, he’s worked right alongside me, even in the brightest places.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0701_03_10: I could be reaching, but I like to think that Octillery’s odd behavior is proof that he really trusts me.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0701_04_10: If I’m correct, it would be terribly rude of me to trust Octillery any less in return. I always keep that in the back of my mind.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0702_01_10: I can see it as plain as day when I look at you and your Pokémon.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0702_02_10: You two have a deep trust for one another as partners.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/2511_0702_03_10: The beautiful harmony you create together could be described as art.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. Would you care for a smoothie to boost your energy for the day?
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/3002_0701_01_10: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day. I always try to eat something, even when I’m in a rush.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/3003_0701_01_10: Good afternoon. Would you care for a light lunch? I have several options prepared.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/3004_0701_01_10: It’s getting close to dinnertime. I should go and make sure the dining area is ready for the evening rush.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening. Dinner is being served as we speak, if you’d like to follow me to your table.
ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.ch0096_10_zumi/3006_0701_01_10: A good night’s sleep is my recipe for success. I avoid late-night snacking since it tends to keep me awake.

ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0101_0701_02_10: I hope we can enjoy our time together...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_01_10: I depend on my Arcanine a lot...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_02_10: Since I was little, I’ve held him while I’m going to sleep...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_03_10: He’s fluffy and warm... It’s a strange feeling, but he makes me feel at ease.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_04_10: I want to be with him forever.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0702_01_10: No matter how far away he is,  he’ll always come if I call him...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0601_0702_02_10: My Arcanine is truly dear to me...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_01_10: Weavile is a Pokémon you can find in the Sinnoh region...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_02_10: And a friend of mine... We traveled together.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_03_10: It has sharp claws, but it’s actually quite sweet and playful. I think it’s adorable!
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_04_10: If you ever come across a Weavile, it would make me happy if you’d show it some affection, too.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0702_01_10: It’s nice to touch the cool body of Weavile when it’s warm out.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0602_0702_02_10: But it doesn’t like it if you touch it too much...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_01_10: If a Trainer doesn’t give good commands, Pokémon get hurt in battle...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_02_10: That’s why I want to get better at battling.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_03_10: And it’s fun for me and my Pokémon when we battle with you.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0702_01_10: What I can do is just a little...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0603_0702_02_10: But I used that little bit of strength and got here.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_01_10: I... I don’t like to talk because I’m afraid I will accidentally hurt someone with my words.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_02_10: That’s why I choose my words carefully... But then my responses take too long.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_03_10: But I don’t mind talking to you like this.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_04_10: I think it’s because you listen to me...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0604_0702_02_10: If so, I’ll share a little bit more about myself.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_01_10: I think I like Pasio... There’s so much good food and fun things to do.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_02_10: Most importantly, I get to battle with so many Trainers...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_03_10: Being close to you, I feel like I can get stronger...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_04_10: I might have said some embarrassing things.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0702_01_10: It’s truly difficult to say what you mean...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/0605_0702_02_10: That’s why I think it’s wonderful to be able to be genuine with your words.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0701_01_10: Here, this is for you. Please take it.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0701_02_10: I thought you might like it... That’s all.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0702_01_10: I don’t need anything in return.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/1701_0702_02_10: It’s just a thank-you for always being there...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_01_10: Arcanine is always with me when I go on an adventure.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_02_10: He has taught me so much.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_03_10: That’s why...I want to give him something special...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_04_10: If I win the PML, will that be a good gift for him?
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0702_01_10: I’ve been with my Arcanine since he was a Growlithe...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2501_0702_02_10: He comforts me. I don’t feel lonely on adventures if I’m with him.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_01_10: I don’t like to talk, so I’ve always kept my distance from people.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_02_10: But...you’ve always been there for me, even when I kept my distance...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_03_10: And I started to enjoy talking...just a little...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_04_10: I want to get better at talking because I want to know more about you.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0702_01_10: I’ve always chosen my words carefully so as to not hurt anyone.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/2511_0702_02_10: I wonder if I can stop worrying about it so much when I get more comfortable talking...
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3003_0701_01_10: Hi. Is there somewhere you want to go? Can I join you?
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3004_0701_01_10: Just having you around makes me happy.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3005_0701_01_10: It’s a bit late, but I’m happy I get to spend more time with you.
ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.ch0097_00_mai/3006_0701_01_10: Nighttime can be lonely sometimes... But when you’re around, it’s not so bad.

ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0101_0701_02_10: All right! Another great day to play with our Pokémon!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0701_01_10: Just being on Pasio gets me pumped up!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0701_02_10: I don’t know anything about this place, so everything is so cool and fresh!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0701_03_10: Doesn’t it feel great when you make new discoveries?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0702_01_10: You know, whenever I feel cramped,  I go out on adventures.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0702_02_10: I feel that I can become a new me when I breathe some fresh air.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0601_0702_03_10: There’s always a new view right outside  your door! In fact, let’s go on an adventure!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0701_01_10: Do you know the Pokémon Komala? I really admire them.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0701_02_10: They are always asleep, and the only movements they make or battles they get into are just them being restless sleepers.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0701_03_10: They might not be able to see me, but  maybe we can be friends in their dreams!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0702_01_10: Komala are probably adventuring in their dreams!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0602_0702_02_10: I wonder if I’ll ever be able to go to the dream world...
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0701_01_10: Even if they build up their electricity, they don’t get really antsy.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0701_02_10: But I do have to make sure I let my Raichu battle regularly to discharge his electricity.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0701_03_10: If I leave it be, you can feel the air get all tingly—even indoors.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0702_01_10: After a battle, I would always have malasadas with Raichu. You can only find those in Alola.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0702_02_10: He doesn’t seem too excited when he eats malasadas...
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0603_0702_03_10: but he always finishes them, so I think he really likes them.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0701_01_10: I’m a Trainer, and I like Pokémon battles a lot.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0701_02_10: But this one time, a friend of mine,  who isn’t a Trainer, saved me.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0701_03_10: I realized then that battles aren’t about whether you win or lose. They’re about whether you have the will to win!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0702_01_10: The girl that saved me’s named Lillie!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0604_0702_02_10: She has a really strong heart!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_01_10: What do you think of me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_02_10: I’d be really happy if you thought I was a good person.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_03_10: Both people and Pokémon have their good and bad sides, you know?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0701_04_10: I think what sets the good people and the bad people apart is whether they can see the good in others or not.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0702_01_10: Even bad people have good sides to them.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/0605_0702_02_10: If not, then why would they have so many allies, you know?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0701_01_10: Alola! Here, I have something nice for you!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0701_02_10: Sharing makes it that much nicer, too!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0702_01_10: This one time, I gave away a lot of stuff without thinking.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/1701_0702_02_10: Then everybody got really worried about me and started giving me stuff back! I went home with more stuff than I left with!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0701_01_10: My gramps is an island kahuna, and he’s super strong!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0701_02_10: Gramps is really good at bringing out a Pokémon’s true strength!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0701_03_10: I’m not as good as he is, but I’m doing my best!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0702_01_10: Are you able to bring out your Pokémon’s strengths?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0702_02_10: It’d be great if you could, and I bet you could do some awesome stuff!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2501_0702_03_10: One day, I’m gonna be a kahuna like my gramps and make everybody happy!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0701_01_10: Have you ever had a Pokémon battle that gave you the chills?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0701_02_10: I have! I lost that time, but it was a mixture of enjoyment and frustration.
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0701_03_10: But it was great! I hope I can have a battle like that again!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0702_01_10: If you’re aiming to be the best Trainer, that makes us rivals!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0702_02_10: I respect you and your Pokémon a lot!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/2511_0702_03_10: That’s why I want to have a real battle with you one of these days and beat you!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! C’mon—I wanna go eat some malasadas!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3002_0701_01_10: Wow! Going all out this early? I’m gonna chow down on some breakfast and get going, too!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3003_0701_01_10: Alola! It’s hard to get out and keep moving on an empty stomach!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3004_0701_01_10: I’m gonna grab a bite to eat. Wanna come?
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3005_0701_01_10: You’re working pretty late! I’m gonna do my best, too! See ya!
ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.ch0098_00_hau/3006_0701_01_10: I get chewed out by my old gramps if I stay up too late.

ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0101_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You kept me waiting long enough! Let’s hurry up and head out on an adventure!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0101_0701_02_10: You want to have a Pokémon battle, too, right? I’m fining you a million if you’re late!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_01_10: My dad is Palmer, the Battle Frontier’s Tower Tycoon! He’s so awesomely cool!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_02_10: I want to be a cool, tough Trainer like my dad.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_03_10: Then I’ll be able to have Pokémon battles with lots of other tough Trainers!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0701_04_10: That’s why there’s no time to lose! I’ve gotta get to work!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0702_01_10: You’ll see! I’m gonna be a cool Trainer just like my dad!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0601_0702_02_10: That’s why I’m making sure not to slack off on my training or whatever.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_01_10: Piplup really has a lot of pride.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_02_10: When I was just starting out as a Trainer, he didn’t listen to me at all!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_03_10: But now my relationship with Piplup is totally different!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0701_04_10: Piplup is my reliable ace in the hole now! Makes me wanna puff out my chest with pride!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_01_10: When Piplup started listening to what I said...
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_02_10: I was so happy that he had finally accepted me as a Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0602_0702_03_10: That’s why I decided to get even tougher—for Piplup!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_01_10: Hey, I’ve been on an adventure with Staraptor!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_02_10: When I got on his back, he took off and started flying around super fast! I was holding on for dear life!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_03_10: But the scenery you can see when you’re flying through the air is incredibly beautiful!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0701_04_10: Don’t you wanna try to ride him once? If you get scared and cry, I’ll fine you!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_01_10: Staraptor is so cool! You can fly anywhere with him straightaway thanks to his Fly move!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_02_10: But I’m trying to walk more and not fly everywhere. Physical health is the foundation of any tough Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0603_0702_03_10: Don’t get the wrong idea! It’s not because I’m scared or anything!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_01_10: I smack right into people a lot when I run. Like...thud!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_02_10: So I’m trying to think up a way of running where I won’t bump into people so much, but it’s pretty hard!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_03_10: I mean, I guess I could just walk, but it’s so slow!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0701_04_10: I run because I wanna hurry up and get to where I’m going!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_01_10: I wanna get tougher and tougher. There are still so many things I wanna do!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_02_10: That’s why I’ve got no time to sit around taking it easy!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0604_0702_03_10: But between you and me, sometimes going around the long way can turn out to be a shortcut.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], is there anyone you look up to?
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_02_10: Of course I have someone I look up to—my dad, the Frontier Brain Tower Tycoon!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_03_10: The Tower Tycoon is the toughest Trainer at a facility called the Battle Tower, you know.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_04_10: If you don’t win a ton of Pokémon battles, you can’t even battle him!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0701_05_10: I want to be cool like my dad! That’s the reason I decided to become a Trainer!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_01_10: Of course I want to beat my dad in a Pokémon battle.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_02_10: Winning alone won’t make me into a cool Trainer like my dad, though.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_03_10: Hmm, what should I do? I guess I’ve still got a long way to go, huh?
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/0605_0702_04_10: I will do it, though! Try to keep up, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/1701_0701_02_10: I’ve already got one. One what? This item, of course!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/1701_0702_01_10: I could learn a lot from the way you use items.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/1701_0702_02_10: So if I find another good item, I’ll give it you!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve got a friend from Twinleaf Town just like me who’s amazingly tough in Pokémon battles!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_02_10: Battling with you makes me think of that kid.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_03_10: It makes me wanna win even more!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0701_04_10: Let’s go together someday. Then we can have a battle with my old friend!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_01_10: When you’ve got a really tough Trainer by your side, it gives you confidence!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_02_10: You can’t have a Pokémon battle by yourself, so there’s no point in getting tougher if you’re all alone.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2501_0702_03_10: When you have an opponent who wants to get tougher and battle against you, it makes you so amazingly happy!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_01_10: Pokémon battles are hard. When you get your directions wrong, you can lose just like that!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_02_10: When Pokémon are tough, you can be sure they have a Trainer they can count on.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_03_10: I’m doing my best to keep my precious Pokémon from getting hurt in battle.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0701_04_10: I think it’s because I’ve been trying so hard that my Pokémon grew to like me.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0702_01_10: There are some things Pokémon can’t do and some things Trainers can’t do.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/2511_0702_02_10: If each of them focuses on getting better at the things they can do, they make the toughest team!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! You slept in, huh? I’ve been awake since yesterday!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3002_0701_01_10: I try to take after my master and wake up early! Come to think of it, though, I’m not even sure if he does wake up early...
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3003_0701_01_10: *yawn* Starting to feel a little sleepy. But I gotta keep going full steam ahead!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3004_0701_01_10: I’m definitely prepared for some battling today! There’s no way I’ll forget anything this time.
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3005_0701_01_10: Evening! You’d think I’d be tired now, but I’m still wired!
ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.ch0099_00_jun/3006_0701_01_10: Time for my secret night training!  Wait, if you’ve found me,  it’s not secret anymore!

ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0101_0701_01_10: Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re looking bright eyed and bushy tailed today!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0101_0701_02_10: I’m feeling great myself! Let’s both get out there and do our best today!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_01_10: What? Is there something stuck to my face? Or...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_02_10: Is it that the buns on my head look like meatballs or something?!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_03_10: How very kind of you to notice! Even Snivy started making googly eyes at my hair buns the other day...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0701_04_10: She started nibbling on them, thinking they were actual food! Silly Snivy...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0702_01_10: Ugh, all this talk about food is making me hungry now...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0601_0702_02_10: What do you think the chances are that my hair buns have actually turned into meatballs without me noticing it? Hmm...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_01_10: There are so many different Trainers from all over the world gathered here on Pasio right now.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_02_10: The Pokémon everyone’s brought along are all so different, too! I hope I get the chance to battle each and every one.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_03_10: You know what? I WILL battle them all! I’m gonna make it happen for sure!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0701_04_10: This could be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, you know? As a Trainer, I’d be silly to pass it up!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0702_01_10: As long as you keep on battling, you’re bound to end up facing opponents from all over the world!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0602_0702_02_10: Especially right now, with everyone gathered around for the festivities! It feels like one big party!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0701_01_10: I love going out to big open fields to play with my Pokémon.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0701_02_10: We can relax and soak up the sun, and as a bonus, the photosynthesis process seems to perk up my Grass-type Pokémon!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0701_03_10: Being there always makes me feel good, too. It’s beneficial in all kinds of ways!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0702_01_10: Wait a sec! Do you think the reason my energy and enthusiasm is always at one thousand percent is because... *gasp*
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0603_0702_02_10: because I’m constantly breathing the pure, clean air that my Grass-type Pokémon produce around me?!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0701_01_10: Pokémon battles are a ton of fun, but sometimes it’s nice to just slow down and take a stroll.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0701_03_10: The truth is, I’m always itching to battle! I just love Pokémon battling that much!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0701_04_10: If someone were to ask me what my favorite thing in the whole wide world is, I would absolutely say Pokémon battling!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0702_01_10: It’s weird... Sometimes I wonder how it’s even possible that I love Pokémon battling this much.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0604_0702_02_10: All I know is that for me, Pokémon battling is the funnest thing in the whole universe!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0701_01_10: Wow, you’re just getting stronger by the day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0701_02_10: Watching it happen right here beside me just fills me with warm fuzzies!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0701_03_10: If we keep working hard, someday we’ll mark our place among the top Pokémon Trainers in the world!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0702_01_10: The heat and excitement of a Pokémon battle is like...like the climax of a really good movie!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/0605_0702_02_10: When your heart’s pounding and you’re on the edge of your seat... It’s so much fun, you just can’t help it!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0701_01_10: So, the other day I battled this REALLY strong sync pair! I wish you coulda seen the way I handled it!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0701_02_10: Anyway, I picked this up for you at the time! Here, it’s a present!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0702_01_10: Hope that little present comes in handy for you!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/1701_0702_02_10: I mean, how could anything I give you NOT come in handy? Kidding, kidding...
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0701_01_10: Are you going out exploring today? I feel like something good’s gonna happen!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0701_02_10: I mean, it’s just my intuition, though... It’s not like I have proof or anything!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0701_03_10: Then again, just getting to meet someone and talk to them qualifies as good in my book!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0702_01_10: I love Pokémon battling, but I also really love talking to other people!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0702_02_10: Plus I’m greedy, so I just wanna do all the fun stuff all the time!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2501_0702_03_10: If something fun happens, please tell me! I’d love to hear all about it!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0701_01_10: You know, since meeting you, I’ve learned so many amazing things.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0701_02_10: Things like...like just how precious the bond is between a Trainer and their Pokémon!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0701_03_10: I still have a lot left to learn, but you just watch! Pretty soon I’ll be impressing you with how I’ve grown!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0702_01_10: You know, I sometimes get a little sad when I lose a Pokémon battle. Or I feel like I’m just not good enough.
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0702_02_10: But then I think about how much potential I have to grow stronger, and suddenly I feel all better!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/2511_0702_03_10: It’s important to stay positive, you see? Taking that first little step will really propel you forward!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Ready to go all out today? I know I am!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3002_0701_01_10: Good morning! Let’s make sure we put today to good use!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3003_0701_01_10: Hiii! I think it’s time for a tasty afternoon snack!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3004_0701_01_10: Oh man, I’m itching to get out there and battle! So, when are we going? Now?
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3005_0701_01_10: Hi there! It’s not good to stay up too late, you know!
ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_00_mei/3006_0701_01_10: Whoa, look at the time! We should go to sleep soon so we’re not tired tomorrow!

ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0101_0701_01_10: Oh! Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Looking good today! Is that a new hat?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0101_0701_02_10: I don’t know what it is, but something about this outfit always puts me in a good mood! I feel like exploring! Wanna come with?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_01_10: Parties never stop being fun, no matter how old you get.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_02_10: You get to play with tons of Pokémon, exchange gifts with your friends... And the best part is...
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_03_10: you get to eat all the yummy party food you want! You’d have to be crazy to say no to that, right?!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0701_04_10: Wh-why are you looking at me like that? You just compared me to a Munchlax in your head, didn’t you? I—I just like food, OK?!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0702_01_10: I’ve met so many awesome sync pairs since coming here to Pasio. I’d love to throw a party with everyone!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0702_02_10: Don’t you think it would be fun?! We could make so many amazing memories together!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0601_0702_03_10: I’ll try to come up with some cool party ideas, OK? Once I get everything set up, you’ll be the first person I invite!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_01_10: You know how they call Delibird a Delivery Pokémon? Well, mine likes to give me all sorts of presents!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_02_10: It’s mostly just Berries and flowers, but it feels kinda nice to get presents out of the blue like that.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_03_10: Although...the other day, I woke up from a nap to find a cast-off Bug Pokémon shell in front of my face.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0701_04_10: It was so freaky! Not exactly the kind of present I’d choose to wake up to.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0702_01_10: The Bug Pokémon shell came as a bit of a shock, but Delibird didn’t mean any harm by it.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0702_02_10: I made sure to say thank you to her, and she gave me a little smile in return.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0602_0702_03_10: For me, that little smile was the real present.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0603_0701_01_10: Since pairing up with Delibird, I learned something super fun! Wanna know what it is?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0603_0701_02_10: You know that big, white sack-looking thing that Delibird carry around? Well... That’s actually its tail!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0603_0701_03_10: I never would’ve guessed that was part of its body... Pokémon are so full of mystery!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0603_0702_01_10: Did you know that Delibird store food in their tails to feed to their chicks?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0603_0702_02_10: Be careful not to accidentally touch one... If they think you’re trying to steal their chicks’ food, they get reeeally angry.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0603_0702_03_10: When it comes to protecting their chicks, Delibird don’t mess around. But they’re actually supernice Pokémon!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0604_0701_01_10: Tee-hee! Like my outfit? Siebold gave it to me.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0604_0701_02_10: He told me that in some regions, this outfit symbolizes the spirit of joy and giving. Pretty nice, huh? I love the red-and-white combo.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0604_0701_03_10: My favorite part is that I match Delibird now! Tee-hee! You can totally tell we’re a sync pair!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0604_0702_01_10: What? There are a bunch of other Pokémon that are red and white, too?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0604_0702_02_10: Let’s see... There’s Voltorb and Electrode... Zangoose... Wurmple...
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0604_0702_03_10: I guess you’re right—I match a bunch of different Pokémon in this outfit! It would be so cool to form a group with all of them!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0605_0701_01_10: Um, e-excuse me... Do you have a minute or two? I’m looking for Trainers to answer my questionnaire.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0605_0701_02_10: OK, first question. Serious answers only, please... What’s your favorite...cake flavor?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0605_0701_03_10: D-don’t laugh! It’s a serious question! I asked you for serious answers only, remember? Tell me everything you like!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0605_0702_01_10: Tee-hee! Thank you so much for answering my questions! I really appreciate it.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/0605_0702_02_10: I don’t have anything with me right now... But I’ll be sure to get you a thank-you present soon, OK?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/1701_0701_01_10: Oh! I’m so glad I caught you!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/1701_0701_02_10: Delibird gave this to me, but I already have too many! Will you take it off my hands?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/1701_0702_01_10: Awww, I’m so glad you like it! Make sure you tell Delibird thank you, too, OK?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/1701_0702_02_10: If you do, she might bring you another present!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2501_0701_01_10: I used to think that getting presents made people way happier than giving them, but now I’m not so sure.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2501_0701_02_10: When you give someone a present, you get a smile in return. I don’t know about you, but that always gives me the warm fuzzies!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2501_0701_03_10: Wait a sec... Wouldn’t that mean both the giver and the receiver get something in the end? Hmm... Either way, it feels nice!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2501_0702_01_10: If you’re gonna give someone a present, you should try to get them something they really want, huh?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2501_0702_02_10: I love seeing how happy my friends look when they open a present I picked out specifically for them!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2501_0702_04_10: Say, if someone were to get you a present... what sort of present would you want most? J-just asking for a friend!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_01_10: Getting to pair up with a new Pokémon has been really exciting, but it’s kinda made me think about certain things.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_02_10: Does she like me? What does she think of me? Am I giving her the right commands? For a while, I couldn’t stop thinking about Delibird.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_03_10: But then I realized that the only way to find answers was to ask her face-to-face!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0701_04_10: That’s the method I chose, and it’s been working out pretty great so far!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_01_10: Have you ever thought about what it would be like if we Trainers could speak Pokémon?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_02_10: I used to think it would be sooo amazing, but recently my opinion’s sorta changed.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_03_10: Nowadays, I feel like as long as we can get our feelings across, who needs words! That’s kinda what it means to be a sync pair, right?
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_04_10: Tee-hee! Watching you and your Pokémon together is actually what helped me realize that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/2511_0702_05_10: I wanna spend even more time with Delibird! The closer we get as friends and partners, the better we’ll be able to communicate!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Let’s get out there bright and early and go spread some cheer!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/3002_0701_01_10: Oof... I can’t seem to wake up this morning. Want to have a quick Pokémon battle? That ought to do the trick.
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/3003_0701_01_10: Hey there! Have you had lunch yet? If not, we should grab something to munch on together!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/3004_0701_01_10: Hey! Wanna see if we can find a few sync pairs itching to battle this afternoon? Now’s the perfect time to head out!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/3005_0701_01_10: Phew! I think I might’ve overdone it a little with the training today. I could go for another round if you want to, though!
ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.ch0101_10_mei/3006_0701_01_10: Can you believe the day’s already almost over? I wonder what kind of adventures are waiting for us tomorrow!

ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3201_0701_01_10: Welcome! We have an assortment of sorts, so please take your time looking around!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3201_0701_02_10: Thank you! We look forward to your next visit!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3202_0701_01_10: Welcome! Here are the current products!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3202_0701_02_10: Thank you! Please come again soon!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3203_0701_01_10: Welcome! Are you doing some shopping? We have a variety of useful items!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3203_0701_02_10: Thank you! I look forward to your next visit!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_01_10: Where are the customers? We have some nice stuff.
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_02_10: I wonder when that person will come again...
