ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_03_10: Perhaps I should change the layout of the products.
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_05_10: It’s about time for me to replenish stock.
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3301_1031_07_10: I get excited when I make a ton of sales!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3401_0701_01_10: We just got some new products! Take your time looking around!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3402_0701_01_10: Take a look at this cool thing. It’s cool, right?
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3501_1031_01_10: New product in stock! I want to scream!
ch0103_00_staff_shop_en.lsd.ch0103_00_staff_shop/3501_1031_02_10: This would be perfect for that person...

ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3201_0701_01_10: Welcome! For anything related to your team members, please come this way!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3202_0701_01_10: Welcome! Would you like to prepare for an adventure?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3202_0701_02_10: Thank you! We hope to see you again!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3203_0701_01_10: Welcome! If you’d like to discuss your team members, come right this way!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3203_0701_02_10: Thank you! Please stop by anytime!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_01_10: I hope we get lots of customers at the café.
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_02_10: The role of a café is to connect people.
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_03_10: What kind of person will stop by the café today?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_05_10: Oh my, that person’s Pokémon is cute!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_06_10: Let me take care of your team!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3301_1031_07_10: If that person met that person... Hee-hee!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3401_0701_01_10: So I’ve got an interesting scoop! You wanna hear?
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3402_0701_01_10: That was some interesting news. Oh, welcome! I just got a nifty piece of information!
ch0104_00_staff_cafe_en.lsd.ch0104_00_staff_cafe/3501_1031_01_10: I just heard a great piece of information!

ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0101_0701_01_10: Hey there. Today’s looking pretty dazzling already, don’t you think?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0101_0701_02_10: I think it’s time for the two of us to take a walk... down the runway to victory, that is!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_01_10: People watching you 24-7, never having a moment to yourself...
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_02_10: That’s the life of a professional model. There’s no such thing as a day off for me.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_03_10: When I’m focusing on being a Pokémon Trainer, though, I’m the one doing the watching!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0701_04_10: I like to keep a close eye on my adorable Pokémon. I don’t want to miss even the slightest change in mood or behavior.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0702_01_10: Oh, there are things I have to keep a close eye on as a model, too...
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0601_0702_02_10: I’ve gotta keep up with the fashion trends... what’s in and what’s out. I can’t afford to miss out on any of that juicy info!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0701_01_10: I work hard as a model and a Gym Leader to make every day shine.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0701_02_10: Other than that, I dunno... I guess I don’t really have any hobbies.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0701_03_10: I get so caught up in Pokémon and fashion that I can barely think of anything else! It makes every day so much fun, though.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0702_01_10: Life can be hard sometimes, sure. But the best thing you can do is face your challenges head on!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0602_0702_02_10: If you can do that, you’ll discover things about yourself that you never knew before. The whole world will open up for you!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0701_01_10: Sygna suits are all the rage on Pasio right now. They’re so cute, I do a double take every time I see a Trainer wearing one.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0701_02_10: I hear they’re one of a kind. Supposedly, the designer is all about creating signature looks for certain Trainers and their Pokémon.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0701_03_10: As a model and a Trainer, I’d love to get my hands on a sygna suit of my own one day.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0702_01_10: Only a select few Trainers have had sygna suits designed for them so far, you know.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0603_0702_02_10: I wonder what a sygna suit designed specifically for me would look like...
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_01_10: Have I ever told you how I first met Zebstrika? It’s such a fantastic story.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_02_10: One day, I got lost on my way home from a photo shoot and it started to pour really hard outside.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_03_10: I was running around, soaking wet, when I heard a Pokémon cry. Then a second later, I saw Zebstrika jolt out of a bush nearby.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0701_04_10: The poor thing had been struck by a bolt of lightning. Her mane was crackling with electricity.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0702_01_10: Zebstrika just stared up at me, not moving an inch.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0702_02_10: Something about that moment felt like fate... So I did the only thing I could think of at the time. I caught her.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0604_0702_03_10: I know there’s no way of really knowing whether the things that happen to us are fate or not... But I felt it in my heart regardless.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_01_10: I’d love to be with my sweet Pokémon every hour of every day...
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_02_10: but it’s good to let our Pokémon rest up at a Pokémon Center every now and then.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_03_10: I mean, burnout is just the worst. You can’t do a good job at work if you’re exhausted.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0701_04_10: That goes for people, too! Take it easy and make sure you give yourself some time to relax and refresh, OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0702_01_10: I think it’d be nice to get away from the big city for a while. Maybe someplace remote, where no one’s around.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/0605_0702_02_10: I wouldn’t even care if it got dark outside. Zebstrika can be my own little night-light.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, just the person I was looking for! I’ve got something for you.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/1701_0701_02_10: It’s been a must-have item for me lately. I highly recommend it.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/1701_0702_01_10: I’ll let you know if I find anything else you’d be interested in!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_01_10: I think people shine the most when their hearts are really full.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_02_10: You can dress yourself up on the outside as much as you want—fashion, jewelry, makeup— but you can’t dress up your heart.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_03_10: When you feel happy and content on the inside, you’ll naturally be more positive and confident on the outside.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0701_04_10: That kind of inner light glows all around you— enough that people can see the difference.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0702_01_10: When I see someone that shines as brightly as you do, it makes me want to do better, too.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2501_0702_02_10: You’re like a beam of sunshine! So always remember to be yourself, OK?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_01_10: Hey... There’s something I’ve been wanting to talk to you about... Do you have a sec?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_02_10: I’ve been meaning to tell you this for a while... I just haven’t had the courage until now.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_03_10: I know it’s Farfetch’d, but...be careful what you wish for, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... You Magnemite get it.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0701_04_10: Ha ha ha! Oh, sweetie, I’m so sorry... Maybe I should have kept my Meowth shut after all!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0702_01_10: OK, OK, I’m done now... Sometimes I like to tell jokes to get a good back-and-forth going with people.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/2511_0702_02_10: Most people think I’d be too cool and sophisticated to tell a silly joke, and I just love proving them wrong! Isn’t this side of me fun?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Nice day, isn’t it? If you’re still feeling groggy, you could try doing some stretches. Works for me!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/3002_0701_01_10: I love a good run in the morning. Keeps me strong and beautiful!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/3003_0701_01_10: The way the sun’s shining right now  would be perfect for a photo shoot.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/3004_0701_01_10: The weather will be cooling off soon. Don’t forget to bring a cute jacket with you if you’re heading out!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/3005_0701_01_10: Evening! There’s a nice, cool breeze out there tonight.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_00_kamitsure/3006_0701_01_10: I’d never say no to some warm, glittering sunshine, but moonlight has its own brilliant beauty as well...

ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0101_0701_01_10: I'm liking your look today... You’re brimming with energy.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0101_0701_02_10: That's good. You have to look the part. What do you say? Ready for an adventure?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_01_10: I make sure that I never stop improving... both as a Trainer and as a model.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_02_10: First, I visualize the best version of myself— the one I want to become.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_03_10: Once I do that, I set specific, small goals that I can achieve to get to my ultimate goal.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0701_04_10: Then, I have to keep my will strong and keep moving forward... Nice and simple, right?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0702_01_10: It can definitely be difficult to achieve the goals that you set for yourself.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0702_02_10: I mean, even I’m no stranger to failure.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0601_0702_03_10: Whenever that happens... the best thing you can do is to keep going and tell yourself that you’ll do better next time.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0701_01_10: Whenever people describe inspiration, don’t they say it’s like a jolt of electricity?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0701_02_10: I’ve always found that weird. I feel like you’d more likely forget things if you were actually hit by electricity, right?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0701_03_10: *giggle* Do you want to try it out?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0702_01_10: I’m only joking. I wouldn’t actually think of electrocuting anybody.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0702_02_10: But wouldn’t it be wonderful to be an electrifying inspiration for people?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0602_0702_03_10: I hope to become like that someday, both as a model and as a Trainer.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_01_10: My Rotom likes to go into my appliances to play pranks on me.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_02_10: It sometimes gets into my hair dryer in the morning and makes my bedhead even worse than it already is.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_03_10: Other times, it gets into my toaster and burns my toast to a crisp...
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0701_04_10: Mornings are always an uphill battle.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0702_01_10: Rotom can be a pain in the neck, but its pranks keep everything fresh for me!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0603_0702_02_10: Rotom’s serious when it comes to having fun! It’s easy to forget how important that is. We can all learn a thing or two from Rotom.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0701_01_10: The designer who made this outfit totally gets me.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0701_02_10: Just a pretty outfit would be boring, and just an eccentric one wouldn’t be satisfying enough.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0701_03_10: But this outfit has the perfect balance between beauty and eccentricity.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0702_01_10: This outfit totally fits my lifestyle in every way.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0702_02_10: Although I pursue perfection, I still want to keep the luxury of having some fun.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0604_0702_03_10: I’m all about mastering beauty and eccentricity! That way, I can have some fabulous fun!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0701_01_10: You don’t need any grandiose theatrics when you meet somebody. There’s no such thing as a “fated meeting.”
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0701_02_10: The most dazzling stories are written after the characters meet, right?
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0701_03_10: And only when they’ve had a beautiful story written about them, then they can decide whether their meeting was fated or not.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0702_01_10: I wonder what kind of story will be written about Rotom and me...or you and me...
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0702_02_10: Of course, we can never know what the future has in store for us.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/0605_0702_03_10: And that can be a little scary, but I think it’s more exciting than anything!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/1701_0701_01_10: I’d like you to have this.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/1701_0701_02_10: You’re always working so hard. I think this will really help you out.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/1701_0702_01_10: Keep at it. I’m cheering for you!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_01_10: On my days off, I go shopping with Skyla a lot.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_02_10: We like to wander around and pick out clothes we think would look good on each other.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_03_10: But sometimes, Skyla chooses some weird outfits for me to try on.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0701_04_10: I guess it’s fine. I get to try out all sorts of outfits, and Skyla seems to really enjoy it.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0702_01_10: Skyla has such good style. I think she could totally be a model, too, if she wanted to.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2501_0702_02_10: It’d be really fun if we could walk the same catwalk someday.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_01_10: When you’re a model and a Gym Leader, you get to meet a lot of different people.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_02_10: Over the years, I’ve met a lot of people I respect. Not only in Unova but here on Pasio, too.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_03_10: And one of them is you.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0701_04_10: You’re so earnest and kind, as a Trainer and just as a person.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0702_01_10: I’ve never seen you be anything but nice to the people and Pokémon around you.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/2511_0702_02_10: I say this without any sarcasm. It’s what makes you so dazzling.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/3001_0701_01_10: Sometimes I have to wake up super early, depending on what outfit I’m gonna wear. Perfection takes time!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/3002_0701_01_10: The air’s so clean and fresh here... It feels good to take a nice, deep breath.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/3003_0701_01_10: It’s always super lively here around this time. So many Trainers to chat with!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/3004_0701_01_10: I’m going for perfect posture—it makes me look that much more fierce!
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/3005_0701_01_10: On nights when I can’t sleep, I step outside, spread my arms, and bathe in the moon’s spotlight.
ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.ch0106_10_kamitsure/3006_0701_01_10: Phew! My skin must be glistening after that training session... Time to cool down so I can do the same routine again tomorrow.

ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0101_0701_01_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you ready to get out there and do some exploring today?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0101_0701_02_10: Come on—let’s give it all we’ve got! And don’t be afraid to ask questions, OK? You can ask me anything!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_01_10: So, what’s your policy when it comes to training up your Pokémon?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_02_10: I mean, what do you think about when choosing a Pokémon to be your partner in a sync pair?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0701_03_10: When you’re aiming to master something, I feel like sticking to a policy is super important.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0702_01_10: You and your Pokémon always look like you’re having so much fun while you battle.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0601_0702_02_10: Whatever your personal policy is when it comes to training, I’m sure it must be as all-out powerful as mine!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_01_10: I’m so excited for the Pokémon Masters League! Only the toughest Trainers get to compete.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_02_10: If I get the chance to battle it out, I’d love to go up against a certain Ice-type Trainer...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0701_03_10: Lorelei, from the Indigo League Elite Four in Kanto! I’ll show her what an all-out offensive looks like!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_01_10: I’ve always looked up to Lorelei’s calm, cool, intellectual battle style.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_02_10: I’ve already battled against so many different Trainers since coming to Pasio.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0602_0702_03_10: I feel like I’m bound to face her eventually!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_01_10: Water-type Pokémon are all so adorable, don’t you think?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_02_10: Starmie, Psyduck, Dewgong, Quagsire, Seaking, Lanturn, Slowbro...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_03_10: Lapras, Gyarados, Horsea, Blastoise, Seel, Seadra, Poliwhirl...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0701_04_10: I love every last one of them! But it’s Starmie here that I chose to partner up with as a sync pair.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_01_10: Do you like Water-type Pokémon, too?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_02_10: Starmie is so nice. It always helps me out with morning training.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0603_0702_03_10: And there’s nothing like surfing the waves on a Lapras! Let me know if you ever feel like giving it a shot!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_01_10: That red crystal in the center of Starmie’s body is what we call its “core.” It kinda looks like a jewel, right?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_02_10: Well, it may be pretty, but Starmie’s not just  for looks! Starmie is actually super fast.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0701_03_10: It’s also great at supporting its allies— Starmie’s just a really dependable Pokémon all around!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_01_10: Did you know that Bubble Beam is one of Starmie’s specialties?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_02_10: As moves go, it’s a lot more powerful than Bubble. The number of bubbles it spews out is really amazing!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0604_0702_03_10: Next time we battle, I’ll show you what I’m talking about!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_01_10: I’ve done a lot of traveling, even before coming here to Pasio.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_02_10: But ever since I teamed up with you, I’ve felt like my Pokémon and I have become closer than ever before.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_03_10: Battling on a team with you has helped me realize so many things I never noticed before.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0701_04_10: I’m so glad I decided to come to Pasio! And thank you!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_01_10: For a long time, it was my dream to go off on a journey and battle against tough Trainers...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_02_10: That dream came true, but now I have a new one: to defeat you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/0605_0702_03_10: I’m so glad we were able to meet here on Pasio!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0701_01_10: Great timing! I’ve got something for you that I think you’re gonna like!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0701_02_10: Here, this is from me. Make sure you take good care of it, OK?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0702_01_10: I don’t know why, but giving people presents always feels a little embarrassing.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/1701_0702_02_10: Anyway, now that you have it, you’ll have to decide how best to use it!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_01_10: If you want to be better friends with your Pokémon, my advice to you is to train in an environment that it likes!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_02_10: I use Water-type Pokémon, so I end up at the beach more often than not.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0701_03_10: For us, swimming, surfing, and spending time together there is really important.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_01_10: Hmm... Should I buy a new swimsuit or some new clothes for training...
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_02_10: When it comes to self-improvement and looking good, I never spare any expense.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2501_0702_03_10: Working on yourself is just as important as working on your Pokémon!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_01_10: Have you gotten used to Pasio yet? For being an artificial island, it sure is huge.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_02_10: Do you have a favorite spot that you like to go to? If you do some exploring, you might discover someplace new!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0701_03_10: There aren’t any wild Pokémon to catch here, but battling with all the different Trainers is actually a lot of fun!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_01_10: The sunsets on Pasio are so pretty.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_02_10: I’ve always loved gazing out at the sunset back home on the Cerulean Cape, too.
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/2511_0702_03_10: I feel like it’s giving me a push— like it’s telling me to do my best tomorrow, too!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3001_0701_01_10: Morning! Starmie and I were just about to go out for some early training!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3002_0701_01_10: A quick swim right after you wake up  is a perfect, refreshing start to the day!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3003_0701_01_10: Hey! Are you free right now? How about a quick swim?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3004_0701_01_10: Snack time’s over! Time to get out there and use up all this energy! Wanna battle?
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3005_0701_01_10: Are you going out to train at this hour? Have fun, but don’t overdo it!
ch0110_01_kasumi_en.lsd.ch0110_01_kasumi/3006_0701_01_10: Man, I don’t feel sleepy at all yet! Maybe it’s because I took a nap while surfing with my Pokémon earlier...

ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve been waiting for you.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0101_0701_02_10: Ready to go do some exploring today?
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0701_02_10: It’s hard to catch them, but it’s so much fun training them.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0701_03_10: And their strength is out of this world! They make the best partners!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0701_04_10: However, Dragon-type Pokémon don’t do well in the cold. It’s not uncommon for me to huddle with mine in the winter to keep them warm.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0702_01_10: If only there were a heated blanket big enough for a dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0702_02_10: Maybe even big enough to have a picnic on.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0601_0702_03_10: Ha ha! I can’t even imagine how big that blanket would have to be.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_01_10: There are a lot of dragon masters in Blackthorn City, where I’m from.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_02_10: My grandfather is the elder of a famous clan of dragon masters.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_03_10: He, his grandfather, and even his grandfather before him...
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0701_04_10: they all had a deep bond with dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0702_01_10: Someday, stories about me will be passed down to future generations of our clan as well.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0702_02_10: If I think about it that way, it reminds me that I have to be on my best behavior.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0602_0702_03_10: I’d like to be a good role model for all future dragon masters.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0701_01_10: I can’t stand Trainers that cheat or use cowardly and underhanded tactics.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0701_02_10: Battles should be fought fair and square.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0701_03_10: Whenever you battle, make sure you keep it clean, too.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0702_01_10: Only cowards resort to sucker punches.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0702_02_10: Pokémon moves are a different story, though.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0603_0702_03_10: If you have Pokémon that use Sucker Punch or Feint Attack, more power to you!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0701_01_10: This cape is a defining part of my wardrobe. I wear it rain or shine.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0701_02_10: Back in my hometown of Blackthorn City, my cape is like a uniform. When people see it, they know I’m a dragon master.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0701_03_10: I happen to like it quite a bit. It’s a uniform that many aspiring dragon masters hope to wear one day.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0702_01_10: You want to know where I got this cape? It was actually custom-made at a department store.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0604_0702_02_10: I can’t resist buying more of them whenever I shop there.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0701_01_10: Whenever I see people or Pokémon in need, I feel compelled to help them in any way I can.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0701_02_10: One man’s justice may be another man’s injustice...
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0701_03_10: but I can only trust that what I believe is right and stay steadfast on my path.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0702_01_10: If you ever think what I’m doing is wrong or unjust, don’t hesitate to stop me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/0605_0702_02_10: But I should warn you, I don’t back down easily.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, I was just thinking of you! Here, take this with you!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/1701_0701_02_10: You never know. It might come in handy.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/1701_0702_01_10: I’m sure you’ll use it to help somebody.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0701_01_10: If I’m going to fight in a Pokémon battle, I want to win.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0701_02_10: Your skills have noticeably increased after each of your battles.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0702_01_10: I see you getting stronger and stronger.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0702_02_10: You have noticeably increased your skills after each battle.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2501_0702_03_10: I hope to remain a trusted teammate and a formidable rival to you.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0701_01_10: I’m sure you would become almost invincible if you mastered using dragon Pokémon.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0701_02_10: Speaking of dragon Pokémon, that reminds me of my hometown, Blackthorn City!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0701_03_10: If you’re interested in meeting dragon masters, I’ll show you around someday.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0702_01_10: If we ever have the chance, I’d like you to show me around your hometown, too.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/2511_0702_02_10: Maybe the source of your strength lies in your origins.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/3001_0701_01_10: Pleasant morning we’re having today! The Pokémon are all bright and cheerful.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/3002_0701_01_10: I always feel at my best when I have a nice, hearty breakfast in the morning!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/3003_0701_01_10: Don’t let your energy crash in the afternoon. Wake up! Keep moving!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/3004_0701_01_10: It’s good to travel around to new places every so often. It can be a nice change of pace.
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/3005_0701_01_10: Make sure you get a good rest tonight. We could use that energy tomorrow!
ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.ch0111_00_wataru/3006_0701_01_10: Taking care of my health is one of my highest priorities. Always has been, always will be.

ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0101_0701_01_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting for you!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0101_0701_02_10: Every day is a new adventure on Pasio! Let’s go see what we can find today!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_01_10: Be sure to wear clothes you can move around in if you’re gonna be adventuring outside!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_02_10: Be it climbing mountains or walking on the beach, it’s best to be able to move, right?
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_03_10: I don’t have too many preferences in my fashion, but that’s definitely one of the few!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0701_04_10: Oh, my other one is how I wear my cap backwards!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0702_01_10: I have to make sure I never forget my hat when walking around.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0702_02_10: It’s an important item that protects me from strong sunlight and the cold!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0601_0702_03_10: I gotta take care of myself. I wouldn’t be doing my Pokémon any favors if I fainted on them!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0701_01_10: I’m friends with an old couple who run a Pokémon Day Care!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0701_02_10: That couple took such good care of my Pokémon that the Pokémon are really attached to them now.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0701_03_10: Seeing how they raise Pokémon opened my eyes to the possibilities of how much closer people and Pokémon can become!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0702_01_10: You seem like you have an easy time getting close with your Pokémon.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0602_0702_02_10: Is it because you shower them with affection? If you have a secret to it, let me know sometime!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0701_01_10: I have a friend named Lyra. She’s a Pokémon Trainer, too.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0701_02_10: I grew up with her in New Bark Town. She’s not only a great rival but also one of my best friends!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0701_03_10: She’s got a good head on her shoulders, and she’s good in a Pokémon battle to boot! If you need anybody to have your back, she’s your girl!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0702_01_10: We have to value not only our bonds with our Pokémon but our bonds with other Trainers, too!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0603_0702_02_10: I mean, c’mon. It’s kinda great to have people you can depend on, isn’t it?
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_01_10: I was floored the first time I heard that Pasio is an artificial island!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_02_10: It’s got mountains, beaches, forests... I might go so far as to say that it’s as beautiful as Johto!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_03_10: There are so many things that you can discover on Pasio. Even walking around alone is fun.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0701_04_10: But that’s nothing compared to traveling with your friends!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0702_01_10: A lot of my camping buddies and I trade all sorts of secrets with each other—like what kinds of Berries are good to eat!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0604_0702_02_10: If you’re ever interested in camping, let me know! We should go together sometime!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_01_10: There has been a lot of cool stuff that happened since I got to Pasio.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_02_10: But I think the best part was how I became friends with you!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_03_10: I feel like I can just talk about anything with you.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0701_04_10: And with you, I could keep exploring forever!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0702_01_10: If there’s anything on your mind, don’t hesitate to tell me, all right?
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/0605_0702_02_10: We’re friends. I want to help you anytime you need it!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, hey! Perfect timing! There is something I wanted to give you.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0701_02_10: Here, take this! I’m sure it’ll be useful!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0702_01_10: Using the right item at the right time can make exploring and battles even more fun!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/1701_0702_02_10: Use whatever item you can if you find yourself in a bind!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0701_01_10: You want to know why I’m with my Pokémon? Huh... You know, it’s become so matter of fact that I’ve never actually thought about it.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0701_02_10: Well, let’s see... Battles and tournaments are definitely a lot of fun. But if I were to give a single reason...
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0701_03_10: Because it’s fun to be with them! You’re the same way, right?
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0702_01_10: I thought it over, and I realized you don’t need a reason to spend time with your friends or with Pokémon!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2501_0702_02_10: We need each other—that’s why we’re together. It’s as simple as that!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0701_01_10: Sometimes when I’m exploring the island...
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0701_02_10: I come across sights that take my breath away!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0701_04_10: Whenever I see something like that, it doesn’t matter how tired I am from exploring! I get full of energy again!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0702_01_10: Seeing all the best views on Pasio...
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/2511_0702_02_10: That might be a pretty good goal, too!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/3001_0701_01_10: When I decide I wanna do something, I go for it! Sometimes you just have to dive in!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/3002_0701_01_10: Got my hat, my bangs look good... All ready to go! Wanna go explore together?
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/3003_0701_01_10: *cheerful humming* When I’m walking and singing, I feel like I can cross entire mountains!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/3004_0701_01_10: Free and easy, like a leaf blowing in the wind... That’s my kind of adventure!
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/3005_0701_01_10: When you’re working hard, you’ve gotta rest hard, too! That’s what my mom always says.
ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.ch0112_00_hibiki/3006_0701_01_10: Ah! I got so distracted! I’d better grab something to eat before my stomach starts growling.

ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0101_0701_01_10: Aha, there you are! I had a feeling I’d be seeing you soon!
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0101_0701_02_10: My powers are at your disposal, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...if you want my help, that is.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0701_01_10: A lot of people think my psychic powers are just part of my everyday life.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0701_03_10: Honestly, it’s very difficult to control my powers. I can lose the sense for it quite easily if I don’t train every day.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0701_04_10: I guess it’s similar to Pokémon battles. Both require daily training.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0702_01_10: It’s difficult to maintain immense power...
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0601_0702_02_10: And I’m not only talking about psychic powers.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_01_10: Alakazam is so intelligent that he can solve any problem immediately—no matter how difficult it is.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_02_10: However, he never tells me the answer whenever I’m struggling with something.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_03_10: He must know that in those cases, staying silent is the best thing to do.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0701_04_10: Because if we don’t find our own answers to our problems, we’ll never grow.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0702_01_10: Alakazam is very smart and has powerful psychic abilities.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0602_0702_02_10: I have to keep training so that I stay worthy of being his partner.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0603_0701_02_10: So even if you have the gift of precognition, that doesn’t mean you can win every Pokémon battle.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0603_0701_03_10: That’s what makes them so interesting, though.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0603_0702_02_10: That’s probably because you’re filled with so many different possibilities.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0701_01_10: A long time ago, I battled the Fighting Dojo to make mine the official Gym of Saffron City.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0701_02_10: I ultimately won, but they were very strong opponents.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0701_03_10: I even saw a glimpse of a future where I would lose.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0702_02_10: But there are times, like with the Fighting Dojo, where I can’t avoid a conflict.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0604_0702_03_10: I’ve long since accepted this as the fate of a Gym Leader.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_01_10: I had a feeling when I first met you,  [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_02_10: I sensed that we could be very good friends.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_03_10: I think that hunch came true.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0701_04_10: I hope you feel the same.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0702_01_10: It might be fun to do what normal friends do together.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0702_02_10: For example, let’s see... Ah yes, like going shopping.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/0605_0702_03_10: Yeah... That would be a lot of fun.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/1701_0701_01_10: I thought I’d run into you if I waited here.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/1701_0701_02_10: Here, I wanted to give this to you. I know you’ll find a use for it.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/1701_0702_02_10: I knew you would. I saw a future where you were happy.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0701_01_10: People seem to think that psychic powers are something that only a few people have, but that’s not true. Everybody has psychic power.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0701_03_10: I don’t just mean physical things you can see, like moving an object or something.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0701_04_10: Consider the power created by the love you have for your Pokémon. I think that can be considered a psychic power.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0702_01_10: Psychic powers are a lot more commonplace than many might think.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2501_0702_02_10: I just hope I can make people here on Pasio understand that.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_01_10: Alakazam and I are two bodies, one soul. We share a psychic link with each other.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_02_10: While it’s great that we can communicate without words...
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_03_10: we can also share emotions. So when Alakazam is sad, I get sad, too.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0701_04_10: Alakazam and I have been through a lot. You might even call us comrades-in-arms.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0702_01_10: Feeling your Pokémon’s pain like your own can be tough.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0702_02_10: But at the same time, maybe that’s actually a good thing when we look at it as Trainers.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/2511_0702_03_10: After all, the more you share your feelings with your Pokémon, the closer you will become.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/3001_0701_01_10: Are you able to sense what sort of day lies ahead of you? Sometimes knowing can be a double-edged sword.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/3002_0701_01_10: Hmm... It seems as though neither your heart nor your mind are fully awake this morning.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/3003_0701_01_10: Let’s visit the ocean today. Something important awaits us there... I can feel it.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/3004_0701_01_10: We’ll have a good time if we spend the day together... I don’t need to see the future to know that much.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/3005_0701_01_10: We’ll see each other again tomorrow... I’ve already foreseen it.
ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.ch0114_00_natsume/3006_0701_01_10: Night is a good time to reflect on oneself... to focus on our inner thoughts.

ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0101_0701_01_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was just thinking about you.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0101_0701_02_10: I’m curious to see what you accomplish here on Pasio...
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_01_10: Pasio’s full of all sorts of people, huh? Champions, Gym Leaders, and the like.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_02_10: But just because someone’s got a sparkling job title doesn’t mean they can’t be beat.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_03_10: This world’s got so much potential... Anyone can push their way to the top if they put their mind to it.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0601_0701_04_10: Haha! Whatever, right? Just ignore me and my philosophical rambling for now, and have some fun watching your story unfold!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0601_0702_01_10: You and your Pokémon should tell me your story sometime. I’d love to hear it.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0601_0702_02_10: You’d better let me be part of your adventure at some point, too, OK? Don’t leave me hanging!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_01_10: Who am I? Who am I, really? It’s a question everyone probably asks themselves at some point in their life.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_02_10: It’s definitely something I had to ask myself once.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_03_10: I spent some time in the Hoenn region, and the people I met there helped me sort of discover who I am.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_04_10: It’s thanks to them that I’m able to answer that question now.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0701_05_10: So, y’know, I can say that I’m Zinnia, and my partner is Rayquaza.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0702_01_10: Think you’ll ever meet someone who totally turns your world upside down?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0602_0702_02_10: What if that were me? Ahaha!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_01_10: Ever since I was a little girl, I’ve always turned my eyes up to the sky.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_02_10: No matter how uncertain or grief-stricken or alone I felt, I turned and looked up there... so that my tears would never, ever fall.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_03_10: Looking up at the sky brings back a lot of memories for me.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_04_10: The people I met back in Hoenn, the Pokémon I encountered...
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0701_05_10: Guess I’ve been through a lot! Heh...
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0702_01_10: What about you? Do you ever do that sort of thing?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0702_02_10: We should go stargazing sometime, me and you.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0603_0702_03_10: We can get lost in our thoughts on infinite universes and galaxies far away.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_01_10: Do you have someone or something you’d want to protect at all costs? Something greater than yourself?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_02_10: If the answer is yes, you should remember this...
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_03_10: Try not to take things for granted—especially the things you really care about.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_04_10: You never know... One day, they could suddenly disappear, lost forever.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0701_05_10: I mean, it’s your job to make sure nothing like that ever happens, but you can’t be too careful.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0702_01_10: They say you can never truly know how much something means to you until it’s gone.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0604_0702_02_10: I wonder if we even realize how much we love the things we want to protect.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_01_10: If you had to make a sacrifice in order to protect something or someone, what would you do, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_02_10: Would you take a step back, and just see what happens? Let everything play out?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_03_10: Or would you jump in and try to do something about it, even if it meant making a sacrifice?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_04_10: No... You probably wouldn’t settle for either of those options, would you?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0701_05_10: You’d probably try to figure out a way to save everyone and everything you could, huh?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0702_01_10: With all of the different people and Pokémon you interact with, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/0605_0702_02_10: I bet your list of precious things you’d give everything to protect gets longer every day.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/1701_0701_01_10: Niiice! Full points to you for being at the right place at the right time!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/1701_0701_02_10: Here, have a reward to celebrate!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/1701_0702_01_10: May you treasure this precious gift that I have bestowed upon you until the end of your days...
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/1701_0702_02_10: Haha! I’m kidding, I’m kidding. It’s all yours. Use it however you like!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_01_10: While I was traveling through the Hoenn region, I had a Whismur as my partner. Her name’s Aster.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_02_10: She’s so darned adorable—especially the way she likes to nuzzle up against me and make the cutest little noises.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_03_10: Aster and I were always together...in good times and in bad.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_04_10: While we were in Hoenn, we were kind of like a sync pair in that way.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0701_05_10: If she hadn’t stuck with me through that journey, I don’t know if I’d be where I am today.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0702_01_10: We can’t go through our lives alone, and neither can Pokémon. We need each other.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2501_0702_02_10: Buuuut! You’ve got plenty of imagination, right? I’m sure you know that without me having to tell you.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_01_10: When I’m around you, I sometimes get this really warm, nostalgic feeling.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_02_10: I think it’s a good thing, though. It tells me that I have a friend around that I can really trust.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_03_10: Thanks to you, I think I’ll be able to forge a new beginning. Turns out my story’s not over after all.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2511_0701_04_10: It could be interesting...trying to imagine how it’ll all unfurl now that I’ve teamed up with you.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/2511_0702_01_10: How do you think our story’ll turn out in the end? I’d be curious to hear your theories sometime.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/3001_0701_01_10: Gooood morning! Hope you slept well. No time to dawdle today!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/3002_0701_01_10: Hmm... Let’s try to guess what kind of adventures are in store for us today. C’mon, use your imagination!
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/3003_0701_01_10: I wonder what it’d be like to just relaaax and do nothing for a day... Sounds kinda nice.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/3004_0701_01_10: The sky is always the same, no matter where you are... Wait, that’s not right. It’s actually pretty different.
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/3005_0701_01_10: The stars are so beautiful tonight. Reminds me of when I... Ahem. Sooo, how was your day?
ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.ch0129_00_higana/3006_0701_01_10: Wow, I can’t believe it’s already this late! Maybe we should leave things here for today and get some rest.

ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0101_0701_01_10: Oho! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look like you’ve got a skip in your step today!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0101_0701_02_10: Get out there and give it your all today! Lots of sync pairs are just waiting to meet you!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0701_01_10: Sync pairs and sync stones... Pasio sure is a fascinating place, don’t you think?
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0701_02_10: When Pokémon partner with Trainers to become sync pairs, they may show us things about themselves that we’d otherwise never see!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0701_03_10: This isn’t good. There’s so much to research! I don’t think I’ll be heading home anytime soon.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_01_10: Professor Bellis is the senior authority when it comes to research on sync stones. She’s more up on the subject than I am.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_02_10: I’m actually tempted to become her assistant, just to have her teach me what she knows!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_03_10: Haha! Age and status don’t matter when it comes to Pokémon research.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0601_0702_04_10: A love for Pokémon is what’s most important for research.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_01_10: There are sync pairs from many different regions on Pasio.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_02_10: I’m able to see all manner of Pokémon I could never encounter in the Kanto region thanks to that.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_03_10: When Trainers’ eyes meet, a battle is soon to follow. But for me...
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0701_04_10: when something catches my eye, it’s time for some Pokémon research!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0702_01_10: Earlier, I had a Trainer show me their partner Pokémon.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0702_02_10: I got so caught up in studying their Pokémon that there was no time left for a battle.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0602_0702_03_10: Make sure you manage your time wisely so you don’t end up like me!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_01_10: Professor Elm, Professor Rowan, myself. There are many people researching Pokémon.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_02_10: People like myself study Pokémon as a profession. For some people, Pokémon are pets. Others use them for battling.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_03_10: There are as many ways to interact with Pokémon as there are people and Pokémon in the world.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0701_04_10: Don’t feel like you need to imitate anyone else. Treasure the unique way you relate to your own Pokémon!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_01_10: Back in my youth, I was a real go-getter Pokémon Trainer.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_02_10: Back in those days, there was another Trainer I knew who was unrivaled in strength and very passionate about Pokémon battles.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_03_10: That Trainer was Agatha! She is a member of the Indigo Elite Four.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_04_10: I chose the life of a Pokémon researcher, but Agatha thought of nothing but Pokémon battles.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0603_0702_05_10: Our paths may have diverged, but I still hold her in high esteem.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_01_10: I’ve got a grandson... Erm, what was his name again?
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_02_10: Just kidding, it’s Blue! His name is Blue. I’m sure you’ve heard of him by now.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_03_10: He was a bit of a mischievous boy, but he really changed after he left Pallet Town to go on his own Pokémon journey.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0701_05_10: I’m so happy to have seen my grandson become such a fine young man... Hoho! The new discoveries never cease, even as I grow older!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_01_10: I think what helped Blue grow so much was his rival, a boy named Red.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_02_10: I also gained experience through battling with a certain Pokémon Trainer.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_03_10: I wonder, do you have anyone like that in your life? If you do, be sure to treasure that friend.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0604_0702_04_10: A friend who pushes you to newer and greater heights is a once-in-a-lifetime treasure!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0701_01_10: There’s something about you that reminds me of Red, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0701_02_10: Those eyes that sparkle, full of hope... It’s exactly how he looked the day I handed him his first Pokémon!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0701_03_10: If you hold on to that sparkle, I’m sure you’ll become a splendid Pokémon Trainer!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_01_10: Perhaps someday you’ll even have the opportunity to battle Red or Blue.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_02_10: On the day I gave them their first Pokémon, I never could have imagined how those two would end up.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_03_10: This is quite the rare opportunity. We should enjoy it to the best of our ability!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/0605_0702_04_10: You’ll join the battle too, won’t you? Don’t go holding anything back now!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/1701_0701_02_10: I found a handy little something. Here, I’ll give it to you!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/1701_0702_01_10: Feel free to use it however you like!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/1701_0702_02_10: If I find something else, I’ll be sure to give it to you. I hope you’ll look forward to it!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_01_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you have any interest in Pokémon research?
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_02_10: Research is a lot of fun! You can become very knowledgeable about all things Pokémon!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_03_10: The feeling of a new discovery that no one else has seen is the best feeling in the world!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_04_10: If you’re interested, you should come stop by my lab sometime.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0701_05_10: I’d be glad to welcome someone who loves Pokémon as much as you!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_01_10: Whether we’re working as Trainers or researchers, reaching the end of our path can be very difficult.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_02_10: But if you make your own way along the path you’ve chosen, even the tough times are enjoyable!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_03_10: Once you find your path, don’t lose your way. Face challenges with all you’ve got.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2501_0702_04_10: I’ll support you all the while, of course!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_01_10: I’m reminded of myself when I was younger when I’m with you.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_02_10: Spending my days enjoying Pokémon battles, challenging my rival.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_03_10: When I’m with you, that old excitement of being a Trainer comes back to me.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0701_04_10: Hoho! I don’t plan on letting you younger folk defeat me just yet!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0702_01_10: You may not end up so different from me in the future.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0702_02_10: Hoho! What I mean is that you’ll grow to be someone who loves Pokémon no matter your age.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/2511_0702_03_10: Do your best never to lose that love for Pokémon.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/3001_0701_01_10: Ho! That skip in your step this morning reminds me of my grandchildren.
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/3002_0701_01_10: Tell me, how is your Pokémon doing? Ah! It seems to be very happy training alongside you today!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/3003_0701_01_10: Some people play with Pokémon; some battle with them. Whatever the choice, we can still support each other!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/3004_0701_01_10: You know, there just aren’t enough hours in the day to enjoy research and exploration as much as I’d like to!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/3005_0701_01_10: I learned so many interesting things out in the field today! I can’t wait to record everything in my latest report!
ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.ch0137_00_orchid1/3006_0701_01_10: Did you know that some Pokémon change their behavior based on whether it’s day or night? Observing them can be quite a challenge!

ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0101_0701_02_10: Keep your guard up around this place, kid. Some bad guys like me have got their eyes on you.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0701_01_10: Hmph... You take raising your Pokémon really seriously, huh. I can tell.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0701_02_10: I’m the same way. If you don’t maintain your tools, they don’t last as long. They start to lose their strength after a while.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0701_03_10: Adults have their own way of thinking about this stuff, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0702_01_10: Pokémon have value because of the way we use them.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0601_0702_02_10: You may not agree with me now, but someday when you’re older, you’ll understand.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0701_01_10: My record’s been clean as a whistle since I arrived on Pasio.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0701_02_10: Being surrounded by all this beautiful nature, watching sync pairs work together in harmony... It’s put a damper on my desire to sow chaos.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0701_03_10: Don’t believe me? Hmph... How much of what people say do you think is true anyway?
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0702_01_10: If society labels someone as evil, does it mean everything that person says or does is wrong? Is that what you believe?
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0702_02_10: In a society like that, any minority viewpoint could easily be considered evil. Is that the world you want to live in?
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0602_0702_03_10: Hmph... Sorry, that got a little deep.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0701_01_10: I’m a mean old man. I could be lying and deceiving you right now, and you wouldn’t even know it.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0701_02_10: The world is made up of people who deceive each other every day. We lie and we get lied to. That’s how it works.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0701_03_10: It’ll all start to click for you someday when you’re older, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0702_01_10: Not all adults are mean old liars, but there are some who are.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0603_0702_02_10: But there are kids out there like that, too. The world’s full of all kinds of different people.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0701_01_10: Hmph. Everything seems to be going according to plan...
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0701_02_10: Oh, it’s you... Having fun eavesdropping? You must be so curious about what plans I was referring to.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0701_03_10: Want some advice? Keep your nose out of grown-up business, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0702_01_10: Want to know more about my plans, do you? Hmph... What makes you think I’d tell a brat like you what I’m up to?
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0702_02_10: Keep poking your nose where it doesn’t belong, and you’ll find yourself in a world of pain, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0604_0702_03_10: That’s the kind of world I live in. Take my advice and go back where you came from before you regret it.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0701_01_10: In the past, I brought various organizations under my own control to form Team Rainbow Rocket.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0701_02_10: But I was forced to step down thanks to a certain kid who got in my way. I’m in the middle of a new plot as we speak.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0701_03_10: To be honest, you remind me a lot of that kid, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0702_01_10: You’ve managed to pique my interest, kid.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0702_02_10: You and your partner... You’re destined to keep growing stronger, and I look forward to watching it happen.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/0605_0702_03_10: Ever thought about utilizing all that strength and potential as my right hand?
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/1701_0701_01_10: You can have this. Hope it’s useful.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/1701_0702_01_10: You get to figure out what to do with it on your own.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0701_01_10: Pokémon are a business enterprise. Unless both parties are profiting, nothing gets done.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0701_02_10: And by profit, I mean money. When it comes to business, there’s no room for things like friendship or caring for one another.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0701_03_10: I understand where you’re coming from, though. I can appreciate your viewpoint.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0702_01_10: It’s good that we all want different things. That’s how things get done in a business.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0702_02_10: The world should be full of different opinions and viewpoints.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2501_0702_03_10: I just wonder if you’ll ever come over to my side one day.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_01_10: People like there to be clear lines between good and evil, right and wrong.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_02_10: When I carry out my evil schemes, some people in this world profit. Some people are helped in other ways.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_03_10: You probably think it’s wrong to cause trouble for people and Pokémon in general.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_04_10: But when people wave their self-righteousness around like a giant flag, that causes its own trouble, too.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0701_05_10: Right, wrong, good, evil... People think everything has to be black and white, but that’s just not how it is.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0702_01_10: There’s one thing I do know...
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0702_02_10: I’m drawn to strength. I like power. And that’s because neither strength nor power are inherently good or evil.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/2511_0702_03_10: The strong will win. It’s got nothing to do with right or wrong... That’s the real truth.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/3001_0701_01_10: Don’t allow yourself to be used by others. Stay vigilant. Even in the morning.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/3002_0701_01_10: If I need to brainstorm, I do it in the morning. That’s when I come up with my greatest schemes.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/3003_0701_01_10: It’s awfully bright outside right now... Makes it difficult to work in the shadows.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/3004_0701_01_10: Pasio is an incredible piece of land. Perhaps one day it will belong to... Ahem.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/3005_0701_01_10: Remember...villains tend to make their moves in the shadow of darkness.
ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.ch0140_00_sakaki/3006_0701_01_10: Isn’t it past your bedtime, kid? Keep your nose out of grown-up business.

ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waiting for you so long!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0101_0701_02_10: I am so happy that I got to see you! I will show you my happiness through dance!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_01_10: I would like to see Pokémon contests become popular on Pasio, too.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_02_10: I am from Hearthome City, where we have contests to show off our Pokémon’s charms.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_03_10: The Pokémon and their Trainers get dressed up so beautiful! I always wear my dress on the stage, of course!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_04_10: It would be magnifique if the sync pairs on Pasio started a Pokémon contest—just spectaculaire!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0702_01_10: Trainers dress up with their Pokémon for contests!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0702_02_10: If you are ever interested in competing, you will let me decide your costume, yes?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_01_10: I love dancing and Pokémon about the same.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_02_10: That is why I spend all my days dancing or in Pokémon battles!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_03_10: I love doing both. But what is even better than doing each one separately...
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_04_10: is to dance with all of my Pokémon! I can do that forever!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0702_01_10: Every day is filled with such joie for me!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0702_02_10: Pourquoi? Because I spend my days surrounded by things I absolutely love!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_01_10: I did not know much about Pokémon at first— not a thing!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_02_10: But I, how do you say, hit the books and practiced much! Then, I became a Gym Leader!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_03_10: Studying was très difficile, but I never thought it was a burden.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_04_10: Why? Because I love Pokémon! I want to know everything about them!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_05_10: I can study for hours if it is something I love! No problème!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0702_01_10: Learning something you love is not work at all! C’est, how do you say, delightful!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0702_02_10: If you have something you love, try learning more about it! You will have so much fun!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_01_10: Mismagius’s cries sound like incantations, and they can cause pain for her targets.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_02_10: But they do not bother me. In fact, her cries make me feel very happy.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_04_10: Perhaps Mismagius change their incantations depending on who’s listening.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_05_10: Or perhaps the effects change depending on the person.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_06_10: We would need Mismagius to tell us if we wanted to know the answer, no?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0702_01_10: My Mismagius can make everybody happy with her dance. I would like to be able to do the same.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0702_02_10: If I see people smiling when they watch me dance, it makes me smile, too!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_01_10: You have a certain...je ne sais quoi that I do not have, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_02_10: If I can discover what it is, I know I can become stronger, too.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_03_10: So let me observe you, s’il vous plaît.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_04_10: I will become an expert on you!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_05_10: If I can study you, I know that we will become even better friends!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0702_01_10: Wanting to know more about each other is very common, no?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0702_02_10: It is some feeling that both people and Pokémon have!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0701_01_10: I have a gift for you!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0701_02_10: I hope you will use it on your adventures!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0702_01_10: If I find anything else, I will give that to you, too!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0702_02_10: You will use well any item I give you, yes?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0701_01_10: Having your friends love what you love is such a great feeling!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0701_02_10: That is why I cannot wait to see how you dance!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0701_03_10: It would be so merveilleux if you learned how fun dancing can be!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0702_01_10: You do not have to think hard to dance.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0702_02_10: Just have fun! That is the most important thing!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_01_10: When are you having fun the most in Pokémon battles?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_02_10: For me, it is when I see that I have improved. I feel the same way when I improve in dancing, too!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_03_10: And the more I improve, the more I love it! So I will practice more and more!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_04_10: Is it not amazing when you can do a new skill?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0702_01_10: It is all right even if you fail!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0702_02_10: Just take your time, and work on it little by little.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0702_03_10: And then, voilà! You will see that you have gotten better!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/3001_0701_01_10: Bonjour! I have so, so much énergie today! I cannot wait to get started!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/3002_0701_01_10: Whenever and wherever, danse, danse, danse! You can, how do you say, shake off your sleepies!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/3003_0701_01_10: I wish to spend my afternoon in the sunshine! You shall join me, yes?
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/3004_0701_01_10: If you want to study, it is better to start before the sun goes down. That is what I think.
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/3005_0701_01_10: The path outside can be a little dark at night, so watch where your feet are going!
ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.ch0151_00_melissa/3006_0701_01_10: When you danse in the moonlight, you should, how do you say, look your step! You don’t want to fall and trip!

ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0101_0701_01_10: Ah, hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve been waiting for you to arrive.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0101_0701_02_10: The two of us could melt ice with our fiery passion for Pokémon battling. We should battle together again soon.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0601_0701_01_10: Would you agree that it’s possible to overcome any challenge through perseverance? Even ones we’re quite unsuited for?
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0601_0701_02_10: My Pokémon and I are very intolerant of heat, which is precisely why we decided to travel to the Hoenn region to train.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0601_0701_03_10: We chose to put ourselves in a position where we were forced to adapt and grow stronger, and in the end, we did.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0601_0702_01_10: It takes time, patience, and hard work to accomplish a great deed.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0601_0702_02_10: One must learn to persevere, like a flower that waits under the snow for spring to arrive once more.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0602_0701_01_10: What do we gain from battling? What do we focus on during the fight?
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0602_0701_02_10: If you gain something from a battle even when you lose, then it was a battle worth having.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0602_0701_03_10: But if you win by compromising the very thing you care most about, it’s all meaningless.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0602_0702_01_10: A Pokémon battle is a fight between two opponents, but it’s also a fight that we have with ourselves.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0602_0702_02_10: When you win a battle, do you feel confident that you’ve triumphed over both your opponent and yourself?
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0603_0701_02_10: synchronized collaboration between Trainer and Pokémon...
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0603_0701_03_10: their souls like burning hot flames... Oh, how I’d love to have a serious battle against a few sync pairs like that!
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0603_0702_01_10: I know of a few fierce young Gym Leaders in the world who meet that description.
