ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0603_0702_02_10: I have great respect for them, despite their age. It would be a pleasure to battle any one of them.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_01_10: The entire island of Pasio was built specifically for sync pairs.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_02_10: Volcanos, glaciers... Everywhere you look, this place was designed to mimic the beauty of nature. It’s truly a sight to behold!
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_03_10: An artificial island, where Trainers and Pokémon can battle in any environment they choose...
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0604_0701_04_10: it’s the perfect place to train! I have no doubt that being here will help us grow stronger.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0604_0702_01_10: In my home country, the winters are long and cold, but the people’s hearts are warm.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0604_0702_02_10: Trainers and Pokémon live in harmony, taking care of one another.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_01_10: It’s important to follow proper etiquette and mind one’s manners.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_02_10: It’s how you show others that you respect them. Failure to do so will only reflect badly on you in the end.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_03_10: But I think you already understand that very well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0701_04_10: You give your absolute best in each and every battle—the finest way to show respect to your opponents.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0702_01_10: Some sync pairs may try to use underhanded methods to win.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0702_02_10: But that does not mean that you should do the same. Two wrongs do not make a right.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/0605_0702_03_10: Nothing is more beautiful than triumphing over your opponents fair and square.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/1701_0701_01_10: I’d like you to have this. I think it will be quite useful.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps you on your journey to grow stronger.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2501_0701_01_10: Have you ever been to the Hoenn region?
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2501_0701_02_10: It’s a lovely place. The climate is warm, and it’s full of beautiful, green nature.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2501_0701_03_10: It’s like a second home to me. I’d love to give you a tour someday.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2501_0702_01_10: I sometimes miss the town where I was born.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2501_0702_02_10: Years can go by, we can travel far and wide, but we all know deep inside...
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2511_0701_01_10: The Hoenn region has all sorts of interesting sights and attractions.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2511_0701_02_10: My favorite is most definitely the Mauville Food Court in Mauville City.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2511_0701_03_10: The ramen there is positively divine... It’s a bit of a hidden jewel in Hoenn, so part of me wants to keep its location a secret.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2511_0702_01_10: Oh dear! Now I’m really craving a Mauville Ramen Bowl.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2511_0702_02_10: I’d love to find a dish here on Pasio that can rival the Mauville Ramen Bowl in both flavor and volume.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/2511_0702_03_10: You haven’t seen anything like that, have you? I need a jumbo-size meal that I can really sink my teeth into!
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning. What crisp, cool weather we’re having.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/3002_0701_01_10: If you get all your chores done in the morning, you’ll have the whole evening to spend doing more meaningful things.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/3003_0701_01_10: If you happen to come across anyone who matches me in strength...do be sure to introduce us.
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/3004_0701_01_10: I’m so very indecisive when it comes to choosing what to eat... There are simply too many delicious options!
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/3005_0701_01_10: Have you eaten yet this evening? I find that eating late always upsets my poor stomach...
ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.ch0153_00_prim/3006_0701_01_10: The air is cool and silent at night... It calms my nerves and allows me to focus.

ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0101_0701_01_10: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. How nice to see you today.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0101_0701_02_10: I hope that you will find things worth smiling about today.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0601_0701_02_10: I thought up these clothes thanks to Fairy-type Pokémon. I wanted to be as graceful and elegant as they are.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0601_0701_03_10: Fairy-type Pokémon are more than just cute. They’re mysterious and powerful creatures.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0601_0701_04_10: I wonder if there’s a word for that...
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0601_0702_01_10: The longer you spend with Fairy-type Pokémon, the more you learn about them.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0601_0702_02_10: They’re kind to new people, and they continue to surprise, even when you spend every day with them.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0601_0702_03_10: Ha... I wonder how I could become a Fairy-type Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0602_0701_01_10: I’ve been feeling a bit different ever since I arrived on Pasio.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0602_0701_02_10: It’s a bit hard for me to explain, but it’s like the refreshing feeling of putting on a new dress.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0602_0701_03_10: A change of environment can really change how you feel, you know?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0602_0702_01_10: You can get used to anything, but there is such a thing as getting too used to something...
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0602_0702_02_10: I suppose that’s difficult to explain with words.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_01_10: I’m the Gym Leader of the Laverre Gym in Kalos. The badge I give out is called...
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_02_10: the Fairy Badge. It’s a really beautiful badge, too.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_03_10: The interior of my Gym is really cute. Just looking at it is sure to put a smile on your face.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0701_04_10: The Gym is made up of several little rooms... It’s made to look like a dollhouse!
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0702_01_10: The Trainers in each room are dressed accordingly. It’s like one big fashion show.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0702_02_10: Trainers who challenge the Gym have to use warp panels to move from room to room.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0603_0702_03_10: I would be glad to use those warp panels with you someday.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_01_10: My partner Pokémon is truly elegant, don’t you think?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_02_10: Back when he was an Eevee, he was so round and cute.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_03_10: I cared for him every day, and we were always together.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0701_04_10: The day Eevee evolved into Sylveon was a clear and beautiful one. Sylveon was sparkling in the sunlight.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_01_10: When things aren’t going well and I’m feeling down on myself...
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_02_10: Sylveon comes over and wraps his feelers around my arms.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_03_10: Sylveon does this because he can understand my feelings.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0604_0702_04_10: In that moment, I think I was able to understand Sylveon’s feelings of kindness, too.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0605_0701_02_10: Every Trainer shares something in common with their partner Pokémon, in one way or another.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0605_0701_03_10: I wonder if Sylveon and I are a sync pair because we’re similar to each other.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0605_0701_04_10: The Trainers here on Pasio all seem to have come with Pokémon that share similarities with them.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0605_0702_01_10: If you became a Pokémon, I wonder which one you’d be, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0605_0702_02_10: I think you’d be a compassionate Pokémon that gives everyone a reason to smile.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/0605_0702_03_10: If I ever did become a Pokémon too, I’d be happy if we would keep being friends as Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, if it isn’t a young Trainer... You’ve come at quite the appropriate time.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/1701_0701_02_10: This is a gift from me to you. Be sure to use it well, OK?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you like it. I’ll try to find something else for you soon.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2501_0701_01_10: Battling together with my Pokémon partner helps us unify our thoughts and feelings. It feels like I’m growing closer to becoming a Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2501_0701_02_10: But something is still missing for me to become a Pokémon.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2501_0701_03_10: Oh, what about you and I becoming a sync pair, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2501_0702_01_10: I think we could make for a good sync pair, but...
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2501_0702_02_10: But if we were, we wouldn’t be able to battle each other anymore. It’s too bad—I really thought it was a good idea.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2511_0701_01_10: I designed the clothes I’m wearing with my desire to become a Pokémon in mind.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2511_0701_02_10: Whether in design or in Pokémon battles, learning from the strengths of others is the way to grow into the ideal you.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2511_0701_03_10: Recently, I’ve been observing your techniques in battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2511_0702_01_10: Watching other people, you start to see their good and bad points.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2511_0702_02_10: I wonder how we Trainers look to our partner Pokémon...
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/2511_0702_03_10: If I were your Pokémon, I think I’d see a lot of good things about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/3001_0701_01_10: Nothing good comes from being hasty. Try taking a deep breath... Stop and smell the roses.
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/3002_0701_01_10: I had a dream I was a Pokémon last night. It was wonderful... Wait, what if this is the dream and last night was reality?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/3003_0701_01_10: I’d love to design some new patterns based on your Pokémon’s aesthetic. Would that be all right with you?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/3004_0701_01_10: My long, fluttering sleeves are like the wings of a butterfly Pokémon, don’t you think? *giggle*
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/3005_0701_01_10: Sometimes people ask me if I ever stop smiling, and I have to wonder... Do I smile even while I’m asleep?
ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.ch0157_00_mache/3006_0701_01_10: No need to push yourself tonight, young Trainer. Tomorrow, the sun will shine and give us a new reason to smile.

charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1101_0100_20: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] reached a clearing in the woods, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] saw Charizard.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1101_0200_20: As [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was entranced by Charizard’s visage, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard a loud voice come from behind.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0401_0700_10: Yeah, no doubt about it! Watch this.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_0900_10: Yeah, no doubt about it! Watch this.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1000_10: Red! See? It reacted to Red’s name!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1100_10: As a Fire-type Trainer myself, I’m personally interested in Red and his Charizard.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0401_1300_10: Yeah, you hear a lot of stories about Red.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_1500_10: Yeah, you hear a lot of stories about Red.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1600_10: Like how he single-handedly dismantled Team Rocket, an organization that was mistreating Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1700_10: Not only that, but he also became the Champion of the Kanto region!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1800_10: He’s a step above most of the Trainers on Pasio. In fact, he’s probably more than just one step up.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_2200_10: Huh. You don’t talk much, do you, Red? I guess that cuts out a lot of meaningless conversation.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_2300_10: And you snuck up on us completely silently just now! When did you even get here? I didn’t notice you at all!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_2400_10: Speaking of... How do you give commands to your Pokémon during battles?
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0301_2500_10: Maybe they understand each other without words?
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0302_2700_10: Maybe Charizard is calling the shots.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_3100_10: Whoa...did you hear that? Did Red just talk?!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4500_10: A bond so strong you don’t even need to say anything... That’s how in sync they are!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_3900_10: You’re already pumped up to the max, huh?
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_4000_10: I gotta step up my game!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_4100_10: I’ll train up my Fire-type moves so much that I’ll burn both Charizard and even Red to ashes!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4200_10: Remember this day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Remember the awe you felt when you gazed upon a living legend!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4300_10: And let that awe fuel your training!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4400_10: Those burning emotions are what give you courage when you really need it!

charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_0300_: Nice! The perfect way to clear one’s head between battles.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_0500_: Nice! The perfect way to clear one’s head between battles.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_0600_: I was just going around saying hi to all the Trainers that I battled in the past.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_0700_: Of course, Pokémon battles are a greeting in and of themselves!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_0900_: Yep! In fact, there was a time when I traveled and fought Trainers all over the Kanto region!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_1100_: Well, there was a time when I traveled and fought Trainers all over the Kanto region!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1200_: It was more of a training journey! My Pokémon and I traveled to make ourselves stronger!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_1400_: Thanks! Lycanroc seems to appreciate it, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_1600_: Hmm, I suppose it is! And thanks, I’ll take the compliment. Lycanroc seems to appreciate it, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1700_: Lycanroc—when he was still a Rockruff—and  all my other Pokémon became stronger with me as we journeyed through Kanto.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1800_: It was because of those experiences that I was able to create the Alola League, yeah!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1900_: Thanks to that, a lot of strong Trainers found themselves in Alola.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2000_: Battling against them allowed me to raise my skills as a Trainer and make my Pokémon even stronger!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2100_: Take Brock, for example. He fights with Rock-type Pokémon, you know.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2200_: Since Lycanroc’s a Rock type, too, we had a leisurely...er, I mean...intense battle!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_2400_: I know, right? And Lycanroc especially seems to want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_2600_: You bet I do! And Lycanroc especially seems to want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2700_: A Lycanroc in its Midday Form will typically be very loyal and follow its Trainer’s commands to a tee, yeah!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2800_: But my Lycanroc is a little different, despite having evolved into Midday Form.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2900_: If I give an order he doesn’t like,  he ignores me.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3000_: He acts as if he’s in Midnight Form!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3100_: So that helps me get better as well! I try to get stronger so I can keep fighting beside Lycanroc!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3200_: We’re gonna continue getting stronger, just like you guys are, yeah!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3300_: Becoming friends is important, but that’s not the only way for Trainers and their Pokémon to be.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_3500_: I’m glad. I know you have your own strengths and ways of interacting with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_3700_: Don’t worry. I know you’ve your own strengths and ways of interacting with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3900_: do you think I beat the Lance, the Indigo Champion, when I was in Kanto?
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_4100_: You flatter me! Maybe I’ll tell you that story sometime...
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_4300_: Good to know where you stand! Maybe I’ll tell you that story sometime...
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_4400_: Since we’ve battled each other, I’d be curious to hear what you think!

charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Lyra enter the forest and followed her until reaching a clearing.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0200: Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t expect you here!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0301_0300: I saw you entering the forest.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_0400: Oh, I see! I was planning on spending the day with Chikorita, but you would definitely be a welcome addition!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_0500: I was just in the neighborhood.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_0600: Oh, I see! I was planning on spending the day with Chikorita, but you would definitely be a welcome addition!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0700: I came out here to let Chikorita sunbathe.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0800: Well, here we are, Chikorita! Go find a spot you like!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_1000: Chikorita likes places with good sunlight!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_1200: Of course she is! She’s my partner, after all!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_1300: You know how they say that the longer the Pokémon stays with the Trainer, the more similar they become?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1400: I love Pokémon—all Pokémon. That’s why I want to treat all of them the best I can!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1600: Oh, look! It looks like she found a good spot!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1700: Can you smell that sweet scent in the air?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1800: That’s proof that Chikorita is in a good mood.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1900: When we were traveling around Johto, she would let this aroma waft around all the time.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2000: On sunny days, both she and I would lie down in the sun...
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2100: And before we knew it, we would have both fallen asleep.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2200: Ahaha, now that I think about it, we may have made nothing but detours during our travels.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2300: Admittedly, we treated it like a walk rather than a journey.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_2500: Yeah! Traveling gives me a chance to see and hear and feel things that I might not be able to otherwise!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_2600: I want to travel around Johto, too.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_2700: Well, let me know when you do! I’ll show you around! But first, we should enjoy Pasio as much as possible!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2800: If you find any good places on Pasio, let me know!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2900: The memories Chikorita and I have with each other are like the most precious treasure.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3000: So I’m hoping to find more “treasure” here on Pasio, too!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3100: And I was hoping that maybe...you would help me with that.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_3400: Oh, great! That makes me so happy!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_3500: Me? Are you sure about that?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3800: Aw, shucks. Saying it out loud is kinda embarrassing, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3900: Whatever the case, if you ever need help, talk to me!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4000: Oh no! Chikorita’s already looking sleepy.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4100: She must have really taken a liking to this spot.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4200: Well, I guess there’s no helping it, then! We might as well take a little break ourselves!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0100: Bzweeeep! My data-analyzing machine is telling me that your Chikorita is ready to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0200: Wait, really? Chikorita’s about to evolve?!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0300: I’m curious about her Evolution, and I’m wondering how strong you’ll become, Lyra. OK, continuing analysis!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0101_0100: I’ve already used my data-analyzing machine on you. I have a good idea of how strong you are.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0101_0200: Well then, let’s get this battle started!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0100: Wow! You guys are as strong as the rumors say!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0200: You bet! My Chikorita is as strong as she is adorable!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0300: My data-analyzing machine is good to go! I’m ready to analyze Chikorita once she evolves!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0400: Come on! At least react to what I’m saying!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0500: This is great! Chikorita looks like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0600: Congratulations, Chikorita! We’re going to have so much more fun!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0100: Wow, your Bayleef is looking great! She looks like she’s gonna get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0200: Thanks! Your Servine looks impressive, too, and full of determination!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0300: Well, seeing as we’re both so great, why don’t we have a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0400: Cool! I’ve always wanted to battle you!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0101_0100: I think your Bayleef is gonna get even stronger after this battle.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0101_0200: Then let’s get this super-duper, exciting show on the road!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0100: Oh no, I lost... But! As a fellow Grass-type user, I learned so much! Thank you!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0200: I should be thanking you! That battle made me feel infinite possibilities!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0300: I’m glad. I’ll be stronger the next time we meet, so get ready to battle me then!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0400: Look at that! Bayleef looks like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0500: I hope you get even cuter, Bayleef!

charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1101_0100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] headed to the spot where [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] and Calem had planned to meet.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1101_0200_: Calem was indeed at the spot, but he seemed preoccupied.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_0300_: That feeling of waiting year after year after year, without any guarantee of meeting again...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_0500_: Oh! I wasn’t actually talking about me... While I was waiting for you, I suddenly remembered this person I used to know.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_0700_: Oh! I wasn’t actually talking about me... While I was waiting for you, I suddenly remembered this person I used to know.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_0800_: When I was traveling around Kalos, I met this really tall Trainer.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_0900_: He’d been separated from his partner Pokémon long, long ago, and he had been searching for it ever since.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1000_: For three thousand years, he looked for his Pokémon. I know—it sounds absurd.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1100_: But it got me thinking. What would I do if you didn’t show up for three thousand years?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1200_: *sigh* Yeah, I’d probably go home. I’d wait for about 30 minutes and then go home.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1300_: If it were Serena, she wouldn’t even wait three minutes.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1400_: But if I were separated from Espurr and had to look for him for the next three thousand years...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1500_: I couldn’t do that. I know I would lose heart.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_1600_: I care for Espurr a lot, but if I were asked if I care for him that much? Well, it makes me think.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0301_1800_: Three thousand years? Sure, I could do that.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_1900_: Seriously? You even said it so easily. You really are something special.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_2100_: Yeah, I mean, three thousand years... How many lifetimes is that?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2200_: “When the ice and snow melt, spring arrives... You and your Pokémon will be together  for many years to come.”
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2300_: Pryce, the Gym Leader in Mahogany Town, said those words to me.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2400_: But I wonder, if you spend that much time with your Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2500_: would you be more willing to wait three thousand years for them?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2600_: I don’t know. I guess there’s not even much of a point in thinking about it, either.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_2900_: You’ve been using your psychic powers for the last few minutes, haven’t you?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3000_: You in a good mood or something? What have you been getting up to over there?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1101_3000_: With a twinkle in his eye, Espurr gave Calem a flower he had been levitating with his psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3100_: Hm? A flower? That’s a pretty shade of purple.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3200_: Have you been making this flower levitate for me this whole time?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_3400_: He can hold it longer or shorter depending on the day.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_3500_: Today looks like his record time!
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_3700_: Yeah, I think Espurr is a bit more on the resilient side.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_3800_: Although whenever I get one of his favorite Poké Puffs, he does get a little antsy.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_3900_: Sorry for making you wait, Espurr.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4000_: You really are a trooper, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0401_4200_: He said that it’s fine because he likes waiting.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_0402_4400_: He said that it’s fine because he likes waiting.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4500_: I get the feeling that I understood what he was trying to say...although I don’t know if I was even close.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4600_: Sorry I said earlier that I probably wouldn’t look for you for three thousand years.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4700_: I’m your Trainer—I won’t ever make you wait that long.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4800_: But if we were to ever get separated...
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2301_1201_4900_: Yeah, I’d look for you. Three thousand years, ten thousand years—it doesn’t matter. I’ll look for you no matter how long it takes.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_1201_0100_: So you wanna battle old Nanu, huh? You sure you’ve thought this through?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_1201_0200_: I still want to to get stronger—strong enough that I can always take care of my Espurr!
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_1201_0300_: Are you really ready for this? I’m not going to go easy on you.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0101_0100_: Well, I guess it’s time to find out who’s stronger.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0100_: Heh, you’re pretty strong, aren’t you, kid?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0200_: We did it, Espurr! But...what’s happening to you?
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0300_: Looks like your partner’s evolving. I guess congratulations are in order.
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0400_: Whoa, this is awesome, Espurr! We’re getting stronger!
charaepi_ch0003_00_calme_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0003_00_calme/2311_0501_0500_: Let’s stick together and become the greatest sync pair of them all!

charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_0100_1: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Can I ask you a favor?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_0300_1: Well, there’s something that’s bothering me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_0500_1: Yeah, there’s something that’s bothering me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_0600_1: Apparently, my face gets really angry whenever I battle.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_0700_1: And sometimes—just sometimes!—the other Trainer and their Pokémon get a little scared of me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_0900_1: So, let’s try this out. Look close!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_1100_1: OK, let’s try this out. Look close!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_1300_1: What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Was my face a little off-putting?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_1500_1: You don’t have to say it... I get it. But it’s a habit, you know?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_1600_1: It’s not something I can just stop doing that easily!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_1900_1: But if that’s the case, I wonder what those Trainers and Pokémon were so scared of...
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2000_1: Then again, I don’t think putting on your game face during a battle is necessarily a bad thing.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2100_1: You have to get serious during battles, or you’ll lose.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2300_1: I have a lot riding on my battles.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2400_1: I know Tepig understands that as we’re battling together.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2500_1: The relationship between Trainers and their Pokémon is hard to define.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2600_1: Arguably, the one and only thing that defines our relationship with our Pokémon is their Poké Ball.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_2700_1: It can seem one-sided and fickle.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_2900_1: I know. I don’t think our relationship with our Pokémon is as cold as that, either.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_3100_1: I know. I don’t think our relationship with our Pokémon is as cold as that, either.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3200_1: But I remembered these guys who called themselves Team Plasma back in the Unova region.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3300_1: They would make a fuss about how we should liberate the Pokémon from their Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3400_1: I guess they saw it as us enslaving the Pokémon using Poké Balls.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3500_1: So if we were able to form a bond so strong that neither Trainers nor Pokémon would be bothered by the Poké Balls...
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_3600_1: Maybe if we could do that, we wouldn’t  have blockheads like them jumping to  the wrong conclusion.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_3800_1: All in all, Trainers and Pokémon have their own wants, desires, and goals.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0302_3900_1: That’d be a big undertaking... wouldn’t it?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_4000_1: All in all, Trainers and Pokémon have their own wants, desires, and goals.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4100_1: As long as they overlap and coincide, that means the two of you are strongly connected.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4200_1: And if that’s the case, you can work together whether or not there’s a Poké Ball, right?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4300_1: So I sat down and got to thinking about  what makes a really strong bond.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4400_1: I like Pokémon battles, and  Tepig likes Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4500_1: That’s why we don’t want to lose—and why we try our darndest to make sure we win.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4600_1: Wouldn’t you say that’s a strong connection?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4700_1: If we’re that in sync, that should mean that we both want to win the PML the same way, right?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4800_1: I’m sure that Tepig would choose the right move even if I didn’t give the instruction!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_4900_1: Right, Tepig? If you were to use a move right this moment, you’d choose Flame Charge, right?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0401_5100_1: I know, right?! I’m so glad we’re partners.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_0402_5300_1: I know, right?! I’m so glad we’re partners.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5400_1: I bet seeing how in sync we are makes you even more excited to battle with us, huh!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5500_1: I would know—because I’m really excited to battle you, too!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5600_1: You and your Pokémon are of the same mind, just like Tepig and me.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5700_1: I couldn’t ask for a better opponent!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2301_1201_5800_1: So when we do battle, show me just how synchronized you and your Pokémon are!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0100_1: People always tell me they know what I’m thinking just by looking at my face.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0200_1: That’s true. I bet I can totally guess what you’re  thinking right now.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0300_1: I’m not really one to talk, though.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0400_1: I’m not very good at like, trying to outwit somebody with tricky moves in battle, either.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_1201_0500_1: I just go straight at my opponent when it comes time for a Pokémon battle! Everything works out if you just push through as hard as you can!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0101_0100_1: Let’s see how hot the two of us can make a Pokémon battle get!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0101_0200_1: OK! But do you really think you can stop us? I’m really driven to win!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0100_1: Oof, you and Tepig ran right over us. That was about as hot as a battle can get!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0200_1: You and Torkoal were pretty awesome, too! I thought you had us there.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0300_1: I think both of us being easy to read is just proof of how passionate we are about Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0400_1: You know, maybe you’re right! We shouldn’t be embarrassed—we should be proud!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2311_0501_0600_1: Oh, you’re evolving! All right! Now you can grow even more!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0100_1: Hello there, Hilda! Looks like you’ve been working hard, huh?
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0200_1: Yup! We met all kinds of Trainers and battled them all. Now Pignite and I are so much stronger!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0300_1: Oh, well, if that’s the case, then perhaps we should see who’s the strongest between us.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_1201_0400_1: You got it! I’m giving this one everything I’ve got!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0101_0100_1: Everything I’ve seen on my adventures, everything I’ve felt—I’m putting it all into winning this battle!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0101_0200_1: That’s what I like to hear! I want to see you really break out of your shell and go for it!
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0100_1: Now I see... You’re as strong as—no, even stronger than I’d heard.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0200_1: And it’s not just about raw power. The trust you and Pignite have in each other is precisely why you’re able to perform so well.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0300_1: Yeah! We’ve been through so much together, after all.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0400_1: Well, you got me. I’m looking forward to seeing just how strong you two can get.
charaepi_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0004_00_toko/2312_0501_0600_1: Cheren did say we should break out of our shell. I guess this is one way to do it!

charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0100_: While walking along the beach and admiring the sights, [Name:PlayerNickname ] paused... Was that a moving island?!
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0200_: Intrigued by the phenomenon,  [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] moved closer...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0300_: and found Lorelei and Lapras  standing on the beach.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_0400_: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_0500_: Lapras and I were just taking a joyride on the ocean.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0401_0700_: It is. Pasio has beautiful oceans around it. Just floating on the ocean is very pleasant.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_0900_: Not at all. Lapras is very comfortable to ride on.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1000_: Not only that—Pasio’s waters are so calm, I can’t imagine getting sick at all.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1100_: And in case you were wondering, Lapras like to swim with people riding on their backs.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1200_: I don’t want you thinking that I’m forcing her to carry me around.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0401_1400_: I guess that was unnecessary. You seem to understand what’s important as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0302_1500_: Oh, really? I didn’t know that!
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1600_: Oh, stop joking. I know you’re the kind  of Trainer who always thinks about  your Pokémon first and foremost.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1700_: I can tell just by looking at you.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1800_: I sometimes come across people who take it  for granted that Pokémon stay with them.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1900_: They take it for granted that Pokémon battle— that they listen to humans.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2000_: But the truth is that these Pokémon stay  with us because they trust us,  and those people have forgotten that.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2100_: Our Pokémon are our friends, and our friends are our equals.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2600_: It’s great to enjoy being with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2700_: But I want more people to think about whether a Pokémon enjoys being with them the same way.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2800_: All in all, I think it’s kindhearted Trainers like you who are going to rise to the top of the PML.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2900_: At least, I hope that’s the case! That being said, I have every intention of winning myself.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3000_: Hm? You want to go for another swim, Lapras? Really, what am I going to do with you...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3100_: Well, last time I was the one who suggested we go out...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3200_: I suppose it’s only fair that we go out again if that’s what Lapras wants.

charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the coast in search of a Trainer to battle.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1101_0200_20: And there [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Flint, with his Infernape, standing perfectly still.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0400_10: Sorry, I just had a blazing-hot battle that nearly burnt me down to cinders.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0500_10: But I’m all right now! I just got my strength back.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_0600_10: You’ve got something hot with you, don’t you. I can feel the heat from here!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_0800_10: You know I can see right through you, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_1000_10: You know I can see right through you, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1100_10: Passionate Trainers are always particular about something.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1200_10: How about you? What’s your secret to success?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_1400_10: I knew it! I can feel your red-hot passion pouring out of you!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_1600_10: I knew it! I can feel your red-hot passion pouring out of you!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1700_10: For me, it’s my blazing hairdo!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1800_10: Some people think if you’re in the Elite Four, you need to be more clean-cut.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_1900_10: But do they know how much work I put into this hair? And anyway, it’s your heart that matters, not your appearance!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_2400_10: What am I saying? It must be a compliment! Thanks!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2500_10: Infernape has some things he’s very particular about, too.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2600_10: He always wants to battle against Pokémon that use moves that are a bad type matchup for him!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2700_10: He’s been this way ever since he was a Chimchar.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2800_10: At first I thought he just wasn’t paying attention, but then I realized what was going on.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_2900_10: This dude’s got flames in his eyes! All he’s thinking about is how he wants to get stronger!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3000_10: Having him as my partner hasn’t been easy, let me tell you. He’s nearly turned my hair to ash many, many times.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3100_10: People have tried to warn me about him, but I chose to keep on believing in him. We’ve had a fiery-hot life together!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3200_10: Don’t get me wrong, though. I’m not saying you should ignore everybody’s advice.
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_3400_10: Always hear what people have to say,  but if you still decide you’re right,  you don’t have to change!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_3600_10: Always hear what people have to say,  but if you still decide you’re right,  you don’t have to change!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3700_10: If you do it that way, then when you fail, you own that failure—but at least you did it your way, right?
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_3800_10: Staying true to ourselves is our way of battling!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0301_3900_10: What a great combination you are!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0401_4000_10: Heh! Hearing that from you makes the fire in my heart burn even brighter!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_0402_4200_10: Heh! Hearing that from you makes the fire in my heart burn even brighter!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_4300_10: I haven’t had a conversation like this with anybody since Volkner! I like you even more now!
charaepi_ch0006_00_oba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0006_00_oba/2301_1201_4400_10: Let’s have a blazing-hot battle sometime to see whose way of doing things comes out on top!

charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_010: While out exploring, [Name:PlayerNickname ] stumbled across a road [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] hadn’t seen before.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_020: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to follow the road to see where it led...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_030: Eventually, the road led [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] to a beautiful, sandy beach.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1101_040: Then, just as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was about to settle down and take a little break...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_070: I guess my secret beach isn’t much of a secret anymore!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_090: Nope! Me and my Palossand came here to play!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_110: Uh-huh! Me and my Palossand came here to play!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_120: Nobody really knows about this place, so it’s always nice and quiet and perfect for relaxing!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_130: Palossand seems to really love it here, too! Sometimes she even comes here to play all on her own!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0301_140: And then you follow her here?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_150: Yep! That’s right! ’Cause I love this beach, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_160: Sounds like you two are best friends!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_180: And Palossand always does her very, very best for me, you know?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_190: And she’s super strong! I can always depend on her in a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_200: She listens to my commands really well...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_210: and even when she doesn’t, she still fights hard in her own way.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_220: That’s why I always ask for Palossand’s help when I know I have a tough battle ahead of me.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_240: I know, right?! I depend on her a lot, even when we’re not in a battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_260: I know, right?! I depend on her a lot, even when we’re not in a battle.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_270: Back in Alola, where I’m from...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_280: she even looks after little kids and Pokémon, too.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_290: We live at a place called Aether House— there are always plenty of tiny tots and Pokémon running around!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_300: It makes me so happy that Palossand always does her very best for me...
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_310: So whenever Palossand wants to play, I always let her play a whole bunch!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_330: Yeah! Actually, I’m really hoping that you and I can become even better friends, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_340: I could learn a lot from you.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_350: Well, actually, I’m really hoping that you and I can become even better friends, too!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_360: It was so nice of you to let us join your team— it really means a lot to me!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_370: I think of you as a really close friend. And when we battle together, it’s so fun! And neither of us holds anything back!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_380: From now on, I’m gonna try to take on an even more active role on the team and help you out where I can!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0301_390: Thank you! I really appreciate that!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_400: Tee-hee! Aw, now I’m a little embarrassed!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_410: I can always count on you, Acerola!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_420: Tee-hee! Ahh, now I’m a little embarrassed!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_440: Where did Palossand go? She was right here just a second ago!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_450: Oh! I think I see her playing over there! Let’s go see what she’s up to.
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_460: Aha! I thought Palossand was just playing around in the sand, but look at all these shells! I think she’s collecting them!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_470: Hey! Do you wanna collect some shells with Palossand, too?
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_1201_480: We should all compete to see who can find the prettiest shell!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0401_500: OK! Let’s do it! Betcha I’ll find the prettiest one!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0302_510: You’re on! You can’t beat me!
charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0007_00_acerola/2301_0402_520: All right! Betcha I’ll find the prettiest one!

charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_0100_: While strolling through the city, [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Erika looking around in confusion and decided to say hello.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_0400_: I am, actually... I wanted to do some shopping, but I seem to have lost my way.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_0600_: Well, maybe... I wanted to do some shopping, but I seem to have lost my way.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_0700_: I was walking with my Vileplume at first...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_0800_: but she kept getting farther and farther away from me, and eventually we got separated.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0301_0900_: It seems she has a mind of her own.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_1000_: Tee-hee! You may be right about that. I find that part of her so adorable, though...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0302_1100_: Sounds like she’s a little impatient.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_1200_: Tee-hee! You may be right about that. I find that part of her so adorable, though...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1300_: Oh dear... I’ve derailed the whole conversation, haven’t I?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1400_: Vileplume and I were actually heading to the flower shop.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1500_: I’m very fond of flower arranging, you see.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1600_: And I heard that Pasio has all sorts of flowers and plants imported from all over the world.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1700_: So I thought I’d try to visit the best flower shop in the city.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1800_: My dear Vileplume... I hope she made it to the flower shop all right.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_1900_: Would it be too much if I asked you to escort me to the flower shop now?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_2100_: Oh, thank you so much. I really appreciate it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_2300_: Oh, thank you so much. I really appreciate it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_2400_: We seem to have arrived, but...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_2500_: The shop is so big, and I don’t see Vileplume anywhere.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0302_2800_: Do you know how we could find her?
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3000_: I know just the thing! I have an idea.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3100_: Vileplume has a specific type of flower that she really loves.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3200_: If I can make an arrangement with those flowers and some of the plants imported here to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3300_: maybe Vileplume will notice them and come right to us.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3400_: Vileplume really loves my flower arrangements, you see.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_3500_: Sometimes, when I’m arranging the flowers, Vileplume suddenly appears right next to me without me realizing.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0401_3700_: Oh, thank you! I think it’s a good idea, too!
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_0402_3900_: Really? Well, hopefully you’ll see it in just a few moments.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_4100_: and after a few moments, a crowd started forming around her, mesmerized by her skillful hands.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1101_4200_: Suddenly, a pungent odor wafted through the space, causing the enraptured audience to hold their noses.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4300_: Oh, thank goodness! You had me so worried for a moment, Vileplume.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4400_: But it looks like you did make it all the way to the flower shop by yourself, didn’t you? And without spreading any of your toxic pollen!
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4500_: I should really thank you for all of your help, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4600_: If I hadn’t met you on the road,  I would probably still be lost out there.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4700_: And look—this shop has so many cute flowers. I’m so glad you helped me find it.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4800_: Now that I’m here, I think I’ll stock up on a bunch of different flowers for my flower arranging.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_4900_: I’m sure I’ll be able to create something simply lovely with them.
charaepi_ch0008_00_erika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0008_00_erika/2301_1201_5000_: I promise to let you know as soon as it’s done, all right?

charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1101_0100_: Norman asked [Name:PlayerNickname ] to meet him at a clearing in the forest.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0200_: Thanks for coming, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve asked you here to talk.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0300_: I’ve been wanting to know how you feel about the PML.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0400_: I’ll ask you straight, [Name:PlayerNickname ]: What does the PML mean to you?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0401_0600_: Hm, I thought you’d say that.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0302_0700_: I think it’s about the bond with my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0402_0800_: Hm, I thought you’d say that.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_0900_: I’ve had a feeling that was the case ever since I joined the team.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1000_: I wanted to hear it straight from you, though. You did, too, didn’t you, Slaking.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0401_1200_: Hm... Back home in Hoenn where I was a Gym Leader, I battled against my own son in my Gym and lost.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0302_1300_: What made you think of that?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0402_1400_: Hm... Back home in Hoenn where I was a Gym Leader, I battled against my own son in my Gym and lost.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1500_: As a parent, I was happy to see my child’s growth. On the other hand, the truth is that I was disappointed in myself as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1600_: I acutely felt a need to thoroughly retrain myself.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1700_: That’s why I decided to enter the PML with Slaking.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1800_: I’ve heard other Gym Leaders from the Hoenn region have come to Pasio to enter the PML.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_1900_: I thought about forming a team with them, but that would miss the whole point of coming to a new place.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2000_: I wanted to work with Trainers from different regions and different cultures to find new kinds of power.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2100_: I thought that we could cooperate with them in battles and increase our sync strength.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2200_: Thanks to you, I’ve learned what sync strength  is really all about.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0401_2500_: Mm-hmm, thanks. Slaking looks happy to hear that, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0302_2600_: I’m glad I could help you.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_0402_2700_: Mm-hmm, thanks. Slaking looks happy to hear that, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2800_: I may not show it, but you’ve gotten through to me, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_2900_: Battling alongside you was a wonderful experience for both Slaking and me that we never could have had without you...
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3000_: I only hope that you got something out of your experience teaming up with me, too.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3100_: I believe that the power of our bond will give us great strength on the grand stage of the PML.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3200_: We were very lucky to meet you. It’s been a privilege. Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3700_: Oh yes, looking at Slaking reminded me...
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3800_: As long as you’re here, could I ask you one more thing?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_3900_: I think you may know this, but my son has also come here to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4000_: We’re not working together right now, though.
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4200_: Do you know of any good restaurants that are popular with young people on Pasio?
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4300_: I was thinking I’d like to take my son out the next time we have a day off!
charaepi_ch0009_00_senri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0009_00_senri/2301_1201_4400_: Sometimes it’s good to take a cue from Slaking and just take it easy.

charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1101_010: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking the beach, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard a distant singing.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1101_020: While looking for the source of the singing, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came across Crasher Wake and Floatzel.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_030: The ring is my rolling sea. ♪
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_040: Fight! Get ’im! Flying Press! Undefeated hero! ♪
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_050: What? Whoa, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_070: Ha ha ha! So you heard my singing and came all this way?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0302_080: I heard you from way over there.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_090: Ha ha ha! You heard my singing and came all this way, huh?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_100: Well, if you want to know, I was singing a song to the people in Sinnoh across the sea!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0301_110: You, uh... You think they can hear you?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_120: Ha ha ha! My voice carries across oceans and soars over mountains!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0302_140: Why don’t you just use a phone?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_150: Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Don’t spoil the fun!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_160: I know it’s pointless, but you shouldn’t not do something just because it’s pointless!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_180: Seems like you don’t get it. Maybe I should tell you a story about Floatzel and me. Eh, Floatzel?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_200: Seems like you don’t get it. Maybe I should tell you a story about Floatzel and me. Eh, Floatzel?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_210: Back when I had just started my pro wrestling career...
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_220: Floatzel begged me to take him to sea by boat, so we voyaged out to the wild blue yonder!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_230: Unfortunately, though, we anchored our boat in a spot that had a cold and very fast current.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_240: It would have been impossible to swim through. Pointless, even.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_250: At least I thought so! Floatzel, on the other hand, jumped into the ocean and started swimming against the current!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_260: A battle with Mother Nature herself! Of course, at the beginning, there was nothing Floatzel could have really done—just be swept away.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_270: But day after day, Floatzel would continue swimming.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_280: After seeing that determination, I decided to train as well!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_290: While I swam with him every day, I noticed he was able to swim a little bit faster each time.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_300: Little by little, he got stronger and  made progress each day.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_310: And eventually, he outpaced the ocean current!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_320: In that moment, Floatzel’s efforts meant something! It hadn’t all been for nothing after all!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_340: I know, right? I was so happy, I jumped into the water with him!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0401_350: Then we got carried out to open sea...
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_0402_370: I don’t blame you if you don’t believe me. Even I thought it was a dream when I first saw it.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_380: Maybe if others had seen Floatzel swimming, they would’ve thought it pointless at first.
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_390: I mean, you won’t know if something’s worth the effort if you never give it a try, right?
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_400: If Floatzel had thought there was no point in  trying, he would’ve never outpaced that current!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_410: That is what Floatzel has taught me!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_420: So...before you start to say my singing is pointless, join me for a verse or two! Maybe our voices will reach Sinnoh!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_480: Well, that’s enough of a warm-up! Let’s do another!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_490: So that the whole world—! Er...I mean, so the whole island can hear us!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_540: Hm? Hey, look over there! There’s a Pokémon Ranger up on that cliff!
charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0010_00_maximum/2301_1201_550: How about that! She’s waving at us! She can hear our voices!

charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_0100: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking the beach, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard the sound of a bass guitar and someone singing loudly in the distance.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_0200: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] headed toward the music and eventually discovered the culprits— Roxie and her Whirlipede.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0300: Oh! Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Did we catch your attention with our little jam session?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_0700: Aw, you don’t gotta be shy! Come on—I’m positive you heard us.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0800: If you ever wanna get into music, we should totally form a band. I mean, we’re already on the same team, right?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0900: Come on! Sing a little something for me!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_1300: You don’t gotta be nervous! Nobody’ll laugh at you—I promise!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_1400: So, what kind of song are you gonna sing for me?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_1600: Haha! I knew you had rock music in your soul! I love heavy metal, too!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_1800: Haha! I kinda figured you would sing something like that!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_1900: Well, come on! Let’s hear it!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_2000: After a moment, [Name:PlayerNickname ] cleared [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] throat and started to sing.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2100: Well, I think you might have made a fan outta Whirlipede!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2200: You know, listening to you sing kinda put my heart at ease, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2300: That kind, fun personality of yours really came through in your singing!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2400: Buuut...I feel like being in a band might not really be your thing.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_2600: No no! That’s not what I meant!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2900: Argh! I’m saying it all wrong... Just listen to me for a sec!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_3000: At once, Roxie launched into a heavy bass riff. [Name:PlayerNickname ] felt the deep sound echo in [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] chest, making [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] heart beat faster.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3100: I think...you’re thinking about it too much, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3200: I mean, when I jam, I JAM! Sometimes I rock out  and headbang so hard, I forget my own name!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3300: When I heard you sing, it kinda made me realize something.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3400: [Name:PlayerNickname ]... I think Pokémon battling is your jam! It’s where you’re most in your element!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3500: So, I guess it might sound a little selfish of me to say this, but...
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3600: I’d much rather see you stand up on stage and battle it out next to your Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0301_3700: I get what you mean. Will you root for me, then?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_3800: Duh! I’ll be cheering for you from the front row! That’s what friends are for!
