charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0302_3900: Guess we should have a battle soon, then!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_4100: Just you wait—we’re gonna blast away the competition! Kaboom!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_4200: You know, I’ve got loads of fans that love and support my music...
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_4300: but when it comes to Trainers, I’m YOUR biggest fan!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0100: Heyyy, I know you. You sing in that Koffing band from Unova, don’t you! ♪ P-O-K-E-M-O-N! Pokémon! ♪
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0200: Dude, your music cuts right to my soul! It gets stuck in my head for days. I love it!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0300: Whoa, you listen to our music? Rad! Whirlipede and I love meeting our fans. We should get to know each other better.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0400: Totally. We usually kinda go with the flow, wherever the wind takes us... But when it comes to Pokémon battling, we go all out!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0500: I’m picking up what you’re putting down... Let’s let our battle skills do the talking!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0101_0100: All right, then! Time for Mina to show you her full power! Kaboom!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0101_0200: Come on, then! Whirlipede and I are gonna blow your minds!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0100: Whoa, you guys are intense! I feel like I just got rocked to my core!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0200: You two rock pretty hard yourselves! I’d love to battle again sometime!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0300: Huh? What’s wrong, Whirlipede? Wait... No way!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0400: You’re evolving, aren’t you?! You want to grow stronger—I can feel the energy coming off you in waves!

charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_0200_: Lucario told me he’s feeling a little curious about your aura.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_0800_: Right now, it seems like he’s curious about the bond you share with your Pokémon. How strong it is.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_1000_: Yep! We sure are! Did you know that Lucario understands us when we talk to him?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0302_1100_: Can Lucario understand what we’re saying?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_1200_: Actually, Lucario can understand ANYONE who talks to him! Isn’t that cool?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_1400_: Oh! I mean Lucario—or Riolu, before he evolved into Lucario.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_1500_: Anyway, back then, I didn’t really connect with Riolu at all.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_1700_: It’s kinda embarrassing to talk about since it’s been so long, but I guess I might as well tell the story now!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_1900_: It’s kinda embarrassing to talk about since it’s been so long, but I guess I might as well tell the story now!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2000_: So, when I was a little girl, I met Riolu and we decided to train together.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2100_: Since I’m successor to the Key Stones, which you need to Mega Evolve a Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2200_: I knew I had to form a strong bond of friendship with Riolu so that he could evolve into Lucario and eventually Mega Lucario one day.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2300_: My grandpa gave me some good advice. He told me that dancing is perfect for learning how to trust and connect with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2400_: It makes sense, right? If you can’t connect with your dance partner, you’ll fall out of sync and fumble your footwork!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2500_: But I was actually really bad at that!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2600_: Riolu was amazing at dancing, and he was able to match all of my moves perfectly...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2700_: but when I saw how good he was, I wanted to show that I was even better! So...I got a little overzealous.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2800_: Despite the fact that Riolu was doing his best to match my dance moves...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_2900_: I was actually way off, so the two of us ended up totally out of sync.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3000_: My grandpa was pretty appalled, as you can probably imagine!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0301_3100_: I’m sure it happens all the time.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_3200_: Well, it was kinda like that for a while. Then one day, my legs got kinda tangled up when we were practicing our dance steps...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_3400_: Well, it was kinda like that for a while. Then one day, my legs got kinda tangled up when we were practicing our dance steps...
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3500_: I thought I was gonna do a face-plant, but Riolu leaped in front of me and saved me from the fall!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3600_: He put my safety above his own, even though he could easily have been injured doing that.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3700_: And that’s when I realized... Up until that point, I hadn’t been trying to connect with Riolu at all.
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3800_: How could I expect to get closer to him if I wasn’t even doing my part?
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_3900_: After I realized that, both my dance moves and my connection with Riolu became so much more in sync!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0301_4000_: I’m glad it turned out OK!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0401_4100_: Thanks! We’re so proud of the perfect sync we have now, but it probably wouldn’t have been possible if we hadn’t made those early mistakes!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0302_4200_: And now you’re a perfect combo!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_0402_4300_: Thanks! We’re so proud of the perfect sync we have now, but it probably wouldn’t have been possible if we hadn’t made those early mistakes!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_4400_: Oh, that reminds me! Our super-special move came out of that whole experience as well! Our deadly rolling axe-kick!
charaepi_ch0012_00_corni_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0012_00_corni/2301_1201_4500_: We might have to go visit you in the hospital if you ever get hit with that... Haha! Just teasing!

charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] headed into the city to meet up with Hapu at her request.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1101_0200_2: When [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] arrived at the meeting spot they’d arranged, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Hapu  already waiting there with Mudsdale.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_0300_1: Ho! Thank you for agreeing to meet with me, friend. I have a favor I would like to ask of you.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0401_0500_1: Well, as a matter of fact, I was hoping you could show me around Pasio.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0302_0600_1: What did you have in mind?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0402_0700_1: Well, as a matter of fact, I was hoping you could show me around Pasio.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_0800_1: I thought it would be far more enjoyable if I had you to accompany me.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0401_1000_2: And so the pair of them took off on a merry stroll through the city, making a few stops here and there along the way.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0402_1200_2: And so the pair of them took off on a merry stroll through the city, making a few stops here and there along the way.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_1300_1: My skin feels as soft as a baby’s bottom after using that mud face mask I bought!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_1400_1: And just look at Mudsdale’s coat— I’ve never seen it so shiny! All thanks to the power of mud. It’s like magic, it is!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_1500_1: Oh, and I got to purchase some new clothing as well! I’d say today was quite a success. What sort of fashion do you think would suit me?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0401_1700_1: Oho! That is just what I was thinking! Perhaps my instincts were correct, then!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0402_1900_1: Oho! That is just what I was thinking! Perhaps my instincts were correct, then!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2000_1: The big city really is like a whole different world.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0301_2100_1: Do you want to move to the city?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_0302_2300_1: Do you dream of big-city life?
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2500_1: It’s just that Trainers from all sorts of different backgrounds have gathered here on Pasio with one similar goal—to triumph at the PML.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2600_1: Think about it. All of that passion and energy is concentrated in one place. That’s what makes the atmosphere here so exciting!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2700_1: The way everyone is accepted here—whether their background or the way they is think is bad or good—is just like in Alola, where I’m from.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2800_1: So, really, it’s the opposite. Being in this big city makes me miss Alola, and it’s reminded me of how proud I am to call it my home!
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_2900_1: Mm-hmm! Mudsdale says the feeling is mutual...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3100_1: Uh-oh... It appears Mudsdale’s hooves have worn a hole into the pavement...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3200_1: We are used to trotting on dirt roads in Alola, so the thought of this happening never even entered my mind...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3300_1: Alrighty! I should contact the proper authorities here immediately and get this hole patched up.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3400_1: Well, life is full of surprises, isn’t it! You never know what might Hapun, especially on Pasio! Heh heh.
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3500_1: Pasio invites all manner of Trainers and Pokémon onto its open shores...
charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0013_00_hapu/2301_1201_3600_1: In that sense, I would be more surprised if NOTHING Hapuned! Heh heh.

charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way  to the forest at the edge of the city  to meet up with Cheren.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1101_0200: When [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived,  [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found him practicing move commands with his Stoutland.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_0500: Don’t worry about it. Stoutland and I were just practicing some commands for different moves and actions.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_0700: Just practicing some commands for different moves and actions. Stoutland and I have been putting a lot of our energy into training lately.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_0800: Ever since I’ve been a Gym Leader, the two of us have been best buds.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_0900: I like to think about tactical advantages and plan all sorts of things while I battle.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1000: And Stoutland here has been a resourceful partner full of endless potential ever since he was a Lillipup.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1100: In that sense, I think Stoutland and I really make the perfect pair.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1300: Ever since I became a Gym Leader and Stoutland and I became a sync pair, the work’s really piled up for us.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1400: But I’m hoping that if we continue battling and training like we were just now, we’ll learn how best to utilize our strengths.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0301_1500: It seems you have it all figured out!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_1600: Thanks. And thanks to you, Stoutland has been even more excited to work hard and grow stronger.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_1800: Indeed. And thanks to you, Stoutland has been even more excited to work hard and grow stronger.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_1900: So, have you figured out why I called you here to meet us today?
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2000: That’s right. I’m confident that Stoutland and I have you beat when it comes to sync strength...
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2200: Phew! All right, let’s continue to fight hard together as a team.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_2400: Well, I suppose we could battle if you want to.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0302_2500: I thought you were going to challenge me to a battle!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_2600: Well, I suppose we could battle if you want to.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2700: But I just saw with my own eyes that we’re pretty even when it comes to sync strength.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2800: When a Trainer and a Pokémon click so well together, it means they’re powerful in a battle, without a doubt.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_2900: I’ve already seen your skills at work in a Pokémon battle, so I know it’s true. And I confirmed it with what I just saw.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0401_3100: So I thought, if we’re going to be forming a team with powerhouse sync pairs, we’d better do our best to amp up our own strengths.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0302_3200: Ah, I get it. And we fight as a team, right?
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0402_3300: Right. I thought, if we’re going to be forming a team with powerhouse sync pairs, we’d better do our best to amp up our own strengths.
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3400: Having a team full of Trainers who treasure the bond they have with their Pokémon... I know that would give me confidence!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3500: And just so we’re clear...I want to battle on a team with YOU, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3600: Together, we’ll aim for the top! The best of the best among Pokémon Trainers!
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_1201_3700: Let’s give this our all. What do you say?
charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0014_01_cheren/2301_0302_4000: How could I say no to that?!

charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_010: Where’s a good, open space around here...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_020: Hm? Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you out shopping?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_040: Really? If that’s the case, could you help me out?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_050: I was just taking a stroll.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_060: Really? If that’s the case, could you help me out?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_070: I was looking for a good place in town where I could train.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_090: Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! All right, then. No time like the present! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_110: Great idea, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! All right, then. No time like the present! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_120: I’m glad you knew this place! You’re a lifesaver!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_130: Onix is bigger than most Pokémon, after all.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_140: It can be pretty difficult for us to train unless we’re outside or in a Gym.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_160: Onix seems happy. He must like this place.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_170: I’m glad we found this place, then, Onix.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_180: Onix seems happy. He must like this place.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_190: Onix has been my partner for a long time.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_200: So it’s my duty as his Trainer to give him a space where he can move around freely.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_210: But now, it’s about time we got to training!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_230: Yeah! I want to make sure that I’m completely in sync with Onix during our battles!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_250: It can be for Trainers, too! I want to ensure I’m completely in sync with Onix during our battles!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_260: By training and working out with Onix...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_270: I naturally get to see what he’s good at and bad at, how he fights, and what his abilities are. That tells me how to best use him in battle.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_280: It’s because I do this that Onix and I have won countless Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0301_290: Do you think I can get stronger, too?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_300: Of course! As your personal coach, I guarantee it!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_310: Do you think I can be more like you?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_320: Of course! As your personal coach, I guarantee it!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_330: Wait, are you Brock? THE Brock?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_340: That’s right! I’m the rock-solid Pokémon Trainer Brock!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_350: And, uh... Can I help you?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_360: We became Rock-type Pokémon Trainers after being inspired by you!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_370: Brock! Please let us train with you!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_390: Then, [Name:PlayerNickname ], why don’t we try out what we were talking about earlier?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_400: I’m sure it would be good training for these fellas, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0301_450: Oof, I can’t feel my arms...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_460: Yeah, those hikers look tired...but satisfied, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_480: Yeah, those hikers look tired...but satisfied, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_500: Of course! I meant to work out myself!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_520: No worries! I meant to work out myself!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_530: You know, you have a really good sense for Pokémon battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_540: You’re definitely destined to become a great Trainer in the future.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_550: I want to be there when it happens!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_570: Ha ha! Well, life’s most fun when you have lofty goals, right?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_590: Ha ha! Well, life’s most fun when you have lofty goals, right?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_600: Take me, for instance. I have Trainers that know me now, sure.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_610: But at one point in time, I was a rookie just like you.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_620: From there, I focused on experiencing as many things as possible. Like that training.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_630: And after a long time of doing that, I became a Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_640: So I know that you can do the same, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_650: The workout we did today was strictly what I developed with Onix.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_660: If that workout and training session can inspire you, that would make me happy.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_670: Onix is cheering you on, too.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_700: Well, I’ll do what I can.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_720: If there’s anything I can do to help, let me know!

charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_020: Now, I want an honest answer. Do you think this outfit suits me?
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0401_040: I’m glad to hear you think so, too.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0402_060: Hm. When you say “not bad,” that means  that it’s somewhat becoming, right?
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_070: I’m rather fond of this suit myself.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_080: But...I also kind of feel it’s a little...too much.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_090: While I do like it, it’s a little  embarrassing at the same time.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_140: Apparently, this sygna suit was designed to give Trainers a stronger connection to their Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_150: I’m not familiar with fashion,  but some so-called famous designer  was very insistent that I wear this suit.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_160: And here’s the weird thing: when I’m wearing this outfit, I feel like I’ve become Tyranitar.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_170: I’ve been training with Tyranitar for a  while now. I would trust him with my life.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_180: And before I started wearing this suit,  I thought we perfectly understood each other.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_190: But once I put on this outfit...
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_200: I feel like I can feel the same things he does. Like I know exactly what he wants me to do with incredible clarity.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_210: At least that’s how it feels.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_220: If I can focus on honing this sensation  to perfection, Tyranitar and I should be  able to reach new heights!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_230: This sygna suit made me feel the possibility of becoming even closer to my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0401_250: As a fellow Trainer, I agree.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0302_260: I want to wear it, too!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0402_270: As a fellow Trainer, I can understand the sentiment.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_280: Tyranitar is known as the Armor Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_290: This sygna suit is my armor! Now, Tyranitar and I can fight even closer than ever!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_310: Now that I have this sygna suit, don’t think  we are the same as we were before. We are stronger than you could imagine!

charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1101_0100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] climbed up a rigorous mountain trail during [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] travels.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1101_0200_: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] trudged toward the top of the mountain, hoping for a good view of Pasio. That’s where [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] ran into Skyla and Swanna.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_0400_: Are you on your way up the mountain?
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_0600_: I thought so! I figured you were heading that way if you were on this trail!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_0800_: I thought so! I figured you were heading that way if you were on this trail!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_0900_: I was looking down on the trail while Swanna  and I were flying overhead, and I realized...
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_1200_: But don’t worry! Swanna and I are here now!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0302_1300_: Yeah, it’s a lot harder than it looked.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_1400_: But don’t worry! Swanna and I are here now!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1500_: If it’s getting too tough to keep hiking,  you can just fly to the top!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1600_: Looks like Swanna’s all for it, too!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_1700_: So, how about it? Let’s go for a nice flight!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2200_: Thanks, Swanna. That was fun, wasn’t it?
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2700_: She got stronger by always flying next to me whenever I flew my cargo plane.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2800_: Hanging out with her made me realize how fun it is to do things with your Pokémon—
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_2900_: and how fun it is to get help from them!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3000_: That’s why I’m really glad I came to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3100_: Trainers and Pokémon all help each other out  to make great Pokémon battles together.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3200_: And you can make better memories if you share them with Pokémon and other people!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3300_: What I’m trying to say is that it made me really appreciate working hard together!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_1201_3400_: I’d love to have more Pokémon battles with you and share more memories together!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0401_3600_: Great! It’s a unanimous decision, then!
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0302_3700_: Yeah, I feel the same way.
charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0016_00_huuro/2301_0402_3800_: Great! It’s a unanimous decision, then!

charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1101_0100_2: While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was admiring the flowers, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] deep in the heart of the forest.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1101_0200_2: That was where [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] ran into Leaf and Eevee.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0300_1: Oh hey, look who it is! What’re you doing here? Me? I was having Eevee pick out which flowers he wants in his next flower crown!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0400_1: Oh, look at that red flower! The color of passion! It totally pops and stands out!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0500_1: Ooh! Or this black one! It’ll make you look a lot more mature!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0600_1: Wow, you found so many, Eevee!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0700_1: Ooh, I like this blue one, too! It’s such a nice cool color!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0800_1: Wow, you even found a yellow flower! What an energetic color!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0900_1: Let’s see. You also found a purple flower, a pink one, light blue... If we add the leaves, we can make a wreath with eight colors total!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1000_1: Look at all these flowers you found, Eevee! It’s like we have a small flower garden!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0301_1100_1: You’re going to use all of them?
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0401_1200_1: Of course! With so many, there’s no need to pick just one!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0302_1300_1: If you had to choose just one...
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0402_1400_1: We have so many! There’s no need to choose just one!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1500_1: These colors are all so distinct. Kinda like Eevee’s Evolutions!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1600_1: Once Eevee is a high-enough level, do you think we’ll have to choose how he evolves?
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1700_1: I wonder what would be the best choice for him.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0401_1900_1: Yeah. I think that’s the best option, too!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0402_2100_1: I can see myself wanting to when the time comes, but...
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2200_1: Eevee’s future is his own. He should be the one to choose.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2300_1: What’s important isn’t what he chooses but how he comes to that decision.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2400_1: I think I can accept any outcome if it’s the choice that Eevee makes.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2500_1: I mean, think about it... Isn’t it wrong for somebody else to decide your future for you?
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2600_1: My job is to make sure that Eevee has as many options as possible to choose from.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2700_1: At least, that’s what I think.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2800_1: But enough of that! Eevee gathered a bunch of great flowers, so I’ll get to making that crown!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2900_1: Right now, I can choose to use all the colors I want, but that won’t always be the case! Gotta enjoy it while I can!

charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1101_0100_: While taking a stroll in the forest one day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] ran into Kris.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1101_0200_: She seemed to be in the middle of observing her Totodile and jotting down some notes.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_0300_: Heh heh heh. I guess Berries are no problem for you, Totodile, with the way your teeth crunch through everything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_0400_: You look like you’re having fun!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_0500_: Yeah, observing Totodile like this is so much fun!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_0600_: I wouldn’t want to be bitten by her!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_0700_: You have no idea how many times she’s tried to bite me...
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_0800_: And despite Totodile’s funny nature, there’s no reason for her to ever change, either.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_0900_: She’s always been like this, you know.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1000_: Ever since we went on our journey. And she hasn’t really changed since we came to Pasio, either.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1100_: I wish I could stay the same like her.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_1300_: Rather, I feel like I have to change.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_1500_: Yeah. She’s always so energetic and optimistic.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1600_: My goal has always been to learn everything there is to know about Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1700_: But I’ve started thinking that trying to master everything would only make me into a jack-of-all-trades...and a master of none.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1800_: All the famous professors have their field of expertise, and they carry their subject further and further.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_1900_: And here I am, trying to know everything... I should at least figure out whether I’m going to specialize in battles or ecology.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_2100_: Well, they’re both really interesting fields, so I’m having a hard time figuring out which one to choose.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_2200_: You want to master Pokémon ecology?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_2300_: Well, they’re both really interesting fields, so I’m having a hard time figuring out which one to choose.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2400_: But Professor Oak is already perfecting the study of Pokémon ecology.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2500_: And Agatha is already on the path to becoming a master of Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2600_: I have to find my own path, just like they did.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2700_: What do you think I should do, Totodile?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2800_: That’s a tough question, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_2900_: What path would be best for me...
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_3000_: Why not ask one of those famous people?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_3200_: Why not look for that path with Totodile?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_3400_: Oh, never mind me. This is my problem. I should make the decision on my own.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0301_3500_: You don’t have to do it all on your own.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_3700_: I’ll help any way I can.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_3900_: Thanks. I appreciate the concern—and your support.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4100_: As long as I’m on Pasio, Totodile and I  will do this. We’ll meet and talk to  as many people as we can!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4200_: No, not just talk to them—battle them, too!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4300_: Yeah! No more dwelling on this alone! I’m gonna ask for more help from you guys in the future!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0401_4500_: Thanks, guys! And [Name:PlayerNickname ]— if you ever need somebody to talk to, you can count on me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0302_4600_: You can come to us for anything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_0402_4700_: Thanks, guys! And [Name:PlayerNickname ], if you ever need somebody to talk to, you can count on me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2301_1201_4800_: I’ll use my knowledge to help you solve your problems!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0100_: Hey, since we’re crossing paths here,  let’s have a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0200_: Sure! Totodile and I are ready for anything!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_1201_0300_: All right! Then time for a serious battle with pretty ol’ me!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0101_0100_: I think your Pokémon is going to change after this battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0100_: I lost? But I’m so pretty... How is this possible?
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0200_: You might be cuter, but I won’t let that stop me from winning!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0300_: You think I’m... Waaah! That makes me so happy! Say it again!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0400_: Hm? Totodile’s acting strange... Oh, she’s evolving!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2311_0501_0500_: That’s great, Totodile! You’re going to get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0100_: You there! Let’s have a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0200_: Well, that came out of nowhere, but we’re ready for anything! Bring it on!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_1201_0300_: You and your Pokémon are just as good as people say you are!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0101_0100_: My Pokémon and your Pokémon—let’s see which one’s tougher!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0100_: To think that you are tougher than us... Your Croconaw truly is amazing.
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0200_: Thanks! I think Croconaw is great, too!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0300_: Not only that—Croconaw looks like she’s about to evolve from that last battle. She IS great!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0400_: Croconaw! You’re going to evolve! That’s amazing!
charaepi_ch0018_00_chris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0018_00_chris/2312_0501_0500_: I’m so happy for you, Croconaw!

charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1101_0200_2: Thinking that he was secretly training, [Name:PlayerNickname ] followed him.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_0400_1: Wait... [Name:PlayerNickname ]?! What are you doing here?!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_0500_1: Sorry I startled you. Treecko looked like he was itching for a fight.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0401_0700_1: Man, Trainers aiming for the top  have some guts, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0302_0800_1: I felt my heart skip a beat!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0402_0900_1: Sorry, sorry! But in my defense, you did let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1000_1: Treecko and I were just in the middle of trying to figure out some new tactics.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1100_1: Treecko can climb trees and walls using the small hooks on his hands and feet.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1200_1: I was just wondering if that would be  something we can use on the ground, too.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1300_1: As long as I’m here, I’d like to do everything I possibly can!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1400_1: I’m probably going to end up battling my father, too.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1500_1: It’s a little awkward going up against your own family, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1600_1: I mean, it clearly shows you who’s stronger, right?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1700_1: And it doesn’t matter whether you win or lose. It will still become awkward. I mean...what do you talk about after that?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1800_1: But that wasn’t the case for my dad. He lost to me, but he seemed a little happy.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_1900_1: I don’t get it... It’s frustrating when you lose, right? At least, I don’t like losing.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2400_1: I get to have a strong rival really close by! How could I not battle him?!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2500_1: Besides, I can’t say that I’m stronger than him just because I beat him once.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_2600_1: Maybe if my dad and I had different specialties, like the neighbors do, I wouldn’t be so bothered.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0401_2800_1: Yeah, Professor Birch and May. They’re my next-door neighbors.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_0402_3000_1: Yeah, like Professor Birch and May have. They’re my next-door neighbors.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3100_1: Professor Birch focuses on his fieldwork, and May focuses on her contests. See? No overlap.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3200_1: But thinking like that is just me running away. While clashing can be tough, it might actually be fortunate at the same time.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3300_1: My dad is strong and respectable. That’s why I want to overcome him.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3400_1: And that’s why I have to get even better at my specialty!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3600_1: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s have a battle sometime!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2301_1201_3700_1: That way I can see how much stronger I’ve gotten!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0100_1: Well, if it isn’t Brendan! I heard your tail is on fire right now!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0200_1: Oh hi, Nolan! What’s a Frontier Brain doing here? Wait, did you just call me a Charmander?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0300_1: You know what I mean. But how about it? You want me to test how strong you’ve gotten?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_1201_0400_1: Uh, I’m not sure I do, but if it’s a  Pokémon battle you want, you got it!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0101_0100_1: All right, then! Let’s see what you got.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0100_1: Yeah! You get it, don’t you? I learned a lot from that battle!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0200_1: Wait, doesn’t it bother you that you lost?
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0300_1: Of course it bothers me! But I’m more happy than frustrated! This defeat is great experience!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0400_1: I gotta go home and reflect on this  before I forget anything!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0500_1: Man, that is one busy guy... Hey! If you ever need somebody to battle again, let me know!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0600_1: Wha...Treecko? Oh, you must have leveled up with that last battle!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2311_0501_0700_1: I’m so excited to see you evolve, Treecko! We’re gonna have even more fun together now!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_1201_0100_1: Look at you, Brendan! You and Grovyle have grown so much!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_1201_0200_1: How about it? You want to have a battle? I want to see if you’ve gotten any stronger.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_1201_0400_1: Come on! Let’s show him what we can do, Grovyle!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0101_0100_1: You don’t know how happy it makes me that I get to battle you like this, son!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0101_0200_1: I’m going all out on this, so you’d better not hold anything back either!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0100_1: I gave it everything I had. There’s nothing to regret! That was a great battle, Brendan!
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0200_1: You’ve really gotten strong, haven’t you? I feel like I need to go into the mountains and train some more.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0300_1: All right, Dad. Just don’t overdo it, OK?  Or else you’ll have to answer to Mom again.
charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0019_00_yuki/2312_0501_0500_1: If you become any stronger and cooler, I don’t think anyone will have a chance against us!

charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1101_0100_2: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Hilbert while walking through the city.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1101_0200_2: Hilbert was surrounded by all sorts of Pokémon, including his partner, Oshawott.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_0400_1: Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_0600_1: Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t see you there!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0700_1: Ha ha, yeah. I was wondering what I was going to do with all these.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0800_1: Before I realized it, these Pokémon were following me.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_0900_1: There aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio, right?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1000_1: If that’s true, there must be a lot of Trainers out there looking for their Pokémon right now.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1100_1: Do you think you could help me find all of their Trainers, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0302_1400_1: No way! That’s way too much trouble!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_1500_1: Whoa, Oshawott! Calm down! Sorry, I guess he wants you to help us out.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_1600_1: You’ll help me? Really? Thanks so much! I really appreciate it!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1700_1: Let’s first ask around to every Trainer we come across.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1800_1: Maybe we can find some clues that way!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_1900_1: I can’t thank you enough! We were able to get all those Pokémon back to their Trainers, thanks to you!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2000_1: But I wonder why they got separated to begin with? They all mentioned seeing some suspicious Trainers going around.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0301_2100_1: It might be those knuckleheads with the masks.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_2200_1: Oh, you may be right. I didn’t think of that possibility.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0302_2300_1: Maybe there are bad Trainers about?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_2400_1: Oh, you may be right. I didn’t think of that possibility.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2500_1: If that’s the case, maybe it was for the best that those Pokémon gathered around me.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2600_1: I’ve been to all sorts of regions, training my Pokémon and testing my abilities.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2700_1: Oshawott looks like he wants to get stronger, as well.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2800_1: I’ve had Oshawott since he was an Egg.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_2900_1: I found that Egg a while back, after I had left a Samurott I had at a Pokémon Day Care.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3000_1: I think he wants to be like my Samurott. I can’t blame him. Samurott is really strong.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3100_1: I want to help Oshawott and make his dream to become a strong Samurott come true.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3200_1: Seeing those Pokémon and Trainers separated from each other got me thinking.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3300_1: Trainers and Pokémon don’t really do well on their own, do they?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3400_1: Ah, sorry. Guess I’m just starting to ramble now.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3500_1: You’re such a good listener that I got carried away.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_3600_1: That reminds me. You want to be stronger, right?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0401_3800_1: Then it might be a good thing  that we teamed up!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_0402_4000_1: Then it might be a good thing  that we teamed up!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4100_1: I think we’re on the same wavelength!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4200_1: I’m sure we’ll be tagging along at least until Oshawott reaches his full potential.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2301_1201_4300_1: I’m with you not only as your teammate but also as a friend and rival!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0100_1: Hey, Hilbert! How’s your exploration of Pasio going?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0200_1: Well, we’ve been all over, and the highlight has been getting to battle all kinds of sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0300_1: Oh, if that’s the case, then you should battle me! I’ll check just how strong you really are.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_1201_0400_1: All right then, Brendan! Let’s battle!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0101_0100_1: You think you can handle my Grovyle?!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0101_0200_1: Make one mistake against us, and it’ll be all over for you!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0100_1: Ouch! I had no idea anybody could battle like that.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0200_1: I thought I was in trouble there. If it hadn’t been for Oshawott’s quick thinking, you’d have had us.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0300_1: Sounds like your Pokémon’s getting stronger, too, huh? We’ve gotta make sure we as Trainers can keep up with them!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0400_1: O-Oshawott?! Is this what they call Evolution?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2311_0501_0500_1: I was pretty surprised in that last battle, too! I didn’t realize how strong we had gotten!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0100_1: Hey, Hilbert. I’ve been hearing a lot about how well you’ve been doing here.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0200_1: Thanks! My Dewott’s at peak performance right now! Something tells me it might be about time for Evolution...
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0300_1: Well, in that case, I would definitely like to battle you. What do you say?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_1201_0400_1: You got it! I’m always ready for an intense Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0101_0100_1: All right—it’s time to reach new heights in battle!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0101_0200_1: I’m sure you can become even stronger than you already are!
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0100_1: You got me... You certainly are strong!  I even felt that it might be time for Evolution.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0200_1: Thanks, Cheren! You came along just to help us with our Evolution, huh?
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0300_1: Perhaps I did. It was not my intention to lose, though.
charaepi_ch0020_00_toya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0020_00_toya/2312_0501_0500_1: Ooh, I can’t wait to see what you look like once you’ve evolved!

charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1101_0100_: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was doing some shopping, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted Blue a little ways away.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_0300_: I was atop the arena when I saw you walking, so I thought I would come down to talk to you!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0301_0400_: You were on top of the arena?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_0500_: Yeah, the best way to get the lay of the land is to get a good look from as high as you can get.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_0700_: Nah. Plus, the best way to get  the lay of the land is to get a good look  from as high as you can get.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_0900_: Not only that, but he can pinpoint a Magikarp a thousand meters below him.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1000_: High places are Pidgeot’s territory, to the degree that he and I might spend more time in the skies than on land.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1200_: We’ve been all over the world,  but Pasio really is a nice place.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_1400_: Yeah, while Pidgeot and I were flying around, we saw firsthand how pretty the island is.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_1500_: It shows how well this artificial island is able to blend into nature.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_1700_: Sure is. There are Trainers and their Pokémon gathered here from all over the world.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_1800_: We have plenty of people to battle, too,  so that’s also a plus.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_1900_: It’s pretty much a paradise for Trainers and Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2500_: I’ve got this rival, Red. You’ve seen him around, right?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2600_: You kinda remind me of him!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2700_: You’re like a crimson flame quietly burning.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_2800_: But even though you’re on the quiet side, you’re hiding some awesome power, too, right?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_3200_: No, I’m sure of it. Pidgeot agrees, too.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3300_: That’s why I have to take you down myself someday!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3400_: OK... Maybe that came out a bit strong.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3500_: But anyway, I’m traveling around the world so that I can get even one step closer to being the absolute best.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3600_: Right now, I don’t think I’d lose to either you or Red!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3700_: What? Don’t be overconfident? Come on, Pidgeot...
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_3800_: How am I supposed to keep my feet on the ground if I’m flying high with you, buddy?
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0301_3900_: I’ll blast you out of the sky!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0401_4000_: Ooh, looks like somebody can talk big! I like it!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0302_4100_: I’ll fly just as high and catch you!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_0402_4200_: Ooh, looks like somebody can talk big! I like it!
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4300_: But if you’re gonna try your hand, I’d recommend you try sooner rather than later.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4400_: We’re as free as the wind, after all.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4500_: If we get bored, we’ll wander away to who knows where next.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4600_: You’re the same, too, aren’t you? I can tell.
charaepi_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0021_00_green/2301_1201_4700_: Birds of a feather and all that!

charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] slowly walked through the narrow passageways of the caves.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1101_0200_2: Passageways so narrow, in fact, that two people would have a difficult time passing each other.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_0300_1: Whoa there... Hang on a minute.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_0400_1: Well, aren’t we in a pickle.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0401_0600_1: I didn’t think I would run in to you here. How are we gonna get through this path now?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0402_0800_1: Oh, don’t put on airs. You want to get to the other side, right?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_0900_1: Life throws you moments like this from time to time, doesn’t it?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1000_1: If we could both change form,  like water changes into ice,  that might let us slip on by each other.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1100_1: But I’m about as graceful as a hunk of ice!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1200_1: I wouldn’t say I’m meticulous either... And I don’t have the best patience.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1300_1: I just do what I want to do. I even left my Gym in my wife’s care so I could travel! She wasn’t too happy about that...
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1400_1: I do feel bad about it, y’know?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0301_1500_1: Well, that certainly can’t feel good.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0402_1800_1: I’m being serious. But I just can’t seem to change that easily...
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_1900_1: But rest assured, I can do more than just cause trouble for my team.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2000_1: I might be stubborn and inflexible, but... Here, watch this!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2100_1: How ’bout that! A lot more reliable all of a sudden, aren’t I?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2200_1: Except...now we’re definitely not going anywhere.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2300_1: Heh... Avalugg can’t even be flipped  by a Slaking moving at full power!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2400_1: We can protect you from any opponent! That’s what friends are for, y’know?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0401_2600_1: I know! You can count on me anytime!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0302_2700_1: You can rely on me from  time to time, too, you know.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_0402_2800_1: Well, that’s a nice thing to say. Makes it really hit home that we’re a team!
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_2900_1: You really are a good person, y’know?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3000_1: I’m glad I have such supportive friends.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3100_1: As you know, I’m pretty unyielding. But that’s why when I say something, I mean it.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3200_1: As long as I’ve got breath in my body, I’ll stand in front and protect you.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3400_1: That being said...it looks like flexibility might be what we really need in this situation, huh?
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3500_1: These crevices are a little too narrow for me. I don’t think I can move forward any farther, so I guess I’ll double back the way I came.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3600_1: Some days you might think you’re moving forward, but you just end up moving backward... That’s just the way it is, y’know.
charaepi_ch0022_00_urup_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0022_00_urup/2301_1201_3700_1: I guess having an unrelenting personality doesn’t do me any good in these situations!

charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] wandered into a clearing in the forest, hoping to relax and catch a nice breath of fresh air.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_0200_2: There, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Cheryl and Blissey playing happily together.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_0300_1: Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Are you seeking out new Trainers to battle with again today?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_0500_1: Really? In that case, I know a lovely spot for relaxing.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_0700_1: I see. Are you feeling tired at all? How about taking a little break for a change? I know a lovely spot for relaxing.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_0800_1: Not many people go there, so it should be nice and quiet.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_0900_1: I can show you the way. Come on—let’s go!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1000_2: Cheryl started forward on the path with a happy spring in her step.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1100_2: But along the way, her foot got caught on a knobbly root sticking out of the ground, causing her to lose her balance.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1400_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] instinctively reached out a hand to keep Cheryl from falling...
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1101_1410_2: only to take a tumble [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] instead.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_1800_1: Oh dear... This is all my fault.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_1900_1: It looks like you might have scraped your knee. May I take a look?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_2100_1: I’ll fix you right up. Hold still for just a moment, OK?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_2300_1: Nonsense! Come now—let me take a look. You don’t want it to get infected, do you?
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2600_1: It almost looks like you never scraped your knee at all. I’m so glad you’re OK.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2700_1: Although...I can’t help but feel a little giddy about all of this.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2800_1: Your strong, steady determination is a constant support for me...
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_2900_1: but it’s not often that I get the chance to return the favor and be helpful to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3000_1: Wait... But it was my fault that you got injured in the first place today, wasn’t it? Oh dear, I’m sorry!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0301_3100_1: It’s OK! Thanks for your help.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_3200_1: Oh, you’re a dear, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Just being around you always seems to make my heart bubble up with joy.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_3400_1: Oh, you’re a dear, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Just being around you always seems to make my heart bubble up with joy.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3500_1: Compared to you, I think I... I still have a lot of room to grow in that area.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3600_1: Did you know that Blissey are called the Happiness Pokémon? Making others happy brings them joy.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3700_1: That means that when other people are happy, Blissey feels happy, too. It’s contagious!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3800_1: For a while, I used to be really hesitant when it came to asking my Pokémon to battle. I sort of felt bad for them, you see...
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_3900_1: But then my dear Blissey here, still a Chansey at the time, decided to evolve so that she could help me work through those feelings.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_4000_1: Blissey was actually my inspiration for participating in the PML. I knew that I wanted to make people happy, just like her.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0401_4200_1: You know, it’s so strange... For some reason, when I hear you say that, I really believe that I CAN.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_0402_4400_1: You know, it’s so strange... For some reason, when I hear you say that, I really believe that I can do it!
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_4500_1: I must be the luckiest Trainer in the world to have such a great role model as a friend.
charaepi_ch0023_00_momi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0023_00_momi/2301_1201_4600_1: Moving forward, I hope that you’ll continue to teach us all sorts of new things. That would make us both so happy.

charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1101_010: [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Shauntal while strolling through town, but Shauntal did not seem to notice [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_020: “The bond between them was deeper than the darkest abyss. It would outlast eternity, continuing without pause, forevermore...”
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_030: Ahh, this place makes me feel so inspired!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_070: [Name:PlayerNickname ]?! G-gosh, I’m sorry! I must have been spacing out.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_090: [Name:PlayerNickname ]?! G-gosh, I’m sorry! I must have been spacing out.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_110: I suppose so. I’m in the middle of writing a novel, you see...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_120: My imagination must have gotten the best of me as I was gazing out at the beautiful cityscape here.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_140: Yes, as a matter of fact!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_150: I’m planning to write a novel set on Pasio at some point!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_160: There’s an abundance of unique Trainers here on this island, after all...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_170: I thought it would be interesting to use them as models for my characters.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_180: For example, take that hiker over there.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_190: He may have a big grin on his face now, but what if he had a tragic past?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_200: What if he ran into an old childhood friend here on Pasio and the two of them had a dramatic, tear-filled reunion? It’s possible!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_210: Oh gosh! I’ve gone and let myself get carried away by my imagination again. I’m sorry...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0301_220: It’s OK. Don’t worry about it.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_230: It’s just that...compared to my normal routine as an Elite Four member, I’m positively surrounded by other Trainers now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_240: It’s a constant source of inspiration.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_260: I do. I believe that there’s a story behind every person and Pokémon out there, and I love to imagine what those stories might be.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_270: But you know what? The person that inspires me the most is actually you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_280: In fact, you remind me of the [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='hero' F='heroine' ] of a story I read often when I was little.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_290: Someday, I’d love to write a story about you. With you as the main character, of course.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_310: Perhaps it’s the way people and Pokémon seem to be naturally drawn to you.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_320: I think that we can all clearly see how much you care about others.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_340: I think you’d make a wonderful [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='hero' F='heroine' ] in a storybook, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_350: Just like the one I idolized all those years ago!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_370: It looks like Chandelure is the one spacing out a bit now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0301_380: Is she bored with the book talk?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_390: Not likely. She usually listens to me chatter about books for much longer than this, so I doubt it’s boredom...
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_400: I wonder... Maybe Chandelure wanted to star in the novel, so she’s giving us the cold shoulder now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_430: Maybe Chandelure wanted to star in the novel, so she’s giving us the cold shoulder now.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_440: Tee-hee! Don’t worry, Chandelure! I’ve already got the perfect part for you to play in the story.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0401_460: We are indeed. Chandelure’s been by my side since I was a little girl!
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0302_470: Can you tell what she’s thinking?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_0402_480: With Chandelure, I can make a pretty good guess at what she’s thinking by the flicker of the flame on her head.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_490: She’s always provided me with a soft, gentle light to read and study by, ever since she was a Litwick.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_500: My very fondest memories come from the times we’ve shared together.
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_510: So of course I’m going to include her in my next novel! How could I not?
charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0024_00_shikimi/2301_1201_520: When the time comes to read that book together, will you shine your light on me like always, Chandelure?

charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to explore  the outskirts of the island, eventually  making [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way to the glaciers.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_0500: Well, these icy glaciers can be pretty treacherous if you’re not super careful. Make sure you stay focused out here, OK?
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0302_0600: No, but it’s pretty c-cold out here...
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_0700: Duh! These are glaciers! Of course it’s gonna be cold!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_0800: This place could easily become a disaster zone if we get a surprise blizzard coming through!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_0900: Abomasnow, would you be a doll and go shield [Name:PlayerNickname ] from the wind for a bit?
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1000: You really should be more careful, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1100: And, well...I should learn to follow my own advice every once in a while, too.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_1300: It was a long time ago, but yeah... I got stranded in the mountains during a really bad snowstorm once.
