charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_1500: Well, it was a long time ago, but I got stranded in the mountains during a really bad snowstorm once.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1600: There’s a flower that only blooms up in the snowiest mountain peaks, and one day, I decided to go hiking to try to find one.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1700: But while I was up there, I got caught in an unexpected blizzard and accidentally veered off the trail.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1800: I was lost and freezing... I almost lost hope altogether. I didn’t think anyone was going to rescue me.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_1900: But then Abomasnow here came out of nowhere and saved my life!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2000: I was barely conscious by then...
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2100: but I remember feeling like I was being carried down the mountain by a big, fluffy Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2200: When I woke up, the Pokémon was gone. Somehow, I’d ended up in a cabin in the mountains, tucked into a warm bed.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2300: Abomasnow here ran off before I even got the chance to thank her!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0301_2400: Guess she was too cool for that.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_2500: Haha, that’s what I thought at first, too.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_2700: Haha, that’s what I thought at first, too.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_2800: After that whole experience, I just knew I had to find that Pokémon again somehow. I wanted to battle with her as my partner!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3100: Not to be mean or anything. She did it to keep me away from danger.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3200: You see, whenever Abomasnow is around, big, strong blizzards tend to form... I think she wanted to protect me from them.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3300: I wasn’t gonna let a little blizzard stop me, though! I hiked right through those storms to visit her over and over again.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3400: It took a while, but eventually Abomasnow gave in and said yes!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0301_3500: Your focus must have convinced her!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_3600: I think so! My perfect focus somehow melted through that icy heart of hers.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_3800: I think so! My perfect focus somehow melted through that icy heart of hers.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_3900: Focus is the key to victory!
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0401_4300: Well, I think Abomasnow might have said yes that day because she was worried about me.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_0402_4500: Well, I think Abomasnow might have said yes that day because she was worried about me.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4600: If I’d continued to visit her up in the mountains, I would’ve been pelted by her blizzard nonstop. At some point, I would have frozen over.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4700: Abomasnow wanted to prevent that from happening, and I believe that kindness is what makes her strong.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4800: I never found the snow flower I’d gone searching for on the mountain that day...
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_4900: but in the end, I found something even more special than that.
charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0025_00_suzuna/2301_1201_5000: Abomasnow may have a cold, icy exterior, but she’s got a warm heart on the inside, and I’m proud to have her as my partner!

charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1101_0100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] was visiting the ocean with friends.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1101_0200_: While they were there, they encountered  a rambunctious pink object bouncing around.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1101_0700_: Incredibly, the pink object turned out to be Whitney’s Miltank.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_0800_: Sorry if we scared ya! Miltank and I were just playin’ a little.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0301_0900_: Is this the time to play?
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_1000_: You don’t have to be so hard on us!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_1100_: It’s not like we’re playin’ all the time!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0302_1200_: Taking a rest sometimes is important.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_1400_: Sometimes you gotta let your hair down!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_1500_: When I’m here, it sure does make me feel relaxed.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_1600_: Oceans and ranches... That’s what we’re all about, after all.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_1800_: Things look a little different where I come from, but there’s an ocean right by my hometown of Goldenrod City, too.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_2000_: Things look a little different where I come from, but there’s an ocean right by my hometown of Goldenrod City, too.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2100_: And Miltank grew up on a ranch.  That’s where I first met her.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2200_: Thinkin’ about it takes me back to that first time I ever went to visit that ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2300_: All of a sudden, Miltank used Rollout and came right at me!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2400_: It was like she was tryin’ to test me!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0401_2600_: Well, I can’t be sure, but I think Miltank was lookin’ for someone to come and take her away from that ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_2800_: Well, I can’t be sure, but I think Miltank was lookin’ for someone to come and take her away from that ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_2900_: But not just anyone, so she used that move to see if I was the right Trainer for her.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3000_: Although I didn’t know that at the time!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3100_: Of course, I dodged her Rollout, but I wondered what in the world was goin’ on!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3200_: But then she just kept comin’ at me, bumpin’ into me, sendin’ me flyin’, and I found that determination so adorable.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3300_: Before I knew it, Miltank and I were playin’ together all the time.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0301_3400_: And the ranch let you take her?
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_0402_3700_: Hey now! Don’t go spreadin’ rumors about me like that!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3800_: An old guy at the ranch told me I could have Miltank.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_3900_: I mean, he actually was happy to have me take her off his hands!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4000_: He said it seemed like Miltank had always wanted to leave the ranch and see the world.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4100_: That’s why I try to make sure Miltank does more than just battle. She has to enjoy herself while she’s out seein’ the world, too!
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4200_: I gotta make her new life better than her life back on the ranch.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4300_: I don’t want her to regret leavin’ her home.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4800_: To be honest, I don’t really know what’s best for Miltank.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_4900_: But I do know that she knows I’m tryin’ to do my best for her.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_5000_: So I hope she stays with me for a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0026_00_akane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0026_00_akane/2301_1201_5100_: That would be the best! At least, that’s how I feel about it.

charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1101_0100: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was wandering through the forest, captivated by the artificial beauty of Pasio, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came upon a clearing.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1101_0200: There, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted Gardenia, who rushed over  happily to say hello.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_0300: Were you checking out Pasio’s forest, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_0400: Isn’t it amazing?! I heard everything here was made by people!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0401_0600: I can hardly believe it! Lear must really love Pokémon to build something like this!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0402_0800: Yeah, this super-rich guy named Lear built all of Pasio. It’s an artificial island!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_0900: I also heard that a new kind of Pokémon  might be born, thanks to Lear!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0401_1100: Pokémon sometimes change their form or evolve to suit their environment.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0402_1300: Pokémon sometimes change their form or evolve to suit their environment.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_1400: Exeggutor in the Alola region soaked up so much sunshine that their necks got super long like that.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_1500: So if Pokémon stay on Pasio long enough, there’s a chance they could change to a new form!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_1600: I wonder if Roserade will change.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_1700: She could be slithery like Serperior or fluffy like Jumpluff.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_1800: Oh! Or maybe she could get a really hard steel body like Ferrothorn!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0401_2100: Um, if Roserade changes form, that means...
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0402_2300: Um, if Roserade changes form, that means...
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_2400: Is it possible she could turn into some spooky Pokémon like Gourgeist or Trevenant?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_2500: I-I don’t think I would like that... What would I do?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_2600: You know, I think I would still love Roserade even if she were a ghost, though.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_2700: Um, I mean, it’s not like I’m s-scared of ghosts or anything! You believe me, right?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_2800: But you know what? Yeah! It’d be no problem! Ghost Roserade might be kind of transparent and cute, right?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_2900: I wonder what Roserade wants to be like.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0301_3000: Isn’t she fine just the way she is?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0401_3100: Like she is now? How she’s always been, you mean?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0401_3300: You’re right. Maybe she’s best as she is already.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0302_3400: Roserade might not want to change.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_0402_3500: Huh? Oh, you’re right. No one likes sudden change, right?
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_3700: I guess I got a little too excited. Sorry, Roserade.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_3800: If her form changed, that would mean we would have to say good-bye to her current form.
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_3900: I’m sure the new Roserade would be lovely, too, but she’s already lovely right now!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_4000: Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You taught me something important!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_4100: Whether she changes or not, as long as we can spend time together, that’s the most important thing!
charaepi_ch0027_00_natane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0027_00_natane/2301_1201_4200: Roserade! Let’s keep on going for walks and soaking up the sun like we always have!

charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_0100_: Yes! That’s it! Now attack like you mean it!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1101_0200_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] headed to the caves to meet up with Clair and her Kingdra. When [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] arrived, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found them training together.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_0400_: I don’t have time to wait around for people all day. When I ask you to meet me, I expect you to come immediately. OK?
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_0600_: Me? A Gym Leader on the same level as the Elite Four?! Of course I’m busy!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_0800_: Well, I suppose I could forgive you just this once. I’m feeling nice today.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1000_: I heard some good news. Lance is here on Pasio now.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1100_: You may have heard of him.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1200_: He’s the Champion of the Indigo Plateau Pokémon League...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1400_: Lance has always treated me like a child, so to be honest, I can’t say I’m his biggest fan.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1500_: My Kingdra and his Dragonite have a bit of a history together as well.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1600_: Back when Kingdra was still a little Horsea, she fought against Dragonite with all her might.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1700_: Look, just hearing Dragonite’s name is getting her all worked up...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1800_: Anyway, our confidence took a huge hit after that match with Lance.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_1900_: I was still a child back then. We didn’t stand a chance against him.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2000_: I have dreams about that day every once in a while, even now.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2100_: Heh heh... Lance didn’t get the last laugh in the end, though.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2200_: We stood our ground and managed to get one good hit in before he beat us. The look of surprise on Lance’s face was priceless!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2300_: We gave him a good scare that day, didn’t we, Kingdra? A real Water Gun in the eye!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_2500_: I know. The two of us have been a powerful team ever since we were children.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0302_2600_: Water Gun, huh? I see what you did there.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_2700_: What? I assure you, you did not! Silly jokes are beneath me...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2800_: Anyway! Horsea continued to give her all for me, eventually evolving into the magnificent Kingdra you see here now.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_2900_: Kingdra generally live deep below the ocean’s surface and are rarely seen in the wild, you know.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3000_: Even Lance hasn’t been able to fully utilize the power of his Kingdra.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3100_: I, and I alone, have accomplished that! I should be known as the world’s best dragon master.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3200_: To tell you the truth, the thought of being known as the best is a little unnerving... but I won’t complain.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_3400_: I suppose hearing that from you gives me a little more confidence.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_3500_: You’re right—I AM strong. But I can still grow stronger.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_3700_: Hmm... You and I? Train together? I suppose I could get behind that. Thank you. For thinking of me.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3800_: You know, I think I feel better now, after talking all of that out with you. I feel like I’ve got my emotions in order now, at least.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_3900_: I believe I can trust you as a fellow Trainer.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4000_: Something tells me the two of us are going to soar to greater heights together, like a pair of Dragon Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0301_4200_: You can count on me as a friend!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0401_4300_: Thank you! It’ll be good to have you around.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0302_4400_: You can count on me as a partner!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_0402_4500_: Right, then. Let’s soar to greater heights together!
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4600_: I think Kingdra is happy about this arrangement as well.
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4700_: You might still be an up-and-coming Trainer, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0028_00_ibuki/2301_1201_4800_: but something about being around you mysteriously seems to put my heart at ease.

charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1101_0100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a stroll near the volcano when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard Flannery call out from up ahead.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_0200_: Hey, you don’t look so great. Or am I just imagining things?
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0302_0500_: Maybe I don’t feel so hot.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0402_0600_: I knew it! Don’t worry—I know just the thing!
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_0700_: When I’m not feeling so hot, I try to relax my body and let out all my steam.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_0800_: That’s something Torkoal taught me. Now, whenever I see a volcano, it makes me think of how I used to be.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0401_1000_: My grandfather was one of the Elite Four,  and I’d felt pressured to live up to that  since I was little.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0402_1200_: My grandfather was one of the Elite Four,  and I’d felt pressured to live up to that  since I was little.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1300_: I tried to get stronger as fast as I could, but I was just running in circles.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1400_: Around that time, seeing Torkoal spouting out smoke all the time like she always does got me thinking.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1500_: How very Torkoal-like she was—never trying to impress anyone.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1600_: Torkoal does her own thing, but there’s more to it than that.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1700_: See how she’s digging a hole?
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1900_: She’ll burn that coal up as she digs out a little cave.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2000_: The smoke she spouts is how you know she’s converting that coal into energy.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2100_: We may not notice it, but Torkoal is working hard, little by little, to dig her caves. That’s what made me realize something.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2200_: I was trying too hard. I needed to do things in my own natural way—be myself instead of trying to be someone I’m not.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2300_: I thought...if I could do that, I’d be able to become who I’d always wanted to be. It didn’t matter that my grandfather was one of the Elite Four.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2400_: Whenever I’d start to feel pressure, Torkoal was always there for me—just doing her own thing like she always does.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2500_: The caves that I’d make—or, in my case, the paths I’d choose to walk down—would be up to me.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2600_: If I have been true to myself, when I get to  the end of that dark, narrow cave...
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2700_: I’m sure there will be an awesome, bright-red, world-shaking volcano waiting for me, like I saw once a long time ago.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2800_: And that’s how I feel now.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2900_: Ahhh! Although I try to stay focused on my dreams, I still feel some pressure. I guess it’s inevitable!
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3000_: I’d been wanting to talk to you about this, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Thanks for listening.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0301_3100_: You made me feel better, too.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0302_3300_: That was good for me to hear.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3500_: After all, you’re someone I look up to. Sometimes I wish I could be more like you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3600_: Knowing that I made you feel better makes me feel better, too!
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3700_: I’m going to keep being myself from now on.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3800_: Some people think they always have to work superhard so they don’t get left behind...
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3900_: but I think it’s better to dig your own cave at your own pace. Racing’s not worth it if it means wearing yourself out!

charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1101_0100_20: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found Liza hanging out on the beach.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1101_0200_20: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] walked over to chat, but Liza looked a little sad.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_0800_10: I guess you can tell I’m feeling lonely.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_0900_10: I’ve just gotten so used to being around Tate all the time.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_1300_10: Yes, we’re twins. Tate and I look just like each other.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1400_10: Tate said he wanted to try training separately while we’re on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1500_10: There are some really tough Trainers and sync  pairs who are totally in sync with each other.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1600_10: Maybe we shouldn’t be together just because we’re twins.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1700_10: Maybe we needed to split up to find out why we need each other. That was his idea.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0401_1900_10: Tate and I promised each other we’d meet again after we’d gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0302_2000_10: So that’s why you’re feeling lonely.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_2100_10: Tate and I promised each other we’d meet again after we’d gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_2200_10: But being by myself is making me lonelier than I thought it would.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_2700_10: I guess I’m not really alone after all!
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_2900_10: Whenever I’m feeling down, Lunatone’s always there by my side to help me out.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3000_10: Even when we first met, it was that way.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0401_3200_10: A long time ago, I was playing by myself and got lost.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_3400_10: A long time ago, I was playing by myself and got lost.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3500_10: It was almost nighttime, and it was getting darker and darker. I was scared, and that’s when Lunatone appeared.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3600_10: It kindly guided me along the dark path.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3700_10: That’s how Lunatone and I met.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3900_10: Having Lunatone around makes me feel so much happier!
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4000_10: Two is more fun than one, so that’s why we’re together.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4100_10: Is that a good enough reason to team up?
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0302_4400_10: Of course. And I’m here for you, too.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4600_10: I’ve been feeling lonely ever since Tate and I split up, but maybe it’s not all bad.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4700_10: If Tate and I were still together,  I might not have been able to grow  so close to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4800_10: It’s a chance for me to practice my teamwork with Trainers other than Tate, too.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4900_10: I have to surprise Tate when I show him how much stronger I’ve gotten.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0401_5100_10: “The sun and the moon can’t rise together.”
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_5300_10: “The sun and the moon can’t rise together.”
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_5400_10: That’s what Tate said when he told me he wanted to split up.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_5500_10: I believe the day will come when we can be together again!
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_5600_10: Now is the time for me to grow! Thanks for reminding me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1101_0100_20: Summoned by Tate, [Name:PlayerNickname ]  made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way over to the volcano.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1101_0200_20: Tate had already arrived and appeared to be talking to someone on his Poryphone.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_0300_10: Yes, I know. I’ll be working hard, Liza, so you should, too.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0401_0700_10: Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ], I didn’t realize you were already here.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_0900_10: Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ], I didn’t even expect you yet.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_1000_10: I’m guessing you heard that conversation?
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0401_1200_10: No no! I’m not angry. Really, don’t worry about it!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_1400_10: No no! I’m not angry. Really, don’t worry about it!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_1500_10: That was my twin, Liza, who I was on the phone with.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_1600_10: We’ve split up here on Pasio,  so we keep in touch by phone.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_2000_10: Well, there is a reason we’re not together.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2100_10: Up until now, we’ve always been together, so we took it for granted.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2200_10: But here on Pasio, there are Trainers and Pokémon that are totally in sync with each other.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2300_10: Seeing really tough Trainers who weren’t even part of a team made us think.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2400_10: We started to wonder why we’re always together.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_2500_10: I mean, of course we are twins, but I felt like there must be something more to our combination...
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0302_2800_10: That must’ve been a difficult decision!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_2900_10: It wasn’t too big of a deal.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_3000_10: This is the first time Liza and I have ever been apart, so I was a little nervous about it.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3100_10: Solrock is always there for me, though.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3300_10: Having said that, I do feel a bit lonesome.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3400_10: It feels strange to not have anyone to train with.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3500_10: Hey, that reminds me! I’ve got an idea, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_3700_10: To be honest, that’s the real reason I asked you here today. What do you think?
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0301_3800_10: Of course I’ll be your friend!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0302_4000_10: I thought we were already friends?!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_0402_4100_10: I mean, yeah, that’s how I always felt, at least!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4200_10: Liza and I actually made a promise to each other when we split up.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4300_10: Even if we stay split up or we do join back together...
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4400_10: we promised each other that we would make it to the PML and have a Pokémon battle there!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4500_10: With you as my friend, I think I can fulfill that promise!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4600_10: I’ll need your help, too, Solrock!
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4700_10: The sun and the moon can’t rise together.
charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0031_00_fuu/2301_1201_4800_10: But I hope Liza and I find out the real reason we should be together!

charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1101_0100: While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a stroll, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] ran into Pryce and his Seel.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1101_0200: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] called out to say hello, but Pryce didn’t hear [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_0300: It seems like you’ve been slacking off a bit ever since we got to Pasio, Seel.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_0400: If you’d been more focused during our last battle, winning would have been a breeze for us.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_0500: If we continue on at this rate, triumphing at the PML will be nothing more than a dream. And a distant dream at that.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0401_0700: Hm? Is that you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Well, well! Fancy running into you here, of all places.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_0900: Hm? Is that you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Well, well! Fancy running into you here, of all places.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_1000: Have you been training out here?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0401_1200: Ah, it just so happens that Seel and I are doing the same.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0302_1300: No, but that could be fun.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_1400: I see. Taking a break today, then?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_1500: Seel and I take walks all over Pasio as part of our daily routine, you know.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_1600: The brief respite gives us a nice, quiet moment to relax together each day.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_1700: However, I believe Seel has been taking advantage of that relaxing time a bit too much...
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_1800: He’s so caught up in the young, lively atmosphere of Pasio that all he wants to do now is play, play, play.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0301_1900: A little fun couldn’t hurt, right?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0401_2000: Yes, but a certain amount of discipline is also necessary for growth.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_2200: Yes, but a certain amount of discipline is also necessary for growth.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_2300: Seel and I did not journey all the way to Pasio to play around on vacation.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_2400: Are you not training hard each day in preparation for the PML as well?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_2500: Listen... The path to reach the mountain summit is not a gentle one, child.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_2600: At times, we must not only be strict with ourselves but with our Pokémon as well.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_3100: Sometimes my enthusiasm gets the best of me and I end up lecturing you whippersnappers... It’s a bad habit of mine.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_3200: I’ve already bored you to tears, haven’t I?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0401_3400: Well, I’m happy to hear that... I have a bit more advice for you, if you’d still care to listen.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0302_3500: It was a little difficult to grasp.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_3600: I see... A bit difficult, you say?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_3700: Hmm... I will try to keep things simple.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_3800: Both of us are heading toward the same goal right now: to compete in the PML, and perhaps even to win.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_3900: I’m sure the road will be tough, with many hurdles to block our way. Things may not always go how we want them to.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_4000: It will not be easy. The journey will be long and arduous...
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_4100: but when we finally overcome all of our obstacles and reach our destination, we will have grown so much.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_4200: Because we so strongly wish to learn and grow with our Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_4300: Because of the bonds that connect us... The friendship and the courage...
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_4400: and so on and so forth...
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0401_4600: Hm? Oh, drat! Not again... I’m simply incorrigible.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_4800: Hm? Oh, drat! Not again... I’m simply incorrigible.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_4900: Sheesh! I shouldn’t be lecturing others on being sloppy and undisciplined when I can’t even keep track of myself...
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_5000: Are you lecturing ME now, Seel? Well, perhaps I deserve it... Thank you.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_5100: That’s it, isn’t it? Words of kindness can be just as important as criticism.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_5200: We need both in order to bring out the best in each other.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0301_5300: Being strict for the sake of your Pokémon, huh?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0401_5400: Indeed! That doesn’t mean I don’t enjoy a good bit of fun with my Pokémon, though.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_0402_5600: Indeed! That doesn’t mean I don’t enjoy a good bit of fun with my Pokémon, though.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_5700: What I mean to say is...having fun and playing with your Pokémon isn’t the only good way to spend time with them.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2301_1201_5800: I believe that if you really care about your Pokémon, you’ll know the importance of being strict with them sometimes.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_1201_0100: Y’know what? You’re an Ice-type Pokémon user, aren’t you? Pryce, right? The veteran Gym Leader?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_1201_0200: Indeed. And if I’m not mistaken, you’re an Ice-type Pokémon user and veteran Gym Leader yourself.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_1201_0300: Well then, how’s about a little showdown between us veterans? What do you say?
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_1201_0400: Hmph... That could be interesting. A battle to find out which one of us is the true master of Ice-type Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_0101_0100: Y’know, there’s no point in standing around and boasting about it. Let’s show these folks a glacial battle they’ll never forget!
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_0501_0100: Y’know...I thought I was a veteran when it comes to battling, but you really showed me a thing or two today.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_0501_0200: It was a fine battle—truly! I feel more motivated than ever to continue my journey and train hard.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_0501_0300: Well, thank you for... Wait a sec. Your Pokémon looks like it’s gonna evolve!
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_0501_0400: Is that true, Seel? Are you evolving? I’ll be right here to witness it.
charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0032_00_yanagi/2311_0501_0500: It’s time to prepare for our next battle. I have faith in you, Seel.

charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1101_0100_: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] walked past the entrance to a cave, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard a loud rumbling sound coming from inside.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1101_0200_: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] entered the cave to investigate the origin of the sound...
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1101_0300_: Suddenly, a Palpitoad leapt onto the path  from out of nowhere!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_0400_: Well, hot diggity! There ya are, Palpitoad!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_0500_: And...is that you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? What in tarnation are you doin’ here, kid?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_0700_: Well, we were just doin’ some diggin’ in this here cave.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_0900_: Well, we were just doin’ some diggin’ in this here cave.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1000_: That rumblin’ ya heard was probably ol’ Palpitoad here levelin’ the ground for me.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1100_: But I reckon he got so excited, he couldn’t hold it in no more—stumbled off down the path.  I chased him all the way back here.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1200_: But never mind all that hooey! The point is, we need more muscle!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1300_: You ’preciate the aesthetics o’ my diggin’, don’tcha, kiddo? If ya do, maybe ol’ Clay’ll put YOU to work!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1400_: Answer me this... Ya got artificial tunnels ’n’ ya got natural rock tunnels, right? Which kind do you reckon is easier to use, kid?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_1600_: Well, bless your heart! That’s correct!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_1800_: Are you jus’ yankin’ my chain, kid? Or do ya really like rough ’n’ tumble adventurin’ that much?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1900_: I guarantee ya, caves ’n’ tunnels made by people are far more convenient and well maintained.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2000_: Anyhoo, next question! ’Tween artificial tunnels ’n’ natural rock tunnels, which do you reckon are prettier?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_2200_: Well, toot my horn! I feel the very same!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_2400_: Well, good ol’ nature does have a kind o’ beauty ya can’t replicate artificially.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_2500_: But what if ya try lookin’ at it from a different perspective?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2600_: I mean, folks say beauty’s in the eye o’ the beholder, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2700_: I, myself, think artificial caves ’n’ tunnels are the most beautiful of all!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2800_: Why? ’Cause they help to improve the economy in a lotta ways! Money’s important, kid.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2900_: We sacrifice our precious time to work hard ’n’ improve our craft, then we get compensation—money—in return for that labor.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3000_: In my case, I’m providin’ convenience to my consumers—the folks who use my tunnels— in exchange for receivin’ that money.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3100_: Folks use my tunnels like roads— for transportin’ goods, travelin’ to visit friends... All sorts o’ things!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3200_: Convenience makes the consumers happy, ’n’ gettin’ paid makes me happy. It’s a win-win situation for everybody!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3300_: And in case you were wonderin’, diggin’ tunnels is a joint effort between me ’n’ my Palpitoad here.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3400_: He’s got Bubble Beam ’n’ Bulldoze, ’n’ I got my pickax.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3500_: Those tunnels are a product o’ the bond between a Trainer and a Pokémon, see? And havin’ that bond makes both of us happy.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3600_: Ain’t nothin’ in the world more beautiful than that combination, if ya ask me!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_3800_: That mighta been a li’l advanced for a whippersnapper like yerself. But listen... The PML’s gonna be tough as boulders.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_4000_: That mighta been a li’l advanced for a whippersnapper like yerself. But listen... The PML’s gonna be tough as boulders.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4100_: You can try to drill right through it, but sooner or later, yer gonna hit some hard bedrock. All you got is you ’n’ yer Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4200_: Y’all gotta work together to get through that tough bedrock before you can build yer pretty tunnel beyond!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4300_: I hope I get to witness y’all do it. I really do mean that.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4400_: Well, anyhoo! I reckon you’ll do a fine job o’ helpin’ me dig in this here cave!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4500_: It’s gonna take a lotta strength to triumph at the PML, right? Well, yer hard labor here’ll be like special trainin’! It’s a win-win situation!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0100_: I couldn’t help but notice...your Palpitoad smells like fresh, nutrient-rich soil.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0200_: Oh-ho! That’s one powerful sniffer ya got there, missy! Palpitoad here just loves playin’ in the dirt. Y’all would be best buds!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0300_: Pokémon that use Ground-type moves do well in good, fresh soil... Would you do me the honor of a battle, sir?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0400_: Why not? Let’s see what y’all can do!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0101_0100_: When Mudsdale and I are through with you, you’ll know exactly what we’re capable of!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0101_0200_: Hah! Y’all think ya can power through Palpitoad’s mud?! I’d like to see ya try!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0100_: Whew... You weren’t kidding about Palpitoad’s mud.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0200_: You and your Pokémon used some mighty earth-shatterin’ moves yerselves there, missy!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0300_: I’m pleased you noticed! You are as strong as any island kahuna in my book.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0400_: Palpitoad?! Hold up—are you evolvin’, buddy?!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0500_: Well, I’ll be! That battle with you must’ve woke somethin’ up inside of him!

charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1101_0: [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard the sound of a Pokémon barking in the distance.
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] wandered over to where the sound was coming from.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_0: Oh, hey! That you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Didn’t realize it was you walking up here.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_0: Oh, I was just trying to get Granbull here to help me with a painting.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_0: Oh, I was just trying to get Granbull here to help me with a painting.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_1: My theme is “Granbull at the PML,” so I wanted him to do a dynamic pose for me— like he’s battling hard at the tournament!
It’s a win-win situation. I get a model to paint, and posing like that gets Granbull into a more competitive mind-set.
C’mon, Granbull. Why don’t you come say hello to [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Aw! You getting scared again, Granbull?
Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. He gets a little timid around other people.
Pasio’s, like, full of people he’s never seen before, so lately he’s been even more of a scaredy-cat than usual.
But despite all that, one of Granbull’s goals is to triumph at the PML.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_1: Yep! It’s a funny story, actually... So, my Granbull has this habit of chomping on whatever it is that makes him happy or excited.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_2: Well, it’s a funny story, actually... My Granbull has this habit of chomping on whatever it is that makes him happy or excited.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_2: And, like, the first time we saw an ad for the PML on TV, he launched himself right up toward the screen!
He was just going at it! Chomping and chomping and chomping on the TV...
And I was just, like, super shocked! It all happened so fast, you know?
That wasn’t the only time he did it, either. Every time the PML ad came on TV, he’d run up and chomp away.
I was super touched when I realized how eager my timid Granbull was to come to a crowded place like this!
Even more reason for us to dominate in the tournament. Better watch out—we’re not gonna go easy on you, either!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_2: You seem pretty strong, so we’ll be comin’ at you with everything we’ve got.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0302_2: Guess I’d better watch out, then.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_3: You’re not making fun of me, are you? ’Cause we’re super strong, too, you know!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_3: Oh no—my painting! It’s gonna get blown away!
Phew! Looks like Granbull caught it just in the nick of time!
I knew I could count on you, boy!
Aw, man... I think the paint got messed up, though. Granbull must have chewed on it a little bit.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0301_3: That means he must like it!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0401_3: Well, I AM pretty proud of it!
You know, I don’t even really mind that it got ruined. It’s enough for me just knowing that Granbull loved it!
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_0402_4: Not necessarily... Granbull must have chomped onto this painting because he really liked it.
And if that’s the case, I don’t really mind that it got ruined.
charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0034_00_matsurika/2301_1201_4: I mean, look how happy Granbull looks!
I bet if you got close to him now, he wouldn’t be afraid anymore, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
He may be a scaredy-cat, but he knows a nice person when he sees one.
I actually think Granbull might really like you!

charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1101_01: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking in town one day...
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_03: Whoa there! Sorry I startled you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_05: Ha ha ha! Voltorb gave you a good shock, didn’t it?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_06: Sorry, kid! It wasn’t on purpose!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_08: You got some backbone, don’t you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_09: Voltorb didn’t scare you? That’s pretty rare!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_10: My Voltorb here got spooked by you and used Self Destruct.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_11: It can be kind of jumpy sometimes. Volatile, even. Maybe I should call it Volat-orb instead!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_12: But on the other hand, that is what makes Voltorb so strong at the same time.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_13: Being afraid is what keeps you alive in survival situations!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_15: Great question! Consider this: Being unafraid means being unalert, right?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0302_16: Are you always nervous, too, then?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_17: Ha ha ha! Of course I am! No less than Voltorb here!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_18: A little moment of relaxation can spell the end on the battlefield!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_19: So, soldiers who stay on their toes  live the longest!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_20: The most important thing is thinking of how to make negatives into positives.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_21: Whoa! What’s going on, Voltorb? I’m feeling  a lot of fighting spirit coming from you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_23: Looks like you sparked Voltorb’s competitiveness!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_25: No! It looks like it just wants to challenge you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_27: But if it wants to battle you, you must be pretty impressive.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_28: My objective at the PML is to battle strong Trainers like you...
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_29: and crank up Voltorb’s potential to 11 so that it can have even greater electric power!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_33: I won’t lose, either! Let’s make this a tingling battle!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_36: Right back at you, kid! Let’s make this an electrifying battle!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_37: Oh no! Your fighting spirit is getting Voltorb too excited!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0302_40: We gotta get out of here!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_01: Lt. Surge, I understand you are a warrior with many battles under your belt, and I respect that. Would you do me the honor of battling you?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_02: Ooh! I like your fighting spirit, buddy! You’re making me feel all tingly!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_03: Sure thing, pal! I’ll show you what being a soldier is all about!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_04: I’ll show you the results of my training then. You better not underestimate a martial artist’s drive to win!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0101_01: Ha! You think you can keep up with my Voltorb?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0101_02: No more need for words... Let’s make this a nice clean fight.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_01: Such a strong will to win... Such determination to not fail! I could feel it from each blow you delivered!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_02: You may appear fearless, but you are in fact cautious and calm as you observe the battle and formulate your strategy. So masterful!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_03: Well, look who’s talking! You were a shock to the system yourself!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_04: While we may seem like we have similar styles, we’re actually completely different! I can’t wait to battle you again sometime!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_05: Whoa, Voltorb! What’s going on? Are you evolving?!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_06: I’m proud of you, soldier! Now we’ll be even more electrifying!

charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1101_0100: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] received a message from Sophocles, asking to meet up in the caves.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_0600: Eeek! Don’t just shout like that all of a sudden, OK? You almost gave me a heart attack!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_0700: S-so anyway...the reason I asked you to meet me here today is because I have a favor to ask.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_0800: You know how I’m not very good at talking to other people, right? Well...I want you to help me overcome that.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1000: Phew! Thank you! So you’ll help me, then?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_1100: What do you need me to do?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_1200: Oh! So you’ll help me, then? Thank you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_1300: So...it’s really dark in here, plus we’re standing far away from each other, so it’s not that hard for me to talk right now.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_1400: But if we get really close, I’ll get nervous and I won’t be able to talk...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_1500: So, if it’s OK with you, I want you to move closer to me little by little...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1700: Oh...OK. That’s weird. I don’t feel nervous. Maybe I’ll be OK around you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1800: I think I want to try getting closer...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_1900: N-nope! Never mind! Bad idea! Eeek...now we’re face-to-face...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_2000: I’m a little uncomfortable like this, so I’m just gonna avert my eyes for a minute, OK? It’s not because I don’t like you. I promise.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_2100: I’m just gonna rush up to you, OK?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_2300: I th-thought I told you little by little! When you’re this close, I just... I can’t... Eeek!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_2400: Unless we get to be as good of friends as me and Togedemaru or Big Mo, being this close is just bad, bad news for me...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2500: The PML is all about team battling, so I want to learn how to be more outgoing, but at this rate, I’ll never be able to overcome my nerves...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2600: If it comes down to it, I guess I’ll just have to rely on the power of science to get me through this!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2700: I actually programmed a new function into my Poryphone, just in case!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2800: I call it the Don’t Avert Your Eyes, You Scaredy-Cat! Mark III.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_2900: Once I turn this little function on... There we go! Now there’s no going back!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3000: If I get nervous and try to look away or retreat—even a little bit—I’ll get an electric shock from the machine! Pretty nifty, huh?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3100: I programmed in an Electrode mode and a Stunfisk mode... Which one do you think I should use?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_3300: Are you familiar with Electrode, the Ball Pokémon? It likes to explode for fun in its spare time. Pretty intense...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_3500: Are you familiar with Stunfisk, the Trap Pokémon? It grins and laughs whenever it shocks others. Ruthless...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3600: Well, let’s give it a whirl! Just a tiny bit...
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_3900: T-Togedemaru! Don’t make loud, sudden noises like that, please! You almost gave me a heart attack!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_4100: Wha—! I told you that I get scared easily by loud noises, didn’t I?!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_4300: W-well, I told you that I get scared easily by loud noises, didn’t I?!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_4500: Wait a sec... I didn’t feel an electric shock.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_4600: Do you think maybe Togedemaru absorbed the electricity from my machine?
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0301_4700: Well, you did seem a bit reckless.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_4800: Y-yeah, I guess you’re right. She must have done it to protect me! Thanks, Togedemaru!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_4900: Maybe she was worried about you.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_5000: Y-yeah, I guess you’re right. She must have done it to protect me! Thanks, Togedemaru!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5100: I can always count on you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5200: I should thank you too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I wasn’t able to overcome my nervousness in the end, but I appreciate your help anyway!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0401_5400: Hey, I just realized something! For the last couple minutes, I haven’t felt nervous at all while talking to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0302_5500: You don’t look too nervous right now.
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_0402_5600: Hey...you’re right! Now that you mention it, I don’t think I’ve felt nervous at all in the last couple minutes while talking to you!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5700: Awesome! Maybe I leveled up a little bit today after all!
charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0036_00_mamane/2301_1201_5800: Maybe soon we’ll be able to have a conversation in the light, too! That would be awesome.

charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] walked into a clearing in the forest, suddenly feeling like [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was being watched.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1101_0200: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] searched around for a moment but couldn’t find the source of the gaze.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0300: I’m not there! Look closer, saplin’!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0400: The plants here may look similar and different at the same time. I’m sure you can tell the differences between them, though.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1101_0500: [Name:PlayerNickname ] looked around once more, as the voice had instructed.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0700: Good job, child! Yeh found my Weepinbell!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_0800: [Name:PlayerNickname ], yer as good as I expected! Yeh got somethin’ other Trainers don’t!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_1000: Sorry, sorry. I didn’t mean to spook yeh.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_1200: Sorry, sorry. I didn’t mean to spook yeh.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_1300: Weepinbell live in the forests and wait for prey.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_1400: An’ that’s because both forests and Weepinbell have their own individual quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_1600: Fer example, the trees in this here spot have thicker trunks than others.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_1800: Fer example, the trees in this here spot have thicker trunks than others.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_1900: That would be because each of these trees is gettin’ plenty of sunlight.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2000: But look at them trees over there.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2100: They grow thin and tall, as if reaching high for more sunlight.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2200: All of us are shaped by our environment. That’s why we develop individual quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2300: That’s the same for the forest, Pokémon, and people alike.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_2500: I like how modest yeh are, saplin’. You humor an old man’s ramblin’s, and I’m grateful for that.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_2800: I’ve been around for a while now, but I’m always dumbstruck by interesting quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_2900: Not all quirks are handed to yeh, though, sprout. Some of ’em yeh gotta take for yerself.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3000: Get out of yer comfort zone. Talk to different people, and think new thoughts.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3100: Pasio’s a great place to do that. At least, that’s what I think.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3200: Weepinbell might evolve soon. Or he might not. That, too, is just one of his quirks.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3300: I wonder which he wants to do.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0401_3500: To find one’s limits and become stronger, eh? That’s certainly one way.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_0402_3700: Acceptin’ oneself as yeh are and seekin’ stability is one answer.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3800: But in the end, it don’t matter much.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_3900: What’s important is to actually think about the answer yeh want and become the person or Pokémon yeh can be satisfied with.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_4000: Yeh continue making decision after decision like that.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2301_1201_4100: And at the end of that road, yeh might see ye’ve grown up to be a unique flower all yer own, an’ there’s nothin’ more beautiful than that.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0100: Ramos! Hi! I just wanted to tell you that I really respect you— from one nature-loving Gym Leader to another!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0200: The way you stand, the way you carry yourself— you radiate the air of a true veteran, while also emanating kindness!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0300: Heh heh heh, yer makin’ me blush, young lady. I’m nothin’ but an old tree tryin’ its darndest to keep bloomin’.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0400: In fact, I admire the verdant youthful energy yeh have!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_1201_0500: Well, how ’bout it? Why don’t we have ourselves a battle?
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0101_0100: Absolutely! How could I say no to that!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0101_0200: I’ll show you that this old growth is still in bloom!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0100: Amazing! You really are good, aren’t you, Ramos?
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0200: Ho ho! Thank yeh, child! You were battlin’ with the power of a blossoming spring flower!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0300: I can tell how strong your friendship with your Pokémon is.
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0400: Weepinbell! What’re yeh... Are yeh about to evolve?!
charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0037_00_fukuji/2311_0501_0500: Well, it looks like that last Pokémon battle was just the fertilizer yeh needed!

charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1101_0100: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was exploring some caves one day, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] ran into Roark.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1101_0200: His eyebrows furrowed in concentration as he gazed deep into the cave...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_0300: I was just trying to imagine how I would have dug out this area if it were me.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_0500: Well, I like drawing up plans and blueprints in my head for digging up caves and things. It’s fun!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_0700: Well, I like drawing up plans and blueprints in my head for digging up caves and things. It’s fun!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_0800: I wonder what the person who built this artificial island was thinking when they dug out these caves.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_0900: If it were me, I think I would have turned these caves into a giant tunnel system that could transport people all over the island.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_1100: Hehe, thanks. But if a tunnel’s gonna be used by that many people, the builders have to make sure it’s completely safe.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_1300: Of course, if a tunnel’s gonna be used by that many people, the builders have to make sure it’s completely safe.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1400: Someday, I’d love to excavate and build something like that! The biggest, greatest tunnel in the whole world!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1500: Imagine how much happiness a tunnel like that could bring to people!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1600: Plus, if I’m excavating that much ground, I’m bound to find all sorts of cool, rare fossils along the way!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1700: Fossil collecting is my life’s work, you know! Digging up enough of them to open my own museum has always been a dream of mine.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1800: Ideally, I’d build a whole underground city and open up the museum there! Sounds like something out of an epic movie, right?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_1900: I’d have tons of ultra-rare fossils on display— ones you can’t find anywhere else! I’m sure it would be fun for visitors...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_2000: but it’s just a silly dream, after all. I’m sure it’ll never happen.  You probably think I’m crazy, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0301_2100: I bet you could do it, Roark!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_2200: You really think so? Thanks...for supporting my dream.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0302_2300: No! I’d love to visit your museum!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_2400: Really? Thanks...for believing in my dream.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_2500: Honestly, I’ve been thinking of giving up on that dream again lately.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_2600: But hearing you say that just now gave me courage. I think I want to keep chasing my dream, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0301_2700: “Again”? You’ve given up  on your dream before?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0401_2800: It was a long time ago, but yes. I had just finished building my first tunnel ever...and the very next day, it collapsed.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_0402_3000: Well, I almost gave it up once, a long time ago. I had just finished building my first tunnel ever...and the very next day, it collapsed.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3100: I was in shock... I’d reviewed my blueprints over and over and built the tunnel to the best  of my ability. I was confident it was safe!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3200: But I failed. The fact that the tunnel collapsed despite how hard I’d worked felt like a sign that maybe digging wasn’t for me after all.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3300: I kept dwelling on those thoughts, and I came really close to giving up...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3400: but then I saw my buddy here smash open a rock that was said to be unbreakable!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3500: Cranidos picked up a rock and body-slammed the supposedly unbreakable rock with it, and it smashed right open!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3600: I had never thought to do that before. That day, Cranidos taught me that there’s never just one way to do things.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3700: It seems like both you and Cranidos taught me another lesson today.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3800: No matter how crazy and outlandish my dream may seem, as long as I never give up, I may think of a way to make it a reality someday!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_3900: I’ll have to learn how to think outside the box and become more resourceful, just like my partner here!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_4000: I’ll still be Roark the Rock! My willpower will still be unbreakable!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2301_1201_4100: I just need to break out of my box and think more unconventionally!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0100: Ah, hello Roark! I came here for fossil excavation, but I’ve been rather unlucky so far...
