charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0200: Yeah, that’s understandable. This site was made just like an authentic dig site, after all! The trick is to not give up and just keep digging.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0300: All of the fossils you can find here had originally been hiding in the earth for tens of thousands of years before they were brought to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0400: Maybe they’re trying not to be found a second time...
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0500: You say that...but it seems like your Cranidos has found a lot of fossils.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0600: Well, he does always dig with me, whether it’s in a mine or a fossil dig site.
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_1201_0700: Thanks to that, he’s gotten pretty tough! How about if we take a little break and have us a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0101_0100: I accept your challenge! I may not have had luck with the fossils, but I won’t need luck in a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0101_0200: All right! You’ll see how strong digging every day has made us!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0200: But such power... Your attacks would probably allow you to pulverize an entire mineshaft on your own!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0300: You guys were really tough! There were a few moments where I thought we might not be able to break through your defense!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0400: Hm? What’s up Cranidos? Wait, was that battle enough to make you evolve?!
charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0038_00_hyouta/2311_0501_0500: Thanks, Roxanne! Cranidos was able to get even stronger, thanks to you!

charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1101_0100_: The streets were bustling with people and Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1101_0200_: Suddenly, a white light flashed  right next to [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_0300_: Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I got a fantastic shot of you!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_0400_: I was here shooting Pokémon that have gathered from all across the country, when I finally saw you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0401_0600_: Of course! I like Pokémon, obviously, but getting the perfect shot of a Trainer’s smiling face is always what makes me the most excited.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0302_0700_: Did you get some good shots of Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_0800_: Yeah, I already got a lot!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_0900_: I don’t want to let even a single Pokémon or Trainer pass by without taking a picture!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1000_: I’ve been taking photos all day today, though.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1100_: I just want to get one more good one of you, and then I think I’ll take a break!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1200_: There it is! Right there! Fantastic! Just fantastic!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1300_: I can see in your face that I caught you by surprise with that one!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1400_: But a surprised face makes for quite a nice photo!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1500_: So many Pokémon and Trainers have come to this town, so everybody has a happy expression on their face.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_1600_: I’ve been so busy, I’ve barely taken my eyes off my camera’s viewfinder!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0401_1800_: It’s absolutely fantastic! Of course it’s fun! Photography is my whole life!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0302_1900_: Did you get any good pictures?
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_2000_: Of course! All the Pokémon look so happy! I almost feel like you can see the bonds they have with their Trainers in the photos.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2100_: When you look at Pokémon through the viewfinder, you realize that each and every one of them is totally unique.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2200_: I mean, there are a lot of other Surskit out there besides my Surskit.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2300_: But not one of them is quite like mine.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2400_: Some are cool, some are a little scary, some space cadets, some mischievous... Each one is different, just like people.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_2500_: That’s why I never get tired of them at all.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0401_2700_: When you take as many pictures as I do, you start to notice the little things.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_0402_2900_: You get it, too. That shows me that you’re really paying attention to the Pokémon around you.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3000_: This cutie has one expression that only I can bring out of her.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3100_: I’m sure your Pokémon has a face that it only ever shows to you, too.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3200_: For some Pokémon, it might only be a really small difference.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3300_: But those loving expressions are proof that your Pokémon trusts you.
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2301_1201_3400_: Isn’t it just fantastic when you notice the small things like that?
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_1201_0100_: Ummm, Viola?  I want you to take on my Beedrill in a battle!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_1201_0200_: Of course! Let’s give it all we’ve got in a showdown between two lovers of Bug-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_1201_0300_: OK! I’ll show you how all my research  here on Pasio has paid off!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0101_0100_: I’ll be carefully observing the power  of your Bug-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0100_: Whoa, your Surskit is amazing! And I thought  my Beedrill had been doing really well...
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0200_: Yes, your Beedrill was really strong, too.  I thought you had me there! Ooh, I know!  Let’s take a photo to remember this by!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0300_: Wait! Your Surskit looks like it’s about to evolve!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0400_: Ooh, Surskit’s going to get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0039_00_viola_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0039_00_viola/2311_0501_0500_: Fantastic! Just fantastic! I can’t let this photo op get away from me!

charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1101_010: While taking a stroll through town, [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Brycen and Cryogonal a short distance away.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1101_020: After a moment, Brycen spotted [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] as well, waving his hand in greeting as he approached.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_030: Hehe, I was just doing a bit of rehearsing for a certain something.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_040: I’ve asked Cryogonal to create some frost in the air for a nice smoky, misty effect...
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_050: Any guesses what I’m up to?
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_070: Precisely! Just because I came to Pasio for Pokémon battling doesn’t mean I’ve abandoned my other interests!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_090: Hahaha, I’m afraid not. I’m an actor, child.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_100: I’m attempting to produce my very own film, from the early stages of planning to the final execution.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_110: The theme of my film is sync strength! The bonds that connect us all.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_120: Bonds that connect Trainer to Trainer, Pokémon to Pokémon! A fiery meeting in the excitement of the PML!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_130: Bonds that grow stronger  in the very heat of battle!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_140: What do you think? A marvelous pitch for a film, is it not?
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_160: Yes! I knew you would agree!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_170: However, capturing the intangible beauty of sync strength—the bond between Trainer and Pokémon—and expressing it...
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_180: through a tangible medium such as film  will be exceedingly difficult.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_210: When it comes to sync strength, others pale  in comparison to you and your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_220: I want to show the world the wonder of my Pokémon—my costar in life.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_230: I intend to explore my theme fully throughout my film.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_240: It will be a series of stories based on the many adventures Cryogonal and I have experienced thus far.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_250: It will be a film of epic proportions— a documentary, but a marvelously entertaining one!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_260: Oh my... I mustn’t get too ahead of myself. Sometimes I get so excited, I can barely contain myself.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0401_280: Thank you for the support, friend. As the star of the film, I promise I won’t let you down!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_300: Hahaha! Every road comes with its own obstacles, child.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_0402_310: The road to success could be nothing but thin ice, and I would still sprint forward, never looking back. That’s my policy.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_320: I believe that Cryogonal shares that sentiment as well.
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_330: Hehe, you do feel the same, don’t you, Cryogonal?
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_340: Come now, my dutiful costar! Let’s get back to that rehearsal!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_350: With stupendous sync strength like ours, I’m sure we’ll be able to produce a complete film in no time!
charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0040_00_hachiku/2301_1201_360: I mean, it would be impossible to make a film about bonds of friendship if you have no bond of your own to speak of, right? But we do!

charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1101_0100: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was hiking, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came upon a Bronzong perched in the middle of the path ahead.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_0200: Hmm. According to my data-analyzing machine, this should be the correct path...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_0400: Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are we in your way?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_0600: Whoa! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Sorry. Are we in your way?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_0700: My Bronzong and I were just analyzing our battle from yesterday.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_0900: After a battle, I like to use my data-analyzing machine to learn everything I can about my opponent’s Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_1100: After a battle, I like to use my data-analyzing machine to learn everything I can about my opponent’s Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1200: There’s a vast number of Trainers here on Pasio right now.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1300: Being able to gather so much diverse data all in one place is incredibly useful.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1400: Or at least it should be...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_1600: Not really... It’s my machine. I keep getting really strange results.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0302_1700: Are your opponents not very good?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_1800: No, they were all really strong! I should have been able to gather some brilliant data from them, but...something’s off.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_1900: I’ve had many battles where my machine refuses to analyze my opponents properly or its calculations are way off.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2000: Perhaps my data-analyzing machine is in need of repair...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0301_2100: Pokémon are more than just data, you know.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_2200: Not just data...? You mean they can’t be fully expressed with just numbers?
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0302_2300: Surprise is what makes a battle.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_2400: You make a good point. Sometimes battles simply can’t be analyzed—it’s impossible to codify and predict everything.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2500: That reminds me—I haven’t been able to express you and your Pokémon in numerical values yet, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2700: I chose to pair up with it because of the protective, metal nature of its body...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2800: but also because it has an air of mystery about it—something that can’t be quantified. It just seemed really interesting.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_2900: It surprised me, in a way, to discover such a huge pool of strength that couldn’t be measured by machine analysis alone.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0401_3100: Precisely! Sometimes the strength of a sync pair—the strength of their bond— can overcome even the strongest opponents!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_0402_3300: Certainly! With enough determination, one can overcome even the strongest opponents!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3500: If I can somehow figure out how to enhance my data-analyzing machine so that it can measure things like trust and determination...
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3600: perhaps I can become even stronger in Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3700: Whoa! Whoa! The lightbulb just went off in my brain!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3800: There’s so much to do but so little time to do it! I’m going to be a very, very busy man!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_3900: I should thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! For giving me the brilliant hint that sparked this whole idea!
charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0041_00_nejiki/2301_1201_4100: First things first! Bronzong and I are going to have to perform some deep self-analysis!

charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] was strolling through town one day, doing some shopping...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_0200_2: when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] turned a corner and suddenly  found [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] nose to nose with Winona!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0301_0400_1: How did you know I’d be here?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_0500_1: A little bird Pokémon told me... I heard tidings on the wind...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_0600_1: I am a bird Pokémon user, after all. News tends to fly fast when one of us is around.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_0800_1: Then it must be fate. Maybe the wind guided us both here...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_0900_1: I had hoped the two of us would meet.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1000_1: I was wondering if you had a moment to...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1400_1: That intense gaze... That aura of determination...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1500_1: They can only mean one thing...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1600_1: That this person wishes to challenge me to a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_1700_1: Well, if a battle is what he wants, then a battle he shall get! We’ll blow him away like a strong gust of wind!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_2000_1: What you mean to say is that maybe he values my skill as a fellow Pokémon Trainer, correct?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_2100_1: If that’s the case, then I really must defeat him. It would be embarrassing to lose to someone who respects me so much!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0302_2200_1: He might not want to battle at all.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_2300_1: But...why would he be emanating such an air of intensity if he didn’t want to challenge me to a battle?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_2400_1: He looks like a tough opponent, in my eyes. Either way, there’s no point in hesitating! I’ll confirm it myself!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_2600_1: What’s the matter? Pelipper doesn’t look like she’s ready to put up a fight at all...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_2700_1: We certainly can’t battle like this. Whatever should I do?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0301_2800_1: Why not ask him what he wants?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_2900_1: I’m almost positive he wishes to challenge me to a battle...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_3100_1: What? I could never be so rude!
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_3200_1: I’ll have to fight him head on with everything I’ve got.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_3300_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] began to feel like the conversation would never end, the way things were going...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1101_3400_2: so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to go talk to the mysterious Trainer [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ].
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3500_1: Interesting... So you’re saying that Trainer over there was just trying to observe me?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3600_1: He was impressed by my skills as a Pokémon Trainer and wanted to discover the secret to my strength?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3700_1: Very interesting indeed. I don’t actually have a secret, but if he wants to learn more about me, I’d be happy to share...
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3800_1: I feel quite happy now, knowing that someone respects me that much as a Trainer. I truly am overjoyed.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_3900_1: Do you feel the same way he does about me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_4100_1: Really? I feel the same about you.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0401_4200_1: You’re the Trainer I feel I have to look out for the most. I can’t afford to let my guard down at all against you.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_4500_1: I suppose I still have much to learn.
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_0402_4600_1: I shall continue to train hard in the hope that one day our Trainer skill levels will be equal, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0042_00_nagi/2301_1201_4700_1: After all, we’re all rivals here at the PML. Let’s give this tournament our utmost effort and leave here without any regrets!

charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along the coast when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] realized [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] could hear a loud voice mixed in with the sound of the waves.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0200_1: What’s wrong, Makuhita? You’re never gonna catch me at that rate!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0300_1: You’re gonna have to show me more if you wanna catch me! Let me see your guts!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_0400_2: Brawly and Makuhita had come up on land  and were glaring at each other.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0500_1: Heh, looks like I’ve finally lit a fire under you.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_0600_1: That’s it! I know you’ve got more guts than that!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_0800_1: Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]? I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_1000_1: Huh? [Name:PlayerNickname ]? I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1100_1: Did you think we were fighting?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1200_1: If you did, you’re wrong. We were training to improve our balance for surfing.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1300_1: Makuhita wanted me to help improve his surfing skills.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1400_1: I was just trying to get him fired up.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_1600_1: Surfing is more than just our hobby. It’s serious training for us.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_1800_1: Surfing is more than just our hobby. It’s serious training for us.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_1900_1: It’s been that way ever since I taught Makuhita how to surf.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2000_1: At first, he couldn’t even stand up on the board.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2100_1: But every time he failed, Makuhita’s toughness wouldn’t let him quit. He never gave up, so he improved quickly.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2200_1: That unwavering fighting spirit that never gives up—no matter what—is what made Makuhita.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2300_1: No, not just Makuhita. It made us both grow.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_2500_1: Of course! Seeing Makuhita’s fighting spirit lit a fire in my heart, too!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0302_2600_1: You guys have worked hard, huh?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_2700_1: Yup! No matter how hard things got, we never threw in the towel.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_2800_1: When Makuhita is working as hard as he does, it gives me strength, too.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_2900_1: Makuhita’s strength is that no matter how hard you hit him, he always gets back up.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3100_1: Huh?! Makuhita?! What are you doing?!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1101_3200_2: Makuhita turned toward Brawly and charged right at him!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3300_1: Hahaha! I guess he was still mad from earlier.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3400_1: Even still, you’ve gotten stronger, haven’t you, Makuhita?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3500_1: You’re like a totally different Pokémon from when we first met!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_3600_1: We have to keep our momentum if we wanna get stronger than [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0401_3800_1: I think you’re the opponent everyone should be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_0402_4000_1: I think you’re the opponent everyone should be afraid of.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4100_1: You have a fighting spirit just like Makuhita’s. You never break, no matter what happens.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4200_1: You’re a tough opponent that we won’t be able to defeat easily, but that makes me excited.
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2301_1201_4400_1: The bigger the wave that’s coming at you, the more a surfer wants to ride it!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0100_1: Ah, Brawly! To think that we would see each other again on Pasio of all places. Shall we pick up our training where we left off?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0200_1: Totes, Bruno! But you’d better not think we’re the same as we were when you saw us last time!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0300_1: Ah, I can see the drive for victory burning in your eyes!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_1201_0400_1: All right, let’s get this started, bro! I’m gonna take you down!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0101_0100_1: You’d better be ready for this big wave, Bruno!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0101_0200_1: A wave is nothing but another wall to break through!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0100_1: Even our overwhelming power was bested...
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0200_1: That was a rad battle, bro! It’s great that we were able to go all-out against each other!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0300_1: I must train more... Brawly, will you lend me your strength?
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0400_1: Aw yeah! We’ll train all over Pasio!
charaepi_ch0043_00_toki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0043_00_toki/2311_0501_0600_1: Bodacious, my dude! Now training’ll be even more awesome!

charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1101_01: [Name:PlayerNickname ] had been called  to a cave by Roxanne.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1101_02: Roxanne said she had something  to discuss with [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_03: My sincerest apologies for summoning you here so suddenly.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_04: The truth is, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I would like to borrow some of your wisdom, if I may.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_07: I had a feeling you would say that.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_08: Can I be of use to you?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_10: You can be an immense help to me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_11: As for why I’ve asked you here, it’s about the Trainers’ School in Rustboro City.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_12: I’ve been given the opportunity to instruct some more junior Trainers.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_13: I’m having trouble thinking of what sort of problems I could give them that would make for an enjoyable, educational experience.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_14: I’m thinking of doing a hands-on lesson.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_15: I thought that escaping a cave such as this one would be a good start, but I haven’t thought of what should come next.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_16: I’ve asked Nosepass for advice,  but she just stays quiet and faces north.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_18: Nosepass is magnetic, so that’s typical behavior.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_20: That could be, but facing north is also typical Nosepass behavior.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_21: Her magnetic nose is always facing north, and she can also control magnetism.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_22: If you lose your way, as long as Nosepass is with you, you’ll know roughly which direction you’re headed.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_23: When you’re on a journey, her behavior can be quite useful!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0301_24: You could use that in a lesson.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_25: If the lesson were on escaping from a cave...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_27: Maybe it could be useful not just when you’re traveling?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_28: When we’re not traveling? Is there some other way Nosepass’s compass could prove useful?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_30: Of course! A lesson on escaping from a cave!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_31: Nosepass’s habit of facing north and her capacity to control magnetism...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_32: Both are perfect for a lesson on how to escape from a cave!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0301_33: I think her facing north is good.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_34: If students use her habit of facing north...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0401_35: I think I could make a maze that requires them to use Nosepass as a compass!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_36: I think her controlling magnetism is good.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_37: If the students use her power  to control magnetism...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0402_38: I could design a maze that makes them use Nosepass to escape from a cave tinged with magnetism!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_40: With such an exciting lesson, I’m sure the students will enjoy it!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_41: I knew consulting you was the right answer!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_0302_44: I’m glad you solved your problem!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_46: Thanks to you, I was able to find the correct answer to my problem.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_47: I was only thinking about what sort of lesson to give some junior Trainers.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_48: Now I realized I’ve learned quite a bit myself!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2301_1201_49: There’s still so much for me to learn from you and Nosepass, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_01: Hmm... Why won’t my Nosepass evolve?
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_02: You gotta chill, Roxanne. Pokémon Evolution is just like working out.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_03: The most important thing is to keep at it! Working out gives you muscles, and as long as you don’t give up, I know Nosepass’ll evolve!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_04: *giggle* That answer is so you, Brawly.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_05: You’re right. We might not be able to see it, but we’re definitely making progress.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_1201_06: I’m sorry, Nosepass. I should have been more relaxed like you. Let’s take this one step at a time.
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0101_01: All right, let’s get this party started!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0101_02: This battle’ll bring us another step closer to Evolution!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_01: Whoa! You two knocked us down like a gnarly wave! I don’t know why you were sweatin’ it. Your bonds are wicked strong!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_02: Why, of course! Nosepass is the best partner I could ever want!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_03: You taught me so much in that battle, Brawly. Thank you very much!
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_04: Hm? What’s wrong, Nosepass? Wait, could it be...
charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/2311_0501_05: It looks like keeping at it really did help you evolve, huh? I’m so happy for you, Nosepass!

charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1101_01: [Name:PlayerNickname ] needed a breath of fresh air away from the bustle of the city, so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to take a stroll in the forest.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1101_02: However, the moment [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] arrived  in a quiet place, a Beedrill suddenly  zoomed out of the trees right toward [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_04: Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Sorry if my Beedrill scared you just now!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_05: I think your shadow actually scared him when you walked up, so he was trying to zoom away.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_06: Either way, he owes you an apology. Beedrill, apologize to [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_07: He didn’t mean any harm—I promise. I hope you’ll forgive him.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_08: Beedrill are known to be a little aggressive at times...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_11: Aw, I was afraid you’d say that...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0302_12: No, I’m not afraid of them!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_14: So many people have a fear of Bug-type Pokémon, you know?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_15: Before Beedrill evolved to look like this, we never really had any issues, but with the way he looks now...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_17: Yeah. Pretty recently, actually... It made me feel really sad.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_19: Thanks. But actually, something happened recently that made me really sad...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_20: It happened in a region I was exploring before I came to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_21: When Beedrill was still just a Weedle, there were these kids that would come and play with him all the time. They loved him.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_22: When he evolved into Kakuna, the kids stopped coming to play. Kakuna don’t move around at all, so maybe they lost interest...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_23: Then he evolved into Beedrill. I thought they’d be excited to play with him again, so I brought him over...but the kids got scared and cried.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_24: He’s still the same Pokémon that he was as a Weedle and a Kakuna—he just looks different. It’s strange how people can forget that.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_26: Yeah, it is sad. But I’m not giving up anytime soon! That’s the whole reason I came here to compete in the PML!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0302_27: We can’t do anything about that.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_28: I disagree! And I don’t plan on giving up anytime soon! That’s the whole reason I came here to compete in the PML!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_29: I want to use the PML to show the world how awesome and powerful Bug-type Pokémon are! I bet they’ll be super popular by the end!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_30: In order to make that happen, Beedrill and I are going to have to defeat a whole lot of other Pokémon! And we will! Just watch!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_32: Yeah! I mean, everybody loves a strong Pokémon, right?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_33: Wait a sec... That doesn’t make sense...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_35: What do you mean? Strong Pokémon are always really popular, aren’t they?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_36: Wait a sec... That doesn’t make sense...
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_37: If Beedrill is already so strong and powerful that people are scared of him, why isn’t he more popular?
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0301_38: It’s not all about being strong.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_39: Y-you think so? Hmm...maybe you’re right.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0302_40: You have to show off some other good qualities, too.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0402_41: Well, Bug-type Pokémon have a ton of good qualities! I should know that better than anyone else.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_42: Take Weedle, for example. It may look cute on the outside, but on the inside, it’s super tough!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_43: Kakuna still has Weedle’s toughness, plus it gets a hard, protective shell on top of that!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_44: Then its appearance really shifts when it evolves into Beedrill and gets super-strong poisonous stingers!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_45: At their core, they’re all the same Pokémon, but the qualities that make them awesome change from Evolution to Evolution!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_46: Kind of mysterious, right? That’s what makes Bug-type Pokémon so interesting to me!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0301_47: You sound like a Bug-type Pokémon Professor!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_0401_48: Hehe, I DO know a lot about Bug-type Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_51: You’re right. I know all there is to know about Bug-type Pokémon, so there are probably things about them that only I can teach others.
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_52: I should really thank you! I don’t know if I would have been able to realize that all on my own!
charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0045_00_tsukushi/2301_1201_54: I think I can start by teaching people that Beedrill only attack with their poisonous stingers if they’re attacked first...

charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1101_010: [Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the village  to do a sprint workout.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1101_020: While there, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] saw somebody unexpected.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_030: Yo! If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Workin’ hard, or hardly workin’?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_070: Ha ha ha! I like your honesty, kid!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_080: You’re going around, seeing the sights on your own, right?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_090: It’s best to see, hear, and experience things for yourself! Especially if it’s somewhere new!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_100: You could get the information from a book that you can read in the safety of your room, sure.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_110: But you wouldn’t experience anything that way. It’s the experience that becomes real knowledge.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_120: You can’t say you’ve studied until you do that.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_140: You look like you don’t exactly believe me.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0302_150: That sounds like a lot of work.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_160: You got that right! It’s always easier said than done.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_170: All right, here’s a special treat. I’ll tell you how I met my Pinsir!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_180: Clean those ears out and listen up!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_190: It happened a while back, when I was searching for Berries in the forest for my research.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_200: I came across a Berry I had never seen before. That’s when this guy showed up in front of me.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_210: I’m guessing he wanted to eat the Berry!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_220: Well, from there, it was a conversation between my fists and his horns.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_230: But here’s the thing. See these horns? They’re hard as anything!  We weren’t getting anywhere!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_240: So we entered a war of attrition.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_250: See, I knew that Pinsir can’t move  as quickly on cold nights.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_260: And just as I planned,  Pinsir finally forfeited to me!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_270: And ever since then, we’ve been best buddies!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_290: Nah, just a day in the life of a guy who can let  himself stay curious.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0302_300: I’m surprised you got out of that OK.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_310: Well, you can’t move forward if you’re afraid, ya know?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_320: I want to test what I know, and I want to know what I don’t already know.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_330: But in order to do so, I have to be physically strong.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_340: So what do you think? You feel like you got stronger already, don’t ya?
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0301_350: Uh, I’m not sure about that.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0401_360: Come on! You’re wasting your life away with that kind of attitude!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_0402_390: Earnest people get strong! They can absorb a lot more that way!
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_400: Whether you can use my story to make yourself stronger is all up to you.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_410: But don’t just think about it, because that’s not enough. You have to experience it yourself, too.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_420: If there’s something you want to do, try it. It doesn’t matter if you’re nervous about it or if you’re crummy at it.
charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0046_00_datsura/2301_1201_430: Being able to do that is the most important quality you can have!

charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1101_0100: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was wandering the town, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] felt like someone was calling [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1101_0200: Looking around, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed Will  and Xatu standing there.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0401_0600: I see that my psychic powers reached you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0302_0700: I felt like somebody was calling me.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_0800: I see that my psychic powers reached you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_0900: I thought this would be a good opportunity for us to get better acquainted with each other. So I set up this meeting so we could chat.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1000: I thought...that I might need your help in order to become stronger.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0401_1200: I thought so, too...but I was wrong.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_1400: That’s right. I sense raw power sleeping inside of you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1500: I trained vigorously in order to become a member of the Elite Four. And at long last, I was able to become one.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1600: I was confident that nobody but the Champion could defeat me.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1700: But one day, a random Trainer was able to defeat me easily.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1800: I was much weaker than I had thought.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_1900: That is why I want to find new power at the PML.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2000: I want to defeat that Trainer with that power!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2100: I shall show you how I am training to do so. Look into Xatu’s eyes.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2200: It is said that Xatu is gazing at both the past and the future.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_2300: By looking into her eyes, you can feel like you’re able to predict what will happen in battle!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_2800: I appreciate you taking me seriously, but please don’t lie.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_0402_2900: I wonder why it’s not working.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3000: Well, this is a predicament. I thought you’d be able to feel something, but...
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3400: Did you feel it, too? Like the cheers and  excitement of thousands of people!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_3900: A vision of us facing each other at the PML. At least that is how I interpreted it.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4000: As I thought, I need you.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4100: As two Trainers who were gifted  with a vision from Xatu...
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4200: let’s keep moving forward toward that future!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4300: Hm? No, you shouldn’t stare into her eyes too long!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4400: You might accidentally see the result of our battle.
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4500: That would take the fun out of it, wouldn’t it?
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4600: We may be able to forecast the future, but it is up to us to be able to pave the way to it!
charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0047_00_itsuki/2301_1201_4700: I’m looking forward to our future!

charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1101_0100_2: Finding [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] incredibly lost on the road one day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to take a gamble and enter a nearby cave.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1101_0200_2: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] hoped it would be a through path—a nice shortcut to lead [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] back to where [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] wanted to go...
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_0600_1: I thought so. You must be lost.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_0800_1: It’s not very nice to lie, you know. Either way, you don’t fool me.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_0900_1: It isn’t difficult, by the way... I simply memorized the sound of your footsteps—nothing more.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1100_1: that last round shouldn’t count, Liepard.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_1300_1: Didn’t know she was there, did you? Though I wouldn’t really expect you to.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_1500_1: Oh, just a game my Pokémon and I like to play. We find the competition entertaining.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1600_1: I don’t know if you know this, but a Liepard can conceal its presence, allowing it to stealthily sneak up on its targets.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1700_1: So our little game consists of me closing my eyes and attempting to guess Liepard’s location.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1800_1: Looks like Liepard is pretty keen on our little game as well.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1900_1: Though originally, it was merely an exercise to bolster my competitive instincts.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_2100_1: You might say that, yes. We’ve been doing it for a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_2300_1: As someone who lives and breathes competition like I do, you know games are never just fun. We take them seriously. We play to win.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2400_1: My past isn’t all sunshine and daisies, kid. Back when I lived at the family estate, I had to learn how to read people...
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2500_1: Adults can be tricky, see. I was in a situation where I had to suss out who was being straight with me and who was trying to use me.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2600_1: Eventually, I discovered how to do that. It’s all about goals and intentions— figuring out what people want the most.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2700_1: That’s what drives people to do what they do. Figure that out, and you’ll see through any lie or bluff... That, kid, is how you win a game.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2800_1: Judging by the question you asked me a moment ago, I’m pretty sure I could guess what sort of victory you crave the most.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_3000_1: You’re an honest kid. I can’t fault you for that.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_3100_1: And you know what? Sometimes it’s the most honest, purehearted of us that end up becoming the strongest of all.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0302_3200_1: Come on... You couldn’t possibly know that.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_3300_1: Don’t believe me? Well then, I guess you’ll just have to wait until we battle to find out if I’m telling the truth or not.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_3400_1: Don’t expect me to reveal my hand until we do, though.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_3500_1: Heh heh... I think Liepard wants to test you now.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_3600_1: Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], close your eyes... Tell me, where do you think Liepard is right now?
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4100_1: Uh oh... Sounds like Liepard’s a little cranky.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4200_1: She must be sulking. She probably thought she could sneak up on you, but instead you found her right away.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4300_1: You’re a tenacious one, aren’t you, kid? That might come in handy for you soon.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4400_1: Finding your way through to the other side of this mountain’s a bit of a gamble. There’s a fork in the path up ahead that goes left or right.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4500_1: Heh heh... You’ve got the makings of a real competitor in you, kid. And, well...no risk, no gain, right?
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4600_1: Indulge Uncle Grimsley in a game of chance... Tell me. Which path will you choose?

charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] entered the forest, feeling as if something was drawing [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] in.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1101_0200_2: Proceeding farther, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Phoebe  alone in a clearing looking around.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0402_0800_1: Huh? Wait, can’t you see her?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1200_1: Wait, can you not see Dusclops?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1300_1: Well, let’s find out! Try to figure out where Dusclops is!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1800_1: Come on out, Dusclops! Say hi!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1900_1: Well, now that [Name:PlayerNickname ] is here, let’s put the game on hold.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2000_1: Dusclops was on a roll, so I guess I lose this time.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2100_1: Oh, but we should count how many she actually found! I might still have a chance!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2600_1: Wait a minute. Do you not...?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2700_1: Ahaha! I get it now! You thought I was playing hide-and-seek with Dusclops!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2800_1: No, we’re both always “it.” We do the seeking!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2900_1: The ones hiding are the spirits  wandering around the forest!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0401_3100_1: Dusclops absorbs wandering spirits into her empty body.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0402_3300_1: Dusclops absorbs wandering spirits into her empty body.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3400_1: ...I don’t know what happens to them when she absorbs them, though...
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3500_1: OK, let’s see. Dusclops found one...two...three...
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3700_1: I guess you really can’t see them, can you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3800_1: You’re depending on your eyes too much.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3900_1: Try to see with your heart. Feel them there.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4000_1: If you do that, you’ll be able to see things that you weren’t able to before.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4100_1: For example, I can’t see the sync strength that Dusclops and I share.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4200_1: But if I close my eyes like this, I can feel it.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4300_1: Just don’t think about it too hard!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4400_1: Even if it’s something you can’t logically understand, you can have an emotional connection with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4500_1: I’m sure you can feel that sync strength  with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4600_1: If you can do that, maybe you’ll be able to see the spirits, also!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0100_1: Our battles are going to get even tougher, and we have to get stronger if we want to be able to stand a chance.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0200_1: Acerola’s still young, so we gotta have her back.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0300_1: Exactly. But you’re still young yourself. Are you sure you’re experienced enough to be looking after others?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0400_1: You bet! You wanna try me? *giggle*
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0101_0100_1: You sure know how to talk a big game, child. Can you back that up?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0101_0200_1: Ahahaha! See for yourself! Come on, Dusclops! Let’s show her what we’re made of!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0100_1: Ho ho! It looks like you have the skill to back up your boastful words!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0200_1: You know it! But I think I got even better thanks to battling you!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0300_1: Keep this up in the PML matches, too, Phoebe!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0400_1: Wha... Dusclops?! Are you about to evolve?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0500_1: Ahahaha! I can’t wait to battle with you in your new evolved form!

charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard that Maylene was training up in the mountains, so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to go and check it out [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ].
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1101_0200: Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Maylene and her Meditite in focused meditation.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_0600: Aw, shucks! I’m not supposed to talk while I’m meditating...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_0700: I guess this is proof I haven’t perfected it yet. If I can hear voices, it means I’m not concentrating hard enough.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_0900: Mm... Do you have to stare at me like that? You’re ruining my concentration.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_1000: *sigh* I suppose me getting flustered means I’m not concentrating enough in the first place.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1200: Sorry if that came across as rude! I should be embarrassed, seeing as how you hiked all the way up here to see me...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1400: I don’t really have anything I can serve you up here, unfortunately, but feel free to make yourself at home.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1500: Oh, wait! This might be a good opportunity for us to train together! What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1600: I was planning on trying out the training regimen that Meditite always follows, starting today.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1700: She has one meal per day—one Berry. She sleeps for one hour total and spends about 15 hours in meditation...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1800: It sounds pretty tough, but I think it will be great experience for us in the end!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2000: It’s fine! I’ve got a lot of self-discipline.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2100: I’m used to sticking to a strict diet. I’ve been following a pretty tough training regimen for a while now.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2200: So yes! I’ll be totally fine...I think.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2400: It’s fine! I’ve got a lot of self-discipline.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2500: If I hyper-focus on my training, maybe I won’t think about my lack of sleep!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2600: So yes! I’ll be totally fine...I think.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_2700: Huh? Oh, sorry, Meditite! You’re getting impatient to start your training, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_3000: Aw... I think Meditite might be worried about me following her training regimen.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_3100: To tell you the truth, I wasn’t really sure if I could do it to begin with...

charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_3400: She must be worried about me following her training regimen...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3500: You know, maybe I was getting a little ahead of myself.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3600: I got a little absorbed in the idea of growing stronger with my Meditite.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3700: What do you think I should do now?

charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4200: I shouldn’t overdo it—I should just start with what I know, then slowly work my way up to more challenging training.

charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4400: Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I think I learned an important lesson today!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4500: I’m going to start my new training regimen with something more reasonable, like climbing up cliffs and things!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_4700: Uh... Isn’t that something people can’t usually do?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_4900: Uh... Isn’t that something people can’t usually do?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_5000: It’s fine! If I build up my leg muscles, I’ll be able to keep going after battle without getting tired!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_5100: [Name:PlayerNickname ], want to go climbing with me? I bet it’ll be really fun!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0100: Wow, Maylene! Your Meditite looks like she’s even more focused than usual!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0200: Yeah, we feel like we need to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0300: I can totally get that. Hey! Why don’t we have a Pokémon battle! We should get stronger if we practice!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0400: Yeah! That sounds like a great idea!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0101_0100: All right! We’ll make this battle hot enough to melt glaciers! Let’s show them how focused we are, Abomasnow!

charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0200: Heh heh... It looks like our training paid off, Meditite!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0400: *gasp* She looks like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0500: I’m so happy for you, Meditite! Let’s keep on doing our best!

charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0100: Did I do something to make you angry, Lycanroc?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0200: If I gave a bad command, I’m sorry...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1101_0300: [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived in the village and looked for the source of the voice.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1101_0400: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] noticed a Lycanroc turning its back  to Olivia as Olivia apologized to it.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_0600: Well, you saw a bit of an embarrassing scene, didn’t you?

charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_0800: We finished battling a Trainer, and now Lycanroc doesn’t want to look at me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_1000: We finished battling a Trainer, and now Lycanroc doesn’t want to look at me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1100: I don’t have a clue... Did I do something bad?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_1300: No. And Lycanroc is my best partner...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_1500: It is. Lycanroc is my best partner...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1600: I always make sure he’s in tip-top shape so he can battle whenever, and I make sure to give careful instructions during battle.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1700: I go to sleep holding him tight every night, just like I would with a Stufful plushy.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_1800: I thought I treated him well, so I don’t know what could have brought this on.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2000: That’s not that weird, is it?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2100: I like cute things just like anybody else!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_2300: I treat him like my own child!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_2400: He’s my pride and joy and can do no wrong!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_2500: But to be honest, I think he’s just as cute when he’s ignoring me like this, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_2600: Of course, I wouldn’t like it if he continued to ignore me.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0301_2700: You’re paying too much attention to him.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0401_2800: Huh? But we’ve always been together, and we will be from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0302_2900: He might want some alone time.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_0402_3000: Huh? But we’ve always been together, and we will be from now on, too.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3400: Maybe he needs his alone time because we’ve spent so much time together.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3500: Maybe that’s what Lycanoc’s been thinking.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3600: Especially since we’ve been a sync pair here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3700: Lycanroc usually attacks strong opponents, throwing caution to the wind.  Isn’t that adorable?
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3800: But because he’s like that, maybe he hasn’t liked the cautious instructions I’ve been giving.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_3900: It’s true that caring for each other is important in any trusting relationship, but...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4000: maybe I should have trusted him more, even if doing so can be a bit reckless.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4100: That, in and of itself, might be another form of trust, after all.
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4200: It looks like you’re in a better mood!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4300: Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You taught me that there is more than one way for us to trust one another!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4400: Trust between friends, partners, rivals, family...
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4500: People and Pokémon are really interesting, aren’t they? This is why I can never get enough of this!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4600: Lycanroc, let’s use our time on Pasio to build the perfect relationship to make us even stronger!
charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0051_00_litchi/2301_1201_4700: I trust you with my life. You’re my precious partner, after all!

charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1101_0100: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking down the beach, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted what looked like Marlon and his Carracosta off in the distance.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1101_0200: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] moved toward them to say hi, but when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] got closer, they were nowhere to be found...
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_0300: Wooo! The ocean’s so big ’n’ bluuue!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1101_0400: Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard the booming voice of Marlon as he and his Carracosta leaped out of the water with a splash!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_0600: Yo, Pasio’s beaches are seriously outta this world, dude!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_0700: We’ve been swimmin’ out here since the crack o’ dawn!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0301_0800: You must really like to swim.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_0900: Totally, dude! I’ve been swimmin’ since before I could walk!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_1100: Ha ha ha! Man, I’ve literally spent ALL DAY in the water before. Wicked, right?!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1200: Me ’n’ Carracosta feel more at home in the water than we do on land!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1300: We actually swam here to Pasio all the way from the Unova region, dude!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_1500: Yeah, man! Me ’n’ Carracosta decided to go for a long-distance swim off an island we were stayin’ at.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_1700: Yeah, man! Me ’n’ Carracosta decided to go for a long-distance swim off an island we were stayin’ at.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1800: Then, all of a sudden, this weird circle appeared outta nowhere, right in front of our eyes!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_1900: It looked pretty rad, so we just dove right in. I mean, how could we NOT?
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2000: Anyway, we kept swimmin’ and swimmin’... and eventually we ended up here on this island! Crazy, right?!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_2200: Ha ha ha! Nah, dude!  I was too stoked to see what was  on the other side to be scared!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_2400: Yeah, dude! We’re both fine... Actually, MORE than fine! I’m stoked we made it all the way here.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2500: That reminds me—this one time back in the day, I was feelin’ totally wiped out after a Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2600: Carracosta was all outta whack, too, so we decided to bail out on a trip we were plannin’ on takin’ with a friend.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2700: When our friend got back from the trip, he told us about all the fun stuff we missed out on...
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2800: I realized in hindsight that I shoulda gone on that trip anyway, even if I was tired.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_2900: Ever since that day, I’ve been tellin’ myself to dive headfirst into anything that seems fun.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3000: But to do that, I gotta max out my upper body strength, so I’ve been out here swimmin’ every day!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3100: I swim till my arms feel like they’re gonna fall off!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3200: But if doin’ that means I get to go all out ’n’ have fun all over the world, that’s fine with me!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3300: You feel the same way, don’t you, dude?
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3400: You got those thrill-seeker vibes! I can tell you go all out to have a good time!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0401_3600: Dude, I knew it! I knew there was a reason we get along!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_0402_3800: What do you mean, you guess so?! Aren’t you havin’ wicked fun out here every day gettin’ ready for the PML?
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_3900: Yo, maybe I’m seein’ things, but your Pokémon looks totally happy to me! That’s proof enough, dude.
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4000: Man, I’m stoked to see where you go from here! You got some serious talent, dude!
