charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4100: If you ever get serious, you might even beat me! There’s no way I’m gonna let that happen, though!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4200: Ha ha ha! Aw, man! I can’t wait for that battle!
charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0052_00_shizui/2301_1201_4300: It’s one more wave we can look forward to shreddin’ one day, Carracosta!

charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard Grant and his Amaura were heading up to the mountains, so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to head that way as well.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1101_0200: Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] spotted the pair of them gazing up at some tall cliffs.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0300: Well now... Look who we have here. What brings you up here to the mountains today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0301_0400: I was actually looking for you.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_0500: Oh? Did you follow me up here?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0302_0600: I was curious what you were doing.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_0700: Oh? Did you follow me up here?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0800: Well, sorry to disappoint you, but we just came to scope out the area today in preparation for the real climb.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_0900: We’re practicing so that one day, Amaura and I can conquer this mountain together.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_1100: Of course it is! That’s why we make sure we take every safety precaution possible.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_1200: Don’t worry—we’ll still be extremely cautious. After all, mountain climbing is never 100 percent safe, no matter how well prepared you are.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1400: Thank you! I’d love to ask you to join us on the climb...
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1500: but it can actually be quite dangerous.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_1600: It’s important to be vigilant, no matter how many safety precautions you’ve taken.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1700: I came to compete in the PML in order to reach greater heights as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1800: But that’s not the only reason I decided to come here to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_1900: This is an artificial island... That means someone had to create all of this beautiful, majestic nature.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2000: I knew that climbing the mountains here would be unlike anything I’ve ever done before!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2100: Ahh, I’m getting excited just thinking about it... I can’t wait to start climbing.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0301_2200: Is there something at the very top?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0302_2400: Do you get a prize for doing it?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_2600: Just a wide, open view of the landscape below.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_2800: Well, when I see a wall in front of me, I’ve just got to climb it.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_3000: Well, what if I told you it’s a lot of fun for me?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3100: Pokémon battling and rock-climbing are really different, but they have a lot in common, too.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3200: They can both feel like a wall in front of you. You just have to climb over that wall and keep aiming higher and higher.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3300: Wouldn’t you agree? I feel like the whole process is really important.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_3500: When it comes to Pokémon battling, you and I are a lot alike.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0401_3600: The look of enjoyment on our faces is as plain as day, even when we’re up against a tough opponent.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_0402_3800: Really? But I thought you were like me when it comes to tackling challenges...pushing yourself hard, past your limits, sometimes.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_3900: Oh! Did you hear Amaura make that sound just now? Maybe we’ll get to see it tonight.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4000: Legends say that the cry of an Amaura is a sign that an aurora will appear in the sky.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4100: I’ve never actually seen one myself, though.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4200: Wouldn’t it be amazing if Amaura and I climbed to the top of this treacherous mountain to witness that beautiful aurora together?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4300: Knowing there may be a special reward like that at the top makes me want to go for it even more!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4500: I don’t know if he understands me or not... I think whether we decide to go up will depend on how Amaura feels.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4700: Rock-climbing is my own challenge to myself, but Pokémon battling can be something we strive to conquer together.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4800: Overcoming a tough battle is like climbing a giant wall—there’s beauty on the other side that you won’t find anywhere else...
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2301_1201_4900: That’s how I like to look at it, anyway.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_1201_0100: As a Pokémon Trainer, I’ve always wondered what a serious battle with you would be like, Grant.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_1201_0200: What a coincidence. I’ve often wondered the same about you. If you’re half as strong as your cooking is delicious, then it should be an amazing battle!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_1201_0300: As a chef, I have a duty to make sure all who come to me leave satisfied. I shall face you with everything I have!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0101_0100: And if you win, I will treat you to one of my special-made desserts!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0100: That was a fantastic battle! Very well. I promised you a dessert, didn’t I? Please, come with me.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0200: All right! I can’t wait! Hm? Are you looking forward for dessert, too, Amaura?
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0300: No, I don’t think that’s the case. I think he’s about to evolve! Talk about the spice of life!
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0400: It looks like you overcame another wall.
charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0053_00_zakuro/2311_0501_0500: You’re the best, partner! Let’s aim for even higher summits!

charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the cave  where Koga had asked [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] to meet him.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0200_20: However, Koga was nowhere to be seen.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_0400_10: You will never find me if you depend only on your eyes!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_0500_10: Sharpen your senses!  Find me with more than just your vision!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0600_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] closed [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] eyes to try to sense Koga in the darkness.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_0800_10: Well, well! Good senses you have there!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1100_10: To think that you could see past my ninja techniques so well!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1200_10: But! Not good enough! Wouldn’t you say, partner?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1300_10: I’m just saying that you let down your guard! You became careless just because you found me!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1400_10: What you see is not everything there is. Being able to see what is not visible is most crucial!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1500_10: Read what your opponent is thinking and decipher their strategies to claim the flow of battle as your own!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1600_10: And you will need an unwavering  willpower in order to do this!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1700_10: My dojo has been training for 400 years  how to be calm at all times!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1800_10: The reason I called you out here today was to teach you the secrets of being a ninja.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2100_10: You really don’t emote much, do you?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2200_10: But I’m sure you’re surprised nonetheless, right?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_2400_10: Well, I see that you have your emotions under control. That is good.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0402_2600_10: I knew it! You worried me a little bit!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2700_10: But prepare yourself. We have only just begun.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2800_10: I would recommend you don’t take Crobat’s techniques or speed lightly!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2900_10: Fwahaha! I see Crobat’s Double Team is causing you trouble!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3000_10: You must be quite surprised! I see it in your face!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3100_10: We’re only able to pull off combination moves like this because of how in sync we are.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3200_10: We can do this without any planning—with only shared experience and eye contact!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3300_10: You should understand how difficult synchronicity like that can be. But if you can achieve it, it will prove a great power for you and your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_3500_10: Of course! I know you can!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0302_3600_10: Do you think we can do it, too?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0402_3700_10: Of course! I know you can!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3800_10: But all this is why you must never let your guard down, especially since you and your Pokémon have such a strong bond.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3900_10: You cannot cut corners at the PML. Or rather, there are not many Trainers here that you can win against by cutting corners.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_4000_10: I’m looking forward to seeing if your bond can overcome ours!

charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1101_0100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] had heard talk of a man in gleaming armor spotted in the village, so [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to make [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way there.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1101_0200_: Fortunately, the polished sheen  of steel is easy to spot.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_0400_: Do not fear! I, Wikstrom, have taken it upon myself to protect this village!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_0600_: Indeed. Defending the townspeople is the duty of a knight such as I.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_0800_: Why, I have volunteered my time to guard it! Your security is in capable hands, I assure you.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_0900_: I hear tell that some ruffians have been skulking about, taking advantage of the PML’s bustling crowds to commit their evil deeds.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1100_: This village looks very much like the place mine own family hails from.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1200_: I believe Aegislash has taken notice of that as well and so has kindly agreed to assist me in guarding it.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1300_: Such bravery! Such valor! This is why my family has chosen to fight alongside a line of noble Aegislash through the generations!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_1500_: Indeed. My family has an exceedingly long history in the Kalos region.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_1700_: Indeed. My family has an exceedingly long history in the Kalos region.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1800_: We have battled in contests and tourneys across the land for generations, with Aegislash fighting tirelessly by our side.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_1900_: It is with regret that I must admit we were not always victorious. Eras of toil and hardship have been recorded in our histories as well.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2000_: Nevertheless, the Aegislash have been our faithful companions for all these years.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2100_: As a descendant of such a venerable family, I feel it is my duty to continue that tradition and carve my own name into history as well.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2200_: And what, pray tell, could be a more splendid stage for me to do so on than the PML, where I can battle against the world’s strongest Trainers?
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_2400_: Thank you, child! You shall witness the glory of my esteemed family soon enough! I shall make it so!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_2600_: Oho! What bold words you speak, child! You will be a formidable opponent, surely! I eagerly await the day we cross swords!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2700_: But alas! ’Twould be a grave mistake to seek out victory and victory alone.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2800_: Winning is of great import, of course, but embracing the path of chivalry and fighting with honor is of the utmost importance.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_2900_: Not even in the face of the direst circumstances would my family relinquish its pride.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3000_: Even in defeat, we respect those who have bested us. Both sides can smile and praise the other for a battle fought bravely.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3100_: For one must exhibit knightly behavior, both in victory and in defeat! One must be just, honorable, and fair!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3200_: If nothing else, I hope that you will remember these words, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='lady' ].
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_3400_: Protect what you believe in, have faith in yourself, and stay true to the promises you make.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_3600_: Indeed. The weight of one’s shield can seem heavy when compared to a blade, but there  is beauty found only in protecting something.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3700_: For you see, when you break a promise, whether to yourself or to another, even the greatest triumph grows sour.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3800_: Mine own principles and promises— the pride and honor of my esteemed family— are forever intertwined with Aegislash.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_3900_: When you started your journey, I am certain you felt something similar stir within your heart. Have faith and stay true to yourself.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4000_: When you do, ’twill mean you have at last found the true path of a knight—of honor.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0401_4200_: Oh, mine heart doth swell at such a courageous answer!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0302_4300_: I’ll do the best I can.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_0402_4400_: Indeed, you shall! But you need not be hasty, child. Lumiose City was not built in a day!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4500_: What was that, Aegislash? You are growing weary of my long-winded speech?
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4600_: Alas! The will to battle beats so strongly in Aegislash’s heart, he can scarcely sit still.
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4700_: The brazen, bladed buffoon! Ha ha ha!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4800_: I must apologize if I have prattled on too long... ’Tis important to enjoy a good Pokémon battle now and again as well!
charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0055_00_gampi/2301_1201_4900_: Ha ha ha! Oh, my dear Aegislash! Let us go now. We shall enjoy this merry festival of the PML with honor and grace!

charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1101_: While out shopping, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a certain Trainer.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: My precious Drifloon blew away in the wind! I only took my eyes off him for a second!
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1101_: [Name:PlayerNickname ], seeing the Trainer in trouble, offered to help find the Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_: Thank you so much for helping me! I couldn’t have found him without you!
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0402_: Yeah, and I couldn’t have done it without you!
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: Thank you for looking after him.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_: Nah, I didn’t do anything special.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: I just saw a Pokémon wandering alone.
And you two came by when Persian and I tried to approach the Drifloon.
I mean, Pasio doesn’t have  any wild Pokémon at all.
My Persian can’t leave lonely Pokémon alone.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_: She, actually. I suppose so. She’s been like this since we were in Alola.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0402_: She, actually. I suppose so. She’s been like this since we were in Alola.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: And there’s not a lot that happens in Alola.
There were a lot of Pokémon that got separated from their Trainers and were having a hard time adjusting to the new environment.
She picked those Pokémon up  and took care of them.
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0301_: You’re pretty nice, too, huh, Nanu?
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0302_: So you’re watching over them, too?
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: But if you think Persian is protective, well, I guess she might be.
You’re also the kind of Trainer who  can’t leave a person or Pokémon  in trouble alone, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0401_: It might be weird for me to say this, being the one who brought it up...
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_0402_: It might be weird for me to say this, being the one who brought it up...
charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/2301_1201_: but it’s as clear as day that you are, so it  doesn’t even really matter what you answer.
I just think that watching a Trainer like you would keep me entertained.

charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1101_0100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ] stopped in town during [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] travels for a little rest and relaxation.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1101_0200_: Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard laughter  coming from close by.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_0400_: Who would have thought I would find Rage Candy Bars on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_0500_: Ah, it’s been too long since I tasted this! No need to be polite! Have some yourself!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1100_: These are Rage Candy Bars! They are my favorite!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1200_: I lost myself in the excitement of being able to eat these...
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1300_: I’m embarrassed you had to see that.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0302_1600_: I must admit I was surprised.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_1700_: Yes... I know it is vastly different  from how I normally act.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_1900_: But that’s behind us now. I welcome you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2000_: Have some Rage Candy Bars. Relax with us.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2100_: Machamp looks happy to see you as well.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_2300_: If you have no urgent matters to attend to, rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_2400_: A moment of respite will do wonders for you.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_2600_: Yes, I come to this village often to relax.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_2700_: I come here often with Machamp.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2800_: You train hard when you train, and you rest hard when you rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_2900_: That is the secret to training with longevity!
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3000_: You’re a Trainer, so you know  how important it is to rest.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_3400_: You must rest if you want to become stronger. That’s all I wanted to say.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_3500_: It might seem roundabout, but resting is an important part of training.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3600_: I believe that training is something you do to elevate yourself and not to challenge yourself.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3700_: If you continue training without rest,  you may indeed become stronger  but your spirit will suffer for it.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3800_: That kind of strength... That is not what Machamp and I yearn for.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_3900_: You must hone your spirit along with your muscles to gain true strength.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0401_4100_: Machamp and I train the same way, and we rest the same way.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_0402_4300_: Machamp and I train the same way, and we rest the same way.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4400_: We can understand each other  because we both go through  the same pleasures and the same hardships.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4500_: We want to become stronger not only for ourselves but for each other as well.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4600_: That is what drives us to become stronger than we have ever been.
charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0057_00_shiba/2301_1201_4800_: And that path goes on forever. We will continue training our minds and bodies like this.

charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] found a golf ball  at the base of a tree.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1101_0200: After picking it up, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed that  there was a name written on it...
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0400: You went out of your way to return this to me? Thank you.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0500: There aren’t any places I can practice a full game of golf on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0600: But I go to the forest so that  I can at least practice my swing.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0700: Toucannon often goes out with a golf ball in his mouth, so I guess we lost this one when we were in the forest last time.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_0800: I practice my swing six hours every day. It has become a fundamental routine for me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1000: Yes, of course! I train with my Pokémon as much as I practice golf.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_1100: Wow, you must be really busy.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_1200: I suppose I am pretty busy, but training  my Pokémon is always a priority.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_1300: I have to juggle both since  I promised myself that I would.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1500: I make sure to go to sleep  at the same time every day.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_1600: No matter what, I always take care of my body so I can keep up with my training regimen.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_1700: Don’t wear yourself out too much.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_1900: But I make sure that I am in peak physical condition, so no need to worry.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2000: Besides, I have Toucannon by my side.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2100: Toucannon’s beak is nice and warm, so I sleep  very comfortably when I snuggle up to him.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2200: It’s so cozy next to his beak,  and touching it helps me fall asleep.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2300: See? If you get close like this...
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2400: Hmmm... He doesn’t seem to be in a mood to humor me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_2500: Is this because of what happened yesterday?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_2700: Well, yesterday a Trainer asked us to battle  with them after our daily golf practice.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_2900: Well, yesterday a Trainer asked us to battle  with them after our daily golf practice.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3000: There were many onlookers who wanted to challenge me, one after another.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3100: In the end, we had 20 Pokémon  battles back-to-back.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3200: We were exhausted by the end of the day, and I just collapsed next to Toucannon.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3300: I meant to snuggle close to his beak,  but I ended up sticking my head into it  and falling asleep there.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3400: Toucannon stayed in that awkward position  all night and waited for me to wake up.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3500: I’m sure the poor thing was trying  hard not to wake me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3600: By morning, his beak was trembling  from the strain.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3700: Do you think my head was heavy?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3800: Ow, ow! Toucannon! Stop! Stop pecking! Your beak is so hot! What does this rhythm mean... Are you angry?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_3900: My Toucannon is usually shy, but he becomes very stern when he’s angry.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4000: I guess this is just him showing how much he cares. I’m sorry, Toucannon. I’ll make sure to not let myself doze off like that again.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0301_4100: How can you work so hard like that?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_4200: I suppose it’s because it’s something I enjoy.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0302_4300: Don’t you ever just take a break?
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_4400: That’s a good question... That thought hasn’t really crossed my mind.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4500: I was fortunate enough to find  two things that I love.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4600: And those are Toucannon and golf.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_4700: It would be wrong for me to say that either of those is a burden to me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0401_4900: You don’t need to worry about that with me!
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_0402_5100: You don’t need to worry about that with me!
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5200: If I go so far that I might really hurt myself, Toucannon will be there to peck some sense  back into me.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5300: He is the perfect partner when it comes to golf, Pokémon battles, and even everyday life.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5400: If I overwork myself and collapse,  it would cause a lot of trouble for Toucannon.
charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0058_00_kahiri/2301_1201_5500: And that is something I want to avoid  more than anything.

charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1101_010: [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a Ponyta racing up toward the volcano and decided to chase it.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1101_020: At the end of the chase, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found  Blaine deep in thought.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_090: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t hear you coming!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_100: I was just trying to think up a quiz using Ponyta as the subject.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_110: I can’t come up with a single idea!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_120: I haven’t been able to come up with anything good lately. I might be in a slump.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0301_130: Show me what you have so far!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_160: It’s the worst it’s been for me since I started thinking up these quizzes!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_170: But now let me think. Ah, yes—let’s try this one out.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_180: Bam! A question! We all know that Pasio is an artificial island...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_190: But there is, in fact, a Pokémon that  only exists on this island! True or false?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_250: I feel like I can do better than that, though.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_260: That wasn’t much of a quiz...  More like testing general knowledge.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_280: I have to think of more fun questions, or else I won’t even be able to focus on Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0301_290: I don’t think those are related...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0401_300: You don’t get it, do you?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_320: Exactly! I have to get out of this slump quickly!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_330: Life is one big question! It’s a cycle of asking yourself questions and figuring out answers!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_340: Every mystery you solve is one more step you take in your growth!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_350: The same can be said for Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_360: No matter what walls you run into, you become stronger every time you overcome one!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_370: As long as I live, I will continue thinking up quiz questions and having Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_380: That is my way of life as the hotheaded quiz master!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_460: I actually thought of something  when I was shouting my manifesto...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_470: But the impact of my revelation made me forget it again!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_480: It was going to be my swan song! My masterpiece!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_490: Ponyta! Kick me in the head!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_500: Maybe I’ll recall it if I get  kicked in the head really hard!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0401_520: What’s wrong, Ponyta? You’re saying that my head is more important than quizzes?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0302_530: This might not be a good idea...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_0402_540: What’s wrong, Ponyta? You’re saying that my head is more important than quizzes?!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_550: Don’t worry about it! My head may seem defenseless, but it’s plenty trained!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_560: Fine... It’s a waste, but I suppose I’ll forget about that quiz.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_580: One day, I will think of a quiz that everybody can enjoy!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2301_1201_590: I will make quizzes the next craze on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_010: ...You’re Blaine, aren’t you? I hear you’re pretty famous in Kanto...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_020: Indeed I am! You need something from me? Are you interested in my quizzes?
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_030: I heard that you were a strong Fire-type user, and I wanted to challenge you... Have a battle with me.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_1201_040: Ah, I see now. You’re a Fire-type user, too. All right, let’s do this!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0101_010: I’m going all out. I’ll show you what I’m made of!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_010: It’s a shame I lost... But that was a great battle. I feel like I can get even stronger. Thank you, Blaine.
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_020: No no, I should be thanking you! Your silent but intense fighting spirit set my soul ablaze, too!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_030: I can’t let myself be beaten by young Trainers! Just because I’m getting old doesn’t mean I’m getting cold! Gotta keep that fire alive! Hah!
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_040: Wha...? Even your Ponyta looks energized...
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_050: Hah! Ponyta, you feel the same way, do you?
charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0059_00_katsura/2311_0501_060: Then we just ride on—full speed ahead! The two of us are gonna get stronger and stronger! Hah!

charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1101_0100_2: Janine was intently watching people  going to and fro in town.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1101_0200_2: She did not notice [Name:PlayerNickname ] as [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] approached her.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_0300_1: Hmm, I see. So that’s how you’re gonna fight, huh?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_0600_1: I was, uh... I was watching the townspeople.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_0700_1: Do you see someone you know?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1000_1: I was watching the movements of all the Trainers and Pokémon in town.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1100_1: I was also watching the Pokémon battles that were happening all over.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1200_1: This is a part of my training, too!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1300_1: I’ve been out here since early this morning!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0301_1400_1: You really work hard on  your studies, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_1600_1: You’re just slacking off, aren’t you?!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1800_1: I train every day with Ariados.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_1900_1: But what makes Pokémon battles deep is the fact that they’re more than just tests of strength.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2000_1: It’s suuuper important that you read what your opponent is thinking and build your strategy around that!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2100_1: I was watching all of these Trainers and Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2200_1: so I can learn to read one—even two—steps ahead in battle.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2700_1: With perfect strategy is how a ninja fights!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2800_1: My father has always told me that I must train not only my body but my mind and spirit, too!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_2900_1: But...no matter how perfect your strategy is, it doesn’t count for anything unless you are connected with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3000_1: I learned that the most important thing is for the Trainer and the Pokémon to have a trusting relationship.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_3200_1: It’s not like Ariados and I need  that kind of advice, though!  We have each other’s back all the time!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0302_3300_1: I can see that being really important.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0402_3400_1: It’s not like Ariados and I need  that kind of advice, though!  We have each other’s back all the time!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3500_1: All the pain and sorrows that we went through... We were able to overcome them together.
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_3700_1: Considering what good partners we are,  I know we won’t lose to anybody!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0301_3800_1: We’ll give you a run for your money!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0401_3900_1: Well then, I guess that makes us rivals!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_0402_4200_1: We could beat my father and his Crobat!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_4300_1: With our sync power, Ariados and I will only get stronger!
charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0060_00_anzu/2301_1201_4400_1: Stronger than you...and stronger than Father!

charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1101_0100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] carefully made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way through a long, dark cave.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1101_0200: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] thought [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard something.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1101_0300: And then a Gengar that appeared  to be wild jumped out at [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_0500: Now, now, dear, you shouldn’t frighten guests like that.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_0700: Now, now, dear, you shouldn’t frighten guests like that.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_0900: You can draw out Gengar’s power to the fullest in dark places, which is why we’re here.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_1000: I myself like places where the sun doesn’t shine. They make me feel calm.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_1200: Don’t judge me. That’s just how I am.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_1400: Don’t judge me. That’s just how I am.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_1600: That’s really none of your concern.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0302_1700: Without me, wouldn’t it be lonely?
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_1800: That’s really none of your concern.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_1900: Why is it that I always meet people like you? It’s been that way for a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_2100: And on top of being nosy, you’re a meddlesome child, too.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_2300: And on top of being nosy, you’re a meddlesome child, too.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2400: Ah well... I guess it won’t hurt to talk a bit.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2500: Do you know Oak? I’ve been stuck with him for a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2600: That old duff was once tough and handsome! He’s a shadow of his former self now.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2700: He does know and talk a lot about Pokémon, which might be why he’s always surrounded by people. He used to shine so brightly.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2800: Compared to him, I’m the quiet type when it comes to Pokémon. I like to get lost in thought about them all by myself.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_2900: I was doing what I liked, but that old duff Oak would not stop talking to me.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3000: I think he was just trying to be nice, but he was giving me help I had never asked for.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3100: He was taking up the time I wanted to spend in contemplation, so I thought I’d try to shut him up with a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3200: But back then, that old guy was strong— undefeated, in fact. Was he as good as me? He was better.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3300: So then I battled Oak again and again.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3400: At some point, the time I spent with him started meaning a lot to me.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3500: One day, all of a sudden, the old duff said he wanted to make a Pokédex.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3600: I told him that Pokémon are for battling, but he wouldn’t listen.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3700: He wasted my precious time, and when he’d had enough of our battles, he left. Why do charming men have to be so meddlesome?
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3800: He trampled all over my youth, even though I never wanted anything to do with him in the first place.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_3900: Hey, Gengar, don’t interrupt me  when I’m talking. You’re just as meddlesome as ever, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0401_4100: That’s right. She always interrupts me when she thinks it’s for my own good.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_0402_4300: No, it’s not that. She always interrupts me when she thinks it’s for my own good.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4400: Whenever I talk about that old Oak guy,  my tone of voice gets harsh,  so she worries about me.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4500: I always tell her she doesn’t need to, though.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4600: But the truth is, she has helped me many times throughout my life.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4700: That’s one thing you should keep in mind, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4800: No matter how much you think you’re all alone and no one understands you, people are never really alone.
charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0061_00_kikuko/2301_1201_4900: If you take a look around, you’ll definitely find someone meddlesome lurking nearby. Like in the shadow of that rock there.

charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1101_0100_: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking down a city street, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed Karen and Houndoom walking just ahead of [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1101_0200_: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] opened [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] mouth to call out to them, but at that exact same moment,  they turned around to face [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_0300_: Ah, I had a feeling it was you. I sensed your presence coming closer to me.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_0400_: You didn’t seem very vigilant, though.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_0500_: You should never let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_0800_: Uh-oh, there’s a loose piece of thread hanging down from your clothes there.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0302_0900_: Was my guard down just now?
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_1100_: Oh, look! There’s a loose piece of thread hanging down from your clothes there.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1101_4700_: Suddenly, Houndoom let out a small stream of fire just big enough to burn away the stray thread.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1400_: You still don’t get it, do you?
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1500_: If my intentions had been malicious instead of helpful just now, you’d already be reduced to a pile of cinders.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1600_: That’s why I told you— you can’t afford to let your guard down.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_1700_: You need to be fully aware, right down to the seams on your clothes. Bad people will invent all sorts of reasons to approach you.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_1900_: Hmm... You’re good at adapting, aren’t you? You’re determined to grow and improve, but you’re flexible, too.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_2100_: Hmm... You’re good at adapting, aren’t you? You’re determined to grow and improve, but you’re flexible, too.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_2300_: Especially since Houndoom and I can’t really relate.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_2500_: No, we don’t. To live life following the advice of others...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_2600_: That just wouldn’t be in our nature.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_2800_: To put it simply, we want to be free to live however we want to.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_2900_: We tend to favor that sort of unrestrained lifestyle.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3000_: Likewise, we don’t stop anyone else from doing what they want to do, either.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3100_: That being said, you should still straighten up your appearance and try not to give your opponent an opening.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3200_: Besides, if you possess true, genuine power, you won’t need to change yourself anyway.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0401_3400_: I have noticed one thing, though...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_0402_3600_: I have noticed one thing, though...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3700_: When Houndoom howls, most people and Pokémon can’t help but quiver in fear.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3800_: But since we’ve been talking, I haven’t seen you react that way at all.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_3900_: You must have some serious guts— or else somehow be perfectly at ease...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4200_: Sorry. Forget about what I said earlier, all right?
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4300_: You’re strong in your own way.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4400_: Trainers like you should battle with whatever Pokémon they want and however they wish.
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4500_: You have your own way of doing things, and so do I...
charaepi_ch0062_00_karin_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0062_00_karin/2301_1201_4600_: I hope someday we can see how our differences measure up in battle.  I’ll be looking forward to it.

charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1101_0100_: Hearing a loud noise coming from somewhere on the mountain, [Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to investigate.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1101_0200_: The source of the mysterious sound was Marshal and his Conkeldurr’s rigorous training.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_0300_: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ], fancy meeting you here. I was just training.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_0500_: I was testing my strength using  Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.  All in pursuit of surpassing my limits!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_0700_: I was testing my strength using  Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.  All in pursuit of surpassing my limits!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_0800_: Then a strange ring appeared and  I went through it to come to this island.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_0900_: But regardless of where I am,  what I do does not change!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1000_: As long as my partner Conkeldurr is by my side, we can train wherever we are!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_1200_: Trying to overcome all problems with strength alone is both arduous and difficult.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_1400_: Trying to overcome all problems with strength alone is both arduous and difficult.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1500_: But Conkeldurr uses not only his strength but also moves that depend on centrifugal force.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1600_: In other words, Conkeldurr has both strength and wisdom!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1700_: This is more than just transforming sand and rocks into concrete.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1800_: It’s more than just strength or willpower. It is something that is only possible through the perfect mixture of wisdom and technique.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_1900_: Conkeldurr is the very embodiment of constant pursuit of power!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_2000_: That is why I am convinced that I can  achieve something if I stay with Conkeldurr.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_2200_: No! While I appreciate the offer, you have your own training that you should focus on.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0302_2300_: Is there anything I can do to help?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_2400_: No! While I appreciate the offer, you have your own training that you should focus on.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0301_2500_: I want to become stronger with you!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0302_2700_: Then how about as a rival?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_2900_: None of us can become stronger on our own. We need each other to compete with  and to hone our skills against!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3000_: My mentor, Alder, had many rivals who  he fought against in his youth.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3100_: However, for one to be my rival, they must be either my equal or greater in strength than me.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3200_: I have been searching for such a rival, and I thought that I might find one here at the PML!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3300_: Very well, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!  I will acknowledge your desire to grow stronger!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_3400_: Well, then let us begin our training! First, we practice our punches on Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_3800_: Where did your resolve go? You can’t give up before you’ve tried!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0401_4200_: Hm? Conkeldurr was surprised by your punch...?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_0402_4400_: Hm? Conkeldurr was surprised by your punch...?
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4500_: You’re going soft, Conkeldurr! You shouldn’t be afraid of such an attack!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4700_: However, I do understand. Even I was taken aback at that fighting spirit.
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4800_: I was not mistaken in acknowledging you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You truly are a spirited Trainer!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_4900_: Let’s make our way to the top, rival!
charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0063_00_renbu/2301_1201_5000_: You may even be able to shatter Conkeldurr’s concrete one day!

charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1101_0100_: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a rumor that a few sync pairs would be challenging Steven to a battle at the beach.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1101_0200_: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] decided to swing by but found that the battle had already ended. Steven stood across from his opponents, looking cool and confident.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_0300_: W-we just gotta accept that we lost, guys... Time to g-get back to training, OK?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0401_0500_: These sync stones have a truly brilliant shine to them, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_0700_: These sync stones have a truly brilliant shine to them, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_0800_: Their beauty is different from any other stone I’ve seen before...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0301_0900_: Uhh, are you listening to me?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0302_1100_: Looking at rocks on your Poryphone?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_1300_: Oh! Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Sorry, I was a bit preoccupied with this stone...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_1700_: I do! And this one is a very special stone!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_1800_: A stone that can only be found at the bottom of the ocean near Pasio... A sync stone, of course!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_1900_: I’ve traveled far and wide to find a stone that sparkles and shines as perfectly as this one does.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2000_: The bond that grows and develops between a Trainer and a Pokémon is often referred to as sync strength...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2100_: And sync stones react to that strength, making them glitter even more brightly.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2200_: But you already knew that, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2300_: Due to my status as a Champion, I get challenged to Pokémon battles constantly here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2400_: But one of the great things about that is that I get to see everyone’s sync stones shine whenever I battle!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2500_: The fact that I get to see them sparkle makes me look forward to battling even more.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2700_: Well, every sync stone shines a bit differently. Each one is unique.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2800_: Don’t get me wrong—I’m incredibly pleased by that fact.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_2900_: But I believe there’s a well of even greater potential hidden within these stones.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3000_: That’s why... [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Do you have time for a battle right now?
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3100_: Against you, my sync stone could potentially shine brighter than it ever has before, as long as we fight with all our might!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0401_3300_: All right! Thanks for agreeing to help.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_3500_: All right! Thanks for agreeing to help.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3600_: Let’s give this everything we’ve got, Metagross!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_3700_: We’re going to make our sync stone sparkle like it’s never sparkled before!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1101_3900_: As Steven and [Name:PlayerNickname ] faced off, their sync stones shone magnificently!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4100_: You and your Pokémon truly are a spectacular sync pair, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4200_: When a Trainer and a Pokémon join together with a bond as strong as yours...
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4300_: that strength really does seem to reflect in their sync stone.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4400_: Just like how polishing a gemstone makes it sparkle, it seems we sync pairs need to hone our skills in order to shine as well!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_4500_: Please, will you join me again sometime soon? I’d like to polish our battling skills together!
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0401_4700_: Great answer! I knew my instincts about you were correct.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_0402_4900_: Hah! Great answer! I knew my instincts about you were correct.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_5000_: Soon, Metagross and I will be shining brighter than ever before! And I’m sure you and your Pokémon will do the same.
charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0090_00_daigo/2301_1201_5200_: when it comes down to it, I’m just the strongest there is right now.

charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_020: Did you come here to do some training as well?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_040: I can tell you’re passionate about training. Perhaps a veteran like me could give you a piece of advice?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_050: When you give your Pokémon a command, pour as much emotion into it as you can. Pokémon respond to feelings much more than words alone.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_070: I see. Just out for a nice, relaxing stroll, then?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_080: We could all use a little rest here and there. It’s hard to pour your emotions into your battle commands when you’re feeling exhausted.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_090: Well, I think it’s about time I returned to my hotel.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_100: I hate to run off when we’ve only just begun to chat...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_110: but I have a pile of documents on my desk that is calling my name.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_130: Yes. As you know, I’m a Pokémon Trainer, but I’m also an archeologist. It’s a very busy job.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_150: Mostly academic. As you know, I’m a Pokémon Trainer, but I’m also an archeologist. It’s a very busy job.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_160: Sometimes it feels like my stack of research papers is never-ending... It just keeps growing and growing.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_170: And the moment I start organizing and cleaning it up, I get distracted by something else.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_200: I mean, I can’t throw them away if I might need them someday, right?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_210: And I use them all the time, so they need to be placed somewhere I can reach them easily, right?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_240: Cleaning is something you should put all your effort into, and make sure you get it all done at once.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_250: Otherwise, you’ll end up doing the same thing, day after day.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_260: Naturally, I’m the one who has to clean my own home, eventually...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_270: That’s why staying in a hotel is so nice. The lovely staff there go in and clean my room while I’m gone.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_280: They tidy up all of my paperwork for me before my stacks get out of hand.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_290: Thanks to them, it’s easier than ever to find the documents I’m looking for! They’ve helped me out so much.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_300: Likewise, when I was staying at my friend Caitlin’s villa...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_310: it didn’t take long for my room there to become a mess of scattered research papers.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_320: But Caitlin’s butler was kind enough to tidy it up for me each day.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0301_330: You aren’t very good at picking up after yourself, huh?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_370: When it comes to Pokémon battling, I know exactly what I have to do.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_380: But cleaning? I barely even know where to start, let alone what works best.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_400: You saw my Garchomp use Earthquake a moment ago, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_410: How did that move make you feel while you were watching? I’m curious.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0401_430: Well, I’ll find out what sort of Trainer you are when we get the chance to battle...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0302_440: I thought I could do better than that!
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_0402_450: Well, I’ll find out what sort of Trainer you are when we get the chance to battle...
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_460: I’m looking forward to competing in the PML.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_470: It’ll be interesting to find out what battling means to each of the different competitors.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_480: You included, of course! The two of us have to face off at some point—I insist.
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_490: I want you to let out all of your emotions. Show me who you truly are!
charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0091_00_shirona/2301_1201_500: I won’t let the battle end until I’ve had the chance to witness your true emotions!

charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1101_0100_2: While exploring the volcano one day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a strange, metallic clanking sound.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1101_0200_2: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to move deeper  into the volcano to investigate...
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1101_0500_2: Suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was knocked to the ground as a tiny but powerful body slammed into [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_0600_1: S-sorry! My fault! Are you OK?!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_0800_1: I’ve been training with Haxorus here, slicing up some bars of metal!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_0900_1: I was trying to warn you not to come any closer since her claws are so sharp...
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_1100_1: Yep! Sawyer gave them to us. There were some extras lying around, so he said we could use them for training!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_1300_1: Yep! Sawyer gave us some metal bars to train with since there were a few extras lying around!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_1400_1: He wants to help Haxorus and I get super strong so that we can do well in the tournament.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_1600_1: Nope! Not at all! It actually feels even more fun and exciting having you around!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_1800_1: Nope! No secrets here! It actually feels even more fun and exciting having you around!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_1900_1: Haxorus fell in love with this new training routine, so she’s been begging me to come and do it every day.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2000_1: It was starting to get a little boring for me— until now, that is!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2100_1: It’s OK if [Name:PlayerNickname ] stays for a little while, right, Haxorus?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2200_1: Yep! She says it’s OK with her!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_2400_1: Of course! I don’t really know how, though. I just do!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_2600_1: Yep! I don’t really know how I know that— I just do!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2700_1: Oh, people always call me “the girl who knows the hearts of dragons,” but I don’t think that’s got anything to do with it, really.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2800_1: Don’t you feel like the more time you spend with someone, the more you can sort of sense what they’re feeling?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_2900_1: That’s normal, right? I don’t really get why everybody thinks I’m so amazing.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3000_1: It doesn’t even feel like they’re praising me, really, since it’s all just common sense in my book.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0401_3200_1: Tee-hee! You understand me so well, don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0302_3300_1: I wouldn’t give it too much thought.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_0402_3400_1: Tee-hee! Don’t worry—it doesn’t really bother me.
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3500_1: I mean, the reason we keep coming back here to train is because I can sense how much Haxorus really wants to do it!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3600_1: Hm? What was that, Haxorus? You want to get back to your training now? OK, OK, I’m coming!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3700_1: Ready, Haxorus? Let’s do a thousand of your special speedy slices on these metal bars!
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3800_1: What? You want me to wear a sygna suit  so I can look super cool, too?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_3900_1: Haha! You sure are awfully demanding today, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0092_00_iris_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0092_00_iris/2301_1201_4000_1: I’ve already got the clothes my grandpa gave me...but I guess I’d wear a sygna suit if somebody gave me one!

charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1101_0100_: The sound of a steam whistle echoed  throughout the area.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1101_0200_: Drawn by it, [Name:PlayerNickname ] moved toward the coast, where [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] found Drake and Salamence gazing out at the ocean.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0300_: If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You must’ve heard the whistle blowing.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0400_: A ship left the port just now.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0500_: Look, over there. Pasio sure has some fine ships.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0600_: They’re powerful enough to stay on the course they’ve plotted even in stormy seas.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_0700_: Seeing them makes me wonder whether I’ve been living strongly enough.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0401_0900_: Just memories of my youthful foolishness.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0402_1100_: Maybe it’s because I’m getting on in years, but I think about things a lot these days.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1200_: A long time ago, my friend Briney and I were trying to become the greatest sailors in the world.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1300_: We dreamed of mastering every sea route there is.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1400_: But then, one day, when I was out to sea, my ship got caught in a storm.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1500_: Somehow, I avoided sinking, but I was adrift for days after that.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1600_: I had used up the last of my food and water, so I thought I was done for, but then a Dragonite appeared in the sky.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_1700_: That Dragonite led me all the way back to shore.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0401_1900_: Legend has it that Dragonite is a kind Pokémon that leads people who are lost at sea back to safety.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_0402_2100_: Of course! Unconditional kindness is not exclusive to people. Pokémon can show it, too.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2200_: Having a different species show me that sort of kindness impacted me deeply.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2300_: I decided that if my life had been saved by a Pokémon, I should use it to benefit Pokémon. That’s when I decided to become a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2400_: I abandoned my friend and started  down a different path. I apologized  to Briney so many times.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2500_: But he wasn’t even angry at me! He sent me on my way with a smile.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2600_: That’s why I want to be the greatest Trainer of them all. It’s for my old friend Briney, too.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2700_: Like a ship that stays the course through a storm, no matter what difficulties I may encounter, I’ll continue on the path that I’ve chosen.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2800_: I come to the ocean to remind myself of what I have resolved to do.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_2900_: And also to remember that Dragonite that saved me so long ago, wherever it is now...
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3000_: Did you hear that cry? It sounded just like Dragonite.
