charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3100_: How could it possibly be the same  Dragonite here on Pasio, though?
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3200_: No time to think now! Salamence! Let’s fly out and see! There’s something I need to tell Dragonite!
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3300_: Salamence is a Pokémon that hoped and wished he could fly for a long time until he finally got his wings.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3400_: Salamence is proof that you can reach your goals if you keep believing in yourself.
charaepi_ch0094_00_genji_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0094_00_genji/2301_1201_3500_: Now it’s my turn. I won’t let this chance get away from me!

charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1101_01: [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Caitlin and Reuniclus in the city square one day, but they were acting a bit unusual.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1101_02: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to approach.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_04: What? Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. There’s no need to worry, I assure you.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_06: What? Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. There’s no need to worry, I assure you.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_07: Reuniclus and I were just practicing keeping our emotions under control.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_09: Haven’t I ever told you? I possess psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_11: Haven’t I ever told you? I possess psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_12: When I was younger, I found it quite difficult to manage them, you see...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_13: When I lost a Pokémon battle, the crushing emotions I felt would cause my powers to spin out of control.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_14: My outbursts were the source of quite a lot of trouble for my butler, Darach.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_15: As I remember it, I was prohibited from battling at all for a while.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_16: During that time, Darach would step in and battle in my stead.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0301_17: Sounds like you went through a lot.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_21: As I moved into adulthood, I was able to control my emotions better and better.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_22: Eventually, I felt in control enough to compete in Pokémon battles all by myself.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_23: That was lovely at first...but soon I had something new to worry about instead.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_24: I had suppressed my emotions so much that Pokémon battles were beginning to feel dull and unexciting compared to before.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_25: Whether I was winning or losing, I was only vaguely interested in what was going on...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_26: That is, until I met up with Cynthia at one of my villas. She taught me a very important lesson, you see.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_28: Yes. Are you two acquainted? She’s the Champion of the Sinnoh region.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_30: Well, she’s the Champion of the Sinnoh region.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_31: Which means her battle skills are a force to be reckoned with, for one thing.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_32: She taught me that showing my emotions isn’t necessarily a bad thing...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_33: and that it can actually be a good thing.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_34: She said that being able to convey your feelings to your Pokémon can help you bring out the very best in them.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_35: The lesson that Cynthia taught me that day is still indispensable to me, even now.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_36: I’d like to continue to follow her advice and climb up the ranks at the PML...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_37: It would be like my way of repaying her for everything she has done for me.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_39: Tee-hee! Perhaps... But I’ll be keeping my eye on you as well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_41: Tee-hee! Maybe, maybe not... I’ll be keeping my eye on you as well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_42: If I do eventually lose to you in a battle...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_43: maybe I’ll resist the urge to suppress my emotions and instead let them all explode.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_44: Who knows what will happen... I certainly have no idea.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_45: Oh, don’t worry, Reuniclus. My psychic powers may be strong... but so are yours.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_46: You’re strong enough to grind rocks into dust. If anything were to happen, I’m sure you’d be able to stop me before I did any harm.

charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1101_0100_2: [Name:PlayerNickname ] met up with Siebold to buy some ingredients for his recipe.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1101_0200_2: Once they’d collected everything on the list, they decided to take a short break.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0300_1: Thanks to you, I was able to gather all of the ingredients I need in record time.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0400_1: Soon, with the expert touch of my chef’s knife, these fresh, crisp vegetables will be reborn!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0500_1: Whether the ingredients shine beautifully in the dish or end up ruining it depends on the skill of the chef.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0600_1: We chefs must carefully consider our ingredients and take full responsibility  for the outcome of each dish we create.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0700_1: Ingredients and chefs, Pokémon and Trainers...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0800_1: The relationships between them are quite similar in a lot of ways.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_0900_1: I think that’s why both of them  appeal to me so much.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_1000_1: I hate to change the subject so abruptly, but I have a question I’d like to ask you.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_1100_1: Do you believe that Pokémon have limitless potential?
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_1400_1: Many Pokémon live their lives very close to our own, while others do not show themselves in front of people at all.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_1500_1: Most of them are shrouded in mystery. Therefore, we can’t possibly know how limitless their potential truly is.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_1600_1: To draw out the hidden potential in our Pokémon—to create a future full of possibility— is the greatest mission of all for us Trainers.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_1900_1: How can you place a limit on your Pokémon’s potential and still call yourself a Pokémon Trainer?!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2000_1: A Trainer and their Pokémon play  vital roles in each other’s future.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2100_1: They go through their lives together. They hurt together and they help together. They must continue to survive together.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2200_1: If Trainers can’t believe in their Pokémon or would try to limit their Pokémon’s potential, maybe the world is better off without them!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_2300_1: Oh dear, I must apologize... I got a bit too carried away.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2400_1: Personally, I do believe that Pokémon have limitless potential hidden deep within them.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2500_1: The PML is like a great, brilliant stage where we can witness that potential with our own two eyes.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2600_1: Nothing makes me happier than watching a Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_2700_1: and witnessing firsthand the incredible potential that Trainers are able to draw out of their Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0301_2800_1: Then let’s do our absolute best!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_3000_1: Trainers can help draw out the potential in their fellow Trainers as well, you know!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_3200_1: Pardon me? Have you been listening to what I’ve been saying at all?!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_3300_1: You, young [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='sir' F='miss' ], are ill qualified to be a Trainer! What do you expect to achieve at the PML if you can’t even comprehend that?
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_3400_1: Oh dear, I do apologize... I get so caught up in my own enthusiasm.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3500_1: Just as I do with the recipes I create, I have endeavored to draw out my Clawitzer’s maximum potential...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3600_1: and with me doing so, Clawitzer has also helped me draw out my own potential as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3700_1: And just as certain ingredients and spices serve to heighten the flavor of others in a recipe...
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_3800_1: so, too, do Pokémon and their Trainers. We are better together. I’ve witnessed it in others and experienced it firsthand.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0401_4000_1: Yes, indeed! But what it all boils down to in the end is...I want nothing more than to truly connect with my Pokémon. That’s it.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_0402_4200_1: Yes, indeed! But what it all boils down to in the end is...I want nothing more than to truly connect with my Pokémon. That’s it.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_4300_1: Well now! All of this talking has made me work up quite an appetite.
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_4400_1: We’ve already purchased all of the necessary ingredients. I think it’s time we turned them into something shockingly delicious!
charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_00_zumi/2301_1201_4500_1: Feast your eyes as Chef Siebold draws out the limitless potential of the ingredients he’s chosen for this dish...

charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_0100_1: Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I didn’t expect to run into you here.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_0200_1: Octillery and I came to the beach in search of inspiration for the new ink-based dish we’re developing.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_0300_1: Did you know that Octillery ink can be used as a cooking ingredient?
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_0500_1: Excellent! Knowledge is the key ingredient to making the world a better place, you know.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_0600_1: And a chef needs both great knowledge and great experience to bring out the ultimate flavor of his ingredients!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_0900_1: In fact, you should be thankful that you learned something new today! Knowledge is the key ingredient to making the world a better place!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1100_1: Apologies... Sometimes I get a bit carried away when I talk about my passions.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1200_1: Discovering that I could use Octillery ink in my cooking unlocked a whole new realm of culinary possibility for me to pursue.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1300_1: I have a passion for bringing out the best in things—both as a chef and as a Pokémon Trainer.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_1400_1: And right now, my greatest passion is perfecting this new Octillery-ink-based recipe—no matter what it takes!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0301_1500_1: You and Octillery seem really close.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_1600_1: Indeed, we are! Octillery has helped me discover a great many things since we first met...
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_1700_1: I’m proud to call such a dependable Pokémon my partner.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0302_1800_1: You’re really excited about this, huh?
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_1900_1: Indeed! And Octillery is bubbling with enthusiasm with me! He wants to perfect this dish almost as much as I do.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_2000_1: I can count on him for anything.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2100_1: It was fate that brought us together in the first place.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2200_1: One day, I went to the beach to search for some fun, new ingredients with my Clawitzer.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2300_1: We were about to stop and take a break when all of a sudden, a wild Octillery lurched out at us from among the rocks.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2400_1: While we were battling, a bit of ink from its Octazooka attack splashed me in the face.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2500_1: I accidentally tasted some of it in the process, and my goodness... It was like an explosion of flavor!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2600_1: I’d heard of ink being used as a cooking ingredient before, but this was the first time I had tasted it myself.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_2700_1: In that instant, I felt like my eyes were opened to a whole new world of food! It was truly astounding!
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0401_2900_1: Indeed. I believe Octillery and I are destined to deliver an entirely new cuisine to the world.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_0402_3100_1: Well, we can’t have that, can we? You can’t win Pokémon battles on an empty stomach.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_3400_1: I think you and I were meant to have this conversation about Octillery today.
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_3500_1: How would you like to be one of the first to taste-test the new ink-based dish we’ve been developing?
charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0096_10_zumi/2301_1201_3600_1: For a treasured guest like you, I’ll put my heart into every last bite. I hope you enjoy it!

charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] noticed the light of  a swaying flame deep in the forest.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1101_0200_20: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] snuck deeper into the forest.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_0400_10: Do you want me for something?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_0600_10: I didn’t think anybody would be out here.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0302_0700_10: What are you doing out here?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_0800_10: I was talking with my partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_0900_10: I just wanted some time alone with Arcanine.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_1000_10: It’s noisy outside of the forest... We can’t talk if it’s noisy.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_1700_10: I mean...thank you for being considerate...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_1900_10: I mean...thank you for being considerate...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2000_10: I try not to apologize too much.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2100_10: You feel better being thanked than being apologized to, right?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2200_10: Do you...understand what I’m trying to say?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2700_10: I’m...very scared of conveying my feelings in words...
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2800_10: Even if I don’t mean to, I end up hurting people.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_2900_10: But I have so many things  that I want to tell them.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3000_10: That’s why I want to take as much time as I can to talk with Arcanine.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3200_10: I can’t... The words don’t come out.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0401_3400_10: This is still too fast for me.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0302_3500_10: You don’t have to push yourself!
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_0402_3600_10: This is still too fast for me.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3700_10: I’m not confident that I can communicate well.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_3900_10: I know what I have to do in these situations.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4100_10: that all you need to do is say thank you and give a flower to somebody you love.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4200_10: It told me that that would be enough.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4300_10: I was thinking of going to find some flowers, but what do you think?
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4400_10: Am I expressing myself all right? *giggle* I’m glad.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4500_10: I really appreciate you following me. Thank you.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4600_10: One of these days, I’ll make sure to thank you properly.
charaepi_ch0097_00_mai_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0097_00_mai/2301_1201_4700_10: I love you, Arcanine. Please stay with me always.

charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Hau walking into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1101_0200_20: Concerned about Raichu’s cries,  [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] decided to follow Hau into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_0300_10: Wait, is that... It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Were you following me?
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_0600_10: I mean, it wasn’t like it was a secret, so you should have called out to me.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_0800_10: Aw, you don’t have to hide it! I mean, it’s not really a secret that I’m here!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_0900_10: I actually came here to train.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1000_10: I don’t know quite how it happened, but somehow I ended up here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1100_10: As long as I’m here, though, I want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_1500_10: There’s somebody I want to beat.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1600_10: My rival always comes at me and doesn’t hold anything back. Kinda like you!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1700_10: But I’ve never won a match, so I can’t help  but feel frustrated—and a little sad.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1800_10: That’s why I’m going to go meet  a really strong Trainer up ahead!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1900_10: All right, let’s go, Raichu! I hear  this Trainer is super strong, but I’m sure  the two of us can handle it!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2000_10: Huh? Are you not feeling up to this?
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2100_10: Maybe our sync strength isn’t as high as I thought. But we’ve surfed so much...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0302_2400_10: Maybe he’s not comfortable with it.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_2500_10: Oh, I see! You might be right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2600_10: Sorry, Raichu. I forgot our promise today!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2700_10: We were supposed to go exploring the town today, weren’t we? I’m so sorry, Raichu. Come on—don’t be angry!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2800_10: Hm? What is that smell? It smells really good.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2900_10: I must have accidentally touched Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_3100_10: If you ever touch an Alolan Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_3200_10: the smell of pancakes comes wafting out.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_3400_10: If you ever touch an Alolan Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_3500_10: the smell of pancakes comes wafting out.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_3700_10: In fact, nobody really knows why Raichu look the way they do in Alola.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_3800_10: There are people that say that it’s because they ate too many pancakes, but I think it’s the opposite.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_4000_10: Pancakes in Alola make you hungry with just their smell.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_4200_10: Pancakes in Alola make you hungry with just their smell.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4300_10: So I think Raichu learned to ride on their tails so they could go find and eat pancakes more easily.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4500_10: I guess he’s just hungry. He doesn’t care for theories right now.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4600_10: All right, forget training for today! Let’s all go get some pancakes!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4700_10: Come with us, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! And once we’re done eating...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4800_10: I’d like you to come train with us!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4900_10: I think you’re a lot stronger of  an opponent than other Trainers!

charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] had come to town  to do some shopping.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1101_0200_20: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] turned the corner onto a big street to get  to the shop [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was heading for.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_0400_10: Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Don’t jump out at people like that!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_0500_10: You bumped into me, so I’m fining you a million!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_0700_10: Really?! Hey, I’m serious about this!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_0900_10: What’s that all about?! You can’t just refuse like that!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1000_10: You’re the one who bumped into me, so of course you have to pay a fine...right?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1100_10: You know, I kind of get the feeling that maybe  it was I who bumped into you. Hmmm...
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1200_10: I guess it can’t be helped! No fine  for you this time! I mean, that’s how  it always ends up, anyway.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1300_10: I’m so disappointed. I finally had a chance to get you to pay me a fine.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1400_10: I’ll never reach my goal at this rate.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_1600_10: Hehehe! Don’t act too shocked when I tell you!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0302_1700_10: There’s a purpose to your fines?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_1900_10: My goal is to use the fines I collect to build my own Battle Tower!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2000_10: The Battle Tower is a place to have Pokémon battles. My daddy—
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2100_10: I mean, my DAD faces off against challengers who climb the Battle Tower.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2200_10: I’ve made many attempts myself, but it always ended in defeat for me.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2300_10: But someday, I’ll make my dad take on the Battle Tower that I build!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_2400_10: And I will definitely beat him! That’s one of my dreams!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_2600_10: Right? You’ve gotta dream big if you wanna have fun!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_2700_10: That’s not my only dream, though.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_2900_10: Yup, and this next one’s a doozy of a dream!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3100_10: My master, Mr. Wake—pro wrestler Crasher Wake—doesn’t acknowledge my skills at all!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3200_10: I’ve devised a special plan just for him!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3300_10: Mr. Wake’s Floatzel and my Piplup are both Pokémon that use Water-type moves.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3400_10: I’m going to make my Piplup learn more awesome moves than his Floatzel to surprise him!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0401_3600_10: It’s good to have dreams, but when  you have too many, you might not be able to make any of them come true.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_0402_3800_10: It’s good to have dreams, but when  you have too many, you might not be able to make any of them come true.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_3900_10: Which one do you think I should go for first?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4000_10: You have to decide right now! Ready? Three, two, one...
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4100_10: Oh, never mind! This is exactly the kind of thing that I need to take the time to think about for myself.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4200_10: Hehehe! I told you my dreams.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4300_10: So you have to tell me yours!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2301_1201_4400_10: If you don’t tell, I’m fining you!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0100_10: Excuse me, young lady! Come battle my Piplup!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0200_10: Who, me? Of course. I’ll be your opponent.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_1201_0300_10: Hehe! All right! My Piplup is raring to go! Time for a Pokémon battle!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0101_0100_10: I’m not sure how well I’ll battle, but I’ll give my absolute best!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0100_10: What a strong Piplup you have! I couldn’t help myself from being impressed.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0200_10: Right?! I knew it! My synergy with Piplup is perfect!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0300_10: Huh? What’s happening to Piplup? Could this be Evolution?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0400_10: Piplup, are you evolving?! I told you he was raring to go!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2311_0501_0500_10: All right! We’re going to get stronger and stronger until we’re the strongest Pokémon and Trainer in the world!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0100_10: I’m still not saying you can be my apprentice, but you’re certainly growing!  I’ve had my eye on you.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0200_10: Thanks for watching, Master! Ooh, my master finally acknowledged my skills!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_1201_0300_10: I just said I’m not your master! You’re still far too soft to be my apprentice! You can still get stronger!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0101_0100_10: First, you have to show me your skills. Then we can talk!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0100_10: Barry and Prinplup, you gave me a good  match! You look happy about it, don’t you?
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0200_10: Master...I’m so moved! I can really feel that Prinplup and I have gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0300_10: The way you battled, I almost thought you were your father!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0400_10: We did it, Prinplup! It’s all thanks to y— Wait, what’s happening?!
charaepi_ch0099_00_jun_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0099_00_jun/2312_0501_0500_10: What’s that all about?! If you’re going to evolve, at least say something!

charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] entered a clearing in the forest and heard Rosa’s voice nearby.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_0200_10: “All right! I’ll show you how it’s done!”
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_0300_10: “Why? ’Cause I’m the most powerful Trainer in the world! That’s why!”
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_0500_10: Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Was my imitation pretty close? Tee-hee!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_0600_10: You guessed correctly! I was trying to do Blue’s voice.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_0800_10: Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Tee-hee! Guess I’ve been discovered.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_0900_10: I was trying to imitate Blue’s voice, but it’s pretty hard!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1000_10: See, Snivy and I have been practicing our acting skills!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1100_10: Not many people know this, but I actually did some movie acting for a little while back in the Unova region.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1600_10: In Unova, there’s this awesome place called Pokéstar Studios where movies are made.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_1700_10: And Snivy and I acted together in some of the movies produced there.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2200_10: If you ever visit the Unova region...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2300_10: I’ll definitely give you a tour!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2400_10: Anyway, Snivy and I have been keeping on top of our acting skills so that we can star in another movie someday.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2600_10: When you break it all down, acting is a lot like imitating other people. You just do whatever they would do!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2700_10: In other words, if I try to act just like the Trainers I battle against...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2800_10: or just imitate lots of other Trainers in general...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_2900_10: maybe I can learn to do all sorts of new things, too! Just like them! The possibilities are endless!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_3000_10: After all, if you want to act like someone else, you have to put yourself in their shoes. You learn how they think and how they battle.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_3200_10: Yeah! We could try it out together if you want, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_3400_10: Yeah! We could try it out together if you want, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_3500_10: It’s OK if you’ve never acted before! Snivy will be keeping an eye on you!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_3700_10: Snivy’s got a great eye! She can tell if you’re totally in character or not.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_3900_10: Snivy’s got a great eye! She can tell if you’re totally in character or not.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4000_10: See, your aura kinda changes when you take on a role and you really embody that character.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4100_10: And little Snivy here is ultra sensitive to that sort of thing!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4200_10: I think it’s, like...one of those things that only a Pokémon can truly sense, you know?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4300_10: Snivy’s always on the lookout—even during Pokémon battles! She watches her opponents really carefully.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0401_4500_10: I know, right?! I think so, too!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_0402_4700_10: I know, right?! I think so, too!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4800_10: The next time we battle against you...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_4900_10: Snivy and I will have to study the way you do things, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! So that we can imitate you someday!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5000_10: I’ll always be me in the end, though! That’s never gonna change!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5100_10: I’ll study a bunch of Trainers and learn what I can from imitating them, but I’m not just gonna copy whatever they do.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2301_1201_5200_10: I’m gonna take all that new knowledge and experience and use it to flavor my OWN battle style! And I’m gonna win!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0100_10: Mwahaha! ’Tis I, Brycen-Man! I have waited an eternity for this day to come, Snivy-Girl!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0200_10: Huh?! Who are you?! Wait, is that you, Brycen?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0300_10: Hm? You wish to do some intensive training with your Snivy? Well then, I shall oblige! Prepare to be defeated!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_1201_0400_10: Wh-what’s going on?! It’s like you’ve totally become the character you play in the movies!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0101_0100_10: I knew this day would come! I procured this Zoroark for that very purpose!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0100_10: How? How did you manage to brush aside ME, Brycen-Man, and my mighty Zoroark so easily? I underestimated you, Snivy-Girl...
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0200_10: Brycen, you don’t have to keep up the act anymore! You came here to battle for Snivy and my sake, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0300_10: I...I have no idea what you’re talking about! F-farewell, Snivy-Girl!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0400_10: Whoa! Snivy, are you about to evolve?! I just felt this sudden rush of power!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2311_0501_0500_10: This is amazing! Promise me we’ll always be together, even after you evolve!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0100_10: Rosa, I’m confident your Servine still has plenty of room to grow. So come on! Let’s battle it out and see what he can do!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0200_10: Yes! Of course I’ll battle you! You and Onix are as strong as rocks,  though, so we’ll give it our best shot!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_1201_0300_10: I’ve been wanting to fight in an all-out one-on-one battle with you for a long time! Come on—let’s do this!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0101_0100_10: Just see if you can get past the impenetrable wall of my rock-solid willpower and my Onix’s rock-hard armor!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0101_0200_10: Don’t hold back! Come at me with everything you’ve got!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0100_10: Man! Your power smashed right through our rock-solid defense!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0200_10: Thanks! I had so much fun battling against you and Onix!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0300_10: It was fun for us, too. We should do this again sometime.
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0400_10: We did it, Servine! Brock was right— I think you’re gonna continue to get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0101_00_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_00_mei/2312_0501_0500_10: Whoa! Hold on. Are you evolving?! This is amazing! Promise me we’ll always be together, even after you evolve!

charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] was in the forest one day, taking a nice, leisurely stroll...
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_0200_20: when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came across a Delibird.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_0300_20: The Delibird didn’t even seem to notice [Name:PlayerNickname ] and continued picking things up from the ground...
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_0500_10: Don’t disappear on me like that! I was looking everywhere for you!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_0600_10: Oh, hey! I didn’t see you there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_0800_10: Hide-and-seek... Is that what you were doing, Delibird? I suppose there are a lot of hiding places here among all these trees.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_0900_10: Huh? Wait a minute... I feel like Delibird’s tail looks heavier than when we started out.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_1000_10: She wasn’t playing hide-and-seek! She must have been picking things up and putting them in her tail!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_1200_10: Delibird and I were taking a walk, but then she just disappeared on me.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_1300_10: It looks like something caught her eye and she started picking things up. Did you find anything nice, Delibird?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_1500_10: Oh wow, such a pretty Berry! Is it for me?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_1600_10: Delibird have a habit of sharing their food with other Pokémon and people.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_1700_10: It looks like she came here to gather Berries to eat.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0301_1800_10: Maybe she wants to give you a present.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_1900_10: Delibird...did you want to come to the forest so you could get this gift for me?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_2000_10: Oh my gosh, you are way too precious! I’m so happy I could cry!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_2100_10: Thank you, thank you, thank you, Delibird!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0302_2200_10: Do you think it’s just natural behavior?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_2300_10: Well, if it isn’t from habit, what could it...
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_2400_10: Wait! I gave her some cookies I baked earlier, so maybe she wanted to give me a present in return!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_2500_10: Thank you sooo much, Delibird! You’re so thoughtful! I love it!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_2600_20: Delibird held out another Berry for [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_2700_10: It looks like she wants to give you a present, too! Go ahead—take it!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_2800_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] took the Berry that [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was offered.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_2900_10: *giggle* Delibird always amazes me with how  thoughtful she is.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3000_10: Siebold told me that if I learn the true meaning of hospitality from Delibird, it would improve my cooking skills.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3100_10: I think I understand what he meant. Delibird always works so hard for others, after all!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3200_10: I hope I can become a better cook so I can use food to make all my friends happy!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3300_10: But that being said... Hey, Delibird?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3400_10: Don’t go running off like that anymore, all right? I was worried sick about you!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3500_10: Delibird always moves to the beat of her own drum.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3600_10: I think she’s always thinking of the next way she can help somebody.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3700_10: Maybe if I become a better cook, I can relate to her better.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3800_10: Do you think there’s another way I might be able to become more like her?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0301_3900_10: Why don’t you pretend to be a Delibird?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_4000_10: That’s an amazing idea! Did you know I’m great at impressions?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_4200_10: How to be more like Delibird... More like Delibird... What if I acted like her?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4300_10: Yeah! I can pick up Berries along with her!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4400_10: We can gather them up and then go around handing them out as presents to everybody!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4500_10: What do you think, Delibird? Isn’t that a great idea?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4600_10: Let’s go spread some cheer together!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4700_10: Delibird seems like she’s on board!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4800_10: Oh, and I’ll have a present for you, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ], so look forward to it!

charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1101_0: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was doing some shopping downtown, a fun, flashy apparel shop caught [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] eye.

[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] paused for a moment, mesmerized by the trendy outfits on display, until [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] noticed Elesa and Zebstrika out of the corner of [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] eye.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_0: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Didn’t think I’d run into you here! Are you shopping for some new clothes?
You could be pretty dazzling with a little touch-up here and an accessory there...
I’d love to style you one day, if you’re up for it.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0401_0: Well, yeah. Modeling is busy work! Right now, I’m trying to find the designer of those sygna suits I keep hearing about.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0302_0: Are you here to shop, too?
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0402_0: No, I’m technically here for work. I’m trying to find the designer of those sygna suits I keep hearing about.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_1: They’re ALL the rage on Pasio right now.
Sygna suits are special... They bring out the unique sparkle of every single sync pair that wears them.
But you know what? The clothes don’t make the person. A fancy outfit is meaningless if the person underneath it has no shine of their own.
That’s why I’ve gotta sparkle so bright that I outshine any sygna suit!
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0401_1: Aww! Thanks, sweetie. I couldn’t be happier if that’s how you see me!
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0402_1: Of course you do, sweetie! All you have to do is be yourself. You can put on fancy clothes, too, but it’s your individuality that really shines.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_1: When it comes to the world of fashion, I’m in the spotlight.
I basically turn people’s dreams into reality, so the trends follow me wherever I go... and I just keep on doing what I do.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_2: Sometimes I get so caught up in speeding along that I don’t realize I’ve left people behind.
But Zebstrika’s always right there keeping pace with me. I know that without even having to turn around and check!
Nah, that’s a lie... Whenever I start to slow down, Zebstrika always zooms right past me.
She’s a good rival—always keeping me on my toes. I can’t let my guard down around her.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0401_2: Oh, absolutely! But it’s more than that. We’re sync pairs, so we’re always in sync.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0302_2: Aren’t you supposed to be partners?
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_0402_2: Of course! We’re a sync pair, so we’re always in sync, even if one of us is racing ahead.
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_2: No one can beat us when it comes to comedic timing.
For example, I have this joke that I like to tell: “What do you call a storm of Pokémon?”
charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_00_kamitsure/2301_1201_3: And when I say the punchline: “A Pokémonsoon,” Zebstrika creates a bolt of lightning and it always gets us a bunch of laughs!
It’s all about timing—ask any good comedian. That’s why our combo is so shockingly funny!

charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_1101_0: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking down the street, a Rotom suddenly popped out of nowhere in front of [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] face.
Rotom then jumped into a nearby electronic sign!
A moment later, an arrow appeared on the sign.
Curious, [Name:PlayerNickname ] began heading the way the arrow was pointing... until [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard the buzz of an error message.
When [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] started to walk the other way, [Name:PlayerNickname ] didn’t hear the buzzer. [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] wondered if this was one of Rotom’s pranks.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_1201_0: Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Welcome to my sygna suit debut!
*giggle* I really wanted you to see my new outfit.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_0401_1: Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You made this a really fun show.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_0402_2: Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You made this a really fun show.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_1201_2: The person who designs all the sygna suits handed this one to me out of the blue.
He said that he designed it just for Rotom and me and that he would be honored if I would wear it.
I was so surprised, but it’s nice to have my own sygna suit. It feels great to have something that’s one-of-a-kind!
You know, ever since coming to Pasio, I’ve been feeling a little anxious… Like I’m not sure what I’m supposed to be doing.
I mean, look around! There are so many amazing sync pairs wherever you look!
All the battles in the PML are so dazzling.
Surrounded by Trainers like Sabrina and Fantina, I started to feel like they had a sparkle in them that I could never have.
That’s when I realized how competitive I am.
I want to give people a performance they’ll never forget—a show that I, and only I, can give them.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_1201_3: This outfit symbolizes Rotom’s and my first step toward our new goal!
But you know, there’s something mysterious about these sygna suits, isn’t there? I feel like I’m totally connected with Rotom.
Oh, speaking of, I asked Rotom to find you and bring you over here...
Hope it didn’t cause any mischief.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_0402_3: That look on your face... It did, didn’t it?
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_1201_3: Haven’t I told you it’s not nice to play pranks on people?
Sorry about that. I just want you to know that Rotom didn’t mean any harm.
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_1201_4: It’s a mischievous little knucklehead, but that’s what makes it all the cuter!
Sure, it can be a handful, but thanks to that, every day is always so much fun.
Rotom and I will be the best entertainers... whether in fashion or in Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_0401_4: Yeah! I know Rotom and I can shine brighter than anybody!
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_0302_4: I’m sure you’ll dazzle our socks off!
charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0106_10_kamitsure/2301_0402_4: Yeah! I know Rotom and I can shine brighter than anybody!

charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1101_0100: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a stroll with [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon along the beach when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came upon a peculiar sync pair.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1101_0200: The two of them appeared to be roping off  an area of the beach for themselves...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0300: Hey, you! Stop right there! This is MY beach! Go away!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0400: Uhh... Was I not clear the first time?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0500: The sand here is super soft. It doesn’t hurt at all when you fall down on it.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0600: So I’m turning this area into a training ground  for me and my Tepig! Right now! Got it? We’re claiming this sand!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_0900: Hey! What do you think you’re doing over there?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1000: Leave [Name:PlayerNickname ] alone! If you want a battle, you can battle with me!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1100: Hmph... A Starmie? That wouldn’t be good for my Tepig...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1200: Ugh. Fine, whatever! I guess you can have this spot, then! Go on, take it! It’s yours!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1300: Phew... I think she’s gone. I can’t believe she picked a fight with you like that!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_1600: I’m glad nothing bad happened.  But even if it did, I’m sure you could  have taken them down in a pinch.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0302_1700: Yeah. I’ll take care of the next one!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_1800: All right! You probably could have  wiped the floor with that sync pair just now,  even if I hadn’t shown up.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_1900: I kinda wish she would’ve stuck around a little longer! I would’ve liked to chase her off with a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2000: See, the Starmie I have here is actually different from the one I used to battle with at my Gym.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2100: I left that Starmie at a Pokémon Day Care for a little while, and the Pokémon Breeders found an Egg! That’s where this Starmie hatched from.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2200: It’s not very experienced yet,  so I want to let it battle as much as I can.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_2300: It’s definitely making progress, though! The poor thing had a lot of trouble before it evolved, back when it was a Staryu...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_2500: Where do I begin? Sometimes it would fire its Bubble Beam at the ground, and the recoil would send it flying backwards...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0401_2600: Or it would try to tackle its opponents with a big jump, only to end up wedged into the sand because it overestimated the distance...
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0302_2700: Is it a lot stronger now?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_2800: It’s getting there, little by little! We still work really hard with our day-to-day training.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_2900: I’m always surprised by how peppy this Starmie is!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_0402_3000: It never gets discouraged, even when we’re  doing really intense training drills. It’s amazing!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3100: In any case, I want to do my best to make sure my special pal here grows up nice and strong!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3200: I feel like I owe it to my old buddy Starmie for sticking with me through all those battles back at the Gym.
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3300: By the way, if you ever need our help with anything, don’t hesitate to ask, OK?
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3400: It’s all great training for Starmie in the end! And  helping people and Pokémon is super important!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3500: Helping you would make me really happy! I love supporting younger Trainers like you almost as much as I love raising up Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0110_00_kasumi/2301_1201_3600: Either way, Starmie and I are looking forward to having tons more fun together from here on out! It’s gonna be great!

charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1101_0100: One day, as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around the crowded streets of Pasio, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] ran into a familiar face.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_0300: Fancy running into you in this hustle and bustle!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_0400: With so many people around, Dragonite might just want to take to the skies.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_0402_0800: Yeah, he has an endearing face, doesn’t he? But don’t let that baby face fool you! He’s really strong when it counts!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_0900: He’s got a heart of gold, though. Whenever he sees people or Pokémon in need, he helps them without a second thought.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1000: But on the other hand, he doesn’t pull any punches against wrongdoers!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1100: See, I think it’s important that Pokémon and people are able to spend their days in peace no matter the time or place.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1200: And if there’s anybody who threatens that peace, I intend to be right there to protect it along with Dragonite!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1300: Aaah! Thief! Give me back my Poké Ball!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1500: Heh! Try catching me in this crowd, loser!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1600: Speak of the devil... [Name:PlayerNickname ], could I ask you for your help?
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_1900: Aaugh! No! Please don’t hurt me!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2000: You thought you could get away with stealing in front of me?!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2200: No need for thanks. I’m just glad that you’re all right. Here’s your Poké Ball back.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2300: No, you really helped me back there! Thank you so much!
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2400: Well, I couldn’t abandon somebody in need.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2500: I’m sure Dragonite felt the same way.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2600: Also, it might be a little meddlesome of us, but wanting to help future Trainers is in our nature.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2700: I know from that battle earlier that you have quite a lot of potential.
charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0111_00_wataru/2301_1201_2800: I look forward to battling alongside you more in the future!

charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1101_0100: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] got lost while walking through the forest.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1101_0200: Stomach growling, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] kept wandering until [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ]  ran into Ethan and a hiker.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_0300: Oh, hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Fancy running into you out here!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0401_0500: That’s not good... Don’t worry, though! We can tell you the way back!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0401_0600: You must be hungry! Give us a few minutes,  and we’ll whip up something to eat.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0402_0800: Yikes! Are you OK?! You must have gotten lost.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0402_0900: Give us a few minutes, and we’ll whip up something to eat!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1000: I just met up with my friend here. We were just about to have a snack ourselves!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1100: Ethan and I are camping buddies, you see? He may be young, but he knows his way around the forest. A real survivalist, this one!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1200: Haha! Luckily, there were a lot of mushrooms and Berries near camp!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1300: Apparently, it’s not against the rules to pick food like this on Pasio! How swell is that?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_1400: Of course, taking too much is just bad manners!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0301_1500: Wow, your friend was right! You are an outdoor expert!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0301_2000: How would you recommend cooking them?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0401_2100: Well, eating them raw and really savoring the flavor is nice, but if I were to choose a way to cook them...
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0302_2200: Do we have to eat them raw?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_0402_2300: A little uneasy eating them like this? All right! Then I’ll show you my favorite cooking method!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2400: Roasting these ingredients on Cyndaquil’s back cooks them perfectly!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2500: Cyndaquil’s the best partner to have around!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2600: Not only is he great in a Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2700: I can cook food on his back, and he lights the way when it’s dark!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_2900: All right! Now let’s put these on the fire!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3000: I think we’re good to go!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3400: Freshly picked and freshly cooked. It’s good, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3500: Let’s throw some more stuff on the fire!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3700: What a big mushroom! And that texture is fantastic!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_3900: We even have Berries for dessert! Take as many as you want!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4000: Oof, I’m stuffed! Thanks for the food!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4100: Now that we’re full, you said you were lost, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4200: That’s right! I can tell you how to get back.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4300: Hmm, it looks like it might get dark on the way back. Why don’t we all go together?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4400: We know the way back perfectly!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4500: Besides, with Cyndaquil providing light, we should be able to navigate the forest just fine!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4600: You just keep saving the day, don’t you, buddy!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4700: As long as you have the right knowledge and friends, adventures out in the wild can be really fun!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2301_1201_4800: It’s really rewarding to explore Pasio... Maybe we can go exploring together next time!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_1201_0100: Are you practicing golf, miss? That’s really cool! Can I try, too?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_1201_0200: Oh, are you interested in golf? I’d be happy to teach you.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_1201_0300: Awesome! And let’s have a Pokémon battle afterward! Do we have a deal?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0101_0100: Behold our graceful skills and moves!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0100: Whew! Battling with you was like a refreshing breeze! Thank you.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0200: I had tons of fun, too! Now, let’s practice golf— Hm?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0300: It looks like your partner Pokémon just caught a tail wind. This is a sign that Cyndaquil is ready to evolve.
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0400: You’re gonna get even stronger?! You really are the best partner, Cyndaquil!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2311_0501_0500: This means we can have tons more adventures together!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_1201_0100: Hah! Looks like your Quilava’s about to turn up the heat!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_1201_0300: No matter the plight, even affright, I will light up bright the more I fight. What am I?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0101_0100: The answer...right after this Pokémon battle! Hah!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0100: That was a good battle! You have a lot of potential to get even hotter!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0200: I figured out the answer! It’s...
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0300: Did you figure out the answer, too, Quilava?
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0400: Ah, I see! Your Quilava showed the answer!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0500: Lights up bright the more it fights... The answer is...Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0600: We should tell Blaine thanks for helping you evolve!
charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0112_00_hibiki/2312_0501_0700: Let’s have more and more battles and get stronger than ever!

charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1101_010: [Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Sabrina on the beach, silently facing her Alakazam with her eyes shut.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1101_020: She seemed to be in such deep concentration that she did not even react to [Name:PlayerNickname ] approaching.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_060: I’ve been wanting to talk to you.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_090: Let’s talk a bit. You’re already here anyway.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_100: Actually...I knew that you would be coming here.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_110: I foresaw that as a possible future.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_130: It’s one of my psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_150: It’s one of my psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_160: I can see what’s going to happen before it happens—only to a certain degree, of course.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_170: I can also directly communicate with my Pokémon without using my voice during battles.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_180: I was just meditating with Alakazam so that our communication can become faster and more accurate.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0301_190: I didn’t know you could do that!
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_200: It seems like you’re impressed with this power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_220: It seems like you’re impressed with this power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_230: Do you think that psychic power is something that only a few people have?
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_240: If that’s the case, you’re mistaken. Everyone has psychic power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_260: Maybe you can’t tell the future or use telepathy...
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_270: but you can empathize with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_280: If you gain experience with your partner Pokémon and spend your days battling...
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_290: you’ll naturally build trust in your relationship and commune with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_300: I think the power that trust and bonds generate is worthy of being called psychic power.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0401_320: Don’t worry. I know you have it.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0302_330: You think I have that, too?
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_0402_340: Don’t worry. I know you have it.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_350: I had a vision of the future once.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_360: I saw you and your partner Pokémon battling as one. Your bond with each other seemed even stronger than it is now.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_370: I can’t tell whether the vision will be sometime soon...or much farther in the future.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_380: But Alakazam and I genuinely look forward to the day it happens.
charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0114_00_natsume/2301_1201_400: I have to make sure you don’t surpass us. Alakazam and I will have to meditate together a lot more from now on.

charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1101_0100: As [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was strolling through the city one day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted a group of Team Break grunts surrounding Zinnia.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_0200: Pshh! Who cares how legendary your Pokémon is! There’s more of us than there are of you, girlie! Get ready to eat dirt!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_0300: Th-think you can scare us off with a puny cry like that?! Hah! We outnumber you, like, a million to one! C’mon, crew! Surround ’em!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_0500: Whoa, look at you! Full points for that sweet, heroic entrance!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0302_0600: You’ll have to fight me first!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0402_0700: Whoa, look at you! Full points for that sweet, heroic entrance!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_0800: Hah! Think you can boss me around, twerp? Hope you like the taste o’ dirt, ’cause now you’re gonna eat it, too! Let’s get ’em!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1100: [Name:PlayerNickname ] didn’t rescue ME with that heroic entrance... [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] rescued all of you.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1200: I was ready to beat you crooks to a pulp...
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1300: but I’d rather not scar [Name:PlayerNickname ] with a grisly image like that, so it looks like you’re off the hook today.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_1400: You should thank [Name:PlayerNickname ]. [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] came just in the nick of time.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_1800: Wait! You weren’t worried about me, were you? I’m totally fine.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0402_2000: Wait! You weren’t worried about me, were you? I’m totally fine. No harm done.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2100: Those thugs thought they were gonna steal Rayquaza, if you can believe that. Hah!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2200: I wonder if crooks like them ever felt a sense of duty in the past. It does seem unlikely...
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2300: but if a sense of duty were betrayed somehow... Well, I could see how that might lead someone down the wrong path.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2400: But I guess that’s really none of my business.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_2500: What about you? Have you ever thought about what your duty could be?
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_2700: Really? I’m curious! You’ll have to tell me all about it sometime.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0302_2800: I don’t really think I have a duty.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0402_2900: That’s totally OK, too. To be honest, I think that’s how most people feel.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3000: As for me...I believed that I had a duty once—a mission of great importance.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3100: I jumped through every hoop imaginable to fulfill that duty, trying everything I could think of.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3200: But in the end, the person who accomplished it wasn’t even me.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_0401_3400: I had a duty that I thought was mine, but it was actually another Trainer who fulfilled it in the end.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3700: The point is, we can believe our purpose is one thing with every fiber of our being, but sometimes we’re wrong. And that’s OK.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_3900: Right now, I’m just trying to figure out what I want to do next—or what I SHOULD do next.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4000: Seems like coming to Pasio might have been a step in the right direction.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4100: Getting to encounter Rayquaza under totally different circumstances than before—and actually getting to partner up with it this time...
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4200: It’s giving me a lot to think about, y’know? I want to take some time to chew over what my and Rayquaza’s next move should be.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4300: It’d probably be good for you to start thinking about what you ought to do in the future, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4400: Think it through well and good, OK?
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4500: The world’s unpredictable. You never know what’s gonna happen one day or the next.
charaepi_ch0129_00_higana_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0129_00_higana/2301_1201_4600: That’s why we’ve gotta use our imagination! To figure out how to fulfill our role in the world, no matter what happens!
