charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1101_010: This is the story of when Professor Oak and [Name:PlayerNickname ] first met Mew.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0401_040: I’m checking out all the sync pairs gathered in the Pokémon Center.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0402_060: Don’t you fret. I had plenty of different Pokémon to study. It was quite enjoyable, hardly a wait at all.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_070: But going out exploring is a surefire way to find even more interesting Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_080: Hm! I’m so excited, I don’t believe I’ll be able to sit around much longer. What do you say we get going, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0301_090: Do you have a partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0401_100: Of course I have a partner Pokémon! Have a look at my faithful partner!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0302_110: What kind of Pokémon is your partner?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_0402_120: Well asked! This is my partner Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1101_130: Professor Oak sent out his Nidorino!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_140: What do you think? With Nidorino by my side, no one can say we aren’t a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6201_1201_150: With that settled, it’s time to do some exploring! There’s no need to wait when there are new sync pairs for us to meet.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_010: Hah! Could that be Professor Oak I see?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_020: Indeed, I am that very same Professor Oak. Oh? That head... Could it be?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_030: I’m the hotheaded Blaine! I used to do Pokémon research with Professor Fuji!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_040: What luck! The accomplished Professor Oak will surely understand what I have to say.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_050: Actually, I spotted a strange Pokémon in this forest not too long ago.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_060: I’m certain the number one Pokémon researcher might be able to discover that mysterious Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0301_070: What kind of Pokémon was it?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0401_080: Hmm... Truthfully I didn’t get a very good look at it. It disappeared as soon as I realized it was there.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0401_090: At any rate, it was a very mysterious Pokémon. I don’t have all the evidence yet, but...I think it could be a Mythical Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0302_100: Could it be a Mythical Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0402_110: Hmm... There’s no conclusive proof yet, but I agree that that is a possibility.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0402_120: At any rate, the mysterious Pokémon disappeared the moment after I first noticed it!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_130: I’ve heard that there are no wild Pokémon on Pasio. Which would mean...
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_140: I’ve been looking into it on my own for a while now, but this is fantastic! Professor! Please give me a hand!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_1201_150: Leave it to me! What do you think about all this, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Care to lend a hand?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0301_160: I’d like to see that Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0401_170: Hoho! Then it’s time to check out a Pokémon that’s never been seen on Pasio before! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6202_0402_190: Hoho! Then it’s time to check out a Pokémon that’s never been seen on Pasio before! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_010: Aw, man! My cover was totally blown thanks to your Gengar, Granny.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_020: For a youngster, you whine just like that old geezer! It wasn’t Gengar’s fault at all!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0401_040: Heh, that’s right. Looks like we meet again, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0402_060: That’s right! I’m Agatha, of the Indigo Elite Four!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_080: That’s my line! What’s an old duff like you doing way out here?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_090: Hm. Well, we heard there was a strange Pokémon around these parts. We decided to look into it for ourselves.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_100: Even on Pasio, it’s nothing but research and more research with you. Feh! How irksome.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_110: What I mean is that this is Pasio!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_120: This is where sync pairs battle in the PML to find the strongest sync pair of them all.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_130: You doddering old duff! Long ago you were a great Trainer. Surely you must still feel some passion for battle!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_140: What’s more, you’ve got a partner Pokémon with you! Do you really not feel anything?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_150: She’s got a point, Gramps! We’re on Pasio, after all. How about a battle?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_160: I’d like to see just how good of a Trainer you are for myself!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_170: Seeing all the different sync pairs and their passion for battling on Pasio has certainly reminded me of the old days.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_180: But now is not the time for that.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_190: Somewhere in this forest lurks a Pokémon that shouldn’t be on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_200: This is positively mysterious! Aren’t you even the least bit curious?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_210: Feh... You sure have become a boring old researcher.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_220: It seems I’ll just have to make you remember what a real battle is like! Right here, right now!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_230: Well, for a doddering old duff, you’ve still got some fight left in you.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_240: No kidding! You might even stand a chance in the PML if you tried, Gramps!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_250: Oh! What was that just now?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_1201_260: Don’t go making a fuss! There’s nothing there.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0401_280: Right. [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s get a move on!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6203_0402_300: Right. [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s get a move on!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_020: It...it can’t be. I never thought it’d be here, of all places.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_030: Hey, Gramps. Am I seeing this right? Is that really...
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_040: Yes. There’s no mistaking it. That is Mew!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_050: But why is it here on Pasio? Pasio shouldn’t have any wild Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_060: Which means it’s someone’s partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_070: We four aren’t the only Trainers on this island, you know.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0301_080: What if it isn’t a partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_090: Mew has been seen by only a very few people. It’s referred to as a Mythical Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0302_100: What kind of Pokémon is Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_110: Mew is called a Mythical Pokémon. Few have ever even caught a glimpse of it.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_120: What’s the problem, you old geezer?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_130: Seems the great Pokémon Professor is speechless and quaking in his shoes.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_150: What’s going on? I’ve never seen Gramps like this before.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_160: Really? I know that look quite well.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_170: He gets overwhelmed with excitement and his heart is truly touched when he comes across a Pokémon that hasn’t been seen on Pasio before.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_180: Oh ho! That’s quite the expression! It reminds me of how you used to be back in the old days!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_190: So, what are you going to do? Don’t tell me you’re satisfied just with seeing Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0302_220: Mew looks like it wants to play!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_240: You’re right. I guess it’s time I go all out.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_250: Not as a professor, but as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_260: I’m going to challenge Mew to a battle!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_270: Talk about bottomless energy! Mew seems like it could take on a whole crowd of opponents and still want more afterwards!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_280: More than battling, it looks like it’s just playing and having fun!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_290: Yes. Mew’s nature, its habits, and just about everything about it are all shrouded in mystery.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_300: However, having a battle with it has allowed me to unravel at least one of those mysteries today.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_310: Mew’s DNA is said to contain the genetic code of every Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_320: It’s believed that that’s why it can use any move.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_330: That’s why Mew used so many different moves in our battle!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_340: How was it? Did it fire up your passion as a Trainer again?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0301_360: Maybe Mew wants to battle again?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_370: Hoho! Well, you certainly are a lively one, Mew!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_380: If you want to battle so much, why not come along with me, Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0302_390: Mew looks like it wants to play more!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_400: Hoho! Well, you certainly are a lively one, Mew!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_410: If you want to battle so much, why not come along with me, Mew?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_430: Hehe, Gramps! It’s just like you said. Mew wants to go along with you!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_440: Mew seemed really happy with how closely you were studying its moves in battle.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_450: Nice going, Mew! This way, Gramps has to take part in the PML!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_460: Seems I can’t afford to slack off now. I’ll need to prepare if I want to beat you, Oak.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_470: Mew... Do you really want to become my partner Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0401_490: I never thought this was how today was going to turn out.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_0402_510: I never thought this was how today was going to turn out.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_520: I suppose I’ll have to do my best!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_530: Thanks to Mew, I was reminded of just how fun Pokémon battles can be.
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_540: It might not be bad to enjoy a few more Pokémon battles while we’re at it!
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_550: By the way, I’d like to ask something of you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_560: Would you mind putting us on your team?
charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0137_00_orchid1/6204_1201_610: Well then, I think we’d best get back to town for some training! If we’re going to compete, we may as well try to be the best!

charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_0100: Such vastness... Humanity cannot even begin to compare to the enormity of the ocean.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_0400: How about it? Come gaze at the ocean with me.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_0600: Well, you’re a cautious one, aren’t you. Won’t approach me that easily, huh?
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0301_0700: You’re a bad person, aren’t you.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_0800: Heh. You certainly have guts, talking to me like that.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_1000: Don’t worry too much about it. I’m just enjoying the view right now.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1100: I understand that you don’t trust me. It’s not like you’re hiding it.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1200: You’re right in thinking that I’m not a good man. But I take no pleasure in hurting people for no reason.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1300: Especially Trainers who show so much promise, such as yourself.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1400: You don’t have anything to worry about...for now.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_1600: Hmph. Just up to one of my sinister plans.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_1800: Hmph. Just up to one of my sinister plans.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_1900: And Mewtwo is my ultimate tool for realizing those plans.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2000: Ah, look at the rage in your eyes!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2100: It must really bother you that I call Pokémon tools.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2200: I wonder how angry you would be if I were to make you and your Pokémon into accessories to my misdeeds.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2300: You wouldn’t let that slide, would you?
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_2500: I like your gusto, kid! I knew you had something special about you!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0302_2600: You’d never get away with it!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_2700: I like your gusto, kid! I knew you had something special about you!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2800: I have great expectations for your future.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_2900: The two of you will undoubtedly become strong enough to oppose me someday.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3000: Hmph. I look forward to that day. Will you be an obstacle that hinders me...?
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3100: Or maybe you’ll join me and willingly become my tool.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0401_3300: Hmph. We’ll see... We have plenty of time until then.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_0402_3500: Hmph. We’ll see... We have plenty of time until then.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3600: I’m looking forward to seeing what you do with your future.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3700: But until that day, you and I are just Trainers.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3800: I’ll keep on exploring with you, for the time being.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_3900: What were we talking about again? Right, gazing at the ocean.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4000: Take a good look while you can, kid.
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4100: Before you know it, everything you see here will belong to me!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4200: If you want to win it all back from me...
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4300: you’d better not hold anything back when you battle me!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4400: I like those who show strength!
charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0140_00_sakaki/2301_1301_4500: I sincerely look forward to you becoming strong enough to face me!

charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1101_010: As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around the city, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] came across a crowd.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1101_020: Fantina appeared to be mesmerizing everyone with her dancing.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_040: Merci beaucoup for watching my dance, my friends! I had so much fun!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_050: If you ever have the time, come see me dance again, s’il vous plaît!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_110: Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I did not see you there!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_120: I must have been too lost in dancing!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_130: There were so many people as well, yes?
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_140: So many people come to watch when I practice my dancing!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0401_170: But sometimes, I get to dance with a partner!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0402_190: Oh, merci, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I am so happy to hear you say that!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0402_200: I would love for everybody who watches me dance to feel joy in themselves.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0402_210: And if they have joy watching me, I am happy watching them!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_220: It would be great if I have somebody to dance with, but ce n’est pas un problème even if I am alone!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_230: Because to dance is always fun!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_250: Non pardon, not just when I dance.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_260: Mismagius is with me for all the time!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_270: Ever since I met Mismagius, I studied so much about Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_280: And the more I learned about her, the more she...
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_300: Mismagius began to dance along with me!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_310: The instant I saw her dancing so happily...
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_320: I knew that we were true partners. C’était le destin!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_370: I would be delighted if you are getting lost in la danse with us!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_380: Mismagius and I will teach you! We shall have much, much fun!

charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1101_0100_2: One day, as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was searching for challengers on the boulevard...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1101_0200_2: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] suddenly found [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] face-to-face with Glacia.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_0300_1: Well, hello there. You look like you’re positively itching for a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_0400_1: While I admire your enthusiasm, you should know that battling isn’t the only way to hone your skills.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0401_0600_1: Certainly not! Intensive training can be quite effective as well!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0402_0800_1: Why, intensive training, of course! It can be quite effective!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_0900_1: Since my dear Glalie is vulnerable to heat, I’ve designed a training regimen that focuses on that.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1000_1: I think your Pokémon could benefit as well. Would you care to join us?
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0401_1200_1: Oh, I do love your enthusiasm. Please, follow me right this way...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0302_1300_1: Sounds like a piece of cake!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0402_1400_1: Oh, I do love your enthusiasm. Please, follow me right this way...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1600_1: Did you think I would bring you to a snowy mountaintop?
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1700_1: Glalie thrives in the freezing cold, so training in a place like that would be pointless for us.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1800_1: No... We choose to train in the climates we’re most vulnerable to. That’s what makes it so effective.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_1900_1: Well, shall we begin? We’ll start off gently...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2000_1: After all, this training regimen isn’t just for our Pokémon, it’s for us as well.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2100_1: First, let’s see how well you do in this sweltering heat when forced to act quickly on a decision.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2200_1: If the heat is feeling like it’s a bit too much for you, you could always let Glalie cool you down...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2300_1: but if you end up frozen stiff, he may just crunch you right up in his jaws!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_2400_1: Come on, Glalie! Give us your Ice Beam!
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0401_2600_1: My, what spectacular reflexes! You managed to dodge the Ice Beam perfectly.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_0402_2900_1: My, my! You knew Glalie would miss right from the beginning, didn’t you?
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3100_1: Well done! I think I may have worked up a bit of a sweat.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3200_1: So many excellent sync pairs have made their way here to Pasio...
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3300_1: but there are a few among them who seem extra promising. I can’t help but want to butt in and give them advice.
charaepi_ch0153_00_prim_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0153_00_prim/2301_1201_3400_1: I’ve taken it upon myself to help rear the next generation of talent. Hopefully someday the two of us can have a serious battle! Ohoho!

charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1101_0100_: One morning, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='himself' F='herself' ] heading toward the sound of a commotion.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1101_0200_: There appeared to be a dispute between Trainers.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_0300_: What’s the problem? I’m asking you for a battle!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_0400_: When Trainers’ eyes meet, they’ve got to have a Pokémon battle! That’s just common sense!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1101_0500_: An unsavory-looking sync pair seemed to be challenging someone who wasn’t interested in a battle.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_0700_: That Trainer’s been going around challenging anyone and everyone to battles, without any care about how they feel.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_0900_: That Trainer’s been going around challenging anyone and everyone to battles, without any care about how they feel.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1000_: Huh? What’s your deal? You wanna have a battle?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1100_: Oh... I was hoping you’d have a Pokémon battle with me...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1200_: What an incredibly cute Trainer you are.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1300_: Wh-what?! Where’d that come from all of a sudden?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1400_: Those clothes look fabulous on you, too... I’m sure you’d look great in some of the clothes I’ve made.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1500_: Wh-what’s with you? If you keep complimenting me so much... there’s no way I won’t start to feel happy.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1600_: Oh, your partner Pokémon appears embarrassed as well. Hee hee, what a cute sync pair.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1700_: Wha—?! How?! Why?! My adorable, little Pokémon has totally lost the will to battle!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_1800_: For badness’ sake! I don’t even feel like battling anymore. Ugh! I’m heading back to my place for today.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_2100_: [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Were you worried about me? Thank you... I’m all right, though.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_2300_: [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Were you worried about me? Thank you... I’m all right, though.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2400_: My Pokémon may appear frail as the breeze and delicate as a bloom, but looks can be deceiving.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2500_: Sylveon was emitting an aura from his feelers without that Trainer noticing.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2600_: Sylveon’s aura can calm aggressive feelings. Pretty smart, right?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_2700_: I’m more than just an ordinary Trainer, you know... I’m actually...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_3000_: A Gym Leader? I am, but not here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_3200_: I’m not working as a designer on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_3400_: Oh, sorry. I got lost in thought and forgot what we were talking about for a moment. Oh, that’s right.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_3500_: I’m pretty carefree, so Sylveon and I are quite similar. We’re a good match, I think.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0301_3600_: You’re a sync pair that looks alike!
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_3700_: I’m very happy to hear you say that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_3900_: I’m very happy to hear you say that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_4000_: I’ve always wanted to be a Pokémon, and that’s reflected in the clothes I design.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_4100_: I wonder... Does that mean I’d be able to drain an opponent of their will to fight, like Sylveon does?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_1201_4300_: What do you think? Does it have any effect?
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0401_4500_: Thank goodness. Next, I think I’ll try it out in a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0157_00_mache_en.lsd.charaepi_ch0157_00_mache/2301_0402_4700_: That’s a shame. But I won’t give up trying to become a Pokémon.

charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6301_1201_0100_: Hoho! My, would you look at all these sync pairs!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6301_1201_0200_: Since we’re here, I’ll give you a lecture on any Pokémon you like. Are there any sync pairs you’re particularly interested in?
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1101_0100_: It looks like someone dropped a Poké Ball in the bushes!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_0401_0500_: Did you think that was a Poké Ball? It’s my Voltorb!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_0402_0800_: Phew! That was close! Mistaking that for a Poké Ball and grabbing it could’ve been bad!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_0402_0900_: My Voltorb will shock you if you startle it.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1201_1000_: Hoho! In this case, being shocked isn’t so bad, you know.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1201_1100_: Voltorb are known to use Self-Destruct when they’re touched. You’ve got to be very careful!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6302_1201_1200_: Could it be... Are you the real Professor Oak?
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0100_: My Vileplume is the greatest in the world!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0200_: Hmm, it truly does have some impressive petals! Vileplume are said to have some of the largest petals in the world.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0300_: But one must be very wary of their pollen. It’s best for me to observe it from a distance, I’d say.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_0400_: I’ll have Vileplume show off some of its moves for you.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0301_0500_: I want to see Poison Powder!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0302_0800_: I want to see Stun Spore!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0402_1000_: Ugh! My body feels so stiff all of a sudden...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1100_: Oh my! Here, take this medicine!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1200_: Research has its occasional dangers. I’m glad I brought along that medicine!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1300_: There are some Pokémon Professors who face down Pokémon moves themselves, but...this is inadvisable in my opinion.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_1400_: Once you understand a move, you can plan a counterattack to it! How about it? Want to see a move again?
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0301_1500_: I want to see Poison Powder!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0302_1800_: I want to see Stun Spore!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_0402_2000_: Ugh! My body feels so stiff all of a sudden...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6303_1201_2100_: Hmm... Well, I suppose as long as there’s enough medicine it’ll be all right.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6304_1201_0100_: Hoho! Off to encounter a never-before-seen Pokémon! Let’s go!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6305_1201_0100_: Perhaps that Pokémon could be a Mythical...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0100_: Inside those three Poké Balls are Pokémon!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0200_: Hm? Oh, well, that’s just something I say when these three Pokémon are together!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0300_: Ah, over there! Aren’t those our Pokémon? Hey!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0500_: What were you doing, running off like that? I’m so glad I found you!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0600_: Hm? I have never been separated from my Charmander before...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0800_: But for a second, I could’ve sworn I saw another Pokémon...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_0900_: It looks like there’s something strange going on in this forest, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We should have a closer look!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1000_: Huh? You’re right. I could’ve sworn there was one more Pokémon.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1100_: I was pretty sure there was another Charmander.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1200_: There’s no way there’s another Charmander as cute as mine around!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6306_1201_1300_: Even if there were two, I’d never mistake my partner Pokémon for any other Charmander!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6307_1201_0100_: Oh? There’s something behind that stone!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6307_1201_0300_: I thought I saw something in the shadow of that rock, but it’s already disappeared again!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6307_1201_0400_: That mysterious Pokémon must be close now! Let’s chase after it!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6310_1201_0100_: This feeling... No, no. Don’t go getting ahead of yourself now, Oak.
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6311_1201_0100_: I’ll check over here and leave that way to you, OK?
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6313_1031_0100_: Is there really no trace of a Mythical Pokémon?
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6313_1201_0100_: I just can’t seem to find that Mythical Pokémon that Blaine spoke of...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6313_1201_0200_: It’s too early to give up yet! Let’s keep searching!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6314_1201_0100_: Strange. It should’ve gone in this direction...
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6314_1201_0200_: Hey, Gramps! Quit running around so much!
charaepi_general_talk_06_en.lsd.charaepi_general_talk_06/6314_1201_0300_: It’s getting tiring for us to keep chasing after you. Give us a break for a bit... Huh?

episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4001_1101_0: A sweets festival had taken over the city for the day.
A long line of eager customers queued up in front of one of the festival’s best sellers, the famous Casteliacone from Castelia City.
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4001_1001_0: Just a little farther, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’re almost to the front! It’s been ages since I’ve had a Casteliacone. I’m so excited!
They really, really are! Watch, one bite and you’ll be addicted!
Plus, they’re made to look like Vanillite, so they’re really cute, too!
Oh, I already know what they look like! I did some research before coming here today.
I want to know how they taste. What about the texture? Are they more creamy or airy? What do you like most about Casteliacones?
Wow, I didn’t realize you were that interested! Why the sudden curiosity about Casteliacones?
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4001_1001_1: I want to figure out why certain things become popular. What is it about them that makes so many people go crazy?
It’s important to be eager to learn, no matter what the topic is. The same goes for applying that knowledge to your Pokémon battles.
You really love learning, huh! As for Casteliacones, I think tasting one for yourself will be a lot more helpful than asking me to describe them.
Plus, it’ll be more fun that way! Am I right?
I...suppose that’s true. All right, then! I’ll look forward to tasting one myself!
Hehe! Look, a gap in the line just for me! Guess today’s my lucky day!
Excuse me! What do you think you’re doing? Cutting in line is against the rules.
Who cares! What’s the big deal, anyways? You can’t expect me to wait in line for hours just for some dumb ice cream.
D-dumb ice cream? Dumb ice cream?!
Casteliacones are famous! They always sell out immediately, even in Castelia City, where they’re originally from!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4001_1001_2: Waiting in line for hours to get your hands on one is part of what makes it so delicious! You really don’t get it at all, do you?!
Sheesh! Somebody woke up on the wrong side of bed this morning...
Regardless, I won’t tolerate rule-breaking! Now march yourself right to the back of the line.
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4003_1001_0: Ugh! Fine then! I’ll go to the back of the dumb line. Happy?!
The two of you are quite strong, aren’t you... I’m impressed!
Although...your battle style is a bit on the reckless side.
What?! I wouldn’t call it reckless. How will you know if something’s gonna work or not if you don’t jump in there and give it a try?
Traveling around the Unova region taught me to take the initiative.
If you stop and think for too long, sometimes you end up missing your chance.
What I’m trying to say is that it’s good to take action! You can always reflect on things later.
That’s how I intend to raise my Tepig—from now until she evolves into a fiery Emboar!
Interesting... I guess I’ve never really thought of it that way.
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4003_0401_1: I thought you’d say that! I’ve always felt like we were pretty similar in that regard!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4003_0302_1: I prefer to think first, act later!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4003_0402_1: I knew you’d say that! Great minds think alike, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4003_1001_1: If you’re not busy at the moment, do you want to have a Pokémon battle?
I was watching you battle earlier, and now I’m itching to fight!
Oh, really? Well, maybe another battle will help Hilda see sense when it comes to the importance of good planning.
Or it’ll help Roxanne realize that taking action is more important than planning everything out!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4005_1001_0: That was awesome, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Another win for us!
My thorough planning and calm, cool analysis seem to have done the trick.
And I knocked down the competition with brute strength!
When it comes to battle style, we really are complete opposites, aren’t we...
But we managed to win despite that. I don’t understand—
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4005_1101_0: Attention all customers currently in line for a Casteliacone!
Thank you for waiting, but we’ve just sold our last cone for the day! We are now sold out!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4005_1001_0: What?! H-how could they sell out so soon?!
But we’ve waited all this time! I can’t believe we missed out.
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4005_1001_1: Shoot! I was really looking forward to having a Casteliacone today.
Um, can I help you with something?
I just thought I’d take this opportunity to perform an analysis on your Pokémon. Your battle earlier has me quite intrigued.
Huh?! Analysis? You didn’t even ask us first!
Hey, look! He’s got four Casteliacones!
Oh, these? I bought them for an experiment. I plan to feed them to Pokémon and observe their responses.
Why, do you want them? I guess I could let them go if you agree to battle me instead.
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4005_1001_2: Collecting data from your Pokémon is worth more to me than a few ice cream cones.
This will be fun. I look forward to analyzing all of the data later.
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4007_1001_0: Whoa! Whoa! You’re even more impressive than I thought!
We did it! That was some excellent teamwork!
It’s like we were totally in sync! We make such an awesome team!
The question is how, though, right? Our battle styles are still polar opposites.
Hmm, this can’t be right... My data-interpreting machine was just reading at 78% a moment ago.
Oh, don’t mind me! Just mumbling to myself... You can just ignore that number.
It seems my data analysis was insufficient to keep up with the movements and commands of you three and your Pokémon.
A sub-optimal performance indeed... I stand defeated.
Wait, are you saying we were so in sync that we broke your machine? How awesome is that!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4007_1001_1: Our styles may be totally different, but when we were battling together, it felt like something just clicked.
I’d have to collect a lot more data to be sure. I think there’s something else at work here... something that can’t be expressed in numbers.
Ah, that reminds me. Four Casteliacones in exchange for a battle, as promised.
Oh. Well, that’s unfortunate. Though that is to be expected with ice cream.
I can’t believe this... After all that buildup, I don’t even get to taste one?
Wait—pause! Melted or not, the ingredients are all still there. Melting shouldn’t change the flavor, right?!
episode_event_ch0004_00_toko_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0004_00_toko/4007_1001_2: I...guess so? Maybe? Why don’t we just come back again tomorrow and wait in line for a good, not-melted one?
We’ll have plenty of time to chat while we wait. Maybe we can get to know each other a little better!
That’s not a bad idea. Like you said before, waiting in line is part of what makes Casteliacones delicious, right?
I’m sure they’ll taste even more amazing after spending all that time with you and [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4001_1001_: Now’s our chance! Go!
Man, the timing of that last move was perfect! That was so awesome!
Let’s take a quick break and then go for another round!
Huh? Isn’t that Steven? And...Wallace?
What was that all about?! What do you think a Champion like Steven is doing all the way up here?
Wait! Maybe he and Wallace are... Nah!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4001_0401_: You’re so smart! Why didn’t I think of that? They must be doing some kinda super-secret training together!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4001_0402_: Pssh! Who cares about collecting dumb rocks? They’re probably doing some kinda super-secret training together!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4001_1001_: Come on! Let’s go follow ’em! If they ARE doing a secret training session, we can see if they’ll let us join in, too!
Gee, it’s kinda hard to see in here... [Name:PlayerNickname ], can you come and—
What do you think you’re doing here, hm?
WAHHH!!
Goodness. I didn’t think I was that scary.
Are you going to tell Wallace and me why you were following us?
Yeah... Guess that was pretty rude, huh? We were actually just trying to investigate—
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4001_0402_: The secrets to our strength, huh?
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4001_1001_: It seems word of your strength has spread far and wide, Steven. Though I’d expect nothing less from the Champion of the Hoenn League.
If there is some secret to your success, I’d be keen to hear it as well.
Well, I’m not trying to hide anything in particular. If you follow me, I may be able to teach you a thing or two.
My, my, how magnanimous of you.
See, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I told you we’d get to learn from a Champion today if we followed them!
Before we get to that, I need you to understand something...
Learning from others is great, of course, but discovering things on your own is also a key part of Pokémon battling.
It looks like there are some other Trainers in the area. Why don’t we try battling a few of them as we hike up the trail?
OK! Let’s show these big shots what we can do, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_1001_: Wha—?! How are those two not tired after all this hiking and battling?!
Well, just look at the gorgeous view we have up here! I can see for miles!
A beautiful hike like this certainly brings back memories of home, don’t you think, Wallace?
I suppose so. I mean, Sootopolis City is—
Hey, check out this stone!
Tsk... Typical Steven. Why pay attention to your good friend Wallace when there are stones to find...
H-how... We just hiked up the same trail and fought the same battles...but they look like they just took a nice walk in the park!
What makes them so different from us? Maybe they’re born with it...
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_0401_: Hmm... It IS kinda nice up here, but I think this is something else.
What if it has something to do with the stones?
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_0402_: Whoa! Yeah! You’re so smart! It’s gotta have something to do with the stones!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_1001_: If that’s the case, we should go collect some stones, too!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_0301_: I’ll take the stone on the right.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_0401_: Nice! The stone you picked is kinda cute, huh? It’s all smooth and round.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_0302_: I’ll take the stone on the left.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_0402_: Nice! The stone you picked looks kinda tough, huh? It’s all sharp and pointy.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4002_1001_: Check out this huge monster stone I picked up!
Hmm... It’s actually kinda normal looking, huh? On second thought, it’s probably not very rare...
Hey, kid! Hand over that stone if y’know what’s good for ya!
What?! Where the heck did you guys come from?!
We found these stones ourselves! They’re ours— finders keepers!
You wanna play hardball, kid? All right. That’s fine. We can do this the tough way!
Tsk... That entrance of yours was tragically cliché, gentlemen. Not to mention dull.
Whoa, hold up... Ain’t you that one Gym Leader from Hoenn?
Wh-whatever... We ain’t gonna let a measly Gym Leader stop us from—
I think it’s time for you to leave. Don’t you?
Th-th-they got the Hoenn CHAMPION, too?! Uhh... Er...
Well, what will it be, boys? If you insist on robbing my friends, you’ll have to get through me first. I can take you all on at once, if you like.
Y-you sure talk a big game! Better watch out— we’ll be back for you!
Whoa! That was so cool! All you had to do was look at those bullies, and they were running away like babies!
Well, now that that’s out of the way... That stone that you two picked up is actually—
Hahaha! Told you we’d be back for you! And this time, we brought a few buddies along for the ride!
We’ve got you so outnumbered, yo! Hope you like gettin’ pounded to dust!
Hm. Dust, he says... What do you think, Champion?
*sigh* The stone will have to wait. I have some ruffians to take care of first.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4003_1001_: There are more of them than I thought. This may take a bit longer...
Wait... Did you already defeat the rest of them?!
These grunts aren’t much of a challenge. Come on, Wallace. Let’s take care of these last few stragglers.
Man, are you seeing what I’m seeing?! Steven and Wallace as a combo are just way too good!
He’s incredible, isn’t he? Even more than the rumors make him out to be.
Eeek! What in the— Grant?! What’s going on? You nearly scared me half to death!
I’m sorry if I startled you... I couldn’t help but be impressed.
Look at Steven... He doesn’t waste a single movement with his commands, and Metagross matches him at every beat.
I feel like only a Champion could be that perfectly in sync with their Pokémon.
Oh? I’m sorry, I don’t believe we’ve met.
Ah, my apologies. I’m Grant, the Gym Leader of Cyllage City in the Kalos region.
I was just doing some rock-climbing on the cliffs over there when I spotted you all training.
When I heard the commotion, I decided to head this way to see if anything was wrong.
I didn’t expect to see such an expert display...
Well, one must come to expect this level of mastery when Steven is around.
He was particularly merciless back there, too... Perhaps it’s because his opponents were trying to steal stones.
Steven can be quite sensitive when it comes to stones. Cross him, and he turns into an entirely different person!
It seems you all lucked out today! Not everyone gets the chance to witness the sheer power of Steven and his Metagross.
Speaking of which, I trust your stone came out of this fiasco safe and sound, Barry?
Snap, I almost forgot! I’ve got it right here. I wonder why those thugs were trying to steal it in the first place. It looks pretty ordinary to me.
Can I borrow it for a moment, Barry? I think you may be surprised...
What? Whoa! Are you serious?! Look how pretty it is!
This stone may look ordinary on the outside, but it’s actually quite rare. It’s called a geode. Those are crystals on the inside.
It takes years and years for the crystals to form into something beautiful like this.
They must have brought in rock and soil from other regions when they were building up these mountains.
Pasio’s origins as an artificial island come with all sorts of surprises, it seems. I never thought I’d find a geode like this here.
It’s really incredible, if you think about it.
Whoaaa! That’s so cool! I’ve never even seen a stone like this before!
Well, the largest ones can fetch a good price in the shop, but I doubt those ruffians understand the true beauty and value of these stones.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4003_0301_: Do you have any stones like this already, Steven?
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4003_0401_: I do, in fact. I have quite a variety of rare geodes in my personal collection.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4003_0302_: Do you want this stone, too?
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4003_0402_: Oh, no. That one is for you to keep! I actually have quite a variety of rare geodes in my personal collection.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4003_1001_: If you’re curious, you can always stop by and see the collection yourself.
Pardon me, but... Um, Steven? Would it be all right if I challenge you to a Pokémon battle?
I’ve been hoping for an opportunity like this since I first heard the rumors about you.
It’s something I’ve looked forward to for a long time. What do you say?
Of course! Challenge accepted. How are you feeling, Wallace?
To be honest, a break would be nice. Barry, [Name:PlayerNickname ], this one is all yours.
All right! Let’s do this!
You’ve actually got me curious about something, Grant.
Really? What is it?
Let’s save that for after the battle, shall we?
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4004_1001_: Whew... Defeating the Champion is a wall that I am unable to surmount.
Aw, man! That was the rockiest battle I’ve been through in a long time!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4004_0401_: That’s my line! Your teamwork was amazing. Truly a sight to behold!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4004_0302_: Bet we could beat you again!
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4004_0402_: Well, I won’t let you win so easily next time. I’m going to continue to reach for the top—it will be me who triumphs when we meet again.
episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0090_00_daigo/4004_1001_: That reminds me... You mentioned you were curious about something earlier, Steven?
Yes. I wanted to ask you about the stones you use in your hair.
You know, I’ve actually been curious about the very same thing! Are those stones part of your fashion, or...?
They are! I’ve always thought they fit well with my style. There’s no special meaning behind them or anything, though.
Curious... But even if that’s the case, your placement of the stones and choice of color are brilliant!
You may not put much thought into it, but you’ve clearly breathed life into those stones.
Oh, I agree completely! It’s a wondrous hairstyle. Nothing short of beautiful!
With your fashion sense, you and your Pokémon could easily take first place in a beauty contest!
Oho! I knew it! The secret’s in the stones, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Grant was super strong, too, right? I mean, he’s a Gym Leader!
I’m right, aren’t I? The secret to your strength has to do with your stones, right?
I do have a thing for stones. You’re right about that much. But it goes deeper than that.
I travel the world in search of interesting stones, but so much happens along the journey before I ever find a single one.
I get to encounter all sorts of people and Pokémon along the way, as well as experience the beauty of nature.
My love for stones is reflected in all of those things.
So if there really is a secret key to my strength...
I’d say it’s having something I’m passionate about and appreciating all of the experiences I have as I follow my passion.
Was meeting me one of those experiences, hm?
Of course it was. Building a friendship with someone as bright and encouraging as you has been a big part of my journey.
Everyone knows that I have plenty of strength on my own in a battle.
But when I have a friend battling at my side, I can be even stronger than that.
I think we share a lot of things in common.
You’re as passionate about stones as you are about Pokémon battling, and it’s the same way with me and sports.
My love for sports is like a driving force that keeps me moving forward...
and the experience I gain along the way is something I can use in my battles, too.
So, essentially...the journey that comes with collecting stones and the experience gained from playing sports influence the way you two battle.
That! Yes! I finally get it! The secret to being strong is having something you love!
For me, maybe that’s Pokémon! Do you think my love for Pokémon can make me a super-awesome Trainer in the future, too?!
I think so. Both of you have kept up with us fairly well as we’ve battled our way up this mountain.
And you were definitely on the right track in that tussle with the masked thugs earlier, as well as in our battle with Grant just now.
If Pokémon battling is already something that you love, I’m sure you’re well on your way to becoming great Trainers someday.
So keep following your passions, all right?
Once you’re confident in your strength, you should come challenge me in Hoenn.
After all, when it comes down to it... I’m just the strongest there is right now.

episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_11: Centra City was abuzz with Trainers and Pokémon.
As usual, [Name:PlayerNickname ] didn’t have to wait long to be challenged to a battle.
This time, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] opponents looked particularly strong.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_10: C’mon, team! These guys are nothing to panic over. This battle’s gonna be ours!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_04: In the end, [Name:PlayerNickname ] won... But [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was surprised to find Caitlin watching the battle from nearby.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_03: Attack with everything we’ve got, team!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_04: In the end, [Name:PlayerNickname ] won... But [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was surprised to find Caitlin watching the battle from nearby.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_10: Well, fancy running into you here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Lovely battle.
I saw you fighting out of the corner of my eye as I was walking into town, and then I found I couldn’t take my eyes off of you.
I do have to point out one thing, though... You could stand to win your battles with a touch more elegance, if I had any say in the matter.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_04: A Trainer must always remain calm and collected. We must present an image of dignity, refinement, and grace.
A Trainer must always remain calm and collected. We must present an image of dignity, refinement, and grace.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4001_10: That, my dear, is elegance... Once you find peace and gain a bit of emotional leeway, you begin to see things you couldn’t before.
If you wish to fully utilize your skills in battle, elegance is of the utmost importance.
Hey, you two aren’t talking about fashion without ME, are you?!
I heard something about grace and elegance... Well? What’s the gossip? I want to know all the juicy details!
I think you may have misheard us. I wasn’t talking about fashion...
I was just teaching my dear friend here that elegance is of the utmost importance when it comes to Pokémon battling.
Gee, do you really think so? I guess I’ve never thought about elegance like that before... Now I’m curious!
Very well. Perhaps I can show you both how grace and elegance can elevate one’s prowess in battle...
Oh, perfect! I’ll watch super closely— Pokémon battling is all about focus!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4003_10: Well done, both of you. That battle was quite splendid.
I just focused as hard as I could, as always! It’s what I’m best at!
I don’t think I would choose the word “elegant”  to describe you in that battle...
but you certainly had an air of strength and toughness about you. I could feel your energy across the battlefield.
Oh wow! Yeah! You were probably feeling that Candice focus that I’m known for! Pokémon, fashion, romance... It’s all about focus!
My Abomasnow’s focus is always top-notch, too!
Tee-hee! It’s a style that suits you and your partner very well, I think.
I used to be unable to control my own emotions or the psychic powers I possess.
Whenever I lost a battle, they would spin entirely out of control... So much so that I was once forbidden from battling at all.
All of that changed when I began interacting with Psychic-type Pokémon. They are able to manipulate their power at will, you see.
With their help, I learned to keep my negative emotions at bay. I learned how to remain calm, elegant, and at peace in any battle.
I take great pride in my elegance, but I must admit that your focus has piqued my interest quite a bit, Candice.
Well gee, I’d still love to learn more about elegance, too! Sounds like we should do a lot more battling together!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4005_10: Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Would you say that was an elegant battle?
What about me? Did you see how focused I was?
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4005_04: Naturally. I do my best to make every battle as graceful and refined as an elegant dance.
I know, right?! I just kept telling myself there was no way I could lose—wished for it from the bottom of my heart!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4005_10: Hey! Just wanted to say your battle just now was suuuper rad!
What’s all this about elegance and focus, though? Did I miss something, or...
Ahh, I think I get it now...
You want my honest opinion? After watchin’ you guys battle...
I don’t think elegance OR focus are what’s really most important when it comes to Pokémon battling.
Well, what IS then? With enough focus, you can pretty much do whatever you set your mind to! It’s the best!
I’m interested to hear what you have to say. Do go on.
Well, in MY opinion, it’s gotta be the beat! The passion!
You start riffin’, you build up a killer rhythm, and then BAM! You smash your opponents in the face with it!
The...beat? Not focus or elegance? Can beats be elegant?
Passionate beats... Um... You’ve lost me, I’m afraid.
I guess it’s kinda hard to put it into words... Let’s just skip ’em! C’mon! I’ll make you guys FEEL what I mean instead!
I’ll show you a Pokémon battle so wild it’ll blow your mind!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4007_10: Gahh! What’s goin’ on, Roxie?! You weren’t supposed to lose!
*sigh* Guess I blew my chance at showin’ you guys what I was talkin’ about.
I wouldn’t say that. It’s true that we won the battle this time...
but you certainly made an impression! Your attacks were like a raging rapid, threatening to knock me down at any moment.
Caitlin’s right! You were seriously impressive! I felt like we were an inch from losing through the whole thing!
Really? But what about the beat? Did you feel the BEAT?!
As a matter of fact, I believe I did feel it. And after this last battle with you, I think I finally understand...
When it comes to Pokémon battling, each and every Trainer has their own belief about what is most important—it’s individual to them.
And I think that’s lovely. It’s our differences that make us so interesting.
I guess you’ve got a point. When I’m playin’ music, sometimes it’s less about the beat and more about just chillin’ and enjoyin’ myself.
Yeah! I know not everybody is as superfocused as I am...
but more often than not, it’s easy to tell when somebody really cares about their Pokémon and how much battling means to them.
In other words, a Trainer should never push others to follow their own personal methods... even if they believe they are correct.
[Name:PlayerNickname ]... It didn’t really come up in our conversation before, but after what I witnessed today...
I would say that you seem to value kindness more than anything else when it comes to Pokémon battling.
You shine with both kindness and strength in every battle you compete in... I saw that very clearly today.
I should thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. For helping me learn a valuable lesson today.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4007_03: I should be the one thanking you!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4007_04: You’re too kind. Really, I feel as though you all have shown me an entirely new world.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4007_03: It was a lot of fun!
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4007_04: Indeed. Really, I feel as though you all have shown me an entirely new world.
episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0095_00_cattleya/4007_10: Something tells me I’m going to have very sweet dreams tonight, thanks to you. I can’t wait to see what I dream about...

episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4001_1: Can you believe that the famous supermodel Elesa is putting on a fashion show right here on Pasio?!
According to my sources, she’s so popular in Unova that tickets to her shows sell out instantly!
Yaaay! I’m so excited!
Rumor has it there’s a Pasio photo shoot in the works as well...
Gyaaah! What I wouldn’t give to be a Cutiefly on the wall during Elesa’s photo shoot!
Guess you better hover around town for the next few days then, Doc. Or the Pokémon Center. Maybe you’ll get lucky and bump into her!
Who knows? If you’re in the right place at the right time, you could ask her for a selfie, dude! That’d be sick.
Y-yes, sick! Sick, indeed! As in the mere thought of bothering Elesa with such a request makes me ill...
So popular...
Elesa’s actually a close friend of mine!
She’s a super-tough Gym Leader, but she also does a ton of modeling work!
Ever since she came to Pasio, we’ve been  hanging out and chatting a lot.
Elesa sounds so cool...
I wonder if she would want to chat with me, too...
I’m sure she would! And she’s more than just cool. She has a really quirky sense of humor, too!
Quirky?
Yeah! Like, when I saw her the other day...
Throw that misbehaving Klink in the clink!
Cofagrigus is so cool! Don’t you *cough* agree, Gus?
That’s what she said to me! Quirky, right?
Are those...puns?
*giggle* Elesa likes to call them jokes, but they really are just bad puns, aren’t they?
Hehe... Maybe she’ll be easier to talk to than I thought...
Oh, Skyla! Retelling my jokes again, huh?
And who’s this new face? I hope my friend hasn’t been making a Muk-ery of me!
Hehe... Muk-ery.
*giggle* I’ve got a Magne-ton more where that came from. So, what’s your name, sweetie?
Oh, I’m...Marley. I’m a Pokémon Trainer.
Well, thanks for coming to see my show, Marley.
I hope you enjoy the glitter and glam! Have a dazzling time!
You too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Huh? What’s all the commotion about? Wait a sec... Oh no! Look!
Is that Team Break?!
Testing... Testing one, two, three! Is this mic working?
All right! Listen up, everybody! This show’s officially been hijacked by yours truly!
If you want the stage back, you gotta give us your sygna suits, too! Hand ‘em over!
But my sygna suit is one of a kind... It was designed to be a symbol of my bond with Rotom.
Even if I gave it to you—which I won’t—it’s not something just anyone can wear. You could never pull it off!
[Name:PlayerNickname ], Skyla, Marley! Could you lend me a hand?
It’s time to show these Team Break fashion victims how to make a battlefield sparkle!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4002_1: Wha—?! They just keep on coming!
It’s almost time for the show to start.
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4002_0: I suppose we could... But I was thinking... What if we go ahead and start the show now?
Why not just start the show?
Haha! I was just thinking the same thing. Come on—let’s do it! Let’s start the show!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4002_1: Skyla, would you mind giving me a hand?
With Swanna here, the stage is just a swoop away!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4003_1: No way! Is that a brand-new, never-before-seen outfit that Elesa’s wearing?!
Oh my! This new look doesn’t appear in my database at all! I believe your hypothesis may indeed be correct!
You may have noticed that I’m wearing a new design today. But it’s not just any ordinary outfit!
Its designer crafted it specifically for me so that I can shine brighter than ever before here on Pasio...
It’s my very own sygna suit!
So thanks for coming, everyone! I hope you’re as excited as I am about the debut of my all-new look today!
And with that, let’s start the show!
Wha—? When did she do a costume change?!
Oh my gosh! Elesa, you look so GORGEOUS in that sygna suit!
Hey, whose side are you on?!
Costume changes are essential to a good fashion show. The same can be said of Pokémon battles!
The stage is my battlefield, and you’ve decided to step into the spotlight today. I hope you haven’t gotten cold feet.
Of course not! I’d love to battle with you!
Again, whose side are you on here, huh?!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4003_0: Yeah, it’s time to battle! Let’s have some fun!
Right! It’s time to battle! What do you say we get this show started?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_1: How? How are you that strong?! And look what you did to my teammate...
Ahh... I can’t help but be dazzled by Elesa’s brilliance...
Seriously! What did you do to her? Ergh...
Fine then! I’ll retreat for now! But I’m gonna remember this!
Oh, totally! I mean, there’s no way you could forget the fashion show where I made my sygna suit debut with Rotom!
Um, I don’t think that’s quite what he meant...
Woo-hoo! We did it! Good riddance, Team Break! Wait a sec... What’s that?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_0: That giant arrow that just appeared on the sign over there...
A giant arrow just appeared on that sign over there...
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_1: Yeah, I think so! I wonder what it’s doing.
It looks like the arrow might be pointing down at something...
Oh! You’re right! Look, there’s another Team Break goon right where it’s pointing!
A Team Break what, you say?!
You’ve got it all wrong! I’m not a member of that loathsome crew!
What’s that mask for then, huh? Admit it! You’re a member of Team Break, aren’t you!
Wait, I think I know that mask...
*giggle* I see we have a surprise visitor today!
You’ll be a tough opponent to beat, but the show’s just getting started, after all... And there are so many people watching us.
Getting to test out my brand-new sygna suit in a  Pokémon battle against you would be a thrill! It’d definitely be a crowd pleaser!
Perhaps, but as I said before, I’m not a member of—
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_0: Let’s turn this show up to 11!
Let’s do it for the audience!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4004_1: O...K... I think I see what you’re trying to do.
All right, then. I hope you’re prepared for the power I’m about to bring to this stage!
How about some applause, people? It’s show time!
Hang on a minute... Isn’t that Will...of the Indigo Elite Four?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4005_1: Marvelous... You’re far more skilled than I gave you credit for.
Clad in a sygna suit, a Gym Leader from Unova managed to unleash a power greater than my own.
For a Team Break member, you weren’t so bad yourself!
I had complete confidence in my ability to win... But this time, I failed.
However, as I’ve already pointed out, I’m in no way, shape, or form connected to Team Break. I’m—
Will, right? Of Elite Four fame?
Correct! My name is Will, and I do happen to be a member of the Indigo Elite Four, as a matter of fact.
I’ve traveled all over the world on a journey to strengthen my Psychic-type Pokémon. We train to be the best of the best.
Since coming to Pasio, I’ve been mistaken for a member of Team Break more times than I care to count, and I’ve been challenged just as many.
Allow me to set the record straight here and now. I’m NOT with Team Break!
Do you see the exquisite curves of this mask?
How could such an elegant design as this be mistaken for what those crude bullies wear?!
Point taken...
You know, I’d heard about an Indigo Elite Four member who conceals his face.
When I saw your mask and realized you were him, I almost hesitated... The idea of going up against someone so strong made me nervous.
But I wanted to test out my strength—to see how brightly I could shine dressed in my new look with Rotom.
In the end, we came out victorious...
But you’re seriously powerful. Your fashion sense and battle prowess are so on point.
You decided to challenge me in the hopes that a battle would make your show a success, and [Name:PlayerNickname ] backed you up.
I knew that the battle had to be exciting, so as your opponent, I made sure to funnel every ounce of strength I had into the battle...
But I was defeated by the pure confidence that sparkled all around you in your sygna suit... You completely annihilated me!
Thanks, Will. That praise means a lot coming from someone like you.
*giggle* I guess that settles it then! Case closed!
Not so fast, Skyla. The show’s not over yet. We’re just getting started!
Hm? What do you mean?
Skyla, Marley, Will, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Will you stay with me until the very end of the show? I need your strength.
Are you seeking another Pokémon battle?
No, no! I want you and your Pokémon to help me build a really beautiful stage!
Oh, it’s Xatu’s and my help you require. I see... That should be no problem at all.
You can leave the catwalk to Swanna and me!
Arcanine, let’s help Elesa carry her set pieces.
Would you mind lending us a hand, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4005_0: Thank you so much! I owe you one!
Thank you so much! I owe you one!
episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure_en.lsd.episode_event_ch0106_10_kamitsure/4005_1: All right, then. Time to return from intermission and continue on with the show!
Come on! Let’s give this audience the most dazzling fashion show they’ve ever seen!

episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_10: I dunno if I’ve ever told you this before, but Pokémon battling with you is so much fun, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You make battling so exciting! I felt so giddy after that last one—
Wait! Uh-oh... I’m the one who’s supposed to be showing YOU hospitality, not the other way around!
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_04: OK... As long as it’s not just me soaking up all the fun!
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_03: Do you want to battle again?
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_04: Oh, I think I’ve had my fair share of battles for the day! Thanks, though!
episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019_2nd/4001_10: It seems like everyone had a really great time at the party in the end, too! I’m so glad I decided to host it!
I hope we can do all of this again sometime, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4001_1001_0: Hey, Maylene? Are you sure this is the spot you heard Chef Siebold would be?
Yep! My sources tell me he’s a legendary chef who’s looking for an assistant on Pasio...and my sources don’t lie!
All right, then! Let’s go find him! He should be around here somewhere...
You know, you really are amazing, Rosa!
The fact that you thought of throwing a party for all your teammates and you want to give everyone a home-cooked meal...
and you want to go study under a top-notch chef so that everything’s perfect... I mean, you’re really going the extra mile!
Y-you think so? I just figured that if I was gonna cook for everyone, I should make something tasty.
And that’s what’s so amazing about you! Let me know if there’s anything you need help with, OK?
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4001_1001_1: Thanks, Maylene! I know I can always count on you.
Anytime! I’m bummed we haven’t run into Siebold yet, though...
Hey... Did you just say Siebold?
Oh, hello! You wouldn’t happen to know where we could find him, would you?
I believe he should be just up ahead... But tell me, do you seek to train under Siebold as an apprentice as well?
Apprentice... If you’re talking about the assistant chef position, then yes!
Hmph... That changes things. I am afraid this is the end of the road for you.
Huh?! What’s that supposed to mean?
Many hopeful applicants, myself included, have traveled here today for the chance to learn the techniques of a legendary chef.
However, I heard that Siebold only wishes to take on a single apprentice... Therefore, I must kick my rivals out of the running here and now.
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4001_1001_2: No way... I’m not gonna give up and go home before I’ve even had the chance to meet Chef Siebold in person!
