Errgh! Then you leave me no choice... The path to becoming a master chef is a brutal one. Leave now, or I will strike hard and without mercy!
Come on, Rosa, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s take him on! We can’t let bullies like him go unchecked!
Besides, I’m a martial artist myself! It would be dishonorable to run away from a challenge!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4003_1001_0: A-actually, um, I’m here to apply to be your assistant chef, Siebold!
Ah, I see. I didn’t realize you were a candidate. Well then, I have one question for you...
I’ve asked this question to everyone who has applied for the position so far, and that is... why do you wish to work with me?
Well... This is something I want to do for my friends.
Yep! Rosa’s throwing a party for her friends, and she wants to serve everyone delicious home-cooked food.
That’s why I want to be your assistant chef— so I can learn to cook something fantastic!
What delightful ambition! I can tell you have a knack for service and hospitality.
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4003_1001_1: Does that mean you’ll take her on?!
Well, she’s passed the interview portion of the application, but now I’d like to see what she’s capable of in action.
In action... You mean you want me to show you what cooking skills I already have?
No, no. I’d like to see your Pokémon battling skills in action!
Huh? A Pokémon battle?! What does Pokémon battling have to do with cooking?
Everything! The two may seem different on the surface, but deep down both are forms of art that share the same philosophy.
The end results only last for a few brief, passing moments, so we devote ourselves to making those moments last in our memories forever.
So your theory is...if you watch me battle, you’ll understand my philosophy on cooking, too?
Precisely. Now, the final question is... will you indulge my curiosity?
To be honest, I’m still pretty confused about all of this, but I’ll give it a shot!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4003_1001_2: I guess my philosophy is...to always put my heart and soul into every battle. I’ll do my best!
I’d expect nothing less! Now, prove it to me in action!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4005_1001_0: What a delectable battle. Well done! Your love and passion shined through each and every move.
You’re hired! I’d be delighted to have you on as an assistant chef, Rosa.
Really?! This is so amazing! Thank you so much!
The pleasure is all mine. Now, shall we go ahead and start prepping for—
Hey there! I heard you’re in need of a talented cook!
Mallow here, at your service! I came to apply for the open assistant chef position!
Ah, another candidate! My deepest apologies, but the position has already been filled.
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4005_1001_1: What?! You already hired someone?! Aw, darn... I was really hoping I’d get the chance to train under a legendary chef...
Thank you for coming out, but I’m afraid there’s nothing I can do.
W-wait a sec! I came all this way...
Could we at least have a battle? You could do that for me, couldn’t you? I’m not asking much!
Wow, you really won’t take no for an answer, will you?
I just want to see if my skills are good enough to get the stamp of approval from a legendary chef! C’mon, pleeease?
I sense you have a very frank, forthright passion for your craft... It would be wrong of me to simply turn you away.
I accept. What sort of battle do you propose?
I want a Pokémon battle and a cooking battle... Er...cook-off? Yeah, a cook-off! And I’m gonna go all out for both!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4005_1001_2: All right. If you want to prove yourself that badly, then Rosa and I have no choice but to accept your challenge with utmost hospitality.
In fact, I had a few uniforms imported to Pasio in case a situation like this were to arise! Rosa, could you fetch them for me, please?
Let’s put them on and give Mallow here the full-service Pokémon battle she deserves!
All right. I’m ready when you are!
Time to serve up a Super Mallow Special!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4007_1001_0: Wow, this uniform’s a little...flashier than I expected.
And where’d this Delibird come from?
Huh. It must be a stowaway from the parcel our uniforms were sent in. I’m not sure how it got here...but it may be just what we need.
Hospitality is the most important quality of any good chef, and if there’s any Pokémon that knows the true meaning of hospitality, it’s Delibird.
If you spend some quality time with Delibird, its kind, charitable nature may rub off on you. It can help you grow as a chef!
Octillery has opened my eyes to a whole new realm of culinary possibility since we first met... Perhaps it will be the same for you.
The true meaning of hospitality, huh... All right! Delibird and I are gonna be best friends in no time!
Phew! You really crushed it in that battle back there. If your team were a meal, it would be a pretty tasty one!
Speaking of which, can we move on to our next battle now? Er—I mean cook-off! I’ll go prepare my dish first!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4007_1001_1: So? What do you think of my dish?! I call it the special Z-Set! Olivia and Hau are huge fans of it back in Alola.
I, uh... Um... It’s a little...different than what I was expecting.
Y-you don’t say... I can tell Mallow really put her heart into it. What else is there to say except...mmmm!
Yes. It’s certainly an acquired taste... I taste intense creativity—a flavor that immediately gets my brain buzzing.
*gasp* Goodness gracious! I just thought of a new recipe! I need to begin prepping right away.
No, wait! I lack the ingredients to fully execute it right now. First, I’ll have to gather everything I need.
Are you gonna go shopping for ingredients now? That sounds like it could take a while.
Why don’t I cook up another dish in the meantime? It’d be my pleasure!
What? Oh, no... You’re too kind.
Uhhh... I’m gonna go help Siebold with the shopping! I am his assistant chef, after all. See you later!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4007_1001_2: W-wait! I can help you, too!
Would you mind staying back to help Mallow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? We’ll be right back!
C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s get cooking! I’m feeling a Super Mallow Special coming on!
We’ll leave you two to it, then! Thanks!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_1001_0: Phew! That cook-off definitely took a turn I wasn’t expecting...
That battle was really something else, though! I feel like it sparked a new passion for cooking in me!
I’m gonna keep working hard and learn whatever I can from Siebold. This party’s gonna rock your socks off. I promise!
Here! I’ve got a little surprise for you as thanks for helping me out today!
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_0401_0: Tee-hee! You’re welcome! I was afraid you wouldn’t like it.
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_0402_1: Tee-hee! I’ve been keeping it a secret.
episode_event_christmas_2019_en.lsd.episode_event_christmas_2019/4008_1001_1: It’s thanks to you that I was able to become Siebold’s assistant chef and sync up with such an adorable new partner.
This is just my way of letting you know how superduper grateful I am!
So thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I hope you have tons of fun at my party, too!

episode_event_general_ch0004_00_toko_en..episode_event_general_ch0004_00_toko/410: Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go! Time to get our team in perfect sync, and battle it out nonstop!
episode_event_general_ch0004_00_toko_en..episode_event_general_ch0004_00_toko/420: Having different battle styles means you can cover each other’s weak points! It’s part of what makes battling on a team so great!

episode_event_general_ch0090_00_daigo_en.episode_event_general_ch0090_00_daigo/41: You look like you’ve been working hard on your battling skills. I should go do some training, or you might pass me up.
episode_event_general_ch0090_00_daigo_en.episode_event_general_ch0090_00_daigo/42: If you continue to train hard, one day you could be a Champion, too... I believe in you.

episode_event_general_ch0095_00_cattleya.episode_event_general_ch0095_00_cattleya: I could use a pick-me-up right about now. A magnificent battle or two should do the trick... Would you care to join me, dear?
Now that I’m awake, a battle would be nice.
What does it really mean to be elegant? Would you care to find out?

episode_event_general_ch0106_10_kamitsur.episode_event_general_ch0106_10_kamitsur: Guess what, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Pasio’s getting a fashion show organized by yours truly! You should come check it out.
I can’t wait to see how the stage turns out.
I absolutely live for the butterflies I get in my stomach right before a fashion show.
I hope you get to experience the euphoria of stepping out onto a catwalk someday, too. There’s nothing like it!
Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s time to strut our stuff and dazzle everyone we meet!
That was stunning, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You never fail to dazzle me with your talent!

episode_event_general_christmas_2019_2nd.episode_event_general_christmas_2019_2nd: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did you have a good time at my party?
I actually have another little surprise for you. A kind of...after party, you could say!
Can you guess what it is?
Surprise! It’s a special Pokémon battle—one that I put all my love and joy into!
Siebold and Delibird have taught me all about hospitality and taking care of others. It’s time for me to take care of you through a Pokémon battle!
I mean, I’ve been wanting to battle against you again for a while now... This gives me the perfect excuse! Tee-hee!
I’ll go get everything ready for us, OK? Meet up with you later!

episode_event_general_christmas_2019_en..episode_event_general_christmas_2019/410: Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m thinking of throwing a holiday party for everyone!
I want to have yummy food I make myself at the party, and I think I found a way to learn how to make some!
But I’m gonna need your help! What do you say? Wanna team up and spread some holiday cheer with super yummy food?!
episode_event_general_christmas_2019_en..episode_event_general_christmas_2019/420: I wanna cook some good food and make people smile!
Maylene told me there’s a legendary chef here on Pasio and he’s looking for an assistant chef right now!
What better way to learn how to cook than to be taught by a master chef?! Ready to polish your skills in the kitchen? I sure am!

episode_event_general_wataru_shirona_01_.episode_event_general_wataru_shirona_01/: I’m Lance, dragon master and Champion of the Indigo League! I never refuse a challenge!
I’m Cynthia, Champion of the Sinnoh region. It sounds like I have some interesting battles to look forward to!
Right, then... Time for our daily training session.
Seeking to be the greatest and most powerful sounds like seeking perfection... But the truth is, we always have room to grow and improve.
What should I do today... research or battle?
Seeking to better myself is much more important to me than being the strongest. And having fun while battling is the most important of all!

episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_10: Whew! I think that’s good enough for today’s training! How about we head back, Pidgeot?
Bad timing! I would have let you battle me if you’d gotten here a little sooner. Oh well.
When you’re as famous as we are, Trainers’ll challenge you every time you walk down the street! Pidgeot needs some rest now.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_03: So you do have a heart!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_04: Of course I do! What kind of Trainer would I be if I didn’t take care of my Pokémon?!
Thanks! You’ve gotta get plenty of rest if you want to be on your A game. That goes for Pokémon AND for Trainers!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4001_10: Hm? What is it? Ohhh... I know that look in your eye. You want me to give you some tips on battling, don’t you.
All right! First, let me introduce you to some other Trainers that are here on Pasio!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4002_10: Oh, hey, Blue! You’re here, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? What’s going on here?
Wait, you two know each other?
Of course! We’re on a team, after all!
Whoa, look at you! Sounds like you’ve already got a pretty good team going, don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
It’s no easy feat to get a strong Trainer to acknowledge you as a teammate, so good going! Of course, she’s not as good as me, but...
You just had to keep talking, didn’t you. Well, you implied that I’m a strong Trainer, so I’ll take the compliment.
I wanted to introduce you two, but if you already know each other...I guess we can move on!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4003_10: There she is. Heeey! Misty!
Hey, Blue! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Oh, and Flannery, too? What are you all up to? Doing some training?
Don’t tell me... You’re on [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team, too, aren’t you, Misty.
Yup! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s been working super hard to grow strong for the team!
Brock and I made sure to teach [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] the basics. [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ]’s got a real knack for Pokémon battling.
Hm, I see... Of course, if I were on the team, too, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] would be even stronger.
Hey! Are you trying to say I’m a bad teacher?
I’m just saying...[EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] could learn a lot more from a stronger sync pair.
Ugh! I guess some things never change. You think you’re better than me. Just admit it!
Hey, guys, I don’t feel right saying this, but let’s cool down a bit! Why not just settle this with a Pokémon battle?
I’m game for that! But just a normal battle would be boring...
There are a bunch of event matches going on all over Pasio right now for the PML.
I heard one of them is a team-on-team elimination battle... You interested?
That kind of feels like a roundabout way of solving things, but all right! Challenge accepted.
I guess it’ll be more fun to settle this with a bang. Let’s do it!
All right! Then [Name:PlayerNickname ] and Flannery are with me!
Wait, why do you get [Name:PlayerNickname ] on your team?!
Because [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] can learn more that way.
You really are a piece of work, aren’t you... Fine, then I’ll make my own Water-type team that’ll knock your socks off!
This is getting pretty intense! I like it!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_10: You guys aren’t bad! I didn’t think you’d be able to keep up with me! Not a bad team we have here!
No kidding! We even made it to the finals!
Huh, it looks like I just got a Poryphone message from Misty... Wait—what?!
What’s wrong?
She lost?! There’s somebody in this tournament that could beat Misty?
I thought that she and her Starmie would easily make it to the finals.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_03: So you admit that she’s good.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_04: She’s the Cerulean City Gym Leader. It’s only common sense she would make it to the finals.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_03: You had faith in her, didn’t you.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_04: She’s the Cerulean City Gym Leader. It’s only common sense she would make it to the finals.
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4005_10: Aww, man... I’m so bummed I lost that battle. I guess I won’t be battling you in the finals after all.
Misty! What happened?!
You got sloppy, didn’t you.
I’m just gonna pretend I didn’t hear that... We had fun, and that’s what matters. By the way, the guy that beat me had a message for you!
He said he wants a rematch with you, Blue.
A rematch?! You mean I’ve battled this guy before?
Oh, you’ll know him when you see him... Watch out, though. He’s strong! I guess I’ll see you at the arena in a bit! I’m not missing this!
I’ve been waiting for you, Blue!
Ahhh, Bruno. So you’re the one who beat Misty, huh? Guess that’s to be expected from a member of the Indigo League Elite Four.
It is all a result of my perseverance training from before and during my time on Pasio.
Indigo Elite Four?! Oh man, I have to put my game face on!
Good call, Flannery. Bruno is the real deal.
Flannery, [Name:PlayerNickname ], time to get serious!
Get ready for our superior power! Hoo hah!
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4007_10: We...lost?! To these children?!
We went through arduous training with Master Bruno... We even beat a Gym Leader!
This is nothing strange. They were just stronger than us.
And as long as you underestimate them as children, that means you still harbor hubris in your heart.
Team battles aren’t about the power of each individual pair but of how well those pairs work together.
Blue, Flannery, and [Name:PlayerNickname ] unleashed their true potential as a team.
You’re right, Bruno. It’s true. You guys are all strong sync pairs...
but my team went a step further, making sure we covered each other’s weaknesses.
Flannery, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... I think that battle was the best this team has done yet! Good job, guys!
It’s our loss. Blue, you are a really impressive Trainer.
No matter the situation or predicament, you strive to be the best there is, and you have the tenacity and serenity to actualize that desire.
I have trained to the absolute limit.
But perhaps you have the power to surpass that limit.
I know a guy that I don’t want to lose to. And I know that he continues to get even stronger.
That’s why I can’t afford to stop.
That’s why I want strong Trainers to battle. So if you ever want another rematch, just let me know!
I shall train more and challenge you again.
So that’s what makes you such a strong Trainer, huh, Blue? I gotta work harder, too!
Hey, Bruno! Can I train with you?
Of course! We can start immediately!
Well, I guess that means our little impromptu team is disbanding. It’s been fun, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4007_04: Heh! Glad to hear that. You know you’re on the right track if you’re able to have fun.
Make sure you remember how strong Pidgeot and I are, all right?
episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green_en.lsd.episode_event_M1_ch0021_00_green/4007_10: Here’s hoping we can see each other again at some other tournament event.
I have no intention of losing, so if you keep moving up the ranks, I’m sure we’ll end up battling each other one way or another.
I look forward to seeing how strong you become!

episode_event_M1_general_ch0021_00_green.episode_event_M1_general_ch0021_00_green: I think I’m gonna go do some training. You can come watch if you want, I guess.
Today let’s work on... Oh! I’ve got an idea!
Bonjour, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was about to go train. You want to join me?
Guess Blue already left... I should go train, too!
I think Blue left to go do some training a little bit ago. If you hurry, you can probably still catch him!

episode_event_sub_ep_ch0106_10_kamitsure.episode_event_sub_ep_ch0106_10_kamitsure: Hey, Skyla, can I ask you a favor?
Sure, what’s up?
Well, we’ve been through a lot ever since we arrived on Pasio, right?
And we keep meeting new sync pairs in battles, right? So of course, we need a good way to break the ice with them.
To help out with that, I’ve been cooking up some good ideas!
Ideas for some awesome jokes, that is!
And I wanted to test them out on you first! I’m sure these’ll make your head spin!
Uh...sure.
OK, here goes.
Have you heard that Trainers who use Hypno are hip? No?
If your Cubone hasn’t evolved yet, there’s always to-Marowak!
Have you heard that Haxorus have a secret  Evolution? They evolve when they try to lift something too heavy and become Baxorus!
Pfft!
Ahahaha! Haxorus evolves into...Back-sore-us...
I did it! I made you laugh!
But those aren’t really jokes, are they? They’re puns.
And besides, those might be a little too, uh... highbrow for normal people. It might go right over their heads.
Hmm...you think so? Then I guess you’re the only one I can tell these masterpieces to.
Yeah!
(I bet she did her best to think those up...)
(But that’s what makes Elesa so great! I love how she gives her all in everything she does!)
Hah! I’m absolutely stumped!
Let’s see... This is a quiz that a world-famous model thought up. The answer must have some artistic angle to it... Think, Blaine! Think!
Who’s the biggest copycat? Hmm...
Hee hee. Time’s up.
The answer is Flannery!
Flannery? The Gym Leader? Wha—? Why?
Well, that’s because...
imitation is the sincerest form of Flannery!
That was more of a pun than a quiz, though... I’ll admit that it took a bit of inspiration, but...
Hah! No! I refuse to call that a quiz!
I’ll show you what quizzes are all about!
All right, then it’s your turn, Blaine! Hit me with your best shot!
Let the quiz-off continue!
Oh wow... Elesa’s show was sooo amazing!
Oh, why thank you!
E-E-Elesa! Wh-what are you doing here?
I’m just running an errand. Are you still open?
Oh, yes we are! Um... Would it be OK to ask you for an autograph?
An autograph? Of course.
Thank you so much!
C-can I also get a picture with you?
Sure! How about we pose like this?
Oh, this is so great!
Perfect! Thank you so much!
I should be thanking you. I can only do what I do thanks to fans like you, after all.
Well, I should get going.
Thank you for coming! I’m looking forward to your next show!
I completely forgot to buy what I needed! I gotta hurry back!
Oh no... She closed shop...
Hm? Is something the matter?
Oh, Elesa! Great show today!
By the way, I think this vending machine might be broken. I just tried to buy some water, but it’s not working...
Oh, that’s not good.
Say, Rotom. Do you think you can fix it?
Wah! Is that a G-G-Ghost type? I’m not good with scary stuff...
Ah! It disappeared into the vending machine!
Yup! Rotom can enter machines and manipulate them from within. I sure hope it can fix it...
Oh wow, look at how much it’s moving! That’s pretty impressive.
After seeing how hard Rotom’s working, I feel like I might have misjudged Ghost-type Pokémon.
That was fast, Rotom. Were you able to fix the vending machine?
It’s working again! See? The buttons are lit up!
Um, thanks, Rotom... Sorry I was scared of you.
It looks like Rotom’s trying to tell you not to worry about it.
I’m proud of you for behaving, Rotom! I expected you to pull one of your usual pranks.
Yeah, thanks a lot! Now I can get some water...
Youch, that’s hot!
Huh, what happened? This water’s piping hot!
I guess I spoke too soon...
Thanks for going shopping with me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Why don’t we head back?
Hm? What’s wrong, Rotom?
It must have gone and hid in a machine again. Is it trying to play hide-and-seek now?
I guess it’s having so much fun outside that it doesn’t want to go back yet.
Finding Rotom might take a while. Why don’t we chat while we look for it?
Tell me about Rotom!
Hmm, let’s see. Oh, I know. I’ve got a story from a little while ago...
Does Rotom always pull pranks?
It does. But don’t get me wrong—Rotom isn’t a bad Pokémon.
When I first got to Pasio, I was in a bit of a slump. At the time, I couldn’t get the results I was hoping for.
It was then that Rotom jumped into the TV.
It started showing me footage of Sabrina and Fantina battling, and they were dazzling.
Seeing them battle, I was reminded how important it is to show your best self and let it shine.
So, for once, it was Rotom’s mischief that brought a smile to my face.
That was when I decided to aim for the top of the PML with Rotom as my partner.
I was confident that the two of us would be able to make everybody watching smile.
Heh heh... It’s a little embarrassing talking about how I felt back then.
Oh, Rotom!
Maybe it heard us talking about it and got curious.
Don’t worry, Rotom. I was just telling [Name:PlayerNickname ] how great of a partner you are.
That was a great show, Elesa.
Hee hee! Thanks, Marley.
Um...Elesa? Can you teach me how to be more like you?
I...have a hard time talking with people...
I sometimes hurt people’s feelings when I speak honestly... Even if that’s not my intention...
I’m jealous of how you can be so dazzling without holding anything back.
You’re a really sweet person, aren’t you, Marley?
Huh?
I knew a girl like you once.
She was also afraid of hurting the people around her, so she would hold her true thoughts back.
The world is filled with different kinds of people. Everyone has their own opinions about things, and sometimes what others say can be hurtful.
But after trying over and over again, you get to see what makes you different from other people. That’s the important part.
What I’m trying to say is that you don’t have to be afraid to express yourself.
Besides, you have a great partner at your side. You have nothing to worry about!
Of course, I’ll always be in your corner, too.
Thank you, Elesa.
I think I found my answer. But if I need advice again, would you mind if I come ask you?
Not at all! I’m always down to parley with Marley!
Parley with Marley... Ha ha...
There’s a smile!
With a dazzling smile like that, I guarantee you’ll be fine.
I gotta say...
your mask, your outfit—it’s all so unique. I can tell you spent a lot of time thinking it up.
Oh, you sure have an eye for fashion, don’t you?
But I can say the same about you. Your show was absolutely fantastic.
I don’t remember the last time I felt such passion from an audience like that.
By the way, you and I aren’t finished yet.
We’ll be battling again in the future. I’m sure of it.
Did you have Xatu look into the future?
Heh... I don’t need to see the future to know this.
I just want to challenge you again sometime. That’s all there is to it.
It’s up to us to create the future we want, right?
Hee hee. I guess you’re right. I’m looking forward to battling you again!
Rotom, Thunder Shock!
Hm... You’re pretty good.
Then how about this? Here we go!
Don’t let up—keep attacking!
Ooh, so aggressive! I like it!
Wait for an opening, and hit it hard!
Ah, turning defense into offense, huh?
I love it! You guys are totally making my head spin!
Good work out there! Both you and your partner were absolutely dazzling!
We’re just getting started!
I like that enthusiasm! I know you two will shine even brighter!
Thanks!
It’s true! But I know you two can shine even brighter than that.
Oh boy! I thought I would try to pay you back for helping me out with my show, but I just ended up enjoying myself!
Spending time with you is always so exciting! Let’s have another Pokémon battle sometime soon!

episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4001_110: Not long ago, news began to spread that the famed Indigo League Champion Lance had made his way to Pasio.
As one might expect, the arrival of yet another Champion instantly became the hottest topic on the island.
Lance’s arrival was being heatedly discussed by excited passersby as [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] friends were walking through town.
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4001_100: When it comes to dragon masters, Lance is number one. It’s simply indisputable! He’s the most powerful Trainer on the Indigo Plateau!
No one can block his Dragonite’s Hyper Beam! It’s a proven fact!
Nuh-uh! It’s Cynthia who’s number one! She’s not limited to Dragon types like Lance. She can triumph with Pokémon of ANY type!
Her Garchomp is a Dragon type, sure, but it’s also an ultrapowerful Ground-type Pokémon!
That’s preposterous! Come, child—just accept the fact that Lance is the greatest!
No way! Cynthia is the best! Nothing you say is gonna convince me otherwise, OK?!
It’s crazy how many people are obsessing over Lance and Cynthia right now... Champions sure know how to create a buzz!
Seems like everyone on Pasio is talking about them. You heard about Lance’s arrival, too, didn’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Lance and Cynthia...two Champions...both with Dragon-type Pokémon as their partners.
You have to admit, they make a pretty exciting matchup. I mean, who wouldn’t be curious to see who’d win in a battle between them?
What’s your stance, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Which Champion do you think is stronger?
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4001_040: Lance, huh? Interesting... He’s definitely made a name for himself as a dragon master, and he’s good at what he does.
But Cynthia’s no pushover! She’s a master when it comes to unleashing the full strength of her Pokémon, regardless of type!
Cynthia, huh? They say she’s a master when it comes to unleashing the full strength of her Pokémon, regardless of type.
But Lance is no pushover! He’s made a name for himself as a dragon master. I hear he and his Dragonite do superintensive training!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4001_100: I’m so curious... Which one of them is actually the strongest?
Ah, so that’s what all the ruckus is about.
Cynthia!
I’ve been feeling eyes on me wherever I go recently... At first I thought there must be some kind of hideous rumor going around about me.
But I suppose Lance’s arrival solves that mystery. I’ll admit, I’d be interested in meeting him, if the opportunity presents itself.
Really?! Well then, why don’t we—
*gasp* Oh my gosh! It’s C-Cynthia!
E-excuse me! Cynthia! Hi! Oh my gosh, I’m your biggest fan!
I’ll believe in you no matter what! I’m totally, absolutely, positively sure that you’re stronger than Lance!
Lies! Utter nonsense! It is Lance who is the strongest, mightiest dragon master!
I can prove it to you right now! I may look like just another scientist, but I have faced the great Lance in battle before!
All right, then. Why don’t you team up with your friends over there? [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
you and Rosa can fight with me. Let’s do our best to get in sync with one another. It’s our first time teaming up like this, after all.
You got it! We’ll give it our best shot!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4002_100: H-how is it possible that you’re this strong?! Champions must be on an entirely different level...
See? I told you Cynthia is the greatest dragon master ever!
B-but I...
No! Not enough evidence! Please stand by— I must research this matter further!
There they go... It seems like everyone on Pasio is laser focused on you and Lance right now, Cynthia.
It certainly seems that way. As long as this whole debate leads to a fun battle between us, that’s good enough for me.
Doesn’t all of this make you curious, though? About who’s really the greatest?
Well...I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t curious. I’ve just never placed much importance on earning titles like “the greatest.”
Seriously?! But people call you the greatest all the time, Cynthia!
I know. I do hear that a lot. But as far as I’m concerned, the goal in all this isn’t to compare myself to others.
Working hard with Garchomp to grow stronger each day, to excel beyond our limits... That personal growth is more important to me.
And that’s why, to be honest, I don’t really care how the rest of the world perceives me.
Mhmm... Wow, it must be nice not to care what people think. I wish I could be that cool!
*chuckle* Did that come off a bit too high and mighty? Let’s just forget I said anything, all right?
Well, I should get going. Places to go, people to see...
I love how cool and nonchalant Cynthia is about her fame and power. I wonder...
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Wanna go talk to Lance? I think I know where he’s training right now!
I wonder what Lance thinks about all of this... I’m so curious!
The greatest dragon master, huh?
Sounds like something right up my alley! Now I’m curious, too!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4003_100: I’ve seen him training in this area before. He should be around here somewhere...
Bingo! Sounds like he’s just over there!
Y-you just got to Pasio, and you’re already able to give me a run for my money?
I guess I shouldn’t be surprised! You are my cousin, after all!
I doubt it has anything to do with us being cousins, Clair. But thank you for helping me get accustomed to the battle style of this place.
Well, well, who do we have here? Training with [Name:PlayerNickname ] again today, Rosa?
Yep! Actually, we have something we want to ask you about—
Yes! We finally found you! Oh my gosh, can you believe THE Lance is standing right in front of us?! *squeal*
Will you pleeease have a battle with us, Lance? I want to hold this memory in my heart forever!
Sorry, Rosa. Can it wait until after this battle? I can’t let my fans down.
Come on, Clair. Let’s do this.
N-no way! Did you forget about that Hyper Beam you just pummeled Kingdra with? We’re in no shape to fight right now.
Ah, that’s right. I guess that leaves you two. Rosa, [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s team up.
I suppose this is as good a chance as any to see exactly what you’re capable of. Give these fans everything you’ve got!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4004_100: Ahhh, I can die a happy woman! Never in a million years did I think I’d get the chance to face Lance in battle...
Wow, I’ll never forget the way I felt when I saw Dragonite’s Hyper Beam in real life!
I think I’m starting to like the battle style here on Pasio. It lends itself to different strategies than I’m used to elsewhere.
Now then, you mentioned you had something you wanted to ask me before?
Oh, right. Well, we were wondering...
I see... Who’s the greatest dragon master, me or Cynthia? Interesting question.
And you say the whole island’s been talking about this? I had no idea.
Hmph. Sounds like a pointless debate, if you ask me. The answer is obvious.
What?! How do you know?!
It’s simple. I know who the strongest dragon master is...
because it’s me—Clair!
Ohhh, of course! You’re a dragon master, too! I hadn’t even thought about that.
It’s true that you’re strong, Clair. And it’s good to have confidence in your own abilities...
but there’s a limit to what’s good and what’s not. Too much pride can make you overconfident, and overconfidence can make you vulnerable.
To get back to your question, Rosa, I think I share Cynthia’s feelings about the title of who’s “the greatest.”
I know the vanity that title holds.
Vanity? What do you mean?
A long time ago, when I was a member of the Elite Four but not Champion, I was defeated by a Trainer.
He claimed to be the greatest of all, and he had the strength and skill to back it up.
But eventually, a stronger Trainer came along, and even he was defeated... It was then that I realized something.
That title—“the greatest”—can inflate your ego, but it doesn’t really mean anything. It’s an illusion, there one minute and gone the next...
The way I see it, seeking to grow and improve yourself is far more worthwhile than chasing a fleeting illusion of greatness.
Mhmm... Wow, that’s so deep. You Champions really are on a whole different level. I should be taking notes!
*chuckle* Glad I could bring a bit of perspective.
Well, if you’ll excuse me, I’ve been meaning to take a stroll around the city sometime today.
Oh! If that’s where you’re headed, I can give you a tour! I know the city like the back of my hand!
Thanks. I’d appreciate that.
Hmph! Why is everyone so stuck on Cynthia and Lance, anyway? I don’t get it!
I’ll show them... Get ready, Pasio, because I’m about to prove that I, Clair, and my Kingdra are the greatest of all!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4005_100: This part of the city is where it gets the busiest! If you like shopping, like I do, you’ll find plenty of spots to check out here!
Interesting. I wonder if they have any good capes for sale around here...
Hm?
What is it? Is something wrong?
*gasp*
We seem to keep running into each other today, Rosa, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
And...I see you’ve brought a new friend with you this time. Nice to see you, Lance.
And you, Cynthia. You seem to be keeping yourself busy here on Pasio.
Whoa...it actually happened! The world’s two greatest dragon masters—the hottest topic on Pasio—just bumped into each other right here!
We seem to have become one of the island’s biggest attractions.
Receiving so much attention is certainly an honor and a privilege.
However...
Hey, are you two OK? If this is some kind of staring contest, then—
There’s been so much gossip about us Champions and our dragon Pokémon... About who is really the greatest of all...
I thought I could simply ignore it and move on...
but now that you’re right here in front of me, I can’t help but feel that itch.
Wait! Do you mean—
Heh, you took the words right out of my mouth.
We may be Champions in title, but we’re still Pokémon Trainers first and foremost, just like anyone else.
When our eyes meet...
Naturally, we have to—
I challenge you to a battle!
Who decided that Lance and Cynthia are the only ones in the running for greatest dragon master of all time, huh? Sure wasn’t me!
My team and I fight with dragon Pokémon, too! And we’re seriously strong!
Uhh, this is not where I thought this was going!
It’s fine by me. I never refuse a challenge.
No matter who the challenger may be.
Thank you. My thoughts exactly.
Yoo-hoo, over here... Last I checked, we’re the ones who challenged you to a battle, so...
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Will you lend us your strength? Our challengers are a team of three, so it would only be fair.
Shall we begin?
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4006_100: H-how...? We were no match for you at all! I thought I’d be crushed if you beat us...
but now that we’ve battled each other, I’m just curious! Who really IS the greatest dragon master?! I have to know!
What about the stadium just up the road? Trainers are allowed to use it whenever we want! You two could battle it out there!
Yeah! You’d have way more space to unleash your attacks at the stadium. Come on! Please? I’ve gotta have front-row seats for this!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4007_100: Umm, s-so I feel like this situation just keeps escalating, and I don’t know what’s going on...
I mean, how’d we end up in a place like this, with an audience like this?
Yes! The time has come at last! Who is the greatest dragon master of all?! Is it Cynthia? Or is it Lance?
It’s Cynthia, duh!
No, it’s not! It’s most definitely Lance, I assure you!
Nuh-uh! Cynthia’s the best!
No, Lance is the best!
Sounds like the crowd’s getting pretty antsy... In a few minutes, they’ll finally get an answer to their big debate!
So...who do you think it’s gonna be, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4007_040: Well, I can’t let you down now, can I?
I’ll give this battle everything I’ve got, and I promise you, I will win!
I’d like to see with my own two eyes what you and Dragonite are truly capable of!
Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m glad you have confidence in me.
Watch—I will win this battle! I stake my title of Lance, master of dragons, on my victory!
Time for you and Garchomp to show me the full extent of your power!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4007_100: Hold it right there!
Yay! We made it just in time, Clair!
E-exactly as I planned it! The star of the show must have a dramatic entrance!
Lance! Cynthia! Iris and I have come to challenge you to a battle!
If you want to claim the title of greatest dragon master as your own, you’ll have to defeat us first!
Clair... You never give up, do you?
Quite the enthusiastic cousin you have there, Lance.
No objection from me. I’ve actually been curious about them for a while now—both Clair and the young Champion from Unova.
You mean me? Woo-hoo! I’ve been wanting to battle against you and your cute Garchomp for so long!
If we’re all in agreement here, can we hurry up and get this battle started already?
Yeah! Let’s do our best, Clair!
Fine...but if this is going to be a team battle, let’s play by the rules.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], will you lend me your strength one more time?
If you get [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ], then we get Rosa! Come on over! We’re gonna be the greatest dragon masters ever!
M-me? Are you serious?! If you’re sure...I promise to do my best and help you two however I can!
It sounds like everything is in order...
Well? Are you ready to battle against Cynthia, Champion of the Sinnoh League...
and Lance, Champion of the Indigo League?
Here we come!
episode_event_wataru_shirona_01_en.lsd.episode_event_wataru_shirona_01/4008_100: Aww, they beat us! I thought we’d have a chance since I’m a Champion, too.
Oh well! At least we had fun, right? I hope we can all battle again someday!
I...I can’t believe this... This shouldn’t have happened...
Kingdra...I-I’m sorry I let you down...
I wanted to prove that I’m the greatest dragon master...that I’m worthy of being your Trainer.
I guess, as it turns out, I’m nowhere near that level... I need to get stronger...
You were brilliant, though, Kingdra. You fought hard, and your moves were all fantastic.
You have a kind heart, Clair.
What?
You staked your pride on this battle to prove yourself to the Pokémon you love, and despite being defeated, you refuse to give up.
You still strive to grow and improve yourself, and that is admirable. As a fellow Trainer, I really respect that!
Cynthia...
You can be a little impulsive sometimes, Clair...
but that earnest, straightforward attitude of yours is one of your greatest strengths as well. If you can learn to hone that, the sky is the limit!
Come and find me whenever you want to battle! I’ll accept your challenge anytime, anywhere!
Lance...
Hmph! Of course I will! I’m not going to let one tiny loss stop me from becoming the greatest dragon master of all time!
Come on, Iris! Let’s let Kingdra and the others rest for a bit, but then it’s right back to training!
You got it! See you later, everyone!
Lance, Cynthia...
thank you.
Can you believe you just beat Clair and Iris? What an awesome battle!
But now it’s time for the grand finale! Which one of you is gonna come out of this battle as the greatest dragon master of all?
About that...
Sorry to disappoint you all, but I think I’m going to need a rain check. Cynthia and I will have to battle another time!
WHAT?! But why?
We’ve faced some tough opponents today... Garchomp and Dragonite have really had to push themselves in these last few battles.
Our Pokémon are our partners, and we care a lot about them, which means it’s our duty to make sure their needs are taken care of.
Right. That’s just basic Pokémon training protocol. You have to make sure your Pokémon are all right before jumping into a battle situation with them...
even if it means having others tease you or accuse you of running away from a challenge.
O-of course. You’re right. I’m sorry... I guess I just got a little carried away.
No, it’s all right. I’m sorry to have to let you all down today.
But as long as we’re on Pasio, there will be endless opportunities for us to battle!
Now you’ve got something to look forward to! Right, everyone?
I’m glad all of our fans were so understanding.
Everyone here loves Pokémon as much as we do. I knew they would understand.
Besides...
I can think of a much better place for our ultimate battle together.
The PML finals seem like a perfectly appropriate platform to me...
So in other words...we should save the fun for later?
All right, then. I can’t say I care much about the title of greatest dragon master, but if it means I get to battle against you, I’m definitely in!
I look forward to the day we can finally unleash our full power on the battlefield.
That sounds like a promise. I’ll climb through the ranks and make sure it’s me standing across from you on that battlefield at the finals!
Someday soon, we will have our ultimate showdown!

grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3901_1301_0100_: ’Sup, dude? How’s it goin’? Lemme know when that battlin’ mood strikes ya!
grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3902_1031_0100_: I wanna battle somebody as strong as a tsunami!
grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3902_1301_0100_: Yo! Have you been workin’ out with Crasher Wake? Sweeeet. I’m ready to go whenever you are, dude!
grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3903_1031_0100_: Train, train! Train till you crash! Those are good lines...
grow_event_M1_type_grass_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_grass/3903_1301_0100_: Do you know how strong Grass types are?! We have to train them up if we want to take on Marlon!

grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3901_1301_0100_1: Hah! I’ll be waiting for you to get stronger and challenge me again!
grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3902_1031_0100_1: I want a blazing battle with a burning Trainer.
grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3902_1301_0100_1: You want to challenge me after you train under Shauntal? Very good! I’ll be ready for you!
grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3903_1031_0100_1: “And so she waited... for a battle to light the fire within.”
grow_event_M1_type_rock_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_rock/3903_1301_0100_1: “The time has come to learn about stone...” Come on. Let’s do some rock-solid training and prepare to challenge Blaine!

grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3901_1301_0100_: C’mon, let’s heat it up!  I wanna see just how hot your spirit burns!
grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3902_1301_0100_: So you trained with Roark, huh? But have you seen just how hot a Pokémon battle can be?! ’Cause I’m about to show you!
grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3903_1031_0100_: It takes hard work to be a solid training partner.
grow_event_M1_type_water_en.lsd.grow_event_M1_type_water/3903_1301_0100_: Come on, I’ll give you a hand! Let’s train up our Pokémon and get ready to challenge Flint!

grow_event_type_boost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_boost/3901_1301_0100_10: You’ve gotta train hard if you want to make it in the PML!
grow_event_type_boost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_boost/3901_1301_0200_10: I heard you can try supercourses more times per day right now!
grow_event_type_boost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_boost/3901_1301_0300_10: Keep working hard and aiming for the top, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

grow_event_type_dragon_en.lsd.grow_event_type_dragon/3901_1301_0100_10: You look ready for battle! Well then, let’s see if you can overcome my challenge!
grow_event_type_dragon_en.lsd.grow_event_type_dragon/3902_1031_0100_10: I see a lot of promising Trainers.
grow_event_type_dragon_en.lsd.grow_event_type_dragon/3902_1301_0100_10: You will know what is needed in a Pokémon battle if you can defeat me!
grow_event_type_dragon_en.lsd.grow_event_type_dragon/3903_1031_0100_10: It’s hard to find enough Trainers with some fight in them!
grow_event_type_dragon_en.lsd.grow_event_type_dragon/3903_1301_0100_10: Bring it on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll show you what Kingdra and I are made of!

grow_event_type_Electric_en.lsd.grow_event_type_Electric/3901_1301_0100_: I look forward to seeing the techniques that you’ve honed in battle.
grow_event_type_Electric_en.lsd.grow_event_type_Electric/3902_1031_0100_: Passion is key— even when practicing.
grow_event_type_Electric_en.lsd.grow_event_type_Electric/3902_1301_0100_: If you’re taking on Siebold of the Kalos Elite Four, I can lend you a hand.
grow_event_type_Electric_en.lsd.grow_event_type_Electric/3903_1031_0100_: Ambition to keep growing stronger is essential.
grow_event_type_Electric_en.lsd.grow_event_type_Electric/3903_1301_0100_: Let’s see how bright your light can shine in battle!

grow_event_type_fire_en.lsd.grow_event_type_fire/3901_1301_0100_10: Let me guess—you want to challenge me? I’ll be waiting for you.
grow_event_type_fire_en.lsd.grow_event_type_fire/3902_1031_0100_10: You shall witness the strength of Steel type! En garde!
grow_event_type_fire_en.lsd.grow_event_type_fire/3902_1301_0100_10: Ho! Well met, young challenger! I see you wish to test your mettle against the unyielding ice! May our contest be fair and honorable!
grow_event_type_fire_en.lsd.grow_event_type_fire/3903_1031_0100_10: Y’know what? Hot battles aren’t that bad.
grow_event_type_fire_en.lsd.grow_event_type_fire/3903_1301_0100_10: You’ve got the look of someone who wants to battle! Enough rambling. Let’s get this show on the road!

grow_event_type_ghost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ghost/3901_1301_0100_10: Hey, hey! Why don’t we have a Pokémon battle? I want to see how strong your bond with your partner is!
grow_event_type_ghost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ghost/3902_1031_0100_10: Ahahaha! I can’t wait to battle!
grow_event_type_ghost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ghost/3902_1301_0100_10: Let’s test whose bond with their Pokémon is stronger—yours or mine!
grow_event_type_ghost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ghost/3903_1031_0100_10: I’ll show you how a real Trainer battles!
grow_event_type_ghost_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ghost/3903_1301_0100_10: Pokémon are for battling! Come, child! I’ll show you how to command them on the battlefield properly!

grow_event_type_ice_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ice/3901_1301_0100_10: Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Wanna have a Pokémon battle with me? Let’s catch up later!
grow_event_type_ice_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ice/3902_1031_0100_10: A new wind is blowing... If only I could ride it...
grow_event_type_ice_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ice/3902_1301_0100_10: Face me in battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! This training session will be a guiding wind to help you soar in battle against Iris!
grow_event_type_ice_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ice/3903_1031_0100_10: I’m ready for a tough battle with a tough sync pair!
grow_event_type_ice_en.lsd.grow_event_type_ice/3903_1301_0100_10: You just did some training with Kahili, right? Come on! I’ve been itching for a battle! I’m going all out this time!

grow_event_type_supercourse_2010_en.lsd.grow_event_type_supercourse_2010/3901_13: Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re always working your hardest. I’ve got some news that a busybody like you might like!
Apparently, we can get a few extra attempts at supercourses right now!
Why don’t you give it a shot? If you train a whole bunch, you might even become the PML champion!

intro_only_event_battle_villa_intro_en.l.intro_only_event_battle_villa_intro/4901: I’ve got some exciting news for you— the Battle Villa just had its grand opening! You can check it out anytime you like now.
The Pokémon Center is already buzzing with rumors about it. From what I hear, it sounds like a totally new kind of challenge!
Apparently, if you do well in the Battle Villa, you can earn amazing rewards that’ll help you and your Pokémon grow even stronger!
You should give it a try, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
A totally new kind of challenge, huh?
Sounds like fun. Come on! Let’s go check it out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
intro_only_event_battle_villa_intro_en.l.intro_only_event_battle_villa_intro/4902: Hahahaha! Welcome to the magnificent halls of my Battle Villa, new guests!
Oh... It’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I should have known you and your foolish friends would show up here eventually.
Hmph! Participate in the challenge, if you like. You have no chance of winning, so I really couldn’t care less what you do!
IF by some miracle you do end up climbing the ranks, I’ll give you a reward... A prize more grand than the likes of you could even imagine!

intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_12: Bonjour, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You look like you’re at the top of your game!
Well, hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Thanks to you and Blue here, I’ll be battling in the PML!
I’ve been looking forward to our team battles so much. I haven’t felt this excited in a very long time!
Will you be heading out now? Why don’t we go together?
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_03: Of course! The more the merrier!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_04: Hoho! Well, that just makes me even more excited!
Take it easy, Gramps! You’ll hurt yourself if you don’t calm down.
Wha—! You forgot me?! I’m Professor Oak! People refer to me as the...
Calm down, Gramps! [Name:PlayerNickname ] is just kidding!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/4901_12: Yeah yeah, I hear you, Red! All right—the two of us are gonna go do our own thing!
See you later, Gramps and [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I can’t wait to battle you guys in the PML!
Look at how big he’s gotten!
He and Red must still be training together.
You remind me of the two of them the day they set off from my lab, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Anyway... We should head out ourselves.
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6001_10: Gramps and Mew... They’re gonna be tough to beat!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6001_12: Who woulda thought that Gramps would become partners with a Mythical Pokémon!
Gramps might be my biggest obstacle yet, but you better believe I’m still gonna win!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6002_10: Look at all these different sync pairs!
intro_only_event_orchid1_present_en.lsd.intro_only_event_orchid1_present/6002_12: Seeing all the sync pairs gathered around here just reminded me of how I partnered up with Mew.
If Blue and Agatha hadn’t been there to give me that push, I might not have been able to become partners with Mew in the first place!
Of course, I’m also grateful to you for helping me look for it!

intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6001_1: If you talk to the other Trainers on Pasio, you get to hear how different the leagues are in all the other regions! It’s some interesting stuff!
Take the Galar region, for example. Most of their Pokémon Gyms are huge stadiums where spectators can enjoy watching the battles.
Once a year, Trainers in Galar compete in a tournament for the chance to battle the Champion, and the whole thing is televised for everybody!
Man, I’m getting pumped up just thinking about it! Once we win here on Pasio, let’s go try our hand in Galar, too!
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6003_1: Since coming to Pasio, I’ve learned a ton of new stuff about dragon Pokémon from the dragon masters here.
Turns out there are a bunch of Pokémon all over the world that I’ve never even seen before.
The one I want to see most is a Steel-type Pokémon called Duraludon! You can find it in the Galar region.
I heard that even though Duraludon’s body is made of heavy-looking metal, it’s actually really, really lightweight! I wonder what it’s like in person...
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6004_1: There are so many stylish people on Pasio—it’s tons of fun just to people watch!
Oh, speaking of stylish, I made a new friend from Kalos the other day. She’s super knowledgeable about all the latest fashion trends!
According to her, the boutiques in the Galar region carry all kinds of different clothing brands!
They let you try out everything in the store to mix and match your entire outfit! You can also go to salons and get your hair and makeup done!
I can’t wait to visit Galar someday and dive into all the fashion and beauty trends there!
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6005_1: I spend lots of time skating all around Pasio, practicing my tricks.
It’s so much fun! The sights and smells are all so different from Kalos that everything feels new and fresh!
Oh, speaking of fresh, have you heard of the Wild Area in Galar? Apparently, it’s full of really big, open fields.
I wonder what they’re like! I’d totally love to run wild with Lucario there someday!
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6006_1: Pasio is a great place to experience all sorts of regional cuisines, thanks to the variety of dishes and cooking ingredients imported here.
A chef I ran into told me that curry is very popular in the Galar region.
Apparently, cooking a pot of curry when one goes camping has become something of a tradition there. I’m curious how that tradition started.
It’s all certainly intriguing! If I ever have the opportunity to visit the region, I’d like to try making my own original curry recipe.
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6007_1: I traveled with a Zigzagoon back on Hoenn that always came through for me in a pinch. His Cut could slice through anything!
Speaking of Zigzagoon, my dad told me that in the Galar region they look different from the ones we usually see.
I hear they like to battle but have a cute side and like to play with people, too.
And get this! They can apparently evolve a second time—after evolving into Linoone! Isn’t that awesome?!
I wonder what they look like. I’d love to see one someday!
If we can, let’s go together!
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6008_1: You know I’m in a band, right? We have an awesome stage in my Gym, and we have a big Koffing painted on the wall behind it!
Koffing and Weezing look totally sick, don’t they? I think they’re rad!
Oh yeah, have you heard of the Galar region? Apparently, they got a Weezing that’s different from the ones we got in Unova.
It’s got smokestack-looking things on its head that filter the air and make it clean.
Talk about unexpected, right? Bet you woulda never guessed that comin’ from a Weezing!
It’d be awesome if we could go catch a few together someday! I might get some ideas for new songs, too!
intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1_en.lsd.intro_only_event_swsh_advertise_1/6009_1: Clashing with mighty opponents head on, testing each other’s mettle, and prevailing over them is what makes both Trainers and Pokémon stronger!
I’ve heard that Farfetch’d in the Galar region can achieve quite a unique Evolution if they can prove their mettle through countless battles.
They become Sirfetch’d, a noble Pokémon that uses a giant leek as a lance to do honorable battle with any opponent that dares challenge it!
I can sympathize with that principle! I would love to encounter one someday.
When that day comes, you shall be at my side!

legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_1001_: I think this is the area Trista was telling us about.
Yeah... She said there’ve been reports of weird sounds and suspicious-looking people lurking around.
Even if the bad guys are crazy powerful like she was saying, I don’t think I can stand by and let them cause trouble.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_0401_: Me, too! Pasio’s been a lot of fun for us so far. We should try and give back a little!
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_0302_: I’ve got a bad feeling about this.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_0402_: You, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? I’m glad it’s not just me.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_1001_: Something tells me this could get a little dangerous... We should keep our guard up.
Yo, that dude is crazy! Did you see what he did back there?!
I know, right? If we can get him to join our cause, things are gonna be lookin’ up for us real soon. Just you watch!
Hm? Wait a sec—these might be our guys...
Yo, why don’t we just make him our boss? Dude, can you imagine?!
We already asked him, remember? Dude wasn’t interested.
He said he’s content just bein’ the leader of Team Rocket. Er...Rainbow Rocket. Whatever.
What?!
Hey, you! Is what you just said true?!
Huh? What’s your deal? We’re tryin’ to have a private conversation here!
Listen! Brock and I are both from the Kanto region. If what you guys were saying is true...
does that mean Giovanni is here on Pasio?!
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_0401_: There used to be a group called Team Rocket in Kanto. They did all sorts of mean, evil things, and Giovanni was their leader.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_0402_: They were a group who used to do all sorts of mean, evil things back in Kanto. Giovanni was their leader.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5001_1001_: If Giovanni’s really here, we’re in for a world of trouble.
Heh! Spikey-hair here’s got it right! The Pokémon he brought with him is no joke, man. They’re chillin’ like villains in this cave right now!
Bet him ’n’ his Pokémon are plottin’ an evil scheme... They’ve got some insane power, dude! I can’t wait to see what they come up with!
Well, there go any doubts I might have had! We can’t let Giovanni follow through with whatever he’s planning!
Come on, Misty! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’ve gotta stop him!
Whoa, whoa. Hold up, parachute-pants! You ain’t goin’ nowhere!
What? You thought we were just gonna let you stroll on by? Hah! Dream on!
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5002_1001_: That takes care of that! C’mon, let’s head in!
Somewhere in this cave, we’re gonna run into Giovanni.
Keep an eye out for trouble, everyone.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5003_1001_: We’ve been walking through this cave for a while now... I feel like we should have found him by now.
Agreed. But who knows what a guy like Giovanni could be getting up to in a place like this.
Plotting. What else?
I came to see what all the commotion was about. I didn’t expect a welcoming committee.
Giovanni!
I see you finally decided to crawl out of the shadows!
Last I heard, Team Rocket had disbanded! What kind of new scheme are you up to now?!
Hm? Disbanded...
So this is how it’s gonna be, huh? I guess I’m doomed to be a criminal no matter which world I find myself in.
Huh? What’s that supposed to mean?
Never mind that. Funnily enough, you and your comrades showed up at the perfect time.
You all have sync stones, don’t you—those little crystals embedded in your Poryphones?
Um, yeah? Everyone does! What’s it to you?
I happen to be in possession of one as well... These mysterious stones can only be found in certain areas around Pasio.
They have...piqued my interest, to say the least. Sync stones are an immense source of power, driven by the bond between Trainer and Pokémon.
If I can learn to bend that power to my will, I’ll be stronger than ever before.
And that’s not all... If I discover how to unleash the hidden power within them, I can truly rule the world.
What do you mean, “hidden power”?
Care to elaborate on that?
Heh, don’t put too much thought into it. You kids wouldn’t know how to use it that way anyway.
Well? Are you here to detain me, or would you prefer to stand around and chat? Personally, I’d rather battle.
I wonder what will happen if I use the sync stone I mined from this cave with Mewtwo...
Mewtwo?!
I feel like it’s staring into my soul... That’s a powerful Pokémon right there, no doubt about it.
Huh. Most people cower in fear when they come face-to-face with Mewtwo... Maybe I underestimated you.
Or maybe not... Why don’t you show me what you can do? I could use a laugh.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5004_1001_: Hmph... That was a truly intense fight.
It really is possible for the bond of a sync pair to manifest great strength and power.
Still not giving up on that, are you?
I doubt it. I don’t even think he treated that last battle as a serious fight.
Heh, what can I say? I’m new to battling with sync stones as you do on this island. Our last battle was a test run.
Why don’t we try again? Prepare yourselves for our next battle, and follow me if you dare!
Come on, let’s go follow him! Just be careful, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
This is Giovanni we’re talking about—the guy who created Team Rocket! That battle was nowhere near what he’s really capable of.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5005_1001_: Looks like this is as deep as the cave goes.
You’ve got nowhere left to run, Giovanni!
Cornered by a bunch of kids, once again...
But you know what? Despite the bitter aftertaste of being beaten by kids like you, I...
Hmph. Doesn’t matter.
You demonstrated your full power to me without hesitation, and I’ll admit that I’m impressed.
And if you agree to work with me... I’d like to continue to witness that power.
Um, come again?!
What are you getting at? Don’t tell me you expect us to get involved in your evil schemes. That’s never gonna happen!
I don’t blame you for being skeptical. I’ve always been up to no good—why should you trust me?
The thing is, I’ve been thinking about changing my ways...starting fresh here in this new part of the world called Pasio.
I could forget about the lying and plotting and just enjoy competing in the PML with Mewtwo, fair and square... Hmph. Not a bad idea.
I guess it’s up to you kids, though. What’s your decision?
Giovanni... THE Giovanni of Team Rocket, team up with US?
To be honest, I’d trust a Liepard before I trust Giovanni. But if he’s on our team, we can keep an eye on him...
and maybe even prevent him from carrying out more of his no-good schemes. What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5005_0301_: If it’ll keep him from stirring up trouble...
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5005_0401_: Heh, keep your friends close and your enemies closer, eh? Touché.
Fine with me, as long as it means I get front-row seats to witness what becomes of you kids here on Pasio.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5005_0302_: If he promises to stop his evil schemes...
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5005_0402_: Listen, kid... I’m not a psychic. I can’t make any promises about the future.
But you know what they say, right? Keep your friends close and your enemies closer. You want to keep me in line? Then keep me around.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5005_1001_: You’re gonna have to stop getting involved with Team Break, too, all right? If you conspire with them to sabotage the PML, it’s over.
All right, I promise. After all, I want to enjoy the PML as much as you do. You can trust me on that, at least.
I guess we have a deal, then. Don’t forget your promise, Giovanni.
And don’t forget that we’ve got our eyes on you. If you even think about stirring up trouble, we’ll be right there to stop you!
Hmph. I’ll be sure to keep that in mind.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5006_1001_: Hmph... It seems I was able to infiltrate their unit successfully.
Now I have to decide if I truly do wish to start fresh on Pasio as a sync pair...
Hmph... Either way, this should be fun.
legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.lsd.legend_event_ch0140_00_sakaki/5101_1001_: Mewtwo... I’m going to need you to sow some chaos for me.

legend_event_general_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.legend_event_general_ch0140_00_sakaki/51: Ah! [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you on your way out to do some exploring?
If you were thinking of heading to the beach, please be careful. I just got a concerning report from the tournament staff.
It sounds like an incredibly powerful sync pair is stirring up trouble around there.
When the staff went to investigate, they were totally overwhelmed.
Be on the lookout for trouble, OK?
legend_event_general_ch0140_00_sakaki_en.legend_event_general_ch0140_00_sakaki/52: Something must be going on at the beach.
According to Trista, something suspicious is going on at the beach right now involving a powerful sync pair.
I’ve got a bad feeling about this... I think we should get down there and investigate. Are you with me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
What’s going on with that suspicious sync pair?
You’re going to investigate the area around the beach, right? I can be your guide if you want!
If we run into any crooks down there, Starmie and I will teach them a lesson!

legend_event_general_pm0384_00_rayquaza_.legend_event_general_pm0384_00_rayquaza/: Oh! Pardon me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Do you have a moment?
So sorry to bother you! I just wanted to pass on a warning.
An unidentified dragon Pokémon seems to have appeared near the glaciers recently.
No one has been able to spot its Trainer yet, and it seems to be quite on edge.
It’s been attacking anyone that comes near it, injuring one sync pair after another.
If you were planning on visiting the glaciers anytime soon, please be extra careful! All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Hey there, cousin! Did you hear about the dragon Pokémon that appeared near the glaciers?
I heard it’s pretty on edge... Been lashing out at people, yeah. We’ve gotta do something before we have a serious injury on our hands.
As a Pokémon Professor, I’m super pumped to be able to encounter a rare Pokémon any way I can! Come on! We should head out to the glaciers!

legend_event_general_pm0873_00_sun_en.ls.legend_event_general_pm0873_00_sun/5101_: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! What a joyous celebrazione this is! This time of year is always so exciting!
I hope it leaves you and your Pokémon feeling refreshed and ready for more fun on the horizon! Vive la vie!
That reminds me... Have you heard the rumor going around lately about a Pokémon up on the mountain peak?
According to my sources, people have been hearing a most ferocious roar coming from up there on clear mornings, just as the sun rises!
Apparently, it’s made the atmosphere up on the peak tantalizingly tense! It must be a majestic Pokémon indeed!
I’m curious to know what sort of Trainer such a Pokémon would choose as its partner... Strange thing is, no one’s seen or heard any sign of one.
You know, today was the first clear day we’ve had in quite a while...
I suspect that when the kirakira sunshine sparkles tomorrow morning, our mysterious sync pair will make an appearance!
Oh, how auspicious it would be if such a special sync pair were to arrive just as we’re celebrating this wondrous occasion!
It could be the chance of a lifetime! You should seize this opportunity, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Carpe diem, as they say!
legend_event_general_pm0873_00_sun_en.ls.legend_event_general_pm0873_00_sun/5201_: Can’t wait to see the sunrise!
Oh! Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Didn’t see you there!
Are you ready to see the sunrise? C’mon, let’s go!
legend_event_general_pm0873_00_sun_en.ls.legend_event_general_pm0873_00_sun/5202_: I’m stoked to see a rad Pokémon with the sunrise!
C’mon! I wanna feed off the sun’s energy and see that rad Pokémon everyone’s been talkin’ about!
Hurry up! The mountain’s callin’ our names, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5001_100: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m guessing that report about the mysterious dragon Pokémon caught your interest, too.
According to Trista’s sources, it doesn’t have a Trainer with it.
The thing is, there shouldn’t be any wild Pokémon on Pasio... Maybe it got lost and wandered here by accident? I dunno.
Apparently, this isn’t the first time a lone Pokémon has suddenly shown up here. Maybe there’s some kind of connection.
Either way, it sounds like everyone who’s tried to calm its rage so far has been no match for it.
I wonder what species it is... As a Pokémon Professor, I can’t let a rare opportunity like this pass me by.
But research aside, I really hope I can help. It might only be lashing out because it’s feeling alone and afraid in an unfamiliar place.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5001_040: Yeah! I knew I could count on you, cousin. With your help, this should go way more smoothly.
Thanks, cousin! With your help, this should go way more smoothly. Oh, and call me Kukui!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5001_100: Come on! Time to hustle our way through these glaciers like we’re using Quick Attack.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5002_100: Hang on a sec, cousin... I think I hear somebody.
Oho! Full points for that quick dodge!
Hey! You shouldn’t catch people off guard like that. It’s not nice.
Tell that to the masked weirdos who just attacked me outta nowhere. You know what they say... Get them before they get you.
Wait, Team Break are here, too? Not good... Listen, we’re not with those crooks.
My name’s Kukui—I’m a Pokémon Professor. This is [Name:PlayerNickname ].
And...I’m just a regular ol’ tourist, I guess? I dunno.
Anyways... Enough talking. I’m gonna have to ask you fine people to leave now.
Can’t let you get in the way of me making Rayquaza my partner!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5003_100: Niiice! Real nice! That’s a pretty sweet team you’ve got there.
You guys are leaps and bounds tougher than those masked weirdos I battled earlier.
Especially you, uh... [Name:PlayerNickname ], was it?
Yeah... There’s something special about you. You kinda remind me of someone I used to know.
Right. Well, if you’re ready to talk to us now...
I’ve got a question for you. It’s about the Pokémon you mentioned before—Rayquaza.
Is that the dragon Pokémon that appeared in this area recently?
Haha! Smart professor! You must know a thing or two about Rayquaza already.
Yep... If you keep heading this way, you’ll find the Sky High Pokémon, Rayquaza.
They say it’s lived far above the clouds in the ozone layer for hundreds of millions of years... A true Legendary Pokémon.
To be honest, I really couldn’t care less about the PML. I’ve been kinda bored ever since I arrived.
But from the moment I heard that Rayquaza had appeared, my mind’s been buzzing.
Which reminds me... [Name:PlayerNickname ], you sparked my curiosity.
This time, I’ve got a question for you.
Why do YOU think Rayquaza, a Legendary Pokémon, came here to Pasio?
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5003_030: I think it got summoned through a ring.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5003_040: A ring?! It’d have to be a pretty amazing ring to do that! Interesting...
Hmm... That’d be a pretty simple answer.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5003_100: Whatever! I honestly have no idea why it came here, either.
Anyways, nice chat! I’m gonna go now. Guess I’ll see you around, maybe!
Whoa, whoa—hang on, Zinnia! Why don’t we all just go together?
If Team Break are still lurking around, it could be dangerous acting alone, yeah.
Ahahaha! That’s so cute! A couple of sync pairs fighting for justice.
Thanks for the concern, but I’m fine! Trust me! I may not look like much, but I can handle myself in a fight.
Just...stay out of my way if you don’t wanna end up on the receiving end, ’kay?
Zinnia... She’s a mysterious one, yeah. Kind of evasive, too. I wonder what her deal is...
Rayquaza was already pretty worrying, but now I’m kind of concerned about her, too.
Let’s follow her trail!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5004_100: We haven’t seen any more of those Team Break thugs along the road... Think Zinnia cleared all of them out?
Rayquaza! Behold my power!
No matter how strong you are, there will always be things you can’t conquer alone, cousin.
For her, this could be one of those—
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5004_040: Phew... That was a close call!
Phew... That was a close call!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5004_100: So this is the infamous Rayquaza... Woo! That body’s packing some power, yeah!
Not gonna lie—you two’ve got pretty good timing.
All right, cool it with the bravado for now. First thing’s first, we need to heal that Pokémon of yours.
Let’s be honest here, cousin... There’s no way you and Salamence could have taken down an opponent like Rayquaza alone.
Why are you so fixated on this, huh? I can tell this isn’t just about catching a strong Pokémon for you.
Hmph. That’s...a bit of a long story.
In the past, I was given a mission... A mission to save the world with Rayquaza.
But in the end, I wasn’t able to achieve that mission. Instead, my story came to a tragic halt, and I lost everything I had.
That’s why I was so excited when I heard Rayquaza had appeared here. It felt like I was being given a second chance.
A chance to face Rayquaza once again... and to face myself.
To finally end this chapter so that I can start a new story...
with Rayquaza as my partner!
Er... I’m still a little unclear on the specifics, but I think I get where you’re coming from, yeah!
But we’re not just gonna let you jump back in there alone, OK?
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5004_030: We want to help you, Zinnia!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5004_040: Yeah! C’mon, Lycanroc! Time to unleash some superpowerful moves!
Yeah! C’mon, Lycanroc! Time to unleash some superpowerful moves!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5004_100: Ugh... I said I can handle myself alone.
Whatever. Just don’t get in my way, all right?
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5005_100: I can take it from here.
It’s time for a little heart-to-heart between me and Rayquaza.
I think it might be too soon to give the all clear... *sigh*
People and Pokémon are connected by more than just Poké Balls.
If she can open up her heart and be honest with Rayquaza, then maybe, just maybe...
Ever since I was a little girl, I’ve always turned my eyes up to the sky.
When I was so full of uncertainty that I felt my heart might be crushed by it...
and when I was so grief stricken and alone I thought my heart might break of it...
I turned and looked up there...so that my tears would never, ever fall.
If I filled my thoughts with lone dragons dancing across the sky, I felt like I could be noble and proud like that, too.
Even if I had to make a lot of sacrifices or if it meant I’d have to sacrifice myself...
I was prepared to fulfill my duty to protect this world... A world that my friend had tried to save.
Hey, Rayquaza... What does it feel like to live above the clouds? Is it lonely up there?
You’re a tough one, aren’t you.
Rayquaza... Can I ask you once more to grant my wish?
Please, lend me your strength...so that one day, I can fulfill the mission I’ve bestowed on myself.
Will you give me the strength to protect this beautiful, starry sky and all of the worlds that float beyond it?
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5005_040: I’m baaack. And I’ve got a new partner!
I’m baaack. And I’ve got a new partner!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5005_100: That is awesome! Woo! Can you believe you just formed a sync pair with a Legendary Pokémon?
Yeah, I guess I did...although I’m pretty sure it came with a condition.
I think Rayquaza wants to battle you two again.
