Maybe it wants to measure my strength as a Trainer now that we’re a sync pair.
You never know, yeah! It could be itching to battle because it’s excited to fight alongside its new partner.
I hadn’t thought of that. I guess I can’t really ask Rayquaza either way, though.
So, what’ll it be, guys? This could be a sweet opportunity for a Pokémon Professor to study the Legendary Rayquaza.
Woo! It doesn’t get any better than this! Hope you’re ready for a seriously fun battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5005_040: A fun Pokémon battle... I’ve kinda forgotten what that feels like.
A fun Pokémon battle... I’ve kinda forgotten what that feels like.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5005_100: I...I can feel my heart beating...faster and faster.
Yeah! I can feel it... My heart’s pounding!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5006_100: Phew... I hope my feelings got through to you in the end.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5006_040: Oh yeah! You and Rayquaza make an amazing combo, Zinnia!
Oh yeah! And that battle was the most fun I’ve had in a long time, cousin!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5006_100: Good stuff. Anyway, I guess it’s about time for us to hightail it outta here...
I know. When we fought together in that last battle, I think I understood what you were trying to say.
You aren’t— I mean, WE aren’t alone anymore.
Well then... You two are competing in the PML, right?
I hope you’re ready to win, ’cause Rayquaza and I are gonna lend you our strength!
Wait, are you saying you want to join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team and compete?!
Yeah! That’s exactly what I’m saying!
You guys did help me out in that fight against Rayquaza. I’m just repaying the favor, all right?
I mean, don’t expect us to be all buddy-buddy with each other just because we’re teammates or anything...
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5006_030: Glad to have you on the team!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5006_040: Oh yeah! If you’re thinking what I’m thinking, this is gonna be great!
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5006_100: Woo! This is gonna seriously strengthen your team, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s a good move— for you and for Zinnia and Rayquaza!
I hope so. Guess we can’t really know for sure, but at least this part of our story ended pretty well.
What are you saying, cousin? It’s way too soon to be talking about endings already!
Your new story with Rayquaza is just beginning!
A new story, huh... I’m not sure where the story’s going or what my mission is yet...
but if Rayquaza and I are the stars of the story, it sounds like it’s gonna be a fun one.
Hm? You wanna know what kind of story it’s gonna be?
Heh. You could use some imagination.
legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0384_00_rayquaza/5301_100: Rayquaza... I never thought I’d get the chance to see you again.
You must have had a reason for coming to this island.
Well then, guess I should take a stab at it.
Time to put my imagination to work! Haha!

legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1101_010: Curious about the strange rumor Professor Bellis had told [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ], [Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to go investigate.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_010: Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’ve been waiting for you.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_020: You’re headin’ up to the peak today, right? Professor Bellis gave us the lowdown.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_030: Me and Hau are goin’ with you! Personally, I’m hopin’ that seein’ the sunrise’ll give me some new inspiration.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_040: I just want to see the Pokémon all those rumors are talking about! I wonder what it is...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_050: Ready to hit the trail, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? It’ll be way more fun if we all hike up together!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_0401_070: All right, then! Let’s rock ’n’ roll!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_0402_090: Oh, I’m SO ready! I even packed us a bunch of malasadas in case we get hungry on the road!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_100: If we start to get tired, I’ll wake us up with a sweet bass solo. Ha ha!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_110: C’mon, let’s go! I can’t wait to see the sunrise and whatever Pokémon shows up with it!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_010: Well, howdy! You folks wouldn’t happen to be headin’ up to the peak, wouldja? Hopin’ to catch the sunrise?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_020: We are, actually! And we’re hoping to check out an awesome Pokémon up there, too.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_030: Ah, so you did hear the rumors, then...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_040: In that case, can I ask y’all a favor, hiker to hiker? I’m in awful need of a Pokémon battle to take the edge off right about now.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_050: See, I’ve been thinkin’ about that mysterious Pokémon lurkin’ up there, too, and... Well, golly, it’s got me shakin’ in my boots!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_060: Doesn’t sound like a bad idea to me! I wouldn’t mind a quick battle before dawn!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_010: Awww, guess you folks win this time... My Pokémon ’n’ I are feelin’ pretty tuckered out after our li’l battle before dawn.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_020: I think we’re gonna have ourselves a quick break here. Y’all are free to join us if ya like.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_030: What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Want to stop here and eat our malasadas before we get back on the trail?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_040: Whoa, whoa, hold up! Now’s not the time for malasadas, you two! We haven’t got much time left!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_050: The sun’s not gonna wait around for us to have a snack. C’mon, let’s get going!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_010: Woo-hoo! We finally made it to the peak! Looks like we’re just in time to see the sunrise.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_020: Yep! Check out the sky... It’s starting to get brighter and brighter! The sun’s probably gonna rise any minute now!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_030: That’ll check one thing off our list, but what about the super-awesome mystery Pokémon?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_040: Hmm... No sign of anything like that yet... Wait, look! The sun’s starting to rise!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_050: Whoa, check it out! There’s somethin’ on top of the rocks over there!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_070: N-no way! What kinda Pokémon is THAT?!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_080: Hang on! I...I think I know what that is!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_010: It’s...it’s Solgaleo! It appeared right when the sun started rising!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_020: Solgaleo? Have you seen it before, Hau?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_030: It’s a Legendary Pokémon from the Alola region. People call it “the beast that devours the sun”!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_040: Whoa! It doesn’t get much cooler than Solgaleo! Check out its mane—it looks just like the sun!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_050: Rad... It definitely seems like the Pokémon we’re lookin’ for.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_060: But what’s a Legendary Pokémon doin’ all the way out here on Pasio? And...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_070: Where’s its Trainer? It’s gotta be part of a sync pair, right? I don’t see anyone else around...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_080: What if it came here alone from someplace far away, to devour the sun like the legends say...?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_090: My grandpa once told me that Solgaleo have the power to travel to different worlds!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_100: Huh?! Where’d those other two Pokémon come from all of a sudden?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_110: Hang on—there shouldn’t be any wild Pokémon on Pasio! They must have come with Solgaleo.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_0401_130: Whoa, you’re right! They must be friends.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_0402_150: Maybe... They almost look like they could be a team.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_160: Uh, maybe it’s just my imagination...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_170: but it looks like Solgaleo wants to battle all the sync pairs gathered up here right now.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_180: Hah! If this Solgaleo doesn’t have a Trainer...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_190: I’ll take it down and form a sync pair with it myself!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_200: C’mon, sunshine! Let’s fight! You’re lookin’ at your new master, right here!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_210: Whoa, Solgaleo looks like it’s ready to pounce!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_220: You say that like it’s a bad thing! Watch this, kid. I’ll show ya how it’s done!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_230: Count me in! This is gonna be the most epic battle ever!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_240: Hold it! Legendary Pokémon or not, it’s not right to gang up on Pokémon like that.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_250: Haha! Are you serious? I mean, look at it— it’s practically taunting us all!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_260: Come on, Solgaleo! It’s time to battle!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_270: Th-that thing’s a beast... We’re no match at all for a Legendary Pokémon that strong...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_280: Guess that’s why we call ’em Legendary... Look! Solgaleo just crushed all those Trainers, and it’s barely breakin’ a sweat.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_290: Wahh! Why’s it looking at us?! Do you think it wants to battle us next?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_300: Heh, it’s about time! I’ve been wonderin’ when it’d finally be our turn to take the stage!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_310: C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s show this Legendary Pokémon how we rock ’n’ roll!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_010: That roar... I think that might be Solgaleo’s way of acknowledging our victory!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_020: How do you feel, Solgaleo! I bet the fire in our hearts got yours beatin’ like a drum!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_030: Huh. Is it just me, or does Solgaleo look a little too cheerful for having just lost?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_040: Maybe it had a ton of fun battling us, so we made it really happy!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_050: That’s my theory. Solgaleo probably loves having fun whenever it battles, just like us.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1101_060: As if in answer to Solgaleo’s valiant roar, a cool, refreshing breeze swept across the mountain peak with the morning sun...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_070: Wow, can you feel that breeze? The sunshine’s so nice up here, I don’t even feel tired anymore!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_080: Um... Am I goin’ crazy, or is Solgaleo givin’ off an even more intense vibe now?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_090: Whoa, you’re right! Maybe it got its energy back after eating up all that sunshine!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_100: It looks like it wants to battle again.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_110: That’s what I was thinkin’! Feels like it’s tryin’ to pump us up for another round!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_120: Yeah, I get the feeling Solgaleo doesn’t like to lose. It wants to prove it can beat us!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_130: Hehe, fine by me. You’ve got some guts, Solgaleo! I like your style!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_140: If you want more where that came from, then c’mon! Let’s battle it out till we forget our own names!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_150: Get ready, ’cause we’re about to blow your mind!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_010: Phew... How many battles is that now? I lost count...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_020: Not a...clue... I’ve barely had a...moment to breathe...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_030: That team must be crazy. After our battle, we were so exhausted that we could barely stand.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_040: I know, right? But what’s even crazier is...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_050: That Solgaleo, right? It’s duked it out with every single sync pair here... That’s just crazy!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_060: It looks like it might finally be satisfied.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_070: Hehe... Think our poisonous riffs satisfied its thirst for battle?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_080: I’ve been jammin’ out so hard, I forgot to watch the rest of the sunrise. Guess that means it was worth it!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_090: Huh, now that you mention it, I think I forgot, too.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_100: But the Pokémon that devours the sun arrived right along with it, right? So it’s kind of like we got to see both!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_110: Haha, I guess it’s true when you put it that way!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_120: Man, nothin’ beats gettin’ to have such a rad session with Solgaleo, though! Kinda feels auspicious, like Professor Bellis was sayin’!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_130: Speakin’ of which, we should probably start headin’ back soon, now that the sun’s up...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_140: Catch ya later, Solgaleo. Stay cool.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_150: Alola! Hope we can battle again sometime!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_160: Hey, wait a sec... Is it just me, or is Solgaleo followin’ us?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_170: Uhh...nope. It’s definitely not just you... It looks like it’s...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_180: Haha! I thought so! [Name:PlayerNickname ]... I think Solgaleo wants to be your partner!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_200: I guess I’d be cool with you and Solgaleo forming a sync pair.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_210: Yo, your battle skills were top-notch earlier! If anyone deserves to team up with Solgaleo, it’s you, kid!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_220: You heard ’em. So, what do you say, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_0401_240: Haha! I’m guessing that means it’s happy!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_0302_250: Guess I’ve got a new best friend!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_0402_260: You bet you do! Haha! You and Solgaleo are gonna make an awesome sync pair!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_270: Woo-hoo! Now we’ll get to hang out with Solgaleo whenever we want!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_280: Oh man! I hadn’t even thought of that! Hope we get to battle again sometime soon, Solgaleo!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5301_1001_010: Huh? Did those goons just teleport another sync pair to Pasio? I guess I should go welcome whoever it is...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5301_1001_020: Whoa... Uhh, OK. Wow. Is that Pokémon what I think it is? Uhh, Team Break definitely upped their game this time!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun_en.lsd.legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5301_1001_030: M-maybe this’ll be a good thing... More for people to celebrate, right? I mean, as long as it’ll help us stir up some excitement, right?

search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0100_10: Eager to learn more about team battling, [Name:PlayerNickname ] made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way over to Professor Bellis’s lab for some advice.
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0300_10: Oh! Hola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Welcome to my lab! Thanks for coming.
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0400_10: So, how have you been? How are your team battles going?
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_0301_0500_10: Great! I want to learn more!
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_0401_0600_10: Subarashii! That’s great! It sounds like you’ve accomplished quite a lot in a short amount of time. I’d love to see what you can do...
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_0402_0800_10: Ganbatte! Keep at it! With your Pokémon by your side, I’m sure you’ll get the hang of it in no time!
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_0900_10: As a matter of fact, I think I have an idea! Would you mind joining me for some fieldwork?
search_01_001_en.lsd.search_01_001/4301_1001_1000_10: There’s a trail in the mountains nearby that would be perfecto! Are you ready to leave now? Let’s go!

search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0100_10: Bravo! I can tell you’ve already formed an incredible bond with your Pokémon.
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0200_10: Speaking of which, has anyone told you how sync moves work or why we’re able to use them here on Pasio?
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0300_10: It has to do with these things called sync stones.
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0400_10: Have you ever noticed that there’s a shiny, rainbow-colored stone embedded in your Poryphone?
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0500_10: That’s a sync stone. They’re quite rare— in fact, they can only be found right here in the ocean where Pasio was built.
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0600_10: The interaction between sync stones and Pokémon is actually the prime subject of my research! It’s quite brilliant...
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0700_10: Sync stones amplify the power that comes from the bond between a Trainer and their Pokémon. I call this “sync strength.”
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0800_10: Tapping into that sync strength is what allows us to use sync moves, as you just demonstrated. That’s what makes battling on Pasio special!
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_0900_10: The more you and your Pokémon develop your sync strength—your bond—the happier you’ll be as a sync pair!
search_01_002_en.lsd.search_01_002/4301_1001_1000_10: In the end, that’s the real reason I’m continuing my research! Now, focus on your sync strength and try using your sync move again!

search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0100_10: Perfecto! My, my! You’re really getting the hang of how Pokémon battles work here!
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0200_10: I’m glad I was able to observe you up close today. This impromptu fieldwork has been so helpful!
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0300_10: To create an even playing field, we’ve given every sync pair their own Poryphone to use while here on Pasio.
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0400_10: Since each Poryphone contains a sync stone, everyone has the ability to use sync moves.
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0500_10: And as I explained before, as your bond with your Pokémon grows, your sync strength as partners grows, too.
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0600_10: I’ll be sure to share any new and helpful information I come across as I continue my research, OK?
search_01_003_en.lsd.search_01_003/4301_1001_0700_10: For now, I think our fieldwork is complete! Danke very much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Ta-ta!

search_01_004_en.lsd.search_01_004/4301_1001_0100_10: All right! Let the fieldwork begin!
search_01_004_en.lsd.search_01_004/4301_1001_0200_10: Why don’t you try tapping someone on the shoulder and get to conversing! A happy smile and an “Alola!” should do the trick!

search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0100_10: Oho! I see you’ve collected a badge or two! You must be aiming to compete in the PML.
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0200_10: Which means...you must have been transported here via one of those mysterious rings, correct?
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0300_10: Oh? You haven’t heard the rumors, then? Allow me to enlighten you...
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0400_10: It appears that some of the Trainers participating in the PML did not travel to Pasio on a boat.
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0500_10: In fact, there are rumors floating around that those Trainers were instead teleported here through strange rings or loops!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0600_10: Mysterious, isn’t it?! I wonder if the rumors are true... I’m so curious! Aren’t you curious?!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_0700_10: In any case... If you come across someone who knows the truth about the rings, do let me know, would you?
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_0401_0900_10: Thank you so much! I’ll continue doing some investigating of my own in the meantime. I hope to hear back from you soon!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_0402_1100_10: Wh-why the hesitation? Pleeease? Keep me in the loop—I beg of you!
search_02_001_en.lsd.search_02_001/4301_1001_1200_10: I’ll continue doing some investigating of my own in the meantime, all right? Yes? OK! I hope to hear back from you soon!

search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0100_10: Huh? A weird circle? Yeah, I think I saw something like that.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0200_10: I’m pretty sure it was a circle, anyways... I mean, it was definitely round...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0300_10: It was a Pokémon I never thought I’d see—that’s for sure. The world’s a big, big place...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0500_10: What? You want to know what Pokémon I saw?
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_1001_0600_10: Well, battle me and maybe I’ll tell you. If you can beat me, that is!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_0700_10: All right, I’ll tell you! The weird circle I saw was round...perfectly round!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_0800_10: The Pokémon was really cute...and pretty, too! It had a round head and a kind of mischievous look in its eyes.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_0900_10: That’s right! I saw an Alolan Persian! It was sooo cute!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1000_10: I’ve never seen a Persian of that form before!
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1100_10: Oh, I’m sorry... I guess that wasn’t the answer you were looking to hear, was it.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1200_10: What? You heard that mysterious rings or loops have something to do with the way people are being transported to Pasio? That’s weird...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1300_10: Now that you mention it, I think I’ve heard rumors about a Pokémon like that before... Something about moving objects through loops...
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1301_10: I overheard a pretty lady talking about how she got to Pasio not too long ago.
search_02_002_en.lsd.search_02_002/4301_0601_1400_10: Maybe she’ll have the information you’re looking for!

search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_0100_10: Ah, hello again! Well? Have you found any new information concerning the strange, mysterious rings?
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_0401_0300_10: I see... Alolan Persian, huh? I...uh...think we may need to keep looking, but thank you for your efforts thus far.
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_0600_10: Anyway, if the true solution was that simple  to find, the problem wouldn’t be worth solving at all, now would it!
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_0700_10: We must carefully examine all evidence and continue our pursuit of the truth!
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_0401_0900_10: Huh? Behind me? Did you see something?
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_0402_1100_10: Huh? What are you talking about? I don’t see anything.
search_02_003_en.lsd.search_02_003/4301_1001_1200_10: Tsk! I don’t appreciate pranks, you know... Anyways, I’m not going to give up on this search! Just tell me when you have more information!

search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0100_10: Heyyy, look who just showed up at the right place at the right time.
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0300_10: Hey, Sawyer... How ’bout we get these guys to help us out?
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0400_10: The young master gave us a specific job to do, Rachel.
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_0500_10: Duhhh. I know. But don’t you think Master Lear will be wayyy happier if we can get the job done even faster?
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_0401_0800_10: Heh heh, I think I’ll take that curiosity as a sign that you’d be willing to help us sniff out those Team Break goons...
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_0402_1000_10: Is today my lucky day? Yeah! You can help us sniff out those Team Break goons. You’ve gotta be pretty fed up with them, too, right?
search_03_001_en.lsd.search_03_001/4301_1001_1200_10: Oh, hush. It’s fiiine! Let’s just get this over with. Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s gooo!

search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0100_10: Blasted Team Break thugs...wreaking havoc everywhere you go while the young master’s trying to run a tournament!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0200_10: I knew there’d be more of them slinking around... And look, here they are. Surprise, surprise.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0300_10: Whoa! Check this guy out... Hey, muscle man! You and your pretty girlfriend over there need to scram! This is our turf!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0400_10: Who do you think you’re talking to? Master Lear handpicked the two of us to crack down on troublemaking misfits like you!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0101_0500_10: Yo! You guys take care o’ the big guy and the girl! Leave this bunch o’ losers to me.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0100_10: Arrgh! We gotta scram for now, boys! Let’s go!
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0200_10: Ugh, fiiinally. I thought that would never end. Come on. Let’s hurry up and report back to Master Lear.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0300_10: Not yet. We need to continue making our rounds. Team Break have probably scattered all over this island.
search_03_002_en.lsd.search_03_002/4301_0501_0400_10: Did you hear that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Sounds like we need your help for a li’l bit longer...

search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0100_10: Phew... Looks like we cleared out all the Team Break stragglers in this area.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0200_10: Hmm... Think we did good enough to squeeze a compliment out of Master Lear for once?
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0300_10: Rachel...the young master highly values the work that you do. You know that.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0400_10: I knowww, but he never says it to my face... I’m just saying, a li’l compliment here and there would be nice.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0500_10: Well, he’s got a lot on his shoulders for someone so young. Running the PML is no small feat.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0600_10: Yeahhh, Master Lear does seem pretty passionate about it. He says he’s gonna create a whole new way to battle, starting here on Pasio.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0700_10: That’s right. Right now, what the young master wants most is to see his tournament go off without a hitch.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0800_10: That’s why we’re out here keeping order. We can’t afford to let Team Break ruin Pasio’s reputation.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_0900_10: Yeahhh. We do it because we love him, huh, Sawyer.
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1000_10: L-love the—! The young master is someone I respect. He’s my prince!
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1100_10: Saaame thing.... Anyways, thanks a bunch for helping us out, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1300_10: However...the young master IS going to win the PML. Both of us support him wholeheartedly in that, all right?
search_03_003_en.lsd.search_03_003/4301_1001_1400_10: Well, maaaybe we could root for you a li’l bit, too. Juuust a li’l bit.

search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0701_0200_10: This whole area is made from real volcanic rock.
search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0701_0300_10: Word is there are some precious stones being found out here lately.
search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0701_0400_10: I’ve heard we can take whatever stones we want from here, so what do you think? Wanna have a look around?
search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0401_0600_10: I knew you would want to!
search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0402_0800_10: Ahaha! You’re all ready to go, aren’t you?
search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0701_0900_10: It’s pretty straightforward. Just smash some rocks that you find lying around and see what kind of stones are inside.
search_04_001_en.lsd.search_04_001/4301_0701_1000_10: Let’s see which one of us can find the most!

search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0701_0100_10: Huh, looks like a dead end.
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0701_0200_10: Maybe it’s time to give up and turn back?
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0401_0400_10: All right! Thanks for coming to look around with me!
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0401_0500_10: That took me back to my time in the Oreburgh Mine—I had a ton of fun! Let’s go again sometime.
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0302_0600_10: Maybe I could keep looking a little longer.
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0402_0700_10: All right! There might still be some places we overlooked!
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0702_0800_10: Maybe it’s time to give up and head back?
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0702_0900_10: Whoa, I can’t believe there was a hidden path here!
search_04_002_en.lsd.search_04_002/4301_0702_1000_10: Now I’m really excited! Let’s go see what we can find!

search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0701_0100_10: Wow, who knew there was a hidden spot like this? This is a real adventure now!
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0701_0200_10: I’m so glad we came—we got to see so many precious stones!
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0701_0300_10: Well, it looks like we’ve covered just about everything.
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0701_0400_10: What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Had enough mining for one day yet?
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0702_0500_10: That was awesome! You smashed all the rocks out here!
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0702_0700_10: As the man they call Roark the Rock, I can’t let myself be outdone!
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0702_0800_10: Looks like this is the end of the cave. Maybe it’s time to head back for the day?
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0401_1100_10: That brought me back to my time in the Oreburgh Mine. Let’s go again sometime!
search_04_003_en.lsd.search_04_003/4301_0402_1300_10: Hahaha, OK. You’ve got guts, huh? Let’s keep looking until you’ve had enough.

search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1101_0100_20: [Name:PlayerNickname ] had made [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] way to the forest to do some intensive training with [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon...
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1101_0200_20: when suddenly, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] heard the sharp cry of a different Pokémon nearby!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_0800_10: You...you all found him for me, didn’t you? How can I thank you?
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_0900_10: That Torchic... He’s my partner Pokémon!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_1000_10: I’m still an evolving Trainer—just a beginner, really. I’ve heard people call me a Rising Star, but...
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_1100_10: I’m not very confident in my battling skills yet... My Torchic doesn’t really listen to me.
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_1200_10: I only looked away for a moment earlier, and he ran away from me...
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_1300_10: Wait... Where’s Torchic now?! Don’t tell me he already ran off again!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_1001_1400_10: No way! I can’t believe this... Wh-where in the world did he go this time?!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_0401_1600_10: Y-you’re right... Panicking isn’t going to get me anywhere. I need to go find him!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_0302_1700_10: He can’t have gone too far!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_0402_1800_10: Y-you’re right... If I run now, I should still be able to catch up with him!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_0401_2000_10: Th-thank you so much! That would be amazing!
search_05_001_en.lsd.search_05_001/4301_0402_2200_10: Th-thank you so much! That would be amazing!

search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_1001_0100_10: There you are, Torchic! Oh, thank goodness.
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_1001_0200_10: This cute li’l Torchic belong to you, dollface? It came runnin’ outta nowhere... Bumped right into my leg.
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_1001_0300_10: Eeeek! Y-yes, he’s my p-partner! S-sorry, mister! I’m sure T-Torchic didn’t mean to run into you! It was an a-accident!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_1001_0400_10: What do you look so scared for, huh? It’s fine! I ain’t even mad about it!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0101_0100_10: If you wanna be a Trainer, you gotta stand up ’n’ fight—no matter how strong your opponent looks! C’mon, yo! You can start with me!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0401_0500_10: Hah! Your friend in the hat’s got the right idea! C’mon! Don’t hold back—I ain’t gonna go easy on you!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0402_0800_10: Hah! Your friend in the hat’s got the right idea! C’mon! Don’t hold back—I ain’t gonna go easy on you!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0501_0100_10: Whew! Your friend ’n’ [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon are beasts, dollface! You should buck up ’n’ learn somethin’ from ’em while you can. You got this!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0501_0300_10: He’s totally right. You two are sooo strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0501_0400_10: You and your partner are so in sync with each other. I wish we could be like that, too!
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0501_0500_10: Right, Torchic? Do you want to be like [Name:PlayerNickname ] and...
search_05_002_en.lsd.search_05_002/4301_0501_0700_10: Ah! There you are! What are you doing all the way over there?!

search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_0100_10: There you are, Torchic! I’m so glad you’re OK. We’ve been looking all over for you!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_0200_10: Thank you so much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I couldn’t have found him without you!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_0400_10: Wha—?! What’s gotten into you, Torchic? I didn’t even say anything...
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0401_0600_10: What? H-hold on a second! I never said anything about a battle.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0402_0800_10: Challenge? As in a battle?! Hold on a second! I never said anything about a battle.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_0900_10: Wait... I don’t even know why I said that. I DO want to battle you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. It’s just that...
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_1000_10: I think my gut reaction is still to be nervous and afraid. But deep down, I want to battle you more than anything!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_1100_10: Torchic could sense what I was really feeling, couldn’t you, buddy? Thanks for giving me the push I needed.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0101_1200_10: All right! Get ready for a battle that’s as good as—no, BETTER than that last one with the scary guy!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0401_1400_10: Great! Neither do I! Torchic and I plan to show you everything we’ve got!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0302_1500_10: Give me a second to prepare!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0402_1600_10: Sure, I can do that! Torchic and I are ready whenever you are!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0102_0100_10: I believe in my partner! If Torchic wants to win, I’ll be right there, fighting hard with him.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_0100_10: Hehe... It looks like we lost this time.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_0200_10: I’m sorry, Torchic. Either way, it was an amazing battle!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0401_0400_10: Yeah! I never knew Pokémon battling could be this much fun!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0402_0600_10: Yeah! I honestly never knew Pokémon battling could be this much fun!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_0700_10: I think I have Torchic to thank for that. After all, it was his confidence in me that encouraged me to jump into the battle.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_0800_10: The old me would have just run away.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_0900_10: I would have been way too afraid to challenge a strong Trainer like you.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1000_10: Thanks, Torchic. And thanks to you for such an amazing battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1100_10: Torchic and I are going to keep getting stronger and stronger. Next time we battle, I bet it will be even more fun!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1200_10: That reminds me... Can I ask you a big favor, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_10: I know it’s a lot to ask, but I have this Pokémon that I really want you to raise.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_11: Oh, no! It’s not my buddy, Torchic!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_12: It’s actually a second Torchic that I brought with me to Pasio.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_13: Meeting you and getting the chance to battle you has really changed me for the better, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1300_14: You’re the perfect person to raise this Torchic! I really hope you’ll consider it.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1400_10: I’m sure that during my adventure with Torchic I’ll still come up against things that make me feel nervous and afraid.
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1500_10: But when that happens, I’ll know that somewhere out there, you’re doing your best with Torchic— just like me!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1600_10: And knowing that will encourage me to stand up and fight hard, too!
search_05_003_en.lsd.search_05_003/4301_0501_1700_10: So what do you say? Will you raise this Torchic for me?

search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6601_1201_0100_10: There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I thought I would find you here!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6601_1201_0200_10: I wanted to show you my gratitude for helping me out with my show the other day.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6601_1201_0300_10: Come with me. Trust me, you won’t be forgetting today anytime soon.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6602_1201_0100_10: Mmm! I love the ocean breeze! And check out this great weather!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6602_1201_0200_10: Come on. Won’t you walk with me? We came all this way, so let’s enjoy the view together!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6603_1201_0100_10: I’m so glad we were able to come here today! It’s so much fun having you along!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0301_0200_10: Yeah, I think I’ll be heading home.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0300_10: Oh, OK. Hey, thanks for spending the day with me.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0400_10: I’m always so busy. Days off don’t come along too often, so today was a fantastic change of pace.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0600_10: It made me so happy when you said yes to coming here with me.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0700_10: I hope you had as much fun as I did.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0302_0800_10: Why don’t we stay here a little longer?
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0402_0900_10: Sure. We can relax a bit longer.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1101_0100_20: One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was invited to Elesa’s photo shoot. It was bustling with activity when [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] arrived at the meetup spot.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_0301_0200_10: All right! Let’s shoot some photos!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_0401_0300_10: There you are! Thanks for coming!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_0402_0500_10: There you are! Thanks for coming!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0600_10: Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t know you were invited, too!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0700_10: Elesa invited us to be in the shoot, too!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0800_10: All that’s left is Viola, but where is she? I wonder if she’s having trouble with her camera.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0900_10: Hmm... Well, we can’t waste too much time waiting for her. Let’s get this shoot started without her for now.
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_1000_10: Come on over here! Oh no, you’re not getting out of a picture with us!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0200_10: Wha—? Viola?! Were you there this entire time? What were you doing?
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0300_10: Sorry, sorry. I’ve been watching all of you for a while now!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0400_10: Thanks to that, I got some great candid shots of you, Elesa!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0500_10: Let me take a picture of the two of you. It’s the least I can do for these great shots I got to take!
search_2020_kamitsure_en.lsd.search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0600_10: Now, line up over there for me!

search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_1031_0200_10: They’re so shiny, and they’re only found here...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_1031_0300_10: I’d look so great wearing one...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0100_10: Hmm... I wonder how I can get my hands on a sync stone...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0200_10: They’re so shiny and pretty... It’d be so cute if I could make one into a hair clip!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4401_0701_0300_10: I heard they can only be found at a special spot in the ocean around Pasio!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0100_10: It’s important for sync pairs to have strong bonds so that we can use sync moves! So we need sync strength! And a sync stone, of course!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0200_10: Wait...is that right? I said the word “sync” so many times that I’m not sure anymore...
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4402_0701_0300_10: A-anyway, you have to use lots of regular moves before you can use your sync move, OK?! At least...that’s what I heard!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0100_10: I see, I see... So you two have been building up your trust in one another for decades now? How wonderful!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0200_10: Yep, this one and I’ve been rollin’ together all our lives!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0300_10: Wonderful! You could almost pass for twins!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4403_0701_0400_10: Gahahaha! People don’t say we look alike fer nuthin’!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0100_10: Therefore, we can conclude that communication is crucial in team battles!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0200_10: So...what you’re saying is the team members all have to be on the same page, correct?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0300_10: Well, practice makes perfect... Hey, look! Some Trainers! Let’s battle—my team against yours!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0400_10: Hold on—I’m not ready! Don’t go challenging people all on your own!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4404_0701_0500_10: Oh shoot, right... Communication... Sorry, we’re gonna need to take a rain check on that battle!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0200_10: Mi corazón is going doki doki because you’re so belle, capisce? How about tú and je have a walk conmigo?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0400_10: Sorry, I have no idea what you just said.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0701_0500_10: You have to use your words properly, or else no comprendo.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4405_0702_0100_10: I can’t believe that tu ne comprends pas... What is there to not understand?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0100_10: I tend to babble on endlessly whenever the subject of sync pairs comes up!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0200_10: But you see, it’s my job as a researcher to spread the information I discover!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0300_10: Mm-hmm... I expect magnifico things from you. I hope you go on to become a fantastique sync pair! Do your best!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0400_10: Oh! I can tell that little boost of encouragement has really lifted your spirits.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0701_0500_10: If a passerby is kind enough to give you a morale boost, it can make you feel a little stronger for a while! Remember that!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4501_0702_0100_10: If a passerby is kind enough to give you a morale boost, it can make you feel a little stronger for a while! Remember that!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4601_0701_0200_10: Your Pokémon was just so lovely that I couldn’t help but stare! Here, take this as an apology.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4601_0702_0300_10: Oh my! It’s even more lovely up close!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4601_0702_0400_10: Oh, I’m in love... Aren’t Pokémon just the best? Let me look at your Pokémon again sometime!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0100_10: Hey, it’s Professor Bellis! What’cha doin’?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0300_10: Oh...yeah! Of course! Fieldwork! I love fieldwork, too!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0101_0400_10: Er, why don’t we have a Pokémon battle? You know, for fieldwork?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0401_0100_10: All right! I’m goin’ all out!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0402_0100_10: Aw, that’s a shame. Maybe next time!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0102_0100_10: Remember, this is all in the name of fieldwork!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0501_0100_10: By the way, what is fieldwork?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0601_0100_10: Fieldwork is something that gets us very excited!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4701_0601_0200_10: Oh, I get it! It’s like a field day! They both got the word “field” in ’em, too!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0100_10: Hm? Are you lookin’ for an opponent for a Pokémon battle?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0200_10: Bingo! Yo quiero a great Pokémon battle!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0300_10: Er...yo...what? Speak English, Doc! We ain’t scientists!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0400_10: Anyway, you’re lookin’ for a battle, right?
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0401_10: Oui oui!  I think this will be our last battle of the day!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0101_0402_10: What do you say we win this match and end our fieldwork with a bang!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0401_0100_10: Well then, let’s get this rollin’!
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0402_0100_10: Don’t worry. We ain’t goin’ nowhere. We’ll be here when you’re ready.
search_general_talk_01_en.lsd.search_general_talk_01/4702_0102_0100_10: There you are. Are you ready?

search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_1031_0200_10: Pasio is my stage to shine!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0100_10: Oh, are you scouting new talent? Why, of course! I’d be happy to...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0200_10: Huh? A mysterious ring? What are you talking about?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0300_10: Ugh... I gave you my best smile thinking you were scouting for models! Now you just want to ask me questions? How lame.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0400_10: Teleporting across the world through rings, huh? Um...did you hit your head or something? How does that even sound possible to you?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4401_0701_0500_10: Some important-looking person asked me  something or another like that back there, too. Why don’t you go ask them?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0100_10: A good mode of transport is essential to having a great adventure!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0200_10: I’m certain that how I came to Pasio was the best way.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_1031_0300_10: But I wonder how I should get home...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0100_10: Hm. You want to know how I came to Pasio?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0200_10: I came by ferry, same as everybody else. It was such a nice trip!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0300_10: Another way to travel? I haven’t heard of one.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0701_0400_10: If there is one, maybe I’ll try that out to get home.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0702_0100_10: A mysterious ring? I don’t think I saw one on the ferry... Hmmm... A mysterious ring...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4402_0702_0200_10: Maybe a Pokémon has something to do with it. If that’s the case, I think there’s a gentleman up ahead who mentioned something like that.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0100_10: Did you know that this island is completely artificial? We were on the construction team that built it!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0200_10: Pretty sweet, huh? Looks like a real island now that all these people showed up! Guess our hard work really paid off!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0300_10: He says that, but it’s really his Machamp that did the hard work.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4403_0701_0400_10: Don’t become a grown-up like him. Remember that you work together with your Pokémon!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0100_10: I heard that somebody saw some strange things around here... Are you interested in that, too?
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0200_10: I see! Then we are kindred spirits!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4404_0701_0300_10: If you find anything out of the ordinary,  please let me know. If you don’t...
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4405_0701_0100_10: Come on, let’s go back.  There aren’t any rare Pokémon around here.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4405_0701_0300_10: Aaah! There’s something there! Nonononono! Let’s get out of here!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0100_10: Oh no, I’ve been spotted!  P-please, d-don’t open up another hole! I don’t wanna be taken anywhere else!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0200_10: Who...who are you? Are you one of its minions?!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0701_0300_10: I’m sorry, I’m sorry! Here, take this and leave me alone!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4601_0702_0100_10: Be careful of holes! They’ll transport you all over the place! Eeek!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4501_0701_0100_10: Hey, there you are! A researcher guy asked me to look for you.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4501_0701_0200_10: He told me to help out a Trainer wearing a hat who was traveling with a Pikachu!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/4501_0702_0100_10: I don’t know what that was all about, but I think I did my job well!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0100_10: You’re looking for a strange Pokémon? What a coincidence! I am, too!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0200_10: By the way, what information do you have? Will you share it with me? Come on.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0300_10: You only know of a mysterious hoop? That’s it? No, you’re hiding something, aren’t you? Why aren’t you telling me? Huh?!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0400_10: Fine! Pokémon battle! Now! And if I win, you tell me everything!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0402_10: I swear I’ll get to the bottom of this mysterious Pokémon puzzle...and you’re going to help me!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0404_10: Fine, then! I suppose I can wait a little longer!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0101_0405_10: You’re back! This time I won’t let you go without a battle! Tell me everything you know about that mysterious Pokémon!
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0200_10: Oh gosh, I’m so sorry. I just lost my temper and saw red.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0300_10: I like Pokémon so much that people around me say that I’m a bit of a weirdo.
search_general_talk_02_en.lsd.search_general_talk_02/2861_0501_0400_10: If there is a strange Pokémon around here, I think I can really relate to it.

search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0100_10: I wonder what kind of country it is...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0200_10: He’s next in line for the throne, right?
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_1031_0300_10: An actual real-life prince! Isn’t that dreamy?
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0100_10: Lear? Of course I know him!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0200_10: He’s supposedly the prince of some country, huh.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4401_0701_0300_10: If he’s got the kind of power that would allow him to build an entire island like this, he’s got to be incredibly rich!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_1031_0300_10: But a lot of people think he’s a bad guy...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0100_10: Lear pwetends to be mean, but he’s actually a weally wespectable puyson.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0200_10: He’s talented—and always twied his hahdest to become the pwince he is today!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4402_0701_0300_10: I huyd a lady with puyple haiyuh saying that!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0100_10: Not too shabby, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s keep up the pace!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0200_10: Heh, Rachel’s right. It’s obvious you kids have grown a lot as Trainers since the last time we saw you.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0300_10: But the young master’s putting in just as much effort—if not more. He’s made sure the volcanoes and glaciers all look as realistic as possible...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0400_10: all so that the Trainers who come to Pasio can experience Pokémon battles in a load of different environments.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4403_0701_0500_10: Sooo true. Master Lear’s not just a genius—he’s a hard worker, too.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0100_10: Hey, you’re not gonna believe it! I saw a sync pair being attacked by Team Break!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0200_10: And get this: Lear helped the Trainers!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0300_10: Wait, whaaat?! Lear, as in Prince Lear? And you’re saying that he actually helped somebody?
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0701_0400_10: Yeah, I was as surprised as you are. Maybe he’s a better guy than we thought.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0702_0100_10: I’m having a hard time imagining a nice Lear...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4404_0702_0200_10: Well, it is true he has a major attitude problem. If he fixes that, he might turn out to be a good tournament host.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0100_10: Shhh! Don’t scream! I promise, I don’t bite!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0200_10: Rachel fan? Me? Nah, I couldn’t care less about her.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0701_0300_10: Sawyer’s the one I gel with, man. Now here! Take this and leave me alone!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4601_0702_0100_10: Ahhh, he’s so ripped! Body-building goals, dude...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0100_10: These other Team Break thugs look stronger than the last ones. Don’t let your guard down, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0200_10: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ]’ll be fiiine. Even Master Lear has his eye on [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] lately. Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? This’ll be, like, a piece of cake for you.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0300_10: I mean, if we’re being toootally honest here, the two of us are lookin’ forward to seeing what you can do, too.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0400_10: Leave it at that, Rachel. We just happen to share an enemy with [Name:PlayerNickname ] right now... That’s all.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4501_0701_0500_10: I know, I knooow... Only be nice if it benefits Master Lear...
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0101_0200_10: I’ll make you head over heels for me just like everybody else!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0301_0100_10: I’d like to see you try.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0401_0100_10: Ooh, I like you. You’ll fit right in with my other followers!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0402_0200_10: No, wait! Don’t run away! I know I seem suspicious, but I swear I’m not a bad person!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0102_0100_10: I see you thought it over.
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0102_0200_10: I’ll make you head over heels for me just like everybody else!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0501_0100_10: I thought I could show off to all my followers!
search_general_talk_03_en.lsd.search_general_talk_03/4701_0501_0200_10: It doesn’t matter if you lose! This weak and vulnerable side of you is just as lovely!

search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4401_0701_0100_10: They literally come out of, like, rocks?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4401_0701_0200_10: Rocks that are brought here to Pasio change and are said to become quite precious stones!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4401_0701_0400_10: We are seeking them out, as they play an important role in the Evolution of Pokémon!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4401_0702_0500_10: I mean, like, the name “Evolution materials” sounds like they’re really important? So everybody wants them?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4401_0702_0600_10: Well then, Madame Punk, let us search out and acquire all the Evolution materials for ourselves!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_1031_0100_10: Punches today! Punches tomorrow! Punches forever!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_1031_0200_10: Discipline is a way of life!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0100_10: Hey, you can’t touch this rock!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0200_10: Punches today, punches tomorrow, punches forever! I live to punch my days away!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0300_10: Punches today, punches tomorrow, punches forever! Hiyah! Heeyah!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0500_10: I punched my days away until my fists became as hard as rock.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0600_10: Surely someday I will be able to pulverize this rock with my fists!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0700_10: Yes, as I talk with you, I’m beginning to feel that today is that day.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_0800_10: All right! All right! Visualize it! Prepare yourself mentally! All right! All right!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0702_1000_10: No matter what the task at hand, if you stay positive, you will find that you can awaken some hidden power within yourself.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0702_1100_10: There is nothing that my fists can’t smash! Heeyah!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_1200_10: You smashed something even greater than just rock...
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4402_0701_1400_10: Huh?! I can’t control my fists! Somebody stop me!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_1031_0100_10: I just have to wait until no one is around, then...
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_1031_0300_10: Wait, wait. I need to calm down.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0100_10: Huh? Is this a dead end?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0300_10: A dead end... Guess I should go look for some other place to mine precious stones.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0702_0400_10: Hmm... This path being a dead end is a real bummer.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0702_0500_10: What a shame! I’ve wasted so much time. Not to mention my considerable talents!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0702_0600_10: You should probably go look somewhere else. Nothing to see here...
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_1032_0700_10: The wall is gone, so I guess everything is fine?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0700_10: How did you know there was a secret passage here?!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0800_10: I was sure I had fooled you! Can you read minds or something?!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_0900_10: Well, I guess it can’t be helped.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_1000_10: We’ll split it! I’ll give you half! Yeah, half!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4403_0701_1100_10: If you take it all for yourself, I’m gonna get angry for real!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_1031_0100_10: We used to have one of those back home...
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_1031_0200_10: Reminds me of when I was just a youngster...
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0101_0100_10: When I look at this track, for some reason, it makes me think of how I got here.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0101_0200_10: I remember walking home along the tracks, crying after my Rattata and I lost.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0101_0300_10: That was a long, long time ago. Have I evolved since then?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0301_0400_10: Let’s have a battle and find out!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0401_0500_10: All right! I’ll find the answer I’m looking for in battle!
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0402_0700_10: Hahaha! Yes, of course. Why am asking you?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0102_0800_10: Let me ask you once more: Do you think I’ve been able to evolve since I was a youngster?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0501_0900_10: Hahaha! I haven’t evolved at all! I never was any good at Pokémon battles, no matter how much fun I think they are...
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0501_1000_10: And after all these years, I’m still battling.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4701_0501_1100_10: I certainly did find something that I really love.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0100_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve got some information I think you’ll be interested in.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0200_10: I heard recently you can get some precious stones in this area! Wanna go have a look?
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0300_10: I thought it’d be fun if we could go look together.
search_general_talk_04_en.lsd.search_general_talk_04/4101_1001_0400_10: I’ll go on ahead. Come find me if you feel like joining in!

search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_1031_0200_10: Maybe he doesn’t think I’m worthy...
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0100_10: Seriously, where did Torchic run off to?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0200_10: I’m not really confident in my skills as a Trainer... What if Torchic doesn’t think I’m a good partner?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0300_10: Um...[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Can I ask you a favor?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_0701_0400_10: While we’re searching for Torchic, do you think you could give me some tips on how to become a better Pokémon Trainer?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_0702_0500_10: If I gain some more confidence, maybe Torchic will finally acknowledge me.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4401_0702_0600_10: I’m sure I could learn so much from you and your partner, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Will you help me? Please!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0100_10: You want to know how to be better friends with your Pokémon? Well, for starters, you can’t be uncertain or anxious.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0200_10: Pokémon can tell when their Trainer is feeling out of sorts.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0300_10: You’ve got to brush off that negativity, walk right up to the Pokémon you want to befriend, and then—
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4402_0701_0400_10: Ahhh! Yesss... What a sweetie you are!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4402_0702_0500_10: I know it looks like she bit me, but she didn’t. She’s just showing me affection.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4402_0702_0600_10: There, see? Look at what good friends we are!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_1031_0100_10: Where has my poor, sweet Torchic gone?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_1031_0300_10: Come back, Torchic! I promise I’ll do better!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0100_10: Torchic is actually the first partner Pokémon I’ve ever had.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0200_10: He’s so small and cute. I love him to bits!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0300_10: But I get scared and run away every time I see a strong Trainer.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_0701_0400_10: My lack of confidence probably makes things a lot harder for Torchic... No wonder he doesn’t listen to anything I say.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_0702_0600_10: Did you hear that?! It’s Torchic! He’s calling for me! I shouldn’t be moping around like this.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4403_0702_0700_10: I need to be better and try my hardest—just like you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Wish me luck!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4404_0701_0100_10: Man, ain’t she a piece o’ work! Sheesh!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4404_0701_0200_10: When I was her age, I’d duke it out with any Trainer I saw—no matter how strong they looked.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4404_0701_0300_10: What she needs is to buck up and fight a bunch o’ different sync pairs! Grow some...guts, if ya know what I mean!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4405_0701_0100_10: Hm? You want to know about the bond I have with my Pokémon? Well, we actually started off as partners at work.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4405_0701_0200_10: Bulbasaur’s always had an easygoing nature, and I’m his super-perfectionist polar opposite. We were never in sync...and it showed.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4405_0701_0300_10: I figured the best way to get in sync with Bulbasaur would be to get to know him much, much better.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4405_0702_0400_10: So I did! We went out on the weekends together, hung out, and just spent more time together in general.
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4405_0702_0500_10: Before I knew it, we understood each other like we never had before—and we’d become the best partners ever!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0100_10: Come on—you’re a Rising Star! Calm down, and take a deep breath! You can do this!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0200_10: How many times have I told you to be bold, have confidence—
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0300_10: Wh-what? I’m n-n-not doing anything weird or s-s-suspicious at all! Nope!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0400_10: See that g-girl over there? I’m kinda like her mentor... So I’m just trying to keep an eye on her, OK?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4601_0701_0500_10: You look like you could help her grow as a Trainer... Here, take this!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4601_0702_0100_10: Just don’t tell her you saw me, OK?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4501_0701_0100_10: Phew! Man, it feels good to be out of that dark cave and back in the sunshine!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4501_0701_0200_10: Yodel-ay-hee-hoo! Hey, you over there! You’re out here for some Pokémon battlin’ today, aren’t you?
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4501_0701_0300_10: Feels like days since I last saw another human! Let me yodel y’all a fightin’ song to boost your morale! Yodel-ay-hee-hoo!
search_general_talk_05_en.lsd.search_general_talk_05/4501_0702_0100_10: Gahaha! Now y’all are ready for any challenger comin’ your way! Good luck!

search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4401_: Check out my outfit! It’s the pinnacle of fashion, don’t you think?!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4402_: What a lovely beach... I just wish I had brought my swimsuit. *sigh*
It’s not so bad, is it? I mean, you can enjoy the beach without swimming, right?
You just don’t get it, do you? I should be wearing a swimsuit that fits a beach as beautiful as this.
I’d look great swimming in the ocean here!
Yeah, it’s true that people can bring out their charm by focusing on the right outfit and setting.
But as a model, no matter where I am or what I’m wearing, the real dazzle comes from me.
A swimsuit would be awesome, too!
You’ve got a point. A swimsuit does make its wearer shine on a beach. But I can shine in any outfit!
Your sygna suit makes you stand out even more on the beach!
Aw, thanks! It makes me really happy to hear you say that!
I’ll dazzle everyone with this sygna suit!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4403_: It feels great to shout at the ocean! You should try it, too!
Sounds like fun. Let’s see... What should I yell?
Sounds good! I’ll show you my passion!
Wooper stubbed its toe and cried out! “Wooowww!”
Wooo... Owww... A pun?! How did I feel such passion from a pun?!
I like that! I’m fired up!
Rhydon’s my favorite Pokémon! I think it’s “right on!”
Rhydon... Right on... A pun?! I didn’t expect that!
I can’t believe you put so much emotion into a pun!
I never knew puns could be so awesome! Let me try one out, too!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4404_: Ahahaha! You look like you’re in a good mood, Surskit!
Look at those two over there. They look like they’re having a lot of fun!
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s join in the fun! Come on—we don’t come to the beach often!
That’s what I wanted to hear! Let’s go talk to them!
I like your style! Let’s go talk to them!
Wait, are you...THE Elesa?! Omigosh, of course! You don’t mind, right, Surskit?
Thanks! Now, let’s do something fun! Any ideas?
How about a foot race? OK, let’s go!
That was so much fun! It feels great to run all-out once in a while, doesn’t it?
Ahhh! Elesa running on the beach... So gorgeous!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4405_: While we’re waiting for Viola, you can count on me behind the camera!
Thanks, Skyla! All right, then let’s get started!
OK then, Swanna! It’s time to fly into the Pasio skies!
Looking good! You wanna see how it turned out?
You can even see the arena!
Wow, you’re right! It looks so small!
Yeah. It really puts into perspective how impressive Pasio is, doesn’t it?
But...you were too far from us, Skyla. I can’t even make out our faces.
You know what? It’s a nice picture. Thanks, Skyla!
Of course! And if you ever want to see that view for real, let me know!
