Leave it to The Highflying Girl! I’ll take you as high up as you want!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4406_: Hmm, Viola’s not here yet. Why don’t I take that picture for you?
I take pictures of my Pokémon from time to time, so I think I’d be a good photographer!
Oh, I didn’t know you were into photography. Then yeah! If you wouldn’t mind.
Ahahaha! Look, look! I think it turned out pretty good, if I do say so myself!
There are more shadows than there are people...
Yeah, it sure looks like there are ghosts all around us in this photo... It would probably scare most normal people.
Yeah, it sure looks like there are ghosts all around us in this photo... It would probably scare most normal people.
Haha! Taking pictures is so much fun! Next time, I’ll take even more amazing ones!
search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure_en.ls.search_general_talk_2020_kamitsure/4407_: Hi, sorry. Would you mind taking our picture?
E-E-Elesa...talked to m-m-me! Of course! I-I-I’d love to!
Thanks! Make sure [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s in the shot too, OK?
Sorry, they’re all fans of you, too.
You got a picture with Elesa! What I wouldn’t give to be in your shoes!

story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey there, friend! Welcome to the world of Pokémon Masters!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m Blue! I’m a pretty big deal around here.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: But enough about me. Tell me about you!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: So your name’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]? That’s got a nice ring to it.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], buckle up, because there’s a huge team tournament  right around the corner.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: The Pokémon Masters League! Or PML, for short.
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: It’s one big festival for Pokémon Trainers like us. Trainers from all over the world gather to form  teams of three and battle it out!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Each Trainer can only use one Pokémon,  though, so the real challenge is how well  your team works together!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: We’re gonna meet so many awesome Trainers here! It’s kind of crazy to think about. I know I’m excited!
story_00_01000_en.lsd.story_00_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Well then, off we go!  To the world of Pokémon Masters!

story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hello! Nice to meet you! I’m Trista, the receptionist here at the Pokémon Masters League.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0110_10: Would you and Pikachu like to register to compete, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? If so, you’ll be needing one of these!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: This is a Poryphone! It’s a multi-purpose information device that is an absolute must-have here on Pasio!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Since team battles are the norm here at the PML, you’ll need your Poryphone to communicate with the other sync pairs on your team.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oops! I got ahead of myself. “Sync pair” is a special term we use here on Pasio to describe a single Trainer-Pokémon pair.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hm? Are you perhaps looking for a team?
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: In that case, you’re in luck! I just met a couple other sync pairs who are searching for new teammates as well. I’ll introduce you!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: So, we heard you were looking for a team, too?
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: You look like you’re raring to go! Let’s take on the PML together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Why not?  It looks like [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’s' F='she’s' ] got some fire in [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] eyes.
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh, I’m Misty, by the way. Let’s give this tournament our best shot!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: And I’m Brock! Glad to be on your team!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1350_10: Well, now that we’re all together,  why don’t we head out to the city?
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Lots of Trainers like to gather around just outside the Pokémon Center. It shouldn’t be too hard to find more teammates there!
story_00_02000_en.lsd.story_00_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Here. Take this, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s head out whenever you’re ready!

story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: This is Centra City, the biggest city on Pasio. You might be surprised to know that Pasio is a completely artificial island!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Now then, I have a sync pair in mind  that might be willing to join our team,  so let’s go look for them.
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Oh, are you talking about that girl from Unova? I think I saw her in the square up ahead not too long ago...
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Will you please stop?! It’s against the rules to force a Trainer to battle if they don’t want to!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Sounds like trouble... Do you think they’re OK? We should see if they need help!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’m sorry, but I just can’t battle right now. My Pokémon needs to rest—she’s worked hard enough for today.
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yeah! If you really want to battle, you’ll have to challenge her another day!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Forget that! You’re battling me now, Champion!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: There’s no way I’m passin’ up a chance like this! C’mon, let’s just battle already!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hey, you two! Cut that out! Don’t you see you’re bothering them?
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: You look like you could use a hand, Rosa. Don’t worry—we’ll take care of these guys!
story_01_01000_en.lsd.story_01_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Who are you? If you wanna start somethin’, you got it! We’ll make you eat dirt!

story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: I...I can’t believe we lost to you bozos! Argh! You’ll pay for this!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Nice timing, you guys! Cynthia and I were having a nice chat before those two started harassing us...
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: So that’s what was going on... All in all, I’m glad nothing bad happened.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Oh, I should introduce you two. [Name:PlayerNickname ], this is Rosa. She’s a famous Trainer from the Unova region.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Hiya! Rosa here! Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: We were looking for you because we wanted to talk to you, but...
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Imagine our surprise when we saw you  with the Sinnoh Champion. Who would have thought you’d be here, too!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Ahh, so you’ve heard of me, then.  You’re correct—I’m Cynthia. Lovely to meet  you all. I’m flattered you think so highly of me.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: Thanks for helping us back there. I really appreciate it.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: You especially, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... That was a magnificent battle. I sense a great deal of potential in you!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: If there are other Trainers like you here competing in the PML, I’m even more excited for things to get started.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Next time we cross paths with one another, we should have a Pokémon battle.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Look at you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You actually managed to impress THE Cynthia!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: But she was right to be impressed. You were great in battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: Right, we had something we wanted to talk to you about, Rosa.
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: We’re looking for people to join our team  for the PML. What do you think?
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: Ahh... So that’s why you came to find me. I’m so flattered!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: But first things first. We’ve gotta have a Pokémon battle!
story_01_02000_en.lsd.story_01_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: A battle should teach me all I need to know about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Show me what you’ve got!

story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: That was impressive, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re way better than I expected!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’d be more than happy to join your team, if you’ll have me!  You didn’t change your minds, did you?!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0301_0300_10: Nope! Glad to have you on board!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0401_0400_10: Yay! Thank you, thank you! Oh gosh, this is so exciting! I promise I’ll give it my all!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0302_0500_10: Nah. We’ll be counting on you!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_0402_0600_10: Absolutely! You can count on me for sure! I promise I’ll give this my best shot!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: Oh! Speaking of which, I should introduce you all to my new friend, Barry! We met here on Pasio.
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: OK, that sounds good. As they say, the more the merrier!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: The last time I saw him, he said he’d be heading to the beach for a while!
story_01_03000_en.lsd.story_01_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: I can take you there, if you want! Come on! Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: This way, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Barry should be just up ahead!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hurry up! I want to introduce you all!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: OK, OK! Hold your Horsea... What kind of person is this Barry, anyway?
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hmm... I think I’d describe Barry as a pretty straightforward, purehearted, “nice guy” sort of Trainer!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: He’s always so earnest and sincere— I feel like I could learn a lot from him!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Oh, and on top of all that, he’s also a really great Pokémon Trainer!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Even Cynthia speaks highly of him!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Wow, really? I’m looking forward to meeting this Barry now!
story_02_01000_en.lsd.story_02_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Well, come on, then! Let’s hurry!

story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hmm... I wonder what the deal is with those weird, masked Trainers.
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’ve heard some rumors! Apparently, a bunch of Trainers wearing masks have been running around trying to steal people’s Pokémon!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Seriously?! It seems like I run into jerks like that everywhere I go... Next time I’m not gonna let them off so easily.
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: I’ve been waiting for you guys FOREVER!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: You’re those Team Break guys, aren’t you?! Play dumb, and you’ll pay a fine!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Team Break? What’s that? Oh! Is that you, Barry?
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Wait, hold on—THIS is the guy we were  looking for?! Why is he yelling at us?
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: Here we go, Piplup! Let’s show them what we’re made of!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Eeek! It doesn’t look like we’re getting through to him at all!
story_02_02000_en.lsd.story_02_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]!  It looks like we’re gonna have to battle him!

story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: What just happened?! Did I really just lose to Team Break?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Barry, listen to me! It’s me, Rosa! Look!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Huh? Wait... Is that you, Rosa? Hold on... So you guys aren’t Team Break?
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: No! Took you long enough to realize. You nearly scared the living daylights out of us!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: What?! Oh... I’m sorry about that! Guess I jumped to the wrong conclusion.
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: But on the bright side, I’m glad I didn’t lose to Team Break!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: Wait, Rosa, you know who I’m talking about, right? They’re those suspicious weirdos that wear goofy masks!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yeah, we just dealt with a few ourselves. Why do you think they’re causing all this trouble? They’re a real nuisance, if you ask me...
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Oh, so they came after you, too, huh? Man, what is their problem?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: Oh yeah! By the way, what are you guys doing here? Did you come to take down Team Break?
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Oops, I almost forgot! We actually came here looking for you!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], I’d like to introduce you to my friend Barry!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: He’s a famous Trainer from the Sinnoh region. He can be a little impulsive at times...but other than that, Barry’s a really dependable guy!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: So, Barry, we’ve actually been on the lookout for sync pairs who might want to join our team for the PML!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: What do you think? Would you be interested in joining [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: For the PML?! I really want to, but Team Break are still out there...
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: I heard there’s a spot nearby where they like to hang out... Aww, man! Should I join up with you or go deal with Team Break?!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0401_2000_10: I like that plan! Come on, Barry! Let’s go take down those Team Break meanies!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0401_2100_10: Seriously?! All right! If we can take those clowns down, I’ll join your team!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0402_2300_10: Wait, you’re gonna help me find those clowns?! That would be great!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_0402_2400_10: You know what? I think I WILL join your team. We’re gonna be awesome together!
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: So like I was saying before, I heard Team Break’s been using a cave nearby as their hideout.
story_02_03000_en.lsd.story_02_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Come on! I’ll race you there! Last one to the cave’s a rotten egg!

story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: He’s not wearing a mask!  He might not be part of Team Break at all!
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: Ahh! Guess I jumped to the wrong conclusion again... Sorry about that!
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: It’s all right. No harm done... I’m Paulo.
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: As a Pokémon Trainer, I can’t just sit by and let Team Break get away with what they’re doing. I came here to crush them once and for all.
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m here for the same thing! This is one of their hideouts, right?
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: Yeah. Don’t let your guard down— they could attack us from anywhere...
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: Well, look at what we got here! Didn’t think we’d get suckers showing up on their own... Let’s teach ’em a lesson!
story_02_04000_en.lsd.story_02_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: There you are! Let’s take ’em out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey, nice battling back there. Thanks to you guys, we were able to chase off those goons in no time.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: No sweat! [Name:PlayerNickname ] and I came here for that exact reason anyway!
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: I feel way better now that we took care of those Team Break guys. Guess it’s time to focus on the PML!
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hang on—this is your team for the PML?
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yep, that’s right! Are you thinking about competing, too?
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hey! Why don’t you join our team, Paulo? You seem pretty cool. I bet you’d be an awesome teammate!
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: No, thanks... I think I’ll pass. I’m actually thinking of putting together my own team to enter the tournament.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Aww, come on! Well...I guess if you have your own plans, we can’t really force you.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: If you’re looking for more teammates, you might want to try the volcano area.
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: I hear it’s a popular spot for doing training exercises with your Pokémon...
story_02_05000_en.lsd.story_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: Seriously?! Dude, thanks for the info! Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m fining you if you’re late!

story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: The place Paulo told us about should be around here, right?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: But yikes, this place is hot! Are there really Trainers that come here on purpose?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: I guess there actually are people here... Look over there.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Is that all you’ve got, Flannery?! Get back up!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Hey, you guys are Trainers right? Can we ask you a question?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: We’re looking for people to join our PML team!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Oh, the PML! I see, but...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: I’m training with Blaine here so I can be an awesome Trainer like my grandpa.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m flattered you’d ask, but I want to focus on getting stronger right now.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Aw, man. You’re not gonna compete? Well...I guess we can’t force you.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: I see you’ve made your way to Pasio as well, Blaine. Didn’t think I’d see you here.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: Pleasure running into you, too, Brock! Seems like you’ve got yourself a pretty strong team here.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Hmm... I just had a brilliant idea. See, I’ve been thinking of moving on to a new training area here pretty soon...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Sorry to spring this on you guys, but how would you feel about battling Flannery here?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0301_1900_10: Sure! Let’s do it right now!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0401_2000_10: Whoa, there... Pump the brakes a bit, would ya? I didn’t mean right this second.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0302_2100_10: Wait, we’re not ready to battle yet!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_0402_2200_10: Whoa, there... Pump the brakes a bit! Don’t worry. I didn’t mean right this second.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: There are a lot of other sync pairs that came here to train. A lot of hot-blooded ones, just like us.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: How about you battle your way through them and finally battle Flannery at the top of the volcano?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: Wait... You want me to represent all the other Trainers here and stand atop the volcano? As the final Trainer to beat?!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: Oh gosh... That sounds like a pretty big role...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: Wait, why am I hesitating?! Blaine’s entrusting me to represent the volcano as the strongest Trainer of us all...
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: I’ll show you what I’m made of! Come see me at the top...if you can!
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: Well, look at that kid go... Sorry to put all of this on you kids, but could you do me a favor and humor her for a bit?
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Don’t worry—we won’t waste your time. You’re looking for team members, right? I’m sure you’ll find a few great ones.
story_03_01000_en.lsd.story_03_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: Good deal! Thanks for lookin’ out, old man! Let’s get to it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah, there you are. I saw the way  you battled out there with your team.  You’re much stronger than I imagined.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Wait, you’re that old guy from earlier! What are you doing here?
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: I realized that I may not have explained  the full situation.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: What do you mean, the full situation?
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: It’s about Flannery. She’s a good Trainer— has a lot of passion and ambition.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: The problem with her is that she gets riled up very easily...
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Now that you mention it, that girl earlier  was getting oddly pumped up.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: You know that the battles on Pasio are all team battles. I want her to learn to not get ahead of herself and to depend on others.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: That’s why I suggested that she battle your team.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: I see. If that’s the case, leave it to us!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: I appreciate it. I really owe you one.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Flannery should be up ahead. I’ll be watching your battle from the shadows!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: Despite what he says, Blaine must  be worried about Flannery.
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: All right! Let’s hurry to the top!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: Errr... I mean... You’ve done well to make it this far!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: If you’re here, that means you were  able to win all your battles to get here! You must be pretty good!
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: For my honor as a Gym Leader and as the granddaughter of an Elite Four member...and to  bring honor to Blaine, who trained with me...
story_03_02000_en.lsd.story_03_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: I’ll show you my hottest moves!

story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Whew... I haven’t had a heated battle like that in ages! And your teamwork! That was awesome!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Exactly! You did well to notice, Flannery!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: B-Blaine?! How long were you watching us?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: You are indeed a powerful Trainer, Flannery. But your eagerness as a Gym Leader has given you tunnel vision!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: What you need right now are friends that you can trust and depend on!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: That’s right—friends! So here’s your final challenge, Flannery.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: Join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team, and make your way to the PML!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: Travel with friends, have fun, battle with them, and try to reflect on the choices you’ve made. I’m certain you’ll grow a lot as you go!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: We’d be more than glad to have you on our team, Flannery. What do you say?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Thanks. I think you’re right, Blaine... I’ll do it!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: That’s what I wanted to hear!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1400_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], let me on your team! Let’s make it to the PML together!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0402_1800_10: I recognize that “hah!” I’m looking forward to working with you guys!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: Make sure she doesn’t get into too much trouble, all right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? I’m off to form my own team for the PML!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2100_10: Hehe. I never said it out loud, Flannery, but I’ve been itching to battle you with these new rules!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: My Trainer’s spirit has long been ignited! Hahaha!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2300_10: All right, if that’s the game you’re playing, I want in! The next time we see each other, I’m not holding anything back!
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2400_10: Let’s get moving, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! How many badges do you have so far?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0401_2600_10: Oh, right. Badges. This might be a good time to start collecting them.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0302_2700_10: I don’t think I have any.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_0402_2800_10: Oh, right. Badges. This might be a good time to start collecting them.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_2900_10: We need to collect five badges to officially compete in the PML.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3000_10: And each badge is held by a PML Leader.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3100_10: Do you know who any of these leaders might be?
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3300_10: A Gym Leader friend of mine from Kanto, Erika, might’ve said something about being a PML Leader.
story_03_04000_en.lsd.story_03_04000/2401_1001_3400_10: Then we don’t have any time to lose! Thanks for everything, Blaine! I’m looking forward to battling you the next time we see each other!

story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Let’s get going. The forest should be just up ahead of this road, and Erika should be somewhere in the forest.
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: According to the rules, we need to collect five badges from PML Leaders to compete in the tournament matches, right?
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Right. How are we supposed to get the badges, though?
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: From what I hear, we have to prove that we’re worthy to each of the leaders.
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: OK... Well, how do we do that?
story_04_01000_en.lsd.story_04_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Standing around here isn’t gonna give us the answer to that. Come on. Let’s find Erika and ask her ourselves!

story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Man, there sure are a lot of female Trainers around here.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: You weren’t kidding... I wonder what they’re all doing here.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Well, a lot of girls really idolize Erika... Maybe they’ve all sort of gravitated here in hopes of getting close to her.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Although, this may be taking that admiration a little too far... I heard that some of the girls even act like her personal bodyguards.
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: You there! Especially you in the orange!
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Uh... Is she talking to me?
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Who else would I be talking to? You’re here to challenge Lady Erika, aren’t you!
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: You know Erika?! Could you tell us where—
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Excuse me! That’s “Lady Erika” to you! How dare you address her so rudely? Where are your manners?
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Ever since Lady Erika became a PML Leader, cretins like you have been gathering around her in swarms...
story_04_02000_en.lsd.story_04_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: I won’t allow such rude citizens to bother her! Go away, or I’ll be forced to drive you off myself!

story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: I can’t believe I lost to filth like you... This...this is mortifying!
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: All right, will you just calm down a second and hear us out? Misty and I are actually friends of Erika’s.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: It’s true. We need to collect badges in order to compete in the PML, and we heard that we could get one from Erika.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Wait...you guys are friends of Lady Erika’s? Oh no... Now I feel like a complete idiot.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Well, you didn’t really give us a chance to explain. Anyway, as long as we’re all clear now...
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’m still not happy I lost to you all... but I suppose I owe you an apology.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: It’s fine! Don’t worry about it. It’s really no big deal.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Lady Erika really does have  the loveliest friends... Thank you.  Forgive my behavior a moment ago.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: If you’d like to speak with Lady Erika, she’s just up ahead, a bit deeper into the forest.
story_04_03000_en.lsd.story_04_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: Great! Thanks for the info! Ready to go, everyone?

story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], meet Erika. Erika, meet... Erika...? Are you asleep?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Oh... Oh dear! I drifted off again, didn’t I.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Brock? Is that you? What a pleasant surprise. And...who might this be?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: This is [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We formed a team together to compete in the PML.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: Really? Well, isn’t that delightful. I suppose you came for a badge, then?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: You guessed it. Uh, what exactly do we have to do to get our hands on one of these badges, anyway?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: Well, first things first—we go head-to-head in a Pokémon battle.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_0302_1100_10: Are you sure you aren’t too tired?
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_0402_1200_10: Tee-hee! That’s very kind of you, but I assure you, I’m quite prepared.
story_04_04000_en.lsd.story_04_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m not going to go easy on you!

story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: Well, well! What a wonderful battle.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: You’re like a hardy root, spreading deep into the soil to connect your teammates to one another...
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: But I also see a calm, quiet oak within you, standing tall... A kind heart that cares for those around you.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: I see all of these things when I look at you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. So it’s with great joy that I now present you with this.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: We did it! We got our first badge!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: One more thing... Would it be all right if I asked you  one small favor?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: What kind of favor are we talking about?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Well, I was wondering if it would be all right if I joined your team.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], you are going to bloom into a beautiful flower as this competition goes on. I’d love to be there to see it firsthand.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: Well, that’s pretty flattering and all... but wouldn’t it be weird for a PML Leader to join a team?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: Not at all. I’ve been told that I’m free to participate in any way I like.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: In fact, I believe there are a fair number  of other PML Leaders in charge of  the same badge that I’ve just given you.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: Huh, I see... Guess I have no objection, then. What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0301_1500_10: Of course! Welcome to the team!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0401_1600_10: Thank you so much! I look forward to competing together soon.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0302_1700_10: Let’s see what sort of flower  we bloom into together!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_0402_1800_10: Of course! I look forward to being there when it happens.
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Right! Time to hunt for the next badge, then!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_2000_10: Oh! I think I might actually know another one of the PML Leaders!
story_04_05000_en.lsd.story_04_05000/2401_1001_2100_10: She’s from the Unova region, like me— a Gym Leader who uses Flying-type Pokémon!

story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: According to Rosa, there should be a PML Leader somewhere on this mountain...
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yep! Her name’s Skyla. She’s a Gym Leader back in Unova.
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: She’s super strong, so let’s make sure we bring our A game!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0301_0400_10: I can’t wait to meet her!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0401_0500_10: Tee-hee! Hearing she’s strong didn’t even make you flinch, did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0302_0600_10: I wonder what her battle style is like.
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_0402_0700_10: Tee-hee! Your mind is always on Pokémon battling, isn’t it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: I look forward to meeting her as well. I wonder what she’s like...
story_05_01000_en.lsd.story_05_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m sure we’ll all be fast friends! She’s super friendly!

story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: What do you know—another win for me. Now, hand over that badge.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Sure, here you go! Thanks for that battle! I think I got a bit stronger!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Nice job out there, Swanna! Good hustle!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: How can you praise your Pokémon after a crushing defeat like that?! Pokémon aren’t friends—they’re tools. No wonder you lost.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Hey, look! There she is! Skylaaa! ...Huh? What’s going on over there?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Winning is all that matters! How can you just smile and accept defeat like that?! You should feel terrible!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Terrible? But I don’t feel terrible at all! Swanna and I had a lot of fun!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Skyla! Are you OK?! What’s going on?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: Oh my gosh! Rosa! How’ve you been? I haven’t seen you in ages! And you guys... Wait, I don’t think I’ve met you yet.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Why must the universe conspire to irritate me... What are you doing here?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Don’t tell me you amateurs are trying to enter the Pokémon Masters League...
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_0401_1400_10: You can’t be serious... Of all the ridiculous, insolent, pathetic—! I knew you’d be a pain the moment I saw that hat of yours...
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_0302_1500_10: You got a problem with that?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_0402_1600_10: Excuse me?! Of all the ridiculous, insolent, pathetic—! I knew you’d be a pain in the neck the moment I saw that hat of yours...
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: Never mind that... It doesn’t matter anyway. I shall crush you under my heel here and now!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: A one-on-one battle, just you and me. None of you interfere!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: I shall teach you a lesson even a fool like you will remember.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: What’s wrong? Is that all you’ve got? I didn’t even get to enjoy myself!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: Bow before the victor, amateur... And don’t forget, I always win!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2300_10: Bwahaha! See? I win, you lose, and all is right in the universe.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: Well done as always, young master.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2600_10: Obviously failure begets failure... You amateurs belong together! We’re done here. Let’s go.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_2900_10: You said your name’s [Name:PlayerNickname ], right? That battle was great!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3000_10: You and your Pokémon were so earnest and straightforward!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: It doesn’t matter whether you win or lose! Being able to have friendly Pokémon battles is the best!
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: I couldn’t agree with you more, Skyla.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: You know...while we’re on that subject... We were actually hoping we could get a badge from you today, too.
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3400_10: Oh, I see! Well, my favorite place is nearby. Why don’t we go there and take a break first?
story_05_02000_en.lsd.story_05_02000/2401_1001_3500_10: Good idea! You and [Name:PlayerNickname ] must be exhausted after battling that jerk, Lear!

story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Oh, wow! Check out that sky! This place is great, Skyla!
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m glad you like it, too!
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Did you and your Pokémon get a good enough chance to rest?
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Well then, why don’t we have a little bit of fun?
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_0401_0600_10: Oh, you know what I’m talking about.
story_05_04000_en.lsd.story_05_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: I think we need a fun battle to pick our spirits up!

story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: What a great battle! I’m so glad I had the chance to battle you!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: My Pokémon and I are super satisfied we were able to really spread our wings!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: Not to mention, I could tell that you were enjoying battling alongside your Pokémon and friends.
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_0301_0400_10: Good match! That was really fun!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Oh, that’s right! This belongs to you now. You’ve earned it!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: You did it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’ve got our second badge!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: You know what? I decided. I’m going to join your team!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_0401_1200_10: If I go along with you guys, I think we’ll be able to have tons of fun adventures!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_0402_1400_10: If I go along with you guys, I think we’ll be able to have tons of fun adventures!
story_05_05000_en.lsd.story_05_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: All right, then! Make sure your seat belt is secure, your seat is upright, and your tray table is stowed. We’re taking off to the next badge!

story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: All right! Everybody ready for takeoff? We’ve gotta go find the PML Leaders in charge of the remaining badges!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Are you OK, Rosa? Why the long face all of a sudden?
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: I’m fine! I just can’t stop thinking about that jerk, Lear, from before...
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: It’s wrong the way he treats Pokémon like tools, and I don’t agree with the way he thinks, but the fact is...he’s still really strong.
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: And I bet there’ll be others just as strong as he is when we get to the tournament matches...
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0301_0700_10: Then we’ve gotta get stronger, too!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0401_0800_10: You’re right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was just thinking the same thing.
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0302_0900_10: Then we need to train even harder!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0402_1000_10: You’re right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was just thinking the same thing.
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Aha! In other words, you want to see if we can power up our team around here in the meantime, right?
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: If that’s the case, why don’t we go pay the Evolution fighter a visit!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Supposedly she’s a pretty amazing Trainer. I’ve heard whispers of her skill in the wind more than a few times!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: She trains with her Pokémon nonstop, and I hear that sync pairs who train with her all end up getting a lot stronger!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: Whoa! This girl sounds incredible! You sure convinced me!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go find this Evolution fighter!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0401_1900_10: Yes! I love that enthusiasm! I’ll be right behind you, friend!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_0402_2100_10: Yeah! If we raise our team’s strength now, we can rise through the ranks in no time once the tournament begins!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: OK! Let’s take a break from collecting badges for a little while, then!
story_06_01000_en.lsd.story_06_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: Come on! Off to the Evolution fighter we go! It’s time for takeoff!

story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Is this the right place, Skyla?
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yep! At least, this is where I heard  she does her training, anyway...
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Lucario! Give me a Low Sweep!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Ooh! That Trainer over there looks like she’s doing exercises with a Lucario!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Do you think she could be the Evolution fighter you’ve been hearing about?!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Definitely! I heard the Evolution fighter is a great skater as well, so that’s gotta be her.
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Wow, I never imagined the Evolution fighter would be a girl around my age!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Huh? What brings all of you here?
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: My name’s Rosa! Nice to meet you!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Right back at you! I’m Korrina, the Gym Leader of Shalour City back in the Kalos region. What can I do for you?
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Well, we heard that Trainers who come and train with you end up becoming really strong, and we reeeally want to get stronger!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Is that so! Well, I can definitely relate... I’d like to grow stronger myself.
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: Hm? Lucario seems to be really curious about all of you...
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Well, you seem like a group of interesting sync pairs, in any case! What have I got to lose? Sure! Let’s train together!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: Yeah! Come on! Let’s head to the training grounds right now!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: Just so you know, we might run into other eager sync pairs along the way. There’s a chance they could challenge us to a battle!
story_06_02000_en.lsd.story_06_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: Just make sure you stick with me and don’t fall too far behind, OK?

story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Keep it up, everyone! We’re almost to the training ground!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: I wonder what sort of training Korrina is gonna have us do...
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hey there, Korrina! You’ve gathered quite the crowd today.
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Oh! Hi, Brendan! I didn’t know you’d be here today!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Everyone, this is my friend Brendan! Brendan, everyone!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Nice to meet you. Name’s Brendan. I’m a Pokémon Trainer from the Hoenn region.
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: So, if all of you are here with Korrina, that must mean...
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yep! We’re about to do some training together!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Nice! Do you mind if I join you? I’ve been wanting to do some training myself!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: Haha, I should have known. Of course you can, Brendan!
story_06_03000_en.lsd.story_06_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go! Everyone’s waiting for us just up ahead!

story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: We’re here, everyone! This is where I do all of my training.
story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: A bunch of my Trainer friends like to hang out around here, too!
story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: We finally made it... Better take a deep breath. This seems like it could get pretty intense!
story_06_04000_en.lsd.story_06_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Don’t worry about it so much! The most important thing is to have fun.

story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: So? How do you think they did, Lucario?
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah, I think so, too! Lucario seems to have taken a liking to you all.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Yeah! Lucario has the ability to sense the auras that surround people.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: He must have sensed how tightly bonded you all are with your Pokémon!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: In fact, I was able to pick up on the same thing pretty clearly while I was watching you guys train.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: And not just the bonds you have with your Pokémon, but also the bonds you have with each other as a team!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Be confident! The tighter your bonds get, the stronger you’ll become!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: Our bonds... You’re right! All of us have bonds that connect us.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: Bonds with our Pokémon and bonds with our friends and teammates!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: If we put all of our effort into strengthening those bonds, I’m sure we’ll be able to defeat Trainers like Lear!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_0401_1300_10: All right! I’m starting to see a little bit of that confidence shine through!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_0402_1500_10: Like I said, confidence is key! Looks like you’re finally starting to see the possibilities, though.
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1600_10: All right! What do you say we finish this training session with a battle!
story_06_05000_en.lsd.story_06_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: It’s go time... Let’s give it all we’ve got!

story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: You beat me! That was a ton of fun, though.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: This just proves that the bond you and your Pokémon share really is second to none!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: Thanks, Korrina! Thanks, Brendan! Thanks to you guys, I feel more confident.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: I think we can get back to focusing on collecting badges now.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh? Were you guys collecting badges?
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: If that’s what you’re up to, I know a PML Leader I can introduce you to!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: Hey, can I come with you, too? You seem like a fun team to be around.
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_0401_1100_10: Awesome! Now we’ll be able to battle each other whenever we want!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_0302_1200_10: Sure! I hope to learn more from you!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_0402_1300_10: All right! If you ever want to learn any roller-skating tricks, like my rolling axe-kick, I’m your girl!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: Bigger! Stronger! More energy! More fun!
story_06_06000_en.lsd.story_06_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: I look forward to our new adventures together!

story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: This weather is beautiful! It’s a perfect day for a Pokémon battle.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hey, Brendan? Didn’t you say you were gonna introduce us to a PML Leader? Who is it? Tell us!
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Oh, yeah! I guess I should fill you in.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: We’re going to go meet Norman, a Gym Leader from the Hoenn region.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Do I know him? He’s another Gym Leader from the same region as me, and he’s Brendan’s dad!
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_0401_0900_10: Yup. Guess I forgot to mention that part! He’s a really strong Trainer, so we gotta get focused.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_0402_1200_10: Yeah, I can hardly wait, either!
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: A man in pursuit of power... It should come as no surprise that someone like him would be chosen to be a PML Leader.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Heh. I gotta admit, it makes me happy to hear you talk about my dad like that.
story_07_01000_en.lsd.story_07_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Come on. I’ll take you guys to him!

story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Brendan, are we there yet? When are we gonna meet Norman?
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: There’s still a ways to go. Dad always says that the journey’s part of the training—that’s why he set up camp way out in the mountains.
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: And that has proven very useful to us!
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: It means that you become the perfect prey for us out here on this isolated mountain, and we haven’t even had to lift a finger.
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: That mask... I know all about you! You’re those nasty Team Break guys who’ve  been trying to steal people’s Pokémon!
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Ha! If you already know, then I guess I don’t have to explain what comes next.
story_07_02000_en.lsd.story_07_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’ll be taking your Pokémon off your hands!

story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: You gotta admit, one thing those Team Break guys can do well is run away.
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hey... Lucario still senses a bunch of those masked thugs nearby.
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_0301_0300_10: We should hurry and find Norman!
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_0401_0400_10: I think so, too! Who knows what could jump out at us next!
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_0402_0600_10: No, it’s not! We should hurry and find Norman!
story_07_03000_en.lsd.story_07_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: Let’s get up this mountain quick, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Argh! I couldn’t beat you... Guess I’m still not good enough...
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Don’t be too hard on yourself. It’s been a long time since someone pushed me like that in battle. Believe in yourself.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: Is that you, Brendan? What brings you all the way out here?
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m guessing you came here for the same reason I did.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: Oh, I’m so relieved. Looks like you guys are fine.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Oh, it’s nothing—as long as you’re safe. More importantly, I’ve brought you another challenger.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: Nice to meet you. I’m Norman. I’m Brendan’s dad and currently a PML Leader.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: I like that look in your eyes. We just might be able to have as wonderful a battle as I had with Paulo!
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: Go for it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Watch out for my dad’s Slaking. He’s amazingly strong!
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1400_10: I just lost to him... It still kind of stings, to be honest.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: Your friend’s right—you definitely shouldn’t underestimate Norman and his Slaking. Good luck!
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: It looks like you’re ready for battle.
story_07_04000_en.lsd.story_07_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: Now show me how well you’ve trained your Pokémon!

story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: You’ve trained your Pokémon really well.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: The bond between you and your Pokémon is strong, and your teamwork was spectacular. You have defeated me, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: I had no idea you were this strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Don’t get me wrong—I’ve been rooting for you. It’s just...frustrating, getting left behind.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: Don’t allow yourself to get frustrated. The skills you displayed when you pushed my Slaking to the limit are the real deal.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! What an awesome battle that was to watch!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: If you keep improving at this rate, we won’t have anything to be afraid of no matter how many of those Team Break thugs we run into!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Team Break? Is that what you call those weirdos I’ve been seeing around lately?
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: Yeah, we ran into them on the way here, but they were no match for us!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: You’d better be careful out there, Brendan.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: It seems that they’re getting stronger than they were before.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: I have a feeling something bad might happen. Hopefully it’s just me worrying too much.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: Team Break has even got Norman worried now? That can’t be good...
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: Oh, with all that unpleasant talk, I forgot to give you your badge.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: Heh heh... This cave seems to be the place.
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: Come on! It’s time to pay a little visit...
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_2100_10: We can’t let them go in there! That cave is where sync pairs go to rest!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: All of you! Come and help me stop those thugs!
story_07_05000_en.lsd.story_07_05000/2401_1001_2300_10: I can help! Let’s go, Norman!

story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hold it right there, Team Break!
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: We can’t allow you to cause any more harm than you already have.
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: No, no, that was never our intention!
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: You see...we came here for the PML Leader. In other words, YOU, Norman!
story_07_06000_en.lsd.story_07_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: No! We have to protect everyone, Slaking!

story_07_07000_en.lsd.story_07_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: I think so... But they collapsed the exit.
story_07_07000_en.lsd.story_07_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: We’ll be all right. Even if we can’t get out here, I’m sure we can find another way.
story_07_07000_en.lsd.story_07_07000/2401_1001_0400_10: As long as we don’t give up, the road will reveal itself!

story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey, everybody, I found a way out of here!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0200_10: Whew, I was just starting to wonder what our new life as cave dwellers would be like.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0300_10: What did I tell you? As long as you don’t give up, the road will surely reveal itself.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0400_10: You just have to have the kind of unbending mental fortitude you need to keep going until you find it.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: You’re right. I was in shock from how suddenly that all went down, but I can’t allow myself to be overcome by my fears.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0600_10: That’s a good point. Well, the exit is right there.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: I should have expected this from a PML Leader. To be honest, I didn’t think much of you.
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0800_10: Team Break! What do you want from me?!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_0900_10: If we want to sabotage this loathsome PML, of course we must also get rid of you!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1100_10: There’s no way I’m letting that happen!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1200_10: I don’t care what your ultimate goal is. I can’t stand by and watch your cowardly methods!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1300_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], will you give me a hand with these thugs?
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_0401_1500_10: I can’t stand people with a sparkle in their eyes like you have!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_0302_1600_10: I won’t let Team Break get away with this!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_0402_1700_10: I can’t stand people with a sparkle in their eyes like you have!
story_07_08000_en.lsd.story_07_08000/2401_1001_1800_10: I will send all of you into a pit of dark despair!

story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0100_10: How could this be?! How could I lose to the likes of you?!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0200_10: Don’t get the wrong idea. This isn’t over!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: We did it! What a huge win for us!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hm, it certainly was! Now I can finally give you your badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0500_10: That’s the Patience Badge. It’s given to Trainers who have unbending mental strength.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: The Patience Badge suits you well. I’m looking forward to seeing just how far you can go with your strong mentality.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0700_10: And one more thing... Would it be possible for me to join your team?
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0800_10: I would like to watch the next generation of Trainers grow from up close.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_0900_10: Huh? Are you really planning to go with [Name:PlayerNickname ], Dad?
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1000_10: Of course! I, too, want to grow stronger.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1100_10: That’s my reason for wanting to go. Will you have me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_0401_1300_10: Mmhmm! Then from now on, let’s devote ourselves to growing stronger!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_0302_1400_10: I’m excited to learn from you!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_0402_1500_10: The pleasure is mine. Let’s devote ourselves to growing stronger!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1600_10: All right! I guess I’ve gotta get serious about my training, too, huh? After all, I do wanna beat you again, Dad!
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1700_10: Nice, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Not only did you get the badge—you got Norman to acknowledge your skill.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1800_10: I haven’t forgotten about you, either, Paulo. Here, take this badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_1900_10: What?! But you beat me in our battle...
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2000_10: Victory isn’t everything. What’s truly important is your mental fortitude.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2100_10: You supported [Name:PlayerNickname ] in the face of fearsome opponents and didn’t back down. You’ve earned this badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2300_10: I’m going to grow stronger...stronger than anyone else...
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2400_10: Huh? I didn’t quite catch that.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2500_10: Nothing. It’s nothing. Thank you for the badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2600_10: I guess this is where we part ways again, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’m off to collect my next badge.
story_07_09000_en.lsd.story_07_09000/2401_1001_2700_10: Next time you see me, I’ll be stronger than ever! Strong enough to blow you and Norman out of the water!

story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: I’ve heard there’s quite a skilled Trainer somewhere around this glacier.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: But I don’t know exactly where...
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I wonder where they are...  It’s pretty cold out here.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: What are you talking about?! You get cold too easily, Flannery!
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: My hometown is hot, and I didn’t think to pack anything besides the clothes I normally wear.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: I guess I would be pretty cold if I were out here dressed like that. Wanna borrow my scarf?
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: I-I’m OK. Th-thanks for the c-c-concern, though.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: It’ll be even colder once the sun goes down. There will be time for chitchat later. We need to focus on our search for now.
story_08_01000_en.lsd.story_08_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: All right, let’s hurry up and get this done before Flannery catches a cold!

story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Well, from the look of you, I bet you’ve come looking for a badge, haven’t you?
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: The name’s Pryce. I’m a Gym Leader from Mahogany Town and a PML Leader. If you’re looking for a battle, I’ll take you on.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: This old guy doesn’t waste any time! Let’s get to it!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Leave this one to me! I know Torkoal can really put in work here!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Don’t push yourself so hard, Flannery. I can handle this old guy.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’m f-fine. Just because I’m cold doesn’t mean I can’t b-battle!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Trust me! Leave this one to me—the Gym Leader of Lavaridge Town!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: What was that all about? You don’t have to get all high and mighty.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: What’s wrong? If you don’t want to battle, I’ll be on my way.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hold on! We’re ready to do this right now!
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Barry, Flannery—would you two calm down? You’re being rude to our opponent.
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Have you made up your minds?
story_08_02000_en.lsd.story_08_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Well then, I will show you the true harshness of winter. Come at me with everything you’ve got!

story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Well, that was an easy win! All right, old man, make with the badge.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: No. Pryce wasn’t really giving it his all in that battle.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hmph. There was certainly something dazzling about your teamwork.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: But can’t you give just a bit more?
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: What are you talking about?! What’s the deal here?!
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: In the battle with Pryce just now, you did perform well, but there was still something missing.
story_08_03000_en.lsd.story_08_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Think hard about it, you two. You’ll need to find the answer before we meet Pryce again.

story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: For s-s-some reason, it’s even colder than it was b-before...
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’ve been thinking about it, and I guess I was kind of rushing for no good reason.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: I thought I could do it all myself, and I hope I didn’t make you feel bad.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: At times like these, I wish I could fine myself. I hope you can forgive me, Flannery!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Oh... Well, uh, I was actually about to apologize to you, too, Barry!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: I’m the one who should be sorry! That was all my fault earlier.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: I was the one who panicked. I was trying too hard to live up to my title of Gym Leader and totally missed the mark.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh, you felt that way, too, huh?
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: I guess that’s why we were so out of sync in that battle.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: Ah, it seems you’ve found the answer to what was missing, then. It’s time for us to head back to Pryce.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: You two can show him what you’ve learned!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2000_10: Oh, it’s you again. Back to challenge me again, are you?
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2100_10: That’s right, old man! Give us one more battle!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2300_10: Just you watch! It’s gonna be completely different from last time! Flannery, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...let’s do this!
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2500_10: Oh, I like that determined expression. This will be good.
story_08_04000_en.lsd.story_08_04000/2401_1001_2600_10: I am known as the Winter Trainer. Let me show you what I’m capable of!

story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: All right! We finally worked together and won!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: YES! But hey, old man, you weren’t going easy on us that time, were you?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: No, I wasn’t. Your performance in that battle was a sight to see.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: There’s nothing more for me to do but give you your badge.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_0301_0700_10: And it’s a badge that we worked together to get.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_0401_0800_10: I will always remember what this badge means!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_0402_1000_10: I mean, that wasn’t even really a fight, anyway, right?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: My sincerest thanks for battling earnestly, Pryce. We all learned so much from you.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: Those are some interesting youngsters. They were more powerful than I had initially thought.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: Indeed. I’m surprised by how much this new generation of Trainers is teaching me as well.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: No, I’m just part of the team. The one running the show is [Name:PlayerNickname ] here.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]... There certainly does seem to be something quite interesting about you.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: I think so, too. I don’t quite know what it is yet, though.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: Well, how about it, then? Would you let me join you, too?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Hm? I’d never imagined you would want to join our team...
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2000_10: I’ve found I have a desire to learn from the younger generation as well.
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2100_10: We welcome you with open arms! I’m sure everyone will be happy to have you join us!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2200_10: Hey, Norman! What are you guys talking about?
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2300_10: Let’s say good-bye to this freezing glacier and get back to a nice, warm town!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2400_10: Hey! I knew it! You’ve b-b-been cold all along, too, h-haven’t you, Barry?!
story_08_05000_en.lsd.story_08_05000/2401_1001_2600_10: Ha ha! I can tell things are going to be very interesting from here on out.

story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: The city seems particularly bustling with activity today.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Now that you mention it...it does seem busier than usual around here.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: People must be getting anxious now that the PML tournament matches are just over the horizon.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Anyway, I was hoping to go for a nice stroll through town, since I’m here and all... Hm? Is there something wrong, Rosa?
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: No. I just...I swear I recognize that girl over there from somewhere... Is that...Iris? Iris, is that you over there?!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Rosa! I haven’t seen you in so long! I’m so glad I finally ran into someone I recognize here.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_0401_0800_10: Yeah! Iris is actually the Champion of the Unova region, you know!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_0402_1000_10: Yeah! We became friends through Pokémon battling back in the Unova region. Iris is the Champion there, you know!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Oh! I should introduce you two! Iris, this is my team leader, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Team leader? Ohhh, you’re all competing in the PML together? That’s great! I’ve been hearing a lot about it.
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m Iris! Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: I never thought I’d run into you here, but I’m sooo glad I did!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Me too! I feel so much better now that I know you’re here! Until now, I hadn’t found anyone here that I recogni—
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Team Break must be causing trouble again! Come on! We should go help!
story_09_01000_en.lsd.story_09_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: Right! I’ll go with you! Is that OK, Rosa? [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! More of those baddies are heading right this way!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Wait a sec... Isn’t that the Champion of the Unova region?
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Guess today’s our lucky day. C’mon, let’s nab her Pokémon!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], these thugs are trying to steal Iris’s Haxorus!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Wha—? My Haxorus?! We can’t let that happen!
story_09_02000_en.lsd.story_09_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Right—we have to do something about this. If we don’t stop them soon, even more innocent people will get dragged into the fray!

story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hah! I was told that a few Trainers were in a tussle with Team Break, so I came to have a look... Turns out it’s just you amateurs!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_0401_0300_10: Oh? So you remember me, then! Yes, it is I, Lear! Owner and creator of this magnificent island you all stand on!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_0402_0500_10: You must be joking, right? That is ridiculous! No one forgets me, Lear, owner of Pasio!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: So you’re Lear, huh? Your reputation precedes you...and not in a good way. To be honest, people don’t speak very positively of you.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: Tell me, what’s the real reason you’re here? I’d hate to think that you’re the one behind all of this misconduct.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Hah! Don’t be ridiculous!  Me? Promote this foolishness on my own island?!  The mere thought is insulting!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: The reason I came here in the first place was to bring judgment on these thugs!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: Got it? Now stay out of my way. Go crawl into a corner with your pathetic team and leave this to a real Pokémon master!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: That guy said his name is Lear, right? You know, I’m sure he must be rich and powerful and all, but that was just plain rude!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: You’re not just gonna let him get away with that attitude, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: We should go and show that snooty Lear that this team is anything but pathetic!
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Try not to let yourself get so worked up. You’ll only tire yourself out.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: But aren’t you upset that he called your team pathetic, Mr. Pryce?
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: Sticks and stones, Iris. Words can’t hurt you if you don’t let them. A Trainer should always be calm and disciplined.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Yeah, I think I know what you mean. Working together as a team is probably a lot harder if you’re all worked up and angry.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: Indeed... It sounds like young Iris here is already much wiser about these things than our haughty friend, Lear.
story_09_03000_en.lsd.story_09_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Come! I think perhaps it’s time to show him exactly what this team is capable of!

story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ugh! What are you still doing here? I thought I told you to stay out of my way!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Lear, you’re wrong! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team is NOT pathetic!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hmph. This is getting ridiculous! One puny amateur...two, three...even ten! It makes no difference if you’re weak.
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_0301_0400_10: Don’t talk about my friends like that!
