story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_0401_0500_10: Friends? Friends are for fools! If all you’re going to do is spout nonsense, do it elsewhere! Out of my sight!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_0402_0700_10: Just how foolish are you?! If all you’re going to do is spout nonsense, do it elsewhere! Out of my sight!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: We’re not fools, and teamwork isn’t nonsense! If we work together with each other, we can achieve anything!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: You’re getting on my nerves... This conversation is over!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: Rachel! Sawyer! Let’s corner Team Break at the beach, where they can’t get away. Don’t just stand there—move it!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Hold it right there, li’l lady!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: Thought you could get away, huh? Well, it’s finders keepers, Iris!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1400_10: Hand over that Haxorus! It belongs to Team Break now!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: We’ll put it to reeeal good use, all right? So don’t argue, and give it here!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: Argh! Not again! They just keep coming and coming!
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: Don’t worry, Iris. I’m right here with you, and so is [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We’ve got your back.
story_09_04000_en.lsd.story_09_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: Now...let me show you why they call me the Winter Trainer.

story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: Looks like that was the last of them, finally... How dare those troublemakers drain away so much of my precious time!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: As for you—how dare you ignore my wishes! I told you to stay out of my business, yet here you are again!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_0401_0400_10: ME work together with YOU?! Just who do you think you’re talking to?
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_0402_0600_10: Who do you think you’re talking to here?! I could have wiped the floor with those fools on my own!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: Lear, stop being so rude to us! It’s not nice!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Would it hurt you to say thank you?!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hmph! Iris, was it? If that’s what you want...
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: then let’s settle this with a battle—a special one-on-one battle, just this once.
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: You shall see that you’re no match for my superior power!
story_09_05000_en.lsd.story_09_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: And I’ll prove you wrong!  I’m going to win this for my friends!

story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hmm... You said Iris is the Champion of the Unova region, didn’t you?
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yep... I can’t believe Lear is neck and neck with her in this battle!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: I mean, Master Lear’s a genius... Plus, he trains suuuper hard.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: Champion or not, I doubt she’ll be able to defeat the young master. I’m sure it’ll be the same next time he faces that kid in the red hat...
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Quiet, you! I told you not to talk about that!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1000_10: And how dare you compare me to this sappy little girl! All this nonsense about friends and working together... Don’t make me laugh!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1100_10: You talk like you’re battling all by yourself, but you’re not alone!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1200_10: What, you mean Rachel and Sawyer? They serve as my retainers, nothing more. They may be loyal, but they are not my friends.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1300_10: Well, what about the Pokémon that battle alongside you? That Krookodile is like a trusty partner to you, isn’t he?
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: Hah! Pokémon are no different. They’re tools! Tools used by Trainers who want to rise to the top! I have no need for friends.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: Is that really what you think? The way I see it, Iris has been fighting neck and neck with you...
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1600_10: despite being in a place she’s unfamiliar with... despite how tired she must be after battling all of those Team Break thugs earlier...
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1700_10: Why do you think that is? If you ask me, I’d attribute it to the incredibly strong bond Iris has with her Pokémon.
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_1900_10: I’m done listening to a bunch of amateurs who think they can lecture me! Rachel, Sawyer, we’re leaving!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2200_10: I just want you to know... I stand by what I said!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2300_10: Mr. Pryce was right. The bond between Trainers and Pokémon is really important when it comes to battling!
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2400_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Do you think we could have a battle?
story_09_06000_en.lsd.story_09_06000/2401_1001_2500_10: I kinda want to try a team battle!

story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0100_10: Wow, that was so cool! Team battling really is a whole different experience!
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: I wish I could do it more...
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: Um, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Do you think it would be OK if join your team?
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0800_10: With Iris on our team now, I’m even more excited about what’s to come!
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_0900_10: Me too! Let’s all do our best, team! So...what’s next?
story_09_07000_en.lsd.story_09_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: Wanna head back to the city for now? Let’s go search for another PML Leader and earn our next badge!

story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Well, team, it’s been a pretty eventful journey so far, but I think I’m ready to get back to collecting badges.
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: The only one we’re missing now is the Pride Badge. Once we get our hands on that, we’ll be able to compete in the PML!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0301_0300_10: Can’t wait to meet the next PML Leader!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0401_0400_10: Hahaha! You really do love Pokémon battles, don’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0302_0500_10: It’s been pretty challenging so far.
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_0402_0600_10: It sure has...but we’re in the final stretch now! Come on—let’s give this our best shot!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Do you know anything about the PML Leader we’re looking for?
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: From what I hear, she’s still a young child.
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: But supposedly, she’s got some serious talent, despite her age. Rumor has it she’s a kahuna on one of the Alolan islands...
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Aha! Interesting... I wonder if she’s a little like me, then! It sounds like she could be!
story_10_01000_en.lsd.story_10_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Maybe we’ll end up being super good friends! Come on, hurry up! What are we waiting for?!

story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Too bad, my friend! No badge for you today. Better luck next time!
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Argh! What gives? Why can’t I win...
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Now, now. No use crying over spilled milk. You have some real strength!  I can feel it in my bones.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hmm... I think you just need to believe in yourself more. With a bit of confidence, you could be great.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hmm... That girl looks pretty young and little... Um, excuse me? You wouldn’t happen to be a PML Leader, would you?
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: What’s this? Another challenger? My, my! Business is booming today.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Your badge collecting must be going pretty well if that’s why you’re here.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m flattered you wish to challenge me now, but to be honest, I’m feeling a wee bit tired from my last... Huh?
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Look! It’s more of those mean, masked people!
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Well, well! I didn’t expect to find so many lovely sync pairs here.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Today must be my lucky day... With all of these Pokémon in one place, I’ll barely have to lift a finger to steal them!
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: Team Break! Ugh, they always pick the worst times to show up... My Pokémon’s still tired from that last battle.
story_10_02000_en.lsd.story_10_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Don’t worry! You can leave this one to us! Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go!

story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Tsk... Who do you kids think you are? You have no right to be this good.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: But don’t worry—my associates should be arriving any minute now. I hope they wipe those smiles off your faces...
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: You sure surprised me! The way you drove off those mask-wearing scoundrels... Your skills are certainly nothing to scoff at!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: That was...incredible. When did you get this strong?!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Ah... I guess the obvious answer is that you’ve been working harder than I have...
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I would like nothing more than to be your next opponent...
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: but according to that lady, there are more of those Team Break scoundrels skulking around this area.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Right! And we can’t just  leave them to their own devices! We should team up and stop them!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Say, Hapu... If I beat those guys, would you agree to battle me again?
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: Well, sure! Of course I would! But it sounds like they might have us outnumbered. It won’t be an easy task.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: H-hey! You’re not thinking of going off on your own, are you?!
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m just gonna run ahead to scope out the area. Don’t worry—I won’t do anything stupid.
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Why’s he in such a rush all of a sudden...?
story_10_03000_en.lsd.story_10_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Mmm... This is a tad bit worrying. It may be a good idea to follow him.

story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: Argh! We must not have rested enough  after that battle with Hapu, Rockruff...  Still, I can’t believe we lost to those goons.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hmm, what have we here? It looks like the boy has attracted a whole swarm of sync pairs right into our trap.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: That one looks like he might be the leader of the bunch.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: Your little friend here was too weak to put up much of a fight, sadly.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: Don’t listen to this foolish bully, Paulo.
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_0401_0900_10: It seems you’re not one to put up with foolish nonsense, either... Mm-hmm! A kindred spirit indeed!
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_0302_1000_10: You’d better take that back, mister!
story_10_04000_en.lsd.story_10_04000/2401_0402_1100_10: It seems you’re not one to put up with foolish nonsense, either... Mm-hmm! A kindred spirit indeed!

story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hmph. It seems these kids are a bit more than we can handle at present...
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: Let’s retreat for now. But mark my words... the next time we meet, we’ll be far stronger!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: Guess you had to come to my rescue again, huh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Thanks.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Tsk! Do you need to have your ears cleaned? I told you it would be unwise to rush in like that.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh well. What’s done is done. At least this allowed me to witness something great.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: You got upset when your friend’s pride was insulted, then fought hard to defend it. That’s not something you see every day.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: All right! Now that we’ve chased off those scalawags, you are free to challenge me for a badge once again.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: But you must be exhausted, my friends. Why don’t you take a rest here and catch up with me on the road ahead?
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: Hapu’s got a point. We should take a quick break here so that we’re back to full power when we challenge her!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... I think I’m gonna go.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: What? Why? You didn’t get hurt back there, did you?
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: No, it’s not that. After my battle with Hapu, she told me that what I’m missing is self-confidence...
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: and I need to give that some real thought. Challenging her again is gonna be pointless until I figure out my issues.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1600_10: I’m not giving up yet, though! I’ve still got time to work this out before the tournament matches begin!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: You’ll see! I’ll continue to get stronger, collect all the badges I need, then sign up to compete in the PML!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: Good luck in your battle against Hapu! I’ll see you around soon!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Wow, he just up and left... Think Paulo’s gonna be OK?
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_2000_10: Why are you so worried about Paulo, anyway? We’ll see him again real soon, like he said.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_2100_10: And when we do, I’m sure he will have grown into a powerful rival for us to compete against.
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_0302_2400_10: We’ll grow even more powerful than that!
story_10_05000_en.lsd.story_10_05000/2401_1001_2600_10: All right! Let’s head out as soon as this rest stop is over. Final badge, here we come!

story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah, there you are... Hm? Is that all of you?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah... Paulo ran off saying he needed to get stronger.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: Is that so... Well, I look forward to seeing the fruits of his labor.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: In any case, the rest of us came here to challenge you to a battle. You’re still ready to rumble, right?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yes, of course I am! But before that... Here, this is for you.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: Is that...a Pride Badge?! But we haven’t even battled yet!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’ve already seen enough of your character for me to make my judgment.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: Not only are you proud of yourselves and your own accomplishments, but you respect and raise up others as well.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Furthermore, you possess the strength and skill— as well as the camaraderie—that it takes to defend that pride.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1000_10: In other words, you have proven that you’re worthy of holding this badge in every way! So take it! It’s yours!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1100_10: Woo-hoo! That means we’ve collected every single badge!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1200_10: This isn’t exactly the way I imagined things would go in the end...but hey, we did it! Congrats, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1300_10: Indeed! Just one more thing, before you go... A personal request.
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: Would you still honor me with a battle?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: I may be a PML Leader, but I’m a Pokémon Trainer first! When I meet a powerful opponent, I want to test my skill against them...
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1600_10: After watching your battle earlier, I felt that it was no longer a badge that was on the line here— it was my pride!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_1700_10: Well, you heard the little lady. What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_0401_1900_10: I was hoping you’d say that!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_0302_2000_10: Let’s do this! No holding back!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_0402_2100_10: I was hoping you’d say that!
story_10_06000_en.lsd.story_10_06000/2401_1001_2200_10: Thank you, my friends. Come on, then! I will battle you with everything I have!

story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0100_10: Phew... I’ve been thoroughly defeated. What a grand battle that was!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: I used every bit of strength I could muster, but it still wasn’t enough... Sounds like it’s high time for some more training!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You’ve really come a long way, haven’t you.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0400_10: And you’re only getting stronger... You remind me of Red and Blue when they first beat me.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: Wh-what’s so funny all of a sudden?!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0700_10: It sounds to me like that battle’s left you aching for something in the past. You’ve got something on your mind...about your journey here.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_0900_10: Hush, hush. You don’t have to say it out loud... We both know that battling against [Name:PlayerNickname ] is a thrill!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1000_10: Whatever you decide to do, it’s your choice. Just don’t hold yourself back! That’s never a good choice.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1200_10: Well then! Now that you’ve acquired your last badge, you’ll be heading back to Centra City, I’d wager?
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1300_10: I shall accompany you. I’m overdue for a taste of the city air.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1400_10: W-wait! You’re coming with us?! Can...can you and me walk and talk together on our way back?!
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1500_10: Why, of course! I would like nothing better! It’s a long walk back, so I hope to hear lots of your stories.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1600_10: Uh... Say, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...I just remembered I’ve got this thing I need to do...
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1700_10: You guys go on ahead! I’ll meet you back in Centra City later.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1800_10: I see... It looks like he’s made up his mind, then.
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: Huh? Made up his mind for what?
story_10_07000_en.lsd.story_10_07000/2401_1001_2000_10: Well, it will be interesting to see how all of this plays out... Hee hee.

story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0100_10: Look, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! The arena’s just up ahead!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0200_10: All we have to do is register right over there, and we’ll be all set to compete in the PML!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0300_10: Wait a sec... I don’t see Brock anywhere. He said he would meet us here, right?
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0500_10: I’ve been waiting for you guys to arrive... with my Tyranitar here.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0600_10: Whoa... What’s with the outfit, Brock?
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0800_10: A fashion designer here on Pasio saw some new kind of potential in my Pokémon and me and designed it for us.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_0900_10: It’s proof of how much we’ve grown and accomplished as a sync pair since coming here.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1000_10: Wow, you’ve got so much passion for this tournament, huh!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1200_10: Up until now, my intention was to watch over [Name:PlayerNickname ] like a mentor Trainer.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1300_10: But you’ve all grown into incredible sync pairs. Even island kahunas and other Gym Leaders have acknowledged your strength.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1400_10: When I see how much you’ve all grown, I can’t help but want to battle with you myself.
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1500_10: Not as a teammate...but as another Trainer!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1600_10: Brock... I had no idea you felt that way!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_1700_10: Well, now you do! Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s battle!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_0401_1900_10: I had a feeling you might! Thanks!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_0402_2100_10: I wouldn’t want you to! Thanks!
story_10_51000_en.lsd.story_10_51000/2401_1001_2200_10: Come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Show me how strong you’ve become!

story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0200_10: You did great! Look at how strong you’ve become, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’m glad I was able to battle you. Now I know for a fact that you’re much stronger than I originally thought.
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0400_10: I don’t think there’s anything left for me to teach you.
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0500_10: Huh? What do you mean there’s nothing left to teach [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]?
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0700_10: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] doesn’t need anybody to watch over  [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] anymore.
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’d like to rejoin the team. Not as a guide or a coach but as a proper teammate... Is that all right?
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_0402_1200_10: Definitely! Let’s get even stronger together!
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m counting on you to help push this team to the top. All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1400_10: Tee-hee! I didn’t think it was possible to be MORE excited for the tournament!
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1500_10: The rest of us will be right there with you! We’ve all grown sooo much since we first met each other, huh!
story_10_53000_en.lsd.story_10_53000/2401_1001_1600_10: I’m so ready! Come on! Pokémon Masters League, here we come!

story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Pokémon Masters League. Let the opening ceremony begin!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0200_10: I am Lear, host and founder of this tournament. I expect your undivided attention now!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0300_10: Sync pairs who stand before me...you have proven your strength by collecting all five PML Badges!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0400_10: This tournament will decide which team among you is the strongest of all. I had Pasio designed and built for that very purpose!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0500_10: So rise, my ambitious Trainers! Climb the ranks and unleash your power! Claim the ultimate victory as your own!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0600_10: Or at least entertain the hilarious thought that you might actually win.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0700_10: Why hilarious? Because you have no chance. I, Lear, am unquestionably the strongest of all!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_0900_10: Sounds like the tournament matches will be starting soon. I wonder what sort of battles await us...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1000_10: Cynthia... I should have guessed she’d be able to get at least this far.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1100_10: I see Blue and Red, too, but I suppose that’s to be expected as well.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1200_10: If we continue to win, we’ll end up facing powerhouse Trainers like them somewhere down the line...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1300_10: Wait...we’re already gonna be competing with the best of the best, starting right now! We’ve gotta try our absolute hardest!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1400_10: You’re right. But we went through the same trials and tribulations that they did. We belong here just as much as they do.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1500_10: If we unite our hearts as a team, we can defeat any opponent! I believe in us.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1600_10: Unite your hearts...as a team? *snort* That is the most ridiculous thing I’ve ever heard!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1800_10: I must say, I never thought the likes of you would make it this far... I smell Foul Play.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_1900_10: E-excuse me?! We’re Trainers of integrity! We collected our badges fair and square!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2100_10: It seems you made an error when choosing our PML Leaders. They must have been complete garbage to have let these amateurs through!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2300_10: Uhh, did you wake up on the wrong side of bed this morning, Master Lear? You’re even crankier than usual.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2400_10: Of course I am! All I could see during the ceremony was that cheeky red-hatted twerp!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2500_10: Ugh... That kid infuriates me! I shall not rest until I defeat him once and for all!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2600_10: That goes for you, too! Another pip-squeak in a stupid hat! It’s like you are TRYING to annoy me!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2700_10: Word of advice, Lear: [Name:PlayerNickname ] is a lot stronger than the last time we met.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2800_10: If you let your guard down, you might be surprised at the results.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_2900_10: You aren’t actually implying that I could LOSE to [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ], are you? Hah! When Tepig fly, maybe! That’s absurd!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3000_10: None of you belong in this tournament! Just hurry up and lose so I can be rid of you!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3100_10: Tsk! Still as pleasant as ever, isn’t he!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3200_10: Are you just gonna let him get away with saying that stuff, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0301_3300_10: I’ll make him regret it next time we battle!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0401_3400_10: Good answer. We sync pairs should settle our scores with Pokémon battles.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0302_3500_10: Right now, I’m more focused on getting stronger.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_0402_3600_10: It’s great to be humble and all...but all of us here are full-fledged sync pairs. That’s something we should be proud of.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3700_10: If we keep winning, I’m sure we’ll eventually have to face him. When the time comes, let’s show him what we’re made of!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_3900_10: Hey! Look over there! Isn’t that...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4200_10: It’s good to see you again! And if you’re here, that must mean...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4300_10: Yep. I managed to form my own team and collect every last badge.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4400_10: Now that I’m this strong, I won’t let anyone...anyone...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4600_10: Uhh, are you feeling OK, Paulo? You look a little pale...
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4700_10: Sorry... I’m probably just a little tired. That’s all.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4800_10: A lot’s happened since we arrived here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We both managed to make it this far.
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_4900_10: But I worked harder than ever to get to this point. I don’t plan on losing anytime soon!
story_10_54000_en.lsd.story_10_54000/2401_1001_5000_10: I’ll see you in the finals!

story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Alola! I guess we’re your first match!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: My name’s Hau, and this is Sophocles! We’re buddies from Alola!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: H-hi... I’m Sophocles... I’m a Captain back home...
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Loosen up, Sophocles! Just do it like we always do!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: OK... I’m sorry... I just g-get so nervous...
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: You’re right, though... How often do you get the chance to battle against s-so many different Trainers like this...
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Yeah! I’m super excited, too! But since we’re here, let’s aim for the top!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: That’s the spirit! I’m gonna go all out, too!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0301_1000_10: I’m not gonna just let you win!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0401_1100_10: Yeah! That’s what I like to hear!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0302_1200_10: That championship is gonna be ours!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_0402_1300_10: Yeah! That’s what I like to hear!
story_11_01000_en.lsd.story_11_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: All right, let’s get this started! Let’s do this, Sophocles!

story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: But I still had a lot of fun! I’m glad I got the chance to compete.
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: I was so focused on the battle that I forgot to feel nervous at all!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: You were awesome, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I think I got goose bumps... How about you, Hau?
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yeah, they were really strong. But...
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Gaaah, we were so close! And we tried so hard, too. Guess I’ve gotta get even stronger!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Yeah... Or, wait a sec! I have an idea! Why don’t you ask [Name:PlayerNickname ] if you can join [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] team?
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: You can keep battling if you join their team, and you can keep getting stronger, like you said!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Yeah... Yeah, you’re right! Wow, Sophocles, you really are a genius!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m joining your team, OK? Let’s do our best together!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: I think I’ll just observe for a while. I want to do an in-depth study of the way various teams battle together...
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: I think it could be really useful for my inventions!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: Yeah? Then from here on out, let’s enjoy the tournament our own way!
story_11_02000_en.lsd.story_11_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: All right, then! Let’s do this! We’re gonna have so much fun!

story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Just when I need him the most, he has to go and throw out his back!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I made it so far, and now I don’t have a team...
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: But just when you think my fire’s gonna go out, it starts to burn even brighter!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: “The grand tournament had begun at last, but for the girl, a great challenge remained...”
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Huh? Who talks like that? Sounds like somebody reading a book.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Phew... We finally made it to Centra City, Chandelure.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Now we just need to hunt for a team... I hope we can find some nice people to join us!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Oh! Hello there, Flint! I had no idea you were here on Pasio, too.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: You weren’t thinking of competing in the PML, were you?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: What? Oh, yes! I AM planning on competing in the tournament, as a matter of fact.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: What is it? Is something the matter, Flint?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: Whooooaaa! I just found the best possible teammate!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Wha—?! Huh? Am I missing something?!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: C’mon, Shauntal! You gotta team up with me so we can burn up the PML together!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: Me?! Form a team with you?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: I know good and well how fiery your spirit is! You and I together would be the strongest team out there!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: I’m flattered that you think so highly of me...
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: but if I compete in this tournament, I’m going to be competing to win. I intend to take this seriously.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: Yeah? Well, I will, too! As long as we both give it our all, nothing is impossible.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: Can’t you see how she’s burning up with excitement?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: Now have a look at my Infernape.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: You can see it, right? That same fiery passion?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Sure... But I don’t understand what any of this has to do with winning the tournament.
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: Don’t you see? Pokémon battles are all about how hot your spirit burns!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: Just like our fiery hearts, our Pokémon’s bodies and minds are flaming hot!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: I don’t think anybody can stop us if we team up. We can definitely win this whole thing!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: You really think...we can win this together?
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: I’m still not sure I understand your logic, Flint...
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4000_10: but I do think we have a chance at victory! With your fiery spirit and my keen observation, I believe we can win!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: Yes! Let’s form a team, Flint—a team of flames, igniting our passion for Pokémon battling!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: That’s what I’m talkin’ about, Shauntal!
story_12_01000_en.lsd.story_12_01000/2401_1001_4300_10: Let’s burn the competition down to cinders!

story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Oh, so we’re up against you, huh? I’ve heard a lot about you—and how you’re supposedly the new up-and-comer!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Let’s give it all we’ve got and have a burning-hot battle! With Shauntal and me together, you’re up against two fiery Elite Four members!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: “A fervent, hot-blooded pro, ready to charge... and a fresh, young talent, poised for battle... Flames of determination danced in their eyes.”
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: “The teams were well matched in power and  skill...but only one could claim victory in the end.”
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh, I do hope it’s our team that triumphs at the end of this story!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: No need to hope for anything, Shauntal. We’ve definitely got this!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Let’s show ’em just how hot we can get!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Right! We’ll give it everything we’ve got!
story_12_02000_en.lsd.story_12_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: All right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s see how fiery your passion for battles is!

story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Oh, Flint... Your flame can’t have been snuffed out that easily.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: But I’m done for... Burned right down to cinders...
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: This experience has given me so much to be inspired about! I feel like I could turn it into a spectacular novel.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: I guess it’s not as easy to succeed in the PML as I thought.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: We did have a burning-hot battle thanks to you, though, Shauntal!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Um, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Would you be willing to let Flint here join your team?
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: Huh? What’re you talkin’ about, Shauntal?
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Flint, you and Infernape have a fire within you. Your flame burns brightly, and you have the potential to burn even brighter still!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: It’s time to use that flame to shine a light on [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: Well, I’m an author as well as a Pokémon Trainer. Sometimes it’s better for me to take a step back and observe the bigger picture.
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Will you let Flint join your team?
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_0301_1800_10: I’m ready to feel the burn!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_0302_2000_10: All this fire and passion might be a bit too much for me...
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_0402_2100_10: Aww, c’mon! You can never have too much heat! Let me on the team. I promise you won’t regret it!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Oh, and in case you didn’t catch my name, I’m Flint, a Fire-type user who specializes in burning-hot battles!
story_12_03000_en.lsd.story_12_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: I’m looking forward to teaming up with you!

story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: So...you’re sure you don’t want to join our team, then?
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah, I’m sorry... I really love the team I’m on already!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: You guys do look awfully strong, though.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: I hope we get to battle someday! I’ll be looking forward to it! Bye for now!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Hmph... Sooner or later, she’ll learn she made a mistake turning down my invitation.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Though I have to admit, the girl has guts. She opposed me, knowing full well that I’m the greatest dragon master in the world!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m not sure if she agrees with that last part...
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Well, no matter. Where do we go from here? I know you’ve taken a liking to the girl, even if you won’t admit it.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Should we look for a new member? We don’t have that much time left.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: I don’t think so. We don’t need anyone else. We should use that time to train.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: After all, I’m the greatest dragon master ever! And you’re as elite as they come—one of the Indigo Elite Four, like my cousin Lance!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Our team is more than strong enough with just the two of us. If we were any stronger, we’d simply be unbeatable!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: You just wait and see, Iris! You’ll regret choosing another team over ours... I know you will!
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Clair still has so much of that boasting, youthful overconfidence, doesn’t she... I suppose that’s where she and Lance are different.
story_13_01000_en.lsd.story_13_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Then again, maybe that’s what makes her so fun to watch... Good luck, Clair. I’ll be right there with you.

story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! There you are... I’m Clair. I’ve been looking forward to this battle.
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Step right up and witness the might of our team of dragon masters! Your streak of good luck ends here.
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’m Lorelei. I’m not exactly a Dragon-type Pokémon user, but that’s no matter.
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: We’ve trained hard, too. Watch out, or I’ll put your Pokémon on ice!
story_13_02000_en.lsd.story_13_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: It’s time for you to learn a lesson in strength from a world-class master of dragons and a queen of ice!

story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: I can’t accept this... There must be some mistake.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: You’re all really strong, aren’t you. Even my Lapras’s Blizzard couldn’t put out the fire in your hearts.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: But now that you beat us, I expect you to keep on winning! You owe us that much, right?
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Well? How was your first taste of the strength of a dragon master!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: You felt it, didn’t you? The energy that my presence brings to this competition! We can’t let that end here!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: So...I suppose I can lend your team a hand!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: S-say something! You’re not actually thinking of refusing, are you?!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: You really are fun to watch, aren’t you, Clair.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: That does sound like an interesting idea, though. What do you say? Could you take Clair along with you?
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: She might be a little...eccentric, as you can see, but you can count on her. I guarantee it.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: You don’t have to shoulder this alone, Clair. Aim for the top together, with a new team.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: That is...if you ever want to be as strong as Lance, of course.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: O-of course I do... And besides, I already surpass Lance when it comes to battle skills!
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: You’ll see! Now that you’ll be in the crowd, I hope you watch me more closely.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: Thank you. I’ll do my best for the both of us.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: Don’t worry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You can rest assured with Kingdra and I on the team.
story_13_03000_en.lsd.story_13_03000/2401_1001_2800_10: I, the greatest dragon master of all time, shall tip the scales in our favor!

story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: A boy with innocent eyes... and a Beedrill with a poisonous stinger...
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: The contrast they create is simply sublime. Fantastic! Just fantastic!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Um, e-excuse me...Viola? How much longer are you going to be taking our pictures?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Just a bit longer! I think I can get exactly the shot I’m looking for if I just take a few more...
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: But the PML tournament matches are starting soon! I still have a lot of training to do...
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Tomorrow’s the day you win all your battles and show the world the true strength of Bug-type Pokémon, right?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Exactly! I’ve studied Bug-type Pokémon more than anyone else. When we fight, it’s majestic!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: A lot of people are afraid of them because of the way they look, but I’m gonna show those people how awesome Bug-type Pokémon really are!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Oh, you looked really determined just now! Fantastic!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: I was just thinking...I dream of being a Bug-type Pokémon Professor one day... and you’re a photographer.
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: We’re both Gym Leaders, but we’re about as different as two people can get, huh?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: All right, I finally got the shot I wanted! Wanna start training?
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: You wanna show the world how cool Bug-type Pokémon are, right? I think I can give you a hand with that.
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: With you and me together, Bugsy, we can show the world how fantastic Bug-type Pokémon are!
story_14_01000_en.lsd.story_14_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Bug-type Pokémon are our best friends! Now let’s get ready to smile for all the cameras!

story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: You must be the sync pair I’ve been hearing about—the one they say can’t be stopped!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Ooh, and such a photogenic face, too! Perfect for a picture! Let me go ahead and take one right now.
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_0401_0400_10: Nice! Even that confused look on your face is fantastic! Just fantastic!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_0402_0600_10: What a cooperative subject you are! And that expression is just fantastic!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Viola! You shouldn’t take people’s photos like that without asking their permission!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Sorry about that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Sometimes Viola gets excited and starts snapping photos without really thinking...
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: All right, the shoot is finished! Time for me to transition from being a photographer to being a Bug-type Pokémon Trainer!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: My lens is always focused on victory. I won’t let anything ruin this shot!
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hey...Viola? After the match is over, can you do me a little favor?
story_14_02000_en.lsd.story_14_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: I was wondering if we could take a victory photo with Beedrill and Surskit! Pleeease?

story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: You and your Pokémon make the best sync pair around! Just fantastic!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: We lost... But...for some reason, I don’t really feel all that bad about it.
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: That must be because you gave it everything  you had! You did great, Bugsy!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: You and Beedrill were both really cool!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Hey, Viola... Can I ask you a favor?
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’d love something to remember this battle by... Do you think you could take a photo of me and [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Pleeease?
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: What a fantastic idea! How about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_0401_0900_10: OK, everybody get in the frame!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_0402_1100_10: What a lovely subject you are! OK, everybody get in the frame!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: All right, I got the perfect shot of your smiling faces. That expression looks good on you, Bugsy!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: You’re probably right. I’m really glad we got to battle each other today!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: You made me want to learn even more about Bug-type Pokémon!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: That sort of got me thinking, actually! There are tons of other Trainers here on Pasio that use Bug-type Pokémon like me...
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: Now is the perfect time to go out and find them all. It’s my chance to study how they battle with their Pokémon!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Fantastic idea, Bugsy! And...maybe I could go along with [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: The way you made Bugsy’s face light up like that was so lovely, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: I think if I hang around you, I’ll be able to take tons of pictures of smiling Trainers and Pokémon!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: How about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Can I join your team? Pretty please!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_0402_2500_10: Woo-hoo! Wait... That does mean yes, right? I’m looking forward to being a part of your team!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Well, I guess it’s good-bye for now, Bugsy.
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: I guess so. But I hope we get to team up together again someday!
story_14_03000_en.lsd.story_14_03000/2401_1001_2800_10: Oh, that tearful look in your eyes at the thought of leaving my side! Fantastic! Just fantastic!

story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: So, are you our match for today?
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Whew, this one looks really tough, Grimsley. This might be the end of the road for us.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Remind me...who was it that completely overpowered our last opponents after saying that very same thing?
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: Heh, sounds like something you would do, Mr. Elite Four.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Besides, I was only able to make it this far thanks to you.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Surrounding yourself in a blanket of smoke, keeping your cards close to your chest... Typical Nanu.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: I get the feeling those same tactics won’t work on our newest contenders, though.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: These Trainers are earnest—I can see it in their eyes. They’re not the type to fall for cheap tricks or bluffs.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Please. I’ve never done such a thing.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Well, as you can see, kid, we’re just a couple of oddballs.
story_15_01000_en.lsd.story_15_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Let’s see how you handle opponents like us.

story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: You said you’re [Name:PlayerNickname ], right? You sure are something.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Seeing how strong you are, I’m guessing you’ve had your fair share of run-ins with Team Break?
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0401_0500_10: You didn’t even hesitate to answer, did ya? I appreciate that.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0402_0700_10: Sounds like I was on target.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: I may not be a zippy young Trainer like you anymore, but I still train hard to get stronger.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: What would you say to having somebody like me on your team, kid?
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0401_1100_10: You might be a little too earnest for your own good... But I appreciate it.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_0402_1300_10: Don’t worry. I might prefer Dark types, but I’m a good guy.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Guess that’s that, then. What about you, Grimsley?
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: I think I’ll pass for now.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: There’s only room for one wild card in any good deck.
story_15_02000_en.lsd.story_15_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: Well, guess it’ll just be me, then. Looking forward to working with you kids.

story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Guess this is the end of the road for our little team.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: And it was me who bugged you about teaming up in the first place, wasn’t it? Sorry about that.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: It’s fine. All par for the course... Game aficionados like myself are used to diving into competitions on a whim.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Besides, I think I know what your true aim is here, anyway.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: It’s a pain in the neck, but I can’t let this slide.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: I know there’s something lurking beneath the surface with that Team Break gang.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: I can’t nap in peace until I find out what that something is.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: You think the kid’s the best way to get to the bottom of it, huh?
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’ll admit, [Name:PlayerNickname ] does have a way of drawing out the passion in others. A born leader.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: I mean, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ]’d have to be if [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] managed to impassion a jaded guy like me.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: That’s reason enough to make [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] a target... So you decided to follow along to protect [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ] and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] team. That’s what this is all about?
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Heh, you can think what you want.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Well, why don’t you just do what you want and let me do the same.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Who knows? The next time we meet, we might be fighting on opposing teams.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: Cut me some slack here. I wouldn’t stand a chance against you.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: But if you’re gonna find yourself another teammate, you might want somebody that uses a different type Pokémon than you.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Hmph. I still can’t tell what’s going on in that head of yours.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I think it’s time I took my leave...
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Oh, before you go, I forgot to tell you.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Let’s get some Sushi High Roller. My treat.
story_15_03000_en.lsd.story_15_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: I’ll think about it, old man.

story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Here they are, Father! It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_0401_0400_10: I like your spirit! But this will not go as you hope!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_0302_0500_10: You never know. We haven’t even battled yet.
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_0402_0600_10: We can already see the results, for the battle has already started!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: We are modern ninjas, living in the shadows. We have mastered the art of espionage. We already know everything about you!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: You should be flattered. Father only prepares like this for opponents that he considers formidable.
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Some would say that we rely too much on underhanded tactics...
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: But that is not the truth. A true ninja masters many strategic techniques!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Don’t think that your conventional strategies will work against us!
story_16_01000_en.lsd.story_16_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Allow us to show you that there are battles you cannot overcome with strength alone!

story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Fwahahaha! A splendid display! We concede!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: You stuck to your earnest and straightforward tactics, and we stuck to our ninja tactics. We may have lost, but we have no regrets!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’m not a child. I know why we lost that battle.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: Listen to me! Right now, we are not just father and daughter, but equals on the same team.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: This defeat is shared. Do not blame only yourself.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: You can’t spoil me like that! If you really consider me an equal, you should be more strict with me!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Besides, I don’t want to take your kindness for granted! I have to become stronger so that I can proudly call myself your equal.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: That’s why I’m going to go on a journey to train!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: I understand. Do what you must! Be diligent in your training, Daughter.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: I guess this is good-bye for a while. I promise I’ll come back stronger.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: So when I do, let’s battle together!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: My apologies. I am sorry you had to witness our familial squabbles.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0401_2300_10: I would love to. But even if I did, I know she’d send me away.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0401_2400_10: Moreover, she is an accomplished ninja herself. I must respect her wishes.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0402_2600_10: Perhaps. But as a parent, I sometimes wish she would depend on me more.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0402_2700_10: But then again, I also know that it is my duty as a parent to respect her decisions.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: To see my daughter act with such resolve... I must continue to find my own strength as well.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_2900_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], forgive my sudden request, but...may I join your team?
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0401_3100_10: Indeed! I cannot allow myself to be weaker than Janine when she returns!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0302_3200_10: It’d be great with you on the team!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_0402_3300_10: Fwahaha! Leave anything poison related to me!
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_3400_10: You may have beaten me, but don’t forget that I am a member of the Indigo Elite Four.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_3500_10: I will definitely be of use to your team.
story_16_02000_en.lsd.story_16_02000/2401_1001_3600_10: As long as we can watch each other’s back and try to cover each other’s weaknesses, we can surely surpass our current limits!

story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: We’ll be facing quite the formidable opponent in our next battle. It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: They may not be the most experienced, but they’ve got a lot of momentum. An opponent like that can be tough to handle when they’re on a roll.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: OK, so what we gotta figure out is how to mess their rhythm up.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Oh, don’t worry, girls! We’ll beat that team to smithereens, no problem.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: We ARE the Elite Four, after all! Or, well, three members of the Elite Four from different regions...
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Don’t let our individual titles get to your head. This is a team battle, after all.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: If each of us doesn’t focus on her own strengths and support the others in battle, we may end up losing what should have been a winnable battle.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: I know that. And like I said before, I don’t think we have anything to worry about! The three of us can do this!
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Well, well, well. I suppose confidence is a good thing.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh, sorry! You just reminded me of my grandma.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: She would teach me all sorts of things just like that when I was a kid.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: How rude! Comparing me to your old granny!
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: I suppose I forgive you. I know you meant it as a compliment, so I’ll try to take it that way.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: There’s one thing I wanted to say to you girls before this next battle.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: We came together because we thought we had some kind of connection, but this team of ours is really not half bad.
story_17_01000_en.lsd.story_17_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: Then let’s give it our all out there and show everyone the strength of Ghost-type Pokémon!

story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: This is it—the real thing. Are you girls ready?
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: That’s what I like to hear. [Name:PlayerNickname ], was it?
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: As you can see, we are a team of Ghost-type Pokémon Trainers.
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: We’ll show you just how strong a team full of ghosts can be—and win while we’re at it!
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_0402_1000_10: Ahahaha, perhaps this will be over before the battle begins?
story_17_02000_en.lsd.story_17_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Enough with the formalities! Let’s get started. After all, Pokémon are—

story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Oh my! I can’t believe we lost. You’re quite the Trainer!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: It seems that you all have a better grasp on what it takes to truly battle as a team.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Darn it! We were so close, too!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Aw, this stinks... I know I could have done better!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: As long as we understand what we did wrong, that’s enough. Reflecting on our mistakes makes us stronger as people.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: I have to thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. This defeat will make these girls stronger still.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_0402_1000_10: Ahaha! I appreciate you saying that!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: This may seem sudden, but could I ask you for a favor, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: I’d like you to let these girls join your team. They need more experience battling.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: They could experience many kinds of battles and encounter many kinds of Pokémon with you.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: And also meet many new friends. If you’d let them be a part of your team, I’m sure they could do all those things.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: I need to start from scratch. I’ll sit back and watch the tournament and try to learn more about team battles.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Once I’m satisfied, I’ll make a team again. Who knows—maybe someday I’ll face you in battle.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: OK... If that’s what you think is best, I’ll gladly join [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: I’ll get stronger and stronger, and then someday I’ll beat you and your new team, Agatha!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: That’s the spirit. Keep doing your best.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Sorry... I don’t think I’m gonna join.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Oh, you have a problem with my suggestion?
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: No, it’s not that! I just want to take some time to learn more about team battles, too.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: I was thinking I might stick around with you and hopefully pick your brain a bit... What do you think?
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Hmmph. I guess I can’t stop you.
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_2800_10: Well then, do me a favor and take good care of Acerola, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_0401_3000_10: That’s what I like to hear. Thanks!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_0402_3200_10: You bet! I’m giving this everything I’ve got!
story_17_03000_en.lsd.story_17_03000/2401_1001_3300_10: Ready when you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! See you around soon, Agatha, Phoebe!

story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hey, Cheren. What’s with the long face?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Well, you went on a massive journey around the Unova region...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: and I followed a similar path right there along with you. Now I’m a Gym Leader.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: Honestly, I think we make a pretty strong team, and I’m totally confident in our battle skills. It’s just that...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: We might have to go up against Champion-level Trainers from here on out. If we’re lucky, we’ll be evenly matched.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: In some respects, we’re here as challengers. There are probably going to be some rough battles up ahead.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Yeah. I’ve been thinking the same thing.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Moving forward in this competition is going to require more strength and power than we’ve ever had to use before.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: And...seeking victory for victory’s sake won’t be enough. We’ll have to battle as a team— use our strength to help one another...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: That’s the sort of battling that’s going to be expected of us from here on out.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Use our strength to help one another, huh?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Hm? What are you laughing at?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: I just remembered how you were before we started exploring Unova. You really have changed a lot since then.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: I don’t know whether to take that as a compliment or an insult...
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: I’ll admit that I’ve had tunnel vision in the past when it comes to winning. I didn’t really know what I wanted back then.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: But the experiences I had and the people I met along the way helped me figure that out for myself.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: You got that right. I want to use everything I learned during my journey to triumph in this tournament.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: I think I might know someone who’s in the same boat as us!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: Cheren! I’m talking about somebody who might wanna join our team for the PML! Come on, follow me!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: Hey, Cheren! Hilbert told me everything. If it’s about Pokémon battles, leave it to me!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: I’ve always wanted to team up and battle with you two. We’d be like Team Unova!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: You’ve seen firsthand what an awesome Trainer Hilda is, right, Cheren?
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: And all three of us have gone through similar journeys across Unova, right? I was thinking... that might help us really get in sync as a team!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: I see... That sounds like a great idea!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: Hilbert’s right. I already know for a fact that you’re passionate about Pokémon battling. It practically radiates off of you.
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: So you’ll join our team then? I look forward to battling together!
story_18_01000_en.lsd.story_18_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: All right! Now that we have a full team, let’s train! Victory or bust!

story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Good luck, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... It looks like we’re your opponents this round.
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: You and your team have built up quite the reputation for yourselves—defeating Gym Leaders, Elite Four members, and other famous Trainers.
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: But I guarantee you, our team is more in sync with each other than anyone else you’ve faced in this tournament!
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: We’re all Trainers that explored the Unova region.
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: But not just that! We trained together on Pasio, strengthening our bonds!
story_18_02000_en.lsd.story_18_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Let’s give this battle everything we’ve got! No regrets on either side!

story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Thanks for such an incredible battle.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: It stinks that we lost, but we did everything we could.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Yeah, truth be told, I feel really relieved.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: You and your team earned that victory. All we can ask is that you keep moving forward, for your sake and for ours!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: I’m looking forward to seeing all the things you’re capable of from here on out.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Until then... Hilbert? Hilda? You ready to go?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: Pause, Cheren. What are you acting out of character for?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: It’s written all over your face. You want to see [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s growth firsthand.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: You can’t hide it from us, Cheren. We’re a team, after all!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: You two saw right through me, huh... Well, I guess there’s no harm in asking.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: I know it’s a little sudden, but would it be OK if I joined your team, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Thanks to my friends here, I’ve already gotten so much stronger since the PML began... just like my journey back in Unova.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: If you let me join, I think we can learn from each other’s experiences and bolster this team’s strength as a whole. What do you say?
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_0401_1700_10: Thank you! I’ll do my best.
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_0302_1800_10: Let’s help each other win this!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_0402_1900_10: Absolutely! In fact, I think that moving forward, teamwork is exactly what’s going to separate the winners from the losers!
story_18_03000_en.lsd.story_18_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Personally, I want us to win this! So let’s put our hands and our hearts together and make it happen as a team!

story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0100_10: Looks like the tournament matches are ramping up!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0200_10: That being said, I’m still amazed that you’ve gotten this strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hehe! You’re right, Brock! It’s pretty amazing how fast [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’s' F='she’s' ] been growing.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0400_10: If we can keep this up, I think our team might really be able to do it!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0600_10: Bwahaha! Careful, someone might overhear that utter nonsense you’re spouting over there!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_0800_10: You should save that sort of talk for bedtime— the only tournament you stand a chance at winning is the one in your dreams!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1000_10: I AM impressed, however, that you somehow managed to get even this far.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1100_10: You must have some seriously good luck... I’m curious to see how far it will actually take you.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0301_1300_10: It’s our teamwork that’s  gotten us this far!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0401_1400_10: Teamwork? Hah! Pure nonsense...  Relying on others does NOT count as winning!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0302_1500_10: We’re gonna win this  together as a team!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_0402_1600_10: As a team? Hah! Pure nonsense...  Relying on others does NOT count as winning!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1800_10: You heard [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’re a team! We all worked together to make it this far!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_1900_10: Yeah! And all of our opponents up until now have had amazing teams, too!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2000_10: If you keep up that attitude, you’ll never know what true teamwork feels like, and I bet you’ll never be able to win... I feel sorry for you.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2100_10: Excuse me?! Did you just say YOU feel sorry for ME?
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2200_10: How dare you speak to the young master that way!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2300_10: Ugh, why don’t you just disqualify them? I’m sure you could, as the founder and all...
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2500_10: Y-young Master? Are you all right?
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2600_10: Ridiculous! Pure nonsense! Bonds, teamwork, sync pairs—all of it!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2700_10: You’d have to be a complete fool to believe any of that nonsense will make you stronger! Surely, you must be joking!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2800_10: The ONLY way to attain true strength is to train yourself hard—without relying on anyone else! You and you alone!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_2900_10: You have seen how powerful I am firsthand— isn’t that proof enough? Is your weakness not proof enough?!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3000_10: Say whatever you like—you shall never be strong enough to overcome the massive difference in power between us!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3200_10: I challenge you to a battle! If you refuse,  I shall revoke your right to compete! Lose the battle, and you’ll be just as gone!
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3300_10: Watch! I shall beat you to a pulp, just like last time, and you will be out of this competition for good.
story_18_51000_en.lsd.story_18_51000/2401_1001_3400_10: And let it be a lesson to you!  Bonds and teamwork are nothing  but a ridiculous load of garbage!
