story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Our team has worked really hard to make it this far in the tournament. We finally qualified for the second half—for the finals!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: But now what? Lear has challenged us to a battle we can’t refuse. If we lose, he’s gonna kick us out of the competition.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Founder or not, I can’t believe he threatened to revoke our right to compete! That’s just cruel!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: You’re right... I’m not happy about the fact that we’re being forced into a rematch when we’re so close to the finals.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: But it might be a good opportunity for [Name:PlayerNickname ] to show off [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] skills. Better be in top shape, though!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Rematch? You’ve battled against Lear before?
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Yeah, it was before you joined the team, Iris. It didn’t go very well for us, though...
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I see... Lear’s pretty powerful, huh? I learned that the hard way when I battled against him, too.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: I think we’re gonna be all right, though! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s a lot stronger now!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Yeah! This time we’ll win for sure! I believe in you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_0401_1300_10: That’s the spirit! We’ll be right there with you, supporting you all the way!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_0401_1400_10: Yeah. It’s important to the team that we win this battle, but it’s more important that we—
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_0402_1600_10: What’s wrong? I thought you’d be super excited about beating Lear once and for all.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_0402_1700_10: I think [Name:PlayerNickname ] realizes that even though winning is important for the team, it’s even more important that we—
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: That we have fun! Right, team?
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: Every battle has a winner and a loser, but that shouldn’t be the only thing you focus on!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: Having fun is what’s most important when it comes to Pokémon battling, don’t you think?
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: Yeah! I think Skyla’s right! Winning or losing doesn’t matter if you’re not having fun battling!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: True! We should all keep that in the back of our minds...including a certain prince!
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: Yep! I know all of us understand how important it is to have fun...
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: but I don’t think Lear really understands that yet.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: I hope he learns soon... Some things are more valuable than victory.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: Something tells me he’s going to be a tough nut to crack.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: But he’s still a Pokémon Trainer, just like us. Part of me wants to believe that deep down he feels the same way we do.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: I think you’re the one who’s going to have to help him realize that, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. He’s stuck on you, for whatever reason.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: It’s not going to be easy, but one way or another, we have to get through to Lear during our battle.
story_19_01000_en.lsd.story_19_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: We’ve got to show him that there’s more to Pokémon battling than victory alone!

story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: It’s almost time. Lear should be arriving soon.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Well, well! Look who decided to show up. I thought you’d get cold feet, but apparently you have some guts after all.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: What?! We’d never run away from a challenge! You seriously underestimate us, Lear!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Take it easy, Rosa. He’s just trying to rile us up.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Lear, battling is one thing, but threatening to disqualify us because of your personal feelings is wrong. Is that the kind of PML you want to run?
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: Stop! I won’t hear it! You’re the ones who tried my patience in the first place!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: This is the end of the PML for you! My...uh...Staraptor and I will make you wish you’d never signed up to compete!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: Uh-oh! Better watch out. Lear’s Staraptor is waaay stronger than the Krookodile you fought with Haxorus.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: And what a sad Krookodile it was! To let that battle end in a draw... I have no need for a Pokémon too weak to follow my commands!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: The only Pokémon suitable for me is one that can follow my commands without question and WIN!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: What?! How can you just throw away your Pokémon like that... All because of a tie?!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: Sync pairs are supposed to be partners! Helping each other get through difficult defeats is part of what makes us grow stronger!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Silence! How dare you judge my decisions! You have no right to lecture me. Now prepare to fight!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Young master... May I say something?
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] team may not be perfect, but they were strong enough to qualify for the finals, so be careful.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: We’ll toootally support you in this battle, Master Lear. You can count on me ’n’ Sawyer—
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: Just who do think you’re talking to right now?
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: I never asked for your advice or your support! I shall stomp these weaklings all by myself!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: Is that understood?! Don’t let me hear you try to advise me on this subject again!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_2500_10: Now, it’s time we start this. Or end this, rather...
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_2600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]... This isn’t the end of the PML for us. There’s no way we’re giving up now.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Sometimes battling is the only way to get people to see eye to eye with you.
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_0401_2900_10: Yeah! Let’s show Lear how strong our team’s bond has become!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_0402_3100_10: Yeah! Let’s show Lear how strong our team’s bond has become!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: Ugh! Bonds... Teamwork... You still have the nerve to speak about that nonsense in front of me?!
story_19_02000_en.lsd.story_19_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: Fine! I’ll show you once and for all how ridiculous all of it really is!

story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: This is NOT happening! Unbelievable! It’s pure  nonsense! How could I lose?!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Not once...but twice! That pest in the red hat was one thing, but to be beaten by...by a bunch of amateurs...
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: My commands were more precise, my Pokémon was stronger... I had the upper hand in practically every way! How...how did this happen?!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: How in the world did I loooooose?!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Lear... You’re extremely powerful—there’s no doubt about that. Your skills as a Trainer might even surpass [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: But [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] has a few things that you don’t.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] has the capacity to have FUN in a Pokémon  battle...and real friendship...and, most importantly, a real bond with [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] Pokémon.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: How...how can stupid things like that make a difference to who wins and who loses? It doesn’t make sense!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Lear, you can’t use sync moves, can you?
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: What? Wait, now that you mention it... I didn’t see him use any sync moves in either battle!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: Sync stones are what turn the bond between Trainers and Pokémon into power.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: If Lear can’t use sync moves, then that means—
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Stone, shmone! Master Lear’s been crushin’ it battle after battle for a long time without having to use one.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: Exactly! The young master’s worked harder than anyone else to get to where he is now and to become the ultimate victor.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: He can win without using sync moves—and without help from anyone else!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: And you two are OK with that?
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: Lear doesn’t depend on anyone but himself. He fights for himself and nobody else, and you two just watch from the sidelines.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: Don’t you think that’s a little...sad?
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: Lear, you have friends who care about you. Friends who have stuck with you all this time.
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_2800_10: All you have to do is reach out a hand—
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_3000_10: None of that is of any use to me! With my skill and unrivaled discipline when it comes to training, there’s nothing I can’t do!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_3100_10: That goes for the PML, too! I and I alone will crush every last incompetent weakling in the running!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_3200_10: That’s why I founded this entire tournament in the first place—to prove that the power of one man is stronger than any stupid bond!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_3600_10: Maybe we should just give him some space for now...
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_3800_10: Hm? What’s wrong, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Aren’t you coming?
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_0301_3900_10: See you in the tournament, Lear!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_0302_4100_10: Our next battle will be at the PML!
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_4400_10: You really have grown a lot, haven’t you?
story_19_03000_en.lsd.story_19_03000/2401_1001_4500_10: Let’s fight as hard as we can in the finals, team! I want another chance at battling against Lear!

story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: It’s making me sad to see you all down in the dumps like this. Where’d all o’ your arrogant laughter go?
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: Your father, the king, made you a promise. If the PML is a success here on Pasio, he’ll name you as the heir to his throne.
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: His highness won’t go back on his word just because you lost a Pokémon battle... That’s not gonna happen.
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: I think you’ll be a great king someday—one who’s worthy of succeeding your father on the throne.
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Have a little faith, young master...
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Huh? Why would the royal manor be calling at a time like this?
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: This is Sawyer speaking. Apologies, but now is not a good—
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_1400_10: Wh-what?! Are you sure?! How could security let this happen?!
story_19_04000_en.lsd.story_19_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: We’ve got an emergency, young master! I just got word that some thieves have entered the royal manor, and...

story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Today’s the day! I can’t believe the PML finals are finally here!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I woke up sooo early this morning! I guess I must have been too excited to sleep!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Sounds like Acerola’s been ready to go since the crack of dawn, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: How about you? Were you able to sleep OK last night?
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_0401_0700_10: Nice! Getting a good night’s sleep is really important if you wanna be able to give it your all in battle!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_0402_0900_10: Lear... I guess it would be hard not to think about him after that battle yesterday.
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_0402_1000_10: But don’t worry! I’m sure he’ll be back to his usual snooty self at the opening ceremony today!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hey, why don’t we head to the arena now? If we hurry, we might be the first ones there!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: I don’t think the arena’s open yet, but we could always go out and have a battle or two to strengthen our team!
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: You’ve gotten pretty famous around here, thanks to all those victories, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. People in town will want to challenge you.
story_20_01000_en.lsd.story_20_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: That’s true! We can probably battle all kinds of Trainers now!

story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Everyone seemed really excited to battle us back there, huh?
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah! I’m still in the mood for a few more battles, though!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: The Trainers we’ll be facing in the finals are bound to be super strong. We’ve got to make sure we’re prepared!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Of course! I look after lots of little kids back home in Alola, so I’m used to being the responsible one.
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Um... You wouldn’t happen to be [Name:PlayerNickname ], would you?
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: Oh, I’m Calem. I recently came to Pasio from the Kalos region.
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: I heard a little about you from Cynthia earlier. I was hoping maybe we could have a battle!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: If Cynthia wanted us to meet you, you must be a pretty powerful Trainer...
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: I dunno about that. The way you battle on Pasio is pretty different from how we do it in Kalos... I’m still trying to get used to it.
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Well then, why don’t we battle and see what you can do?!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: The key to team battling is battling a lot and getting to know your teammates and your partner Pokémon really well!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: We’ve still got some time before the tournament matches start... What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_0401_1600_10: Yay! All right, let’s give it our best shot!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_0402_1800_10: I’ll be fine! Trust me, I’ve got the power of old royalty on my side!
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: I may be a new arrival to Pasio, but I’m no newbie when it comes to Pokémon training.
story_20_02000_en.lsd.story_20_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: Time to see for myself whether your skills live up to Cynthia’s description!

story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Guess that’s one victory for us! I have to give you some credit, though— you’re way stronger than I thought you’d be!
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah! Our Pokémon all look like they had a ton of fun in that battle!
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: I told you I’m not a newbie when it comes to Pokémon training...
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: but you definitely impressed me back there. I can see how you’ve made it this far in the tournament.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Well, Espurr... They’re definitely in the running for the championship... We’ve got some decisions to make.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: Well, it’s just... I actually have a couple reasons for coming to find you today.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: You’ve all heard of Team Break, right?
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: How could we not? They’re trying to sabotage the PML by stealing people’s Pokémon! We’ve battled tons of them.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: I haven’t seen them around lately, though... Not since the tournament matches began, I think.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Well, it seems they’re back in business. They’ve started stealing Pokémon again.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: I was planning to infiltrate one of their hideouts, but Cynthia told me to hold off.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: That’s when she told me about you all... She said you might be willing to help.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Aha... Well, how could we say no to that!
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: But aren’t you supposed to be preparing for the finals? Are you sure you want to get involved?
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_0401_1700_10: No hesitation at all, huh? Cynthia was right... You’ve definitely got some resolve.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_0302_1800_10: We can’t leave Team Break to their own devices!
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_0402_1900_10: That’s right! We’ve still got some time before the opening ceremony begins. Let’s do this!
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: We’d love to help you, Calem! Let’s take down Team Break together!
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: Thanks, everyone. Just do me a favor and don’t go too overboard, OK? You’ve still got a tournament to win.
story_20_03000_en.lsd.story_20_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Right, then. Let’s head to that hideout.

story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: That’s one of Team Break’s hideouts... They’re keeping their stolen Pokémon in that cave.
story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: It’s pretty well guarded. We’ll have to be careful!
story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Espurr and I can handle the guards. Wait here. We’ll take care of them.
story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: What? Why don’t we all go together?
story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: Yeah, let’s do it together, Calem!
story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: We’ll be fine as long as we all stick close to one another.
story_20_04000_en.lsd.story_20_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: All right, let’s do this. Come on, everyone!

story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hmm... I feel like I should have run into some of those stolen Pokémon by now... How much deeper does this cave go?
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: Don’t go running too far ahead! We agreed we’d do this together, didn’t we?
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Oops. Sorry, I’m not really used to working in big groups.
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: Well, we’re deep inside Team Break’s hideout now... Of course we’re gonna worry if you take off on your own.
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: Misty... Maybe that’s just Calem’s way of looking out for us.
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: I think you’re worried about us, too, Calem. That’s why you wanted to walk ahead— to make sure it’s safe, right?
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Maybe... In any case, we need to keep moving.
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: C-Calem! Wait, we’re coming, too! Ugh... Come on, let’s follow after him—
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: Who said you could poke your noses around here, huh?! This is our turf!
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh no, this is NOT what we need right now! We have to find Calem before he gets too far ahead of us!
story_20_05000_en.lsd.story_20_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: Then let’s make quick work of these thugs! Come on, Misty and [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: Errgh! So our reports were true! Those Pokémon of yours are strong indeed!
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: Well, we have other ways to deal with you... I think it’s time to move our plans forward.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: We managed to chase them off, but I feel like their Pokémon have gotten a lot stronger since last time.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: I’ve got a bad feeling about all of this... We should try and catch up to Calem as fast as we can.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Agreed. Why do you think he keeps running off on his own like that?!
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: Cynthia recommended us, so obviously she thinks we’re skilled enough for the task. I wish he’d lean on us a little more...
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: Maybe he’s just trying to be nice.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Well, he seemed really worried that getting us involved would affect our performance at the tournament.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1000_10: I think that’s why he’s been trying so hard to take care of this on his own.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1100_10: Hmm... When you put it like that, it does make sense.
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1200_10: How’d you figure him out so quickly? Today was your first time meeting him, too, right?
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1300_10: Let’s just say Calem reminds me of some friends of mine...
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: Bwahaha! Give up now, if y’know what’s good for ya, kid!
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1600_10: Hey! I think I hear more of those thugs over there!
story_20_06000_en.lsd.story_20_06000/2401_1001_1700_10: Oh no! Calem could be in trouble! Let’s go!

story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0200_10: Think you can beat us all alone, huh, kid? Hah! Don’t be stupid!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0300_10: Things’re different now! We can call up strong Pokémon to battle for us whenever we want now!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0400_10: Give it up, kid! You can’t win by yourself! Leave your Pokémon where we can see it and scram. Got it?!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: I don’t care how strong you are...
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0600_10: I won’t give up until I rescue those poor Pokémon that you’ve stolen from their Trainers!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0700_10: Wipe that self-righteous look off your face... It’s makin’ me cringe.
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_0800_10: You wanna play hardball? Fine, you got it! You’re gonna regret not runnin’ away while you had the chance, kid!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_1100_10: We told you this would be too dangerous alone. Let us fight with you!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_1300_10: These thugs are way stronger than we thought... I’ll hold them off here!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_1500_10: What?! Did you even hear what I just said?!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_1800_10: No! We can’t just leave you, Calem!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_2100_10: I know why you’re doing this. You want to do as much as you can because we’ve got the tournament ahead of us.
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_2200_10: But you’re forgetting that we want to help you, too. We’re your friends, Calem!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_2400_10: Of course we are! There are some things you just can’t do all by yourself... That’s where friends like us come in!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_2500_10: That’s why I really, really, really...
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_2600_10: reeeally wish you’d let Big Sis help you!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_2800_10: Oof! What I meant to say was...
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_3000_10: You’re totally right... I can’t believe I forgot something so simple.
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_3100_10: Come on, everyone! Let’s battle these thugs together—and rescue those stolen Pokémon!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_0401_0100_10: All right! Hope you’re ready, Team Break!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_0402_0100_10: All right! Hope you’re ready, Team Break!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_3200_10: Pffft! Think you’re better than us now that you’ve got “Big Sis” to help you? Hah! Don’t make me laugh!
story_20_07000_en.lsd.story_20_07000/2401_1001_3300_10: Come on! Bet we’ll beat you at your own game!

story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0100_10: Y-you gotta be kiddin’ me... How did we lose?
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0200_10: Woo-hoo! We beat these thieves to smithereens!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: Guess we managed to do it in the end!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0600_10: Which means it’s time for you Team Break crooks to hand over the Pokémon you stole!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: Heh heh... No can do, girlie!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0800_10: Don’t tell me you still haven’t learned your lesson!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_0900_10: Uhh, do we look like we’re good at learnin’ lessons? Hah! We’re not gonna stop till we’ve totally annihilated this tournament!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1000_10: And you kiddies walked right into our trap! When I give the signal, you’ll be surrounded by every Team Break member in this hideout!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1200_10: Bwahaha! It’s game over for you now!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1400_10: Huh? Where is everybody?! If they’re playin’ hooky...
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1500_10: Sorry, but your colleagues have already been apprehended.
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1700_10: Long time no see. Thanks to your distraction, I was able to complete our objective.
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1800_10: N-no way... This place was crawlin’ with Team Break members and Pokémon!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_1900_10: You tellin’ me you took out ALL of ’em?!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_2000_10: That’s correct. My being here should be proof of that.
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_2100_10: So, you now have a choice to make— come quietly, or...
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_2200_10: see how you fare in a battle against Garchomp and me! Take your pick.
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_2400_10: W-we’re sorry we stole the Pokémon!
story_20_08000_en.lsd.story_20_08000/2401_1001_2500_10: There, that wasn’t so hard, was it?

story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0100_10: The PML staff should be able to take over from here. We can leave Team Break and the stolen Pokémon to them.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0200_10: I can’t believe you defeated all these Team Break crooks on your own...
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0300_10: I...I don’t even know what to say!
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0400_10: Like I said before, if you hadn’t been keeping some of them distracted, I might not have been able to blindside Team Break the way I did.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0500_10: It’s really thanks to you that I was able to round up all these criminals.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: Wow, it feels awesome to hear that from someone like you, Cynthia!
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0700_10: That reminds me, I didn’t get to ask you about that whole “Big Sis” thing back there, Acerola... What was that all about?
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0800_10: Oh! I think I said it out of habit... Hee hee! The kids back home at Aether House always call me that.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_0900_10: Calem sort of reminded me of them, I guess! The way he was trying his hardest to protect us, just like the kids always do.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1000_10: But you don’t have to worry about us, Calem. We want to help protect you, too!
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1200_10: I guess I wasn’t thinking about how the rest of you felt, was I? I just rushed in there headlong.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1300_10: I did the same thing to my friend Shauna once... I regretted it back then, too, but I obviously didn’t learn my lesson.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1400_10: Sorry, Acerola. I should have paid more attention to how you and the others were feeling.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1500_10: You were right there with me, just like a big sister, and I totally ignored your help.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1600_10: Yeah! You should really let Big Sis help you out more often, OK?
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1700_10: Hmm... It seems you’ve gained some lovely new friends, Calem. I’ve been thinking about this for a while now, but after today...
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1800_10: I’m convinced that you’d do well on [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team, Calem. It’s perfect for you!
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_1900_10: What?! You want Calem to join our team?!
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2000_10: Remember how I said I had a couple different reasons for wanting to approach your team earlier?
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2100_10: Well, one of those reasons was to see if you’d help me take out Team Break... But I was also hoping you might let me join your team.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2200_10: There are worse things than having a highly skilled Trainer from Kalos on your team, right?
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2300_10: Hee hee! Well, you have one vote from Acerola! What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_0302_0100_10: You’re in...as long as you learn to lean on the team a little.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_0402_0100_10: All right. I wouldn’t want Big Sis to get mad at me.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_0402_0200_10: Hee hee! I sure hope not!
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2400_10: Well, that’s excellent! I think I’m even more excited to battle against your team now.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2500_10: Wait, does that mean... You’re competing, too, Cynthia?
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2600_10: I am, as a matter of fact. Best of luck to both our teams in the finals.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2700_10: Speaking of which, we should probably start heading that way before they begin the opening ceremony without us.
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_2900_10: Oof! Hope they didn’t spot me...
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_3000_10: Just as I thought... There seems to be something bigger going on around here, unlike anything we’ve seen before...
story_20_09000_en.lsd.story_20_09000/2401_1001_3300_10: Shall we get going? The greatest sync pairs on Pasio are gathering at the arena, and we should be among them!

story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Phew! We made it just in time! We would have missed the opening ceremony if we hadn’t run here from the volcano!
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah! Do you think we might have time to take a—
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1101_0300_20: We will be commencing the opening ceremony momentarily. All participating teams, please line up.
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: break? Heh, I guess not. Shall we?
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: What’s wrong, Rosa? We have to get going.
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: Yeah, I know... I just thought I saw Paulo over there.
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Paulo? He must have made it to the finals, too, then. That’s great news!
story_21_01000_en.lsd.story_21_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: I’d like to say hi to him as well, but first we have to line up! Let’s go find him after the ceremony.

story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: All right, listen up! We’re starting the opening ceremony for the PML finals!
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Lear’s not doing the opening announcement? What’s going on?
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: You and your Pokémon all pushed yourselves to the limit to make it this far in the competition.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: You all got guts—that’s for sure! Pat yourselves on the back!
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: But that’s not good enough, is it? I figure most of you came here to win...
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: so let’s see it! Duke it out to your heart’s content! You’re here to prove that you’re the best, aren’t you? Well, here’s your chance!
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: The PML finals is your stage! It’s time to show off!
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: I didn’t think I’d see Sawyer being master of ceremonies.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: I didn’t think he’d be so good at it! I’m glad it was him and not Lear! Can you imagine Lear saying anything like that?
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: I wonder what’s going on, though... Lear doesn’t seem like the type to pass up being in the spotlight.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: Could he still be moping around because of our battle? Either way...
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: our first match is about to start! Let’s focus on the tournament for now.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_0401_1500_10: That’s the spirit! Let’s go for the win!
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_0401_1600_10: We have to focus if we want to have our rematch with Lear, right?
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_0302_1700_10: I wonder if Lear is OK.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_0402_1800_10: It’s probably best if we put Lear out of our minds for now—for his sake as well.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_0402_1900_10: We have to focus if we want to have our rematch with him.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1101_2000_20: Attention, all sync pairs: The first match of the finals will begin momentarily.
story_21_02000_en.lsd.story_21_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: Yeah! Let’s see. Our first opponent is...

story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Whew! I guess we can wrap up our daily training there. What do you think, Conkeldurr?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: I know. The real problem is figuring out what will happen now...
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: We came to Pasio to train and take our martial arts to new heights—to find our new path.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: But nothing has changed. We are the same as we were back in Unova. We have to do  something different.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: That’s it, Machamp! Now, give me ten thousand more Karate Chops!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Ah, Marshal! I did not realize you were on Pasio, too.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Yes. I was actually just looking for a good spot to train. Is that what you and Machamp are doing here?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Indeed, we are. There are many boulders here, which makes it perfect for training.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: I see. It looks like it’s going well. I could hear your battle shouts from way over there! They resonated deep within me.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’ve never heard such intense shouts before.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Oh, you could hear my battle shouts?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: Whenever I try to exert myself to the fullest, that sort of shout naturally comes out.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: It’s the same with Machamp. The more we shout from our cores, the more strength we can muster!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: Here we go, Machamp! Show us your superior  power... No, your overwhelming power!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: You do have a good shout... But you gotta have balance, too.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: Ah, Brawly... Have you finished surfing?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: Yeah, those were some rad waves! Hariyama had tons of fun, too!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Oh hey, Marshal! You training here, too?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: Wait! Marshal, are you and Conkeldurr—
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3000_10: Your upper bodies are definitely impressive. Your muscles make it obvious that you’ve got an intense training regimen.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3100_10: But your lower body can still use some improvement. If you train your legs, your lower half’ll be totally gnarly in no time, too!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3200_10: Wha—?! You could tell that in a single glance?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3300_10: Brawly’s Pokémon Gym is filled with exercise machines for Trainers and Pokémon to use. He would know a thing or two about muscles.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3400_10: I might have a different methodology than Bruno, but I train and work out as well.
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3500_10: Oh! If you want a good way to train your lower body, I’d recommend surfing!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_3700_10: Haha! You never know... You two might be good at it!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_4000_10: Surfing is a bit extreme, don’t you think, Brawly?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_4300_10: New encounters! New perspectives! They’ll lead to new doors...and maybe a new path!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_4400_10: Bruno, Brawly! How would you like to do even more intense training with me?
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_4500_10: We can form a team—and aim for the top of the PML as the ultimate Fighting-type team!
story_21_03000_en.lsd.story_21_03000/2401_1001_4600_10: Let’s continue on our path to becoming masters of martial arts together!

story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: I haven’t thanked you yet, Bruno and Brawly. If I hadn’t teamed up with you, I wouldn’t have gotten this strong.
story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: No need to thank us. We all got stronger by being together.
story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: I guess that’s just the kind of synergy that Fighting-type fanatics like us create!
story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: But we’re not the ultimate team yet!
story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: Exactly. We still have a ways to go on that path, but we will continue to battle on!
story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We have all greatly improved our strength since forming a team together here on Pasio!
story_21_04000_en.lsd.story_21_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: We have transcended both superior and overwhelming power—get ready for our SUPREME power!

story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: There is no such thing as the strongest Pokémon. Nor is there a perfect team combination.
story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: I knew this, yet I thought that we could never lose. It seems that our path was steeper than we had thought.
story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: But it wouldn’t be worth it if it were easy, would it? The challenge is what drives us to master the path.
story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Besides, we’re martial artists. You know it’s not in our nature to quit.
story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]... I feel like I saw your true nature during our battle.
story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: You have a heart that cares for your friends and Pokémon.
story_21_05000_en.lsd.story_21_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: Strengthen that heart of yours, and use it to rise to the top in this tournament! Best of luck!

story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1001_0100_10: I didn’t think we would get matched up with Marshal and his team so quickly.
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1001_0200_10: Yeah, not only was their coordination impeccable...but they looked like they were having a lot of fun during that battle, too!
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: To think our first opponents were that strong... Goes to show you that the finals are no joke!
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_0401_0500_10: I know what you mean! I can’t wait to see all the other teams!
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_0302_0600_10: Our teamwork makes us just as good as any of these other teams!
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_0402_0700_10: You bet! That’s why we we’ve been able to beat the competition up to now!
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: Ha ha! If that’s your first reaction after battling, we’ll be fine!
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1101_0900_20: Attention, all sync pairs: Round one of the finals has ended.
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1101_1000_20: The matchups for round two will be announced momentarily.
story_21_06000_en.lsd.story_21_06000/2401_1001_1100_10: It’s already time to announce the next matches! Let’s see. Our new opponents are...

story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0100_10: ...And then supposedly this suuuper strong Trainer named Cynthia rolled in and defeated pretty much all of Team Break!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0200_10: Long story short: the hideout I found was a dud.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0300_10: Same... Those wretched Team Break thugs! Where’d they manage to hide it?!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0400_10: Anyways...are you sure it was a good idea to ditch the opening ceremony so you could keep searchin’, Master Lear?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0500_10: I had no choice! If our...secret friend...falls into the wrong hands, the PML will be the least of our worries.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0600_10: Besides, if I’d been there, all that sappy talk of bonds and friendship would have made me gag.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0800_10: No! Never you mind! And where in the world is Sawyer, anyway? He should have been here by now!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_0900_10: Mmm... I’m sure he’ll thunder into this cave any minute now.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1100_10: You had better be! Those goons could be summoning all sorts of terrible Pokémon as we speak! Do NOT keep me waiting again!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1200_10: Let’s go! We’ve got to head to the next hideout!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1300_10: It’s time to take Hoopa back from those Team Break thieves... We cannot let them get away with this!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1400_10: Hoopa... You mean the Mythical Pokémon?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1500_10: You there! Whoever you are—come out and show yourself!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1600_10: Ah, I guess I should apologize for eavesdropping. I never thought I’d hear the name of that Pokémon, though.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1800_10: His name’s Cheren. He’s one of [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s teammates.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_1900_10: Yes, I’m aware. What is he doing here?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2000_10: Well, I know I’m in the wrong here, but when I noticed you weren’t at the opening ceremony, I got curious and followed Sawyer.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2200_10: I guess we’re all in way more trouble than I originally thought.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2300_10: Hoopa, the Mythical Pokémon, huh? I’ve only ever read about it in books.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2400_10: It’s said that Hoopa can warp space with its rings, sending anything and everything to faraway places.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2500_10: I suppose with that kind of power, it could easily teleport people and Pokémon to Pasio from all over the world.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2600_10: Tsk! You think you know everything, don’t you?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2700_10: Well, when you bring Hoopa into the equation, all of the strange things going on around here start to make sense.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2800_10: Some Trainers came to this island on a ferry or on the back of their Pokémon...
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_2900_10: but some were transported here by some mysterious ring—me being one of them.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3000_10: It all makes sense now... It was Hoopa’s power that brought us here.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3100_10: You used Hoopa to bring all of us sync pairs here to Pasio, didn’t you? For the PML.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3200_10: Uhhh, so what if we did? You tryin’ to accuse us of some kinda crime?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3300_10: For your information, Hoopa was totally happy to do it for us when we gave it donuts. It’s, like, mutually beneficial or whatever.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3400_10: That’s right. And we sent people back home if they didn’t want to stay on Pasio, all right?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3500_10: All we wanted to do was use Hoopa’s powers to ramp up the excitement around here for the tournament!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3600_10: Silence! I told you not to bring that up!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3700_10: Whatever. I don’t have to stand here and listen to this twerp! Rachel, Sawyer, we’re done here! Come on!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3800_10: Wait, Lear! If Team Break really did steal Hoopa, all of Pasio could be in danger now.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_3900_10: You don’t actually think you can solve this all on your own, do you? You need to enlist help from the other sync pairs on the island.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4100_10: How dare you! Just because of what happened in that last battle, you DARE insinuate that I am weak?!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4200_10: That was a fluke! A FLUKE, I tell you! I have no need for help—I have more than enough strength to handle this alone!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4300_10: The last time I checked, I was the one in charge here. Everyone else can simply shut their mouth and do as I say!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4500_10: I am in line to become king, and what a king says is absolute! No one is above a king!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4600_10: OK, let’s say you become king all on your own, without any help from anyone... Then what?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4700_10: Do you think I’m a fool? What does it matter what I would or wouldn’t do? If I don’t become king, I’ll never gain recognition.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_4800_10: If I can’t become king, then why am I even here?!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_5200_10: Hmph! It’s as if you all live to infuriate me! Rachel, Sawyer, we’re leaving! Do NOT make me say it again!
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_5400_10: Lear is bound and determined to do this all on his own, isn’t he?
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_5500_10: That obsession with power... He’s definitely not going to make this easy for us.
story_21_51000_en.lsd.story_21_51000/2401_1001_5600_10: I wonder if this is how Alder felt...

story_21_52000_en.lsd.story_21_52000/2401_1001_0100_10: Heh heh heh... The power of Mythical Pokémon is sublime indeed. With Hoopa, we can summon any Pokémon we want, no matter how powerful!
story_21_52000_en.lsd.story_21_52000/2401_1001_0200_10: And it’s only the beginning... We’ll use Hoopa to teleport more and more of them to Pasio and sabotage this obnoxious tournament!

story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Ngh... Can’t believe these guys managed to corner me...
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Heh! Looks like you don’t have any Pokémon left that are fit for battle.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Your Rockruff was no match for our powerful Pokémon.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Weaklings like you should shut your mouths and let us do what we want!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: Don’t make me laugh! There’s no way I’ll let anyone steal Pokémon away from their Trainers!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: I don’t care who it is. I’ll stop anyone who’d do something so terrible!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Hmph! Tough words for a kid who just lost.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’m not here to listen to your speeches. All of you are going to hand over your Pokémon!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: We’ll not sit idly by and allow these people to suffer your wicked deeds!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Y’know what? It’s time you packed it in and got out of here.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Huh? Who’re you two? You’d better not get in our way!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: More scrubs who don’t know their place, huh? We’ll beat you and take your Pokémon, too!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: It seems there are evildoers no matter where you go.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Avalugg, lend me a bit of your strength!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Aegislash! Teach these ruffians the sting of the blade of justice!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: Thank you so much! You really saved us!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: ’Tis not a deed that requires gratitude. It is our duty to help those in need.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: Y’know, it’d probably be best to stay away from suspicious-looking spots.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: Please allow me to express my gratitude. Thank you, Wikstrom and Wulfric.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: I do! My name is Paulo.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: I’ve heard so many stories about the two of you from Trainers from Kalos. I really look up to the both of you!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: The strong-as-steel, chivalrous knight who battles fair and honorably against opponents, Wikstrom!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: The man who’s tough as an iceberg and hot as a furnace, Wulfric! I’ve heard you’re a kindhearted man who looks after wounded Pokémon!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Representatives of the Gym Leaders and Elite Four of Kalos! It’s an honor to meet you both!
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: Haha! Y’know what? Compliments like that make me feel bashful.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: I am honored that stories of my exploits have reached your ears.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: Moreover, your courageous acts are truly the chivalrous deeds befitting a knight.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: No. No way am I good enough to compare to the two of you...
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3600_10: Oh? What makes you say such a thing?
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3800_10: Things would’ve gone a lot differently if the two of you hadn’t shown up when you did.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: You’re not only kind and chivalrous—the two of you have strength, too, to back it up.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_4000_10: But I... I might be brave, but I’ve got no strength to get the job done. I was too weak to even beat those guys...
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: At this rate, I’m sure to lose in the PML...
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: Hm. The strength to enforce what you believe in...
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_4400_10: I’m sure you’ll become a fine Trainer in time. There’s no need to rush things.
story_22_01000_en.lsd.story_22_01000/2401_1001_4700_10: Wikstrom, Wulfric! Would it be all right to ask you for something?

story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: The second round of the finals...
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hm? Are you having second thoughts, Paulo?
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: I suppose I can’t blame you. That one’s a friend of yours, right?
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: That’s right... [Name:PlayerNickname ] started collecting badges around the same time that I did.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: But...before I knew it, [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’d' F='she’d' ] already gotten far ahead of me.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_0900_10: [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] was ahead of me gathering badges, and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] was ahead of me battling Team Break...
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: But today is going to be different!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: The two of you taught me chivalry, kindness, and most importantly, strength.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1200_10: I was able to become who I’ve always wanted to be, all thanks to forming a team with the two of you, who I idolize.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: What I’ve always wanted to be... I’ve become a steadfast Trainer who won’t lose out to anyone in strength or spirit!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: This time, things will be different. I’ll use everything I’ve learned and battle with all my strength. There’s no way our team will lose!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: It seems we too must battle with all our might in answer of this spirited declaration!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: Boy was I surprised when I heard that our second-round opponent was you, Paulo!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: Haha! I could say the same about you.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: But I’m glad we get to meet on the field of battle in the PML like this!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2300_10: Hm. Compared to before, you seem to be overflowing with confidence.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: It seems those teammates of yours also made for some good teachers, eh?
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2500_10: Yes! They’re Trainers I hold in high regard!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2600_10: Paulo’s teammates are Wikstrom and Wulfric? This doesn’t look like it’ll be easy.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Y’know what to do. Let’s go, Korrina!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: We hail from the same region, so there’s no need for pleasantries or holding back. Let us battle with all of our might!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_2900_10: OK! I’m already getting fired up! Let’s go all out!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: Thanks to this team, I reflected on myself and realized what you are to me.
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: You’re the rival that’s always ahead of me. The rival I never want to lose to!
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: But that ends today! I’ve changed. Here, today...
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_0401_3600_10: I’m going to win. And I’ll continue to win...
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_0402_3800_10: You’re wrong! I’ll win, and I’ll keep winning...
story_22_02000_en.lsd.story_22_02000/2401_1001_3900_10: I’ll show you a true champion team!

story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: My ideal team... I thought that I’d grown so much stronger...
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: Don’t let it get to you, Paulo. Each and every sync pair gave it their all for a truly intense battle.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: Losing is a consequence of Pokémon battles sometimes, even if you still give it everything you’ve got.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Accept what has transpired. Face it, and continue forward. That is the way to grow stronger.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: And offer our congratulations to those who have won: [Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='his' F='her' ] team.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Sorry for acting weird. I’m all right now.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], you really are strong. I gave it everything I had, and it still wasn’t enough.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1600_10: You’ll just have to keep battling for both of us! I’ll be cheering for you!
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: Paulo... He kind of looked like he was forcing that smile. I hope he’s all right...
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I’m sure he was feeling down after his loss... But there’s nothing we can do. If there’s a winner, then there’s sure to be a loser, too.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: If even a single thing had gone differently in that battle, we would’ve ended up as the losers.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: You’re right. It could’ve gone either way. Paulo really is strong.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: For us to have won against Paulo...
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_0301_2300_10: We’ve got to do our best for his sake, too!
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_0401_2400_10: Right! We’ve got to fight even harder than before!
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_0302_2500_10: We’re going to win this thing!
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_0402_2600_10: That’s right. We’ve still got some rough road ahead of us. No matter what strong opponent we face, we can’t afford to lose.
story_22_03000_en.lsd.story_22_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: That’s your duty, as Paulo’s rival.

story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Thank you for joining my team!
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Y’know what? We don’t need any thanks.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: What’s most important is you really have grown, Paulo.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: You had no confidence in yourself at first, but you found your way and grew stronger so quickly.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: Right from the beginning, you were brave enough to stand up to Team Break on your own. I always knew you were a Trainer with potential.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: I never would’ve guessed you could become so strong. We were able to enjoy some truly first-rate battles thanks to you.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: If there is any gratitude to be offered, it should be from us to you. Thank you, Paulo.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: It makes me happy to hear you say that.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: I won’t forget any of the things you two have taught me!
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: Indeed. Though our teams may part ways, we must all remain diligent.
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Y’know what? Next time, you should have a battle with us, Paulo!
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: Wikstrom... Wulfric... I looked up to them so much. I thought that if I was on a team with the two of them, I’d win for sure...
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: I sought the strength I believed I had, formed my ideal team, gave it every ounce of strength I could...
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: But [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’s' F='she’s' ] still stronger than me...
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_2100_10: What is it going to take to become stronger than I am now? How do I beat [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]?
story_22_04000_en.lsd.story_22_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: Am I...am I just aiming too high?

story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: We made it through the second round of the finals. Things are going pretty well for us!
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Indeed. It’s been nonstop exciting battles the whole way.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’ve hardly even had time to sleep.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hold on! Don’t go falling asleep during battle now!
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: Hee hee. Our opponents for the third round should be revealed soon.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Oh? Why the long faces, you two? Has something happened?
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: Well, we met some kid Trainers on the way here.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_1200_10: Ah! I get it! You lost to them in a battle!
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: No, that’s not it at all! It’s what they said. They said our Pokémon were cool, but...
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: This garb has been passed down from ninja to ninja for generations. To hear such disrespect for it is...
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: My look is so trendy, it’s on everyone’s lips in Johto! Pasio just hasn’t reached my level yet!
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: I admit I wasn’t expecting that...
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_0301_1900_10: I think you two look great.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_0401_2000_10: R-right! I’d expect nothing less from your sensibilities, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_0402_2300_10: Hee hee. I suppose you could say the two of you have quite the bold sense of style.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: Oh! Is that you over there, Erika?
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: I’m glad we ran into each other.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: Is this a friend of yours, Erika?
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Yes. This is Valerie, a Gym Leader from Kalos.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: She’s also a designer who makes all manner of wonderful clothing.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3200_10: I’m Valerie. A pleasure to meet you.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3300_10: Hm? The way you speak... Are you from Johto?
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: That’s right. In Kalos, I’m known as the maiden from a land with history.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3700_10: What business do you have with us?
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: They pair so well with your partner Pokémon. I think they’re wonderful.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4300_10: That’s right, Valerie! My style is incredible, don’t you think?
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4400_10: Fwahahaha! I’d expect nothing less from a designer!
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4500_10: Well, you two sure look pleased...
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4600_10: Valerie, since you’re here, would mind joining me on a walk? I have something I’d like to speak with you about.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4700_10: Really? That’d be wonderful. I’m still not quite used to things here on Pasio. I hardly know my left from my right.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4800_10: Hee hee. Then I’d be glad to show you around town.
story_23_01000_en.lsd.story_23_01000/2401_1001_4900_10: I suppose we’ll be off, then.

story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hmm. It seems Valerie’s reputation precedes her.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: Indeed. Valerie’s designs are extremely popular with lots of people.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: Hmm... By the way, how much would one outfit cost?
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hmm... Well, from what I’ve heard from other Trainers from Kalos...
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: a single outfit could cost more than 500 Big Pearls.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0700_10: I see... I was thinking of getting an outfit for my daughter, but...if they cost that much...
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: It’s not the price that matters. It’s how good it looks on the wearer that’s important.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: That’s right. Clair, Koga, your outfits really match the two of you well.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: The two of you have such a charming style. I’m sure even your clothes are happy to be worn by you two.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: I knew you’d understand! We have the same sensibilities.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Hmm, all right! I’ve made up my mind! Since you’ve complimented me so kindly, I will grant you my company all day long!
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: If there’s anything you’d like to do, just let me know.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: Anything is fine, from being shown around town to having a Pokémon battle. Anything you want.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: That sure would be a big help.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: I’d like to become a Pokémon.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_0401_2400_10: Well, I mean exactly what I said. I’d like to be a Pokémon.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_0402_2600_10: Really? Oh, I’m so happy to hear that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: My fashion designs are all about that feeling of becoming a Pokémon.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: After receiving a sync stone, I thought I’d be able to...
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: Oh! I’m sorry. I was caught up in the beauty of my sync stone for a moment.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: Sorry. I completely forgot what we were talking about before.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_3400_10: You were talking about how you thought you’d use a sync stone to become a Pokémon.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_3500_10: Ah, that’s right. So, what do you think? Would it be possible?
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_3600_10: Hmm. So you weren’t speaking metaphorically. I think you might’ve heard some bad information.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_3700_10: ...I’m sorry, Valerie, but you can’t become a Pokémon by using a sync stone.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_4100_10: Isn’t there anything else you’d like to do while you’re on Pasio?
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_4200_10: Hmm. Let me think for a minute...
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_4300_10: Oh! Well, there is someone I want to meet.
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_4600_10: P-please! I don’t have much money, but...
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_4700_10: We want a robe— No, please make a dress for Elesa!
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_4900_10: Yes. Just the thought of Elesa walking down the shining runway in the Nimbasa City Gym in one of your dresses is spellbinding...
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_5000_10: I’ve made up my mind! I have to have you make it!
story_23_02000_en.lsd.story_23_02000/2401_1001_5100_10: If you lose in a Pokémon battle, you have to make it for me, OK?!

story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: Having a dream is fine, but that’s no reason to go forcing people to do things.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0300_10: Y-you’re right. I’m sorry. We just got a bit too excited...
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hey, you. You said you know Elesa?
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Huh? Of course. I just saw her not too long ago.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Really? Could you tell me where you saw her?
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’ve heard that Elesa is on Pasio, and I’ve actually been wanting to meet her.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: R-really? I can draw you a map right now!
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: I’m certain that one of your dresses would really complement Elesa’s beauty! Please make one for her!
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: I see now. The person you said you wanted to meet was Elesa.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: I’ve been wanting to meet her for a while now. She’s really stylish.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: I want to know how she thinks and lives— and how to become like that.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: I feel like meeting her would really get my creativity going.
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: I don’t really get what’s happening, but you want to meet Elesa, right?
story_23_03000_en.lsd.story_23_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: I’ll show you to where the map leads. Please follow closely.

story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: According to the map, the spot should be right around here.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: It certainly seems like that would be the case...
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_0600_10: You’re every bit as strong as I’ve heard, Elesa! I’m looking forward to the real match!
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: So am I. Though getting challenged like that was more than a little startling.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: But was it really a good idea to show a potential tournament opponent your strengths and weaknesses?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: It’s fine, it’s fine! Battles are the most fun when you just battle when you want without getting caught up in stuff like that.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1000_10: Plus...we’re both still hiding an ace up our sleeve, aren’t we?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: That was a great battle, Leaf!
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: Misty! Oh, and [Name:PlayerNickname ], too! What’re you doing here?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1400_10: Oh, I get it! You came for a battle with me, too, huh?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: I’m afraid not. We came to find Elesa, actually.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1700_10: You... Are you Valerie, the designer?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: Wha—? You’ve heard of me, Elesa?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_1900_10: Of course! We models hold the fashions you create in the highest regard.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_2000_10: I’m glad you found me. There’s actually something I’d like to ask you.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_2300_10: Hehe. You sure have an interesting way of thinking about things, Valerie.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_2400_10: One day, I really hope you’ll wear one of the dresses I make.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_2600_10: Heh. Looks like the two of them are getting along just fine.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_2700_10: By the way, Valerie, about you wanting to become a Pokémon...
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_2900_10: Huh? Of course I was. I absolutely want to be a Pokémon.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_3100_10: And I actually know a way... A way to become a Pokémon.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_3300_10: Yeah. I’m sure it’s exactly the kind of thing you’re looking for, Valerie.
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_3400_10: You mean it? Can I really, really be a Pokémon?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_3500_10: Yes, if you follow what I say. All right...
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_3600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Have a battle with Valerie right now!
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_0302_3900_10: Is that the way to become a Pokémon?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_4100_10: Valerie, this will be your first battle on Pasio, right? That should do the trick!
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_4300_10: Huh? You actually understand what’s happening here, Elesa? What does she mean? How will this make someone a Pokémon?
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_4500_10: C’mon. It’s time to battle with all your might!
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_4600_10: Hmm. I still don’t really understand, but I’m up for it if you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_23_04000_en.lsd.story_23_04000/2401_1001_4700_10: The elusive Fairy types may appear frail as a breeze and delicate as a bloom, but they are strong.

story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: How do I put this...? When I used my sync move...
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: it felt like I was one with Sylveon.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: That was the feeling of...being a Pokémon.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: It was the feeling of your hearts becoming one. That’s the answer.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: Sync moves happen only when a Trainer’s heart and mind are in sync with their Pokémon’s.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: In that moment, your hearts are connected and beat as one.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: I know it’s not exactly what you’re looking for, but that’s what it means to become a Pokémon here on Pasio.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: That’s what it means to become a Pokémon...
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: I see. On Pasio, you and your Pokémon can unite your hearts and minds, and when you do, it feels like you’ve become your Pokémon.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: My, that’s wonderful. Just wonderful. I’m really interested in Pokémon battles on Pasio now.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: Fwahaha! Glad to hear it, Valerie!
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1400_10: Hee hee. It’s good to see Valerie so happy. Thank you, Leaf.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: Of course! I can’t have anyone trying to actually turn into a Pokémon like Bill did.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1600_10: Though I guess that’d be interesting in its own way.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’m in your debt, everyone. Thank you.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: It might be a bit too soon, but I’d like to get even closer with Sylveon right away.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Elesa, would you please do me the favor of battling me?
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_2100_10: Actually, Valerie, you should think about joining [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_2300_10: The round three pairings for the finals were just revealed. My team is battling...
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_2700_10: Hee hee. That’s right. Our shining battle will be on the stage of the PML...
