story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_2800_10: So, your team will get to battle with Elesa next, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_2900_10: Oh my! I suppose I’ll just have to join your team then, won’t I?
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_3000_10: That way, I can have a battle with Elesa on the greatest stage imaginable!
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_3100_10: Oh, well, only if that’s all right with everyone else.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_3200_10: Of course! It’s certainly a bit sudden, but we’d be glad to have you, Valerie!
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_3400_10: Fwahahaha! It seems we’ve gained yet another strong-willed ally.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_3500_10: We welcome you with open arms! Isn’t that right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_0401_3800_10: Thank you. Sylveon and I will do our best!
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_0402_4200_10: Hee hee. I think we’ll get along quite well.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_4300_10: I’ll be waiting for you in round three, then.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_4400_10: I should get going, too. My teammates are probably waiting for me.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_4500_10: Don’t go losing now, OK? I’m looking forward to a battle with you, too!
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_4700_10: Elesa... And Leaf is still in the running, too...
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_4800_10: After their battle, Elesa and Leaf both talked about how they still had an ace up their sleeve. I’m eager to see what they meant.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_4900_10: Me, too. I’m really looking forward to the coming battles.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_5000_10: I want to go all out, too, so let’s be sure to give it everything we’ve got.
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_5100_10: Yeah! We’ll take down any team that dares to take us on!
story_23_05000_en.lsd.story_23_05000/2401_1001_5200_10: I’m sure we can do it together!

story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0100_10: Sabrina, Fantina, and me—a team made up entirely of Gym Leaders.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: We’ve battled Elite Four members and some of the greatest Trainers in the world to make it this far.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Thanks to the two of you, my confidence is shining brighter than it ever has. I feel like we can take on anyone!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0400_10: Round three is starting soon, and our opponent has already been chosen.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0500_10: We’re taking on the members of [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Ooh la la! [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team! I’ve heard about them!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: Their team is très fantastique! This ensures a marvelously fun battle!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’ve heard about them, too. It seems they’re quite strong.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: I tried to look into the future to see the outcome of our battle with them. But for some reason, I was unable to see the results.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: An unknowable future... We absolutely must not hold anything back in this battle.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: You promised it beforehand, Sabrina! You promised to smile more with us!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: That’s right. The finals are an enormous stage with many spectators.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: We don’t have to explode with glamor, but... we’ve made it to the finals—don’t you think we should at least give everyone a magnificent smile?
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: Something like that is...asking a lot from me.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’m not a dancer or a model. I live in a very different world than the showy one you two live in.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: Smiling is not something I’m used to.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: But I’ve wanted to see your smile for such a long time.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: I’ve had such fun since I joined this team with you two. I’ve been smiling every day.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: That’s why I want you to smile, too, Sabrina!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: Hee hee. Fantina and I are both performers. We have no trouble expressing what we feel.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: That’s why we’d like you to try it a little, too. When we win, I’d like to have the whole audience be captivated by our charm.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: I suppose it wouldn’t be very much like you two to be satisfied by a victory alone.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: Hee hee, we’ll get you to change soon enough, Sabrina. Before long...
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: you’ll be smiling and showing your teeth like you were a Rattata!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_3000_10: Oh my! What a terrible joke, Elesa. Effroyable.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: Ooh la la! Sabrina smiled, non?
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: You must say more, Elesa! Speak more bad jokes, please!
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_3700_10: Leave it to me. All right, this next one’s a bit more complicated...
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_3800_10: Please, no more. This is already too embarrassing.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4000_10: Hee hee. What a lovely smile! You’d make a good performer.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: Say, Sabrina. You said you couldn’t foresee the outcome of the next match, right?
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: Even so, I believe in us.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4300_10: We’ll win together and wear the biggest smiles together. We’ll grasp that shining future.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4500_10: However, today I saw that shine in [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s eyes...
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4600_10: I’m sure the next battle will put our bond and our connection with each other to the test.
story_24_01000_en.lsd.story_24_01000/2401_1001_4800_10: We’re going to utterly captivate everyone in that stadium with our next battle!

story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Our match will be starting soon! Ah, how it gets the heart beating, non?
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: I wasn’t able to see the outcome of this battle, but I’ve got a feeling it’s going to be very intense.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_0300_10: I’m certain that feeling is correct... I’m looking forward to a great battle with you and your team, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Yeah! We’ll have the hottest battle ever!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: By the way, where’s Elesa? Is she still getting ready?
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Oui. Préparation has taken a bit longer than we would have liked, but she should be done soon...
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: Oh goodness, Elesa. What lovely and elegant clothes you’re wearing!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Wow, Elesa! Amazing! Too amazing even!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: This is my sygna suit. I wanted to face you in battle wearing this special outfit.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Teaming up with Sabrina and Fantina has really helped me polish my skills. I’m as versatile in battle as a Rotom now.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: In this place, at this battle... I will be the focus of everyone’s attention!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: Wow, you’re dazzling, Elesa. I feel like my head is spinning.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: Keep it together, Rosa! Your eyes are turning into stars!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: Hee hee. If you’re so captivated with only this glimpse, you’re in trouble. I’m only going to shine brighter from here on out.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_0401_2100_10: I thought so. I’m really looking forward to battling you.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_0402_2300_10: Hee hee. I’m flattered, but you should get ready! I’m really looking forward to battling you.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: Looks like it’s about time to shine.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_2500_10: The curtain is rising! Two bright stars will clash! This will be the greatest—
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_2600_10: That’s right! It’s time for the curtain to rise, but it’s going to be our performance that everyone remembers!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Team Break?! What are they doing here?
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: Look how many there are! Where did they all come from?
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_2900_10: Hehehe. It seems our surprise attack was a complete success. All thanks to that one.
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_3000_10: All right, everyone! Today is our big day!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: We’re putting a stop to the PML right here!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: They look like they might hurt the fans!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_3500_10: I won’t let them get away with hurting the people who’ve come to watch our Pokémon battle!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_3600_10: [Name:PlayerNickname ], we’ll settle our battle later. For now, we’ve got to work together to get rid of these guys!
story_24_02000_en.lsd.story_24_02000/2401_1001_3700_10: Team Break, we’re going to send you packing with a single strike!

story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: Whoa, Team Break’s looking even stronger than they were before!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: For them to have gained this much strength...
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hehe! You’ve got your back against the wall! Now, hand over your Pokémon!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Huh? Are you really in a position to refuse?
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Stay tough! Don’t listen to them!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: It’s all right now. They’re gone.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: I know. It’ll be all right. Please cheer up.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: That’s right! We’ll drive Team Break away!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: Let’s go, Elesa! Other people need our help!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: I understand your fear all too well.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: Your partner Pokémon is amazing. It stood by your side to protect you during Team Break’s attack.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Pokémon feel fear just like Trainers do.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_2300_10: But even though your Pokémon was scared, it gathered its courage and never gave up.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: So you should have courage, too, as your Pokémon’s Trainer.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: We might not be able to continue our match, but we can stop Team Break. We can’t let them get away with what they’re doing!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_2800_10: You and your Pokémon should get to a safe place and wait this out.
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3100_10: I-I’m all right! I don’t want to lose to Team Break anymore!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3200_10: No, it’s more than that! I WON’T lose to them ever again! I won’t lose to anyone who does such terrible things!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3400_10: I’m scared, but I won’t let Team Break win. They can’t control me. So please!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3500_10: Please continue with your match, Elesa!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3600_10: I’m sure if you do, many sync pairs out there will see it and find their courage. Just like I did!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3700_10: I want everyone in the stadium to see our courage!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_3800_10: The courage that will defeat Team Break!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_4200_10: Hah! You didn’t think a little back pain would be enough to keep me down, did you?
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_4300_10: Leave Team Break to us! Go and enjoy your match!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_4500_10: You know how strong my Pokémon and I are, right, Dad? There’s no way we’ll lose to Team Break!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_4600_10: But if you insist, I don’t mind taking your spot in the battle!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_4800_10: Fight on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Show them all what you can do!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_4900_10: Show everyone just how strong and brave you are!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_5100_10: They were all running scared until a moment ago, but now they’re all working together?
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_5200_10: Hee hee. What a marvelous crowd. Though they’re stealing our spotlight...
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_5300_10: How could we not want to battle when they’ve shown us such shining courage!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_0401_5600_10: Right! We’ll show Team Break and all those brave people in the audience what we can do!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_0302_5700_10: Let’s show them what we’ve got!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_0402_5800_10: That’s right! Let’s show Team Break and all those brave people in the audience what we can do!
story_24_03000_en.lsd.story_24_03000/2401_1001_5900_10: Let’s have the most courageous, most brilliantly shining battle ever!

story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: I feel wonderful...like my heart is melting.
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Your shine—it greatly exceeded my expectations.
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: I don’t feel the pain of losing... I just feel moved.
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Oh Rattata! I thought this plan would work for sure!
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: We’re not gonna quit! Next time, we’ll really wreck the PML!
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: There’s nothing to be worried about. If they try anything funny, we’ll give them the boot!
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: Doesn’t matter if a sync pair didn’t make it to the PML or if they lost along the way. They all have the one thing they need: the flame of courage!
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Hah! We’ll protect everyone in the PML!
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_1100_10: I couldn’t even make it this far...
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_1200_10: Fight with all my might, and achieve a shining victory...
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: That was my plan. But there were some unexpected surprises, so my strategy had to change.
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_0402_1700_10: No, not them. Two wonderfully shining things.
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_1800_10: One of them was you, of course. You shine so bright...
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_2000_10: everyone’s dazzlingly bright courage, which astounded even me!
story_24_04000_en.lsd.story_24_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: Make sure your heart shines brighter and brighter every day!

story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: I never thought they’d make it past Elesa’s team.
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m not sure which surprises me more—that or Team Break’s invasion.
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: Heh. [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team really is at the center of this little storm.
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: There aren’t too many teams left. It’s possible we’ll face [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team in the next round.
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: I’m sure [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he’ll' F='she’ll' ] be surprised to find out you’re on our team...
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: A battle is a fluid thing, and the advantage changes back and forth. That kind of uncertain chance is what makes it interesting.
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’m going to really enjoy battling [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ].
story_24_05000_en.lsd.story_24_05000/2401_1001_0800_10: It’ll be a great battle that will rage like churning waters on the stormy seas...

story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0100_10: Konnichiwa! Bonjour! Pleasure to meet you. I’m Professor Bellis.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m doing research on sync pairs here on Pasio.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0400_10: Aha! Brock and Misty mentioned that they’d teamed up with a promising young Trainer. That hat of yours fits their description.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_0500_10: So, how are you liking the team battling style of the island so far?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_0401_0700_10: Eccellente!  I hope you continue to have a great time here!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_0402_0900_10: Don’t worry! You’ll get the hang of it, mi [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='amigo' F='amiga' ]. I can tell you’re passionate about growing stronger. That passion is key!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1000_10: We already know that sync pairs have incredible potential, and there’s still so much we’ve yet to discover!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1100_10: Next time my research yields some exciting results, I’ll be sure to let you know, OK?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1200_10: Oh my. Is that the time? I need to do some shopping and hurry back to the lab!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1300_10: By the way, the shop here has all sorts of handy items in stock. Why don’t you go have a look?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1400_10: I suppose I’ll leave you to it for now! I’d better be off. Do svidaniya! Good luck!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1500_10: Welcome, welcome! Today is our grand opening, so feel free to stop by and browse through our stock any time!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1600_10: You can make changes to your team right over here. Why don’t you try doing it now?
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1700_10: Perfect! You successfully edited your team.
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1800_10: Feel free to use team editing to your advantage whenever you meet new sync pairs!
story_99_00010_en.lsd.story_99_00010/2401_1001_1900_10: Thank you for stopping by. I look forward to your next visit!

story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0100_10: Welcome! Since you’re a first-time customer, we’d like to offer you a Training Machine free of charge!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0200_10: By the way, you can use Training Machines to... you guessed it! Train with your partner Pokémon to improve their strength!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0300_10: Why don’t you try using this Training Machine to teach your Pikachu a new move!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0400_10: Wow! Nice work! Your Pikachu looks stronger than ever!
story_99_00030_en.lsd.story_99_00030/2401_1001_0500_10: Yep! That Training Machine sure seems to have done the trick. I’ll have to keep plenty in stock! Come again soon!

story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey you. You, in the shoddy hat. You have got some serious nerve,  waltzing in here wearing an eyesore like that.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0200_10: Hang on a minute... You’re Lear, right?  I don’t appreciate you and your cronies ganging  up on my friend, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0300_10: Ugh... Apparently, I was wrong. It’s not just [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]—the whole group is a dingy eyesore.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0400_10: You certainly don’t belong on any island I own!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_0401_0600_10: Did you just—?! I can’t believe there are still people  on this island who don’t know who I AM!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_0402_0800_10: Did you just—?! I can’t believe there are still people  on this island who don’t know who I AM!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_0900_10: I am Lear! It was I who created Pasio, the magnificent artificial island you now stand on— and I who founded the Pokémon Masters League!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1000_10: And it is I who shall be its champion!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1100_10: You would do well to remember my name.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1200_10: Uhhh, not like anybody asked, but I’m Rachel. See ya around.
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1300_10: Sawyer. Anyone who disrespects the young master will have to answer to me...
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1400_10: Hah! Don’t bother. I doubt these amateurs will be around long enough to cause us any trouble. Hahaha! Bwahahaha!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1500_10: I can’t believe he just insulted us like that out of nowhere... Don’t let jerks like him get to you, all right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1600_10: You’ve already shown me that you  and your Pokémon have got some promise  in this tournament!
story_99_00040_en.lsd.story_99_00040/2401_1001_1700_10: So c’mon! It’s time to take our next step toward competing in the PML!

story_99_00060_en.lsd.story_99_00060/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was hoping I’d run into you!
story_99_00060_en.lsd.story_99_00060/2401_1001_0200_10: I’ve made leaps and bounds in my research on sync pairs lately. If my new hypothesis is correct, you should be able to grow even stronger now!
story_99_00060_en.lsd.story_99_00060/2401_1001_0300_10: I believe you and your Pokémon can unleash an even greater power together! Why don’t we meet up here—I’d love to test out my theory!

story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0100_10: Velkommen! Show us what you’re capable of!  Prove your strength against this tough young man!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0200_10: I won’t go easy on you!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0300_10: Whoa! You guys are seriously strong!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0400_10: Fantástico! You’ve truly proven your strength today—and my hypothesis as well!
story_99_00061_en.lsd.story_99_00061/2401_1001_0500_10: Congratulations. May you and your Pokémon continue to grow and unlock even greater potential as a sync pair!

story_99_00070_en.lsd.story_99_00070/2401_1001_0100_10: Congratulations! From now on, you’ll be able to participate in any events that are going on!
story_99_00070_en.lsd.story_99_00070/2401_1001_0200_10: Events only last for a limited time, though. Act fast, or you might miss your chance at exploring the new areas!
story_99_00070_en.lsd.story_99_00070/2401_1001_0300_10: Feel free to check out the news for a list of all the events currently going on.

story_99_00090_en.lsd.story_99_00090/2401_1001_0100_10: You’ve done a fantastique job so far improving your strength as a sync pair! Very impressive!
story_99_00090_en.lsd.story_99_00090/2401_1001_0200_10: But did you know there’s a way to push that even further? Beyond your current limits? If you’d like to find out...meet me here.

story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah! I had a feeling you’d come and find me. Now then, step right up and show us all how strong you’ve become!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0200_10: I’ll be the judge of that! And I won’t go easy on you!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0300_10: Total defeat?! You’ve got some real power!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0400_10: Très bien! You’ve certainly earned a prize for yourselves today. I would love for you to have this!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0500_10: If you equip this, your team will be stronger than ever! Brilliant, don’t you think?!
story_99_00091_en.lsd.story_99_00091/2401_1001_0600_10: There’s a whole range of equipment out there with all sorts of different perks. Try searching for some the next time you go exploring!

story_99_00100_en.lsd.story_99_00100/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah! Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You have the most amazing timing.
story_99_00100_en.lsd.story_99_00100/2401_1001_0200_10: My research has been progressing über smoothly! In fact, I think I’ve found a way for you and your Pokémon to excel beyond your current limits!
story_99_00100_en.lsd.story_99_00100/2401_1001_0300_10: Here. Try using some of this special Buff Blend the next time you’re training together! I think you’ll be surprised how much stronger you feel!
story_99_00100_en.lsd.story_99_00100/2401_1001_0400_10: Isn’t this fantástico, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? From here on out, you and your Pokémon will be able to soar to even greater heights together!

story_99_00200_en.lsd.story_99_00200/2401_1001_0100_10: Bravo! You and your Pokémon have truly pushed yourselves to be the best that you can be!
story_99_00200_en.lsd.story_99_00200/2401_1001_0200_10: I think it’s time to give you this. You’ve earned it!
story_99_00200_en.lsd.story_99_00200/2401_1001_0300_10: With this gear, your team will be able to grow even stronger!
story_99_00200_en.lsd.story_99_00200/2401_1001_0400_10: Ah, subarashii! Don’t forget, you can find more amazing gear like this out in the field! Now, off you go! Enjoy your next adventure!

story_99_00300_en.lsd.story_99_00300/2401_1001_0100_10: Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Your timing is excelente today!
story_99_00300_en.lsd.story_99_00300/2401_1001_0200_10: I’d like to share a wee bit of my research with you... I made a new discovery that will allow you to expand on the power of your sync stone!
story_99_00300_en.lsd.story_99_00300/2401_1001_0300_10: With the help of sync orbs, you and your partner Pokémon will be able to achieve even greater feats in no time! Ganbatte ne!

story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0101_0100_1: Come on, you guys know the rules, don’tcha? If two Trainers’ eyes meet, they hafta battle!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0101_0200_1: We fight who we want! If you get in our way, we’ll fight you, too!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0501_0100_1: Psssh! It was just a bad matchup!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0501_0200_1: It’s gonna take a lot more than that to keep us from battling the Champion!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0101_0100_1: Now scram! We came here to fight Cynthia, and we’re not leavin’ till we do it! What are you gettin’ in our way for?!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0101_0200_1: These blockheads won’t even be a good warm-up, but if they want a whoopin’, a whoopin’ they’ll get!
story_zako_battle_01_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0501_0100_1: Graahhh! We missed our opportunity thanks to you!

story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0101_0300_1: Sync pair alert! Sync pair alert! If we take your strong Pokémon,  we will get stronger, too!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0101_0400_1: You there! Hand over your partner Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3801_0501_0100_1: Did we not prepare well enough? Retreat!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0100_1: I feel eyes on me... Could it be?
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0200_1: You must be those meddling kids I keep hearing about!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0300_1: Whoa, hold the phone... You got yourselves some mighty fine Pokémon there, don’t ya.
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0101_0400_1: I’ll take all of you out—and take your Pokémon while I’m at it! Get ’em!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3702_0501_0100_1: Darn it! You’ll pay for this!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0500_1: Hmm? Somebody’s in our hideout! What was the lookout doing?
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0600_1: Well well, it looks like we have some fine specimens here!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0101_0700_1: Thank you for raising your Pokémon with so much love and care... We’ll be taking them now!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3802_0501_0400_1: Strategic retreat! We’ll steal some stronger Pokémon  and get you next time!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3703_0101_0200_1: I got this ripped after I gave up being able to float!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3703_0501_0100_1: Not even my glorious muscles could help me overcome this?!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0100_1: Aw, jeez, this is the pits! Our eyes just met!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0200_1: You wanna get past me? Be my guest.
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0101_0300_1: Well, I’d like to say that, but I should at least do my job, right? Hand over your Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_02_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_02_01/3803_0501_0100_1: Well, I did my job as well as I could. Nobody can say I didn’t try.

story_zako_battle_03_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_03_01/3701_0101_0100_1: I just won a battle, so I’m in a great mood!
story_zako_battle_03_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_03_01/3701_0501_0200_1: Forget this! My mood is ruined!

story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3801_0101_0100_1: Aww, more cute little sync pairs!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3801_0101_0200_1: If you want to move on, you have to get past me!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3801_0501_0200_1: The afterglow of defeat is welling up inside me!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0100_1: O Wise One... Is this person perhaps...
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0200_1: Hey, let me take a look at your face a bit...
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0300_1: Oh snap! [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He' F='She' ] has a really bad fortune waiting for [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0101_0500_1: We must save [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]! It’s OK. Just leave everything to us!
story_zako_battle_05_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_05_01/3702_0501_0200_1: Meh, it’s not that big of a deal. [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='He’s' F='She’s' ] free to believe what [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='he' F='she' ] wants.

story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0100_1: And that is why it is imperative to carefully think of the best roles for each pair and...
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0200_1: All in all, I’m just glad I was able to be on your team!
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0300_1: Me too. I’m happy to be on a team with you... Maybe we can become even more than... Hm?
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0101_0400_1: Trainers! Perfect timing! I can show her how cool I am if we win!
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0501_0100_1: Aw, shucks. We lost. But that was so much fun! ...Maybe it was so fun because I was with you.
story_zako_battle_06_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_06_01/3702_0501_0300_1: Have you two forgotten that I am a part of the team, too?!

story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0100_1: This is the right way to the gathering spot, right?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0200_1: Aaah, jeez! What a pain in the neck. Why’d you have to make eye contact with me, huh? Seriously, give me a break.
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0300_1: Hey! What’re you doing?! Turn around before they notice you! Jeez!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0101_0400_1: Well, hello there! Fancy meeting you here... Would you be interested in a Pokémon battle?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0501_0100_1: Team Break? I’ve never heard of them, so I can’t help you there. But I really appreciate you battling us! Thanks!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3701_0501_0200_1: Ok! Hurry along home, now! I can only put up with a pain in my neck for so long...
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0101_0200_1: Finally, some new servants to wait on me! I do hope you come along... Who knows what’ll happen to your precious Pokémon if you don’t!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0501_0100_1: Oh... Are you sure you don’t want to be my servant? Final answer?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3702_0501_0200_1: No matter! I already have plenty!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0100_1: Oh? What’s this? Welcome to my cave. Are you lost?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0200_1: I looooove Pokémon! But I hate people....
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0101_0300_1: You know what I’m trying to say, right?
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0501_0100_1: It’s only natural that I like and dislike things...
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3703_0501_0200_1: But whenever I say that I don’t like something, some people yell at me... That’s why I’m going to stay in my cave.
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0100_1: Found ya! Ha ha! Team Break baddies, comin’ atcha!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0200_1: I was bad back in school, and I’m still bad now! Who cares about math when bein’ bad feels so good!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0300_1: Yeah! Can you count how many girls are on this team? That’s right—one! The same as my average test score!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0101_0400_1: Bet you think we’re going down the wrong path don’t you? Well, think again! ’Cause we’re the aces of bein’ bad!
story_zako_battle_07_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_07_01/3803_0501_0100_1: We’ll let you off easy this time!

story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0101_0100_1: I don’t even feel the cold here... Could this be my special talent...?!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0101_0200_1: Get ready for the power of a hiker that the cold never bothers!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0101_0300_1: Battling was never one of my talents! But even then, everybody has something they’re good at!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0501_0100_1: From today on, I will be an ice hiker! Using my talent to its fullest!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3701_0501_0300_1: No one knows where the ice hiker went after that. They say that he and his Pokémon still roam the icy mountain glaciers to this day...
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0101_0100_1: Brrr... Mas-s-ster! It’s t-t-too cold for swimming lessons out h-here!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0101_0200_1: Oh, come on. I know you can keep going! I mean, look at me!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0101_0300_1: I don’t feel cold at all!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3801_0501_0100_1: N-no! Don’t leave me behind, M-m-master! I can’t handle this cold! Waaait!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3702_0501_0100_1: You coulda gone a lil’ easier on me! I’m just a lil’ kid!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3702_0501_0200_1: You wait! I’ll beat you when I’m all growed up!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0100_1: Weird, we’re usually all pretty in sync.
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0200_1: Hey, four-eyes! Stop holding us back!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0300_1: We’re supposed to be a three-person team! And look at you two, always just... Hm?
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0101_0400_1: This is a good opportunity for me to show you that you need me, too!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0501_0100_1: Do you see now? The reason they won is because they properly operate as a team!
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0501_0200_1: Sorry. I shouldn’t have said those things. Your glasses are really nice.
story_zako_battle_08_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_08_01/3802_0501_0300_1: We had forgotten that we needed all three of us to win. Let’s wipe the slate clean and start over. This time, together!

story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0100_1: Hahaha! This town belongs to us now!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0200_1: Ma’am! These are those brats that we were telling you about!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0400_1: Very well, I shall purloin your Pokémon as well, and they will join my pretties!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0501_0100_1: Ma’am, you lied about how strong you are! Wait...why did I agree to be your servant?
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0501_0200_1: We got tricked by her boss-like vibes! I mean, if you really think about it, who even says “my pretties” anymore?
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0100_1: Argh! I went through all the trouble o’ stealin’ this little guy, and now...
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0200_1: It’s too darn cute... I can’t use it for battling! I...I can’t do it.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0300_1: Hey! Your Pokémon look pretty strong! Lemme just take ’em off your hands for ya!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0400_1: Wait! Stay back, lil’ bud! I can’t have you getting hurt!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0501_0200_1: I guess it was pretty stupid of me to steal other people’s Pokémon... I’ll go give this little guy back to his Trainer now.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0100_1: Hnnnggg! I can’t take it off!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0200_1: I didn’t want to put this mask on! Why would anybody put glue on the inside?!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0300_1: Oof, you look like you’re in a bind.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0400_1: Hm? What’s this? My body is acting on its own!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0501_0100_1: I did it! I got it off! I’m free!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0501_0200_1: Hmm... I feel like you lost your single defining characteristic.
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3703_0101_0600_1: Ooh! What nice-looking sync pairs! I’ll beat you and take your Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0100_1: Pokémon Ranger en route! Wee woo wee woo!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0200_1: Ambush successful! You must be members of Team Break!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0300_1: Now, send out your Pokémon! We’ll be having a Pokémon battle now!
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0501_0100_1: Training is complete! How was that? Realistic, huh?
story_zako_battle_09_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0501_0200_1: That was a good workout before fighting Team Break!

story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0100_1: I’m an Ace Trainer... I can’t lose...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0200_1: H-hey! I’m an Ace Trainer. One step away from the main tournament matches of the PML!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0300_1: There’s no way I’ll lose against a few random sync pairs!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0501_0100_1: H-how? I... Is this how strong the other teams heading to the tournament are?
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0501_0200_1: Nah! I’m probably just having a bad day! I would have been able to beat you normally!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0100_1: How many more badges do you need? Oh, just one?  You’re pretty good at this, aren’t you?
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0200_1: If I ever want something, somebody either gives it to me or I take it from them.
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0300_1: I want everything you have, so I’m going to take it from you!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0501_0100_1: I wonder... If I’d worked harder, could I be competing in the PML right now, too? Maybe that was a path I could have taken.
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0501_0200_1: All the grownups ever taught me was to take what I get and steal everything else...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0100_1: I love your Pokémon... Waaay more than you do...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0200_1: I can spend more money and time on them than you can...
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0300_1: Your Pokémon would be so much happier with me than with you!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0501_0100_1: I would buy them everything they want! I would give my everything to them!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3703_0101_0200_1: I have arrived! Prepare to fight! Right here! Right now!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0101_0200_1: You were lookin’ at me weren’t ya? Let’s battle!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0501_0100_1: Hey, thanks for havin’ that battle with me! I appreciate you not runnin’!
story_zako_battle_10_01_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0501_0200_1: I’ve got a bit of a mean lookin’ face, so most people run away before battlin’ me.

story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0100_1: Look, look! Is that [Name:PlayerNickname ] over there?!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0200_1: WOW! It really, really is [EN:Gen Ref='255' M='him' F='her' ]!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0300_1: You’ve been getting super famous lately, haven’t you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? Can I shake your hand?
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0101_0400_1: Oh my gosh, it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I heard you’re gonna be the next champion! Can we battle? Pleeease!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0501_0100_1: Whoa, the rumors about you were right! You’re amazing, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’re totally gonna be the champion!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3701_0501_0200_1: Good luck at the finals! We’ll be rooting for you!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0100_1: Wahhh! I h-hate this, I hate this! It’s all your fault!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0200_1: Sorry, Little Bro... Sorry that your big brother is such a big loser.
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0300_1: B-but I wanted to battle in the f-finals! Now I c-can’t! Wahhhh!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0400_1: I know... I brought you all the way to Pasio so we could do something cool, and I totally screwed it up for us.
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0500_1: If only we could have one final battle with a really awesome, famous Trainer before we leave the island...
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0600_1: but there’s no way that would ever happ—
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0700_1: AH! Oh my—! Are you [Name:PlayerNickname ]? THE [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0101_0800_1: Oh man, this has gotta be fate! Please, will you battle us? It would give us an awesome memory to take home!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0501_0200_1: We lost, but that’s OK! I had lotsa fun! Pokémon battling is the bestest thing ever!
story_zako_battle_20_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_02/3801_0501_0300_1: When we get home, let’s brag to Mom and Dad about how we got to battle against [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0100_1: Aha! We meet again! Remember us? Team Break baddies, comin’ atcha!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0200_1: I was bad back in school, and I’m still bad now! Who cares about math when bein’ bad feels so good!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0300_1: Can you count how many girls are on this team? That’s right—one! The same as my average test score!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0400_1: We’re still the same Team Break baddies as last time—except we’re different!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0500_1: I am muscle! I am brawn! I am war! I oversleep and run late—brutally late!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0600_1: I am the Chief Intelligence Officer of the Team Break baddies! My bovine brethren will render you defenseless!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0700_1: Uh...I dunno what that means, but...it’s showtime!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0501_0200_1: I think it’s time we disbanded the Team Break baddies.
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0100_1: Let’s steal Pokémon—lots and lots of Pokémon! And then conquer all of Pasio and rule it ourselves! Yeah!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0200_1: Mhmm... I like the way your mind works! Let’s put our heads together and make it happen.
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0300_1: You wanna get in on our plans, too, huh?
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0400_1: Wait a sec! Who are you?! You better not be those brats who keep running around beating our team members!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0500_1: You trying to steal my Pokémon?! Pokémon that I stole fair and square?
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0600_1: You’re just a self-righteous goody-two-shoes! I’ll make you regret messing with Team Break— and I’ll be taking your Pokémon, too!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0501_0100_1: W-wait! These Pokémon are our partners! Don’t take them away!
story_zako_battle_20_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0501_0200_1: We just wanted to live here in peace and quiet with the stolen Pokémon... Is that so bad?

story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3701_0101_0100_1: Yo, y’all like how I look, dawgs?! I’m dope and phat and fly, right?!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3701_0101_0200_1: I’m dope and phat and fly, right?!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3701_0101_0300_1: I’m dope and phat and fly, right?!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0100_1: Hey, girrrl! You look like you have an eye for fashion! We got something you might like!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0200_1: See this fine gentleman right here? He’s a famous fashion designer! And he’s, like, way more popular than Valerie.
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0300_1: Anyway, he thinks you got somethin’ special about you, so he’s offerin’ you a huge discount on a sweet outfit. They usually cost a fortune, y’know!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0400_1: Oh my gosh! Really? Me? Yes! I’ll buy it!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0101_0500_1: Hold on... Hey, you! What’re you lookin’ at! This ain’t a show!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0501_0100_1: Oh no! My clothes! They’re ruined!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0501_0200_1: Oh wow! Look at your clothes! Your outfits are so much better than theirs!
story_zako_battle_23_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_02/3801_0501_0300_1: I have to have them! What’s your price?!

story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0100_1: I’m the best-possible teammate that Elesa could choose!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0200_1: Why, you ask? It’s because of my outfit!  Look at it! Perfect contrast of black and white, just like a Zebstrika! This must be fate!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0300_1: What’re you on about, sister? Take a look at me: white sleeves and black pants! I’m way more Zebstrika than you!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0400_1: You cannot be serious! You have a Liepard on the back of your jacket, and you dare say you’re more inspired by Zebstrika than me?!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0101_0500_1: And you! Look at yourselves! You’re not even wearing Zebstrika colors! What’s the matter with you?
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0501_0100_1: Are you telling me it takes more than wearing the right colors to be on Elesa’s team?
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0501_0200_1: What the heck is more important than wearing the right colors?!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3701_0501_0300_1: I don’t get it... Somebody, tell us the answer!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0101_0100_1: We climbed so high up, but we still can’t see her...
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0101_0200_1: If we could get a good look at this fashion guru...
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0101_0300_1: Wait...is that her? I think that’s... Move! I can’t see!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0501_0100_1: No! You’ve got it all wrong! This isn’t what it looks like! We can explain!
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0501_0200_1: We have no confidence in our fashion sense, so we thought if we could learn from somebody fashionable like you...
story_zako_battle_23_06_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_23_06/3801_0501_0300_1: Oh, is that so? Hmm... Then, the best advice I can give you is to hold your heads high and don’t be so embarrassed about how you look. Own it.

story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0101_0100_1: Heh heh heh. All these Pokémon you brought out are totally rad!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0101_0200_1: They’ll be perfect for a rad Trainer like yours truly!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0101_0300_1: You guys think so, too, right?!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0501_0100_1: Osu! You were indeed the most rad! Please! Allow me to call you master!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3701_0501_0200_1: Yeah, yer the real deal! I got your back, too!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0101_0100_1: Take every Pokémon in sight! Don’t leave a single one behind!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0101_0300_1: I know! I’ll steal yer Pokémon so you can’t even fight in the PML!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0501_0100_1: Tch... Looks like we can’t even beat you with numbers.
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0501_0200_1: Whatever. It’s fine as long as we can mess with the PML!
story_zako_battle_24_02_en.lsd.story_zako_battle_24_02/3801_0501_0300_1: My crew probably stole way more Pokémon while I was distracting you here!

Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips_top.title: Tips
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category1.t: Sync Pairs
On Pasio, a sync pair is the term given to the combination of one Trainer and one Pokémon. Pokémon battles on Pasio comprise multiple sync-pair teams.
Stats

Numbers are used to express a sync pair’s strength. There are six stat categories, and their numbers affect the outcome of battles.
HP Represents how much energy the sync pair has. When this number reaches zero, the sync pair will faint.
Attack Represents the sync pair’s physical attack power. The higher the number, the more physical damage the sync pair deals to an opponent with physical moves.
Defense Represents the sync pair’s defense against physical moves. The higher the number, the less damage the sync pair takes from physical moves.
Sp. Atk Represents the power of the sync pair’s special attacks. The higher the number the more damage the sync pair deals with special moves.
Sp. Def Represents the sync pair’s defense against special attacks. The higher the number, the less damage the sync pair takes from special moves.
Speed Represents the sync pair’s speed. The higher the number, the faster the move gauge fills, allowing the sync pair to use moves more quickly.
Roles

Roles indicate what each sync pair excels at in battle. There are three kinds of roles.
Strike These sync pairs excel at attacking their opponent. Despite their high Attack and Sp. Atk levels, most sync pairs have low HP, making them vulnerable defensively.
Tech These sync pairs excel at hindering their opponents by inflicting them with status conditions and weakening them.
Support These sync pairs excel at assisting their allies by healing and upgrading them. Most also have a lot of HP, making them adept at withstanding attacks from opponents.
★s
A sync pair’s initial level cap varies according to the number of ★s on its icon.
Level (Lv.)

Sync pairs use the experience they earn in battle to increase their level, resulting in improved stats and even obtaining area information relating to Pokémon Evolution for some pairs.
Once a sync pair reaches its level cap, it cannot level up any further.
Pokémon Types
There are 18 types in total: Normal, Fire, Water, Electric, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Poison, Ground, Flying, Psychic, Bug, Rock, Ghost, Dragon, Dark, Steel, and Fairy.
Passive Skills

Sync pairs can have passive skills, which have an effect on battles. You can view the effects of passive skills by going to Edit Team via the Team menu, selecting a sync pair, and then checking under Passive Skill on its profile to get more info.

Weaknesses &
Supereffective Moves

Some regular moves and sync moves have types. In addition, sync pairs have a single type weakness. If you perform a move that is your opponents’ type weakness, it will be super effective and deal more damage. Similarly, if your sync pair is struck by a move type that it is weak to, they will take more damage.
Critical Hits

During battle, some attacks may deal more damage than usual. These are known as critical hits. Supereffective attacks can also land as critical hits. When you land a critical hit in a co-op battle, the unity gauge fills more quickly.
Gear

Giving gear to a team can strengthen its sync pairs. The effects of gear extend to all of the team’s sync pairs. Some gear is only for designated sync pairs. In that case, its effects will be halved for sync pairs on the team who don’t fulfill its conditions.
Favorite Sync Pairs
You can set a sync pair as your favorite via your Profile in the Poryphone menu. Sync pairs you have favorited can also be seen by your friends.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category2.t: Use level-up manuals to increase a sync pair’s experience.
Raise a sync pair’s level cap with specific items.

Power-Up: Use this item on a sync pair to raise their stats. You can find it in the Team menu under Increase Potential.
The number of times power-ups can be used depends on the sync pair’s number of ★s. Using the most power-ups possible for a sync pair increases its number of ★s. Once the sync pair’s number of ★s reaches its maximum level, it will no longer increase.
Some power-ups have an expiration date and will disappear if you do not use them in time.
When you acquire a duplicate sync pair, the level of its sync move increases. Sync moves have a maximum level of 5, and their damage increases with each rise in level.
From Moves & Skills on the Team menu, your sync pair can learn new moves or passive skills with certain items.
You can upgrade gear by using certain items. Upgrading gear boosts its effects.
Gear can only be upgraded to a certain level. However, you can go over this cap by exchanging duplicate gear.

Some sync pairs acquire Pokémon Evolution area info once they reach a certain level. By exploring these areas, you can evolve your sync pair’s Pokémon, increasing the sync pair’s stats. Once a Pokémon evolves, it cannot return to its previous form. Evolution materials are required to take on Evolution areas. You can exchange items for Evolution materials in the shop.
The move gauge is required to perform moves in battle. You can expand it by advancing through the main story and trading in coins at the shop.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category3.t: Moves
Sync pairs have different moves they can use in battle. Some moves require use of the move gauge. Moves that don’t use the move gauge can only be used a certain number of times.
Move Gauge
During battle, the move gauge fills up over time. Moves that use the move gauge cannot be performed until the move gauge is sufficiently full. Different moves use up a different amount of the gauge.
Moves with a Limited Number of Uses
Some moves can only be used a certain number of times. This number is reset at the end of each area.
Move Types
Some regular moves and sync moves have types. If you perform a move that is the type of your opponents’ weakness, it will be super effective and deal more damage.
Categories

The following is a list of move categories.
Physical The higher the Attack of the sync pair used, the greater the damage its physical attacks deal. Conversely, the higher your opponent’s Defense, the less damage they take.
Special The higher the Sp. Atk of the sync pair used, the greater the damage their special attacks deal. Conversely, the higher your opponent’s Sp. Def, the less damage they take.
Status These moves do not deal damage directly. They include moves that change the target’s stats, inflict status conditions, or heal.
Power
The higher the number, the more damage the move deals to the opponent.
Accuracy
The higher the number, the more likely the move is to hit the opponent.
Target

Indicates a move’s area of effect.
Self Affects only the sync pair that used the move.
Single Opponent Affects a single opponent you select.
All Opponents Affects all opposing sync pairs in the battle.
Single Ally Affects a single ally you select.
All Allies Affects all allied sync pairs in the battle.
Field of play Affects the field of play.
Allied field of play Affects the allied field of play.
Opponents’ field of play Affects the opponents’ field of play.
Sync Moves
Sync moves are attacks that can only be used when the sync move counter reaches zero. The counter decreases by one every time you perform a move.
Special Attacks
Sync moves and unity attacks are special kinds of attacks that can ignore the effects of many moves and passive skills while dealing damage.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category4.t: Sync Pair Stat Changes

A sync pair’s stats can be temporarily altered by move effects and other means.
The sync pair’s stat rank is set at 0, and can decrease 6 points or increase 6 points for a total of 13 ranks. However, a sync pair’s critical-hit rate ranges from 0 to 3.
These stat changes are indicated by icons.
Some moves, passive skills, or sync moves may be affected by these stat changes. However, stat changes that are caused by status conditions do not have such effects.
Changes to stats are reset when the sync pair is switched.
Field Effects

Effects on the field of play affect all sync pairs and can cover three areas: the allied side, the opposing side, and the entire field. Sync pairs in those areas are affected. The following is a list of effects on the field of play. (Some wear out after a period of time.)
Damage Reduction Reduces damage taken by the target. Some effects reduce damage taken from physical moves, and some effects reduce damage from special moves.
Status Move Defense Prevents the opponent’s status moves from affecting the target.
Status Condition Prevention Prevents status conditions from being inflicted on the target. However, moves that inflict status conditions upon the user cannot be defended against.
Status Condition Reflection When a status move would inflict a special condition on the target, that special condition is reflected. However, effects of moves that inflict status conditions upon the user or effects other than status moves that may cause a status condition cannot be reflected.
Stat Reduction Defense Effects that lower stats do not affect the target. However, moves that lower the user’s own stats cannot be defended against.
Stat Reduction Reflection When a status move would reduce the stats of the target, that stat reduction is reflected. However, effects of moves that reduce the user’s own stats or effects other than status moves that may reduce stats cannot be reflected.
Critical-Hit Defense Prevents attacks from being critical hits.
Unity Disruption Makes it difficult for the target’s team to fill their unity gauge.
Chain Reduction Reduces the amount of time chains can continue.
Switch Prevention Prevents sync pairs from switching.
Move Gauge Acceleration Causes the target’s move gauge to fill more quickly.
Weather Change Protection Prevents the weather from being changed.
Status Conditions

Sync pairs can be inflicted with status conditions by moves or other means during battle. The following is a list of status conditions.
Poisoned Lose HP for each action performed.
Badly Poisoned Lose HP for each action performed. The amount of HP lost increases over time.
Paralyzed The Pokémon may not perform a move successfully, but they will not fail to perform a sync move. The sync pair’s speed is also reduced.
Burned Lose HP for each action performed. Also reduces the sync pair’s Attack stat while in effect.
Asleep Makes a sync pair fall asleep, leaving the Pokémon unable to perform moves. They will wake up after a certain amount of time has passed or if they use their sync move. Some moves can still be used while asleep.
Frozen Freezes a sync pair, leaving the Pokémon unable to perform moves. They will thaw out after a certain amount of time has passed or if they use their sync move. Some moves can still be used while frozen.
Status conditions are not removed when a sync pair switches out, but once inflicted with one status condition, a sync pair can’t be inflicted with another. Status conditions are removed when the battle ends or when a move designed to remove status conditions is used. Sync moves can still be used while a sync pair is inflicted with a status condition; using a sync move causes the condition to be removed.
Status Changes

A sync pair’s status can be changed temporarily during battle. The following is a list of status categories.
Confusion Causes a Pokémon to potentially hit itself instead of an opponent when using a move. It lasts for a certain number of Pokémon moves or until the sync pair is switched out.
Flinching Causes a Pokémon to flinch, making it unable to perform a move, and causes the move gauge to fill more slowly. It lasts for a certain amount of time or until the sync pair uses a sync move or is switched out. It will also end if the Pokémon is put to sleep or frozen.
Trapped The sync pair will no longer be able to switch out and will take damage after every action. It lasts for a few moves.
Prevent Evasion Causes moves on the target to always hit (except in certain circumstances). Lasts for a fixed amount of time or until the sync pair is switched out.
Grant Type Resistance Temporarily grants resistance to one of the following move types, reducing the damage the target takes from them: Normal, Fire, Water, Electric, Grass, Ice, Fighting, Poison, Ground, Flying, Psychic, Bug, Rock, Ghost, Dragon, Dark, Steel, and Fairy. Lasts until the sync pair is switched out.
Endurance Unless attacked with a sync move or unity attack, the sync pair will always have at least 1 HP remaining after being hit by a move that would otherwise cause them to faint. It works once or lasts until the sync pair is switched out.
Gradual Healing Recovers HP with every action. It works for a certain number of moves or until the sync pair is switched out.
Status Maintenance Prevents some status changes and all status conditions inflicted by opponents. It lasts for a certain amount of time or until the sync pair is switched out.
Sure Hit Next Causes the next move to always hit, with some exceptions. It works until a move is performed or until the sync pair is switched out.
Guaranteed Critical Hit Causes the next attack to always be a critical hit (except in certain circumstances). The attack itself may miss, however. It works until a move is performed or until the sync pair is switched out.
Ready to Counterattack

Certain moves, such as Beak Blast, will cause a sync pair to get ready to counterattack. When certain conditions are met, the move will activate. The conditions for when each move will activate differ, so please see each move’s description for details.
Sync pairs in this state are unable to use most moves. Using the move again in this state or activating a unity attack will remove it.
Defensive Posture

Certain moves, such as King’s Shield, will cause a sync pair to take up a defensive posture. Sync pairs in this state will not take damage from some moves. Depending on the move, when certain conditions are met, an additional effect will be activated. Please see each move’s description for details.
Sync pairs in this state are unable to use most moves. Using the move again in this state or activating a unity attack will remove it.
Action Order

The order in which sync pairs act.
Although battles take place in real time, moves are performed in the order chosen, as opposed to the moment they are selected. You can turn this feature on or off by going to Settings in the Poryphone menu, selecting the bottom right icon (Battle/HUD), and scrolling down to find Action Order.
Select Target
Tap an opponent’s Pokémon to use a move on them.
Opponent’s Target

A red target icon will appear underneath a Pokémon when it is being targeted by the opposing sync pairs.
All opposing sync pairs will attempt to use a move against the same target.
Things Kept After Battle
HP and move usage counts are not reset at the end of each battle in the same area. However, status conditions are removed at the end of each battle.
Weather

Battles can be affected by weather conditions.
Sunny Boosts Fire-type moves. Freezing is disabled, and the frozen status condition is removed.
Rain Boosts Water-type moves.
Hail All sync pairs in battle take damage with every action.
Sandstorm All sync pairs in battle take damage with every action.
The effect of some moves changes based on the weather. Some passive skills are only activated during certain weather conditions. When the weather has already been changed and another weather-altering effect is used, the previous weather condition is overwritten and its effects are removed.
Unity Attacks & Unity Bonus

In co-op battles, the unity gauge fills up when sync pairs from your team attack continuously. When the unity gauge hits 100%, sync pairs from your team will automatically perform a powerful unity attack.
You select which sync pairs will participate in the unity attack. The more supereffective sync pair types used, the more damage they do to opponents they are super effective against.
When three allied sync pairs continuously attack without the opponent making a move, a unity bonus is activated for a certain period of time. While the unity bonus is in effect, the damage inflicted on your team’s opponents increases and any attack performed fills the unity gauge. Performing a supereffective attack while the unity bonus is in effect increases the duration of the bonus.
Switching

In co-op play, you can switch the sync pairs participating in a battle. To switch your active sync pair with a sync pair on standby, tap that sync pair’s move window to enlarge it, then tap the Pokémon icon at the top of the window to switch. If you tap the name of a move instead of the Pokémon icon, the sync pair will use that move as soon as they switch in. Although this feature is not available in the beginning, it can be unlocked by progressing through the game.
Team Condition

When a sync pair is affected by a status condition, the name of the condition will appear at the top of that sync pair’s move window. You can check the condition of a sync pair on standby by tapping that Trainer’s icon to enlarge it. Additionally, if your active sync pair is in danger of being hit by a supereffective attack, a warning icon will appear above that Pokémon.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category5.t:
Area info can be obtained by participating in events or progressing through the main story. Once you acquire area info, that area becomes available to explore.
Depending on the area info, the length of time and number of times you can explore an area may be limited.

There are two ways of matching in co-op play.
Quick Connect: Automatically matches you with other players in the matching lobby.
Connect with Friends: Invite and play with other players. Select Invite from Friend List to choose players to invite to the matching lobby. For invited players, the area info can be accessed by selecting the Invitations button at the bottom of the Poryphone menu; they can join the co-op battle by selecting that area.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category6.t:
At the Pokémon Center, you can get items by speaking to Trainers.
Additionally, you can select certain sync pairs you’d like to see visit the Pokémon Center more often. In the Edit Team menu, select a sync pair, then tap the + icon on the left to view their detail screen. Tap the heart icon at the top left of this screen to allow that sync pair to appear more frequently.
Note: This option is not available when viewing sync pair details in the Dex.

In Missions, you can earn various rewards for fulfilling certain conditions. To see what missions you can take on, go to Missions under the Poryphone menu.
You can get a special reward for completing all of the missions within the same group.
Some missions and the rewards earned for completing them are only available for a limited period of time.
Log-in bonuses or items that exceed your inventory limit are sent here. Some items can only be claimed for a certain period of time.

When a player becomes your friend, you can invite them to the same matching lobby in co-op battles.
To make someone a friend, you must send a friend request to either a player you met in a co-op battle or a player whose ID you know, and then have them accept.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category7.t:
Use sync pair scout to befriend a random sync pair.
If you get a sync pair you already have, its sync move level will increase by 1. If the sync pair’s sync move level is already at 5, you will receive a power-up with the same ★ level as the sync pair obtained.

Using sync pair scout earns you scout points. You earn scout points each time you use sync pair scout. When you reach the maximum amount, you can choose any sync pair available to befriend during that sync pair scout period.
Once the sync pair scout period is over, the scout points collected during that time will be deleted.
You can earn coins by exchanging extra gear. Once exchanged, gear cannot be returned to you.
Exchange items and coins for other items. The quantity and type of items that can be exchanged may vary depending on the time period.
Exchange gear to earn coins, or earn them as rewards for exploring. They can be exchanged for items or used to upgrade gear.
Tips_en.lsd.controllers.simple_text.tips.category8.t: A team comprises the sync pairs you take with you to explore and is made up of a maximum of three sync pairs.

You can create teams for both single-player and co-op battles. You choose three sync pairs to create your team.
In a single-player battle, you control all three sync pairs on your team, and you can toggle between them as needed.
In a co-op battle, you choose the three sync pairs who will take turns battling in the center position. You cannot control the other players’ sync pairs on the left or right during battle.

You can equip your team with gear. The effects of gear extend to all of the sync pairs on the team. Some gear is only effective for certain sync pairs. In those cases, its effects only apply to the sync pairs in the team who fulfill its conditions.
You can use this feature to automatically edit your team to maximize its strength. If you select a type, the strongest team possible will be created to explore, with priority given to that type.
Multiple teams can be created and saved as preset teams. You can choose which team to use before heading out to explore. The same sync pairs and gear can be used across different teams.
A measure of your team’s strength. This number increases when you have sync pairs with higher stats and a greater number of pairs who can perform supereffective moves in the chosen area.
Tips_en.lsd.2:
The categories listed below can be found in the Exchange Items menu.
\[General\] Items that can be exchanged at any time.
\[Event\] Items that can only be exchanged during a specified time period.
\[Daily\] Items that can be exchanged a specified number of times each day.
\[Monthly\] Items that can be exchanged a specified number of times each month.
There may be instances where certain categories do not contain any exchangeable items.
Tips_en.lsd.3:
Sync pairs can use the XP they earn in battle to increase their level, resulting in improved stats. Some pairs can even take on special areas relating to Pokémon Evolution when they reach a certain level.
Once a sync pair reaches its level cap, it cannot level up any further.
Tips_en.lsd.4:
Some sync pairs can take on special Pokémon Evolution areas once they reach a certain level. Completing these areas will evolve your sync pair’s Pokémon, increasing the sync pair’s stats. Once a Pokémon evolves, it cannot return to its previous form.
Evolution materials are required to take on Evolution areas and can be obtained in the shop.
Tips_en.lsd.5:
Roles indicate what each sync pair excels at in battle. There are three kinds of roles:
Strike: These sync pairs excel at attacking their opponent. Despite their high Attack and Sp. Atk stats, which give rise to powerful moves, most of these sync pairs have low HP, making them vulnerable defensively. Pairs who excel more at either physical or special attacks are divided further into Physical Strike and Special Strike types respectively.
Tech: These sync pairs excel at hindering their opponents with moves that inflict status conditions and weaken their stats.
Support: These sync pairs excel at assisting their allies with moves that heal and strengthen them. Most of these sync pairs also have a lot of HP, making them adept at withstanding enemy attacks.
Tips_en.lsd.6:
A move’s target indicates the move’s area of effect.
Self: Only affects the sync pair that used the move.
Single Opponent: Affects a single opponent you select.
All Opponents: Affects all opposing sync pairs.
Single Ally: Affects a single ally you select.
All Allies: Affects all allied sync pairs.
Field of Play: Affects all sync pairs in the field of play.
Field of Play (Allies): Affects all allied sync pairs in the field of play.
Field of Play (Opponents): Affects all opposing sync pairs in the field of play.
Tips_en.lsd.7:
Effects on the field of play affect all sync pairs.
These effects can cover three areas: the allied side, the opposing side, and the entire field, thereby affecting any sync pairs in those respective areas. The following is a list of area effect types. (Some wear out after a period of time.) Damage Reduction: Reduces damage received by the target. Some effects reduce damage taken from physical moves, and some effects reduce damage from special moves.
Status Move Defense: Prevents the target from being affected by an opponent’s status move.
Status Condition Defense: Prevents the target from being inflicted with a status condition. However, moves that inflict status conditions on yourself cannot be defended against.
Status Condition Reflection: Reflects the status condition of the target that has been inflicted by an opponent’s status move back to the opponent. However, moves used by the target that inflict a status condition on themselves, or non-status moves that inflict status conditions are not reflected.
Stat Reduction Defense: Prevents the target from having its stats reduced. However, moves that reduce your own stats cannot be defended against.
Stat Reduction Reflection: Reflects the stat reduction effect of a target that has been inflicted by an opponent’s status move back to the opponent.
